GE07mbh_12_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:001.000-0002_02: puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:001.000-0002_08: tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya ceti
GE07mbh_12_u:001.000-0003_04: namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.000-0003_05: namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
GE07mbh_12_u:001.001c: viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.002c: śaucaṃ nivartayiṣyanto māsam ekaṃ bahiḥ purāt
GE07mbh_12_u:001.004a: dvaipāyano nāradaś ca devalaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.004c: devasthānaś ca kaṇvaś ca teṣāṃ śiṣyāś ca sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.009a: nāradas tv abravīt kāle dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:001.010c: jiteyam avaniḥ kṛtsnā dharmeṇa ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:001.011a: diṣṭyā muktāḥ stha saṃgrāmād asmāl lokabhayaṃkarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:001.012a: kaccic ca nihatāmitraḥ prīṇāsi suhṛdo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:001.012c: kaccic chriyam imāṃ prāpya na tvāṃ śokaḥ prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:001.014a: idaṃ tu me mahad duḥkhaṃ vartate hṛdi nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:001.015a: saubhadraṃ draupadeyāṃś ca ghātayitvā priyān sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:001.016a: kiṃ nu vakṣyati vārṣṇeyī vadhūr me madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.018a: idam anyac ca bhagavan yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:001.021c: gūḍhotpannaḥ sutaḥ kuntyā bhrātāsmākaṃ ca sodaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.022a: toyakarmaṇi yaṃ kuntī kathayām āsa sūryajam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.023a: yaṃ sūtaputraṃ loko 'yaṃ rādheyaṃ cāpy amanyata
GE07mbh_12_u:001.023c: sa jyeṣṭhaputraḥ kuntyā vai bhrātāsmākaṃ ca mātṛjaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.024c: tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.025a: na hi taṃ veda pārtho 'pi bhrātaraṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.025c: nāhaṃ na bhīmo na yamau sa tv asmān veda suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.026a: gatā kila pṛthā tasya sakāśam iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.026c: asmākaṃ śamakāmā vai tvaṃ ca putro mamety atha
GE07mbh_12_u:001.027a: pṛthāyā na kṛtaḥ kāmas tena cāpi mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:001.027c: atipaścād idaṃ mātary avocad iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.028a: na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ tyaktuṃ nṛpaṃ duryodhanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:001.028c: anāryaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca kṛtaghnaṃ ca hi me bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:001.029a: yudhiṣṭhireṇa saṃdhiṃ ca yadi kuryāṃ mate tava
GE07mbh_12_u:001.029c: bhīto raṇe śvetavāhād iti māṃ maṃsyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.030c: saṃdhāsye dharmaputreṇa paścād iti ca so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:001.031a: tam avocat kila pṛthā punaḥ pṛthulavakṣasam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.031c: caturṇām abhayaṃ dehi kāmaṃ yudhyasva phalgunam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.032c: prāptān viṣahyāṃś caturo na haniṣyāmi te sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:001.033a: pañcaiva hi sutā mātar bhaviṣyanti hi te dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:001.033c: sakarṇā vā hate pārthe sārjunā vā hate mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:001.034a: taṃ putragṛddhinī bhūyo mātā putram athābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:001.034c: bhrātṝṇāṃ svasti kurvīthā yeṣāṃ svasti cikīrṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:001.035a: tam evam uktvā tu pṛthā visṛjyopayayau gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:001.035c: so 'rjunena hato vīro bhrātā bhrātrā sahodaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.036a: na caiva vivṛto mantraḥ pṛthāyās tasya vā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:001.037a: ahaṃ tv ajñāsiṣaṃ paścāt svasodaryaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:001.037c: pūrvajaṃ bhrātaraṃ karṇaṃ pṛthāyā vacanāt prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:001.040a: yadā hy asya giro rūkṣāḥ śṛṇomi kaṭukodayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:001.041a: tadā naśyati me krodhaḥ pādau tasya nirīkṣya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:001.041c: kuntyā hi sadṛśau pādau karṇasyeti matir mama
GE07mbh_12_u:001.042a: sādṛśyahetum anvicchan pṛthāyās tava caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:001.042c: kāraṇaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ cid api cintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:001.043a: kathaṃ nu tasya saṃgrāme pṛthivī cakram agrasat
GE07mbh_12_u:001.043c: kathaṃ ca śapto bhrātā me tat tvaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:001.044a: śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tvattaḥ sarvaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:001.044c: bhavān hi sarvavid vidvāṃl loke veda kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:002.001a: sa evam uktas tu munir nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.001c: kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ yathā śaptaḥ sa sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.002a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:002.002c: na karṇārjunayoḥ kiṃ cid aviṣahyaṃ bhaved raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:002.003a: guhyam etat tu devānāṃ kathayiṣyāmi te nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:002.003c: tan nibodha mahārāja yathā vṛttam idaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:002.004a: kṣatraṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ gacchec chastrapūtam iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:002.005a: sa bālas tejasā yuktaḥ sūtaputratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.006a: sa balaṃ bhīmasenasya phalgunasya ca lāghavam
GE07mbh_12_u:002.006c: buddhiṃ ca tava rājendra yamayor vinayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:002.008a: sa sakhyam agamad bālye rājñā duryodhanena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:002.009c: droṇaṃ rahasy upāgamya karṇo vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:002.010b-0006_01: aho citraṃ mahac citraṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:002.010c: arjunena samo yuddhe bhaveyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.011a: samaḥ putreṣu ca snehaḥ śiṣyeṣu ca tava dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:002.011c: tvatprasādān na māṃ brūyur akṛtāstraṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.012a: droṇas tathoktaḥ karṇena sāpekṣaḥ phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:002.012c: daurātmyaṃ cāpi karṇasya viditvā tam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:002.013c: kṣatriyo vā tapasvī yo nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:002.014a: ity ukto 'ṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭham āmantrya pratipūjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:002.014c: jagāma sahasā rāmaṃ mahendraṃ parvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:002.015a: sa tu rāmam upāgamya śirasābhipraṇamya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:002.016a: rāmas taṃ pratijagrāha pṛṣṭvā gotrādi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.016c: uṣyatāṃ svāgataṃ ceti prītimāṃś cābhavad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:002.017c: gandharvai rākṣasair yakṣair devaiś cāsīt samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.018a: sa tatreṣv astram akarod bhṛguśreṣṭhād yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:002.019a: sa kadā cit samudrānte vicarann āśramāntike
GE07mbh_12_u:002.021c: karṇaḥ prasādayaṃś cainam idam ity abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.022a: abuddhipūrvaṃ bhagavan dhenur eṣā hatā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:002.022c: mayā tatra prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.023a: taṃ sa vipro 'bravīt kruddho vācā nirbhartsayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:002.023c: durācāra vadhārhas tvaṃ phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
GE07mbh_12_u:002.024c: yudhyatas tena te pāpa bhūmiś cakraṃ grasiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:002.025a: tataś cakre mahīgraste mūrdhānaṃ te vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.026a: yatheyaṃ gaur hatā mūḍha pramattena tvayā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:002.027a: tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas taṃ dvijasattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:002.027c: gobhir dhanaiś ca ratnaiś ca sa cainaṃ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:002.028a: nedaṃ madvyāhṛtaṃ kuryāt sarvaloko 'pi vai mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:002.028c: gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā yad vā kāryaṃ te tat samācara
GE07mbh_12_u:002.029a: ity ukto brāhmaṇenātha karṇo dainyād adhomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:002.029c: rāmam abhyāgamad bhītas tad eva manasā smaran
GE07mbh_12_u:003.002a: tasmai sa vidhivat kṛtsnaṃ brahmāstraṃ sanivartanam
GE07mbh_12_u:003.004a: tataḥ kadā cid rāmas tu carann āśramam antikāt
GE07mbh_12_u:003.007c: na cainam aśakat kṣeptuṃ hantuṃ vāpi guror bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:003.009a: karṇas tu vedanāṃ dhairyād asahyāṃ vinigṛhya tām
GE07mbh_12_u:003.009c: akampann avyathaṃś caiva dhārayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_12_u:003.011a: aho 'smy aśucitāṃ prāptaḥ kim idaṃ kriyate tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:003.011c: kathayasva bhayaṃ tyaktvā yāthātathyam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:003.012c: dadarśa rāmas taṃ cāpi kṛmiṃ sūkarasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_12_u:003.014a: sa dṛṣṭamātro rāmeṇa kṛmiḥ prāṇān avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:003.016a: sa rāmaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā babhāṣe pūrṇamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.017c: bhadraṃ ca te 'stu nandiś ca priyaṃ me bhavatā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:003.018c: kas tvaṃ kasmāc ca narakaṃ pratipanno bravīhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:003.019a: so 'bravīd aham āsaṃ prāg gṛtso nāma mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.019c: purā devayuge tāta bhṛgos tulyavayā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:003.020a: so 'haṃ bhṛgoḥ sudayitāṃ bhāryām apaharaṃ balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:003.021a: abravīt tu sa māṃ krodhāt tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.022a: śāpasyānto bhaved brahmann ity evaṃ tam athābruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:003.022c: bhavitā bhārgave rāma iti mām abravīd bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.023a: so 'ham etāṃ gatiṃ prāpto yathā nakuśalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:003.024a: evam uktvā namaskṛtya yayau rāmaṃ mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.024c: rāmaḥ karṇaṃ tu sakrodham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:003.025a: atiduḥkham idaṃ mūḍha na jātu brāhmaṇaḥ sahet
GE07mbh_12_u:003.025c: kṣatriyasyaiva te dhairyaṃ kāmayā satyam ucyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:003.026a: tam uvāca tataḥ karṇaḥ śāpabhītaḥ prasādayan
GE07mbh_12_u:003.026c: brahmakṣatrāntare sūtaṃ jātaṃ māṃ viddhi bhārgava
GE07mbh_12_u:003.027a: rādheyaḥ karṇa iti māṃ pravadanti janā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:003.027c: prasādaṃ kuru me brahmann astralubdhasya bhārgava
GE07mbh_12_u:003.028a: pitā gurur na saṃdeho vedavidyāpradaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:003.028c: ato bhārgava ity uktaṃ mayā gotraṃ tavāntike
GE07mbh_12_u:003.029a: tam uvāca bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ saroṣaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:003.030c: tasmād etad dhi te mūḍha brahmāstraṃ pratibhāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:003.031c: abrāhmaṇe na hi brahma dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:003.032a: gacchedānīṃ na te sthānam anṛtasyeha vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:003.032c: na tvayā sadṛśo yuddhe bhavitā kśatriyo bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:003.033a: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa nyāyenopajagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.002a: tataḥ kadā cid rājānaḥ samājagmuḥ svayaṃvare
GE07mbh_12_u:004.006a: śiśupālo jarāsaṃdho bhīṣmako vakra eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:004.006c: kapotaromā nīlaś ca rukmī ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.007a: sṛgālaś ca mahārāja strīrājyādhipatiś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.007c: aśokaḥ śatadhanvā ca bhojo vīraś ca nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.008a: ete cānye ca bahavo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.008c: mlecchācāryāś ca rājānaḥ prācyodīcyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:004.009c: sarve bhāsvaradehāś ca vyāghrā iva madotkaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.012c: pratyaṣedhac ca tāṃ kanyām asatkṛtya narādhipān
GE07mbh_12_u:004.013c: ratham āropya tāṃ kanyām ājuhāva narādhipān
GE07mbh_12_u:004.015a: tato vimardaḥ sumahān rājñām āsīd yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:004.017a: karṇas teṣām āpatatām ekaikena kṣureṇa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:004.018a: tato vidhanuṣaḥ kāṃś cit kāṃś cid udyatakārmukān
GE07mbh_12_u:004.018c: kāṃś cid udvahato bāṇān rathaśaktigadās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:004.020a: te svayaṃ tvarayanto 'śvān yāhi yāhīti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:004.020c: vyapeyus te raṇaṃ hitvā rājāno bhagnamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.001a: āviṣkṛtabalaṃ karṇaṃ jñātvā rājā tu māgadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.004c: bibheda saṃdhiṃ dehasya jarayā śleṣitasya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:005.005a: sa vikāraṃ śarīrasya dṛṣṭvā nṛpatir ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.005c: prīto 'smīty abravīt karṇaṃ vairam utsṛjya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:005.006a: prītyā dadau sa karṇāya mālinīṃ nagarīm atha
GE07mbh_12_u:005.007a: pālayām āsa campāṃ tu karṇaḥ parabalārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.009a: sa divye sahaje prādāt kuṇḍale paramārcite
GE07mbh_12_u:005.010a: vimuktaḥ kuṇḍalābhyāṃ ca sahajena ca varmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:005.011c: kuntyāś ca varadānena māyayā ca śatakratoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.015a: evaṃ śaptas tava bhrātā bahubhiś cāpi vañcitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:005.015c: na śocyaḥ sa naravyāghro yuddhe hi nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:006.001a: etāvad uktvā devarṣir virarāma sa nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:006.004c: jahi śokaṃ mahāprājña śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_12_u:006.005a: yatitaḥ sa mayā pūrvaṃ bhrātryaṃ jñāpayituṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:006.005c: bhāskareṇa ca devena pitrā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:006.006a: yad vācyaṃ hitakāmena suhṛdā bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:006.007a: na cainam aśakad bhānur ahaṃ vā snehakāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:006.007c: purā pratyanunetuṃ vā netuṃ vāpy ekatāṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:006.009a: ity ukto dharmarājas tu mātrā bāṣpākulekṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:006.010c: śaśāpa ca mahātejāḥ sarvalokeṣu ca striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.002a: āviṣṭo duḥkhaśokābhyāṃ niḥśvasaṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.003c: jñātīn niṣpuruṣān kṛtvā nemāṃ prāpsyāma durgatim
GE07mbh_12_u:007.004a: amitrā naḥ samṛddhārthā vṛttārthāḥ kuravaḥ kila
GE07mbh_12_u:007.004c: ātmānam ātmanā hatvā kiṃ dharmaphalam āpnumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.005a: dhig astu kṣātram ācāraṃ dhig astu balam aurasam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.005c: dhig astv amarṣaṃ yenemām āpadaṃ gamitā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.006a: sādhu kṣamā damaḥ śaucam avairodhyam amatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.007a: vayaṃ tu lobhān mohāc ca stambhaṃ mānaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.008a: trailokyasyāpi rājyena nāsmān kaś cit praharṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:007.010a: āmiṣe gṛdhyamānānām aśunāṃ naḥ śunām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:007.010c: āmiṣaṃ caiva no naṣṭam āmiṣasya ca bhojinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.011a: na pṛthivyā sakalayā na suvarṇasya rāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.011c: na gavāśvena sarveṇa te tyājyā ya ime hatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.013a: bahu kalyāṇam icchanta īhante pitaraḥ sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:007.014c: labhante mātaro garbhāṃs tān māsān daśa bibhrati
GE07mbh_12_u:007.015a: yadi svasti prajāyante jātā jīvanti vā yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:007.015c: saṃbhāvitā jātabalās te dadyur yadi naḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:007.016c: yad āsāṃ nihatāḥ putrā yuvāno mṛṣṭakuṇḍalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.017a: abhuktvā pārthivān bhogān ṛṇāny anavadāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:007.018a: yadaiṣām aṅga pitarau jātau kāmamayāv iva
GE07mbh_12_u:007.019c: na te janmaphalaṃ kiṃ cid bhoktāro jātu karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:007.020a: pāñcālānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca hatā eva hi ye 'hatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.020c: te vayaṃ tv adhamāṃl lokān prapadyema svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.021a: vayam evāsya lokasya vināśe kāraṇaṃ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.023a: aṃśakāmā vayaṃ te ca na cāsmābhir na tair jitam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.023c: na tair bhukteyam avanir na nāryo gītavāditam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.024a: nāmātyasamitau kathyaṃ na ca śrutavatāṃ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.024c: na ratnāni parārdhyāni na bhūr na draviṇāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.024d-0007_01: asmaddveṣeṇa saṃtaptaḥ sukhaṃ na smeha vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:007.025a: ṛddhim asmāsu tāṃ dṛṣṭvā vivarṇo hariṇaḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.028a: imau vṛddhau ca śokāgnau prakṣipya sa suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.029a: ko hi bandhuḥ kulīnaḥ saṃs tathā brūyāt suhṛjjane
GE07mbh_12_u:007.030a: ātmano hi vayaṃ doṣād vinaṣṭāḥ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.030c: pradahanto diśaḥ sarvās tejasā bhāskarā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:007.031c: duryodhanakṛte hy etat kulaṃ no vinipātitam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.031e: avadhyānāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā loke prāptāḥ sma vācyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:007.033a: hatāḥ śūrāḥ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ viṣayaḥ svo vināśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.033c: hatvā no vigato manyuḥ śoko māṃ rundhayaty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:007.034c: tyāgavāṃś ca punaḥ pāpaṃ nālaṃ kartum iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.036c: vanam āmantrya vaḥ sarvān gamiṣyāmi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:007.037a: na hi kṛtsnatamo dharmaḥ śakyaḥ prāptum iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.038a: mayā nisṛṣṭaṃ pāpaṃ hi parigraham abhīpsatā
GE07mbh_12_u:007.038c: janmakṣayanimittaṃ ca śakyaṃ prāptum iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:007.039a: sa parigraham utsṛjya kṛtsnaṃ rājyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:007.040a: praśādhi tvam imām urvīṃ kṣemāṃ nihatakaṇṭakām
GE07mbh_12_u:007.040c: na mamārtho 'sti rājyena na bhogair vā kurūttama
GE07mbh_12_u:008.003a: aho duḥkham aho kṛcchram aho vaiklavyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:008.003c: yat kṛtvāmānuṣaṃ karma tyajethāḥ śriyam uttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:008.005a: klībasya hi kuto rājyaṃ dīrghasūtrasya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.006a: yo hy ājijīviṣed bhaikṣyaṃ karmaṇā naiva kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:008.007a: kāpālīṃ nṛpa pāpiṣṭhāṃ vṛttim āsthāya jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.007c: saṃtyajya rājyam ṛddhaṃ te loko 'yaṃ kiṃ vadiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:008.008c: kasmād āśaṃsase bhaikṣyaṃ cartuṃ prākṛtavat prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:008.009a: asmin rājakule jāto jitvā kṛtsnāṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:008.009c: dharmārthāv akhilau hitvā vanaṃ mauḍhyāt pratiṣṭhase
GE07mbh_12_u:008.010c: bhavatā viprahīṇāni prāptaṃ tvām eva kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:008.011c: kṛtyā nṛśaṃsā hy adhane dhig astv adhanatām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:008.012a: aśvastanam ṛṣīṇāṃ hi vidyate veda tad bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:008.012c: yaṃ tv imaṃ dharmam ity āhur dhanād eṣa pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:008.013a: dharmaṃ saṃharate tasya dhanaṃ harati yasya yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.013c: hriyamāṇe dhane rājan vayaṃ kasya kṣamemahi
GE07mbh_12_u:008.014c: dāridryaṃ pātakaṃ loke kas tac chaṃsitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:008.015a: patitaḥ śocyate rājan nirdhanaś cāpi śocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:008.016a: arthebhyo hi vivṛddhebhyaḥ saṃbhṛtebhyas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.017a: ardhād dharmaś ca kāmaś ca svargaś caiva narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:008.017c: prāṇayātrā hi lokasya vinārthaṃ na prasidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:008.018c: vyucchidyante kriyāḥ sarvā grīṣme kusarito yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:008.019a: yasyārthās tasya mitrāṇi yasyārthās tasya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.019c: yasyārthāḥ sa pumāṃl loke yasyārthāḥ sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.020c: arthair arthā nibadhyante gajair iva mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.021a: dharmaḥ kāmaś ca svargaś ca harṣaḥ krodhaḥ śrutaṃ damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.022a: dhanāt kulaṃ prabhavati dhanād dharmaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:008.022c: nādhanasyāsty ayaṃ loko na paraḥ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_12_u:008.023c: dhanād dhi dharmaḥ sravati śailād girinadī yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:008.024c: sa vai rājan kṛśo nāma na śarīrakṛśaḥ kṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.025c: rājan kim anyaj jñātīnāṃ vadhād ṛdhyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.026a: na ced dhartavyam anyasya kathaṃ tad dharmam ārabhet
GE07mbh_12_u:008.026c: etāvān eva vedeṣu niścayaḥ kavibhiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.027c: sarvathā dhanam āhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyaṃ cāpi yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.028a: drohād devair avāptāni divi sthānāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.028b-0009_01: drohāt kim anyaj jñātīnāṃ gṛdhyante yena devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.028c: iti devā vyavasitā vedavādāś ca śāśvatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.029c: kṛtsnaṃ tad eva ca śreyo yad apy ādadate 'nyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.030a: na paśyāmo 'napahṛtaṃ dhanaṃ kiṃ cit kva cid vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:008.030c: evam eva hi rājāno jayanti pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:008.031a: jitvā mamatvaṃ bruvate putrā iva pitur dhane
GE07mbh_12_u:008.031c: rājarṣayo jitasvargā dharmo hy eṣāṃ nigadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:008.032a: yathaiva pūrṇād udadheḥ syandanty āpo diśo daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:008.033a: āsīd iyaṃ dilīpasya nṛgasya nahuṣasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:008.033c: ambarīṣasya māndhātuḥ pṛthivī sā tvayi sthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:008.034a: sa tvāṃ dravyamayo yajñaḥ saṃprāptaḥ sarvadakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:008.034c: taṃ cen na yajase rājan prāptas tvaṃ devakilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:008.035c: upetya tasyāvabhṛthaṃ pūtāḥ sarve bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:008.037c: mahān dāśarathaḥ panthā mā rājan kāpathaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.001c: dhārayitvāpi te śrutvā rocatāṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:009.002a: sārthagamyam ahaṃ mārgaṃ na jātu tvatkṛte punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.002c: gaccheyaṃ tad gamiṣyāmi hitvā grāmyasukhāny uta
GE07mbh_12_u:009.003a: kṣemyaś caikākinā gamyaḥ panthāḥ ko 'stīti pṛccha mām
GE07mbh_12_u:009.003c: atha vā necchasi praṣṭum apṛcchann api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:009.010c: pitṝn devāṃś ca vanyena vāgbhir adbhiś ca tarpayan
GE07mbh_12_u:009.012c: caran bhaikṣyaṃ munir muṇḍaḥ kṣapayiṣye kalevaram
GE07mbh_12_u:009.014a: na śocan na prahṛṣyaṃś ca tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.015c: akurvāṇaḥ paraiḥ kāṃ cit saṃvidaṃ jātu kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:009.016c: prajāḥ sarvāḥ svadharmasthāḥ samaḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:009.017a: na cāpy avahasan kaṃ cin na kurvan bhrukuṭīṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:009.018a: apṛcchan kasya cin mārgaṃ vrajan yenaiva kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:009.018c: na deśaṃ na diśaṃ kāṃ cid gantum icchan viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.020a: svabhāvas tu prayāty agre prabhavanty aśanāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:009.020c: dvaṃdvāni ca viruddhāni tāni sarvāṇy acintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:009.021a: alpaṃ vāsvādu vā bhojyaṃ pūrvālābhena jātu cit
GE07mbh_12_u:009.021c: anyeṣv api caraṃl lābham alābhe sapta pūrayan
GE07mbh_12_u:009.023a: ekakālaṃ caran bhaikṣyaṃ gṛhe dve caiva pañca ca
GE07mbh_12_u:009.023d-0010_01: alābhe sati vā lābhe samadarśī mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.024a: na jijīviṣuvat kiṃ cin na mumūrṣuvad ācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:009.024c: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva nābhinandan na ca dviṣan
GE07mbh_12_u:009.025c: nākalyāṇaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ cintayann ubhayos tayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.026a: yāḥ kāś cij jīvatā śakyāḥ kartum abhyudayakriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.028c: na vaśe kasya cit tiṣṭhan sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.029a: vītarāgaś carann evaṃ tuṣṭiṃ prāpsyāmi śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:009.029c: tṛṣṇayā hi mahat pāpam ajñānād asmi kāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:009.031c: pratigṛhṇāti tat pāpaṃ kartuḥ karmaphalaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:009.033c: asāram imam asvantaṃ saṃsāraṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:009.034a: divaḥ patatsu deveṣu sthānebhyaś ca maharṣiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:009.034c: ko hi nāma bhavenārthī bhavet kāraṇatattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:009.035a: kṛtvā hi vividhaṃ karma tat tad vividhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:009.035c: pārthivair nṛpatiḥ svalpaiḥ kāraṇair eva badhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:009.036a: tasmāt prajñāmṛtam idaṃ cirān māṃ pratyupasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:009.036c: tat prāpya prārthaye sthānam avyayaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.003c: kṣātram ācarato mārgam api bandhos tvadantare
GE07mbh_12_u:010.004a: yadīmāṃ bhavato buddhiṃ vidyāma vayam īdṛśīm
GE07mbh_12_u:010.004c: śastraṃ naiva grahīṣyāmo na vadhiṣyāma kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:010.005c: na cedaṃ dāruṇaṃ yuddham abhaviṣyan mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_12_u:010.006a: prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvam iti vai kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.006c: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvaṃ prāṇasya bhojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.007a: ādadānasya ced rājyaṃ ye ke cit paripanthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.007c: hantavyās ta iti prājñāḥ kṣatradharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.008c: tān hatvā bhuṅkṣva dharmeṇa yudhiṣṭhira mahīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:010.009a: yathā hi puruṣaḥ khātvā kūpam aprāpya codakam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.010c: aprāśya nidhanaṃ gacchet karmedaṃ nas tathopamam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.011a: yathā mahāntam adhvānam āśayā puruṣaḥ patan
GE07mbh_12_u:010.011c: sa nirāśo nivarteta karmedaṃ nas tathopamam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.012c: ātmānaṃ ghātayet paścāt karmedaṃ nas tathāvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:010.013a: yathānnaṃ kṣudhito labdhvā na bhuñjīta yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:010.013c: kāmī ca kāminīṃ labdhvā karmedaṃ nas tathāvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:010.014a: vayam evātra garhyā hi ye vayaṃ mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.014c: tvāṃ rājann anugacchāmo jyeṣṭho 'yam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:010.016c: kathaṃ vai nānupaśyeyur janāḥ paśyanti yādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:010.017a: āpatkāle hi saṃnyāsaḥ kartavya iti śiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:010.018a: tasmād iha kṛtaprajñās tyāgaṃ na paricakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:010.019a: kathaṃ tasmāt samutpannas tanniṣṭhas tad upāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.019c: tad eva nindann āsīta śraddhā vānyatra gṛhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:010.021a: śakyaṃ tu mauṇḍyam āsthāya bibhratātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:010.021c: dharmacchadma samāsthāya āsituṃ na tu jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:010.022a: śakyaṃ punar araṇyeṣu sukham ekena jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:010.023a: neme mṛgāḥ svargajito na varāhā na pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.023c: athaitena prakāreṇa puṇyam āhur na tāñ janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.024a: yadi saṃnyāsataḥ siddhiṃ rājan kaś cid avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:010.024c: parvatāś ca drumāś caiva kṣipraṃ siddhim avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.026a: atha ced ātmabhāgyeṣu nānyeṣāṃ siddhim aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:010.026c: tasmāt karmaiva kartavyaṃ nāsti siddhir akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.027a: audakāḥ sṛṣṭayaś caiva jantavaḥ siddhim āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.027c: yeṣām ātmaiva bhartavyo nānyaḥ kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:010.027d-0011_01: te 'pi vai puruṣā loke parvatānām ihopamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:010.028a: avekṣasva yathā svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir vyāpṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:010.028c: tasmāt karmaiva kartavyaṃ nāsti siddhir akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.002a: ke cid gṛhān parityajya vanam abhyagaman dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.003c: tyaktvā gṛhān pitṝṃś caiva tān indro 'nvakṛpāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:011.004a: tān ābabhāṣe bhagavān pakṣī bhūtvā hiraṇmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.004c: suduṣkaraṃ manuṣyaiś ca yat kṛtaṃ vighasāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.005a: puṇyaṃ ca bata karmaiṣāṃ praśastaṃ caiva jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:011.005c: saṃsiddhās te gatiṃ mukhyāṃ prāptā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.006c: asmān nūnam ayaṃ śāsti vayaṃ ca vighasāśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.008a: idaṃ śreyaḥ param iti vayam evābhyupāsmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:011.008c: śakune brūhi yac chreyo bhṛśaṃ vai śraddadhāma te
GE07mbh_12_u:011.009c: tato 'haṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi yāthātathyaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.010a: śṛṇumas te vacas tāta panthāno viditās tava
GE07mbh_12_u:011.010c: niyoge caiva dharmātman sthātum icchāma śādhi naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.011a: catuṣpadāṃ gauḥ pravarā lohānāṃ kāñcanaṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:011.011c: śabdānāṃ pravaro mantro brāhmaṇo dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.013a: karmāṇi vaidikāny asya svargyaḥ panthās tv anuttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.015c: siddhikṣetram idaṃ puṇyam ayam evāśramo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:011.016a: atha ye karma nindanto manuṣyāḥ kāpathaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.016c: mūḍhānām arthahīnānāṃ teṣām enas tu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:011.017c: saṃtyajya mūḍhā vartante tato yānty aśrutīpatham
GE07mbh_12_u:011.018a: etad vo 'stu tapo yuktaṃ dadānīty ṛṣicoditam
GE07mbh_12_u:011.018c: tasmāt tad adhyavasatas tapasvi tapa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:011.019c: saṃvibhajya guroś caryāṃ tad vai duṣkaram ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:011.020a: devā vai duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā vibhūtiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.020c: tasmād gārhasthyam udvoḍhuṃ duṣkaraṃ prabravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.021a: tapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ prajānāṃ hi mūlam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.022a: etad vidus tapo viprā dvaṃdvātītā vimatsarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.022c: tasmād vanaṃ madhyamaṃ ca lokeṣu tapa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:011.025c: lokasya guravo bhūtvā te bhavanty anupaskṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:011.027a: tatas te tad vacaḥ śrutvā tasya dharmārthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:011.028a: tasmāt tvam api durdharṣa dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.001a: arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nakulo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:012.003c: tasmād viddhi mahārāja devān karmapathi sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:012.004a: anāstikān āstikānāṃ prāṇadāḥ pitaraś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:012.004c: te 'pi karmaiva kurvanti vidhiṃ paśyasva pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:012.005a: na hi vedoktam utsṛjya vipraḥ sarveṣu karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:012.006a: atyāśramān ayaṃ sarvān ity āhur vedaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.007c: kṛtātmasu mahārāja sa vai tyāgī smṛto naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.008c: ātmatyāgī mahārāja sa tyāgī tāmasaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:012.009c: apācakaḥ sadā yogī sa tyāgī pārtha bhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.010a: krodhaharṣāv anādṛtya paiśunyaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.010c: vipro vedān adhīte yaḥ sa tyāgī gurupūjakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.011a: āśramāṃs tulayā sarvān dhṛtān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.011c: ekatas te trayo rājan gṛhasthāśrama ekataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.012a: samīkṣate tu yo 'rthaṃ vai kāmaṃ svargaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:012.012c: ayaṃ panthā maharṣīṇām iyaṃ lokavidāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.013a: iti yaḥ kurute bhāvaṃ sa tyāgī bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:012.013c: na yaḥ parityajya gṛhān vanam eti vimūḍhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:012.016a: śamo damas tapo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucam athārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.016c: yajño dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca nityam ārṣo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.017c: atraiva hi mahārāja trivargaḥ kevalaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.018c: tyāginaḥ prasṛtasyeha nocchittir vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:012.019a: asṛjad dhi prajā rājan prajāpatir akalmaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.020a: vīrudhaś caiva vṛkṣāṃś ca yajñārthaṃ ca tathauṣadhīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.020c: paśūṃś caiva tathā medhyān yajñārthāni havīṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:012.021c: tasmād gārhasthyam eveha duṣkaraṃ durlabhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:012.022c: na yajante mahārāja śāśvataṃ teṣu kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0001: idam anyan mahārāja vidvadbhiḥ kathitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0002: bhūmir agniś ca vāyuś ca na cāpo na divākaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0003: nakṣatrāṇi na candraś ca na diśaḥ kāla eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0004: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca na gandho na rasaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0005: na ca santi pramāṇāni yaiḥ prameyaṃ prasādhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0007: nārthāpattir na caitihyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na ca saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0008: na kva cin nirṇayo rājan nādharmo dharma eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0009: tiryak ca sthāvaraṃ caiva na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0010: varṇāśramavibhāgaś ca na ca kartā na karmakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0011: na cārthaś ca vibhūtiś ca na cārthasya viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0012: tamobhūtam idaṃ sarvam anālokaṃ jagan nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0013: na cātmā vidyamāno 'pi manasā yogam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0014: acetanaṃ manas tv āsīd ātmā eva sacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0015: īśvaraś cetanas tv ekas tenedaṃ gahanīkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0016: mantrāś ca cetanā rājan na ca dehena yojitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0017: te ca viśvasṛjo nāma ṛṣayo mantradevatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0018: caitanyam īśvarāt prāpya brahmāṇḍaṃ tair vinirmitam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0020: sṛṣṭis tena samārabdhā prasādād īśvarasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0022: yogena ca samāviṣṭaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ ca śaṃbhunā
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0023: dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca ukto mokṣaś ca saṃkṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0025: ajño jantur anīśaś ca bhājanaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0026: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhram eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0032: tvaṃ cānye ca mahārāja īśvarasya vaśe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0033: jīvante ca mriyante ca na svatantrāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0034: hitvā hitvā ca bhūtāni hatvā sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0035: yajate karmaṇā devaṃ na sa pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0037: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca te ca yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0039: prajānāṃ hitakāmaiś ca ātmanaś ca hitaiṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0040: yadi tatra bhavet pāpaṃ kathaṃ te svargam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.023d-001_0041: na prāptā narakaṃ rājan veṣṭitāḥ pāpakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.025a: sa ratnāni vicitrāṇi saṃbhṛtāni tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.025e: kuṭumbam āsthite tyāgaṃ na paśyāmi narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:012.026c: ya cānye kratavas tāta brāhmaṇair abhipūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.026e: tair yajasva mahārāja śakro devapatir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:012.027c: aśaraṇyaḥ prajānāṃ yaḥ sa rājā kalir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.028a: aśvān gāś caiva dāsīś ca kareṇūś ca svalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.028c: grāmāñ janapadāṃś caiva kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:012.029c: vayaṃ te rājakalayo bhaviṣyāmo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.030c: duḥkhānām eva bhoktāro na sukhānāṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:012.031a: aniṣṭvā ca mahāyajñair akṛtvā ca pitṛsvadhām
GE07mbh_12_u:012.032c: lokayor ubhayor bhraṣṭo hy antarāle vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:012.033a: antar bahiś ca yat kiṃ cin manovyāsaṅgakārakam
GE07mbh_12_u:012.033c: parityajya bhavet tyāgī na yo hitvā pratiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_12_u:012.034c: brāhmaṇasya mahārāja nocchittir vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:012.035a: nihatya śatrūṃs tarasā samṛddhān; śakro yathā daityabalāni saṃkhye
GE07mbh_12_u:012.035c: kaḥ pārtha śocen nirataḥ svadharme; pūrvaiḥ smṛte pārthiva śiṣṭajuṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:012.036a: kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa parākrameṇa; jitvā mahīṃ mantravidbhyaḥ pradāya
GE07mbh_12_u:012.036c: nākasya pṛṣṭhe 'si narendra gantā; na śocitavyaṃ bhavatādya pārtha
GE07mbh_12_u:013.001a: na bāhyaṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:013.001c: śārīraṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:013.002c: yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ vā syād dviṣatāṃ tat tathāstu naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.003c: yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ vā syāt suhṛdāṃ tat tathāstu naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.004a: dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:013.004c: mameti ca bhaven mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:013.005a: brahmamṛtyū ca tau rājann ātmany eva samāśritau
GE07mbh_12_u:013.006c: bhittvā śarīraṃ bhūtānāṃ na hiṃsā pratipatsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:013.007a: athāpi ca sahotpattiḥ sattvasya pralayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:013.007c: naṣṭe śarīre naṣṭaṃ syād vṛthā ca syāt kriyāpathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.008a: tasmād ekāntam utsṛjya pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraiś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.008c: panthā niṣevitaḥ sadbhiḥ sa niṣevyo vijānatā
GE07mbh_12_u:013.008d-0013_02: yady ayaṃ hy adhamaḥ panthāḥ kasmāt tais tair niṣevitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.008d-0013_04: yugāni bahuśas taiś ca bhukteyam avanir nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:013.009c: na bhuṅkte yo nṛpaḥ samyaṅ niṣphalaṃ tasya jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:013.010a: atha vā vasato rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.010c: dravyeṣu yasya mamatā mṛtyor āsye sa vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:013.011c: ye tu paśyanti tadbhāvaṃ mucyante mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:013.012a: bhavān pitā bhavān mātā bhavān bhrātā bhavān guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:013.012c: duḥkhapralāpān ārtasya tasmān me kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:013.013a: tathyaṃ vā yadi vātathyaṃ yan mayaitat prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.001c: bhrātṝṇāṃ bruvatāṃ tāṃs tān vividhān vedaniścayān
GE07mbh_12_u:014.006a: ime te bhrātaraḥ pārtha śuṣyanta stokakā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:014.008a: kathaṃ dvaitavane rājan pūrvam uktvā tathā vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.009a: vayaṃ duryodhanaṃ hatvā mṛdhe bhokṣyāma medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:014.010a: virathāṃś ca rathān kṛtvā nihatya ca mahāgajān
GE07mbh_12_u:014.010c: saṃstīrya ca rathair bhūmiṃ sasādibhir ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.012a: ity etān evam uktvā tvaṃ svayaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:014.012c: katham adya punar vīra vinihaṃsi manāṃsy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:014.013a: na klībo vasudhāṃ bhuṅkte na klībo dhanam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:014.013c: na klībasya gṛhe putrā matsyāḥ paṅka ivāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014a: nādaṇḍaḥ kṣatriyo bhāti nādaṇḍo bhūtim aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014c: nādaṇḍasya prajā rājñaḥ sukham edhanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0002: rakṣobhir guhyakair nāgair manuṣyaiś ca vibhūṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0006: viprāṇāṃ viditaś cāyaṃ tava caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0007: arājake hi loke 'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0008: rakṣārtham asya lokasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0012: yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ saṃbhavaty aṃśato nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0014: tapaty ādityavac caiva cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0015: na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaś cid apy abhivīkṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0016: so 'gnir bhavati vāyuś ca so 'rkaḥ somaś ca dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0017: sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa mahendraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0018: pitāmahasya devasya viṣṇoḥ śarvasya caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0019: ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ tasmiṃs tejaḥ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0021: mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0022: ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0025: pratyakṣam etal lokasya saṃśayo na hi vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0027: prajānāṃ pālane yuktaḥ pūjyate daivatair api
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0028: kāryaṃ yo 'vekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0030: tasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākrame
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0031: mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0032: taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0033: tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājāpi kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0034: tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0035: aniṣṭaṃ cāpy aniṣṭeṣu tad dharmaṃ na vicālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0038: tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0039: bhayād bhogāya kalpante dharmān na vicalanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0040: deśakālau ca śaktiṃ ca kāryaṃ cāvekṣya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0042: sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0044: daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0045: daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0046: susamīkṣya dhṛto daṇḍaḥ sarvā rañjayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0048: yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0050: kāko 'dyāc ca puroḍāśaṃ śvā caivāvalihed dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0051: svāmitvaṃ na kva cic ca syāt prapadyetādharottaram
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0052: sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabhas tu śucir naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0053: daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0058: yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0059: prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0065: dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sabāndhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0066: tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0067: antarikṣagatāṃś caiva munīn devāṃś ca hiṃsati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0069: aśakyo nyāyato netuṃ viṣayāṃś caiva sevatā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0071: daṇḍaḥ praṇetuṃ śakyo hi susahāyena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0072: svarāṣṭre nyāyavartī syād bhṛśaṃ daṇḍaś ca śatruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0079: viṣṇunā caiva devena śakreṇa ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0080: lokapālaiś ca bhūtaiś ca pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0083: tān nihatya na doṣas te svalpo 'pi jagatīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.014d-002_0084: chalena māyayā vātha kṣatradharmeṇa vā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:014.015c: brāhmaṇasyaiṣa dharmaḥ syān na rājño rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:014.016a: asatāṃ pratiṣedhaś ca satāṃ ca paripālanam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.016c: eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ samare cāpalāyanam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.017a: yasmin kṣamā ca krodhaś ca dānādāne bhayābhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:014.017c: nigrahānugrahau cobhau sa vai dharmavid ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.018a: na śrutena na dānena na sāntvena na cejyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.018c: tvayeyaṃ pṛthivī labdhā notkocena tathāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:014.019a: yat tad balam amitrāṇāṃ tathā vīrasamudyatam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.020c: tat tvayā nihataṃ vīra tasmād bhuṅkṣva vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:014.023c: pūrveṇa tu mahāmeror daṇḍena mṛditas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.025c: vigāhya sāgaraṃ vīra daṇḍena mṛditās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.026a: etāny apratimāni tvaṃ kṛtvā karmāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:014.027a: sa tvaṃ bhrātṝn imān dṛṣṭvā pratinandasva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:014.027c: ṛṣabhān iva saṃmattān gajendrān ūrjitān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:014.028c: eko 'pi hi sukhāyaiṣāṃ kṣamaḥ syād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.029a: kiṃ punaḥ puruṣavyāghrāḥ patayo me nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.030c: yudhiṣṭhiras tvāṃ pāñcāli sukhe dhāsyaty anuttame
GE07mbh_12_u:014.031c: tad vyarthaṃ saṃprapaśyāmi mohāt tava janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:014.033a: yadi hi syur anunmattā bhrātaras te janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:014.033c: baddhvā tvāṃ nāstikaiḥ sārdhaṃ praśāseyur vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:014.034a: kurute mūḍham evaṃ hi yaḥ śreyo nādhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.034c: dhūpair añjanayogaiś ca nasyakarmabhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.034e: bheṣajaiḥ sa cikitsyaḥ syād ya unmārgeṇa gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0002: tādṛśānāṃ vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0003: imāṃś cośanasā gītāñ ślokāñ śṛṇu narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0005: ātharvaṇena hantā ca yaś ca bhāryāṃ parāmṛśet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0006: nirdoṣaṃ vadham eteṣāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy ātatāyinām
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0012: keśagrahe ca nārīṇām api yudhyet pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0019: tasyānyatra vadhaṃ vidvān manasāpi na cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0021: na hanyāt kṣatriyo vipraṃ svakuṭumbasya cātyaye
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0023: kṣatrabandhuḥ paraṃ śaktyā yudhyed vipreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0025: jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena bhrūṇahā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0026: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vāpy antyajo 'tha vā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0027: na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ śāntaṃ tṛṇenāpi kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0030: sahasraṃ tv eva varṣāṇi nihatya narake patet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0031: tasmān naivāpaguryād dhi naiva śastraṃ nipātayet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0032: śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn gṛhṇātīti hi dhāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0033: tāvatīḥ sa samāḥ pāpo narake parivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0034: tvagasthibhedaṃ viprasya yaḥ kuryāt kārayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0035: brahmahā sa tu vijñeyaḥ prāyaścittī narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0036: śrotriyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā tathātreyīṃ ca brāhmaṇīm
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0040: brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ vā ghātayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0041: brahmaghnaṃ taskaraṃ caiva mā bhūdevaṃ cariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0042: chittvā hastau ca pādau nāsikoṣṭhau ca bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0046: kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrau vā śastreṇaiva tu ghātayet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0048: vikalendriyāṃs trivarṇāṃś ca caṇḍālaiḥ saha vāsayet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0049: taiś ca yaḥ saṃpibet kaś cit sa piban brahmahā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0050: pretānāṃ na ca deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0052: dunoty adṛṣṭā kartāraṃ brahmahatyeti tāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0053: brahmaghnena pibantaś ca viprā deśāḥ purāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0057: durbalānāṃ balaṃ rājā balino ye ca sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0058: balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca pāpānāṃ mṛtyur iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0059: sadoṣam api yo hanyād aśrāvya jagatīpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0060: durbalaṃ balavantaṃ vā sa parājayam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0061: rājājñāṃ prāḍvivākaṃ ca necched yaś cāpi niṣpatet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0062: sākṣiṇaṃ sādhuvākyaṃ ca jitaṃ tam api nirdiśet
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0063: bandhanān niṣpated yaś ca pratibhūr na dadāti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0064: kulajaś ca dhanāḍhyaś ca sa parājayam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0065: rājājñayā samāhūto yo na gacchet sabhāṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0069: mṛtasyāpi na deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0072: brahmahatyāṃ ca cauryaṃ ca rājadrohaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0073: mahānti pātakāny āhur ṛṣayaḥ pātakāni ha
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0074: yuddhād anyatra hiṃsāyāṃ surāpasya ca kīrtane
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0075: mahāntaṃ gurutalpe ca mitradrohe ca pātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0076: na kathaṃ cid upekṣeta mahāsāhasikaṃ naram
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0078: triṣu varṇeṣu yo daṇḍaḥ praṇīto brahmaṇā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0080: sāhasro vā bhaved daṇḍaḥ kāñcano dehaniṣkrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0081: caturṇām eva varṇānām evam āhośanāḥ kaviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0082: nārīṇāṃ bālavṛddhānāṃ goḥ pāte ca mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0087: saubalasya ca durbuddheḥ karṇasya ca durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0088: paśyatāṃ caiva śūrāṇāṃ yāhaṃ dyūte sabhāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0093: sāham evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā tava hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0094: ādityasya prasādena na ca prāṇair viyojitā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.035d-003_0096: divākareṇa devena vivastrā na kṛtā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:014.036c: tvaṃ tu sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kuruṣe svayam āpadam
GE07mbh_12_u:014.037c: māndhātā cāmbarīṣaś ca tathā rājan virājase
GE07mbh_12_u:014.038a: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ devīṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:014.039a: yajasva vividhair yajñair juhvann agnīn prayaccha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.002a: daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.002c: daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.003c: kāmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas trivargo daṇḍa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.004a: daṇḍena rakṣyate dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ daṇḍena rakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.004c: etad vidvann upādatsva svabhāvaṃ paśya laukikam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.005a: rājadaṇḍabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.006a: parasparabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.006c: evaṃ sāṃsiddhike loke sarvaṃ daṇḍe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.007a: daṇḍasyaiva bhayād eke na khādanti parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.007c: andhe tamasi majjeyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.008a: yasmād adāntān damayaty aśiṣṭān daṇḍayaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:015.008c: damanād daṇḍanāc caiva tasmād daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.008d-0015_01: paralokabhayād ete pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.009c: dānadaṇḍaḥ smṛto vaiśyo nirdaṇḍaḥ śūdra ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.010c: maryādā sthāpitā loke daṇḍasaṃjñā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.011a: yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati sūnṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.011c: prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.012c: daṇḍasyaiva bhayād ete manuṣyā vartmani sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.013a: nābhīto yajate rājan nābhīto dātum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.013c: nābhītaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cit samaye sthātum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.015a: nāghnataḥ kīrtir astīha na vittaṃ na punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.015d-0016_01: māhendraṃ ca grahaṃ lebhe lokānāṃ ceśvaro 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:015.016a: ya eva devā hantāras tāṃl loko 'rcayate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.016c: hantā rudras tathā skandaḥ śakro 'gnir varuṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.017a: hantā kālas tathā vāyur mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo raviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.017c: vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:015.018c: na brahmāṇaṃ na dhātāraṃ na pūṣāṇaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:015.019c: yajante mānavāḥ ke cit praśāntāḥ sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:015.020a: na hi paśyāmi jīvantaṃ loke kaṃ cid ahiṃsayā
GE07mbh_12_u:015.021a: nakulo mūṣakān atti biḍālo nakulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:015.021c: biḍālam atti śvā rājañ śvānaṃ vyālamṛgas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:015.022a: tān atti puruṣaḥ sarvān paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.022c: prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:015.023a: vidhānaṃ devavihitaṃ tatra vidvān na muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.023c: yathā sṛṣṭo 'si rājendra tathā bhavitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:015.024c: vinā vadhaṃ na kurvanti tāpasāḥ prāṇayāpanam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.025a: udake bahavaḥ prāṇāḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca phaleṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.025c: na ca kaś cin na tān hanti kim anyat prāṇayāpanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:015.028a: bhūmiṃ bhittvauṣadhīś chittvā vṛkṣādīn aṇḍajān paśūn
GE07mbh_12_u:015.028c: manuṣyās tanvate yajñāṃs te svargaṃ prāpnuvanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.029c: kaunteya sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.030a: daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vyanaśiṣyann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.031a: satyaṃ cedaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam uktaṃ; daṇḍaḥ prajā rakṣati sādhu nītaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.031c: paśyāgnayaś ca pratiśāmyanty abhītāḥ; saṃtarjitā daṇḍabhayāj jvalanti
GE07mbh_12_u:015.031d-0017_01: yadi na praṇayed rājan daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.032a: andhaṃ tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:015.032c: daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī
GE07mbh_12_u:015.034a: sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.034c: daṇḍasya hi bhayād bhīto bhogāyeha prakalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.036a: yadi daṇḍān na bibhyeyur vayāṃsi śvāpadāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.036c: adyuḥ paśūn manuṣyāṃś ca yajñārthāni havīṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.037a: na brahmacāry adhīyīta kalyāṇī gaur na duhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.037c: na kanyodvahanaṃ gacched yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.038c: mamatvaṃ na prajānīyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.039c: vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.040a: careyur nāśrame dharmaṃ yathoktaṃ vidhim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.040c: na vidyāṃ prāpnuyāt kaś cid yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.041c: yuktā vaheyur yānāni yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.042a: na preṣyā vacanaṃ kuryur na bālo jātu karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:015.042c: tiṣṭhet pitṛmate dharme yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.043a: daṇḍe sthitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhayaṃ daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.043c: daṇḍe svargo manuṣyāṇāṃ loko 'yaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.044a: na tatra kūṭaṃ pāpaṃ vā vañcanā vāpi dṛṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.045a: haviḥ śvā prapibed dhṛṣṭo daṇḍaś cen nodyato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.045c: haret kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:015.046a: yad idaṃ dharmato rājyaṃ vihitaṃ yady adharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.046c: kāryas tatra na śoko vai bhuṅkṣva bhogān yajasva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.047c: saṃvasantaḥ priyair dārair bhuñjānāś cānnam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.048a: arthe sarve samārambhāḥ samāyattā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.048c: sa ca daṇḍe samāyattaḥ paśya daṇḍasya gauravam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.050a: nātyantaguṇavān kaś cin na cāpy atyantanirguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:015.050c: ubhayaṃ sarvakāryeṣu dṛśyate sādhv asādhu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.051a: paśūnāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ chittvā tato bhindanti nastakān
GE07mbh_12_u:015.051c: kṛṣanti bahavo bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:015.052c: tais tair nyāyair mahārāja purāṇaṃ dharmam ācara
GE07mbh_12_u:015.053a: yaja dehi prajā rakṣa dharmaṃ samanupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:015.054a: mā ca te nighnataḥ śatrūn manyur bhavatu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:015.054c: na tatra kilbiṣaṃ kiṃ cit kartur bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:015.055a: ātatāyī hi yo hanyād ātatāyinam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:015.055c: na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:015.056c: avadhye cātmani kathaṃ vadhyo bhavati kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:015.057a: yathā hi puruṣaḥ śālāṃ punaḥ saṃpraviśen navām
GE07mbh_12_u:015.057c: evaṃ jīvaḥ śarīrāṇi tāni tāni prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:015.058c: evaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ prāhur ye janās tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.001c: dhairyam āsthāya tejasvī jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:016.002a: rājan viditadharmo 'si na te 'sty aviditaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.002c: upaśikṣāma te vṛttaṃ sadaiva na ca śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.003a: na vakṣyāmi na vakṣyāmīty evaṃ me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.003c: atiduḥkhāt tu vakṣyāmi tan nibodha janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:016.004a: bhavatas tu pramohena sarvaṃ saṃśayitaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.004c: viklavatvaṃ ca naḥ prāptam abalatvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:016.005c: moham āpadyate dainyād yathā kupuruṣas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:016.006a: āgatiś ca gatiś caiva lokasya viditā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:016.006c: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:016.007a: evaṃ gate mahārāja rājyaṃ prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:016.007c: hetum atra pravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:016.008a: dvividho jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro mānasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:016.009a: śārīrāj jāyate vyādhir mānaso nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.009c: mānasāj jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīra iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.010c: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:016.011a: śītoṣṇe caiva vāyuś ca trayaḥ śārīrajā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.011c: teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ ca tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.012d-0018_01: ubhābhyāṃ vadhyate vāyur vidhānam idam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:016.013a: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva mānasāḥ syus trayo guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.013b-0019_01: rajasā śāmyate sattvaṃ rajaḥ sattvena śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:016.013c: harṣeṇa bādhyate śoko harṣaḥ śokena bādhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:016.014a: kaś cit sukhe vartamāno duḥkhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:016.014c: kaś cid duḥkhe vartamānaḥ sukhasya smartum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:016.015a: sa tvaṃ na duḥkhī duḥkhasya na sukhī ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:016.015c: na duḥkhī sukhajātasya na sukhī duḥkhajasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:016.016a: smartum arhasi kauravya diṣṭaṃ tu balavattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:016.016c: atha vā te svabhāvo 'yaṃ yena pārthiva kṛṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:016.017c: miṣatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ na tasya smartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.018a: pravrājanaṃ ca nagarād ajinaiś ca nivāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.018c: mahāraṇyanivāsaś ca na tasya smartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.019c: saindhavāc ca parikleśaṃ kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.019f-0020_01: draupadyā rājaputryāś ca kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.019f-0021_01: balavanto vayaṃ rājan devair api sudurjayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.020a: yac ca te droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ yuddham āsīd ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:016.020c: manasaikena te yuddham idaṃ ghoram upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.021a: yatra nāsti śaraiḥ kāryaṃ na mitrair na ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.021c: ātmanaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.022a: tasminn anirjite yuddhe prāṇān yadi ha mokṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:016.022c: anyaṃ dehaṃ samāsthāya punas tenaiva yotsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:016.022d-0022_01: yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.022d-0022_02: bahv apathyaṃ balavato na kiṃ cit trāyate dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:016.023b-0023_02: tasminn anirjite yuddhe kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.024a: etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:016.025a: diṣṭyā duryodhanaḥ pāpo nihataḥ sānugo yudhi
GE07mbh_12_u:016.025c: draupadyāḥ keśapakṣasya diṣṭyā tvaṃ padavīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:016.026c: vayaṃ te kiṃkarāḥ pārtha vāsudevaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:017.001c: balaṃ moho 'bhimānaś ca udvegaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.002a: ebhiḥ pāpmabhir āviṣṭo rājyaṃ tvam abhikāṅkṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:017.003a: ya imām akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ śiṣyād eko mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.003c: tasyāpy udaram evaikaṃ kim idaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:017.004a: nāhnā pūrayituṃ śakyā na māsena nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:017.004c: apūryāṃ pūrayann icchām āyuṣāpi na śaknuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:017.005e: jayodaraṃ pṛthivyā te śreyo nirjitayā jitam
GE07mbh_12_u:017.006a: mānuṣān kāmabhogāṃs tvam aiśvaryaṃ ca praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:017.007a: yogakṣemau ca rāṣṭrasya dharmādharmau tvayi sthitau
GE07mbh_12_u:017.009c: na ca tuṣyanti rājānaḥ paśya buddhyantaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:017.010c: abbhakṣair vāyubhakṣaiś ca tair ayaṃ narako jitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.011a: yaś cemāṃ vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ praśāsed akhilāṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.011c: tulyāśmakāñcano yaś ca sa kṛtārtho na pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.012c: viśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭha iha cāmutra cāvyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:017.013a: nirāmiṣā na śocanti śocasi tvaṃ kim āmiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:017.014a: panthānau pitṛyānaś ca devayānaś ca viśrutau
GE07mbh_12_u:017.015c: vimucya dehān vai bhānti mṛtyor aviṣayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:017.016c: tābhyāṃ vimuktaḥ pāśābhyāṃ padam āpnoti tatparam
GE07mbh_12_u:017.017a: api gāthām imāṃ gītāṃ janakena vadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:017.018a: anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:017.018c: mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:017.020a: dṛśyaṃ paśyati yaḥ paśyan sa cakṣuṣmān sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:017.020c: ajñātānāṃ ca vijñānāt saṃbodhād buddhir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:017.021a: yas tu vācaṃ vijānāti bahumānam iyāt sa vai
GE07mbh_12_u:017.022c: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:017.023a: te janās tāṃ gatiṃ yānti nāvidvāṃso 'lpacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.004a: dhanāny apatyaṃ mitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:018.004c: panthānaṃ pāvanaṃ hitvā janako mauṇḍyam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.005a: taṃ dadarśa priyā bhāryā bhaikṣyavṛttim akiṃcanam
GE07mbh_12_u:018.006c: kruddhā manasvinī bhāryā vivikte hetumad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.008a: pratijñā te 'nyathā rājan viceṣṭā cānyathā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:018.008c: yad rājyaṃ mahad utsṛjya svalpe tuṣyasi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:018.009c: śakyam adya tvayā bhartuṃ moghas te 'yaṃ pariśramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.011c: bhartā bhūtvā ca lokasya so 'dyānyair bhṛtim icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:018.012a: śriyaṃ hitvā pradīptāṃ tvaṃ śvavat saṃprati vīkṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:018.012c: aputrā jananī te 'dya kausalyā cāpatis tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:018.014a: tāś ca tvaṃ viphalāḥ kurvan kāṃl lokān nu gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:018.015a: naiva te 'sti paro loko nāparaḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.015c: dharmyān dārān parityajya yas tvam icchasi jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:018.016a: srajo gandhān alaṃkārān vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:018.017a: nipānaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūtvā tvaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:018.018a: khādanti hastinaṃ nyāse kravyādā bahavo 'py uta
GE07mbh_12_u:018.018c: bahavaḥ kṛmayaś caiva kiṃ punas tvām anarthakam
GE07mbh_12_u:018.019a: ya imāṃ kuṇḍikāṃ bhindyāt triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca te haret
GE07mbh_12_u:018.019c: vāsaś cāpaharet tasmin kathaṃ te mānasaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:018.020a: yas tv ayaṃ sarvam utsṛjya dhānāmuṣṭiparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.020c: yadānena samaṃ sarvaṃ kim idaṃ mama dīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:018.020e: dhānāmuṣṭir ihārthaś cet pratijñā te vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:018.021a: kā vāhaṃ tava ko me tvaṃ ko 'dya te mayy anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.021c: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ rājan yatra te 'nugraho bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:018.021e: prāsādaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:018.022c: saukhikaiḥ saṃbhṛtān arthān yaḥ saṃtyajasi kiṃ nu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:018.023a: yo 'tyantaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād yaś ca dadyāt sadaiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:018.023c: tayos tvam antaraṃ viddhi śreyāṃs tābhyāṃ ka ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:018.024c: eteṣu dakṣiṇā dattā dāvāgnāv iva durhutam
GE07mbh_12_u:018.025c: sadaiva yācamāno vai tathā śāmyati na dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.026a: satāṃ ca vedā annaṃ ca loke 'smin prakṛtir dhruvā
GE07mbh_12_u:018.026c: na ced dātā bhaved dātā kutaḥ syur mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.027a: annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:018.027c: annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:018.028c: prabhavaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ ca dāntā nindanta āsate
GE07mbh_12_u:018.029a: tyāgān na bhikṣukaṃ vidyān na mauṇḍyān na ca yācanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:018.029c: ṛjus tu yo 'rthaṃ tyajati taṃ sukhaṃ viddhi bhikṣukam
GE07mbh_12_u:018.030c: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca sa vai mukto mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:018.032a: trayīṃ ca nāma vārtāṃ ca tyaktvā putrāṃs tyajanti ye
GE07mbh_12_u:018.032c: triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca vāsaś ca pratigṛhṇanty abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.033a: aniṣkaṣāye kāṣāyam īhārtham iti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:018.033c: dharmadhvajānāṃ muṇḍānāṃ vṛttyartham iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.034a: kāṣāyair ajinaiś cīrair nagnān muṇḍāñ jaṭādharān
GE07mbh_12_u:018.034c: bibhrat sādhūn mahārāja jaya lokāñ jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.035c: dadāty aharahaḥ pūrvaṃ ko nu dharmataras tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.036a: tattvajño janako rājā loke 'sminn iti gīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:018.036c: so 'py āsīn mohasaṃpanno mā mohavaśam anvagāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.037a: evaṃ dharmam anukrāntaṃ sadā dānaparair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:018.038a: pālayantaḥ prajāś caiva dānam uttamam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.001a: vedāhaṃ tāta śāstrāṇi aparāṇi parāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:019.001c: ubhayaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:019.002a: ākulāni ca śāstrāṇi hetubhiś citritāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:019.002c: niścayaś caiva yanmātro vedāhaṃ taṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.003a: tvaṃ tu kevalam astrajño vīravratam anuṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.003c: śāstrārthaṃ tattvato gantuṃ na samarthaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:019.004c: tenāpy evaṃ na vācyo 'haṃ yadi dharmaṃ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005a: bhrātṛsauhṛdam āsthāya yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005c: nyāyyaṃ yuktaṃ ca kaunteya prīto 'haṃ tena te 'rjuna
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_01: mameśvarasamaṃ sattvaṃ brahmaṇā caiva yat samam
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_02: vāsudevasamaṃ caiva na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_03: tathā tvaṃ yaudhamukhyeṣu sattvaṃ paramam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_04: balam indre ca vāyau ca balaṃ yac ca janārdane
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_05: tad balaṃ bhīmasene ca tvayi cārjuna vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_06: tvatsamaś citrayodhī ca dūrapātī ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:019.005d-0026_07: divyāstreṇa ca saṃpannaḥ ko vānyas tvatsamo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.006c: na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:019.006d-0027_01: dhārmikaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ jñāyate mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:019.007a: dharmasūkṣmaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ tatra duṣprataraṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:019.007c: dhanaṃjaya na me buddhim abhiśaṅkitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.008a: yuddhaśāstravid eva tvaṃ na vṛddhāḥ sevitās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:019.009a: tapas tyāgo vidhir iti niścayas tāta dhīmatām
GE07mbh_12_u:019.009c: paraṃ paraṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saiṣā naiḥśreyasī gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.010a: na tv etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:019.010c: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā naitat pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.011c: ṛṣayas tapasā yuktā yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.012c: anantā adhanā eva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.013c: abuddhijaṃ tamas tyaktvā lokāṃs tyāgavatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.014a: dakṣiṇena tu panthānaṃ yaṃ bhāsvantaṃ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.014c: ete kriyāvatāṃ lokā ye śmaśānāni bhejire
GE07mbh_12_u:019.015a: anirdeśyā gatiḥ sā tu yāṃ prapaśyanti mokṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:019.015c: tasmāt tyāgaḥ pradhāneṣṭaḥ sa tu duḥkhaḥ praveditum
GE07mbh_12_u:019.017c: vipāṭya kadalīskandhaṃ sāraṃ dadṛśire na te
GE07mbh_12_u:019.019a: agrāhyaś cakṣuṣā so 'pi anirdeśyaṃ ca tad girā
GE07mbh_12_u:019.020a: kalyāṇagocaraṃ kṛtvā manas tṛṣṇāṃ nigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:019.021a: asminn evaṃ sūkṣmagamye mārge sadbhir niṣevite
GE07mbh_12_u:019.021c: katham artham anarthāḍhyam arjuna tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.022a: pūrvaśāstravido hy evaṃ janāḥ paśyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:019.022c: kriyāsu niratā nityaṃ dāne yajñe ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:019.025a: yān vayaṃ nābhijānīmaḥ kas tāñ jñātum ihārhati
GE07mbh_12_u:019.025c: evaṃ prājñān sataś cāpi mahataḥ śāstravittamān
GE07mbh_12_u:019.026a: tapasā mahad āpnoti buddhyā vai vindate mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:019.026c: tyāgena sukham āpnoti sadā kaunteya dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:020.002a: yad vacaḥ phalgunenoktaṃ na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:020.002c: atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:020.003a: ajātaśatro dharmeṇa kṛtsnā te vasudhā jitā
GE07mbh_12_u:020.003c: tāṃ jitvā na vṛthā rājaṃs tvaṃ parityaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:020.004a: catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī karmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:020.004c: tāṃ krameṇa mahābāho yathāvaj jaya pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:020.006a: karmaniṣṭhāṃs tu budhyethās taponiṣṭhāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:020.007c: bhūyān doṣaḥ pravardheta yas taṃ dhanam apāśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:020.009a: anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhate
GE07mbh_12_u:020.010a: yajñāya sṛṣṭāni dhanāni dhātrā; yaṣṭādiṣṭaḥ puruṣo rakṣitā ca
GE07mbh_12_u:020.010c: tasmāt sarvaṃ yajña evopayojyaṃ; dhanaṃ tato 'nantara eva kāmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:020.011a: yajñair indro vividhair annavadbhir; devān sarvān abhyayān mahaujāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:020.011c: tenendratvaṃ prāpya vibhrājate 'sau; tasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyam
GE07mbh_12_u:020.012a: mahādevaḥ sarvamedhe mahātmā; hutvātmānaṃ devadevo vibhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:020.012c: viśvāṃl lokān vyāpya viṣṭabhya kīrtyā; virocate dyutimān kṛttivāsāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:020.013a: āvikṣitaḥ pārthivo vai maruttaḥ; svṛddhyā martyo yo 'jayad devarājam
GE07mbh_12_u:020.013c: yajñe yasya śrīḥ svayaṃ saṃniviṣṭā; yasmin bhāṇḍaṃ kāñcanaṃ sarvam āsīt
GE07mbh_12_u:020.014a: hariścandraḥ pārthivendraḥ śrutas te; yajñair iṣṭvā puṇyakṛd vītaśokaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:020.014c: ṛddhyā śakraṃ yo 'jayan mānuṣaḥ saṃs; tasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyam
GE07mbh_12_u:021.001c: indreṇa samaye pṛṣṭo yad uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.002a: saṃtoṣo vai svargatamaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:021.002c: tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ susamyak paritiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:021.004a: na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:021.005a: yadāsau sarvabhūtānāṃ na krudhyati na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:021.005c: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:021.006a: evaṃ kaunteya bhūtāni taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ tathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:021.006c: tadā tadā prapaśyanti tasmād budhyasva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:021.007a: anye śamaṃ praśaṃsanti vyāyāmam apare tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:021.007c: naikaṃ na cāparaṃ ke cid ubhayaṃ ca tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:021.008a: yajñam eke praśaṃsanti saṃnyāsam apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.008c: dānam eke praśaṃsanti ke cid eva pratigraham
GE07mbh_12_u:021.008e: ke cit sarvaṃ parityajya tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
GE07mbh_12_u:021.009c: hatvā bhittvā ca chittvā ca ke cid ekāntaśīlinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.010a: etat sarvaṃ samālokya budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.010c: adroheṇaiva bhūtānāṃ yo dharmaḥ sa satāṃ mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.011c: prajanaḥ sveṣu dāreṣu mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07mbh_12_u:021.013a: yo hi rājye sthitaḥ śaśvad vaśī tulyapriyāpriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.014c: dharme vartmani saṃsthāpya prajā varteta dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:021.016c: tasyāyaṃ ca paraś caiva lokaḥ syāt saphalo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:021.016e: nirvāṇaṃ tu suduṣpāraṃ bahuvighnaṃ ca me matam
GE07mbh_12_u:021.018a: prajānāṃ pālane yuktā damam uttamam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.019c: sādhyā rājarṣisaṃghāś ca dharmam etaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:021.019e: apramattās tataḥ svargaṃ prāptāḥ puṇyaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:022.002c: jitvā cārīn naraśreṣṭha tapyate kiṃ bhavān bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:022.004c: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vihitaṃ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:022.005c: vadhaś ca bharataśreṣṭha kāle śastreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:022.006c: praśastaṃ jīvitaṃ loke kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:022.007a: na tyāgo na punar yācñā na tapo manujeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:022.009a: tyaktvā saṃtāpajaṃ śokaṃ daṃśito bhava karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:022.011a: indro vai brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ karmaṇā kṣatriyo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:022.012a: tac cāsya karma pūjyaṃ hi praśasyaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:022.012c: tena cendratvam āpede devānām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:022.013a: sa tvaṃ yajñair mahārāja yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:022.014a: mā tvam evaṃgate kiṃ cit kṣatriyarṣabha śocithāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:022.014c: gatās te kṣatradharmeṇa śastrapūtāḥ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:022.015a: bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca yad vṛttaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:022.015c: diṣṭaṃ hi rājaśārdūla na śakyam ativartitum
GE07mbh_12_u:023.001a: evam uktas tu kaunteyo guḍākeśena bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:023.001c: novāca kiṃ cit kauravyas tato dvaipāyano 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:023.002a: bībhatsor vacanaṃ samyak satyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:023.002c: śāstradṛṣṭaḥ paro dharmaḥ smṛto gārhasthya āśramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:023.003c: na hi gārhasthyam utsṛjya tavāraṇyaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:023.004a: gṛhasthaṃ hi sadā devāḥ pitara ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:023.005a: vayāṃsi paśavaś caiva bhūtāni ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:023.005c: gṛhasthair eva dhāryante tasmāj jyeṣṭhāśramo gṛhī
GE07mbh_12_u:023.007a: vedajñānaṃ ca te kṛtsnaṃ tapaś ca caritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:023.008a: tapo yajñas tathā vidyā bhaikṣam indriyanigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:023.008c: dhyānam ekāntaśīlatvaṃ tuṣṭir dānaṃ ca śaktitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:023.009c: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vakṣyāmi tavāpi viditaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:023.010a: yajño vidyā samutthānam asaṃtoṣaḥ śriyaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:023.011a: vedajñānaṃ tathā kṛtsnaṃ tapaḥ sucaritaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:023.012a: etāni rājñāṃ karmāṇi sukṛtāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:023.012c: imaṃ lokam amuṃ lokaṃ sādhayantīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:023.013a: teṣāṃ jyāyas tu kaunteya daṇḍadhāraṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:023.013c: balaṃ hi kṣatriye nityaṃ bale daṇḍaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:023.014c: api gāthām imāṃ cāpi bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:023.015a: bhūmir etau nigirati sarpo bilaśayān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:023.016c: prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.001c: saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ prāptaḥ śrotum icchāmi taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.002c: śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś cāstāṃ bhrātarau saṃyatavratau
GE07mbh_12_u:024.003a: tayor āvasathāv āstāṃ ramaṇīyau pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:024.004a: tataḥ kadā cil likhitaḥ śaṅkhasyāśramam āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:024.005c: phalāni śātayām āsa samyak pariṇatāny uta
GE07mbh_12_u:024.006a: tāny upādāya visrabdho bhakṣayām āsa sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.006c: tasmiṃś ca bhakṣayaty eva śaṅkho 'py āśramam āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:024.007a: bhakṣayantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkho bhrātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:024.007c: kutaḥ phalāny avāptāni hetunā kena khādasi
GE07mbh_12_u:024.008c: ita eva gṛhītāni mayeti prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:024.009c: steyaṃ tvayā kṛtam idaṃ phalāny ādadatā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.009e: gaccha rājānam āsādya svakarma prathayasva vai
GE07mbh_12_u:024.009f-0028_01: likhito 'tha tadā gatvā bhrātur vākyena coditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.010c: stenaṃ māṃ tvaṃ viditvā ca svadharmam anupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:024.010e: śīghraṃ dhāraya caurasya mama daṇḍaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:024.011a: ity uktas tasya vacanāt sudyumnaṃ vasudhādhipam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.012a: sudyumnas tv antapālebhyaḥ śrutvā likhitam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.013a: tam abravīt samāgatya sa rājā brahmavittamam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.013c: kim āgamanam ācakṣva bhagavan kṛtam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:024.014a: evam uktaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sudyumnam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:024.014c: pratiśrauṣi kariṣyeti śrutvā tat kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:024.015c: bhakṣitāni mayā rājaṃs tatra māṃ śādhi māciram
GE07mbh_12_u:024.016a: pramāṇaṃ cen mato rājā bhavato daṇḍadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:024.016c: anujñāyām api tathā hetuḥ syād brāhmaṇarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:024.017c: brūhi kāmān ato 'nyāṃs tvaṃ kariṣyāmi hi te vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.018c: nānyaṃ vai varayām āsa tasmād daṇḍād ṛte varam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.019c: karau pracchedayām āsa dhṛtadaṇḍo jagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.020a: sa gatvā bhrātaraṃ śaṅkham ārtarūpo 'bravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.021a: na kupye tava dharmajña na ca dūṣayase mama
GE07mbh_12_u:024.021b-0029_01: sunirmalaṃ kulaṃ brahmann asmiñ jagati viśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:024.021c: dharmas tu te vyatikrāntas tatas te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022a: sa gatvā bāhudāṃ śīghraṃ tarpayasva yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022c: devān pitṝn ṛṣīṃś caiva mā cādharme manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_02: mahānti pātakāny āhuḥ saṃyogaṃ caiva taiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_03: na steyasadṛśaṃ brahman mahāpātakam asty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_04: jagaty asmin mahābhāga brahmahatyāsamaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_07: brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'tha vā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_08: sarve kāmakṛte pāpe hantavyā na vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_09: rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍā vai kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_10: nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.022d-0030_11: uddhṛtaṃ naḥ kulaṃ brahman rājñā daṇḍe dhṛte tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:024.023a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya likhitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.024c: tataḥ sa vismito bhrātur darśayām āsa tau karau
GE07mbh_12_u:024.025a: tatas tam abravīc chaṅkhas tapasedaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.025c: mā ca te 'tra viśaṅkā bhūd daivam eva vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:024.026a: kiṃ nu nāhaṃ tvayā pūtaḥ pūrvam eva mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:024.026c: yasya te tapaso vīryam īdṛśaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:024.027a: evam etan mayā kāryaṃ nāhaṃ daṇḍadharas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:024.027c: sa ca pūto narapatis tvaṃ cāpi pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:024.028a: sa rājā pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha śreṣṭho vai tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.028c: prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:024.029c: utpathe 'smin mahārāja mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:024.030a: bhrātur asya hitaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu dharmajñasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:024.030c: daṇḍa eva hi rājendra kṣatradharmo na muṇḍanam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.002a: araṇye vasatāṃ tāta bhrātṝṇāṃ te tapasvinām
GE07mbh_12_u:025.003c: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ pārtha yayātir iva nāhuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.004c: duḥkhasyānte naravyāghrāḥ sukhaṃ tv anubhavantv ime
GE07mbh_12_u:025.005a: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:025.005c: anubhūya tataḥ paścāt prasthātāsi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:025.006a: atithīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:025.006c: ānṛṇyaṃ gaccha kaunteya tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:025.007c: tataḥ paścān mahārāja gamiṣyasi parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:025.008a: bhrātṝṃś ca sarvān kratubhiḥ saṃyojya bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.009c: śṛṇu mac ca yathā kurvan dharmān na cyavate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.010a: ādadānasya ca dhanaṃ nigrahaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:025.010d-0031_03: ākāro hīṅgitaś caiva gatiś ceṣṭā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:025.010d-0031_04: pratijñā caiva hetuś ca dṛṣṭāntopanayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.010d-0031_05: uktir nigamanaṃ teṣāṃ prameyaṃ ca prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.010d-0031_07: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yonir iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:025.011c: śāstrajāṃ buddhim āsthāya nainasā sa hi yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:025.013a: nibodha ca yathātiṣṭhan dharmān na cyavate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.014c: pramādayati tat karma na tatrāhur atikramam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.015a: tarasā buddhipūrvaṃ vā nigrāhyā eva śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.015c: pāpaiḥ saha na saṃdadhyād rāṣṭraṃ paṇyaṃ na kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:025.016a: śūrāś cāryāś ca satkāryā vidvāṃsaś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:025.017b-0032_03: mantre ca vyavahāre ca niyoktavyo vijānatā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.017b-0032_07: vedajñā ye ca śāstrajñās te ca rājan subuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.017b-0032_09: te tu sarvatra yoktavyās te ca buddheḥ parāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.018c: enasā yujyate rājā durdānta iti cocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:025.019c: taskaraiś cāpi hanyante sarvaṃ tad rājakilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.020c: pauruṣe karmaṇi kṛte nāsty adharmo yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:025.021a: vipadyante samārambhāḥ sidhyanty api ca daivataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.021c: kṛte puruṣakāre tu nainaḥ spṛśati pārthivam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.022a: atra te rājaśārdūla vartayiṣye kathām imām
GE07mbh_12_u:025.024a: yat karma vai nigrahe śātravāṇāṃ; yogaś cāgryaḥ pālane mānavānām
GE07mbh_12_u:025.024c: kṛtvā karma prāpya kīrtiṃ suyuddhe; vājigrīvo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.025a: saṃtyaktātmā samareṣv ātatāyī; śastraiś chinno dasyubhir ardyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.025c: aśvagrīvaḥ karmaśīlo mahātmā; saṃsiddhātmā modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.026a: dhanur yūpo raśanā jyā śaraḥ sruk; sruvaḥ khaḍgo rudhiraṃ yatra cājyam
GE07mbh_12_u:025.026c: ratho vedī kāmago yuddham agniś; cāturhotraṃ caturo vājimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.027a: hutvā tasmin yajñavahnāv athārīn; pāpān mukto rājasiṃhas tarasvī
GE07mbh_12_u:025.027c: prāṇān hutvā cāvabhṛthe raṇe sa; vājigrīvo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.028a: rāṣṭraṃ rakṣan buddhipūrvaṃ nayena; saṃtyaktātmā yajñaśīlo mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.028c: sarvāṃl lokān vyāpya kīrtyā manasvī; vājigrīvo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.029a: daivīṃ siddhiṃ mānuṣīṃ daṇḍanītiṃ; yoganyāyaiḥ pālayitvā mahīṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:025.029c: tasmād rājā dharmaśīlo mahātmā; hayagrīvo modate svargaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.030a: vidvāṃs tyāgī śraddadhānaḥ kṛtajñas; tyaktvā lokaṃ mānuṣaṃ karma kṛtvā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.030c: medhāvināṃ viduṣāṃ saṃmatānāṃ; tanutyajāṃ lokam ākramya rājā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.031a: samyag vedān prāpya śāstrāṇy adhītya; samyag rāṣṭraṃ pālayitvā mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:025.031c: cāturvarṇyaṃ sthāpayitvā svadharme; vājigrīvo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.032a: jitvā saṃgrāmān pālayitvā prajāś ca; somaṃ pītvā tarpayitvā dvijāgryān
GE07mbh_12_u:025.032c: yuktyā daṇḍaṃ dhārayitvā prajānāṃ; yuddhe kṣīṇo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:025.033a: vṛttaṃ yasya ślāghanīyaṃ manuṣyāḥ; santo vidvāṃsaś cārhayanty arhaṇīyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:025.033c: svargaṃ jitvā vīralokāṃś ca gatvā; siddhiṃ prāptaḥ puṇyakīrtir mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.002a: na pārthivam idaṃ rājyaṃ na ca bhogāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.002c: prīṇayanti mano me 'dya śoko māṃ nardayaty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.003a: śrutvā ca vīrahīnānām aputrāṇāṃ ca yoṣitām
GE07mbh_12_u:026.004a: ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vyāso yogavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.005a: na karmaṇā labhyate cintayā vā; nāpy asya dātā puruṣasya kaś cit
GE07mbh_12_u:026.005c: paryāyayogād vihitaṃ vidhātrā; kālena sarvaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.006a: na buddhiśāstrādhyayanena śakyaṃ; prāptuṃ viśeṣair manujair akāle
GE07mbh_12_u:026.006c: mūrkho 'pi prāpnoti kadā cid arthān; kālo hi kāryaṃ prati nirviśeṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.007a: nābhūtikāle ca phalaṃ dadāti; śilpaṃ na mantrāś ca tathauṣadhāni
GE07mbh_12_u:026.007c: tāny eva kālena samāhitāni; sidhyanti cedhyanti ca bhūtikāle
GE07mbh_12_u:026.008a: kālena śīghrāḥ pravivānti vātāḥ; kālena vṛṣṭir jaladān upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:026.008c: kālena padmotpalavaj jalaṃ ca; kālena puṣyanti nagā vaneṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:026.009a: kālena kṛṣṇāś ca sitāś ca rātryaḥ; kālena candraḥ paripūrṇabimbaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.009c: nākālataḥ puṣpaphalaṃ nagānāṃ; nākālavegāḥ sarito vahanti
GE07mbh_12_u:026.010a: nākālamattāḥ khagapannagāś ca; mṛgadvipāḥ śailamahāgrahāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.010c: nākālataḥ strīṣu bhavanti garbhā; nāyānty akāle śiśiroṣṇavarṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.011a: nākālato mriyate jāyate vā; nākālato vyāharate ca bālaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.011c: nākālato yauvanam abhyupaiti; nākālato rohati bījam uptam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.012a: nākālato bhānur upaiti yogaṃ; nākālato 'staṃ girim abhyupaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:026.012c: nākālato vardhate hīyate ca; candraḥ samudraś ca mahormimālī
GE07mbh_12_u:026.014a: sarvān evaiṣa paryāyo martyān spṛśati dustaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.015a: ghnanti cānyān narā rājaṃs tān apy anye narās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.015c: saṃjñaiṣā laukikī rājan na hinasti na hanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:026.016a: hantīti manyate kaś cin na hantīty api cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:026.017a: naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:026.017c: aho kaṣṭam iti dhyāyañ śokasyāpacitiṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:026.018a: sa kiṃ śocasi mūḍhaḥ sañ śocyaḥ kim anuśocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:026.018c: paśya duḥkheṣu duḥkhāni bhayeṣu ca bhayāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:026.019a: ātmāpi cāyaṃ na mama sarvāpi pṛthivī mama
GE07mbh_12_u:026.019c: yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti paśyan na muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:026.020c: divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.021c: jīveṣu parivartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.022a: duḥkham evāsti na sukhaṃ tasmāt tad upalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:026.023c: na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.024a: sukham ante hi duḥkhānāṃ duḥkham ante sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.024b-0033_01: sukham eva hi duḥkhāntaṃ kadā cid duḥkhataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.024c: tasmād etad dvayaṃ jahyād ya icchec chāśvataṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.025a: yan nimittaṃ bhavec chokas tāpo vā duḥkhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.025c: āyāso vāpi yan mūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:026.026a: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ priyaṃ vā yadi vāpriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.027a: īṣad apy aṅga dārāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ vā carāpriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.027c: tato jñāsyasi kaḥ kasya kena vā katham eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.028a: ye ca mūḍhatamā loke ye ca buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.028c: ta eva sukham edhante madhyaḥ kleśena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:026.029a: ity abravīn mahāprājño yudhiṣṭhira sa senajit
GE07mbh_12_u:026.030a: sukhī parasya yo duḥkhe na jātu sa sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:026.030c: duḥkhānāṃ hi kṣayo nāsti jāyate hy aparāt param
GE07mbh_12_u:026.031a: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhavābhavau ca; lābhālābhau maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.031c: paryāyaśaḥ sarvam iha spṛśanti; tasmād dhīro naiva hṛṣyen na kupyet
GE07mbh_12_u:026.032a: dīkṣāṃ yajñe pālanaṃ yuddham āhur; yogaṃ rāṣṭre daṇḍanītyā ca samyak
GE07mbh_12_u:026.032c: vittatyāgaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ ca yajñe; samyag jñānaṃ pāvanānīti vidyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:026.033a: rakṣan rāṣṭraṃ buddhipūrvaṃ nayena; saṃtyaktātmā yajñaśīlo mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.033c: sarvāṃl lokān dharmamūrtyā caraṃś cāpy; ūrdhvaṃ dehān modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:026.034a: jitvā saṃgrāmān pālayitvā ca rāṣṭraṃ; somaṃ pītvā vardhayitvā prajāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.034c: yuktyā daṇḍaṃ dhārayitvā prajānāṃ; yuddhe kṣīṇo modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:026.035a: samyag vedān prāpya śāstrāṇy adhītya; samyag rāṣṭraṃ pālayitvā ca rājā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.035c: cāturvarṇyaṃ sthāpayitvā svadharme; pūtātmā vai modate devaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0003: yad etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0004: na svargo na sukhaṃ na śrīr nirdhanasyeti tan mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0006: taporatāś ca munayo yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0007: ṛṣīṇāṃ samayaṃ śaśvad ye rakṣanti dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0008: āśritāḥ sarvadharmajñās tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0012: vaikhānasānāṃ vacanaṃ yathā no viditaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0013: ajāś ca pṛśnayaś caiva sikatāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0014: aruṇāḥ ketavaś caiva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0016: dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño nigrahaś caiva durgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0017: dakṣiṇena ca panthānam aryamṇo ye divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0018: etān kriyāvatāṃ lokān uktavān pūrvam apy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0020: ete tyāgavatāṃ lokā bhānti pārtha sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0023: tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ sā samyak pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0027: yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0028: yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0029: yadā na bhāvaṃ kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0030: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0033: idaṃ tu śṛṇu me pārtha bruvataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0034: dharmam anye vṛttam anye dhanam īhanti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0036: bhūyān doṣo hi vitteṣu yaś ca dharmas tadāśrayaḥ
