GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0037: pratyakṣam anupaśyāmas tvam api draṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0039: ye vittam abhipadyante samyak teṣu sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0040: druhyataḥ praiti tat prāhuḥ pratikūlaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0041: yas tu saṃbhinnavṛttaḥ syād vītaśokabhayo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0042: alpena tṛṣito druhyan bhrūṇahatyāṃ na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0043: duṣyanty ādadato bhṛtyā nityaṃ dasyubhayād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0044: durlabhaṃ ca dhanaṃ prāpya bhṛśaṃ dattvānutapyate
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0045: adhanaḥ kasya kiṃ vācyo vimuktaḥ sarvataḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0046: devasvam upagṛhyaiva dhanena na sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0053: etasyārthe ca kaunteya dhanaṃ dhanavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0054: dhātā dadāti martyebhyo yajñārtham iti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0055: tasmād budhyanti puruṣā na hi tat kasya cid dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0056: śraddadhānas tato loke dadyāc caiva yajeta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0057: labdhasya tyāgam evāhur na bhogaṃ na ca saṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0058: tasya kiṃ saṃcayenārthaḥ kārye jyāyasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0060: śataṃ varṣāṇi te pretya purīṣaṃ bhuñjate janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:026.036d-004_0061: anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhate
GE07mbh_12_u:027.001a: abhimanyau hate bāle draupadyās tanayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:027.001c: dhṛṣṭadyumne virāṭe ca drupade ca mahīpatau
GE07mbh_12_u:027.002a: vasuṣeṇe ca dharmajñe dhṛṣṭaketau ca pārthive
GE07mbh_12_u:027.003a: na vimuñcati māṃ śoko jñātighātinam āturam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.005a: yadā hy enaṃ vighūrṇantam apaśyaṃ pārthasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.006a: jīrṇaṃ siṃham iva prāṃśuṃ narasiṃhaṃ pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:027.006c: kīryamāṇaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair dṛṣṭvā me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.007a: prāṅmukhaṃ sīdamānaṃ ca rathād apacyutaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.007c: ghūrṇamānaṃ yathā śailaṃ tadā me kaśmalo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:027.008a: yaḥ sa bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir yodhayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.010c: dagdhaḥ śastrapratāpena sa mayā yudhi ghātitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.011a: svayaṃ mṛtyuṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ pāñcālyaṃ yaḥ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.011c: na bāṇaiḥ pātayām āsa so 'rjunena nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.012c: tadaivāviśad aty ugro jvaro me munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:027.012e: yena saṃvardhitā bālā yena sma parirakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.014c: abhigamya raṇe mithyā pāpenoktaḥ sutaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:027.015a: tan me dahati gātrāṇi yan māṃ gurur abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:027.015c: satyavākyo hi rājaṃs tvaṃ yadi jīvati me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.015e: satyaṃ mā marśayan vipro mayi tat paripṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_12_u:027.017e: kān nu lokān gamiṣyāmi kṛtvā tat karma dāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.018a: aghātayaṃ ca yat karṇaṃ samareṣv apalāyinam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.018c: jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram aty ugraṃ ko mattaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.019a: abhimanyuṃ ca yad bālaṃ jātaṃ siṃham ivādriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:027.020c: kṛṣṇaṃ ca puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kilbiṣī bhrūṇahā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:027.021c: śocāmi pṛthivīṃ hīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ parvatair iva
GE07mbh_12_u:027.023c: jātiṣv anyāsv api yathā na bhaveyaṃ kulāntakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:027.024a: na bhokṣye na ca pānīyam upayokṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:027.025a: yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ kāmam anujāne prasādya vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.026c: maivam ity abravīd vyāso nigṛhya munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.027a: ativelaṃ mahārāja na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:027.027c: punar uktaṃ pravakṣyāmi diṣṭam etad iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:027.028a: saṃyogā viprayogāś ca jātānāṃ prāṇināṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.028c: budbudā iva toyeṣu bhavanti na bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:027.030a: sukhaṃ duḥkhāntam ālasyaṃ dākṣyaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.030c: bhūtiḥ śrīr hrīr dhṛtiḥ siddhir nādakṣe nivasanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:027.031a: nālaṃ sukhāya suhṛdo nālaṃ duḥkhāya durhṛdaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:027.031c: na ca prajñālam arthebhyo na sukhebhyo 'py alaṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:027.032a: yathā sṛṣṭo 'si kaunteya dhātrā karmasu tat kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:027.032c: ata eva hi siddhis te neśas tvam ātmanā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:028.003a: aśmānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prājñaṃ vaideho janako nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.004a: āgame yadi vāpāye jñātīnāṃ draviṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.004c: nareṇa pratipattavyaṃ kalyāṇaṃ katham icchatā aśmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.005c: tāni tāny abhivartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.006c: tat tad dhi cetanām asya haraty abhram ivānilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.007c: ity evaṃ hetubhis tasya tribhiś cittaṃ prasicyati
GE07mbh_12_u:028.010a: ye ca viṃśativarṣā vā triṃśadvarṣāś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.010c: pareṇa te varṣaśatān na bhaviṣyanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:028.013a: evam etāni duḥkhāni tāni tānīha mānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:028.014a: jarāmṛtyū ha bhūtāni khāditārau vṛkāv iva
GE07mbh_12_u:028.014c: balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca hrasvānāṃ mahatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:028.015a: na kaś cij jātv atikrāmej jarāmṛtyū ha mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.016a: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ bhūtānāṃ paryupasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:028.016c: prāptavyam avaśaiḥ sarvaṃ parihāro na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:028.017a: pūrve vayasi madhye vāpy uttame vā narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:028.017c: avarjanīyās te 'rthā vai kāṅkṣitāś ca tato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.019a: prādurbhāvaś ca bhūtānāṃ dehanyāsas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.022a: vaidyāś cāpy āturāḥ santi balavantaḥ sudurbalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.022c: strīmantaś ca tathā ṣaṇḍhā vicitraḥ kālaparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.023a: kule janma tathā vīryam ārogyaṃ dhairyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.025a: vyādhir agnir jalaṃ śastraṃ bubhukṣā śvāpadaṃ viṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:028.025c: rajjvā ca maraṇaṃ jantor uccācca patanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.026a: niryāṇaṃ yasya yad diṣṭaṃ tena gacchati hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.026c: dṛśyate nābhyatikrāmann atikrānto na vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.027a: dṛśyate hi yuvaiveha vinaśyan vasumān naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.028c: samṛddhe ca kule jātā vinaśyanti pataṃgavat
GE07mbh_12_u:028.029a: prāyeṇa śrīmatāṃ loke bhoktuṃ śaktir na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:028.029c: kāṣṭhāny api hi jīryante daridrāṇāṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:028.030c: yad yad iṣṭam asaṃtoṣād durātmā pāpam ācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:028.031a: striyo 'kṣā mṛgayā pānaṃ prasaṅgān ninditā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.033a: vāyum ākāśam agniṃ ca candrādityāv ahaḥkṣape
GE07mbh_12_u:028.033c: jyotīṃṣi saritaḥ śailān kaḥ karoti bibharti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.034a: śītam uṣṇaṃ tathā varṣaṃ kālena parivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:028.035a: nauṣadhāni na śāstrāṇi na homā na punar japāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.036a: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau
GE07mbh_12_u:028.037a: ye cāpi puruṣaiḥ strībhir gītavādyair upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.037c: ye cānāthāḥ parānnādāḥ kālas teṣu samakriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.038c: saṃsāreṣv anubhūtāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:028.039a: naivāsya kaś cid bhavitā nāyaṃ bhavati kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:028.040a: kvāsaṃ kvāsmi gamiṣyāmi ko nv ahaṃ kim ihāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.040c: kasmāt kam anuśoceyam ity evaṃ sthāpayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.040f-0037_01: pathi saṃgatam evaitad bhrātā mātā pitā sakhā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.041a: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paralokaṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.042c: yajec ca vidvān vidhivat trivargaṃ cāpy anuvrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:028.045a: te pibantaḥ kaṣāyāṃś ca sarpīṃṣi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.045c: na mṛtyum ativartante velām iva mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.046c: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nagā nāgair ivottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.047c: dātāro yajñaśīlāś ca na taranti jarāntakau
GE07mbh_12_u:028.048a: na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.048c: jātānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ na pakṣā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.049a: so 'yaṃ vipulam adhvānaṃ kālena dhruvam adhruvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.050a: deho vā jīvato 'bhyeti jīvo vābhyeti dehataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.050c: pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārair anyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.051a: nāyam atyantasaṃvāso labhyate jātu kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:028.051c: api svena śarīreṇa kim utānyena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:028.052a: kva nu te 'dya pitā rājan kva nu te 'dya pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.052c: na tvaṃ paśyasi tān adya na tvāṃ paśyanti te 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:028.053a: na hy eva puruṣo draṣṭā svargasya narakasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:028.053c: āgamas tu satāṃ cakṣur nṛpate tam ihācara
GE07mbh_12_u:028.055a: sa yajñaśīlaḥ prajane niviṣṭaḥ; prāg brahmacārī pravibhaktapakṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.055c: ārādhayan svargam imaṃ ca lokaṃ; paraṃ ca muktvā hṛdayavyalīkam
GE07mbh_12_u:028.056a: samyag ghi dharmaṃ carato nṛpasya; dravyāṇi cāpy āharato yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:028.057a: ity evam ājñāya videharājo; vākyaṃ samagraṃ paripūrṇahetuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.057c: aśmānam āmantrya viśuddhabuddhir; yayau gṛhaṃ svaṃ prati śāntaśokaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:028.058a: tathā tvam apy acyuta muñca śokam; uttiṣṭha śakropama harṣam ehi
GE07mbh_12_u:028.058c: kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa mahī jitā te; tāṃ bhuṅkṣva kuntīsuta mā viṣādīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.002c: eṣa śokārṇave magnas tam āśvāsaya mādhava
GE07mbh_12_u:029.003a: sarve sma te saṃśayitāḥ punar eva janārdana
GE07mbh_12_u:029.008a: mā kṛthāḥ puruṣavyāghra śokaṃ tvaṃ gātraśoṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.008c: na hi te sulabhā bhūyo ye hatāsmin raṇājire
GE07mbh_12_u:029.009c: evaṃ te kṣatriyā rājan ye vyatītā mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:029.010a: sarve hy abhimukhāḥ śūrā vigatā raṇaśobhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.010c: naiṣāṃ kaś cit pṛṣṭhato vā palāyan vāpi pātitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.011a: sarve tyaktvātmanaḥ prāṇān yuddhvā vīrā mahāhave
GE07mbh_12_u:029.011c: śastrapūtā divaṃ prāptā na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.011d-0039_02: prāptā vīragatiṃ puṇyāṃ na tāñ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.013a: sukhaduḥkhair ahaṃ tvaṃ ca prajāḥ sarvāś ca sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.014a: mahābhāgyaṃ paraṃ rājñāṃ kīrtyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:029.015a: mṛtān mahānubhāvāṃs tvaṃ śrutvaiva tu mahīpatīn
GE07mbh_12_u:029.015c: śrutvāpanaya saṃtāpaṃ śṛṇu vistaraśaś ca me
GE07mbh_12_u:029.016a: āvikṣitaṃ maruttaṃ me mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruhi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.016e: devā viśvasṛjo rājño yajñam īyur mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.017a: yaḥ spardhām anayac chakraṃ devarājaṃ śatakratum
GE07mbh_12_u:029.017e: saṃvarto yājayām āsa yaṃ pīḍārthaṃ bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.019a: āvikṣitasya vai satre viśve devāḥ sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.020a: marudgaṇā maruttasya yat somam apibanta te
GE07mbh_12_u:029.021a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.021c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.022a: suhotraṃ ced vaitithinaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:029.024a: kūrmān karkaṭakān nakrān makarāñ śiṃśukān api
GE07mbh_12_u:029.027a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.027c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.027e: adakṣiṇam ayajvānaṃ śvaitya saṃśāmya mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.028a: aṅgaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ caiva mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.028c: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ śvetān aśvān avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:029.032a: yasya yajñeṣu rājendra śatasaṃkhyeṣu vai punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.033a: na jāto janitā cānyaḥ pumān yas tat pradāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.033c: yad aṅgaḥ pradadau vittaṃ somasaṃsthāsu saptasu
GE07mbh_12_u:029.034a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.034c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.035a: śibim auśīnaraṃ caiva mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.035c: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ carmavat samaveṣṭayat
GE07mbh_12_u:029.037a: yāvad adya gavāśvaṃ syād āraṇyaiḥ paśubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:029.037c: tāvatīḥ pradadau gāḥ sa śibir auśīnaro 'dhvare
GE07mbh_12_u:029.038a: nodyantāraṃ dhuraṃ tasya kaṃ cin mene prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.038c: na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyantaṃ sarvarājasu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:029.039a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.039c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.039e: adakṣiṇam ayajvānaṃ taṃ vai saṃśāmya mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.040a: bharataṃ caiva dauḥṣantiṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:029.041a: yo baddhvā triṃśato hy aśvān devebhyo yamunām anu
GE07mbh_12_u:029.041c: sarasvatīṃ viṃśatiṃ ca gaṅgām anu caturdaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:029.042c: iṣṭavān sa mahātejā dauḥṣantir bharataḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.043c: khaṃ martyā iva bāhubhyāṃ nānugantum aśaknuvan
GE07mbh_12_u:029.044a: paraṃ sahasrād yo baddhvā hayān vedīṃ vicitya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:029.044c: sahasraṃ yatra padmānāṃ kaṇvāya bharato dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:029.045a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.045c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.046a: rāmaṃ dāśarathiṃ caiva mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.046c: yo 'nvakampata vai nityaṃ prajāḥ putrān ivaurasān
GE07mbh_12_u:029.047a: vidhavā yasya viṣaye nānāthāḥ kāś canābhavan
GE07mbh_12_u:029.048a: kālavarṣāś ca parjanyāḥ sasyāni rasavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:029.048c: nityaṃ subhikṣam evāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.049c: na vyālajaṃ bhayaṃ cāsīd rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.051a: nānyonyena vivādo 'bhūt strīṇām api kuto nṛṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.051c: dharmanityāḥ prajāś cāsan rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.051d-0043_02: narāḥ satyavratāś cāsan rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.052c: sarvā droṇadughā gāvo rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.053a: sa caturdaśa varṣāṇi vane proṣya mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.055a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.055c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.056a: bhagīrathaṃ ca rājānaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.056c: yasyendro vitate yajñe somaṃ pītvā madotkaṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.059a: sarvā rathagatāḥ kanyā rathāḥ sarve caturyujaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.059c: rathe rathe śataṃ nāgāḥ padmino hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.060c: gavāṃ sahasram aśve 'śve sahasraṃ gavy ajāvikam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.061c: gaṅgā bhāgīrathī tasmād urvaśī hy abhavat purā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.063a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.063c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.067a: yasya yajñe mahān āsīd yūpaḥ śrīmān hiraṇmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.067c: taṃ devāḥ karma kurvāṇāḥ śakrajyeṣṭhā upāśrayan
GE07mbh_12_u:029.068a: caṣālo yasya sauvarṇas tasmin yūpe hiraṇmaye
GE07mbh_12_u:029.069a: avādayat tatra vīṇāṃ madhye viśvāvasuḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.070c: yat striyo hemasaṃpannāḥ pathi mattāḥ sma śerate
GE07mbh_12_u:029.072a: trayaḥ śabdā na jīryante dilīpasya niveśane
GE07mbh_12_u:029.072c: svādhyāyaghoṣo jyāghoṣo dīyatām iti caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.073a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.073c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.074c: yaṃ devā maruto garbhaṃ pituḥ pārśvād apāharan
GE07mbh_12_u:029.076a: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitur utsaṅge śayānaṃ devarūpiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.076c: anyonyam abruvan devāḥ kam ayaṃ dhāsyatīti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:029.077a: mām eva dhāsyatīty evam indro abhyavapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:029.077c: māndhāteti tatas tasya nāma cakre śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.078a: tatas tu payaso dhārāṃ puṣṭihetor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.079a: taṃ piban pāṇim indrasya samām ahnā vyavardhata
GE07mbh_12_u:029.080a: tam iyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā ekāhnā samapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:029.081a: ya āṅgāraṃ hi nṛpatiṃ maruttam asitaṃ gayam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.082c: visphārair dhanuṣo devā dyaur abhedīti menire
GE07mbh_12_u:029.083a: yataḥ sūrya udeti sma yatra ca pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:029.083c: sarvaṃ tad yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:029.086a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.086c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.087a: yayātiṃ nāhuṣaṃ caiva mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.087c: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ vijitya sahasāgarām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.091c: pūruṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya sve sadāraḥ prasthito vanam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.092a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.092c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.093a: ambarīṣaṃ ca nābhāgaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.093c: yaṃ prajā vavrire puṇyaṃ goptāraṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:029.094a: yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ rājñām ayuta yājinām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.095a: naitat pūrve janāś cakrur na kariṣyanti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:029.097a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.097c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.100c: kanyāṃ kanyāṃ śataṃ nāgā nāgaṃ nāgaṃ śataṃ rathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.101a: rathaṃ rathaṃ śataṃ cāśvā deśajā hemamālinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.101c: aśvam aśvaṃ śataṃ gāvo gāṃ gāṃ tadvad ajāvikam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.103a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.103c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.105a: yasmai vahnir varān prādāt tato vavre varān gayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.105c: dadato me 'kṣayā cāstu dharme śraddhā ca vardhatām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.106a: mano me ramatāṃ satye tvatprasādād dhutāśana
GE07mbh_12_u:029.106c: lebhe ca kāmāṃs tān sarvān pāvakād iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.108a: śataṃ gavāṃ sahasrāṇi śatam aśvaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:029.109a: tarpayām āsa somena devān vittair dvijān api
GE07mbh_12_u:029.109c: pitṝn svadhābhiḥ kāmaiś ca striyaḥ svāḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:029.111c: tāvatīr eva gāḥ prādād āmūrtarayaso gayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.112a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.112c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.113a: rantidevaṃ ca sāṅkṛtyaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.113c: samyag ārādhya yaḥ śakraṃ varaṃ lebhe mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.114a: annaṃ ca no bahu bhaved atithīṃś ca labhemahi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.114c: śraddhā ca no mā vyagaman mā ca yāciṣma kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:029.116c: tataś carmaṇvatīty evaṃ vikhyātā sā mahānadī
GE07mbh_12_u:029.117a: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau niṣkān sadasi pratate nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.117c: tubhyaṃ tubhyaṃ niṣkam iti yatrākrośanti vai dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.117e: sahasraṃ tubhyam ity uktvā brāhmaṇān sma prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:029.118c: ghaṭāḥ sthālyaḥ kaṭāhāś ca pātryaś ca piṭharā api
GE07mbh_12_u:029.118e: na tat kiṃ cid asauvarṇaṃ rantidevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.119a: sāṅkṛte rantidevasya yāṃ rātrim avasad gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:029.119c: ālabhyanta śataṃ gāvaḥ sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.120c: sūpabhūyiṣṭham aśnīdhvaṃ nādya māṃsaṃ yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.121a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.121c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.122a: sagaraṃ ca mahātmānaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.124a: ekacchatrā mahī yasya praṇatā hy abhavat purā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.127a: khānayām āsa yaḥ kopāt pṛthivīṃ sāgarāṅkitām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.127c: yasya nāmnā samudraś ca sāgaratvam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.128a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.128c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.129a: rājānaṃ ca pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:029.130a: prathayiṣyati vai lokān pṛthur ity eva śabditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.130c: kṣatāc ca nas trāyatīti sa tasmāt kṣatriyaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.131a: pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ prajā dṛṣṭvā raktāḥ smeti yad abruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:029.133c: yathābhikāmam avasan kṣetreṣu ca gṛheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:029.136a: sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:029.136c: putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.137a: kiṃ vai tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyasi sṛñjaya tvaṃ; na me rājan vācam imāṃ śṛṇoṣi
GE07mbh_12_u:029.137c: na cen moghaṃ vipralaptaṃ mayedaṃ; pathyaṃ mumūrṣor iva samyag uktam
GE07mbh_12_u:029.138a: śṛṇomi te nārada vācam etāṃ; vicitrārthāṃ srajam iva puṇyagandhām
GE07mbh_12_u:029.138c: rājarṣīṇāṃ puṇyakṛtāṃ mahātmanāṃ; kīrtyā yuktāṃ śokanirṇāśanārtham
GE07mbh_12_u:029.139a: na te moghaṃ vipralaptaṃ maharṣe; dṛṣṭvaiva tvāṃ nāradāhaṃ viśokaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.139c: śuśrūṣe te vacanaṃ brahmavādin; na te tṛpyāmy amṛtasyeva pānāt
GE07mbh_12_u:029.140a: amoghadarśin mama cet prasādaṃ; sutāghadagdhasya vibho prakuryāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:029.140c: mṛtasya saṃjīvanam adya me syāt; tava prasādāt sutasaṃgamaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:029.141a: yas te putro dayito 'yaṃ viyātaḥ; svarṇaṣṭhīvī yam parvatas te
GE07mbh_12_u:029.141c: punas te taṃ putram ahaṃ dadāmi; hiraṇyanābhaṃ varṣasahasriṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:030.001c: parvatena kimarthaṃ ca dattaḥ kena mamāra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:030.003c: tathyaṃ vā kāñcanaṣṭhīvīty etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:030.004a: atra te kathayiṣyāmi yathā vṛttaṃ janeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:030.004c: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva prāg ṛṣī lokapūjitau
GE07mbh_12_u:030.006c: nārado mātulaś caiva bhāgineyaś ca parvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.008a: prītimantau mudā yuktau samayaṃ tatra cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.008c: yo bhaved dhṛdi saṃkalpaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.008e: anyonyasya sa ākhyeyo mṛṣā śāpo 'nyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:030.009c: sṛñjayaṃ śvaityam abhyetya rājānam idam ūcatuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.010a: āvāṃ bhavati vatsyāvaḥ kaṃ cit kālaṃ hitāya te
GE07mbh_12_u:030.010e: tatheti kṛtvā tau rājā satkṛtyopacacāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:030.011a: tataḥ kadā cit tau rājā mahātmānau tathāgatau
GE07mbh_12_u:030.013a: paramaṃ saumya ity uktas tābhyāṃ rājā śaśāsa tām
GE07mbh_12_u:030.013c: kanye viprāv upacara devavat pitṛvac ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:030.014a: sā tu kanyā tathety uktvā pitaraṃ dharmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:030.016a: vavṛdhe ca tatas tasya hṛdi kāmo mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.016c: yathā śuklasya pakṣasya pravṛttāv uḍurāṭ chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.017a: na ca taṃ bhāgineyāya parvatāya mahātmane
GE07mbh_12_u:030.017c: śaśaṃsa manmathaṃ tīvraṃ vrīḍamānaḥ sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:030.018c: kāmārtaṃ nāradaṃ kruddhaḥ śaśāpainaṃ tato bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:030.019a: kṛtvā samayam avyagro bhavān vai sahito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.019c: yo bhaved dhṛdi saṃkalpaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.020a: anyonyasya sa ākhyeya iti tad vai mṛṣā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:030.020c: bhavatā vacanaṃ brahmaṃs tasmād etad vadāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:030.021a: na hi kāmaṃ pravartantaṃ bhavān ācaṣṭa me purā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.021c: sukumāryāṃ kumāryāṃ te tasmād eṣa śapāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:030.022a: brahmavādī gurur yasmāt tapasvī brāhmaṇaś ca san
GE07mbh_12_u:030.022c: akārṣīḥ samayabhraṃśam āvābhyāṃ yaḥ kṛto mithaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.023a: śapsye tasmāt susaṃkruddho bhavantaṃ taṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:030.023c: sukumārī ca te bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.024a: vānaraṃ caiva kanyā tvāṃ vivāhāt prabhṛti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:030.025a: sa tad vākyaṃ tu vijñāya nāradaḥ parvatāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.025c: aśapat tam api krodhād bhāgineyaṃ sa mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.026a: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:030.026c: yukto 'pi dharmanityaś ca na svargavāsam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:030.027a: tau tu śaptvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhau parasparam amarṣaṇau
GE07mbh_12_u:030.029a: atha tām alabhat kanyāṃ nāradaḥ sṛñjayātmajām
GE07mbh_12_u:030.030a: sā tu kanyā yathāśāpaṃ nāradaṃ taṃ dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:030.032a: upatasthe ca bhartāraṃ na cānyaṃ manasāpy agāt
GE07mbh_12_u:030.032c: devaṃ muniṃ vā yakṣaṃ vā patitve pativatsalā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.033a: tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān parvato 'nusasāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:030.033c: vanaṃ virahitaṃ kiṃ cit tatrāpaśyat sa nāradam
GE07mbh_12_u:030.034c: bhavān prasādaṃ kurutāṃ svargādeśāya me prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:030.035a: tam uvāca tato dṛṣṭvā parvataṃ nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.036a: tvayāhaṃ prathamaṃ śapto vānaras tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:030.036c: ity uktena mayā paścāc chaptas tvam api matsarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:030.036e: adyaprabhṛti vai vāsaṃ svarge nāvāpsyasīti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:030.037a: tava naitad dhi sadṛśaṃ putrasthāne hi me bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:030.037c: nivartayetāṃ tau śāpam anyo 'nyena tadā munī
GE07mbh_12_u:030.039a: tāṃ parvatas tato dṛṣṭvā pradravantīm aninditām
GE07mbh_12_u:030.039c: abravīt tava bhartaiṣa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.040c: tavaivābhedyahṛdayo mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:030.041c: śāpadoṣaṃ ca taṃ bhartuḥ śrutvā svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gatā
GE07mbh_12_u:030.041e: parvato 'tha yayau svargaṃ nārado 'tha yayau gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:030.042c: eṣa vakṣyati vai pṛṣṭo yathā vṛttaṃ narottama
GE07mbh_12_u:031.002a: evam uktaḥ sa ca munir dharmarājena nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.003c: kāryasyāsya tu yac cheṣaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.004a: ahaṃ ca parvataś caiva svasrīyo me mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.006c: parvato mām uvācedaṃ kāle vacanam arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:031.007c: uṣitau samaye brahmaṃś cintyatām atra sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.009a: vareṇa chandyatāṃ rājā labhatāṃ yad yad icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:031.009c: āvayos tapasā siddhiṃ prāpnotu yadi manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:031.011a: prītau svo nṛpa satkārais tava hy ārjavasaṃbhṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.012c: tad gṛhāṇa mahārāja pūjārho nau mato bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:031.013a: prītau bhavantau yadi me kṛtam etāvatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:031.013c: eṣa eva paro lābho nirvṛtto me mahāphalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.014c: vṛṇīṣva rājan saṃkalpo yas te hṛdi ciraṃ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.016a: bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmo na tv āyuṣmān bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:031.016c: devarājābhibhūtyarthaṃ saṃkalpo hy eṣa te hṛdi
GE07mbh_12_u:031.018a: tac chrutvā sṛñjayo vākyaṃ parvatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.018c: prasādayām āsa tadā naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:031.019a: āyuṣmān me bhavet putro bhavatas tapasā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:031.019c: na ca taṃ parvataḥ kiṃ cid uvācendravyapekṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:031.020a: tam ahaṃ nṛpatiṃ dīnam abruvaṃ punar eva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:031.021a: ahaṃ te dayitaṃ putraṃ pretarājavaśaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.021c: punar dāsyāmi tad rūpaṃ mā śucaḥ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:031.022a: evam uktvā tu nṛpatiṃ prayātau svo yathepsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.023c: jajñe putro mahāvīryas tejasā prajvalann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:031.024c: babhūva kāñcanaṣṭhīvī yathārthaṃ nāma tasya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:031.025c: bubudhe tac ca devendro varadānaṃ mahātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.026a: tatas tv abhibhavād bhīto bṛhaspatimate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.027a: codayām āsa vajraṃ sa divyāstraṃ mūrtisaṃsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.027c: vyāghro bhūtvā jahīmaṃ tvaṃ rājaputram iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:031.028c: sṛñjayasya suto vajra yathainaṃ parvato dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:031.029a: evam uktas tu śakreṇa vajraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.033c: vyasuḥ papāta medinyāṃ tato dhātrī vicukruśe
GE07mbh_12_u:031.035a: dhātryās tu ninadaṃ śrutvā rudatyāḥ paramārtavat
GE07mbh_12_u:031.035c: abhyadhāvata taṃ deśaṃ svayam eva mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.036a: sa dadarśa gatāsuṃ taṃ śayānaṃ pītaśoṇitam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.038a: tatas tā mātaras tasya rudantyaḥ śokakarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.038c: abhyadhāvanta taṃ deśaṃ yatra rājā sa sṛñjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.039a: tataḥ sa rājā sasmāra mām antargatamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.039c: tac cāhaṃ cintitaṃ jñātvā gatavāṃs tasya darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:031.041c: bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca na tac chakyam ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:031.042a: ata ūrdhvaṃ kumāraḥ sa svarṇaṣṭhīvī mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.042c: cittaṃ prasādayām āsa pitur mātuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:031.043a: kārayām āsa rājyaṃ sa pitari svargate vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.044c: tarpayām āsa devāṃś ca pitṝṃś caiva mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.046a: sa tvaṃ rājendra saṃjātaṃ śokam etan nivartaya
GE07mbh_12_u:031.046c: yathā tvāṃ keśavaḥ prāha vyāsaś ca sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:031.047c: iṣṭvā puṇyair mahāyajñair iṣṭāṃl lokān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:032.003c: brāhmaṇeṣu ca yo dharmaḥ sa nityo vedaniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.005a: tathā yaḥ pratihanty asya śāsanaṃ viṣaye naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.006a: pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ kuryān mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.006c: bhṛtyo vā yadi vā putras tapasvī vāpi kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:032.006e: pāpān sarvair upāyais tān niyacched ghātayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:032.007c: dharmaṃ vinaśyamānaṃ hi yo na rakṣet sa dharmahā
GE07mbh_12_u:032.008c: svadharme vartamānas tvaṃ kiṃ nu śocasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:032.008e: rājā hi hanyād dadyāc ca prajā rakṣec ca dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.009a: na te 'bhiśaṅke vacanaṃ yad bravīṣi tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:032.009c: aparokṣo hi te dharmaḥ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:032.010a: mayā hy avadhyā bahavo ghātitā rājyakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:032.010c: tāny akāryāṇi me brahman dahanti ca tapanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:032.011a: īśvaro vā bhavet kartā puruṣo vāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:032.011c: haṭho vā vartate loke karmajaṃ vā phalaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:032.012a: īśvareṇa niyuktā hi sādhv asādhu ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:032.012c: kurvanti puruṣāḥ karma phalam īśvaragāmi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:032.013a: yathā hi puruṣaś chindyād vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā vane
GE07mbh_12_u:032.013c: chettur eva bhavet pāpaṃ paraśor na kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:032.014a: atha vā tad upādānāt prāpnuyuḥ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:032.014c: daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:032.015a: na caitad iṣṭaṃ kaunteya yad anyena phalaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:032.015c: prāpnuyād iti tasmāc ca īśvare tan niveśaya
GE07mbh_12_u:032.016a: atha vā puruṣaḥ kartā karmaṇoḥ śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.016c: na paraṃ vidyate tasmād evam anyac chubhaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:032.017a: na hi kaś cit kva cid rājan diṣṭāt pratinivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:032.017c: daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:032.018a: yadi vā manyase rājan haṭhe lokaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:032.018c: evam apy aśubhaṃ karma na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:032.021a: evaṃ satyaṃ śubhādeśaṃ karmaṇas tat phalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:032.021c: tyaja tad rājaśārdūla maivaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.022c: evam ātmaparityāgas tava rājan na śobhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:032.024a: tad rājañ jīvamānas tvaṃ prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:032.024c: prāyaścittam akṛtvā tu pretya taptāsi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:033.001a: hatāḥ putrāś ca pautrāś ca bhrātaraḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:033.002c: vayasyā jñātayaś caiva bhrātaraś ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:033.004a: tāṃs tādṛśān ahaṃ hatvā dharmanityān mahīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:033.004c: asakṛt somapān vīrān kiṃ prāpsyāmi tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:033.005a: dahyāmy aniśam adyāhaṃ cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:033.005c: hīnāṃ pārthivasiṃhais taiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:033.006a: dṛṣṭvā jñātivadhaṃ ghoraṃ hatāṃś ca śataśaḥ parān
GE07mbh_12_u:033.006c: koṭiśaś ca narān anyān paritapye pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:033.007a: kā nu tāsāṃ varastrīṇām avasthādya bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:033.008c: ākrośantyaḥ kṛśā dīnā nipatantyaś ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:033.009a: apaśyantyaḥ pitṝn bhrātṝn patīn putrāṃś ca yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:033.009c: tyaktvā prāṇān priyān sarvā gamiṣyanti yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:033.010a: vatsalatvād dvijaśreṣṭha tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:033.010c: vyaktaṃ saukṣmyāc ca dharmasya prāpsyāmaḥ strīvadhaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:033.011a: te vayaṃ suhṛdo hatvā kṛtvā pāpam anantakam
GE07mbh_12_u:033.011c: narake nipatiṣyāmo hy adhaḥśirasa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:033.012c: āśramāṃś ca viśeṣāṃs tvaṃ mamācakṣva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:034.001c: samīkṣya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā ṛṣiḥ provāca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_12_u:034.002a: mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā rājan kṣatradharmam anusmara
GE07mbh_12_u:034.002c: svadharmeṇa hatā hy ete kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:034.003a: kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śriyaṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.004a: na tvaṃ hantā na bhīmo 'pi nārjuno na yamāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:034.005a: na yasya mātāpitarau nānugrāhyo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:034.005c: karmasākṣī prajānāṃ yas tena kālena saṃhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.006c: yad dhanti bhūtair bhūtāni tad asmai rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:034.009c: yadā tvam īdṛśaṃ karma vidhinākramya kāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.010a: tvaṣṭreva vihitaṃ yantraṃ yathā sthāpayitur vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:034.012a: vyalīkaṃ cāpi yat tv atra cittavaitaṃsikaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:034.012c: tadartham iṣyate rājan prāyaścittaṃ tad ācara
GE07mbh_12_u:034.013a: idaṃ ca śrūyate pārtha yuddhe devāsure purā
GE07mbh_12_u:034.013c: asurā bhrātaro jyeṣṭhā devāś cāpi yavīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.014a: teṣām api śrīnimittaṃ mahān āsīt samucchrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.015c: jaghnur daityāṃs tadā devās tridivaṃ caiva lebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:034.017a: śālāvṛkā iti khyātās triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:034.018c: hantavyās te durātmāno devair daityā ivolbaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.019a: ekaṃ hatvā yadi kule śiṣṭānāṃ syād anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:034.019c: kulaṃ hatvātha rāṣṭraṃ vā na tad vṛttopaghātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:034.020a: adharmarūpo dharmo hi kaś cid asti narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:034.020c: dharmaś cādharmarūpo 'sti tac ca jñeyaṃ vipaścitā
GE07mbh_12_u:034.022c: bhrātṝn āśvāsayaitāṃs tvaṃ suhṛdaś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:034.023c: kurvann api tathaiva syāt kṛtvā ca nirapatrapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.024a: tasmiṃs tat kaluṣaṃ sarvaṃ samāptam iti śabditam
GE07mbh_12_u:034.024c: prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti hrāso vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.030a: so 'yaṃ tvam iha saṃkrānto vikrameṇa vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:034.031a: teṣāṃ purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi gatvā rājan suhṛdvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:034.031c: bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca sve sve rājye 'bhiṣecaya
GE07mbh_12_u:034.032a: bālān api ca garbhasthān sāntvāni samudācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:034.033a: kumāro nāsti yeṣāṃ ca kanyās tatrābhiṣecaya
GE07mbh_12_u:034.033c: kāmāśayo hi strīvargaḥ śokam evaṃ prahāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:034.036a: avāptaḥ kṣatradharmas te rājyaṃ prāptam akalmaṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:034.036c: carasva dharmaṃ kaunteya śreyān yaḥ pretya bhāvikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.001c: kiṃ kṛtvā caiva mucyeta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:035.002c: prāyaścittīyate hy evaṃ naro mithyā ca vartayan
GE07mbh_12_u:035.003a: sūryeṇābhyudito yaś ca brahmacārī bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:035.004a: parivittiḥ parivettā brahmojjho yaś ca kutsakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.004c: didhiṣūpatis tathā yaḥ syād agredidhiṣur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:035.005a: avakīrṇī bhaved yaś ca dvijātivadhakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:035.006a: grāmayājī ca kaunteya rājñaś ca parivikrayī
GE07mbh_12_u:035.006c: śūdrastrīvadhako yaś ca pūrvaḥ pūrvas tu garhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.008c: etāny enāṃsi sarvāṇi vyutkrāntasamayaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.009a: akāryāṇy api vakṣyāmi yāni tāni nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:035.012a: ādhānādīni karmāṇi śaktimān na karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.012c: aprayacchaṃś ca sarvāṇi nityaṃ deyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:035.013c: sarvāṇy etāny akāryāṇi prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.014a: pitrā vibhajate putro yaś ca syād gurutalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.015c: yāni kurvann akurvaṃś ca prāyaścittīyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.016a: etāny eva tu karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni mānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:035.016c: yeṣu yeṣu nimitteṣu na limpanty atha tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:035.017a: pragṛhya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:035.017c: jighāṃsantaṃ nihatyājau na tena brahmahā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:035.018a: api cāpy atra kaunteya mantro vedeṣu paṭhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:035.019a: apetaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttād yo hanyād ātatāyinam
GE07mbh_12_u:035.019c: na tena brahmahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:035.022a: gurutalpaṃ hi gurvarthe na dūṣayati mānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:035.023a: steyaṃ kurvaṃs tu gurvartham āpatsu na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:035.023c: bahuśaḥ kāmakāreṇa na ced yaḥ saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:035.024c: svayam aprāśitā yaś ca na sa pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:035.025a: prāṇatrāṇe 'nṛtaṃ vācyam ātmano vā parasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:035.025c: gurvarthe strīṣu caiva syād vivāhakaraṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:035.026a: nāvartate vrataṃ svapne śukramokṣe kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:035.027a: pārivittyaṃ ca patite nāsti pravrajite tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:035.027c: bhikṣite pāradāryaṃ ca na tad dharmasya dūṣakam
GE07mbh_12_u:035.029a: anarhe brāhmaṇe dattam ajñānāt tan na dūṣakam
GE07mbh_12_u:035.030c: api sā pūyate tena na tu bhartā praduṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:035.031a: tattvaṃ jñātvā tu somasya vikrayaḥ syād adūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.031e: vanadāho gavām arthe kriyamāṇo na dūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:035.032a: uktāny etāni karmāṇi yāni kurvan na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:035.032d-0047_01: yāni kṛtvā naraḥ pūto bhaviṣyati narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:036.001a: tapasā karmabhiś caiva pradānena ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:036.001c: punāti pāpaṃ puruṣaḥ pūtaś cen na pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.002a: ekakālaṃ tu bhuñjānaś caran bhaikṣaṃ svakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:036.003d-0048_01: lakṣyaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ vā syād viduṣām icchayātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.003d-0048_02: prāsyed ātmānam agnau vā samiddhe trir avākśirāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.003d-0048_03: japan vānyatamaṃ vedaṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:036.003d-0048_05: dhanaṃ vā jīvanāyālaṃ gṛhaṃ vā saparicchadam
GE07mbh_12_u:036.004a: ṣaḍbhir varṣaiḥ kṛcchrabhojī brahmahā pūyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.004c: māse māse samaśnaṃs tu tribhir varṣaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.006c: ya cāsyāvabhṛthe snānti ke cid evaṃvidhā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.007a: te sarve pūtapāpmāno bhavantīti parā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.009c: dogdhrīṇāṃ sa ca pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vipramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.010c: sādhubhyo vai daridrebhyo dattvā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:036.011a: śataṃ tai yas tu kāmbojān brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:036.011c: niyatebhyo mahīpāla sa ca pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.012a: manorathaṃ tu yo dadyād ekasmā api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:036.012c: na kīrtayeta dattvā yaḥ sa ca pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.013a: surāpānaṃ sakṛt pītvā yo 'gnivarṇāṃ pibed dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.013c: sa pāvayaty athātmānam iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:036.015c: samitiṃ brāhmaṇair gacched iti vai brāhmaṇī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.016a: bhūmipradānaṃ kuryād yaḥ surāṃ pītvā vimatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.016c: punar na ca pibed rājan saṃskṛtaḥ śudhyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.017c: pāṇāv ādhāya vā śephaṃ pravrajed ūrdhvadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.019a: mahāvrataṃ cared yas tu dadyāt sarvasvam eva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:036.019c: gurvarthe vā hato yuddhe sa mucyet karmaṇo 'śubhāt
GE07mbh_12_u:036.020c: upahṛtya priyaṃ tasmai tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.022c: saṃvatsaraṃ vratī bhūtvā tathā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:036.023a: steyaṃ tu yasyāpaharet tasmai dadyāt samaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_12_u:036.024c: parivettā bhavet pūtaḥ parivittiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:036.025a: niveśyaṃ tu bhavet tena sadā tārayitā pitṝn
GE07mbh_12_u:036.025c: na tu striyā bhaved doṣo na tu sā tena lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.026a: bhajane hy ṛtunā śuddhaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.026c: striyas tena viśudhyanti iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.027a: striyas tv āśaṅkitāḥ pāpair nopagamyā hi jānatā
GE07mbh_12_u:036.027c: rajasā tā viśudhyante bhasmanā bhājanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:036.027d-0049_02: gaṇḍūṣocchiṣṭam api vā viśuddhyed daśabhis tu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:036.029a: tathā vaiśye ca śūdre ca pādaḥ pādo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.030c: trirātraṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ syāt karma ca prathayen naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.032a: eṣa eva tu sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ vidhir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:036.033a: sāvitrīm apy adhīyānaḥ śucau deśe mitāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.034a: ahaḥsu satataṃ tiṣṭhed abhyākāśaṃ niśi svapet
GE07mbh_12_u:036.034c: trir ahnas trir niśāyāś ca savāsā jalam āviśet
GE07mbh_12_u:036.035c: pāpāny ajñānataḥ kṛtvā mucyed evaṃvrato dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:036.036c: atiricyet tayor yat tu tat kartā labhate phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:036.037a: tasmād dānena tapasā karmaṇā ca śubhaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:036.037c: vardhayed aśubhaṃ kṛtvā yathā syād atirekavān
GE07mbh_12_u:036.038c: dadyān nityaṃ ca vittāni tathā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:036.041a: jānatā tu kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ guru sarvaṃ bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:036.042c: āstike śraddadhāne tu vidhir eṣa vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:036.044a: śiṣṭācāraś ca śiṣṭaś ca dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:036.045a: sa rājan mokṣyase pāpāt tena pūrveṇa hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:036.045c: trāṇārthaṃ vā vadhenaiṣām atha vā nṛpakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:036.046a: atha vā te ghṛṇā kā cit prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:036.046c: mā tv evānāryajuṣṭena karmaṇā nidhanaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.002a: kiṃ bhakṣyaṃ kim abhakṣyaṃ ca kiṃ ca deyaṃ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:037.002c: kiṃ ca pātram apātraṃ vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:037.003c: siddhānāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ manoś caiva prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.005a: katham annaṃ kathaṃ dānaṃ katham adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.005c: kāryākāryaṃ ca naḥ sarvaṃ śaṃsa vai tvaṃ prajāpate
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006a: tair evam ukto bhagavān manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006d-0050_01: anādeśe japo homa upavāsas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006d-0050_02: ātmajñānaṃ puṇyanadyo yatra prāyaś ca tatparāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006d-0050_06: etāni medhyaṃ puruṣaṃ kurvanty āśu na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006d-0050_07: na garveṇa bhavet prājñaḥ kadā cid api mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.006d-0050_08: dīrgham āyur athecchan hi trirātraṃ coṣṇapo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:037.008c: ādānam anṛtaṃ hiṃsā dharmo vyāvasthikaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.009a: dvividhau cāpy ubhāv etau dharmādharmau vijānatām
GE07mbh_12_u:037.010c: aśubhasyāśubhaṃ vidyāc chubhasya śubham eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.011c: daivaṃ ca daivayuktaṃ ca prāṇaś ca pralayaś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:037.012c: ūrdhvaṃ bhavati saṃdehād iha dṛṣṭārtham eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:037.013e: tad auṣadhaiś ca mantraiś ca prāyaścittaiś ca śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:037.013f-0051_03: kṣayaṃ śokaṃ prakurvāṇo na mriyeta yadā naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.014c: varjayen na hi taṃ dharmaṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:037.015a: daśa vā vedaśāstrajñās trayo vā dharmapāṭhakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.015c: yad brūyuḥ kārya utpanne sa dharmo dharmasaṃśaye
GE07mbh_12_u:037.016a: aruṇā mṛttikā caiva tathā caiva pipīlakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.016c: śleṣmātakas tathā viprair abhakṣyaṃ viṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.017a: abhakṣyā brāhmaṇair matsyāḥ śakalair ye vivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.017c: catuṣpāt kacchapād anyo maṇḍūkā jalajāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:037.018a: bhāsā haṃsāḥ suparṇāś ca cakravākā bakāḥ plavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.018c: kaṅko madguś ca gṛdhrāś ca kākolūkaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.019a: kravyādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarve catuṣpādāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.019c: yeṣāṃ cobhayato dantāś caturdaṃṣṭrāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.020c: mānuṣīṇāṃ mṛgīṇāṃ ca na pibed brāhmaṇaḥ payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.021a: pretānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ ca yac ca kiṃ cid anirdaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:037.021c: abhojyaṃ cāpy apeyaṃ ca dhenvā dugdham anirdaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:037.021d-0052_04: mṛṣyanti ye copapatiṃ strījitānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.022a: takṣṇaś carmāvakartuś ca puṃś calyā rajakasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.022c: cikitsakasya yac cānnam abhojyaṃ rakṣiṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:037.024a: vāryamāṇāhṛtaṃ cānnaṃ śuktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:037.024c: surānugatam ucchiṣṭam abhojyaṃ śeṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:037.026a: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ māṃsam apūpāś ca vṛthā kṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.026c: abhojyāś cāpy abhakṣyāś ca brāhmaṇair gṛhamedhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.027a: devān pitṝn manuṣyāṃś ca munīn gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.027c: pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād gṛhastho bhoktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:037.028a: yathā pravrajito bhikṣur gṛhasthaḥ svagṛhe vaset
GE07mbh_12_u:037.028c: evaṃvṛttaḥ priyair dāraiḥ saṃvasan dharmam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:037.029a: na dadyād yaśase dānaṃ na bhayān nopakāriṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:037.030a: na matte naiva conmatte na stene na cikitsake
GE07mbh_12_u:037.030c: na vāgghīne vivarṇe vā nāṅgahīne na vāmane
GE07mbh_12_u:037.031a: na durjane dauṣkule vā vratair vā yo na saṃskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.032a: asamyak caiva yad dattam asamyak ca pratigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.032c: ubhayoḥ syād anarthāya dātur ādātur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:037.033a: yathā khadiram ālambya śilāṃ vāpy arṇavaṃ taran
GE07mbh_12_u:037.033c: majjate majjate tadvad dātā yaś ca pratīcchakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.034a: kāṣṭhair ārdrair yathā vahnir upastīrṇo na dīpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:037.035a: kapāle yadvad āpaḥ syuḥ śvadṛtau vā yathā payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.036c: anukrośāt pradātavyaṃ dīneṣv evaṃ nareṣv api
GE07mbh_12_u:037.037a: na vai deyam anukrośād dīnāyāpy apakāriṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:037.037c: āptācaritam ity eva dharma ity eva vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.038a: niṣkāraṇaṃ sma tad dattaṃ brāhmaṇe dharmavarjite
GE07mbh_12_u:037.039a: yathā dārumayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.040a: yathā ṣaṇḍho 'phalaḥ strīṣu yathā gaur gavi cāphalā
GE07mbh_12_u:037.040c: śakunir vāpy apakṣaḥ syān nirmantro brāhmaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:037.041a: grāmadhānyaṃ yathā śūnyaṃ yathā kūpaś ca nirjalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:037.041c: yathā hutam anagnau ca tathaiva syān nirākṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:037.042c: śatrur arthaharo mūrkho na lokān prāptum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:037.043a: etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā vṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:037.043c: samāsena mahad dhy etac chrotavyaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:038.002a: āpatsu ca yathā nītir vidhātavyā mahīkṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:038.002c: dharmyam ālambya panthānaṃ vijayeyaṃ kathaṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:038.004a: dharmacaryā ca rājyaṃ ca nityam eva virudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:038.004c: yena muhyati me cetaś cintayānasya nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.005a: tam uvāca mahātejā vyāso vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.006a: śrotum icchasi ced dharmān akhilena yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:038.007a: sa te sarvarahasyeṣu saṃśayān manasi sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:038.008a: janayām āsa yaṃ devī divyā tripathagā nadī
GE07mbh_12_u:038.008c: sākṣād dadarśa yo devān sarvāñ śakrapurogamān
GE07mbh_12_u:038.010a: uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ devāsuragurur dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.010c: tac ca sarvaṃ savaiyākhyaṃ prāptavān kurusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.013c: rāmād astrāṇi śakrāc ca prāptavān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:038.014a: mṛtyur ātmecchayā yasya jātasya manujeṣv api
GE07mbh_12_u:038.015a: yasya brahmarṣayaḥ puṇyā nityam āsan sabhāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.015c: yasya nāviditaṃ kiṃ cij jñānajñeyeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:038.016c: tam abhyehi purā prāṇān sa vimuñcati dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:038.017a: evam uktas tu kaunteyo dīrghaprajño mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.019c: upasaṃpraṣṭum arhāmi tam ahaṃ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:038.021c: yad āha bhagavān vyāsas tat kuruṣva nṛpottama
GE07mbh_12_u:038.022a: brāhmaṇās tvāṃ mahābāho bhrātaraś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.023a: hataśiṣṭāś ca rājānaḥ kṛtsnaṃ caiva samāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:038.025a: suhṛdāṃ cāsmad ādīnāṃ draupadyāś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:038.025c: kuru priyam amitraghna lokasya ca hitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:038.026a: evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.028a: etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir anunīto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.028c: vyajahān mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtāpaṃ ca mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.030a: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.031c: arcayām āsa devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.034c: arjunaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ chatraṃ dhārayām āsa bhānumat
GE07mbh_12_u:038.035a: dhriyamāṇaṃ tu tac chatraṃ pāṇḍuraṃ tasya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:038.037a: te pañca ratham āsthāya bhrātaraḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.038a: āsthāya tu rathaṃ śubhraṃ yuktam aśvair mahājavaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.040a: narayānena tu jyeṣṭhaḥ pitā pārthasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:038.041a: kurustriyaś ca tāḥ sarvāḥ kuntī kṛṣṇā ca draupadī
GE07mbh_12_u:038.042a: tato rathāś ca bahulā nāgāś ca samalaṃkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.042c: pādātāś ca hayāś caiva pṛṣṭhataḥ samanuvrajan
GE07mbh_12_u:038.043a: tato vaitālikaiḥ sūtair māgadhaiś ca subhāṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.046a: pāṇḍureṇa ca mālyena patākābhiś ca vedibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.046c: saṃvṛto rājamārgaś ca dhūpanaiś ca sudhūpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.047a: atha cūrṇaiś ca gandhānāṃ nānāpuṣpaiḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.048a: kumbhāś ca nagaradvāri vāripūrṇā dṛḍhā navāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:038.048c: kanyāḥ sumanasaś chāgāḥ sthāpitās tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:039.003a: gṛhāṇi rājamārge tu ratnavanti bṛhanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:039.004a: tāḥ śanair iva savrīḍaṃ praśaśaṃsur yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:039.005a: dhanyā tvam asi pāñcāli yā tvaṃ puruṣasattamān
GE07mbh_12_u:039.006a: tava karmāṇy amoghāni vratacaryā ca bhāmini
GE07mbh_12_u:039.006c: iti kṛṣṇāṃ mahārāja praśaśaṃsus tadā striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.007c: prītijaiś ca tadā śabdaiḥ puram āsīt samākulam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.009c: ūcuḥ kathāḥ karṇasukhāḥ samupetya tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.010c: diṣṭyā rājyaṃ punaḥ prāptaṃ dharmeṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:039.011a: bhava nas tvaṃ mahārāja rājeha śaradāṃ śatam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.011c: prajāḥ pālaya dharmeṇa yathendras tridivaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:039.014c: pūjayām āsa ratnaiś ca gandhair mālyaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.015a: niścakrāma tataḥ śrīmān punar eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.017a: tān sa saṃpūjayām āsa kaunteyo vidhivad dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:039.017c: dhaumyaṃ guruṃ puraskṛtya jyeṣṭhaṃ pitaram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:039.017d-0053_01: praviveśa sabhāṃ rājā sudharmāṃ vāsavo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:039.018c: gobhir vastraiś ca rājendra vividhaiś ca kim icchakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.020a: haṃsavan neduṣāṃ rājan dvijānāṃ tatra bhāratī
GE07mbh_12_u:039.021c: jayaṃ pravadatāṃ tatra svanaḥ prādurabhūn nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:039.022a: niḥśabde ca sthite tatra tato viprajane punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.023c: sāṃkhyaḥ śikhī tridaṇḍī ca dhṛṣṭo vigatasādhvasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.025a: sa duṣṭaḥ pāpam āśaṃsan pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:039.025c: anāmantryaiva tān viprāṃs tam uvāca mahīpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:039.026a: ime prāhur dvijāḥ sarve samāropya vaco mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:039.026c: dhig bhavantaṃ kunṛpatiṃ jñātighātinam astu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:039.027a: kiṃ te rājyena kaunteya kṛtvemaṃ jñātisaṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.027c: ghātayitvā gurūṃś caiva mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.028a: iti te vai dvijāḥ śrutvā tasya ghorasya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.029a: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.029c: vrīḍitāḥ paramodvignās tūṣṇīm āsan viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:039.030c: pratyāpannaṃ vyasaninaṃ na māṃ dhikkartum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:039.031a: tato rājan brāhmaṇās te sarva eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:039.031c: ūcur naitad vaco 'smākaṃ śrīr astu tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:039.032a: jajñuś caiva mahātmānas tatas taṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:039.034a: na vayaṃ brūma dharmātman vyetu te bhayam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.035a: tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve huṃkāraiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.037-0054_01: tatas tatra tu rājānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:039.037a: pūjitāś ca yayur viprā rājānam abhinandya tam
GE07mbh_12_u:039.037c: rājā ca harṣam āpede pāṇḍavaḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.038a: brāhmaṇās tāta loke 'sminn arcanīyāḥ sadā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:039.039a: purā kṛtayuge tāta cārvāko nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.040a: chandyamāno vareṇātha brahmaṇā sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.042a: sa tu labdhavaraḥ pāpo devān amitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.043a: tato devāḥ sametyātha brahmāṇam idam abruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:039.044a: tān uvācāvyayo devo vihitaṃ tatra vai mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:039.045a: rājā duryodhano nāma sakhāsya bhavitā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:039.046c: dhakṣyanti vāgbalāḥ pāpaṃ tato nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:039.047a: sa eṣa nihataḥ śete brahmadaṇḍena rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:039.048a: hatās te kṣatradharmeṇa jñātayas tava pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:039.049a: sa tvam ātiṣṭha kalyāṇaṃ mā te bhūd glānir acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:039.049c: śatrūñ jahi prajā rakṣa dvijāṃś ca pratipālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:040.003a: madhye kṛtvā tu rājānaṃ bhīmasenārjunāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:040.005a: sudharmā viduro dhaumyo dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:040.006a: yuyutsuḥ saṃjayaś caiva gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
GE07mbh_12_u:040.006c: dhṛtarāṣṭro yato rājā tataḥ sarva upāviśan
GE07mbh_12_u:040.007c: svastikān akṣatān bhūmiṃ suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ maṇīn
GE07mbh_12_u:040.009a: pṛthivīṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:040.014d-0056_01: tata utthāya dāśārhaḥ śaṅkham ādāya pūjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:040.015c: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca rājarṣiḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:040.017a: pūjayām āsa tāṃś cāpi vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:040.018a: te prītā brāhmaṇā rājan svasty ūcur jayam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:040.018c: haṃsā iva ca nardantaḥ praśaśaṃsur yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:040.020a: diṣṭyā gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:040.020c: tvaṃ cāpi kuśalī rājan mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_12_u:040.020d-0058_03: vijitya śatrūn akhilān prajā dharmeṇa rañjayan
GE07mbh_12_u:040.022c: pratipede mahad rājyaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:040.022d-005_0008: māhātmyaṃ ca mahāpuṇyaṃ yuddhānāṃ caiva kauśalam
GE07mbh_12_u:040.022d-005_0009: kṣetrāṇāṃ caiva tīrthānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca prakīrtanam
GE07mbh_12_u:040.022d-005_0016: bhojayed brāhmaṇān mukhyāñ śreyasaḥ sādhanaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:041.002c: tathyān vāpy atha vātathyān guṇān āhuḥ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:041.003a: anugrāhyā vayaṃ nūnaṃ bhavatām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:041.004a: dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājaḥ pitā no daivataṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:041.005a: etadarthaṃ hi jīvāmi kṛtvā jñātivadhaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:041.005c: asya śuśrūṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mayā nityam atandriṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:041.006a: yadi cāham anugrāhyo bhavatāṃ suhṛdāṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:041.007a: eṣa nātho hi jagato bhavatāṃ ca mayā saha

GE07mbh_12_u:047.034a: yaṃ dṛgātmānam ātmasthaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.034c: prāhuḥ saptadaśaṃ sāṃkhyās tasmai sāṃkhyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.035c: jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.036c: śāntāḥ saṃnyāsino yānti tasmai mokṣātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.038c: bālaḥ svapiti yaś caikas tasmai māyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.040a: ajasya nābhāv adhyekaṃ yasmin viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041c: kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_02: yasmiṃś caiva pralīyante tasmai hetvātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_03: yo niṣaṇṇo bhaved rātrau divā bhavati viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_04: iṣṭāniṣṭasya ca draṣṭā tasmai draṣṭātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_06: vaikuṇṭhasya hi tad rūpaṃ tasmai kāryātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_08: kruddho nijaghne samare tasmai krauryātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.041d-0079_10: yaś ceṣṭayati bhūtāni tasmai vāyvātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.043a: brahma vaktraṃ bhujau kṣatraṃ kṛtsnam ūrūdaraṃ viśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.043c: pādau yasyāśritāḥ śūdrās tasmai varṇātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.044a: yasyāgnir āsyaṃ dyaur mūrdhā khaṃ nābhiś caraṇau kṣitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.044c: sūryaś cakṣur diśaḥ śrotre tasmai lokātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.045a: viṣaye vartamānānāṃ yaṃ taṃ vaiśeṣikair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046c: yo dhārayati bhūtāni tasmai prāṇātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0080_02: antarbhūtaḥ pacaty agnis tasmai pākātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0080_06: jagad dhārayate kṛtsnaṃ tasmai vīryātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0081_01: viṣaye vartamānānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0082_01: yaṃ na devā na gandharvā na daityā na ca dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0082_02: tattvato hi vijānanti tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.046d-0083_02: yas tejayati tejāṃsi tasmai tejātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047a: paraḥ kālāt paro yajñāt paraḥ sadasatoś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047c: anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-0084_01: vaidyuto jāṭharaś caiva pāvakaḥ śucir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0002: uddhṛtā yena vai vedās tasmai matsyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0004: yo dhārayati pṛṣṭhena tasmai kūrmātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0005: ekārṇave mahīṃ magnāṃ vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0006: uddadhāra mahīṃ yo 'sau tasmai kroḍātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0009: vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya baliṃ saṃyamya māyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0010: ime krāntās trayo lokās tasmai krāntātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0014: jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye tasmai kṣatrātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.047d-007_0021: anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.049a: ātmajñānam idaṃ jñānaṃ jñātvā pañcasv avasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.049d-0086_01: sāṃkhyair yogair viniścitya sādhyaiś ca paramarṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.049d-0086_02: yasya na jñāyate tattvaṃ tasmai guhyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.054a: yasmin sarvaṃ yataḥ sarvaṃ yaḥ sarvaṃ sarvataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.054c: yaś ca sarvamayo nityaṃ tasmai sarvātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.056a: namas te triṣu lokeṣu namas te paratastriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:047.056c: namas te dikṣu sarvāsu tvaṃ hi sarvaparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.057a: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo lokānāṃ prabhavāpyaya
GE07mbh_12_u:047.057c: tvaṃ hi kartā hṛṣīkeśa saṃhartā cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.058a: tena paśyāmi te divyān bhāvān hi triṣu vartmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:047.058c: tac ca paśyāmi tattvena yat te rūpaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.059a: divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ devī vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_12_u:047.059d-0090_01: diśo bhujā raviś cakṣur vīryaṃ śukraprajāpatī
GE07mbh_12_u:047.059d-0090_02: sapta mārgā niruddhās te vāyor amitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.059d-0091_01: avyaktaṃ vyaktarūpeṇa vyāptaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:047.059d-0091_03: avyaktaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ vyaktam etac carācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:047.060b-0094_06: rātrau ca kṛṣṇaṃ punar utthitā ye
GE07mbh_12_u:047.060c: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.061a: yathā viṣṇumayaṃ satyaṃ yathā viṣṇumayaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.061c: yathā viṣṇumayaṃ sarvaṃ pāpmā me naśyatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:047.061d-0096_02: praṇāmaṃ ye 'pi kurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.062a: tvāṃ prapannāya bhaktāya gatim iṣṭāṃ jigīṣave
GE07mbh_12_u:047.062c: yac chreyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tad dhyāyasva surottama
GE07mbh_12_u:047.064c: nama ity eva kṛṣṇāya praṇāmam akarot tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:047.065a: abhigamya tu yogena bhaktiṃ bhīṣmasya mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.065c: traikālyadarśanaṃ jñānaṃ divyaṃ dātuṃ yayau hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.066a: tasminn uparate śabde tatas te brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.066c: bhīṣmaṃ vāgbhir bāṣpakaṇṭhās tam ānarcur mahāmatim
GE07mbh_12_u:047.067a: te stuvantaś ca viprāgryāḥ keśavaṃ puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:047.067c: bhīṣmaṃ ca śanakaiḥ sarve praśaśaṃsuḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:047.070a: bhīmaseno yamau cobhau ratham ekaṃ samāsthitau
GE07mbh_12_u:047.070c: kṛpo yuyutsuḥ sūtaś ca saṃjayaś cāparaṃ ratham
GE07mbh_12_u:047.072a: tato giraḥ puruṣavaras tavānvitā; dvijeritāḥ pathi sumanāḥ sa śuśruve
GE07mbh_12_u:047.072c: kṛtāñjaliṃ praṇatam athāparaṃ janaṃ; sa keśihā muditamanābhyanandata
GE07mbh_12_u:048.001a: tataḥ sa ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:048.001c: kṛpādayaś ca te sarve catvāraḥ pāṇḍavāś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:048.003c: dehanyāsaḥ kṛto yatra kṣatriyais tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:048.006c: paśyantas te kurukṣetraṃ yayur āśu mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:048.008a: amī rāmahradāḥ pañca dṛśyante pārtha dūrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:048.009c: ihedānīṃ tato rāmaḥ karmaṇo virarāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:048.010c: rāmeṇeti yad āttha tvam atra me saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:048.012c: katham utsāditaṃ kṣatraṃ kathaṃ vṛddhiṃ punar gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:048.013c: tathābhūc ca mahī kīrṇā kṣatriyair vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:048.014a: evaṃ me chindhi vārṣṇeya saṃśayaṃ tārkṣyaketana
GE07mbh_12_u:048.014c: āgamo hi paraḥ kṛṣṇa tvatto no vāsavānuja
GE07mbh_12_u:048.015a: tato vrajann eva gadāgrajaḥ prabhuḥ; śaśaṃsa tasmai nikhilena tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.001a: śṛṇu kaunteya rāmasya mayā yāvat pariśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.001c: maharṣīṇāṃ kathayatāṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya janma ca
GE07mbh_12_u:049.002a: yathā ca jāmadagnyena koṭiśaḥ kṣatriyā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.002c: udbhūtā rājavaṃśeṣu ye bhūyo bhārate hatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.003a: jahnor ajahnus tanayo ballavas tasya cātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.003c: kuśiko nāma dharmajñas tasya putro mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.004c: putraṃ labheyam ajitaṃ trilokeśvaram ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:049.007a: tasya kanyābhavad rājan nāmnā satyavatī prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:049.007c: tāṃ gādhiḥ kaviputrāya sorcīkāya dadau prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.008a: tataḥ prītas tu kaunteya bhārgavaḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:049.008c: putrārthe śrapayām āsa caruṃ gādhes tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:049.009a: āhūya cāha tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.009c: upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrāpy ayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:049.012a: ity evam uktvā tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhṛgunandanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.012c: tapasy abhirato dhīmāñ jagāmāraṇyam eva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:049.013a: etasminn eva kāle tu tīrthayātrāparo nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.014a: carudvayaṃ gṛhītvā tu rājan satyavatī tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.014c: bhartur vākyād athāvyagrā mātre hṛṣṭā nyavedayat
GE07mbh_12_u:049.015a: mātā tu tasyāḥ kaunteya duhitre svaṃ caruṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:049.015c: tasyāś carum athājñātam ātmasaṃsthaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:049.017a: tām ṛcīkas tadā dṛṣṭvā dhyānayogena vai tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.018c: janiṣyate hi te putraḥ krūrakarmā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.019a: janiṣyate hi te bhrātā brahmabhūtas tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.019c: viśvaṃ hi brahma tapasā mayā tatra samarpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.019d-0101_01: kṣatravīryaṃ ca sakalaṃ tava mātre samarpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.019d-0101_02: viparyayeṇa te bhadre naitad evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:049.019d-0101_03: mātus te brāhmaṇo bhūyāt tava ca kṣatriyaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.020a: saivam uktā mahābhāgā bhartrā satyavatī tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.020c: papāta śirasā tasmai vepantī cābravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.021a: nārho 'si bhagavann adya vaktum evaṃvidhaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.022a: naiṣa saṃkalpitaḥ kāmo mayā bhadre tathā tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:049.022c: ugrakarmā bhavet putraś carur mātā ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.023a: icchaṃl lokān api mune sṛjethāḥ kiṃ punar mama
GE07mbh_12_u:049.023c: śamātmakam ṛjuṃ putraṃ labheyaṃ japatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:049.024a: noktapūrvaṃ mayā bhadre svaireṣv apy anṛtaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.024d-0102_01: dṛṣṭam etat purā bhadre jñātaṃ ca tapasā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.024d-0102_02: brahmabhūtaṃ hi sakalaṃ pitus tava kulaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:049.025a: kāmam evaṃ bhavet pautro mameha tava caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:049.025c: śamātmakam ṛjuṃ putraṃ labheyaṃ japatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:049.026a: putre nāsti viśeṣo me pautre vā varavarṇini
GE07mbh_12_u:049.026c: yathā tvayoktaṃ tu vacas tathā bhadre bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:049.027a: tataḥ satyavatī putraṃ janayām āsa bhārgavam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.027d-0103_01: so 'pi putraṃ hy ajanayaj jāmadagnyaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.030a: etasminn eva kāle tu kṛtavīryātmajo balī
GE07mbh_12_u:049.033a: grāmān purāṇi ghoṣāṃś ca pattanāni ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:049.033c: jajvāla tasya bāṇais tu citrabhānur didhakṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.034c: dadāha kārtavīryasya śailān atha vanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:049.036a: āpavas taṃ tato roṣāc chaśāpārjunam acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:049.037a: tvayā na varjitaṃ mohād yasmād vanam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:049.037c: dagdhaṃ tasmād raṇe rāmo bāhūṃs te chetsyate 'rjuna
GE07mbh_12_u:049.038a: arjunas tu mahārāja balī nityaṃ śamātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.038c: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca dātā śūraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:049.038d-0107_01: nācintayat tadā śāpaṃ tena dattaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.039a: tasya putrāḥ subalinaḥ śāpenāsan pitur vadhe
GE07mbh_12_u:049.039c: nimittam avaliptā vai nṛśaṃsāś caiva nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.041a: tato 'rjunasya bāhūṃs tu chittvā vai pauruṣānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.041c: taṃ ruvantaṃ tato vatsaṃ jāmadagnyaḥ svam āśramam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.042a: arjunasya sutās te tu saṃbhūyābuddhayas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.043d-0109_02: śrutvā rāmas tam arthaṃ ca kruddhaḥ kālānalopamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.045c: vikramya nijaghānāśu putrān pautrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.047a: sa tathā sumahātejāḥ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:049.047c: kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo vanam eva jagāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:049.048c: kṣobhaṃ saṃprāptavāṃs tīvraṃ prakṛtyā kopanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.050a: ye te yayātipatane yajñe santaḥ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.050c: pratardanaprabhṛtayo rāma kiṃ kṣatriyā na te
GE07mbh_12_u:049.052c: parāvasos tadā śrutvā śastraṃ jagrāha bhārgavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.053a: tato ye kṣatriyā rājañ śataśas tena jīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.054a: sa punas tāñ jaghānāśu bālān api narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:049.054c: garbhasthais tu mahī vyāptā punar evābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.055a: jātaṃ jātaṃ sa garbhaṃ tu punar eva jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_12_u:049.055c: arakṣaṃś ca sutān kāṃś cit tadā kṣatriyayoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.058c: na te madviṣaye rāma vastavyam iha karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:049.058d-0110_01: pṛthivī dakṣiṇā dattā vājimedhe mama tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.058d-0110_02: punar asyāḥ pṛthivyā hi dattvā dātum anīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.059a: tataḥ śūrpārakaṃ deśaṃ sāgaras tasya nirmame
GE07mbh_12_u:049.060a: kaśyapas tu mahārāja pratigṛhya mahīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:049.061a: tataḥ śūdrāś ca vaiśyāś ca yathāsvairapracāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062c: bādhyante na ca vitteṣu prabhutvam iha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062d-0111_01: brāhmaṇā madyapāḥ ke cin mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062d-0111_04: svadharmaṃ brāhmaṇās tyaktvā pāṣaṇḍāṃś ca samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062d-0111_07: vaiśyāḥ satpathasaṃsthāś ca śūdrā ye caiva dhārmikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062d-0111_08: tān sarvān ghātayanti sma durācārāḥ sunirbhayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.062d-0111_11: ānvīkṣakī trayī vārtā na ca nītiḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:049.063d-0113_01: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dravatīṃ tatra saṃbhrāntaḥ sa mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.064a: ūruṇā dhārayām āsa kaśyapaḥ pṛthivīṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.064c: nimajjantīṃ tadā rājaṃs tenorvīti mahī smṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.065a: rakṣiṇaś ca samuddiśya prāyācat pṛthivī tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.066a: santi brahman mayā guptā nṛṣu kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.066c: haihayānāṃ kule jātās te saṃrakṣantu māṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:049.067c: ṛkṣaiḥ saṃvardhito vipra ṛkṣavaty eva parvate
GE07mbh_12_u:049.069a: sarvakarmāṇi kurute tasyarṣeḥ śūdravad dhi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.069c: sarvakarmety abhikhyātaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.070a: śibeḥ putro mahātejā gopatir nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.070c: vane saṃrakṣito gobhiḥ so 'bhirakṣatu māṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:049.071a: pratardanasya putras tu vatso nāma mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.071c: vatsaiḥ saṃvardhito goṣṭhe sa māṃ rakṣatu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.075c: samyaṅ mām abhirakṣantu tataḥ sthāsyāmi niścalā
GE07mbh_12_u:049.076a: eteṣāṃ pitaraś caiva tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.077a: teṣām apacitiś caiva mayā kāryā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.077c: na hy ahaṃ kāmaye nityam avikrāntena rakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:049.078a: tataḥ pṛthivyā nirdiṣṭāṃs tān samānīya kaśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.079a: teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yeṣāṃ vaṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:049.079c: evam etat purā vṛttaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:049.080a: evaṃ bruvann eva yadupravīro; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_12_u:049.080c: rathena tenāśu yayau yathārko; viśan prabhābhir bhagavāṃs trilokam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.001a: tato rāmasya tat karma śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.002c: vikramo yena vasudhā krodhān niḥkṣatriyā kṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:050.004a: aho dhanyo hi loko 'yaṃ sabhāgyāś ca narā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:050.004c: yatra karmedṛśaṃ dharmyaṃ dvijena kṛtam acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:050.005a: tathā yāntau tadā tāta tāv acyutayudhiṣṭhirau
GE07mbh_12_u:050.008a: dūrād eva tam ālokya kṛṣṇo rājā ca dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.008c: catvāraḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva te ca śāradvatādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.010a: abhivādya ca govindaḥ sātyakis te ca kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.010c: vyāsādīṃs tān ṛṣīn paścād gāṅgeyam upatasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:050.012c: kiṃ cid dīnamanā bhīṣmam iti hovāca keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.013a: kaccij jñānāni te rājan prasannāni yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:050.013c: kaccid avyākulā caiva buddhis te vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:050.014a: śarābhighātaduḥkhāt te kaccid gātraṃ na dūyate
GE07mbh_12_u:050.014c: mānasād api duḥkhād dhi śārīraṃ balavattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:050.015a: varadānāt pituḥ kāmaṃ chandamṛtyur asi prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:050.015c: śaṃtanor dharmaśīlasya na tv etac chamakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.016a: susūkṣmo 'pīha dehe vai śalyo janayate rujam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.016c: kiṃ punaḥ śarasaṃghātaiś citasya tava bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:050.017c: bhavān hy upadiśec chreyo devānām api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:050.018a: yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:050.018c: sarvaṃ taj jñānavṛddhasya tava pāṇāv ivāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.019a: saṃsāraś caiva bhūtānāṃ dharmasya ca phalodayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.019c: viditas te mahāprājña tvaṃ hi brahmamayo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.020a: tvāṃ hi rājye sthitaṃ sphīte samagrāṅgam arogiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.021a: ṛte śāṃtanavād bhīṣmāt triṣu lokeṣu pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:050.022c: nisargaprabhavaṃ kiṃ cin na ca tātānuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:050.023a: satye tapasi dāne ca yajñādhikaraṇe tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:050.023c: dhanurvede ca vede ca nityaṃ caivānvavekṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:050.024c: mahārathaṃ tvatsadṛśaṃ na kaṃ cid anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:050.026a: tvaṃ hi bhīṣma mahābāho vasūnāṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.027a: ahaṃ hi tvābhijānāmi yas tvaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:050.028a: manuṣyeṣu manuṣyendra na dṛṣṭo na ca me śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.028c: bhavato yo guṇais tulyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:050.029a: tvaṃ hi sarvair guṇai rājan devān apy atiricyase
GE07mbh_12_u:050.029c: tapasā hi bhavāñ śaktaḥ sraṣṭuṃ lokāṃś carācarān
GE07mbh_12_u:050.029d-0116_01: kiṃ punaś cātmano lokān uttamān uttamair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.030a: tad asya tapyamānasya jñātīnāṃ saṃkṣayeṇa vai
GE07mbh_12_u:050.031a: ye hi dharmāḥ samākhyātāś cāturvarṇyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:050.032a: cāturvedye ca ye proktāś cāturhotre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:050.032c: sāṃkhye yoge ca niyatā ye ca dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.033a: cāturvarṇyena yaś caiko dharmo na sma virudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:050.033c: sevyamānaḥ sa caivādyo gāṅgeya viditas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:050.033d-0117_03: vedokto yaś ca śiṣṭoktaḥ sa caiva viditas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:050.033d-0118_01: pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca sa cāpi viditas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:050.034c: dharmaśāstraṃ ca sakalaṃ nityaṃ manasi te sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:050.035a: ye ca ke cana loke 'sminn arthāḥ saṃśayakārakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:050.035c: teṣāṃ chettā nāsti loke tvad anyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:050.036a: sa pāṇḍaveyasya manaḥsamutthitaṃ; narendra śokaṃ vyapakarṣa medhayā
GE07mbh_12_u:050.036c: bhavadvidhā hy uttamabuddhivistarā; vimuhyamānasya janasya śāntaye
GE07mbh_12_u:051.001a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmo vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.001c: kiṃ cid unnāmya vadanaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:051.002a: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo lokānāṃ nidhanodbhava
GE07mbh_12_u:051.002c: tvaṃ hi kartā hṛṣīkeśa saṃhartā cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.004a: namas te triṣu lokeṣu namas te paratas triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:051.004c: yogeśvara namas te 'stu tvaṃ hi sarvaparāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:051.005a: matsaṃśritaṃ yad āttha tvaṃ vacaḥ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:051.005c: tena paśyāmi te divyān bhāvān hi triṣu vartmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:051.006a: tac ca paśyāmi tattvena yat te rūpaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:051.006c: sapta mārgā niruddhās te vāyor amitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.007a: divaṃ te śirasā vyāptaṃ padbhyāṃ devī vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_12_u:051.007c: diśo bhujau raviś cakṣur vīrye śakraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.008c: vapur hy anumimīmas te meghasyeva savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.009c: yac chreyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣa tad dhyāyasva surottama
GE07mbh_12_u:051.010a: yataḥ khalu parā bhaktir mayi te puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:051.010c: tato vapur mayā divyaṃ tava rājan pradarśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:051.011a: na hy abhaktāya rājendra bhaktāyānṛjave na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:051.011c: darśayāmy aham ātmānaṃ na cādāntāya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:051.012a: bhavāṃs tu mama bhaktaś ca nityaṃ cārjavam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.012c: dame tapasi satye ca dāne ca nirataḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.013a: arhas tvaṃ bhīṣma māṃ draṣṭuṃ tapasā svena pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:051.013c: tava hy upasthitā lokā yebhyo nāvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.014a: pañcāśataṃ ṣaṭ ca kurupravīra; śeṣaṃ dinānāṃ tava jīvitasya
GE07mbh_12_u:051.014c: tataḥ śubhaiḥ karmaphalodayais tvaṃ; sameṣyase bhīṣma vimucya deham
GE07mbh_12_u:051.015a: ete hi devā vasavo vimānāny; āsthāya sarve jvalitāgnikalpāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:051.015c: antarhitās tvāṃ pratipālayanti; kāṣṭhāṃ prapadyantam udak pataṃgam
GE07mbh_12_u:051.016a: vyāvṛttamātre bhagavaty udīcīṃ; sūrye diśaṃ kālavaśāt prapanne
GE07mbh_12_u:051.016c: gantāsi lokān puruṣapravīra; nāvartate yān upalabhya vidvān
GE07mbh_12_u:051.017a: amuṃ ca lokaṃ tvayi bhīṣma yāte; jñānāni naṅkṣyanty akhilena vīra
GE07mbh_12_u:051.017c: ataḥ sma sarve tvayi saṃnikarṣaṃ; samāgatā dharmavivecanāya
GE07mbh_12_u:052.001a: tataḥ kṛṣṇasya tad vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:052.003a: kiṃ cāham abhidhāsyāmi vākpate tava saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_12_u:052.003c: yadā vācogataṃ sarvaṃ tava vāci samāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:052.004a: yad dhi kiṃ cit kṛtaṃ loke kartavyaṃ kriyate ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:052.004c: tvattas tan niḥsṛtaṃ deva lokā buddhimayā hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:052.006c: gātrāṇi cāvasīdanti na ca buddhiḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:052.007a: na ca me pratibhā kā cid asti kiṃ cit prabhāṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:052.008a: balaṃ medhāḥ prajarati prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:052.008c: marmāṇi paritapyante bhrāntaṃ cetas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:052.009a: daurbalyāt sajjate vāṅ me sa kathaṃ vaktum utsahe
GE07mbh_12_u:052.010a: tat kṣamasva mahābāho na brūyāṃ kiṃ cid acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:052.010c: tvatsaṃnidhau ca sīdeta vācaspatir api bruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:052.011a: na diśaḥ saṃprajānāmi nākāśaṃ na ca medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:052.012a: svayam eva prabho tasmād dharmarājasya yad dhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:052.012c: tad bravīhy āśu sarveṣām āgamānāṃ tvam āgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.013a: kathaṃ tvayi sthite loke śāśvate lokakartari
GE07mbh_12_u:052.013c: prabrūyān madvidhaḥ kaś cid gurau śiṣya iva sthite
GE07mbh_12_u:052.015a: yac ca mām āttha gāṅgeya bāṇaghātarujaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:052.016a: na te glānir na te mūrchā na dāho na ca te rujā
GE07mbh_12_u:052.016c: prabhaviṣyanti gāṅgeya kṣutpipāse na cāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:052.017c: na ca te kva cid āsaktir buddheḥ prādurbhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:052.018a: sattvasthaṃ ca mano nityaṃ tava bhīṣma bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:052.018c: rajas tamobhyāṃ rahitaṃ ghanair mukta ivoḍurāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.019a: yad yac ca dharmasaṃyuktam arthayuktam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:052.021c: bhīṣma drakṣyasi tattvena jale mīna ivāmale
GE07mbh_12_u:052.022a: tatas te vyāsasahitāḥ sarva eva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.024a: vāditrāṇi ca divyāni jaguś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.024c: na cāhitam aniṣṭaṃ vā kiṃ cit tatra vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_12_u:052.025a: vavau śivaḥ sukho vāyuḥ sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.025c: śāntāyāṃ diśi śāntāś ca prāvadan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.027c: bhīṣmam āmantrayāṃ cakrū rājānaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_12_u:052.028a: tataḥ praṇāmam akarot keśavaḥ pāṇḍavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:052.028c: sātyakiḥ saṃjayaś caiva sa ca śāradvataḥ kṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.029a: tatas te dharmaniratāḥ samyak tair abhipūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.029c: śvaḥ sameṣyāma ity uktvā yatheṣṭaṃ tvaritā yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.030a: tathaivāmantrya gāṅgeyaṃ keśavas te ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.031a: tato rathaiḥ kāñcanadantakūbarair; mahīdharābhaiḥ samadaiś ca dantibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.031c: hayaiḥ suparṇair iva cāśugāmibhiḥ; padātibhiś cāttaśarāsanādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:052.032a: yayau rathānāṃ purato hi sā camūs; tathaiva paścād atimātrasāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:052.032c: puraś ca paścāc ca yathā mahānadī; purarkṣavantaṃ girim etya narmadā
GE07mbh_12_u:052.033a: tataḥ purastād bhagavān niśākaraḥ; samutthitas tām abhiharṣayaṃś camūm
GE07mbh_12_u:052.033c: divākarāpītarasās tathauṣadhīḥ; punaḥ svakenaiva guṇena yojayan
GE07mbh_12_u:052.034a: tataḥ puraṃ surapurasaṃnibhadyuti; praviśya te yaduvṛṣapāṇḍavās tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:052.034c: yathocitān bhavanavarān samāviśañ; śramānvitā mṛgapatayo guhā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:053.002c: avalokya tataḥ paścād dadhyau brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:053.005c: prahāsa iva vistīrṇaḥ śuśruve tasya veśmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.007a: tata utthāya dāśārhaḥ snātaḥ prāñjalir acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.007c: japtvā guhyaṃ mahābāhur agnīn āśritya tasthivān
GE07mbh_12_u:053.009c: ādarśe vimale kṛṣṇas tataḥ sātyakim abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:053.010c: api sajjo mahātejā bhīṣmaṃ draṣṭuṃ yuthiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.011a: tataḥ kṛṣṇasya vacanāt sātyakis tvarito yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:053.011c: upagamya ca rājānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:053.013c: yad atrānantaraṃ kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān kartum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:053.014c: na sainikaiś ca yātavyaṃ yāsyāmo vayam eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:053.015a: na ca pīḍayitavyo me bhīṣmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.017a: tad vākyam ākarṇya tathā kuntīputro dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.018a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā yamau bhīmārjunāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:053.020a: rathasthāḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā sukhāṃ pṛṣṭvā ca śarvarīm
GE07mbh_12_u:053.021a: meghapuṣpaṃ balāhaṃ ca sainyaṃ sugrīvam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:053.022c: gāṃ khurāgrais tathā rājaṃl likhantaḥ prayayus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:053.024a: tato yayur yatra bhīṣmaḥ śaratalpagataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.024c: āste brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmā devagaṇair yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:053.025a: tato 'vatīrya govindo rathāt sa ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.025c: bhīmo gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca yamau sātyakir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:053.025e: ṛṣīn abhyarcayām āsuḥ karān udyamya dakṣiṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:053.026a: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:053.027a: śaratalpe śayānaṃ tam ādityaṃ patitaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.003c: hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu tan me śaṃsa mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:054.005c: dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kṛṣṇaś ca bhīmārjunayamās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.007a: muhūrtam iva ca dhyātvā nārado devadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.007c: uvāca pāṇḍavān sarvān hataśiṣṭāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_12_u:054.008c: astam eti hi gāṅgeyo bhānumān iva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:054.009a: ayaṃ prāṇān utsisṛkṣus taṃ sarve 'bhyetya pṛcchata
GE07mbh_12_u:054.009c: kṛtsnān hi vividhān dharmāṃś cāturvarṇyasya vetty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:054.010a: eṣa vṛddhaḥ purā lokān saṃprāpnoti tanutyajām
GE07mbh_12_u:054.010c: taṃ śīghram anuyuñjadhvaṃ saṃśayān manasi sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:054.011a: evam uktā nāradena bhīṣmam īyur narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.011c: praṣṭuṃ cāśaknuvantas te vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:054.012c: nānyas tvad devakīputra śaktaḥ praṣṭuṃ pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:054.013c: tvaṃ hi nas tāta sarveṣāṃ sarvadharmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.014a: evam uktaḥ pāṇḍavena bhagavān keśavas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.015a: kaccit sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā te rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:054.016a: kaccij jñānāni sarvāṇi pratibhānti ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:054.016c: na glāyate ca hṛdayaṃ na ca te vyākulaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.017a: dāho mohaḥ śramaś caiva klamo glānis tathā rujā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.018a: yac ca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca paramadyute
GE07mbh_12_u:054.018c: tat sarvam anupaśyāmi pāṇau phalam ivāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:054.019a: vedoktāś caiva ye dharmā vedāntanihitāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:054.020a: śiṣṭaiś ca dharmo yaḥ proktaḥ sa ca me hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:054.021a: caturṣv āśramadharmeṣu yo 'rthaḥ sa ca hṛdi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.021d-0120_01: sarvadharmeṣu yo hy arthaḥ sa ca me hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.022a: yatra yatra ca vaktavyaṃ tad vakṣyāmi janārdana
GE07mbh_12_u:054.022c: tava prasādād dhi śubhā mano me buddhir āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:054.024a: svayaṃ kimarthaṃ tu bhavāñ śreyo na prāha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_12_u:054.024c: kiṃ te vivakṣitaṃ cātra tad āśu vada mādhava
GE07mbh_12_u:054.025a: yaśasaḥ śreyasaś caiva mūlaṃ māṃ viddhi kaurava
GE07mbh_12_u:054.026a: śītāṃśuś candra ity ukte ko loke vismayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:054.026c: tathaiva yaśasā pūrṇe mayi ko vismayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:054.027a: ādheyaṃ tu mayā bhūyo yaśas tava mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:054.027c: tato me vipulā buddhis tvayi bhīṣma samāhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.028a: yāvad dhi pṛthivīpāla pṛthivī sthāsyate dhruvā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.028c: tāvat tavākṣayā kīrtir lokān anu cariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:054.029a: yac ca tvaṃ vakṣyase bhīṣma pāṇḍavāyānupṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:054.030a: yaś caitena pramāṇena yokṣyaty ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:054.031a: etasmāt kāraṇād bhīṣma matir divyā mayā hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:054.031c: dattā yaśo vipratheta kathaṃ bhūyas taveti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:054.032a: yāvad dhi prathate loke puruṣasya yaśo bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:054.033a: rājāno hataśiṣṭās tvāṃ rājann abhita āsate
GE07mbh_12_u:054.034c: kuśalo rājadharmāṇāṃ pūrveṣām aparāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:054.035a: janmaprabhṛti te kaś cid vṛjinaṃ na dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:054.036a: tebhyaḥ piteva putrebhyo rājan brūhi paraṃ nayam
GE07mbh_12_u:054.036c: ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca tvayā nityam upāsitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.037a: tasmād vaktavyam eveha tvayā paśyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.037c: dharmāñ śuśrūṣamāṇebhyaḥ pṛṣṭena ca satā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.038a: vaktavyaṃ viduṣā ceti dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:054.038c: apratibruvataḥ kaṣṭo doṣo hi bhavati prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:054.039a: tasmāt putraiś ca pautraiś ca dharmān pṛṣṭaḥ sanātanān
GE07mbh_12_u:055.001c: hanta dharmān pravakṣyāmi dṛḍhe vāṅmanasī mama
