GE07mbh_12_u:055.001e: tava prasādād govinda bhūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.002a: yudhiṣṭhiras tu māṃ rājā dharmān samanupṛcchatu
GE07mbh_12_u:055.002c: evaṃ prīto bhaviṣyāmi dharmān vakṣyāmi cānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:055.003c: ahṛṣyann ṛṣayaḥ sarve sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.004c: yasya nāsti samaḥ kaś cit sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.005a: dhṛtir damo brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā dharmaś ca nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:055.005c: yasminn ojaś ca tejaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.006a: satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ śāntir dākṣyam asaṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.006c: yasminn etāni sarvāṇi sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.007a: yo na kāmān na saṃrambhān na bhayān nārthakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:055.007c: kuryād adharmaṃ dharmātmā sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.008c: saṃmānayati satkṛtya sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.009c: yo dadāti satāṃ nityaṃ sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.010a: ijyādhyayananityaś ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:055.010c: śāntaḥ śrutarahasyaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.012a: lokasya kadanaṃ kṛtvā lokanātho viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:055.013a: pūjyān mānyāṃś ca bhaktāṃś ca gurūn saṃbandhibāndhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:055.014a: brāhmaṇānāṃ yathā dharmo dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.015c: mithyāpravṛttān yaḥ saṃkhye nihanyād dharma eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.016a: samayatyāgino lubdhān gurūn api ca keśava
GE07mbh_12_u:055.016c: nihanti samare pāpān kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:055.016d-0121_01: yo lobhān na samīkṣeta dharmasetuṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:055.016d-0121_02: nihanti yas taṃ samare kṣatriyo vai sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:055.016d-0121_04: mahīṃ karoti yuddheṣu kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:055.017c: dharmyaṃ svargyaṃ ca lokyaṃ ca yuddhaṃ hi manur abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:055.018a: evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:055.019a: athāsya pādau jagrāha bhīṣmaś cābhinananda tam
GE07mbh_12_u:055.019c: mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya niṣīdety abravīt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:055.020c: pṛccha māṃ tāta visrabdhaṃ mā bhais tvaṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_12_u:056.002a: rājyaṃ vai paramo dharma iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.002c: mahāntam etaṃ bhāraṃ ca manye tad brūhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:056.006a: atra vai saṃpramūḍhe tu dharme rājarṣisevite
GE07mbh_12_u:056.006c: lokasya saṃsthā na bhavet sarvaṃ ca vyākulaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:056.007a: udayan hi yathā sūryo nāśayaty āsuraṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.008c: prabrūhi bharataśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.009a: āgamaś ca paras tvattaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:056.010a: namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
GE07mbh_12_u:056.011a: śṛṇu kārtsnyena mattas tvaṃ rājadharmān yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:056.013a: daivatāny arcayitvā hi brāhmaṇāṃś ca kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:056.013c: ānṛṇyaṃ yāti dharmasya lokena ca sa mānyate
GE07mbh_12_u:056.014a: utthāne ca sadā putra prayatethā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:056.014c: na hy utthānam ṛte daivaṃ rājñām arthaprasiddhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:056.015a: sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ hy etad daivam utthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:056.015c: pauruṣaṃ hi paraṃ manye daivaṃ niścityam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:056.016a: vipanne ca samārambhe saṃtāpaṃ mā sma vai kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.016c: ghaṭate vinayas tāta rājñām eṣa nayaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.017a: na hi satyād ṛte kiṃ cid rājñāṃ vai siddhikāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.017c: satye hi rājā nirataḥ pretya ceha ca nandati
GE07mbh_12_u:056.018a: ṛṣīṇām api rājendra satyam eva paraṃ dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.018c: tathā rājñaḥ paraṃ satyān nānyad viśvāsakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.019a: guṇavāñ śīlavān dānto mṛdur dharmyo jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.019c: sudarśaḥ sthūlalakṣyaś ca na bhraśyeta sadā śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.021a: mṛdur hi rājā satataṃ laṅghyo bhavati sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.021c: tīkṣṇāc codvijate lokas tasmād ubhayam ācara
GE07mbh_12_u:056.022a: adaṇḍyāś caiva te nityaṃ viprāḥ syur dadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:056.022c: bhūtam etat paraṃ loke brāhmaṇā nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:056.023a: manunā cāpi rājendra gītau ślokau mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:056.023c: dharmeṣu sveṣu kauravya hṛdi tau kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:056.024a: adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.024c: teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:056.025c: brahma ca kṣatriyo dveṣṭi tadā sīdanti te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.026a: etaj jñātvā mahārāja namasyā eva te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.027c: nigrāhyā eva satataṃ bāhubhyāṃ ye syur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.028a: ślokau cośanasā gītau purā tāta maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:056.028c: tau nibodha mahāprājña tvam ekāgramanā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:056.029a: udyamya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:056.030a: vinaśyamānaṃ dharmaṃ hi yo rakṣati sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:056.030c: na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manum ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:056.031a: evaṃ caiva naraśreṣṭha rakṣyā eva dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.031c: svaparāddhān api hi tān viṣayānte samutsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:056.032a: abhiśastam api hy eṣāṃ kṛpāyīta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:056.032c: brahmaghne gurutalpe ca bhrūṇahatye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:056.033c: vidhīyate na śārīraṃ bhayam eṣāṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:056.034a: dayitāś ca narās te syur nityaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:056.034c: na kośaḥ paramo hy anyo rājñāṃ puruṣasaṃcayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:056.035a: durgeṣu ca mahārāja ṣaṭsu ye śāstraniścitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.036a: tasmān nityaṃ dayā kāryā cāturvarṇye vipaścitā
GE07mbh_12_u:056.036c: dharmātmā satyavāk caiva rājā rañjayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.037a: na ca kṣāntena te bhāvyaṃ nityaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:056.037c: adharmyo hi mṛdū rājā kṣamāvān iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.038a: bārhaspatye ca śāstre vai ślokā viniyatāḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:056.038c: asminn arthe mahārāja tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:056.039a: kṣamamāṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nityaṃ nīcaḥ paribhavej janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.040a: tasmān naiva mṛdur nityaṃ tīkṣṇo vāpi bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.040c: vasante 'rka iva śrīmān na śīto na ca gharmadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.041c: parīkṣyās te mahārāja sve pare caiva sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:056.042c: na caiva na prayuñjīta saṅgaṃ tu parivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:056.043a: nityaṃ hi vyasanī loke paribhūto bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:056.044c: kāraṇaṃ ca mahārāja śṛṇu yenedam iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:056.045a: yathā hi garbhiṇī hitvā svaṃ priyaṃ manaso 'nugam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.045c: garbhasya hitam ādhatte tathā rājñāpy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.046c: svaṃ priyaṃ samabhityajya yad yal lokahitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:056.047a: na saṃtyājyaṃ ca te dhairyaṃ kadā cid api pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:056.047c: dhīrasya spaṣṭadaṇḍasya na hy ājñā pratihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:056.048a: parihāsaś ca bhṛtyais te na nityaṃ vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:056.048c: kartavyo rājaśārdūla doṣam atra hi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:056.049c: sve sthāne na ca tiṣṭhanti laṅghayanti hi tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.051c: utkocair vañcanābhiś ca kāryāṇy anuvihanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:056.052c: strīr akṣibhiś ca sajjante tulyaveṣā bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:056.053a: vātaṃ ca ṣṭhīvanaṃ caiva kurvate cāsya saṃnidhau
GE07mbh_12_u:056.054a: hayaṃ vā dantinaṃ vāpi rathaṃ nṛpatisaṃmatam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.055a: idaṃ te duṣkaraṃ rājann idaṃ te durviceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.055c: ity evaṃ suhṛdo nāma bruvanti pariṣadgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.056a: kruddhe cāsmin hasanty eva na ca hṛṣyanti pūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:056.057a: visraṃsayanti mantraṃ ca vivṛṇvanti ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.057c: līlayā caiva kurvanti sāvajñās tasya śāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:056.058c: nindanti svān adhīkārān saṃtyajanti ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:056.059a: na vṛttyā parituṣyanti rājadeyaṃ haranti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:056.059e: asmatpraṇeyo rājeti loke caiva vadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:056.060a: ete caivāpare caiva doṣāḥ prādurbhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:057.002a: bhagavān uśanā cāha ślokam atra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:057.002c: tam ihaikamanā rājan gadatas tvaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:057.003a: dvāv etau grasate bhūmiḥ sarpo bilaśayān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:057.004a: tad etan naraśārdūla hṛdi tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:057.004c: saṃdheyān api saṃdhatsva virodhyāṃś ca virodhaya
GE07mbh_12_u:057.005a: saptāṅge yaś ca te rājye vaiparītyaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:057.005c: gurur vā yadi vā mitraṃ pratihantavya eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.006a: maruttena hi rājñāyaṃ gītaḥ ślokaḥ purātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.008a: bāhoḥ putreṇa rājñā ca sagareṇeha dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:057.009a: asamañjāḥ sarayvāṃ prāk paurāṇāṃ bālakān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:057.009c: nyamajjayad ataḥ pitrā nirbhartsya sa vivāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.010c: mithyā viprān upacaran saṃtyakto dayitaḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.012a: na hiṃsyāt paravittāni deyaṃ kāle ca dāpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:057.012c: vikrāntaḥ satyavāk kṣānto nṛpo na calate pathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.013c: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca satataṃ rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.014a: trayyā saṃvṛtarandhraś ca rājā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:057.016a: na viśvasec ca nṛpatir na cātyarthaṃ na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:057.020c: satāṃ vṛtte sthitamatiḥ santo hy ācāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.021a: na cādadīta vittāni satāṃ hastāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:057.022c: kāle dātā ca bhoktā ca śuddhācāras tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:057.023a: śūrān bhaktān asaṃhāryān kule jātān arogiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.024c: dharmeṣu niratān sādhūn acalān acalān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:057.025c: tais tulyaś ca bhaved bhogaiś chatramātrājñayādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.026a: pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca vṛttiś cāsya bhavet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:057.026c: evaṃ kṛtvā narendro hi na khedam iha vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:057.027a: sarvātiśaṅkī nṛpatir yaś ca sarvaharo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:057.027c: sa kṣipram anṛjur lubdhaḥ svajanenaiva bādhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:057.028c: na pataty aribhir grastaḥ patitaś cāvatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_12_u:057.029c: rājā bhavati bhūtānāṃ viśvāsyo himavān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:057.032a: ārabdhāny eva kāryāṇi na paryavasitāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:057.032c: yasya rājñaḥ pradṛśyante sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.033a: putrā iva pitur gehe viṣaye yasya mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.036a: vaśyā neyā vinītāś ca na ca saṃgharṣaśīlinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.036c: viṣaye dānarucayo narā yasya sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.037a: na yasya kūṭakapaṭaṃ na māyā na ca matsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.038a: yaḥ satkaroti jñānāni neyaḥ paurahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.038c: satāṃ dharmānugas tyāgī sa rājā rājyam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:057.039a: yasya cāraś ca mantraś ca nityaṃ caiva kṛtākṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:057.039c: na jñāyate hi ripubhiḥ sa rājā rājyam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:057.040a: ślokaś cāyaṃ purā gīto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:057.041a: rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:057.041c: rājany asati lokasya kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:057.042a: tad rājan rājasiṃhānāṃ nānyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:057.042c: ṛte rakṣāṃ suvispaṣṭāṃ rakṣā lokasya dhāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:057.044a: ṣaḍ etān puruṣo jahyād bhinnāṃ nāvam ivārṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:057.045c: grāmakāmaṃ ca gopālaṃ vanakāmaṃ ca nāpitam śrīvaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.001c: bṛhaspatir hi bhagavān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsati
GE07mbh_12_u:058.002a: viśālākṣaś ca bhagavān kāvyaś caiva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.002c: sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca tathā prācetaso manuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.003a: bharadvājaś ca bhagavāṃs tathā gauraśirā muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.004a: rakṣām eva praśaṃsanti dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:058.004c: rājñāṃ rājīvatāmrākṣa sādhanaṃ cātra vai śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:058.005a: cāraś ca praṇidhiś caiva kāle dānam amatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.006a: satāṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ satyaṃ prajāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:058.007c: nicayaś ca niceyānāṃ sevā buddhimatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:058.008c: kāryeṣv akhedaḥ kośasya tathaiva ca vivardhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:058.009c: ketanānāṃ ca jīrṇānām avekṣā caiva sīdatām
GE07mbh_12_u:058.013c: rājadharmasya yan mūlaṃ ślokāṃś cātra nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:058.014c: utthānena mahendreṇa śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ divīha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:058.016a: utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.016c: dharṣaṇīyo ripūṇāṃ syād bhujaṃga iva nirviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.017a: na ca śatrur avajñeyo durbalo 'pi balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:058.017c: alpo 'pi hi dahaty agnir viṣam alpaṃ hinasti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:058.018c: taṃ taṃ tāpayate deśam api rājñaḥ samṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.019a: rājño rahasyaṃ yad vākyaṃ jayārthaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.019c: hṛdi yac cāsya jihmaṃ syāt kāraṇārthaṃ ca yad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:058.020a: yac cāsya kāryaṃ vṛjinam ārjavenaiva dhāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:058.021a: rājyaṃ hi sumahat tantraṃ durdhāryam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.021c: na śakyaṃ mṛdunā voḍhum āghātasthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:058.023a: yady apy asya vipattiḥ syād rakṣamāṇasya vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.023c: so 'py asya vipulo dharma evaṃvṛttā hi bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.024c: bhūyas te yatra saṃdehas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:058.025a: tato vyāsaś ca bhagavān devasthāno 'śmanā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:058.025c: vāsudevaḥ kṛpaś caiva sātyakiḥ saṃjayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:058.026a: sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ puṣyamāṇair ivānanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.026c: astuvaṃs te naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:058.027c: netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ pādau tasya śanaiḥ spṛśan
GE07mbh_12_u:058.028a: śva idānīṃ svasaṃdehaṃ prakṣyāmi tvaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:058.028c: upaiti savitāpy astaṃ rasam āpīya pārthivam
GE07mbh_12_u:058.029a: tato dvijātīn abhivādya keśavaḥ; kṛpaś ca te caiva yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.029c: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahānadīsutaṃ; tato rathān āruruhur mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.030a: dṛṣadvatīṃ cāpy avagāhya suvratāḥ; kṛtodakāryāḥ kṛtajapyamaṅgalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:058.030c: upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat paraṃtapās; tataḥ puraṃ te viviśur gajāhvayam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.002a: prapadya ca kurukṣetraṃ bhīṣmam āsādya cānagham
GE07mbh_12_u:059.002c: sukhāṃ ca rajanīṃ pṛṣṭvā gāṅgeyaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.005a: ya eṣa rājā-rājeti śabdaś carati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:059.005c: katham eṣa samutpannas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.009c: rakṣaty api ca loko 'sya prasādam abhivāñchati
GE07mbh_12_u:059.010a: ekasya ca prasādena kṛtsno lokaḥ prasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:059.011a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.011c: śrotuṃ tan me yathātattvaṃ prabrūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:059.012a: naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.012c: yad ekasmiñ jagat sarvaṃ devavad yāti saṃnatim
GE07mbh_12_u:059.013a: niyatas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.014a: naiva rājyaṃ na rājāsīn na daṇḍo na ca dāṇḍikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.014c: dharmeṇaiva prajāḥ sarvā rakṣanti ca parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.015c: khedaṃ paramam ājagmus tatas tān moha āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.017a: naṣṭāyāṃ pratipattau tu mohavaśyā narās tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.018c: kāmo nāmāparas tatra samapadyata vai prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:059.019a: tāṃs tu kāmavaśaṃ prāptān rāgo nāma samaspṛśat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.020c: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ ca rājendra doṣādoṣaṃ ca nātyajan
GE07mbh_12_u:059.021a: viplute naraloke 'smiṃs tato brahma nanāśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.021c: nāśāc ca brahmaṇo rājan dharmo nāśam athāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.022a: naṣṭe brahmaṇi dharme ca devās trāsam athāgaman
GE07mbh_12_u:059.022c: te trastā naraśārdūla brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.024c: lobhamohādibhir bhāvais tato no bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.025a: brahmaṇaś ca praṇāśena dharmo 'py anaśad īśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:059.025c: tataḥ sma samatāṃ yātā martyais tribhuvaneśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:059.026a: adho hi varṣam asmākaṃ martyās tūrdhvapravarṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.027a: atra niḥśreyasaṃ yan nas tad dhyāyasva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.028a: tān uvāca surān sarvān svayaṃbhūr bhagavāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.028c: śreyo 'haṃ cintayiṣyāmi vyetu vo bhīḥ surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.030a: trivarga iti vikhyāto gaṇa eṣa svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.030c: caturtho mokṣa ity eva pṛthagarthaḥ pṛthaggaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.031a: mokṣasyāpi trivargo 'nyaḥ proktaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.031c: sthānaṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayaś caiva trivargaś caiva daṇḍajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.032a: ātmā deśaś ca kālaś cāpy upāyāḥ kṛtyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.032c: sahāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva ṣaḍvargo nītijaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.033a: trayī cānvīkṣikī caiva vārtā ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.033c: daṇḍanītiś ca vipulā vidyās tatra nidarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.034c: cāraś ca vividhopāyaḥ praṇidhiś ca pṛthagvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.035a: sāma copapradānaṃ ca bhedo daṇḍaś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:059.036a: mantraś ca varṇitaḥ kṛtsnas tathā bhedārtha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.036c: vibhraṃśaś caiva mantrasya siddhyasiddhyoś ca yat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.037a: saṃdhiś ca vividhābhikhyo hīno madhyas tathottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.038a: yātrākālāś ca catvāras trivargasya ca vistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.038c: vijayo dharmayuktaś ca tathārthavijayaś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.039a: āsuraś caiva vijayas tathā kārtsnyena varṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.041a: rathā nāgā hayāś caiva pādātāś caiva pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:059.041c: viṣṭir nāvaś carāś caiva deśikāḥ pathi cāṣṭakam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.042a: aṅgāny etāni kauravya prakāśāni balasya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:059.043a: sparśe cābhyavahārye cāpy upāṃśur vividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.043b-0126_02: uktaṃ kaitavyam ity etad upāyo navamo budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.043c: arir mitram udāsīna ity ete 'py anuvarṇitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.044a: kṛtsnā mārgaguṇāś caiva tathā bhūmiguṇāś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.046a: utpātāś ca nipātāś ca suyuddhaṃ supalāyanam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.048a: tathā khātavidhānaṃ ca yogasaṃcāra eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.053c: śamo vyāyāmayogaś ca yogo dravyasya saṃcayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.055a: tathā rājaguṇāś caiva senāpatiguṇāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:059.055c: kāraṇasya ca kartuś ca guṇadoṣās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.056c: śaṅkitatvaṃ ca sarvasya pramādasya ca varjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.057c: pradānaṃ ca vivṛddhasya pātrebhyo vidhivat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.059c: daśoktāni kuruśreṣṭha vyasanāny atra caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.060a: mṛgayākṣās tathā pānaṃ striyaś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.062a: yantrāṇi vividhāny eva kriyās teṣāṃ ca varṇitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.064c: upārjanaṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ paramarma ca tāni ṣaṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.065a: labdhasya ca praśamanaṃ satāṃ caiva hi pūjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.066c: āhārayojanaṃ caiva nityam āstikyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.067a: ekena ca yathottheyaṃ satyatvaṃ madhurā giraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.068a: pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca sarvādhikaraṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.070c: maṇḍalasthā ca yā cintā rājan dvādaśarājikā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.071a: dvāsaptatimatiś caiva proktā yā ca svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.072a: dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca mokṣaś cātrānuvarṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.073a: mūlakarmakriyā cātra māyā yogaś ca varṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.073c: dūṣaṇaṃ srotasām atra varṇitaṃ ca sthirāmbhasām
GE07mbh_12_u:059.074a: yair yair upāyair lokaś ca na caled āryavartmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.075a: etat kṛtvā śubhaṃ śāstraṃ tataḥ sa bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.078a: daṇḍena nīyate ceyaṃ daṇḍaṃ nayati cāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:059.078c: daṇḍanītir iti proktā trīṃl lokān anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.080a: nayacāraś ca vipulo yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.080c: āgamaś ca purāṇānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.081a: tīrthavaṃśaś ca vaṃśaś ca nakṣatrāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:059.082c: itihāsopavedāś ca nyāyaḥ kṛtsnaś ca varṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.083a: tapo jñānam ahiṃsā ca satyāsatye nayaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.083c: vṛddhopasevā dānaṃ ca śaucam utthānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.084c: bhuvi vācogataṃ yac ca tac ca sarvaṃ samarpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.085c: dharmārthakāmamokṣāś ca sakalā hy atra śabditāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086a: tatas tāṃ bhagavān nītiṃ pūrvaṃ jagrāha śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086d-0127_02: jñānāni ca vaśe yasya tārakādīny aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086d-0127_04: tuṣṭyarthaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putro lalāṭād utthitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086d-0127_05: arudat sasvanaṃ ghoraṃ jagataḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086d-0127_06: jāyamānaḥ pitā putre putraḥ pitari caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:059.086d-0127_07: buddhiṃ viśvasṛje dattvā brahmāṇḍaṃ yena nirmitam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.087a: yugānām āyuṣo hrāsaṃ vijñāya bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.087c: saṃcikṣepa tataḥ śāstraṃ mahārthaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.088a: vaiśālākṣam iti proktaṃ tad indraḥ pratyapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:059.089a: bhagavān api tac chāstraṃ saṃcikṣepa puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.089c: sahasraiḥ pañcabhis tāta yad uktaṃ bāhudantakam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.090a: adhyāyānāṃ sahasrais tu tribhir eva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.092c: saṃkṣiptam āyur vijñāya martyānāṃ hrāsi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:059.093a: atha devāḥ samāgamya viṣṇum ūcuḥ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:059.093c: eko yo 'rhati martyebhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ taṃ vai samādiśa
GE07mbh_12_u:059.094a: tataḥ saṃcintya bhagavān devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.094c: taijasaṃ vai virajasaṃ so 'sṛjan mānasaṃ sutam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.095a: virajās tu mahābhāga vibhutvaṃ bhuvi naicchata
GE07mbh_12_u:059.096c: kardamas tasya ca sutaḥ so 'py atapyan mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.097a: prajāpateḥ kardamasya anaṅgo nāma vai sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.098d-0129_02: saubhāgyena ca saṃpannāṃ guṇaiś cānuttamāṃ satīm
GE07mbh_12_u:059.099a: mṛtyos tu duhitā rājan sunīthā nāma mānasī
GE07mbh_12_u:059.099c: prakhyātā triṣu lokeṣu yā sā venam ajījanat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.101a: mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ corum ṛṣayas tasya mantrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.101c: tato 'sya vikṛto jajñe hrasvāṅgaḥ puruṣo bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:059.102c: niṣīdety evam ūcus tam ṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.104a: bhūyo 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthus te maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.106a: taṃ daṇḍanītiḥ sakalā śritā rājan narottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.106c: tataḥ sa prāñjalir vainyo maharṣīṃs tān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.107c: anayā kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ tan me tattvena śaṃsata
GE07mbh_12_u:059.108a: yan māṃ bhavanto vakṣyanti kāryam arthasamanvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.108c: tad ahaṃ vai kariṣyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.109a: tam ūcur atha devās te te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.109c: niyato yatra dharmo vai tam aśaṅkaḥ samācara
GE07mbh_12_u:059.110c: kāmakrodhau ca lobhaṃ ca mānaṃ cotsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.111a: yaś ca dharmāt pravicalel loke kaś cana mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.111c: nigrāhyas te sa bāhubhyāṃ śaśvad dharmam avekṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.112c: pālayiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhaumaṃ brahma ity eva cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:059.113c: tam aśaṅkaḥ kariṣyāmi svavaśo na kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:059.114a: adaṇḍyā me dvijāś ceti pratijānīṣva cābhibho
GE07mbh_12_u:059.114c: lokaṃ ca saṃkarāt kṛtsnāt trātāsmīti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:059.115a: vainyas tatas tān uvāca devān ṛṣipurogamān
GE07mbh_12_u:059.115c: brāhmaṇā me sahāyāś ced evam astu surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.116a: evam astv iti vainyas tu tair ukto brahmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.116c: purodhāś cābhavat tasya śukro brahmamayo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.117a: mantriṇo vālakhilyās tu sārasvatyo gaṇo hy abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:059.118a: ātmanāṣṭama ity eva śrutir eṣā parā nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:059.118d-0130_01: tayoḥ prīto dadau rājā pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:059.119a: samatāṃ vasudhāyāś ca sa samyag upapādayat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.119c: vaiṣamyaṃ hi paraṃ bhūmer āsīd iti ha naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.120a: sa viṣṇunā ca devena śakreṇa vibudhaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:059.121a: taṃ sākṣāt pṛthivī bheje ratnāny ādāya pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:059.122a: śakraś ca dhanam akṣayyaṃ prādāt tasya yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:059.123c: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca samarthaṃ pradadau dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.124a: hayā rathāś ca nāgāś ca koṭiśaḥ puruṣās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.124e: na jarā na ca durbhikṣaṃ nādhayo vyādhayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.125a: sarīsṛpebhyaḥ stenebhyo na cānyonyāt kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:059.125d-0133_02: parvatāś ca dadur mārgaṃ dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:059.126a: teneyaṃ pṛthivī dugdhā sasyāni daśa sapta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:059.127a: tena dharmottaraś cāyaṃ kṛto loko mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.127c: rañjitāś ca prajāḥ sarvās tena rājeti śabdyate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.128c: prathitā dhanataś ceyaṃ pṛthivī sādhubhiḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.129a: sthāpanaṃ cākarod viṣṇuḥ svayam eva sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.129c: nātivartiṣyate kaś cid rājaṃs tvām iti pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:059.130a: tapasā bhagavān viṣṇur āviveśa ca bhūmipam
GE07mbh_12_u:059.130c: devavan naradevānāṃ namate yaj jagan nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:059.131a: daṇḍanītyā ca satataṃ rakṣitaṃ taṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:059.131c: nādharṣayat tataḥ kaś cic cāranityāc ca darśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:059.132c: ko hetur yad vaśe tiṣṭhel loko daivād ṛte guṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:059.133a: viṣṇor lalāṭāt kamalaṃ sauvarṇam abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.133c: śrīḥ saṃbhūtā yato devī patnī dharmasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.134a: śriyaḥ sakāśād arthaś ca jāto dharmeṇa pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:059.134c: atha dharmas tathaivārthaḥ śrīś ca rājye pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:059.135a: sukṛtasya kṣayāc caiva svarlokād etya medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:059.136a: mahattvena ca saṃyukto vaiṣṇavena naro bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:059.137a: sthāpanām atha devānāṃ na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.137c: tiṣṭhaty ekasya ca vaśe taṃ ced anuvidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.139a: yo hy asya mukham adrākṣīt somya so 'sya vaśānugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.139c: subhagaṃ cārthavantaṃ ca rūpavantaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:059.140a: tato jagati rājendra satataṃ śabditaṃ budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:059.140c: devāś ca naradevāś ca tulyā iti viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:059.141a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mahattvaṃ prati rājasu
GE07mbh_12_u:059.141c: kārtsnyena bharataśreṣṭha kim anyad iha vartatām
GE07mbh_12_u:060.001a: tataḥ punaḥ sa gāṅgeyam abhivādya pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:060.002a: ke dharmāḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ cāturvarṇyasya ke pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:060.002c: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca rājadharmāś ca ke matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.003a: kena svid vardhate rāṣṭraṃ rājā kena vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:060.003c: kena paurāś ca bhṛtyāś ca vardhante bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:060.004a: kośaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca durgaṃ ca sahāyān mantriṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:060.005a: keṣu viśvasitavyaṃ syād rājñāṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_12_u:060.005c: kuto vātmā dṛḍho rakṣyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:060.005d-0134_01: dvaidhībhāve ca bhūtānāṃ śapathaḥ kīdṛśo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:060.005d-0134_02: adharmasya phalaṃ yac ca śapathasya vilaṅghane
GE07mbh_12_u:060.005d-0134_03: sarvam etad yathātattvaṃ vyavahāraṃ ca tādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.006a: namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
GE07mbh_12_u:060.007c: prajanaḥ sveṣu dāreṣu śaucam adroha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:060.008c: brāhmaṇasya tu yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.009a: damam eva mahārāja dharmam āhuḥ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.010a: taṃ ced vittam upāgacched vartamānaṃ svakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:060.011c: saṃvibhajya hi bhoktavyaṃ dhanaṃ sadbhir itīṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:060.012c: kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:060.013a: kṣatriyasyāpi yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:060.013c: dadyād rājā na yāceta yajeta na tu yājayet
GE07mbh_12_u:060.015a: ye ca kratubhir ījānāḥ śrutavantaś ca bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.016c: kṣatriyo nāsya tat karma praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.017a: vadhaṃ hi kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmam āhuḥ pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.017c: nāsya kṛtyatamaṃ kiṃ cid anyad dasyunibarhaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:060.018a: dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño yogaḥ kṣemo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:060.018c: tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa yoddhavyaṃ dharmam īpsatā
GE07mbh_12_u:060.019a: sveṣu dharmeṣv avasthāpya prajāḥ sarvā mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.020c: kuryād anyan na vā kuryād aindro rājanya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:060.021a: vaiśyasyāpīha yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:060.022a: pitṛvat pālayed vaiśyo yuktaḥ sarvapaśūn iha
GE07mbh_12_u:060.022c: vikarma tad bhaved anyat karma yad yat samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:060.022e: rakṣayā sa hi teṣāṃ vai mahat sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:060.023a: prajāpatir hi vaiśyāya sṛṣṭvā paridade paśūn
GE07mbh_12_u:060.023c: brāhmaṇāya ca rājñe ca sarvāḥ paridade prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.024a: tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi yac ca tasyopajīvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.024c: ṣaṇṇām ekāṃ pibed dhenuṃ śatāc ca mithunaṃ haret
GE07mbh_12_u:060.025a: laye ca saptamo bhāgas tathā śṛṅge kalā khure
GE07mbh_12_u:060.026a: na ca vaiśyasya kāmaḥ syān na rakṣeyaṃ paśūn iti
GE07mbh_12_u:060.026c: vaiśye cecchati nānyena rakṣitavyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:060.027a: śūdrasyāpi hi yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:060.027c: prajāpatir hi varṇānāṃ dāsaṃ śūdram akalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:060.028c: teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇāc caiva mahat sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:060.029a: śūdra etān paricaret trīn varṇān anasūyakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.029c: saṃcayāṃś ca na kurvīta jātu śūdraḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:060.030a: pāpīyān hi dhanaṃ labdhvā vaśe kuryād garīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.030c: rājñā vā samanujñātaḥ kāmaṃ kurvīta dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.031a: tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi yac ca tasyopajīvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.032a: chatraṃ veṣṭanam auśīram upānad vyajanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:060.033c: śūdrāyaiva vidheyāni tasya dharmadhanaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:060.034a: yaś ca kaś cid dvijātīnāṃ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣur āvrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:060.034c: kalpyāṃ tasya tu tenāhur vṛttiṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.035a: śūdreṇa ca na hātavyo bhartā kasyāṃ cid āpadi
GE07mbh_12_u:060.035e: na hi svam asti śūdrasya bhartṛhāryadhano hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:060.036a: uktas trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ yajñas trayyaiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:060.037a: tābhyāṃ śūdraḥ pākayajñair yajeta vratavān svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.038a: śūdraḥ paijavano nāma sahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:060.038c: aindrāgnena vidhānena dakṣiṇām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.039c: daivataṃ hi mahac chraddhā pavitraṃ yajatāṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:060.040a: daivataṃ paramaṃ viprāḥ svena svena parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.040c: ayajann iha satrais te tais taiḥ kāmaiḥ sanātanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.041a: saṃsṛṣṭā brāhmaṇair eva triṣu varṇeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.041c: devānām api ye devā yad brūyus te paraṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:060.041e: tasmād varṇaiḥ sarvayajñāḥ saṃsṛjyante na kāmyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:060.042a: ṛgyajuḥsāmavit pūjyo nityaṃ syād devavad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.043c: nāsya yajñahano devā īhante netare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.044a: svaṃ daivataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ svena nityaṃ; parān varṇān ayajann evam āsīt
GE07mbh_12_u:060.044c: ārocitā naḥ sumahān sa dharmaḥ; sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā triṣu varṇeṣu dṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.044d-0137_01: saṃpūjyo vai brāhmaṇas triṣu varṇeṣu hṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.045a: tasmād varṇā ṛjavo jātidharmāḥ; saṃsṛjyante tasya vipāka eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.045c: ekaṃ sāma yajur ekam ṛg ekā; vipraś caiko 'niścayas teṣu dṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.047c: vahniṃ juhoti dharmeṇa śraddhā vai kāraṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:060.048a: yat skannam asya tat pūrvaṃ yad askannaṃ tad uttaram
GE07mbh_12_u:060.050a: steno vā yadi vā pāpo yadi vā pāpakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.050c: yaṣṭum icchati yajñaṃ yaḥ sādhum eva vadanti tam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.051a: ṛṣayas taṃ praśaṃsanti sādhu caitad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:060.051c: sarvathā sarvavarṇair hi yaṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:060.051e: na hi yajñasamaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:061.001c: caturṇām iha varṇānāṃ karmāṇi ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:061.003c: ādhānādīni karmāṇi prāpya vedam adhītya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:061.004a: sadāro vāpy adāro vā ātmavān saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.010a: adhītya vedān kṛtasarvakṛtyaḥ; saṃtānam utpādya sukhāni bhuktvā
GE07mbh_12_u:061.010c: samāhitaḥ pracared duścaraṃ taṃ; gārhasthyadharmaṃ munidharmadṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:061.011c: mitāśano devaparaḥ kṛtajñaḥ; satyo mṛduś cānṛśaṃsaḥ kṣamāvān
GE07mbh_12_u:061.012a: dānto vidheyo havyakavye 'pramatto; annasya dātā satataṃ dvijebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.012c: amatsarī sarvaliṅgipradātā; vaitānanityaś ca gṛhāśramī syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:061.013a: athātra nārāyaṇagītam āhur; maharṣayas tāta mahānubhāvāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.013c: mahārtham atyarthatapaḥprayuktaṃ; tad ucyamānaṃ hi mayā nibodha
GE07mbh_12_u:061.014a: satyārjavaṃ cātithipūjanaṃ ca; dharmas tathārthaś ca ratiś ca dāre
GE07mbh_12_u:061.014c: niṣevitavyāni sukhāni loke; hy asmin pare caiva mataṃ mamaitat
GE07mbh_12_u:061.015c: satāṃ tam āśramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadanti paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.016a: evaṃ hi yo brāhmaṇo yajñaśīlo; gārhasthyam adhyāvasate yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:061.016c: gṛhasthavṛttiṃ praviśodhya samyak; svarge viṣuddhaṃ phalam āpnute saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.018a: khādann eko japann ekaḥ sarpann eko yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:061.019a: brahmacārī vratī nityaṃ nityaṃ dīkṣāparo vaśī
GE07mbh_12_u:061.019c: avicārya tathā vedaṃ kṛtyaṃ kurvan vaset sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:061.020a: śuśrūṣāṃ satataṃ kurvan guroḥ saṃpraṇameta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:061.020b-0140_01: aniketaś carann ekaḥ sarvān eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:061.020c: ṣaṭkarmasv anivṛttaś ca napravṛttaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:061.021a: na caraty adhikāreṇa sevitaṃ dviṣato na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:062.003a: uktāni karmāṇi bahūni rājan; svargyāṇi rājanyaparāyaṇāni
GE07mbh_12_u:062.003c: nemāni dṛṣṭāntavidhau smṛtāni; kṣātre hi sarvaṃ vihitaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:062.004a: kṣātrāṇi vaiśyāni ca sevamānaḥ; śaudrāṇi karmāṇi ca brāhmaṇaḥ san
GE07mbh_12_u:062.004c: asmiṃl loke nindito mandacetāḥ; pare ca loke nirayaṃ prayāti
GE07mbh_12_u:062.005a: yā saṃjñā vihitā loke dāse śuni vṛke paśau
GE07mbh_12_u:062.005c: vikarmaṇi sthite vipre tāṃ saṃjñāṃ kuru pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:062.008a: yo yasmin kurute karma yādṛśaṃ yena yatra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:063.001a: jyākarṣaṇaṃ śatrunibarhaṇaṃ ca; kṛṣir vaṇijyā paśupālanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:063.001c: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ cāpi tathārthahetor; akāryam etat paramaṃ dvijasya
GE07mbh_12_u:063.003c: kauṭilyaṃ kaulaṭeyaṃ ca kusīdaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:063.004a: śūdro rājan bhavati brahmabandhur; duścāritryo yaś ca dharmād apetaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.004c: vṛṣalīpatiḥ piśuno nartakaś ca; grāmapraiṣyo yaś ca bhaved vikarmā
GE07mbh_12_u:063.005a: japan vedān ajapaṃś cāpi rājan; samaḥ śūdrair dāsavac cāpi bhojyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.005c: ete sarve śūdrasamā bhavanti; rājann etān varjayed devakṛtye
GE07mbh_12_u:063.006c: havyaṃ kavyaṃ yāni cānyāni rājan; deyāny adeyāni bhavanti tasmin
GE07mbh_12_u:063.007a: tasmād dharmo vihito brāhmaṇasya; damaḥ śaucaṃ cārjavaṃ cāpi rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:063.007c: tathā viprasyāśramāḥ sarva eva; purā rājan brahmaṇā vai nisṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.008a: yaḥ syād dāntaḥ somapa āryaśīlaḥ; sānukrośaḥ sarvasaho nirāśīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.008c: ṛjur mṛdur anṛśaṃsaḥ kṣamāvān; sa vai vipro netaraḥ pāpakarmā
GE07mbh_12_u:063.009a: śūdraṃ vaiśyaṃ rājaputraṃ ca rājaṃl; lokāḥ sarve saṃśritā dharmakāmāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.009c: tasmād varṇāñ jātidharmeṣu saktān; matvā viṣṇur necchati pāṇḍuputra
GE07mbh_12_u:063.010a: loke cedaṃ sarvalokasya na syāc; cāturvarṇyaṃ vedavādāś ca na syuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.010c: sarvāś cejyāḥ sarvalokakriyāś ca; sadyaḥ sarve cāśramasthā na vai syuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.011a: yaś ca trayāṇāṃ varṇānām icched āśramasevanam
GE07mbh_12_u:063.011c: kartum āśramadṛṣṭāṃś ca dharmāṃs tāñ śṛṇu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:063.014a: bhaikṣacaryāṃ na tu prāhus tasya tad dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.014c: tathā vaiśyasya rājendra rājaputrasya caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:063.016c: saṃtānādīni karmāṇi kṛtvā somaṃ niṣevya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:063.017a: pālayitvā prajāḥ sarvā dharmeṇa vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:063.018c: saṃgrāme vijayaṃ prāpya tathālpaṃ yadi vā bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:063.019a: sthāpayitvā prajāpālaṃ putraṃ rājye ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:063.020c: devān yajñair ṛṣīn vedair arcitvā caiva yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.021a: antakāle ca saṃprāpte ya icched āśramāntaram
GE07mbh_12_u:063.023a: na caitan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma trayāṇāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:063.024a: bahv āyattaṃ kṣatriyair mānavānāṃ; lokaśreṣṭhaṃ dharmam āsevamānaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.024c: sarve dharmāḥ sopadharmās trayāṇāṃ; rājño dharmād iti vedāc chṛṇomi
GE07mbh_12_u:063.025a: yathā rājan hastipade padāni; saṃlīyante sarvasattvodbhavāni
GE07mbh_12_u:063.025c: evaṃ dharmān rājadharmeṣu sarvān; sarvāvasthaṃ saṃpralīnān nibodha
GE07mbh_12_u:063.026a: alpāśrayān alpaphalān vadanti; dharmān anyān dharmavido manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.026c: mahāśrayaṃ bahukalyāṇarūpaṃ; kṣātraṃ dharmaṃ netaraṃ prāhur āryāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.027a: sarve dharmā rājadharmapradhānāḥ; sarve dharmāḥ pālyamānā bhavanti
GE07mbh_12_u:063.027c: sarvatyāgo rājadharmeṣu rājaṃs; tyāge cāhur dharmam agryaṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:063.028a: majjet trayī daṇḍanītau hatāyāṃ; sarve dharmā na bhaveyur viruddhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.028c: sarve dharmāś cāśramāṇāṃ gatāḥ syuḥ; kṣātre tyakte rājadharme purāṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:063.029a: sarve tyāgā rājadharmeṣu dṛṣṭāḥ; sarvā dīkṣā rājadharmeṣu coktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.029c: sarve yogā rājadharmeṣu coktāḥ; sarve lokā rājadharmān praviṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:063.030a: yathā jīvāḥ prakṛtau vadhyamānā; dharmāśritānām upapīḍanāya
GE07mbh_12_u:063.030c: evaṃ dharmā rājadharmair viyuktāḥ; sarvāvasthaṃ nādriyante svadharmam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.007a: udāhṛtaṃ te rājendra yathā viṣṇuṃ mahaujasam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.009a: sādhyā devā vasavaś cāśvinau ca; rudrāś ca viśve marutāṃ gaṇāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:064.009c: sṛṣṭāḥ purā ādidevena devā; kṣātre dharme vartayante ca siddhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.010e: babhūva rājā rājendra māndhātā nāma vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:064.012c: jagrāha śirasā pādau yajñe viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.013a: darśayām āsa taṃ viṣṇū rūpam āsthāya vāsavam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.013c: sa pārthivair vṛtaḥ sadbhir arcayām āsa taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:064.014c: saṃvādo 'yaṃ mahān āsīd viṣṇuṃ prati mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:064.015a: kim iṣyate dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭha; yad draṣṭukāmo 'si tam aprameyam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.016a: nāsau devo viśvarūpo mayāpi; śakyo draṣṭuṃ brahmaṇā vāpi sākṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:064.016c: ye 'nye kāmās tava rājan hṛdisthā; dāsyāmi tāṃs tvaṃ hi martyeṣu rājā
GE07mbh_12_u:064.017a: satye sthito dharmaparo jitendriyaḥ; śūro dṛḍhaṃ prītirataḥ surāṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:064.017c: buddhyā bhaktyā cottamaśraddhayā ca; tatas te 'haṃ dadmi varaṃ yatheṣṭam māndhātovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:064.018a: asaṃśayaṃ bhagavann ādidevaṃ; drakṣyāmy ahaṃ śirasāhaṃ prasādya
GE07mbh_12_u:064.018c: tyaktvā bhogān dharmakāmo hy araṇyam; icche gantuṃ satpathaṃ lokajuṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.019a: kṣātrād dharmād vipulād aprameyāl; lokāḥ prāptāḥ sthāpitaṃ svaṃ yaśaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:064.019c: dharmo yo 'sāv ādidevāt pravṛtto; lokajyeṣṭhas taṃ na jānāmi kartum
GE07mbh_12_u:064.020a: asainiko 'dharmaparaś carethāḥ; parāṃ gatiṃ lapsyase cāpramattaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.020c: kṣātro dharmo hy ādidevāt pravṛttaḥ; paścād anye śeṣabhūtāś ca dharmāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.021a: śeṣāḥ sṛṣṭā hy antavanto hy anantāḥ; suprasthānāḥ kṣatradharmāviśiṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.021c: asmin dharme sarvadharmāḥ praviṣṭās; tasmād dharmaṃ śreṣṭham imaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:064.022a: karmaṇā vai purā devā ṛṣayaś cāmitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.023a: yadi hy asau bhagavān nāhaniṣyad; ripūn sarvān vasumān aprameyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.023c: na brāhmaṇā na ca lokādikartā; na saddharmā nādidharmā bhaveyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.024a: imām urvīṃ na jayed vikrameṇa; devaśreṣṭho 'sau purā ced ameyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.024c: cāturvarṇyaṃ cāturāśramyadharmāḥ; sarve na syur brahmaṇo vai vināśāt
GE07mbh_12_u:064.025a: dṛṣṭā dharmāḥ śatadhā śāśvatena; kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa punaḥ pravṛttāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:064.025c: yuge yuge hy ādidharmāḥ pravṛttā; lokajyeṣṭhaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:064.026a: ātmatyāgaḥ sarvabhūtānukampā; lokajñānaṃ mokṣaṇaṃ pālanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:064.026c: viṣaṇṇānāṃ mokṣaṇaṃ pīḍitānāṃ; kṣātre dharme vidyate pārthivānām
GE07mbh_12_u:064.027a: nirmaryādāḥ kāmamanyupravṛttā; bhītā rājño nādhigacchanti pāpam
GE07mbh_12_u:064.027c: śiṣṭāś cānye sarvadharmopapannāḥ; sādhvācārāḥ sādhu dharmaṃ caranti
GE07mbh_12_u:064.028c: loke bhūtāni sarvāṇi vicaranti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.001a: evaṃvīryaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ; kṣātraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadharmeṣu dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.001c: pālyo yuṣmābhir lokasiṃhair udārair; viparyaye syād abhāvaḥ prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:065.002a: bhuvaḥ saṃskāraṃ rājasaṃskārayogam; abhaikṣacaryāṃ pālanaṃ ca prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:065.002c: vidyād rājā sarvabhūtānukampāṃ; dehatyāgaṃ cāhave dharmam agryam
GE07mbh_12_u:065.003a: tyāgaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ munayo vai vadanti; sarvaśreṣṭho yaḥ śarīraṃ tyajeta
GE07mbh_12_u:065.003c: nityaṃ tyaktaṃ rājadharmeṣu sarvaṃ; pratyakṣaṃ te bhūmipālāḥ sadaite
GE07mbh_12_u:065.004a: bahuśrutyā guruśuśrūṣayā vā; parasya vā saṃhananād vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:065.004c: nityaṃ dharmaṃ kṣatriyo brahmacārī; cared eko hy āśramaṃ dharmakāmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.005a: sāmānyārthe vyavahāre pravṛtte; priyāpriye varjayann eva yatnāt
GE07mbh_12_u:065.005c: cāturvarṇyasthāpanāt pālanāc ca; tais tair yogair niyamair aurasaiś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:065.006a: sarvodyogair āśramaṃ dharmam āhuḥ; kṣātraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmopapannam
GE07mbh_12_u:065.006c: svaṃ svaṃ dharmaṃ ye na caranti varṇās; tāṃs tān dharmān ayathāvad vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:065.007a: nirmaryāde nityam arthe vinaṣṭān; āhus tān vai paśubhūtān manuṣyān
GE07mbh_12_u:065.007c: yathā nītiṃ gamayaty arthalobhāc; chreyāṃs tasmād āśramaḥ kṣatradharmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.008a: traividyānāṃ yā gatir brāhmaṇānāṃ; yaś caivokto 'thāśramo brāhmaṇānām
GE07mbh_12_u:065.008c: etat karma brāhmaṇasyāhur agryam; anyat kurvañ śūdravac chastravadhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.010a: anyathā vartamānasya na sā vṛttiḥ prakalpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:065.010c: karmaṇā vyajyate dharmo yathaiva śvā tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.011a: yo vikarmasthito vipro na sa sanmānam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:065.011c: karmasv anupayuñjānam aviśvāsyaṃ hi taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.012a: ete dharmāḥ sarvavarṇāś ca vīrair; utkraṣṭavyāḥ kṣatriyair eṣa dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.012c: tasmāj jyeṣṭhā rājadharmā na cānye; vīryajyeṣṭhā vīradharmā matā me 12,065.013
GE07mbh_12_u:065.013b-0145_01: bāhlīkāś ca turuṣkāś ca pāñcālāś ca tathā smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.013c: śakās tuṣārāḥ kahvāś ca pahlavāś cāndhramadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.014a: oḍrāḥ pulindā ramaṭhāḥ kācā mlecchāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.014c: brahmakṣatraprasūtāś ca vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.015a: kathaṃ dharmaṃ careyus te sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.015c: madvidhaiś ca kathaṃ sthāpyāḥ sarve te dasyujīvinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.016a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:065.016c: tvaṃ bandhubhūto hy asmākaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:065.019a: pitṛyajñās tathā kūpāḥ prapāś ca śayanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:065.019c: dānāni ca yathākālaṃ dvijeṣu dadyur eva te
GE07mbh_12_u:065.020c: bharaṇaṃ putradārāṇāṃ śaucam adroha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:065.025c: āśramāṇāṃ vikalpāś ca nivṛtte 'smin kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:065.027c: tadā dharmo na calate sadbhūtaḥ śāśvataḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.028c: na tasya dattaṃ na hutaṃ na śrāddhaṃ phalati kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:065.029c: devāś ca bahu manyante dharmakāmaṃ nareśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:065.030a: prajāpatir hi bhagavān yaḥ sarvam asṛjaj jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:065.031a: pravṛttasya hi dharmasya buddhyā yaḥ smarate gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:065.031c: sa me mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca tatra kṣatraṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:065.032a: evam uktvā sa bhagavān marudgaṇavṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:065.032c: jagāma bhavanaṃ viṣṇur akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:065.034c: antarā vilayaṃ yānti yathā pathi vicakṣuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.001a: śrutā me kathitāḥ pūrvaiś catvāro mānavāśramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.001c: vyākhyānam eṣām ācakṣva pṛcchato me pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:066.002a: viditāḥ sarva eveha dharmās tava yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:066.003a: yat tu liṅgāntaragataṃ pṛcchase māṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:066.003c: dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha tan nibodha narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:066.008a: āhnikaṃ bhūtayajñāṃś ca pitṛyajñāṃś ca mānuṣān
GE07mbh_12_u:066.010d-0149_03: mṛtyur vā rakṣaṇaṃ veti yasya rājño viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.016a: carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rakṣām api ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.016c: yathārhapūjāṃ ca sadā kurvan gārhasthyam āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:066.017c: nigrahānugrahau pārtha gārhasthyam iti tat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.019a: āśramasthāni sarvāṇi yas tu veśmani bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:066.020a: yaḥ sthitaḥ puruṣo dharme dhātrā sṛṣṭe yathārthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:066.020c: āśramāṇāṃ sa sarveṣāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:066.021a: yasmin na naśyanti guṇāḥ kaunteya puruṣe sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:066.021c: āśramasthaṃ tam apy āhur naraśreṣṭhaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:066.022c: kurvan vasati sarveṣu hy āśrameṣu yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:066.023a: deśadharmāṃś ca kaunteya kuladharmāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:066.024a: kāle vibhūtiṃ bhūtānām upahārāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:066.026a: ye dharmakuśalā loke dharmaṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.026c: pālitā yasya viṣaye pādo 'ṃśas tasya bhūpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.027a: dharmārāmān dharmaparān ye na rakṣanti mānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:066.027c: pārthivāḥ puruṣavyāghra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ haranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:066.028a: ye ca rakṣāsahāyāḥ syuḥ pārthivānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:066.030a: ātmopamas tu bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.030c: nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya labhate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:066.032a: yadā nivṛttaḥ sarvasmāt kāmo yo 'sya hṛdi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.032c: tadā bhavati sattvasthas tato brahma samaśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:066.033a: suprasannas tu bhāvena yogena ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:066.035a: vane carati yo dharmam āśrameṣu ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:066.035c: rakṣayā tac chataguṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpnoti pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.036a: eṣa te vividho dharmaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:066.036c: anutiṣṭha tvam enaṃ vai pūrvair dṛṣṭaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:067.001c: rāṣṭrasya yat kṛtyatamaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:067.003c: parasparaṃ ca khādanti sarvathā dhig arājakam
GE07mbh_12_u:067.004a: indram enaṃ pravṛṇute yad rājānam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.004c: yathaivendras tathā rājā saṃpūjyo bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:067.005c: nārājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu havyam agnir vahaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:067.007c: na hi pāpāt pāpataram asti kiṃ cid arājakāt
GE07mbh_12_u:067.008a: sa cet samanupaśyeta samagraṃ kuśalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:067.008c: balavān hi prakupitaḥ kuryān niḥśeṣatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:067.008d-0150_01: yo durbalo na namati sa mahatkleśabhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:067.009a: bhūyāṃsaṃ labhate kleśaṃ yā gaur bhavati durduhā
GE07mbh_12_u:067.009c: suduhā yā tu bhavati naiva tāṃ kleśayanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:067.010a: yad ataptaṃ praṇamati na tat saṃtāpayanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:067.010c: yac ca svayaṃ nataṃ dāru na tat saṃnāmayanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:067.011c: indrāya sa praṇamate namate yo balīyase
GE07mbh_12_u:067.012a: tasmād rājaiva kartavyaḥ satataṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:067.012c: na dhanārtho na dārārthas teṣāṃ yeṣām arājakam
GE07mbh_12_u:067.013a: prīyate hi haran pāpaḥ paravittam arājake
GE07mbh_12_u:067.013c: yadāsya uddharanty anye tadā rājānam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:067.014a: pāpā api tadā kṣemaṃ na labhante kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:067.014c: ekasya hi dvau harato dvayoś ca bahavo 'pare
GE07mbh_12_u:067.015a: adāsaḥ kriyate dāso hriyante ca balāt striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.016a: rājā cen na bhavel loke pṛthivyāṃ daṇḍadhārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.017a: arājakāḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ vineśur iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:067.017c: parasparaṃ bhakṣayanto matsyā iva jale kṛśān
GE07mbh_12_u:067.018a: tāḥ sametya tataś cakruḥ samayān iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:067.018c: vākkrūro daṇḍapuruṣo yaś ca syāt pāradārikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.018e: yaś ca na svam athādadyāt tyājyā nas tādṛśā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:067.019c: tās tathā samayaṃ kṛtvā samaye nāvatasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:067.020a: sahitās tās tadā jagmur asukhārtāḥ pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:067.021a: yaṃ pūjayema saṃbhūya yaś ca naḥ paripālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:067.021c: tābhyo manuṃ vyādideśa manur nābhinananda tāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.022a: bibhemi karmaṇaḥ krūrād rājyaṃ hi bhṛśaduṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:067.023a: tam abruvan prajā mā bhaiḥ karmaṇaino gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:067.025a: sa tvaṃ jātabalo rājan duṣpradharṣaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:067.025c: sukhe dhāsyasi naḥ sarvān kubera iva nairṛtān
GE07mbh_12_u:067.026a: yaṃ ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.026c: caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya tvatsaṃsthaṃ no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:067.027c: pāhy asmān sarvato rājan devān iva śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.028c: mānaṃ vidhama śatrūṇāṃ dharmo jayatu naḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:067.029a: sa niryayau mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.030a: tasya tāṃ mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahendrasyeva devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.030c: apatatrasire sarve svadharme ca dadhur manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.030d-0153_01: varṇinaś cāśramāś caiva mlecchāḥ sarve ca dasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:067.031a: tato mahīṃ pariyayau parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
GE07mbh_12_u:067.031c: śamayan sarvataḥ pāpān svakarmasu ca yojayan
GE07mbh_12_u:067.032a: evaṃ ye bhūtim iccheyuḥ pṛthivyāṃ mānavāḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:067.033a: namasyeyuś ca taṃ bhaktyā śiṣyā iva guruṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:067.033c: devā iva sahasrākṣaṃ prajā rājānam antike
GE07mbh_12_u:067.034c: svajanena tv avajñātaṃ pare paribhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:067.035c: tasmāc chatraṃ ca patraṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:067.036a: bhojanāny atha pānāni rājñe dadyur gṛhāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:067.036c: āsanāni ca śayyāś ca sarvopakaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:067.038c: īkṣitaḥ prativīkṣeta mṛdu carju ca valgu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:068.001a: kim āhur daivataṃ viprā rājānaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:068.001c: manuṣyāṇām adhipatiṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:068.003a: rājā vasumanā nāma kausalyo dhīmatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.005c: prajānāṃ hitam anvicchan dharmamūlaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:068.006a: kena bhūtāni vardhante kṣayaṃ gacchanti kena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:068.006c: kam arcanto mahāprājña sukham atyantam āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.008c: prajā rājabhayād eva na khādanti parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.009a: rājā hy evākhilaṃ lokaṃ samudīrṇaṃ samutsukam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.010a: yathā hy anudaye rājan bhūtāni śaśisūryayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.011a: yathā hy anudake matsyā nirākrande vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.013a: evam eva vinā rājñā vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.013c: andhe tamasi majjeyur agopāḥ paśavo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:068.014c: hanyur vyāyacchamānāṃś ca yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.015a: yānaṃ vastram alaṃkārān ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:068.015c: hareyuḥ sahasā pāpā yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.016a: mamedam iti loke 'smin na bhavet saṃparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.016b-0156_01: na dārā na ca putraḥ syān na dhanaṃ na parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.016c: viśvalopaḥ pravarteta yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.017a: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vṛddham ācāryam atithiṃ gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:068.017c: kliśnīyur api hiṃsyur vā yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.018c: adharmaḥ pragṛhītaḥ syād yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.019c: mamatvaṃ ca na vindeyur yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.020a: antaś cākāśam eva syāl loko 'yaṃ dasyusād bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.020c: patec ca narakaṃ ghoraṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.021a: na yonipoṣo varteta na kṛṣir na vaṇikpathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.021c: majjed dharmas trayī na syād yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.022c: na vivāhāḥ samājā vā yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.023a: na vṛṣāḥ saṃpravarteran na mathyeraṃś ca gargarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.023c: ghoṣāḥ praṇāśaṃ gaccheyur yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.024c: kṣaṇena vinaśet sarvaṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.025c: vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.026c: vidyāsnātās tapaḥsnātā yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.027a: hasto hastaṃ sa muṣṇīyād bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.027c: bhayārtaṃ vidravet sarvaṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.028c: kartā svecchendriyo gacched yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.029c: durbhikṣam āviśed rāṣṭraṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.031a: nākruṣṭaṃ sahate kaś cit kuto hastasya laṅghanam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.031c: yadi rājā manuṣyeṣu trātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.033a: dharmam eva prapadyante na hiṃsanti parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.034a: yajante ca trayo varṇā mahāyajñaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.034c: yuktāś cādhīyate śāstraṃ yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.035a: vārtāmūlo hy ayaṃ lokas trayyā vai dhāryate sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:068.035c: tat sarvaṃ vartate samyag yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.036a: yadā rājā dhuraṃ śreṣṭhām ādāya vahati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.037a: yasyābhāve ca bhūtānām abhāvaḥ syāt samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.037c: bhāve ca bhāvo nityaḥ syāt kas taṃ na pratipūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.038c: tiṣṭhet priyahite rājña ubhau lokau hi yo jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.039a: yas tasya puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ manasāpy anucintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.039c: asaṃśayam iha kliṣṭaḥ pretyāpi narakaṃ patet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.040a: na hi jātv avamantavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.040c: mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:068.041a: kurute pañca rūpāṇi kālayuktāni yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:068.041c: bhavaty agnis tathādityo mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.042a: yadā hy āsīd ataḥ pāpān dahaty ugreṇa tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:068.043c: kṣemaṃ ca kṛtvā vrajati tadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.044a: aśucīṃś ca yadā kruddhaḥ kṣiṇoti śataśo narān
GE07mbh_12_u:068.045a: yadā tv adhārmikān sarvāṃs tīkṣṇair daṇḍair niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:068.045c: dhārmikāṃś cānugṛhṇāti bhavaty atha yamas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:068.047a: śriyaṃ dadāti kasmai cit kasmāc cid apakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:068.047c: tadā vaiśravaṇo rājaṃl loke bhavati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.049a: na hi rājñaḥ pratīpāni kurvan sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:068.049c: putro bhrātā vayasyo vā yady apy ātmasamo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:068.050c: na tu rājñābhipannasya śeṣaṃ kva cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:068.052a: naśyed abhimṛśan sadyo mṛgaḥ kūṭam iva spṛśan
GE07mbh_12_u:068.052c: ātmasvam iva saṃrakṣed rājasvam iha buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:068.054a: rājā bhojo virāṭ samrāṭ kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.054c: ya evaṃ stūyate śabdaiḥ kas taṃ nārcitum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:068.056c: dharmanityaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ mantriṇaṃ pūjayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:068.058a: rājā pragalbhaṃ puruṣaṃ karoti; rājā kṛśaṃ bṛṃhayate manuṣyam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.058c: rājābhipannasya kutaḥ sukhāni; rājābhyupetaṃ sukhinaṃ karoti
GE07mbh_12_u:068.059a: rājā prajānāṃ hṛdayaṃ garīyo; gatiḥ pratiṣṭhā sukham uttamaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:068.059c: yam āśritā lokam imaṃ paraṃ ca; jayanti samyak puruṣā narendram
GE07mbh_12_u:068.060a: narādhipaś cāpy anuśiṣya medinīṃ; damena satyena ca sauhṛdena
GE07mbh_12_u:068.060c: mahadbhir iṣṭvā kratubhir mahāyaśās; triviṣṭape sthānam upaiti satkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:068.061a: sa evam ukto guruṇā kausalyo rājasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.001c: kathaṃ rakṣyo janapadaḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.002a: kathaṃ cāraṃ prayuñjīta varṇān viśvāsayet katham
GE07mbh_12_u:069.002c: kathaṃ bhṛtyān kathaṃ dārān kathaṃ putrāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:069.004a: ātmā jeyaḥ sadā rājñā tato jeyāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.006a: nyaseta gulmān durgeṣu saṃdhau ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:069.007a: saṃsthāneṣu ca sarveṣu pureṣu nagarasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.009a: amātyeṣu ca sarveṣu mitreṣu trividheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.010c: yathā na vidyur anyonyaṃ praṇidheyās tathā hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:069.011a: cārāṃś ca vidyāt prahitān pareṇa bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:069.012c: veśeṣu catvare caiva sabhāsv āvasatheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.013c: cāreṇa vihataṃ sarvaṃ hataṃ bhavati pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:069.014a: yadā tu hīnaṃ nṛpatir vidyād ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.014c: amātyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya kuryāt saṃdhiṃ balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.014d-0158_01: vidvāṃsaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā brāhmaṇāś ca bahuśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.015a: ajñāyamāno hīnatve kuryāt saṃdhiṃ pareṇa vai
GE07mbh_12_u:069.015c: lipsur vā kaṃ cid evārthaṃ tvaramāṇo vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.016a: guṇavanto mahotsāhā dharmajñāḥ sādhavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:069.016c: saṃdadhīta nṛpas taiś ca rāṣṭraṃ dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:069.019c: vyāsaktaṃ ca pramattaṃ ca durbalaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.020c: pūrvaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ ca yātrāyāṃ nagare tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.020d-0159_01: antaḥpure ca rāṣṭre ca adhyakṣeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.021a: na ca vaśyo bhaved asya nṛpo yady api vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:069.021c: hīnaś ca balavīryābhyāṃ karśayaṃs taṃ parāvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:069.023e: yam arthaṃ śaknuyāt prāptuṃ tena tuṣyed dhi paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.025a: daśadharmagatebhyo yad vasu bahv alpam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.025c: tan nādadīta sahasā paurāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:069.026a: yathā putrās tathā paurā draṣṭavyās te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.027a: sutaṃ ca sthāpayed rājā prājñaṃ sarvārthadarśinam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.028a: ākare lavaṇe śulke tare nāgavane tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.028c: nyased amātyān nṛpatiḥ svāptān vā puruṣān hitān
GE07mbh_12_u:069.029a: samyag daṇḍadharo nityaṃ rājā dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:069.029c: nṛpasya satataṃ daṇḍaḥ samyag dharme praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:069.030c: dānaśīlaś ca satataṃ yajñaśīlaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:069.031a: ete guṇāḥ samastāḥ syur nṛpasya satataṃ sthirāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.031c: kriyālope tu nṛpateḥ kutaḥ svargaḥ kuto yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.032a: yadā tu pīḍito rājā bhaved rājñā balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.032b-0161_01: guptāś caiva dadurgāś ca deśās teṣu praveśayet (sic)
GE07mbh_12_u:069.032c: tridhā tv ākrandya mitrāṇi vidhānam upakalpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.033a: ghoṣān nyaseta mārgeṣu grāmān utthāpayed api
GE07mbh_12_u:069.033c: praveśayec ca tān sarvāñ śākhānagarakeṣv api
GE07mbh_12_u:069.034a: ye guptāś caiva durgāś ca deśās teṣu praveśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.034c: dhanino balamukhyāṃś ca sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.035a: sasyābhihāraṃ kuryāc ca svayam eva narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.036a: kṣetrastheṣu ca sasyeṣu śatror upajapen narān
GE07mbh_12_u:069.036c: vināśayed vā sarvasvaṃ balenātha svakena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:069.037c: jalaṃ nisrāvayet sarvam anisrāvyaṃ ca dūṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.040a: pravṛddhānāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhāḥ pracchedayet tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.040c: caityānāṃ sarvathā varjyam api patrasya pātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.040d-0163_03: raudrāṇāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ tasmāt tān parivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.040d-0163_04: śrūyate hi nikumbhena saudāsasya balaṃ hatam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.042c: teṣāṃ ca dvāravad guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.043a: dvāreṣu ca gurūṇy eva yantrāṇi sthāpayet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.043c: āropayec chataghnīś ca svādhīnāni ca kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.044a: kāṣṭhāni cābhihāryāṇi tathā kūpāṃś ca khānayet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.044c: saṃśodhayet tathā kūpān kṛtān pūrvaṃ payorthibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.045c: nirharec ca tṛṇaṃ māse caitre vahnibhayāt puraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.046a: naktam eva ca bhaktāni pācayeta narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.046d-0164_02: mṛṇmayāni ca kurvīta jñātvā deśe balābalam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.047c: gṛhāṇi ca praviśyātha vidheyaḥ syād dhutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.048a: mahādaṇḍaś ca tasya syād yasyāgnir vai divā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.048c: praghoṣayed athaivaṃ ca rakṣaṇārthaṃ purasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:069.049c: bāhyān kuryān naraśreṣṭha doṣāya syur hi te 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.050a: catvareṣu ca tīrtheṣu sabhāsv āvasatheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.051c: prapāś ca vipaṇīś caiva yathoddeśaṃ samādiśet
GE07mbh_12_u:069.053a: parikhāś caiva kauravya pratolīḥ saṃkaṭāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.053c: na jātu kaś cit paśyet tu guhyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:069.054c: tailaṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ sasyam auṣadhāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.057a: auṣadhāni ca sarvāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.057c: caturvidhāṃś ca vaidyān vai saṃgṛhṇīyād viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.058a: naṭāś ca nartakāś caiva mallā māyāvinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.059a: yataḥ śaṅkā bhavec cāpi bhṛtyato vāpi mantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.059c: paurebhyo nṛpater vāpi svādhīnān kārayeta tān
GE07mbh_12_u:069.060c: mānena ca yathārheṇa sāntvena vividhena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.061a: nirvedayitvā tu paraṃ hatvā vā kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:069.061c: gatānṛṇyo bhaved rājā yathā śāstreṣu darśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.062a: rājñā saptaiva rakṣyāṇi tāni cāpi nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:069.062c: ātmāmātyaś ca kośaś ca daṇḍo mitrāṇi caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:069.063a: tathā janapadaś caiva puraṃ ca kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:069.064a: ṣāḍguṇyaṃ ca trivargaṃ ca trivargam aparaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.064c: yo vetti puruṣavyāghra sa bhunakti mahīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:069.065a: ṣāḍguṇyam iti yat proktaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:069.065c: saṃdhāyāsanam ity eva yātrāsaṃdhānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.066a: vigṛhyāsanam ity eva yātrāṃ saṃparigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067a: trivargaś cāpi yaḥ proktas tam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067c: kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ ca vṛddhiś ca trivargam aparaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_01: dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca trivargo vai sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_02: mantraś caiva prabhāvaś ca utsāhaś caiva tāntrikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_04: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartā ca parikīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_05: etat parataraṃ vidyāt trivargād api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_06: sarveṣāṃ ca kṣaye rājan yas trivargaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_07: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva trivargaḥ kāraṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_09: kāryasya sarvathā nāśo mokṣa ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:069.067d-0166_12: jagato laukikī yātrā yatra nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:069.068a: dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca sevitavyo 'tha kālataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.068c: dharmeṇa hi mahīpālaś ciraṃ pālayate mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:069.068d-0168_01: yaḥ kaś cid dhārmiko rājā sa vipanno 'pi bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.069a: asminn arthe ca yau ślokau gītāv aṅgirasā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.069c: yādavīputra bhadraṃ te śrotum arhasi tāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:069.070a: kṛtvā sarvāṇi kāryāṇi samyak saṃpālya medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:069.070c: pālayitvā tathā paurān paratra sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071a: kiṃ tasya tapasā rājñaḥ kiṃ ca tasyādhvarair api
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_01: ślokāś cośanasā gītās tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_02: daṇḍanīteś ca yan mūlaṃ trivargasya ca bhūpate
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_03: bhārgavāṅgirasaṃ karma ṣoḍaśāṅgaṃ ca yad balam
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_04: viṣaṃ māyāś ca daivaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ cārthasiddhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_07: ṣaṭ pañca ca vinirjitya daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_08: trivargair daśabhir yuktaḥ surair api na jīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_09: na buddhiṃ parigṛhṇīta strīṇāṃ mūrkhajanasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_11: na teṣāṃ śṛṇuyād rājā buddhis teṣāṃ parāṅmukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_14: vidvāṃsaḥ prathitā ye ca ye cāptāḥ sarvakarmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_15: yuddheṣu dṛṣṭakarmāṇas teṣāṃ ca śṛṇuyān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_16: daivaṃ puruṣakāraṃ ca trivargaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:069.071d-0169_17: daivatāni ca viprāṃś ca praṇamya vijayī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:070.001a: daṇḍanītiś ca rājā ca samastau tāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:070.001c: kasya kiṃ kurvataḥ siddhyai tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:070.002c: śṛṇu me śaṃsato rājan yathāvad iha bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:070.003c: prayuktā svāminā samyag adharmebhyaś ca yacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:070.005a: some prayatnaṃ kurvanti trayo varṇā yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:070.006a: kālo vā kāraṇaṃ rājño rājā vā kālakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:070.006c: iti te saṃśayo mā bhūd rājā kālasya kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:070.007a: daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā samyak kārtsnyena vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.007c: tadā kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.008a: bhavet kṛtayuge dharmo nādharmo vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:070.008c: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ nādharme ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.009c: vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanty aviguṇāny uta
GE07mbh_12_u:070.010a: ṛtavaś ca sukhāḥ sarve bhavanty uta nirāmayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.011a: vyādhayo na bhavanty atra nālpāyur dṛśyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.011c: vidhavā na bhavanty atra nṛśaṃso nābhijāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.013a: nādharmo vidyate tatra dharma eva tu kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.013c: iti kārtayugān etān guṇān viddhi yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:070.014a: daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā trīn aṃśān anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.014c: caturtham aṃśam utsṛjya tadā tretā pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.016a: ardhaṃ tyaktvā yadā rājā nītyardham anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.016c: tatas tu dvāparaṃ nāma sa kālaḥ saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.017a: aśubhasya tadā ardhaṃ dvāv aṃśāv anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:070.018c: prajāḥ kliśnāty ayogena praviśyati tadā kaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.019a: kalāv adharmo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dharmo bhavati tu kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:070.019c: sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ svadharmāc cyavate manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.021a: vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanti viguṇāny uta
GE07mbh_12_u:070.021c: ṛtavo nasukhāḥ sarve bhavanty āmayinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:070.022c: vyādhayaś ca bhavanty atra mriyante cāgatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.023a: vidhavāś ca bhavanty atra nṛśaṃsā jāyate prajā
GE07mbh_12_u:070.023c: kva cid varṣati parjanyaḥ kva cit sasyaṃ prarohati
GE07mbh_12_u:070.024a: rasāḥ sarve kṣayaṃ yānti yadā necchati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.025c: yugasya ca caturthasya rājā bhavati kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:070.026a: kṛtasya karaṇād rājā svargam atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:070.026c: tretāyāḥ karaṇād rājā svargaṃ nātyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:070.027c: kaleḥ pravartanād rājā pāpam atyantam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:070.028a: tato vasati duṣkarmā narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.028c: prajānāṃ kalmaṣe magno 'kīrtiṃ pāpaṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:070.029b-0172_01: paripālyāḥ prajāḥ samyag iha pretya ca kāmadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:070.029c: anavāptaṃ ca lipseta labdhaṃ ca paripālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:070.029d-0173_02: lipsitavyam alabdhaṃ ca labdhaṃ rakṣyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:070.030c: samyaṅ nītā daṇḍanītir yathā mātā yathā pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:070.031a: yasyāṃ bhavanti bhūtāni tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:070.031c: eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā daṇḍanītimān
GE07mbh_12_u:070.032a: tasmāt kauravya dharmeṇa prajāḥ pālaya nītimān
GE07mbh_12_u:070.032c: evaṃvṛttaḥ prajā rakṣan svargaṃ jetāsi durjayam
GE07mbh_12_u:071.001c: sukhenārthān sukhodarkān iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:071.002c: yān guṇāṃs tu guṇopetaḥ kurvan guṇam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:071.003a: cared dharmān akaṭuko muñcet snehaṃ na nāstikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.003c: anṛśaṃsaś cared arthaṃ caret kāmam anuddhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.004a: priyaṃ brūyād akṛpaṇaḥ śūraḥ syād avikatthanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.004c: dātā nāpātravarṣī syāt pragalbhaḥ syād aniṣṭhuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.005a: saṃdadhīta na cānāryair vigṛhṇīyān na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.005c: nānāptaiḥ kārayec cāraṃ kuryāt kāryam apīḍayā
GE07mbh_12_u:071.006a: arthān brūyān na cāsatsu guṇān brūyān na cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.006c: ādadyān na ca sādhubhyo nāsatpuruṣam āśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:071.007a: nāparīkṣya nayed daṇḍaṃ na ca mantraṃ prakāśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:071.007c: visṛjen na ca lubdhebhyo viśvasen nāpakāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:071.008a: anīrṣur guptadāraḥ syāc cokṣaḥ syād aghṛṇī nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.008c: striyaṃ seveta nātyarthaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ bhuñjīta nāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:071.009a: astabdhaḥ pūjayen mānyān gurūn seved amāyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:071.009c: arced devān na dambhena śriyam icched akutsitām
GE07mbh_12_u:071.010a: seveta praṇayaṃ hitvā dakṣaḥ syān na tv akālavit
GE07mbh_12_u:071.010c: sāntvayen na ca bhogārtham anugṛhṇan na cākṣipet
GE07mbh_12_u:071.011a: praharen na tv avijñāya hatvā śatrūn na śeṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:071.011c: krodhaṃ kuryān na cākasmān mṛduḥ syān nāpakāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:071.012a: evaṃ carasva rājyastho yadi śreya ihecchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:071.013a: iti sarvān guṇān etān yathoktān yo 'nuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:071.014a: idaṃ vacaḥ śāṃtanavasya śuśruvān; yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pāṇḍavamukhyasaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:071.014c: tadā vavande ca pitāmahaṃ nṛpo; yathoktam etac ca cakāra buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:072.001a: kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣan nādhibandhena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:072.001c: dharme ca nāparādhnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:072.002a: samāsenaiva te tāta dharmān vakṣyāmi niścitān
GE07mbh_12_u:072.002c: vistareṇa hi dharmāṇāṃ na jātv antam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:072.003c: arcitān vāsayethās tvaṃ gṛhe guṇavato dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:072.006a: ārjavena ca saṃpanno dhṛtyā buddhyā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:072.007c: na sa dharmaṃ na cāpy arthaṃ parigṛhṇāti bāliśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.008a: mā sma lubdhāṃś ca mūrkhāṃś ca kāme cārtheṣu yūyujaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.011a: dāpayitvā karaṃ dharmyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ nityaṃ yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:072.013a: mā smādharmeṇa lābhena lipsethās tvaṃ dhanāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:072.014c: asthāne cāsya tad vittaṃ sarvam eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:072.015c: karair aśāstradṛṣṭair hi mohāt saṃpīḍayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.016a: ūdhaś chindyād dhi yo dhenvāḥ kṣīrārthī na labhet payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.016b-0174_01: yo hi pakvaṃ drumaṃ chidya labhate na punaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:072.016c: evaṃ rāṣṭram ayogena pīḍitaṃ na vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:072.017a: yo hi dogdhrīm upāste tu sa nityaṃ labhate payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.017c: evaṃ rāṣṭram upāyena bhuñjāno labhate phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:072.019a: dogdhi dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca prajā rājñi surakṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:072.019c: nityaṃ svebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca tṛptā mātā yathā payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.020c: tathā yuktaś ciraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhoktuṃ śakyasi pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.021c: atha sāmnaiva lipsethā dhanam abrāhmaṇeṣu yat
GE07mbh_12_u:072.022a: mā sma te brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanasthaṃ pracalen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.022c: antyāyām apy avasthāyāṃ kim u sphītasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:072.023a: dhanāni tebhyo dadyās tvaṃ yathāśakti yathārhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.023c: sāntvayan parirakṣaṃś ca svargam āpsyasi durjayam
GE07mbh_12_u:072.024a: evaṃ dharmeṇa vṛttena prajās tvaṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.026a: eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā rakṣate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.026c: bhūtānāṃ hi yathā dharme rakṣaṇaṃ ca parā dayā
GE07mbh_12_u:072.026d-0176_01: iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya paratra ca mahītale
GE07mbh_12_u:072.027a: tasmād evaṃ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyante dharmakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.027c: yad rājā rakṣaṇe yukto bhūteṣu kurute dayām
GE07mbh_12_u:072.028a: yad ahnā kurute pāpam arakṣan bhayataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.029a: yad ahnā kurute puṇyaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.029c: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tasya bhuṅkte phalaṃ divi
GE07mbh_12_u:072.029d-0177_01: yadā na kurute dharmaṃ rājā bhūtāni pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.029d-0177_02: prajāpuṇyaṃ caturbhāgaṃ tadā na prāpnuyān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.030a: sviṣṭiḥ svadhītiḥ sutapā lokāñ jayati yāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:072.030c: kṣaṇena tān avāpnoti prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.032a: svargaloke ca mahatīṃ śriyaṃ prāpsyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:072.032e: tasmād rājaiva nānyo 'sti yo mahat phalam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:072.033a: sa rājyam ṛddhimat prāpya dharmeṇa paripālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:072.033c: indraṃ tarpaya somena kāmaiś ca suhṛdo janān
GE07mbh_12_u:073.001a: ya eva tu sato rakṣed asataś ca nibarhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:073.001c: sa eva rājñā kartavyo rājan rājapurohitaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:073.001d-0178_02: kṣamaḥ kartuṃ samartho vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:073.003a: kutaḥ svid brāhmaṇo jāto varṇāś cāpi kutas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.003c: kasmāc ca bhavati śreyān etad vāyo vicakṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:073.004c: bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ sṛṣṭa ūrubhyāṃ vaiśya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:073.005c: varṇaś caturthaḥ paścāt tu padbhyāṃ śūdro vinirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.006d-0179_01: sarvasvaṃ brāhmaṇasyedaṃ yat kiṃ cid iha dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:073.006d-0179_02: dharmayuktaṃ praśastaṃ ca jagaty asmin nṛpātmaja
GE07mbh_12_u:073.008a: vaiśyas tu dhanadhānyena trīn varṇān bibhṛyād imān
GE07mbh_12_u:073.008c: śūdro hy enān paricared iti brahmānuśāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:073.009a: dvijasya kṣatrabandhor vā kasyeyaṃ pṛthivī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:073.009c: dharmataḥ saha vittena samyag vāyo pracakṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:073.010a: viprasya sarvam evaitad yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:073.010b-0180_01: dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca striyo ratnāni vāhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:073.010b-0180_02: maṅgalaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca yac cānyad api vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:073.011a: svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:073.011c: gurur hi sarvavarṇānāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.012a: patyabhāve yathā strī hi devaraṃ kurute patim
GE07mbh_12_u:073.012c: ānantaryāt tathā kṣatraṃ pṛthivī kurute patim
GE07mbh_12_u:073.013a: eṣa te prathamaḥ kalpa āpady anyo bhaved ataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.013c: yadi svarge paraṃ sthānaṃ dharmataḥ parimārgasi
GE07mbh_12_u:073.014a: yaḥ kaś cid vijayed bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
GE07mbh_12_u:073.015c: yo rājānaṃ nayed buddhyā sarvataḥ paripūrṇayā
GE07mbh_12_u:073.016a: brāhmaṇo hi kule jātaḥ kṛtaprajño vinītavāk
GE07mbh_12_u:073.016c: śreyo nayati rājānaṃ bruvaṃś citrāṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:073.017a: rājā carati yaṃ dharmaṃ brāhmaṇena nidarśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:073.018a: tāvatā sa kṛtaprajñaś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:073.019a: evam eva prajāḥ sarvā rājānam abhisaṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.019c: samyagvṛttāḥ svadharmasthā na kutaś cid bhayānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.020a: rāṣṭre caranti yaṃ dharmaṃ rājñā sādhv abhirakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.020c: caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya rājā bhāgaṃ sa vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:073.022a: ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:073.023a: chāyāyām apsu vāyau ca sukham uṣṇe 'dhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:073.023c: agnau vāsasi sūrye ca sukhaṃ śīte 'dhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:073.024a: śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca ramate manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:073.024c: teṣu bhogeṣu sarveṣu nabhīto labhate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:073.025a: abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:073.025c: na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:073.026a: indro rājā yamo rājā dharmo rājā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:073.026c: rājā bibharti rūpāṇi rājñā sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:074.000-0182_01: rājñā purohitaḥ kāryaḥ kīdṛśo varṇato bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:074.000-0182_03: gauro vā lohito vāpi śyāmo vā nīrujaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:074.001a: rājñā purohitaḥ kāryo bhaved vidvān bahuśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002a: dharmātmā dharmavid yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ rājan purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0001: teṣām arthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmaś ceti viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0002: ślokāṃś cośanasā gītāṃs tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0003: ucchiṣṭaḥ sa bhaved rājā yasya nāsti purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0005: śatrūṇāṃ ca bhaved vadhyo yasya nāsti purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0008: brūyād garhyāṇi satataṃ mahotpātāny aghāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0013: raudrahomasahasraṃ ca svasya rājñaḥ priyaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0014: rājñaḥ pāpamalāḥ sapta yān ṛcchati purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0015: amātyāś ca kukarmāṇo mantriṇaś cāpy upekṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0018: hiṃsā cānyatra saṃgrāmād yajñāc ca mala ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0019: kubhṛtyais tu prajānāśaḥ saptamas tu mahāmalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0021: bhṛgvaṅgiro vidhijño vai purodhā nirṇuden malān
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0022: etān hitvā divaṃ yāti rājā sapta mahāmalān
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0023: sāmātyaḥ sapurodhāś ca prajānāṃ pālane rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0025: ślokān āha surendrasya gurur devo bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0027: ṛgvede sāmavede ca yajurvede ca vājinām
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0028: na nirdiṣṭāni karmāṇi triṣu sthāneṣu bhūbhṛtām
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0029: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva aniṣṭānāṃ ca śātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0030: śaptās te yājñavalkyena yajñānāṃ hitam īhatā
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0032: bahvṛcaṃ sāmagaṃ caiva vājinaṃ ca vivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0036: śāntike pauṣṭike caiva nityaṃ karmaṇi varjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0038: vedāś catvāra ity ete brāhmaṇā ye ca tad viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0039: paurohitye pramāṇaṃ tu brāhmaṇaś ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0040: jātyā na kṣatriyaḥ proktaḥ kṣatatrāṇaṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0043: vaitānaṃ karma yac caiva gṛhyakarma ca yat smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0046: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva tathābhicaraṇaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0048: na samyak phalam icchanti ye yajanti dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0049: paurohityaṃ hi kurvāṇā nāśaṃ yāsyanti bhūbhṛtām
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0053: ṛṣiṇā yājñavalkyena tat tathā na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0059: aśastair vātaduṣṭaiś ca dūrasthaiḥ saṃvaden nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0060: rogiṇaṃ tv ṛtvijaṃ caiva varjayec ca purohitam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0061: na cānyasya kṛtaṃ yena paurohityaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0062: yasya yājyo mṛtaś caiva bhraṣṭaḥ pravrajito 'tha vā
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0063: yuddhe parājitaś caiva sarvāṃs tān varjayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002b-008_0071: hiṃsāliṅgā hi nirdiṣṭā mantrā vaitānikair dvijaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.002c: rājā caivaṃ guṇo yeṣāṃ kuśalaṃ teṣu sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.003a: ubhau prajā vardhayato devān pūrvān parān pitṝn
GE07mbh_12_u:074.005a: vimānanāt tayor eva prajā naśyeyur eva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:074.005c: brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mūlam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:074.007a: yadā hi brahma prajahāti kṣatraṃ; kṣatraṃ yadā vā prajahāti brahma
GE07mbh_12_u:074.007c: anvag balaṃ katame 'smin bhajante; tathābalyaṃ katame 'smin viyanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.008a: vyṛddhaṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhavati kṣatriyasya; brahma kṣatraṃ virudhyate ha
GE07mbh_12_u:074.008c: anvag balaṃ dasyavas tad bhajante; 'balyaṃ tathā tatra viyanti santaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.009a: naiṣām ukṣā vardhate nota usrā; na gargaro mathyate no yajante
GE07mbh_12_u:074.009c: naiṣāṃ putrā vedam adhīyate ca; yadā brahma kṣatriyāḥ saṃtyajanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.010a: naiṣām ukṣā vardhate jātu gehe; nādhīyate saprajā no yajante
GE07mbh_12_u:074.010c: apadhvastā dasyubhūtā bhavanti; ye brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyān saṃtyajanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.011c: kṣatraṃ hi brahmaṇo yonir yoniḥ kṣatrasya ca dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.012a: ubhāv etau nityam abhiprapannau; saṃprāpatur mahatīṃ śrīpratiṣṭhām
GE07mbh_12_u:074.012c: tayoḥ saṃdhir bhidyate cet purāṇas; tataḥ sarvaṃ bhavati hi saṃpramūḍham
GE07mbh_12_u:074.013a: nātra plavaṃ labhate pāragāmī; mahāgādhe naur iva saṃpraṇunnā
GE07mbh_12_u:074.013c: cāturvarṇyaṃ bhavati ca saṃpramūḍhaṃ; tataḥ prajāḥ kṣayasaṃsthā bhavanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.014a: brahmavṛkṣo rakṣyamāṇo madhu hema ca varṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:074.014c: arakṣyamāṇaḥ satatam aśru pāpaṃ ca varṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:074.015a: abrahmacārī caraṇād apeto; yadā brahmā brahmaṇi trāṇam icchet
GE07mbh_12_u:074.015c: āścaryaśo varṣati tatra devas; tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ duḥsahāś cāviśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.016a: striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇaṃ vāpi pāpaḥ; sabhāyāṃ yatra labhate 'nuvādam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.016c: rājñaḥ sakāśe na bibheti cāpi; tato bhayaṃ jāyate kṣatriyasya
GE07mbh_12_u:074.017a: pāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe 'tivelaṃ; tato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.017c: pāpaiḥ pāpāḥ saṃjanayanti rudraṃ; tataḥ sarvān sādhvasādhūn hinasti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.018a: kuto rudraḥ kīdṛśo vāpi rudraḥ; sattvaiḥ sattvaṃ dṛśyate vadhyamānam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.018c: etad vidvan kaśyapa me pracakṣva; yato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.019a: ātmā rudro hṛdaye mānavānāṃ; svaṃ svaṃ dehaṃ paradehaṃ ca hanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.019c: vātotpātaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rudram āhur; dāvair jīmūtaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rūpam asya
GE07mbh_12_u:074.020a: na vai vātaṃ parivṛnoti kaś cin; na jīmūto varṣati naiva dāvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.020c: tathāyukto dṛśyate mānaveṣu; kāmadveṣād badhyate mucyate ca
GE07mbh_12_u:074.021a: yathaikagehe jātavedāḥ pradīptaḥ; kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ pradahet sa tvarāvān
GE07mbh_12_u:074.021c: vimohanaṃ kurute deva eṣa; tataḥ sarvaṃ spṛśyate puṇyapāpaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.022a: yadi daṇḍaḥ spṛśate puṇyabhājaṃ; pāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe 'viśeṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:074.022c: kasya hetoḥ sukṛtaṃ nāma kuryād; duṣkṛtaṃ vā kasya hetor na kuryāt
GE07mbh_12_u:074.023a: asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtām apāpāṃs; tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate
GE07mbh_12_u:074.023c: śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvān; na miśraḥ syāt pāpakṛdbhiḥ kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:074.024a: sādhvasādhūn dhārayatīha bhūmiḥ; sādhvasādhūṃs tāpayatīha sūryaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.024c: sādhvasādhūn vātayatīha vāyur; āpas tathā sādhvasādhūn vahanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.025a: evam asmin vartate loka eva; nāmutraivaṃ vartate rājaputra
GE07mbh_12_u:074.025c: pretyaitayor antaravān viśeṣo; yo vai puṇyaṃ carate yaś ca pāpam
GE07mbh_12_u:074.026a: puṇyasya loko madhumān ghṛtārcir; hiraṇyajyotir amṛtasya nābhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.026c: tatra pretya modate brahmacārī; na tatra mṛtyur na jarā nota duḥkham
GE07mbh_12_u:074.027a: pāpasya loko nirayo 'prakāśo; nityaṃ duḥkhaḥ śokabhūyiṣṭha eva
GE07mbh_12_u:074.027c: tatrātmānaṃ śocate pāpakarmā; bahvīḥ samāḥ prapatann apratiṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.028a: mitho bhedād brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ; prajā duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ cāviśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:074.028c: evaṃ jñātvā kārya eveha vidvān; purohito naikavidyo nṛpeṇa
