GE07mbh_12_u:074.029c: agryo hi brāhmaṇaḥ proktaḥ sarvasyaiveha dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.030a: pūrvaṃ hi brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭā iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.031a: tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ prasṛtāgrabhuk
GE07mbh_12_u:074.031c: sarvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca nivedyaṃ tasya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:074.032a: avaśyam etat kartavyaṃ rājñā balavatāpi hi
GE07mbh_12_u:074.032c: brahma vardhayati kṣatraṃ kṣatrato brahma vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:074.032d-0183_01: evaṃ rājñā viśeṣeṇa pūjyā vai brāhmaṇāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:075.001c: yogakṣemaś ca rājño 'pi samāyattaḥ purohite yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:075.001d-0185_04: brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarvasya kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:075.001d-0185_05: yogakṣemo hi rāṣṭrasya tābhyām āyatta eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:075.002a: yatādṛṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ brahma prajānāṃ śamayaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:075.002c: dṛṣṭaṃ ca rājā bāhubhyāṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:075.005c: te balāny avamṛdnantaḥ prācaraṃs tasya nairṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.006a: sa hanyamāne sainye sve mucukundo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.007a: tata ugraṃ tapas taptvā vasiṣṭho brahmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.007c: rakṣāṃsy apāvadhīt tatra panthānaṃ cāpy avindata
GE07mbh_12_u:075.009a: tvatto hi balinaḥ pūrve rājānaḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.009c: na caivaṃ samavartaṃs te yathā tvam iha vartase
GE07mbh_12_u:075.010a: te khalv api kṛtāstrāś ca balavantaś ca bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.011a: yady asti bāhuvīryaṃ te tad darśayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:075.013c: pṛthag balavidhānaṃ ca tal lokaṃ parirakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:075.015c: tathā ca māṃ pravartantaṃ garhayasy alakādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:075.016c: nāhaṃ rājyam anirdiṣṭaṃ kasmai cid vidadhāmy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:075.017a: nācchinde cāpi nirdiṣṭam iti jānīhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:075.017c: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ vīra maddattām akhilām imām
GE07mbh_12_u:075.018a: nāhaṃ rājyaṃ bhavaddattaṃ bhoktum icchāmi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:075.019a: tato vaiśravaṇo rājā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:075.021a: evaṃ yo brahmavid rājā brahmapūrvaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:075.021c: jayaty avijitām urvīṃ yaśaś ca mahad aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:075.022a: nityodako brāhmaṇaḥ syān nityaśastraś ca kṣatriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:075.022c: tayor hi sarvam āyattaṃ yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:075.022d-0187_01: yaśaś ca tejaś ca mahīṃ ca kṛtsnāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.001c: puṇyāṃś ca lokāñ jayati tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:076.002a: dānaśīlo bhaved rājā yajñaśīlaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:076.003a: sarvāś caiva prajā nityaṃ rājā dharmeṇa pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:076.004a: rājñā hi pūjito dharmas tataḥ sarvatra pūjyate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.004c: yad yad ācarate rājā tat prajānāṃ hi rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.005a: nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca bhaven mṛtyur ivāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:076.005c: nihanyāt sarvato dasyūn na kāmāt kasya cit kṣamet
GE07mbh_12_u:076.006a: yaṃ hi dharmaṃ carantīha prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.006c: caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya rājā bhārata vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:076.007a: yad adhīte yad yajate yad dadāti yad arcati
GE07mbh_12_u:076.007c: rājā caturthabhāk tasya prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:076.008a: yad rāṣṭre 'kuśalaṃ kiṃ cid rājño 'rakṣayataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.008c: caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:076.009a: apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo 'rdham iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.009e: tādṛśāt kilbiṣād rājā śṛṇu yena pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.010a: pratyāhartum aśakyaṃ syād dhanaṃ corair hṛtaṃ yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:076.011a: sarvavarṇaiḥ sadā rakṣyaṃ brahmasvaṃ brāhmaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:076.011c: na stheyaṃ viṣaye teṣu yo 'pakuryād dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:076.012a: brahmasve rakṣyamāṇe hi sarvaṃ bhavati rakṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:076.012c: teṣāṃ prasāde nirvṛtte kṛtakṛtyo bhaven nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.013a: parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.014a: na hi kāmātmanā rājñā satataṃ śaṭhabuddhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:076.015a: nāhaṃ rājyasukhānveṣī rājyam icchāmy api kṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:076.015c: dharmārthaṃ rocaye rājyaṃ dharmaś cātra na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.016a: tad alaṃ mama rājyena yatra dharmo na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.018a: vedāhaṃ tava yā buddhir ānṛśaṃsyaguṇaiva sā
GE07mbh_12_u:076.018c: na ca śuddhānṛśaṃsyena śakyaṃ mahad upāsitum
GE07mbh_12_u:076.019a: api tu tvā mṛduṃ dāntam atyāryam atidhārmikam
GE07mbh_12_u:076.019c: klībaṃ dharmaghṛṇāyuktaṃ na loko bahu manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.020c: naitad rājñām atho vṛttaṃ yathā tvaṃ sthātum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:076.022a: na hy etām āśiṣaṃ pāṇḍur na ca kunty anvayācata
GE07mbh_12_u:076.022c: na caitāṃ prājñatāṃ tāta yayā carasi medhayā
GE07mbh_12_u:076.023a: śauryaṃ balaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca pitā tava sadābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:076.023c: māhātmyaṃ balam audāryaṃ tava kunty anvayācata
GE07mbh_12_u:076.024a: nityaṃ svāhā svadhā nityam ubhe mānuṣadaivate
GE07mbh_12_u:076.024c: putreṣv āśāsate nityaṃ pitaro daivatāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:076.026a: kāle dhuri niyuktānāṃ vahatāṃ bhāra āhite
GE07mbh_12_u:076.026c: sīdatām api kaunteya na kīrtir avasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:076.027a: samantato viniyato vahaty askhalito hi yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.028c: dharmī gṛhī vā rājā vā brahmacāry atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.029a: alpaṃ tu sādhubhūyiṣṭhaṃ yat karmodāram eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:076.029c: kṛtam evākṛtāc chreyo na pāpīyo 'sty akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.030a: yadā kulīno dharmajñaḥ prāpnoty aiśvaryam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:076.032a: yaṃ hi vaidyāḥ kule jātā avṛttibhayapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.032c: prāpya tṛptāḥ pratiṣṭhanti dharmaḥ ko 'bhyadhikas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:076.033a: kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ svargyaṃ kā nv ataḥ prītir
GE07mbh_12_u:076.033c: kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaiśvaryaṃ brūhi me yadi manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:076.034a: yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ samyak kṣemaṃ vindanti tatkṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:076.034c: sa svargajittamo 'smākaṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:076.035a: tvam eva prītimāṃs tasmāt kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_12_u:076.035c: bhava rājā jaya svargaṃ sato rakṣāsato jahi
GE07mbh_12_u:076.036a: anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:076.037c: vatsalaṃ saṃvibhaktāram anu jīvantu tvāṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.003c: ete devasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:077.004c: ete kṣatrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:077.004d-0189_03: aiśvaryakāmā ye cāpi sāmiṣārthāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005c: ete vaiśyasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0001: mlecchadeśās tu ye ke cit pāpair adhyuṣitā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0002: gatvā tu brāhmaṇas tāṃś ca caṇḍālaḥ pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0003: vrātyān mlecchāṃś ca śūdrāṃś ca yājayitvā dvijādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0006: brāhmaṇo ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ mūḍhaḥ kṛtvā tu viplavam
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0007: kalpam ekaṃ kṛmiḥ so 'tha nānāviṣṭhāsu jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0008: vrātye mlecche tathā śūdre taskare patite 'śucau
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0009: kudeśe ca surāpe ca brahmaghne vṛṣalīpatau
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0010: anadhītiṣu sarvatra bhuñjāne yatra tatra vā
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0012: mitradruhi kṛtaghne ca goghne caiva kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0013: putraghātini śatrau ca na mantrān yojayed dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0014: sa teṣāṃ viplavaḥ prokto mantravidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0015: yadi vipro videśasthas tīrthayātrāṃ gato 'tha vā
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0016: yadi bhītaḥ prapanno vā kudeśaṃ śaucavarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0017: susaṃyataḥ śucir bhūtvā mantrān uccārayed dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0019: hīneṣv api prayuñjāno nāsau viplāvakaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.005d-009_0020: krūrakarmā sukarmā vā karmabhir vañcito 'tha vā
GE07mbh_12_u:077.006c: ete śūdrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:077.007c: tān sarvān dhārmiko rājā baliṃ viṣṭiṃ ca kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:077.009c: ṛte brahmasamebhyaś ca devakalpebhya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:077.010c: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:077.010d-0190_01: prāg uktāṃś cāpy anuktāṃś ca sarvāṃs tān dāpayet karān
GE07mbh_12_u:077.011a: vikarmasthās tu nopekṣyā jātu rājñā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:077.012a: yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.012c: rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante tadvido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.013a: avṛttyā yo bhavet steno vedavit snātakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:077.013c: rājan sa rājñā bhartavya iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.014a: sa cen no parivarteta kṛtavṛttiḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:077.014c: tato nirvāsanīyaḥ syāt tasmād deśāt sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:077.014d-0191_02: damaḥ satyaṃ tapo dānam etad brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:078.001c: kayā ca vṛttyā varteta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:078.002c: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:078.003a: vikarmasthāś ca nopekṣyā viprā rājñā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:078.004a: yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.004c: rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante kilbiṣaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:078.008a: na me steno janapade na kadaryo na madyapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.009a: na ca me brāhmaṇo 'vidvān nāvratī nāpy asomapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.010c: adhīte nāvratī kaś cin māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.013c: nādhyāpayanty adhīyante yajante na ca yājakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.016a: saṃvibhāgaṃ damaṃ śaucaṃ sauhṛdaṃ ca vyapāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.021c: svatantro jātu na krīḍe māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.022d-0192_01: kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mayā sarvaṃ rājyasthenāpi kāryavat
GE07mbh_12_u:078.023a: nāvajānāmy ahaṃ vṛddhān na vaidyān na tapasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.024c: svāmī sarvasya rājyasya śrīmān mama purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.025a: dānena divyān abhivāñchāmi lokān; satyenātho brāhmaṇānāṃ ca guptyā
GE07mbh_12_u:078.025c: śuśrūṣayā cāpi gurūn upaimi; na me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.026a: na me rāṣṭre vidhavā brahmabandhur; na brāhmaṇaḥ kṛpaṇo nota coraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.026c: na pārajāyī na ca pāpakarmā; na me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.027a: na me śastrair anirbhinnam aṅge dvyaṅgulam antaram
GE07mbh_12_u:078.028a: gobrāhmaṇe ca yajñe ca nityaṃ svastyayanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:078.028c: āśāsate janā rāṣṭre māmakāntaram āviśaḥ rākṣasa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_01: nārīṇāṃ vyabhicārāc ca anyāyāc ca mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_02: viprāṇāṃ karmadoṣāc ca prajānāṃ jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_03: avṛṣṭir mārako rogaḥ satataṃ kṣudbhayāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_04: vigrahaś ca sadā tasmin deśe bhavati dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_06: bhayam utpadyate tatra yatra viprāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_08: mānavān na jighāṃsanti yatra nāryaḥ pativratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_09: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yatra śūdrāś ca dhārmikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_10: nānāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ tatra na durbhikṣaṃ na vibhramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_11: dhārmiko yatra bhūpālo na tatrāsti parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029-0194_12: utpātā na ca dṛśyante na divyā na ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.029c: tasmāt prāpnuhi kaikeya gṛhān svasti vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:078.030a: yeṣāṃ gobrāhmaṇā rakṣyāḥ prajā rakṣyāś ca kekaya
GE07mbh_12_u:078.030c: na rakṣobhyo bhayaṃ teṣāṃ kuta eva tu mānuṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:078.031a: yeṣāṃ purogamā viprā yeṣāṃ brahmabalaṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:078.031c: priyātithyās tathā dārās te vai svargajito narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.032a: tasmād dvijātīn rakṣeta te hi rakṣanti rakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:078.032c: āśīr eṣāṃ bhaved rājñāṃ rāṣṭraṃ samyak pravardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:078.034a: ya evaṃ vartate rājā paurajānapadeṣv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:079.001c: kathaṃ cid vaiśyadharmeṇa jīved vā brāhmaṇo na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:079.003a: kāni paṇyāni vikrīṇan svargalokān na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:079.004a: surā lavaṇam ity eva tilān kesariṇaḥ paśūn
GE07mbh_12_u:079.004c: ṛṣabhān madhu māṃsaṃ ca kṛtānnaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:079.005c: eteṣāṃ vikrayāt tāta brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:079.006a: ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.006c: dhenur yajñaś ca somaś ca na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:079.008a: vayaṃ siddham aśiṣyāmo bhavān sādhayatām idam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.008c: evaṃ samīkṣya nimayan nādharmo 'sti kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:079.009a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā dharmaḥ purātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.010c: rucite vartate dharmo na balāt saṃpravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:079.011c: ṛṣīṇām itareṣāṃ ca sādhu cedam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.012a: atha tāta yadā sarvāḥ śastram ādadate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.013a: rājā trātā na loke syāt kiṃ tadā syāt parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.013c: etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi vistareṇa pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:079.014a: dānena tapasā yajñair adroheṇa damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:079.015a: teṣāṃ ye vedabalinas ta utthāya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.017a: yadā tu vijayī rājā kṣemaṃ rāṣṭre 'bhisaṃdadhet
GE07mbh_12_u:079.018a: unmaryāde pravṛtte tu dasyubhiḥ saṃkare kṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:079.018c: sarve varṇā na duṣyeyuḥ śastravanto yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:079.019a: atha cet sarvataḥ kṣatraṃ praduṣyed brāhmaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:079.019c: kas tasya brāhmaṇas trātā ko dharmaḥ kiṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.020a: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śastreṇa ca balena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:079.020c: amāyayā māyayā ca niyantavyaṃ tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:079.021c: brahmaiva saṃniyantṛ syāt kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.022a: adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.022c: teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:079.023c: kṣatraṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ dveṣṭi tadā śāmyanti te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.024c: samudīrṇāny ajeyāni tejāṃsi ca balāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:079.026a: ye tatra yuddhaṃ kurvanti tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.026b-0195_01: brāhmaṇān parirakṣanti teṣāṃ lokā bhavanti ke
GE07mbh_12_u:079.026c: brāhmaṇān parirakṣanto dharmam ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:079.028c: anāśakāgnyor viśatāṃ śūrā yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:079.028e: evam evātmanas tyāgān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ vidur janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.029a: tebhyo namaś ca bhadraṃ ca ye śarīrāṇi juhvati
GE07mbh_12_u:079.029e: brahmalokajitaḥ svargyān vīrāṃs tān manur abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:079.030c: duṣkṛtaḥ sukṛtaś caiva tathā śastrahatā raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:079.031a: bhavaty adharmo dharmo hi dharmādharmāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:079.032a: maitrāḥ krūrāṇi kurvanto jayanti svargam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.032c: dharmyāḥ pāpāni kurvanto gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:079.033a: brāhmaṇas triṣu kāleṣu śastraṃ gṛhṇan na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:079.033b-0196_01: ātmatrāṇaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ parān dasyubhya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:079.035a: brāhmaṇo yadi vā vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:079.035c: dasyubhyo 'tha prajā rakṣed daṇḍaṃ dharmeṇa dhārayan
GE07mbh_12_u:079.036a: kāryaṃ kuryān na vā kuryāt saṃvāryo vā bhaven na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:079.036c: na sma śastraṃ grahītavyam anyatra kṣatrabandhutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.037a: apāre yo bhavet pāram aplave yaḥ plavo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:079.037c: śūdro vā yadi vāpy anyaḥ sarvathā mānam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:079.038a: yam āśritya narā rājan vartayeyur yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:079.039a: tam eva pūjayeraṃs te prītyā svam iva bāndhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:079.039c: mahad dhy abhīkṣṇaṃ kauravya kartā sanmānam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:079.040a: kim ukṣṇāvahatā kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dhenvā cāpy adugdhayā
GE07mbh_12_u:079.040c: vandhyayā bhāryayā ko 'rthaḥ ko 'rtho rājñāpy arakṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:079.041a: yathā dārumayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.041c: yathā hy anetraḥ śakaṭaḥ pathi kṣetraṃ yathoṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:079.042a: evaṃ brahmānadhīyānaṃ rājā yaś ca na rakṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:079.042c: na varṣati ca yo meghaḥ sarva ete nirarthakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:079.043a: nityaṃ yas tu sato rakṣed asataś ca nibarhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:079.043c: sa eva rājā kartavyas tena sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:080.001c: kathaṃvidhāś ca rājendra tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:080.002c: ādau chandāṃsi vijñāya dvijānāṃ śrutam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:080.003a: ye tv ekaratayo nityaṃ dhīrā nāpriyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.004a: yeṣv ānṛśaṃsyaṃ satyaṃ cāpy ahiṃsā tapa ārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:080.004c: adroho nābhimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.004d-0197_01: etair eva guṇair yuktāḥ kāryās te ṛtvijaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:080.004d-0198_01: yasminn etāni dṛśyante sa purohita ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:080.006c: ete mahartvijas tāta sarve mānyā yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:080.007c: idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyaṃ na kva cid vyavatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_12_u:080.008a: nedaṃ prati dhanaṃ śāstram āpaddharmam aśāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.008c: ājñā śāstrasya ghoreyaṃ na śaktiṃ samavekṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:080.009a: śraddhām ārabhya yaṣṭavyam ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.009c: mithyopetasya yajñasya kim u śraddhā kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:080.010a: na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:080.010c: kaś cin mahad avāpnoti mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:080.011c: na mantrā dakṣiṇāhīnās tārayanti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:080.012c: avaśyaṃ tāta yaṣṭavyaṃ tribhir varṇair yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:080.013a: somo rājā brāhmaṇānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.013c: taṃ ca vikretum icchanti na vṛthā vṛttir iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:080.013e: tena krītena dharmeṇa tato yajñaḥ pratāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:080.014a: ity evaṃ dharmataḥ khyātam ṛṣibhir dharmavādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.014c: pumān yajñaś ca somaś ca nyāyavṛtto yathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:080.014e: anyāyavṛttaḥ puruṣo na parasya na cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.015a: śarīraṃ yajñapātrāṇi ity eṣā śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.016a: tapo yajñād api śreṣṭham ity eṣā paramā śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.016c: tat te tapaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidvaṃs tad api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:080.017c: etat tapo vidur dhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:080.018c: avyavasthā ca sarvatra tad vai nāśanam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:080.019c: cittiḥ sruk cittam ājyaṃ ca pavitraṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:080.019d-0199_01: na śāṭhyaṃ na ca jihmatvaṃ kālo deśaś ca te daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:080.020a: sarvaṃ jihmaṃ mṛtyupadam ārjavaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:081.001a: yad apy alpataraṃ karma tad apy ekena duṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:081.002c: kīdṛśe viśvased rājā kīdṛśe nāpi viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:081.003a: caturvidhāni mitrāṇi rājñāṃ rājan bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:081.003c: sahārtho bhajamānaś ca sahajaḥ kṛtrimas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.004a: dharmātmā pañcamaṃ mitraṃ sa tu naikasya na dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.004c: yato dharmas tato vā syān madhyastho vā tato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.005a: yas tasyārtho na roceta na taṃ tasya prakāśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.005b-0200_01: mitrāṇāṃ prakṛtir nāsti tv amitrāṇāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:081.005b-0200_02: upakārād bhaven mitram apakārād bhaved ariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.005b-0200_03: yasyaiva hi manuṣyasya naro maraṇam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.005b-0200_04: tasya paryāgate kāle punar jīvitam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.006a: caturṇāṃ madhyamau śreṣṭhau nityaṃ śaṅkyau tathāparau
GE07mbh_12_u:081.006c: sarve nityaṃ śaṅkitavyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ kāryam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.007a: na hi rājñā pramādo vai kartavyo mitrarakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:081.007c: pramādinaṃ hi rājānaṃ lokāḥ paribhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:081.008a: asādhuḥ sādhutām eti sādhur bhavati dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.008c: ariś ca mitraṃ bhavati mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.009a: anityacittaḥ puruṣas tasmin ko jātu viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:081.009c: tasmāt pradhānaṃ yat kāryaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:081.010c: aviśvāsaś ca sarvatra mṛtyunā na viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:081.011c: yasmin karoti viśvāsam icchatas tasya jīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.012a: tasmād viśvasitavyaṃ ca śaṅkitavyaṃ ca keṣu cit
GE07mbh_12_u:081.012c: eṣā nītigatis tāta lakṣmīś caiva sanātanī
GE07mbh_12_u:081.013a: yaṃ manyeta mamābhāvād imam arthāgamaḥ spṛśet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.013c: nityaṃ tasmāc chaṅkitavyam amitraṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.014a: yasya kṣetrād apy udakaṃ kṣetram anyasya gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.015a: tathaivāty udakād bhītas tasya bhedanam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:081.015c: yam evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ vidyāt tam amitraṃ vinirdiśet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.016a: yaḥ samṛddhyā na tuṣyeta kṣaye dīnataro bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.017a: yaṃ manyeta mamābhāvād asyābhāvo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:081.017c: tasmin kurvīta viśvāsaṃ yathā pitari vai tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.018a: taṃ śaktyā vardhamānaś ca sarvataḥ paribṛṃhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.018c: nityaṃ kṣatād vārayati yo dharmeṣv api karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:081.019c: ye tasya kṣatam icchanti te tasya ripavaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.020c: yat syād evaṃvidhaṃ mitraṃ tad ātmasamam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:081.021c: kulīnaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ sa te syāt pratyanantaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.022c: yo mānito 'mānito vā na saṃdūṣyet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:081.023a: ṛtvig vā yadi vācāryaḥ sakhā vātyantasaṃstutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.023c: gṛhe vased amātyas te yaḥ syāt paramapūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.024a: sa te vidyāt paraṃ mantraṃ prakṛtiṃ cārthadharmayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.024c: viśvāsas te bhavet tatra yathā pitari vai tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.025a: naiva dvau na trayaḥ kāryā na mṛṣyeran parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:081.025c: ekārthād eva bhūtānāṃ bhedo bhavati sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.026a: kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syād yaś ca syāt samaye sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.026c: samarthān yaś ca na dveṣṭi samarthān kurute ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.027a: yo na kāmād bhayāl lobhāt krodhād vā dharmam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:081.027c: dakṣaḥ paryāptavacanaḥ sa te syāt pratyanantaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.028a: śūraś cāryaś ca vidvāṃś ca pratipattiviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.029a: ete hy amātyāḥ kartavyāḥ sarvakarmasv avasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:081.030c: yuktā mahatsu kāryeṣu śreyāṃsy utpādayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:081.031a: ete karmāṇi kurvanti spardhamānā mithaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.032a: jñātibhyaś caiva bibhyethā mṛtyor iva yataḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.032c: uparājeva rājardhiṃ jñātir na sahate sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.034a: ajñātitā nātisukhā nāvajñeyās tv ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:081.035a: nikṛtasya narair anyair jñātir eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:081.035c: nānyair nikāraṃ sahate jñāter jñātiḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:081.036a: ātmānam eva jānāti nikṛtaṃ bāndhavair api
GE07mbh_12_u:081.036c: teṣu santi guṇāś caiva nairguṇyaṃ teṣu lakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:081.037c: ubhayaṃ jñātilokeṣu dṛśyate sādhv asādhu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:081.038a: tān mānayet pūjayec ca nityaṃ vācā ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:081.038c: kuryāc ca priyam etebhyo nāpriyaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:081.039c: na hi doṣo guṇo veti nispṛktas teṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:081.041c: mitreṣv amitreṣv aiśvarye ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:082.001c: mitreṣv amitreṣv api ca kathaṃ bhāvo vibhāvyate
GE07mbh_12_u:082.003c: apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpi nātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:082.004a: sa te sauhṛdam āsthāya kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:082.004c: kṛtsnāṃ ca buddhiṃ saṃprekṣya saṃpṛcche tridivaṃgama
GE07mbh_12_u:082.005a: dāsyam aiśvaryavādena jñātīnāṃ vai karomy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:082.006a: araṇīm agnikāmo vā mathnāti hṛdayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:082.006c: vācā duruktaṃ devarṣe tan me dahati nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:082.007a: balaṃ saṃkarṣaṇe nityaṃ saukumāryaṃ punar gade
GE07mbh_12_u:082.009a: yasya na syur na vai sa syād yasya syuḥ kṛcchram eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:082.009c: dvābhyāṃ nivārito nityaṃ vṛṇomy ekataraṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:082.010a: syātāṃ yasyāhukākrūrau kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:082.010c: yasya vāpi na tau syātāṃ kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:082.012c: vaktum arhasi yac chreyo jñātīnām ātmanas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:082.013a: āpado dvividhāḥ kṛṣṇa bāhyāś cābhyantarāś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:082.014a: seyam ābhyantarā tubhyam āpat kṛcchrā svakarmajā
GE07mbh_12_u:082.015a: arthahetor hi kāmād vādvārā bībhatsayāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:082.016c: na śakyaṃ punar ādātuṃ vāntam annam iva tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:082.017a: babhrūgrasenayo rājyaṃ nāptuṃ śakyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:082.018a: tac cet sidhyet prayatnena kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:082.018c: mahākṣayavyayaṃ vā syād vināśo vā punar bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:082.020a: anāyasaṃ mune śastraṃ mṛdu vidyām ahaṃ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:082.022a: jñātīnāṃ vaktukāmānāṃ kaṭūni ca laghūni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:082.022c: girā tvaṃ hṛdayaṃ vācaṃ śamayasva manāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:082.023c: mahatīṃ dhuram ādatte tām udyamyorasā vaha
GE07mbh_12_u:082.024a: sarva eva guruṃ bhāram anaḍvān vahate same
GE07mbh_12_u:082.024c: durge pratīkaḥ sugavo bhāraṃ vahati durvaham
GE07mbh_12_u:082.025c: yathā tvāṃ prāpya notsīded ayaṃ saṃghas tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:082.027c: jñātīnām avināśaḥ syād yathā kṛṣṇa tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:082.028a: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:082.029c: tvayy āsaktā mahābāho lokā lokeśvarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:082.030a: upāsate hi tvadbuddhim ṛṣayaś cāpi mādhava
GE07mbh_12_u:082.030c: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jānīṣe tvaṃ gatāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:082.030e: tvām āsādya yaduśreṣṭham edhante jñātinaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:083.001a: eṣā prathamato vṛttir dvitīyāṃ śṛṇu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:083.001c: yaḥ kaś cij janayed arthaṃ rājñā rakṣyaḥ sa mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.002a: hriyamāṇam amātyena bhṛto vā yadi vābhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.003a: śrotavyaṃ tasya ca raho rakṣyaś cāmātyato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:083.003c: amātyā hy upahantāraṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ghnanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:083.004c: sametya sarve bādhante sa vinaśyaty arakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.005c: muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīyaḥ kausalyaṃ yad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:083.007a: sa kākaṃ pañjare baddhvā viṣayaṃ kṣemadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.007c: pūrvaṃ paryacarad yuktaḥ pravṛttyarthī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.008a: adhīye vāyasīṃ vidyāṃ śaṃsanti mama vāyasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.008c: anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:083.009a: iti rāṣṭre paripatan bahuśaḥ puruṣaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:083.010a: sa buddhvā tasya rāṣṭrasya vyavasāyaṃ hi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.010c: rājayuktāpacārāṃś ca sarvān buddhvā tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.011a: tam eva kākam ādāya rājānaṃ draṣṭum āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:083.012a: sa sma kausalyam āgamya rājāmātyam alaṃkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.012c: prāha kākasya vacanād amutredaṃ tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.013a: asau cāsau ca jānīte rājakośas tvayā hṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.013c: evam ākhyāti kāko 'yaṃ tac chīghram anugamyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:083.014a: tathānyān api sa prāha rājakośaharān sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.014c: na cāsya vacanaṃ kiṃ cid akṛtaṃ śrūyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:083.015c: tam atikramya suptasya niśi kākam apothayan
GE07mbh_12_u:083.016a: vāyasaṃ tu vinirbhinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāṇena pañjare
GE07mbh_12_u:083.017a: rājaṃs tvām abhayaṃ yāce prabhuṃ prāṇadhaneśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:083.017c: anujñātas tvayā brūyāṃ vacanaṃ tvatpuro hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.018c: ayaṃ tavārthaṃ harate yo brūyād akṣamānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.018d-0201_01: hriyate hi mahārthaś ca puruṣe vikramaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:083.021a: taṃ rājā pratyuvācedaṃ yan mā kiṃ cid bhavān vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:083.021c: kasmād ahaṃ na kṣameyam ākāṅkṣann ātmano hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.022c: kariṣyāmi hi te vākyaṃ yad yan māṃ vipra vakṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:083.023a: jñātvā nayān apāyāṃś ca bhṛtyatas te bhayāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:083.024a: prāg evoktaś ca doṣo 'yam ācāryair nṛpasevinām
GE07mbh_12_u:083.024c: agatīkagatir hy eṣā yā rājñā saha jīvikā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.025a: āśīviṣaiś ca tasyāhuḥ saṃgataṃ yasya rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.025c: bahumitrāś ca rājāno bahvamitrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:083.026c: athaiṣām ekato rājan muhūrtād eva bhīr bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:083.027c: na tu pramādaḥ kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cid bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.028a: pramādād dhi skhaled rājā skhalite nāsti jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.031a: devateva hi sarvārthān kuryād rājā prasāditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.031c: vaiśvānara iva kruddhaḥ samūlam api nirdahet
GE07mbh_12_u:083.031e: iti rājan mayaḥ prāha vartate ca tathaiva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:083.032a: atha bhūyāṃsam evārthaṃ kariṣyāmi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.033c: na ca me 'tra bhavān garhyo na ca yeṣāṃ bhavān priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.033e: hitāhitāṃs tu budhyethā mā parokṣamatir bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:083.034a: ye tv ādānaparā eva vasanti bhavato gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:083.035a: ye vā bhavadvināśena rājyam icchanty anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:083.036a: teṣām ahaṃ bhayād rājan gamiṣyāmy anyam āśramam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.036c: tair hi me saṃdhito bāṇaḥ kāke nipatitaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:083.037a: chadmanā mama kākaś ca gamito yamasādanam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.037c: dṛṣṭaṃ hy etan mayā rājaṃs tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.038c: kākena baḍiśenemām atārṣaṃ tvām ahaṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_12_u:083.040a: agninā tāmasaṃ durgaṃ naubhir āpyaṃ ca gamyate
GE07mbh_12_u:083.041c: neha viśvasituṃ śakyaṃ bhavatāpi kuto mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.042a: ato nāyaṃ śubho vāsas tulye sadasatī iha
GE07mbh_12_u:083.042c: vadho hy evātra sukṛte duṣkṛte na ca saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.043a: nyāyato duṣkṛte ghātaḥ sukṛte syāt kathaṃ vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.043c: neha yuktaṃ ciraṃ sthātuṃ javenāto vrajed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.044a: sītā nāma nadī rājan plavo yasyāṃ nimajjati
GE07mbh_12_u:083.045c: asatām iva te bhāvo vartate na satām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:083.045e: āśīviṣaiḥ parivṛtaḥ kūpas tvam iva pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:083.045f-0202_01: kriyāvṛttiḥ parivṛtaḥ kva vā gacchati duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.045f-0202_02: tathāhaṃ kākaghātena kṛtas tvam asi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:083.046c: nadī madhurapānīyā yathā rājaṃs tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:083.047c: tatas taṃ saṃvṛṇoty eva tam atītya ca vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:083.048c: tathopamā hy amātyās te rājaṃs tān pariśodhaya
GE07mbh_12_u:083.051a: kaccij jitendriyo rājā kaccid abhyantarā jitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.051c: kaccid eṣāṃ priyo rājā kaccid rājñaḥ priyāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.052c: tasya me rocase rājan kṣudhitasyeva bhojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.053a: amātyā me na rocante vitṛṣṇasya yathodakam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.053c: bhavato 'rthakṛd ity eva mayi doṣo hi taiḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.053e: vidyate kāraṇaṃ nānyad iti me nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.054a: na hi teṣām ahaṃ drugdhas tat teṣāṃ doṣavad gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.054c: arer hi durhatād bheyaṃ bhagnapṛṣṭhād ivoragāt rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:083.055c: pūjito brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha bhūyo vasa gṛhe mama
GE07mbh_12_u:083.056a: ye tvāṃ brāhmaṇa necchanti na te vatsyanti me gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:083.056c: bhavataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ yad idānīm anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:083.057a: yathā syād duṣkṛto daṇḍo yathā ca sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.057c: tathā samīkṣya bhagavañ śreyase viniyuṅkṣva mām
GE07mbh_12_u:083.058a: adarśayann imaṃ doṣam ekaikaṃ durbalaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:083.058c: tataḥ kāraṇam ājñāya puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ jahi
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059a: ekadoṣā hi bahavo mṛdnīyur api kaṇṭakān
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_01: arthe sarvaṃ jagad baddham arthena ca nibadhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_02: arthe darpo manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād arthaṃ virocaya
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_04: sa tasya doṣān udbhāvya tasyārthaṃ grāhayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_05: sāmapūrvaṃ ca keṣāṃ cid bhedena ca parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_06: vairaṃ kāraya bhūpāla paścād daṇḍaṃ prayojaya
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059b-0203_07: bilvena ca yathā bilvam ākāraṃ chādya buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:083.059c: mantrabhedabhayād rājaṃs tasmād etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:083.060a: vayaṃ tu brāhmaṇā nāma mṛdudaṇḍāḥ kṛpālavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.060c: svasti cecchāmi bhavataḥ pareṣāṃ ca yathātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.061a: rājann ātmānam ācakṣe saṃbandhī bhavato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:083.062a: pituḥ sakhā ca bhavataḥ saṃmataḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.062c: vyāpanne bhavato rājye rājan pitari saṃsthite
GE07mbh_12_u:083.063a: sarvakāmān parityajya tapas taptaṃ tadā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.063c: snehāt tvāṃ prabravīmy etan mā bhūyo vibhramed iti
GE07mbh_12_u:083.064a: ubhe dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasukhe rājyaṃ prāpya yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:083.065a: tato rājakule nāndī saṃjajñe bhūyasī punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:083.067a: hitaṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyo 'nvaśiṣan mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:083.067c: tathā ca kṛtavān rājā yathoktaṃ tena bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:084.001c: śaktāḥ kathayituṃ samyak te tava syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:084.001d-0204_01: sabhāsadaḥ sahāyāś ca suhṛdaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:084.002a: atyāḍhyāṃś cātiśūrāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca bahuśrutān
GE07mbh_12_u:084.002c: susaṃtuṣṭāṃś ca kaunteya mahotsāhāṃś ca karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:084.003a: etān sahāyāṃl lipsethāḥ sarvāsv āpatsu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:084.003c: kulīnaḥ pūjito nityaṃ na hi śaktiṃ nigūhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.004a: prasannaṃ hy aprasannaṃ vā pīḍitaṃ hṛtam eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:084.004c: āvartayati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad eko hy anupālitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.005c: pragalbhāś cānuraktāś ca te tava syuḥ paricchadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.006a: dauṣkuleyāś ca lubdhāś ca nṛśaṃsā nirapatrapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.006c: te tvāṃ tāta niṣeveyur yāvad ārdrakapāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.007c: yān arthabhājo manyethās te te syuḥ sukhabhāginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.008c: na tvāṃ nityārthino jahyur akṣudrāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.009a: anāryā ye na jānanti samayaṃ mandacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.009b-0205_01: paricchadās tathāmātyā nedṛśāḥ syuḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:084.010a: naikam icched gaṇaṃ hitvā syāc ced anyataragrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.010c: yas tv eko bahubhiḥ śreyān kāmaṃ tena gaṇaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:084.011a: śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ hy etad vikramo yasya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:084.011c: kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.012a: samarthān pūjayed yaś ca nāspardhyaiḥ spardhate ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.012c: na ca kāmād bhayāt krodhāl lobhād vā dharmam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:084.013c: sa te mantrasahāyaḥ syāt sarvāvasthaṃ parīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.014c: śūraḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyaś ca śreyasaḥ pārtha lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:084.018a: yodhāḥ srauvās tathā maulās tathaivānye 'py avaskṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.019a: yeṣāṃ vainayikī buddhiḥ prakṛtā caiva śobhanā
GE07mbh_12_u:084.019c: tejo dhairyaṃ kṣamā śaucam anurāga sthitir dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.022c: nityam artheṣu sarveṣu rājā kurvīta mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.023a: hīnatejā hy asaṃhṛṣṭo naiva jātu vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.026a: yo vā hy asthirasaṃkalpo buddhimān āgatāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.026c: upāyajño 'pi nālaṃ sa karma yāpayituṃ ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:084.028a: mantriṇy ananurakte tu viśvāso na hi vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:084.029a: vyathayed dhi sa rājānaṃ mantribhiḥ sahito 'nṛjuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.030c: vācā kṣipati saṃrabdhas tataḥ paścāt prasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.031c: mantriṇāṃ ca bhavet krodho visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.032a: yas tu saṃharate tāni bhartuḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:084.033a: anṛjus tv anurakto 'pi saṃpannaś cetarair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.033c: rājñaḥ prajñānayukto 'pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.034a: yo 'mitraiḥ saha saṃbaddho na paurān bahu manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:084.034c: sa suhṛt tādṛśo rājño na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.035c: sa suhṛt krodhano lubdho na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.036c: satkṛtaḥ saṃvibhakto vā na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.036d-0206_02: satkṛtaḥ sthāpitaḥ so 'pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.037a: yas tv alpenāpi kāryeṇa sakṛd ākṣārito bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:084.037c: punar anyair guṇair yukto na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.038a: kṛtaprajñaś ca medhāvī budho jānapadaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.038c: sarvakarmasu yaḥ śuddhaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.039c: suhṛd ātmasamo rājñaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.040c: pitṛpaitāmaho yaḥ syāt sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.041c: mantravit kālavic chūraḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.042a: sarvalokaṃ samaṃ śaktaḥ sāntvena kurute vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:084.042c: tasmai mantraḥ prayoktavyo daṇḍam ādhitsatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:084.043c: yoddhā nayavipaścic ca sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:084.044a: tasmāt sarvair guṇair etair upapannāḥ supūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.044c: mantriṇaḥ prakṛtijñāḥ syus tryavarā mahad īpsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.045a: svāsu prakṛtiṣu chidraṃ lakṣayeran parasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:084.045c: mantriṇo mantramūlaṃ hi rājño rāṣṭraṃ vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:084.046a: nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:084.046c: gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.047a: mantragrāhā hi rājyasya mantriṇo ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.048c: svāminaṃ tv anuvartanti vṛttyartham iha mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.049a: sa vinīya madakrodhau mānam īrṣyāṃ ca nirvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.050a: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vividhaṃ vimarśaṃ; budhyeta cittaṃ viniveśya tatra
GE07mbh_12_u:084.050c: svaniścayaṃ taṃ paraniścayaṃ ca; nivedayed uttaramantrakāle
GE07mbh_12_u:084.051a: dharmārthakāmajñam upetya pṛcched; yukto guruṃ brāhmaṇam uttamārtham
GE07mbh_12_u:084.051c: niṣṭhā kṛtā tena yadā saha syāt; taṃ tatra mārgaṃ praṇayed asaktam
GE07mbh_12_u:084.052a: evaṃ sadā mantrayitavyam āhur; ye mantratattvārthaviniścayajñāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:084.052c: tasmāt tvam evaṃ praṇayeḥ sadaiva; mantraṃ prajāsaṃgrahaṇe samartham
GE07mbh_12_u:084.053a: na vāmanāḥ kubjakṛśā na khañjā; nāndhā jaḍāḥ strī na napuṃsakaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:084.053c: na cātra tiryaṅ na puro na paścān; nordhvaṃ na cādhaḥ pracareta kaś cit
GE07mbh_12_u:084.054a: āruhya vātāyanam eva śūnyaṃ; sthalaṃ prakāśaṃ kuśakāśahīnam
GE07mbh_12_u:084.054c: vāgaṅgadoṣān parihṛtya mantraṃ; saṃmantrayet kāryam ahīnakālam
GE07mbh_12_u:085.001c: bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādaṃ śakrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:085.002a: kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ brahman puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:085.003a: sāntvam ekapadaṃ śakra puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:085.005a: yo hi nābhāṣate kiṃ cit satataṃ bhrukuṭīmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:085.005c: dveṣyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sa sāntvam iha nācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:085.006a: yas tu pūrvam abhiprekṣya pūrvam evābhibhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:085.008a: adātā hy api bhūtānāṃ madhurām īrayan giram
GE07mbh_12_u:085.008c: sarvalokam imaṃ śakra sāntvena kurute vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:085.009a: tasmāt sāntvaṃ prakartavyaṃ daṇḍam ādhitsatām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:085.009c: phalaṃ ca janayaty evaṃ na cāsyodvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:085.010a: sukṛtasya hi sāntvasya ślakṣṇasya madhurasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:085.010c: samyag āsevyamānasya tulyaṃ jātu na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:085.011a: ity uktaḥ kṛtavān sarvaṃ tathā śakraḥ purodhasā
GE07mbh_12_u:085.011c: tathā tvam api kaunteya samyag etat samācara
GE07mbh_12_u:086.001a: kathaṃ svid iha rājendra pālayan pārthivaḥ prajāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:087.014a: śaṇaṃ sarjarasaṃ dhānyam āyudhāni śarāṃs tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:088.010f-0211_03: rakṣābhyadhikṛtā nāma tebhyo rakṣed imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:088.011a: vikrayaṃ krayam adhvānaṃ bhaktaṃ ca saparivyayam

GE07mbh_12_u:088.012a: utpattiṃ dānavṛttiṃ ca śilpaṃ saṃprekṣya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:088.013c: yathā yathā na hīyeraṃs tathā kuryān mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:088.014a: phalaṃ karma ca saṃprekṣya tataḥ sarvaṃ prakalpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:088.014c: phalaṃ karma ca nirhetu na kaś cit saṃpravartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:088.015a: yathā rājā ca kartā ca syātāṃ karmaṇi bhāginau
GE07mbh_12_u:088.015c: samavekṣya tathā rājñā praṇeyāḥ satataṃ karāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:088.016a: nocchindyād ātmano mūlaṃ pareṣāṃ vāpi tṛṣṇayā
GE07mbh_12_u:088.017c: pradviṣṭasya kutaḥ śreyaḥ saṃpriyo labhate priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:088.018c: bhṛto vatso jātabalaḥ pīḍāṃ sahati bhārata

GE07mbh_12_u:088.023a: bāhyaṃ janaṃ bhedayitvā bhoktavyo madhyamaḥ sukham

GE07mbh_12_u:088.036c: prabhāvayati rāṣṭraṃ ca vyavahāraṃ kṛṣiṃ tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:088.038c: na hy ataḥ sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid dhanam asti yudhiṣṭhira

GE07mbh_12_u:089.005c: vyāghrīva ca haret putram adaṣṭvā mā pated iti
GE07mbh_12_u:089.005d-0212_01: yathā śalyakavān ākhuḥ padaṃ dhūnayate sadā

GE07mbh_12_u:089.017d-0213_01: bhoktā tasya tu pāpasya sukṛtasya yathā tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:090.001a: vanaspatīn bhakṣyaphalān na chindyur viṣaye tava

GE07mbh_12_u:090.004c: kasminn idānīṃ maryādām ayaṃ lokaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:090.005a: asaṃśayaṃ nivarteta na ced vakṣyaty ataḥ param

GE07mbh_12_u:090.007c: ūrdhvaṃ caiva trayī vidyā sā bhūtān bhāvayaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:090.009a: śatrūñ jahi prajā rakṣa yajasva kratubhir nṛpa

GE07mbh_12_u:090.015e: kaccid rocej janapade kaccid rāṣṭre ca me yaśaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:090.017c: ye ca tvābhipraśaṃseyur nindeyur atha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:090.018a: ekāntena hi sarveṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tāta rocitum
GE07mbh_12_u:090.019c: kathaṃ syād adhikaḥ kaś cit sa tu bhuñjīta mānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:090.020a: ye carā hy acarān adyur adaṃṣṭrān daṃṣṭriṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:090.020c: āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagā bhujagān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:090.021a: etebhyaś cāpramattaḥ syāt sadā yatto yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:090.022a: kaccit te vaṇijo rāṣṭre nodvijante karārditāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:090.023a: kaccit kṛṣikarā rāṣṭraṃ na jahaty atipīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:090.023c: ye vahanti dhuraṃ rājñāṃ saṃbharantītarān api
GE07mbh_12_u:090.024a: ito dattena jīvanti devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:090.025a: eṣā te rāṣṭravṛttiś ca rāṣṭraguptiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:090.025c: etam evārtham āśritya bhūyo vakṣyāmi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:091.002c: tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:091.003a: dharmāya rājā bhavati na kāmakaraṇāya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:091.003c: māndhātar evaṃ jānīhi rājā lokasya rakṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:091.004a: rājā carati vai dharmaṃ devatvāyaiva gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.004c: na ced dharmaṃ sa carati narakāyaiva gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.005a: dharme tiṣṭhanti bhūtāni dharmo rājani tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.005c: taṃ rājā sādhu yaḥ śāsti sa rājā pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.006c: devāś ca garhāṃ gacchanti dharmo nāstīti cocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.007c: tad eva maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008c: bhayam āhur divārātraṃ yadā pāpo na vāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008d-0217_01: mamedam iti nedaṃ ca sādhūnāṃ tāta dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008d-0217_02: naiva vyavasthā bhavati yadā pāpo na vāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008d-0217_03: naiva bhāryā na paśavo na kṣetraṃ na niveśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008d-0217_05: devāḥ pūjāṃ na jānanti na svadhāṃ pitaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:091.008d-0217_06: na pūjyante hy atithayo yadā pāpo na vāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.009c: na yajñāṃs tanvate viprā yadā pāpo na vāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.010a: vadhyānām iva sarveṣāṃ mano bhavati vihvalam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.010c: manuṣyāṇāṃ mahārāja yadā pāpo na vāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.011a: ubhau lokāv abhiprekṣya rājānam ṛṣayaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.011c: asṛjan sumahad bhūtam ayaṃ dharmo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.012a: yasmin dharmo virājeta taṃ rājānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.012c: yasmin vilīyate dharmas taṃ devā vṛṣalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.013a: vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmo yas tasya kurute hy alam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.013c: vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devās tasmād dharmaṃ na lopayet
GE07mbh_12_u:091.014c: tasmin hrasati hīyante tasmād dharmaṃ pravardhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:091.015a: dhanāt sravati dharmo hi dhāraṇād veti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.016a: prabhavārthaṃ hi bhūtānāṃ dharmaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:091.017a: tasmād dhi rājaśārdūla dharmaḥ śreṣṭha iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.017c: sa rājā yaḥ prajāḥ śāsti sādhukṛt puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.019a: dharmasya brāhmaṇā yonis tasmāt tān pūjayet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:091.019c: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca māndhātaḥ kāmān kuryād amatsarī
GE07mbh_12_u:091.020a: teṣāṃ hy akāmakaraṇād rājñaḥ saṃjāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.020c: mitrāṇi ca na vardhante tathāmitrībhavanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:091.020d-0218_01: śatravo hy api mitrāṇi tadā mitraṃ bhavanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:091.021a: brāhmaṇān vai tadāsūyād yadā vairocano baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.021c: athāsmāc chrīr apākrāmad yāsminn āsīt pratāpinī
GE07mbh_12_u:091.022c: atha so 'nvatapat paścāc chriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdare
GE07mbh_12_u:091.023c: tasmād budhyasva māndhātar mā tvā jahyāt pratāpinī
GE07mbh_12_u:091.024a: darpo nāma śriyaḥ putro jajñe 'dharmād iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.024c: tena devāsurā rājan nītāḥ subahuśo vaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:091.025a: rājarṣayaś ca bahavas tasmād budhyasva pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:091.025c: rājā bhavati taṃ jitvā dāsas tena parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.026c: tathā vartasva māndhātaś ciraṃ cet sthātum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:091.027a: mattāt pramattāt pogaṇḍād unmattāc ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.028a: nigṛhītād amātyāc ca strībhyaś caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.029a: etebhyo nityayattaḥ syān naktaṃcaryāṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:091.029c: atyāyaṃ cātimānaṃ ca dambhaṃ krodhaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:091.030a: avijñātāsu ca strīṣu klībāsu svairiṇīṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:091.032a: ete cānye ca jāyante yadā rājā pramādyati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.034a: aśīte vidyate śītaṃ śīte śītaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:091.034c: avṛṣṭir ativṛṣṭiś ca vyādhiś cāviśati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:091.036a: arakṣitātmā yo rājā prajāś cāpi na rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.036c: prajāś ca tasya kṣīyante tāś ca so 'nu vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:091.037a: dvāv ādadāte hy ekasya dvayoś ca bahavo 'pare
GE07mbh_12_u:091.038c: tyaktvā dharmaṃ yadā rājā pramādam anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.001a: kālavarṣī ca parjanyo dharmacārī ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.001c: saṃpad yadaiṣā bhavati sā bibharti sukhaṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.002a: yo na jānāti nirhantuṃ vastrāṇāṃ rajako malam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.002c: raktāni vā śodhayituṃ yathā nāsti tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.003a: evam eva dvijendrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśām api
GE07mbh_12_u:092.004a: karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye daṇḍanītiś ca rājani
GE07mbh_12_u:092.004c: brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ cāpi dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:092.005a: teṣāṃ yaḥ kṣatriyo veda vastrāṇām iva śodhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.005c: śīladoṣān vinirhantuṃ sa pitā sa prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.006a: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:092.007a: cāturvarṇyaṃ tathā vedāś cāturāśramyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:092.007c: sarvaṃ pramuhyate hy etad yadā rājā pramādyati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.007d-0219_01: agnitretā trayī vidyā yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.007d-0219_02: sarva eva pramādyanti yadā rājā pramādyati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.008a: rājaiva kartā bhūtānāṃ rājaiva ca vināśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.008c: dharmātmā yaḥ sa kartā syād adharmātmā vināśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.009a: rājño bhāryāś ca putrāś ca bāndhavāḥ suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.009c: sametya sarve śocanti yadā rājā pramādyati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.011a: durbalārthaṃ balaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ dhātrā māndhātar ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.011c: abalaṃ tan mahad bhūtaṃ yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.012a: yac ca bhūtaṃ sa bhajate bhūtā ye ca tadanvayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.012c: adharmasthe hi nṛpatau sarve sīdanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:092.013a: durbalasya hi yac cakṣur muner āśīviṣasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:092.013c: aviṣahyatamaṃ manye mā sma durbalam āsadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.015a: na hi durbaladagdhasya kule kiṃ cit prarohati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.015c: āmūlaṃ nirdahaty eva mā sma durbalam āsadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.016a: abalaṃ vai balāc chreyo yac cātibalavad balam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.017a: vimānito hatotkruṣṭas trātāraṃ cen na vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.018a: mā sma tāta bale stheyā bādhiṣṭhā māpi durbalam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.018c: mā tvā durbalacakṣūṃṣi dhakṣyanty agnir ivāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.019c: tāni putrān paśūn ghnanti teṣāṃ mithyābhiśāsatām
GE07mbh_12_u:092.020a: yadi nātmani putreṣu na cet pautreṣu naptṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:092.020c: na hi pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva
GE07mbh_12_u:092.021c: mahān daivakṛtas tatra daṇḍaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.022a: yuktā yadā jānapadā bhikṣante brāhmaṇā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:092.024a: yadā yuktā nayanty arthān kāmād arthavaśena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.024c: kṛpaṇaṃ yācamānānāṃ tad rājño vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:092.025a: mahāvṛkṣo jāyate vardhate ca; taṃ caiva bhūtāni samāśrayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:092.025c: yadā vṛkṣaś chidyate dahyate vā; tadāśrayā aniketā bhavanti
GE07mbh_12_u:092.026a: yadā rāṣṭre dharmam agryaṃ caranti; saṃskāraṃ vā rājaguṇaṃ bruvāṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.026c: tair evādharmaś carito dharmamohāt; tūrṇaṃ jahyāt sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:092.027a: yatra pāpā jñāyamānāś caranti; satāṃ kalir vindati tatra rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.027c: yadā rājā śāsti narān naśiṣyān; na tad rājyaṃ vardhate bhūmipāla
GE07mbh_12_u:092.028a: yaś cāmātyaṃ mānayitvā yathārhaṃ; mantre ca yuddhe ca nṛpo niyuñjyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:092.028c: pravardhate tasya rāṣṭraṃ nṛpasya; bhuṅkte mahīṃ cāpy akhilāṃ cirāya
GE07mbh_12_u:092.029a: atrāpi sukṛtaṃ karma vācaṃ caiva subhāṣitām
GE07mbh_12_u:092.029c: samīkṣya pūjayan rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.030a: saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte na cānyān avamanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.030c: nihanti balinaṃ dṛptaṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031a: trāyate hi yadā sarvaṃ vācā kāyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031c: putrasyāpi na mṛṣyec ca sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0220_01: saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte nṛpatir durbalān narān
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0220_02: tadā bhavanti balinaḥ sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0221_01: yadā rakṣati rāṣṭrāṇi yadā dasyūn apohati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0221_02: yadā jayati saṃgrāme sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0222_01: pāpam ācarato yatra karmaṇā vyāhṛtena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.031d-0222_02: priyasyāpi na mṛṣyeta sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.032c: bhinatti na ca maryādāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.033c: kāmadveṣāv anādṛtya sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.034c: harṣaṃ saṃjanayan nṝṇāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.035c: saṃpūjayati sādhūṃś ca sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.036a: satyaṃ pālayati prāptyā nityaṃ bhūmiṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.036c: pūjayaty atithīn bhṛtyān sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.037c: asmiṃl loke pare caiva rājā tat prāpnute phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:092.038c: saṃyacchan bhavati prāṇān nasaṃyacchaṃs tu pāpakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.039c: yadā samyak pragṛhṇāti sa rājño dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.041c: sa paśyati hi yaṃ dharmaṃ sa dharmaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:092.042a: apramādena śikṣethāḥ kṣamāṃ buddhiṃ dhṛtiṃ matim
GE07mbh_12_u:092.042c: bhūtānāṃ sattvajijñāsāṃ sādhv asādhu ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.043a: saṃgrahaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk
GE07mbh_12_u:092.043c: paurajānapadāś caiva goptavyāḥ svā yathā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.044a: na jātv adakṣo nṛpatiḥ prajāḥ śaknoti rakṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:092.044c: bhāro hi sumahāṃs tāta rājyaṃ nāma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:092.045a: tad daṇḍavin nṛpaḥ prājñaḥ śūraḥ śaknoti rakṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:092.045c: na hi śakyam adaṇḍena klībenābuddhināpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:092.046a: abhirūpaiḥ kule jātair dakṣair bhaktair bahuśrutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.047a: tatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmaṃ vetsyasi vai param
GE07mbh_12_u:092.047c: svadeśe paradeśe vā na te dharmo vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:092.048a: dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca dharma evottaro bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:092.048c: asmiṃl loke pare caiva dharmavit sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:092.049a: tyajanti dārān prāṇāṃś ca manuṣyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.049c: saṃgrahaś caiva bhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk
GE07mbh_12_u:092.050a: apramādaś ca śaucaṃ ca tāta bhūtikaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:092.050c: etebhyaś caiva māndhātaḥ satataṃ mā pramādithāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.051c: nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:092.052a: etad vṛttaṃ vāsavasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:092.052c: rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tat tvam apy anupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:092.054a: dharmavṛttaṃ hi rājānaṃ pretya ceha ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:092.055a: sa evam ukto māndhātā tenotathyena bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:092.055c: kṛtavān aviśaṅkas tad ekaḥ prāpa ca medinīm
GE07mbh_12_u:092.056a: bhavān api tathā samyaṅ māndhāteva mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:092.056c: dharmaṃ kṛtvā mahīṃ rakṣan svarge sthānam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:093.001a: kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan rājā varteta dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.001c: pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:093.003a: rājā vasumanā nāma kausalyo balavāñ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.004c: yena vṛttena vai tiṣṭhan na cyaveyaṃ svadharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.005a: tam abravīd vāmadevas tapasvī japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.006a: dharmam evānuvartasva na dharmād vidyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:093.006c: dharme sthitā hi rājāno jayanti pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:093.007a: arthasiddheḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyate yo mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.007c: ṛtāṃ ca kurute buddhiṃ sa dharmeṇa virocate
GE07mbh_12_u:093.008a: adharmadarśī yo rājā balād eva pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:093.010c: api sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kṣipram eva vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:093.011c: vardhate matimān rājā srotobhir iva sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.013a: eteṣv eva hi sarveṣu lokayātrā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:093.013c: etāni śṛṇvaṃl labhate yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ śriyaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:093.014c: arthān samīkṣyārabhate sa dhruvaṃ mahad aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:093.016a: atha pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ buddhyā na ca paśyaty abuddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:093.018a: yasya nāsti gurur dharme na cānyān anupṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:094.001c: tāṃ vṛttim upajīvanti ye bhavanti tadanvayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.003c: tad eva viṣamasthasya svajano 'pi na mṛṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:094.004a: sāhasaprakṛtir yatra kurute kiṃ cid ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.005c: jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.006c: yo na mānayate dveṣāt kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.007a: śaktaḥ syāt sumukho rājā kuryāt kāruṇyam āpadi
GE07mbh_12_u:094.007c: priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ na ca vibhraśyate śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.008a: apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:094.008c: nacireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo 'priyaḥ priyam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009b-0223_01: śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ caitad vikramo yatra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009b-0223_02: kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009b-0223_03: samarthān pūjayed yaś ca na spardheta ca yaś ca taiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009c: na ca kāmān na saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009d-0224_01: amāyayaiva varteta na ca satyaṃ tyajed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.009d-0224_02: damaṃ dharmaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca kṣatradharmaṃ prajāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.010c: na tvareta na cāsūyet tathā saṃgṛhyate paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.011a: priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed apriye na ca saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:094.012a: yaḥ priyaṃ kurute nityaṃ guṇato vasudhādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.012c: tasya karmāṇi sidhyanti na ca saṃtyajyate śriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:094.013c: bhaktaṃ bhajeta nṛpatis tad vai vṛttaṃ satām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:094.014c: śaktaṃ caivānuraktaṃ ca yuñjyān mahati karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:094.015a: evam eva guṇair yukto yo na rajyati bhūmipam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.015c: bhartur artheṣv asūyantaṃ na taṃ yuñjīta karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:094.017c: kārye mahati yo yuñjyād dhīyate sa nṛpaḥ śriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.018a: rakṣitātmā tu yo rājā rakṣyān yaś cānurakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:094.018c: prajāś ca tasya vardhante dhruvaṃ ca mahad aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:094.019a: ye ke cid bhūmipatayas tān sarvān anvavekṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:094.019c: suhṛdbhir anabhikhyātais tena rājā na riṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:094.021a: dṛḍhamūlas tv aduṣṭātmā viditvā balam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.021c: abalān abhiyuñjīta na tu ye balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.022a: vikrameṇa mahīṃ labdhvā prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:094.023a: maraṇāntam idaṃ sarvaṃ neha kiṃ cid anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.023c: tasmād dharme sthito rājā prajā dharmeṇa pālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:094.024c: mantracintyaṃ sukhaṃ kāle pañcabhir vardhate mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:094.025a: etāni yasya guptāni sa rājā rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:094.025c: satataṃ vartamāno 'tra rājā bhuṅkte mahīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:094.026c: eteṣv āptān pratiṣṭhāpya rājā bhuṅkte mahīṃ ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:094.027c: asaṃtyaktamanuṣyaṃ ca taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.028a: yas tu niḥśreyasaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ tat pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:094.030a: agrāmyacaritāṃ buddhim atyantaṃ yo na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:094.030c: jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.031a: mukhyān amātyān yo hitvā nihīnān kurute priyān
GE07mbh_12_u:094.031c: sa vai vyasanam āsādya gādham ārto na vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:094.033c: priyeṇa kurute vaśyāṃś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:094.034a: nākāle praṇayed arthān nāpriye jātu saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:094.035a: ke mānuraktā rājānaḥ ke bhayāt samupāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:094.035c: madhyasthadoṣāḥ ke caiṣām iti nityaṃ vicintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:094.036a: na jātu balavān bhūtvā durbale viśvaset kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:094.037a: api sarvair guṇair yuktaṃ bhartāraṃ priyavādinam
GE07mbh_12_u:094.037c: abhidruhyati pāpātmā tasmād dhi vibhiṣej janāt
GE07mbh_12_u:095.001c: jaghanyam āhur vijayaṃ yo yuddhena narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:095.002a: na cāpy alabdhaṃ lipseta mūle nātidṛḍhe sati
GE07mbh_12_u:095.002c: na hi durbalamūlasya rājño lābho vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004c: alpenāpi sa daṇḍena mahīṃ jayati bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0001: daṇḍo hi balavān yatra tatra sāma prayujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0003: trayāṇāṃ viphalaṃ karma yadā paśyeta bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0006: upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0007: durbalo hi mahīpālo yadā bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0011: vijñāya tattvaṃ tattvajña tattvatas tat kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0012: yadi rakṣaḥ piśācena hanyate yatra kutra cit
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0013: upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0014: durbalo hi mahīpālaḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrum uddharet
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0016: śaṭhānāṃ sacivānāṃ ca mlecchānāṃ ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0018: aśmanā nāśayel lohaṃ lohenāśmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0020: dāsānāṃ ca pradṛptānām etad eveha kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0022: śaṭhānāṃ durvinītaiś ca pūrvam uktaṃ samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:095.004d-010_0023: anyāḥ śaṭhāś ca sacivās tathā kubrāhmaṇādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.005b-0225_01: rāṣṭrakarmakarā hy ete rāṣṭrasya ca virodhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.005b-0225_02: durvinītā vinītāś ca sarve sādhyāḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.005c: sadhanā dhānyavantaś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.005d-0226_02: āyavṛddhau sahāyāś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.006c: tadā lipseta medhāvī parabhūmiṃ dhanāny uta
GE07mbh_12_u:095.008a: takṣaty ātmānam evaiṣa vanaṃ paraśunā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:095.008c: yaḥ samyag vartamāneṣu sveṣu mithyā pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:095.009a: na vai dviṣantaḥ kṣīyante rājño nityam api ghnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.009c: krodhaṃ niyantuṃ yo veda tasya dveṣṭā na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:095.010a: yad āryajanavidviṣṭaṃ karma tan nācared budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.013a: ity ukto vāmadevena sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:095.013c: tathā kurvaṃs tvam apy etau lokau jetā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.001a: atha yo vijigīṣeta kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_12_u:096.001c: kas tasya dharmyo vijaya etat pṛṣṭo bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:096.002c: brūyād ahaṃ vo rājeti rakṣiṣyāmi ca vaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:096.003a: mama dharmyaṃ baliṃ datta kiṃ vā māṃ pratipatsyatha
GE07mbh_12_u:096.003c: te cet tam āgataṃ tatra vṛṇuyuḥ kuśalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.003d-0227_01: brūyād yuddhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ śṛṇu naḥ kuśalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.004a: te ced akṣatriyāḥ santo virudhyeyuḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:096.005a: aśaktaṃ kṣatriyaṃ matvā śastraṃ gṛhṇāty athāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.005c: trāṇāyāpy asamarthaṃ taṃ manyamānam atīva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:096.006a: atha yaḥ kṣatriyo rājā kṣatriyaṃ pratyupāvrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.006c: kathaṃ sa pratiyoddhavyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:096.007c: eka ekena vācyaś ca visṛjasva kṣipāmi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:096.008a: sa cet saṃnaddha āgacchet saṃnaddhavyaṃ tato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.008c: sa cet sasainya āgacchet sasainyas tam athāhvayet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.009a: sa cen nikṛtyā yudhyeta nikṛtyā taṃ prayodhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.009c: atha ced dharmato yudhyed dharmeṇaiva nivārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.010a: nāśvena rathinaṃ yāyād udiyād rathinaṃ rathī
GE07mbh_12_u:096.010c: vyasane na prahartavyaṃ na bhītāya jitāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011a: neṣur lipto na karṇī syād asatām etad āyudham
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011c: jayārtham eva yoddhavyaṃ na krudhyed ajighāṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011d-0228_01: nāsty ekasya gajo yuddhe gajaś caikasya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011d-0228_02: na padātir gajaṃ yudhyen na gajena padātinam
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011d-0228_03: hastinā yodhayen nāgaṃ kadā cic chikṣito hayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011d-0228_05: nāge bhūmau same caiva rathenāśvena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.011d-0228_07: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābhāgas tathā rājan vibhīṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.012a: sādhūnāṃ tu mithobhedāt sādhuś ced vyasanī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.013c: cikitsyaḥ syāt svaviṣaye prāpyo vā svagṛhān bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.013e: nirvraṇo 'pi ca moktavya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.014c: satsu nityaṃ satāṃ dharmas tam āsthāya na nāśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.015a: yo vai jayaty adharmeṇa kṣatriyo vardhamānakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.016a: karma caitad asādhūnām asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:096.016c: dharmeṇa nidhanaṃ śreyo na jayaḥ pāpakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:096.017a: nādharmaś carito rājan sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva
GE07mbh_12_u:096.017c: mūlāny asya praśākhāś ca dahan samanugacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:096.018a: pāpena karmaṇā vittaṃ labdhvā pāpaḥ prahṛṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:096.018c: sa vardhamānaḥ steyena pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjati
GE07mbh_12_u:096.019a: na dharmo 'stīti manvānaḥ śucīn avahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:096.020a: sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśair amartya iva manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:096.021a: tataḥ samūlo hriyate nadīkūlād iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:096.021e: tasmād dharmeṇa vijayaṃ kāmaṃ lipseta bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.002a: adharmayukto vijayo hy adhruvo 'svargya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:097.002c: sādayaty eṣa rājānaṃ mahīṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:097.004a: balenāvajito yaś ca na taṃ yudhyeta bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.004c: saṃvatsaraṃ vipraṇayet tasmāj jātaḥ punar bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:097.005c: evam eva dhanaṃ sarvaṃ yac cānyat sahasāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:097.006a: na tu vandhyaṃ dhanaṃ tiṣṭhet pibeyur brāhmaṇāḥ payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.006c: yuñjīran vāpy anaḍuhaḥ kṣantavyaṃ vā tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:097.007a: rājñā rājaiva yoddhavyas tathā dharmo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:097.007c: nānyo rājānam abhyased arājanyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:097.008c: śāntim icchann ubhayato na yoddhavyaṃ tadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:097.009a: atha cel laṅghayed enāṃ maryādāṃ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.009c: apraśasyas tad ūrdhvaṃ syād anādeyaś ca saṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:097.010e: dharmalabdhād dhi vijayāt ko lābho 'bhyadhiko bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:097.011a: sahasā nāmya bhūtāni kṣipram eva prasādayet
GE07mbh_12_u:097.011c: sāntvena bhogadānena sa rājñāṃ paramo nayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.013a: amitropagrahaṃ cāsya te kuryuḥ kṣipram āpadi
GE07mbh_12_u:097.014c: jīvitaṃ hy apy aticchinnaḥ saṃtyajaty ekadā naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.015c: śuddhaṃ jīvitam evāpi tādṛśo bahu manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:097.017c: pūjārhāḥ pūjitā yasya sa vai lokajid ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:097.018a: etenaiva ca vṛttena mahīṃ prāpa surottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.018c: anv eva caindraṃ vijayaṃ vyajigīṣanta pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:097.019a: bhūmivarjaṃ puraṃ rājā jitvā rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_12_u:097.020a: agnihotrāṇy agniśeṣaṃ havir bhājanam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:097.021c: anyatra śrotriyasvāc ca tāpasasvāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:097.022c: āsan rājñāṃ purāṇānāṃ sarvaṃ tan mama rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:097.023c: na māyayā na dambhena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.001c: abhiyāne ca yuddhe ca rājā hanti mahājanam
GE07mbh_12_u:098.002a: atha sma karmaṇā yena lokāñ jayati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.003a: nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:098.003c: yajñair dānaiś ca rājāno bhavanti śucayo 'malāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.004c: ta eva vijayaṃ prāpya vardhayanti punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.006a: yathaiva kṣetranirdātā nirdan vai kṣetram ekadā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.006c: hinasti kakṣaṃ dhānyaṃ ca na ca dhānyaṃ vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:098.007a: evaṃ śastrāṇi muñcanto ghnanti vadhyān athaikadā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.007c: tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtsnā bhūtānāṃ bhāvanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.008a: yo bhūtāni dhanajyānād vadhāt kleśāc ca rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:098.008c: dasyubhyaḥ prāṇadānāt sa dhanadaḥ sukhado virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.011a: abhīto vikirañ śatrūn pratigṛhṇañ śarāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.011c: na tasmāt tridaśāḥ śreyo bhuvi paśyanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:098.012a: tasya yāvanti śastrāṇi tvacaṃ bhindanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:098.013a: na tasya rudhiraṃ gātrād āvedhebhyaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:098.013c: sa ha tenaiva raktena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:098.014c: na tato 'sti tapo bhūya iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.015c: śūrāc charaṇam icchantaḥ parjanyād iva jīvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:098.016a: yadi śūras tathā kṣeme pratirakṣet tathā bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:098.016c: pratirūpaṃ janāḥ kuryur na ca tad vartate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.017a: yadi te kṛtam ājñāya namaskuryuḥ sadaiva tam
GE07mbh_12_u:098.017c: yuktaṃ nyāyyaṃ ca kuryus te na ca tad vartate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.019a: pataty abhimukhaḥ śūraḥ parān bhīruḥ palāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:098.020a: mā sma tāṃs tādṛśāṃs tāta janiṣṭhāḥ puruṣādhamān
GE07mbh_12_u:098.020c: ye sahāyān raṇe hitvā svastimanto gṛhān yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.021c: tyāgena yaḥ sahāyānāṃ svān prāṇāṃs trātum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:098.022a: taṃ hanyuḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭair vā daheyur vā kaṭāgninā
GE07mbh_12_u:098.022c: paśuvan mārayeyur vā kṣatriyā ye syur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.024c: kṣatriyo nāsya tat karma praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.025a: na gṛhe maraṇaṃ tāta kṣatriyāṇāṃ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:098.025c: śauṭīrāṇām aśauṭīram adharmyaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:098.026a: idaṃ duḥkham aho kaṣṭaṃ pāpīya iti niṣṭanan
GE07mbh_12_u:098.027c: vīro dṛpto 'bhimānī ca nedṛśaṃ mṛtyum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:098.028c: tīkṣṇaiḥ śastraiḥ suvikliṣṭaḥ kṣatriyo mṛtyum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:098.029a: śūro hi satyamanyubhyām āviṣṭo yudhyate bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:098.030a: sa saṃkhye nidhanaṃ prāpya praśastaṃ lokapūjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:098.031a: sarvo yodhaḥ paraṃ tyaktum āviṣṭas tyaktajīvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.031d-0229_01: yatra yatra hataḥ śūraḥ śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:098.031d-0229_02: akṣayāṃl labhate lokān yadi dainyaṃ na sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.001c: bhavanti nidhanaṃ prāpya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:099.003a: ambarīṣo hi nābhāgaḥ svargaṃ gatvā sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:099.004c: upary upari gacchantaṃ svaṃ vai senāpatiṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:099.005c: ṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā sudevasya vismitaḥ prāha vāsavam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.007c: vedān adhītya dharmeṇa rājaśāstraṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.008a: atithīn annapānena pitṝṃś ca svadhayā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010c: āsīd yodhaḥ praśāntātmā so 'yaṃ kasmād atīva mām
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-0232_01: vimānaṃ sūryasaṃkāśam āsthito modate divi śakra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0002: yad anena kṛtaṃ karma pratyakṣaṃ te mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0003: purā pālayataḥ samyak pṛthivīṃ dharmato nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0005: saṃdhamo vidhamaś caiva sudhamaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0006: rākṣasā durjayā loke trayas te yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0008: atha tasmiñ śubhe kāle tava yajñaṃ vitanvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0010: tasya te khalu vighnārtham āgatā rākṣasās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0012: parigṛhya tataḥ sarvāḥ prajā bandīkṛtās tava
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0013: vihvalāś ca prajāḥ sarvāḥ sarve ca tava sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0016: śrutvā teṣāṃ vaco bhūyaḥ sopadhaṃ vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0020: bandīmokṣam akṛtvā ca na cāgamanam iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0021: sudevas tad vacaḥ śrutvā prasthānam akaron nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0022: saṃprāptaś ca sa taṃ deśaṃ yatra bandīkṛtāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0025: neyaṃ śakyā camūr jetum api sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0026: nāmbarīṣaḥ kalām ekām eṣāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0028: tataḥ senāṃ punaḥ sarvāṃ preṣayām āsa pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0029: yatra tvaṃ sahitaḥ sarvair mantribhiḥ sopadhair nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0030: tato rudraṃ mahādevaṃ prapanno jagataḥ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0032: stutvā śastraṃ samādāya svaśiraś chettum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0034: sa pāṇiḥ saha śastreṇa dṛṣṭvā cedam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0035: kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ putra kartukāmo vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0036: sa uvāca mahādevaṃ śirasā tv avanīṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0038: aśakto 'haṃ raṇe jetuṃ tasmāt tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0040: nāgantavyam ajitvā ca mām āha jagatīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0042: tam uvāca mahādevaḥ sudevaṃ patitaṃ kṣitau
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0046: rathaṃ ca sumahābhāgaṃ yena tat tripuraṃ hatam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0047: dhanuḥ pinākaṃ khaḍgaṃ ca raudram astraṃ ca śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0050: rathād asmāt sudeva tvaṃ durjayas tu surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0051: māyayā mohito bhūmau na padaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0053: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca na śaktā draṣṭum īdṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0054: rathaṃ sūryasahasrābhaṃ kim u yoddhuṃ tvayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0055: sa jitvā rākṣasān sarvān kṛtvā bandīvimokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0056: ghātayitvā ca tān sarvān bāhuyuddhe tv ayaṃ hataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.010d-011_0057: vidhamaṃ prāpya bhūpāla vidhamaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.011a: nānena kratubhir mukhyair iṣṭaṃ naiva dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.011c: tarpitā vidhivac chakra so 'yaṃ kasmād atīva mām
GE07mbh_12_u:099.012a: etasya vitatas tāta sudevasya babhūva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:099.012c: saṃgrāmayajñaḥ sumahān yaś cānyo yudhyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.013a: saṃnaddho dīkṣitaḥ sarvo yodhaḥ prāpya camūmukham
GE07mbh_12_u:099.014a: kāni yajñe havīṃṣy atra kim ājyaṃ kā ca dakṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:099.014c: ṛtvijaś cātra ke proktās tan me brūhi śatakrato
GE07mbh_12_u:099.015c: havīṃṣi paramāṃsāni rudhiraṃ tv ājyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:099.016c: ājyaśeṣaṃ pibanty ete haviḥ prāśnanti cādhvare
GE07mbh_12_u:099.017c: jvalanto niśitāḥ pītāḥ srucas tasyātha satriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.018c: ṛjuḥ suniśitaḥ pītaḥ sāyako 'sya sruvo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:099.019c: hastihastagataḥ khaḍgaḥ sphyo bhavet tasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:099.021a: āvegād yat tu rudhiraṃ saṃgrāme syandate bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:099.023c: kuñjarāṇāṃ hayānāṃ ca varmiṇāṃ ca samuccayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.023e: agniḥ śyenacito nāma tasya yajñe vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.024a: uttiṣṭhati kabandho 'tra sahasre nihate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.024c: sa yūpas tasya śūrasya khādiro 'ṣṭāśrir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.025e: udgātā tatra saṃgrāme trisāmā dundubhiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.026a: brahmasve hriyamāṇe yaḥ priyāṃ yuddhe tanuṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:099.027a: bhartur arthe tu yaḥ śūro vikramed vāhinīmukhe
GE07mbh_12_u:099.027c: bhayān na ca nivarteta tasya lokā yathā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:099.028c: yasya vedir upastīrṇā tasya lokā yathā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:099.029a: yas tu nāvekṣate kaṃ cit sahāyaṃ vijaye sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.029c: vigāhya vāhinīmadhyaṃ tasya lokā yathā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:099.035a: vedī yasya tv amitrāṇāṃ śirobhir avakīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.035c: aśvaskandhair gajaskandhais tasya lokā yathā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:099.038a: yadā tūbhayato vyūho bhavaty ākāśam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.038c: sāsya vedī tathā yajñe nityaṃ vedās trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.039a: yas tu yodhaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṃtrasto hanyate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.039c: apratiṣṭhaṃ sa narakaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.041a: yas tu senāpatiṃ hatvā tadyānam adhirohati
GE07mbh_12_u:099.042a: nāyakaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ vā yo vā syāt tatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.042c: jīvagrāhaṃ nigṛhṇāti tasya lokā yathā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:099.043a: āhave nihataṃ śūraṃ na śoceta kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:099.043c: aśocyo hi hataḥ śūraḥ svargaloke mahīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.044a: na hy annaṃ nodakaṃ tasya na snānaṃ nāpy aśaucakam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.044c: hatasya kartum icchanti tasya lokāñ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:099.045c: tvaramāṇā hi dhāvanti mama bhartā bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:099.046a: etat tapaś ca puṇyaṃ ca dharmaś caiva sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.046c: catvāraś cāśramās tasya yo yuddhe na palāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:099.047a: vṛddhaṃ balaṃ na hantavyaṃ naiva strī na ca vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.047c: tṛṇapūrṇamukhaś caiva tavāsmīti ca yo vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:099.048a: ahaṃ vṛtraṃ balaṃ pākaṃ śatamāyaṃ virocanam
GE07mbh_12_u:099.048c: durāvāryaṃ ca namuciṃ naikamāyaṃ ca śambaram
GE07mbh_12_u:099.049a: vipracittiṃ ca daiteyaṃ danoḥ putrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:099.050a: ity etac chakravacanaṃ niśamya pratigṛhya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:100.001c: pratardano maithilaś ca saṃgrāmaṃ yatra cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:100.002c: yodhān uddharṣayām āsa tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:100.003c: yodhān svān darśayām āsa svargaṃ narakam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:100.004a: abhītānām ime lokā bhāsvanto hanta paśyata
GE07mbh_12_u:100.007c: ity uktās te nṛpatinā yodhāḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:100.009a: gajānāṃ rathino madhye rathānām anu sādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:100.009c: sādinām antarā sthāpyaṃ pādātam iha daṃśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:100.010a: ya evaṃ vyūhate rājā sa nityaṃ jayate dviṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:100.010c: tasmād evaṃ vidhātavyaṃ nityam eva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:100.012c: jitāṃ ca bhūmiṃ rakṣeta bhagnān nātyanusārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:100.013c: na vegaḥ susaho rājaṃs tasmān nātyanusārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:100.014a: na hi prahartum icchanti śūrāḥ prādravatāṃ bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:100.015a: carāṇām acarā hy annam adaṃṣṭrā daṃṣṭriṇām api
GE07mbh_12_u:100.016c: ato bhayārtāḥ praṇipatya bhūyaḥ; kṛtvāñjalīn upatiṣṭhanti śūrān
GE07mbh_12_u:100.017c: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu śūraḥ saṃmānam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:100.018a: na hi śauryāt paraṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:100.018c: śūraḥ sarvaṃ pālayati sarvaṃ śūre pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:101.001c: īṣad dharmaṃ prapīḍyāpi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:101.002a: satyena hi sthitā dharmā upapattyā tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:101.003e: kāryāṇāṃ saṃprasiddhyarthaṃ tān upāyān nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:101.004a: ubhe prajñe veditavye ṛjvī vakrā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:101.004c: jānan vakrāṃ na seveta pratibādheta cāgatām
GE07mbh_12_u:101.005c: tāṃ rājā nikṛtiṃ jānan yathāmitrān prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:101.007c: nānārañjanaraktāḥ syuḥ patākāḥ ketavaś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:101.008a: ṛṣṭayas tomarāḥ khaḍgā niśitāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.009a: caitryāṃ vā mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vā senāyogaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:101.009c: pakvasasyā hi pṛthivī bhavaty ambumatī tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:101.010c: tasmāt tadā yojayeta pareṣāṃ vyasaneṣu vā
GE07mbh_12_u:101.011a: jalavāṃs tṛṇavān mārgaḥ samo gamyaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:101.012a: navyāraṇyair na śakyeta gantuṃ mṛgagaṇair iva
GE07mbh_12_u:101.014c: bahubhir guṇajātais tu ye yuddhakuśalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.016a: saptarṣīn pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā yudhyerann acalā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:101.017a: yato vāyur yataḥ sūryo yataḥ śukras tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.017c: pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saṃnipāte yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:101.023c: vijayaṃ labhate nityaṃ senāṃ samyak prayojayan
GE07mbh_12_u:101.026a: pāraṃparyāgate dvāre ye ke cid anuvartinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.026c: paricaryāvaroddhāro ye ca ke cana valginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.027a: anīkaṃ ye prabhindanti bhinnaṃ ye sthagayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:101.027d-0236_01: jātigotraṃ ca vijñāya karma cānuttamaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:101.027d-0236_03: triguṇaṃ caturguṇaṃ caiva vetanaṃ teṣu kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:101.029c: yathā jayārthaṃ saṃgrāme na jahyāma parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:101.030a: ihaiva te nivartantāṃ ye naḥ ke cana bhīravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.030c: na ghātayeyuḥ pradaraṃ kurvāṇās tumule sati
GE07mbh_12_u:101.030d-0237_01: na saṃnipāte pradaraṃ vadhaṃ vā kuryur īdṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.031a: ātmānaṃ ca svapakṣaṃ ca palāyan hanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:101.033c: amitrair anubaddhasya dviṣatām astu nas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:101.034a: manuṣyāpasadā hy ete ye bhavanti parāṅmukhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.034c: rāśivardhanamātrās te naiva te pretya no iha
GE07mbh_12_u:101.035c: jayinaṃ suhṛdas tāta vandanair maṅgalena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:101.036a: yasya sma vyasane rājann anumodanti śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.036c: tad asahyataraṃ duḥkham ahaṃ manye vadhād api
GE07mbh_12_u:101.037a: śriyaṃ jānīta dharmasya mūlaṃ sarvasukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:101.037c: sā bhīrūṇāṃ parān yāti śūras tām adhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:101.038a: te vayaṃ svargam icchantaḥ saṃgrāme tyaktajīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.038c: jayanto vadhyamānā vā prāptum arhāma sadgatim
GE07mbh_12_u:101.041c: api hy asmin pare gṛddhā bhaveyur ye purogamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.042c: te pūrvam abhivarteraṃs tān anvag itare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.043a: api coddharṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ bhīrūṇām api yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:101.044a: saṃhatān yodhayed alpān kāmaṃ vistārayed bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:101.044c: sūcīmukham anīkaṃ syād alpānāṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:101.045a: saṃprayuddhe prahṛṣṭe vā satyaṃ vā yadi vānṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:101.045c: pragṛhya bāhūn krośeta bhagnā bhagnāḥ parā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:102.001c: kiṃsaṃnāhāḥ kathaṃśastrā janāḥ syuḥ saṃyuge nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:102.002c: ācārād eva puruṣas tathā karmasu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:102.005a: tathā yavanakāmbojā mathurām abhitaś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:102.006b-0239_02: eko 'pi hi sahasrasya tiṣṭhaty abhimukho raṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:102.006c: prāya eṣa samuddiṣṭo lakṣaṇāni tu me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:102.010c: śūrāś capalacittāś ca te bhavanti durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:102.013c: nakulākṣās tathā caiva sarve śūrās tanutyajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:102.015c: vāraṇā iva saṃmattās te bhavanti durāsadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:102.017a: udvṛttāś caiva sugrīvā vinatā vihagā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:102.019a: tyaktātmānaḥ sarva ete antyajā hy anivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:102.019c: puraskāryāḥ sadā sainye hanyante ghnanti cāpi te
GE07mbh_12_u:102.020c: evam eva prakupyanti rājño 'py ete hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.001a: jaitryā vā kāni rūpāṇi bhavanti puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:103.002a: jaitryā vā yāni rūpāṇi bhavanti puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:103.004c: maṅgalāni ca kurvantaḥ śamayanty ahitāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:103.005c: yasyāṃ bhavanti senāyāṃ dhruvaṃ tasyāṃ jayaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:103.006a: anv enāṃ vāyavo vānti tathaivendradhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:103.007a: gomāyavaś cānulomā vaḍā gṛdhrāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.007c: ācareyur yadā senāṃ tadā siddhir anuttamā
GE07mbh_12_u:103.008c: puṇyā gandhāś cāhutīnāṃ pravānti; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.009a: gambhīraśabdāś ca mahāsvanāś ca; śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca nadanti yatra
GE07mbh_12_u:103.009c: yuyutsavaś cāpratīpā bhavanti; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.010a: iṣṭā mṛgāḥ pṛṣṭhato vāmataś ca; saṃprasthitānāṃ ca gamiṣyatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:103.010c: jighāṃsatāṃ dakṣiṇāḥ siddhim āhur; ye tv agratas te pratiṣedhayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:103.011a: maṅgalyaśabdāḥ śakunā vadanti; haṃsāḥ krauñcāḥ śatapatrāś ca cāṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.011c: hṛṣṭā yodhāḥ sattvavanto bhavanti; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.012a: śastraiḥ patraiḥ kavacaiḥ ketubhiś ca; subhānubhir mukhavarṇaiś ca yūnām
GE07mbh_12_u:103.012c: bhrājiṣmatī duṣpratiprekṣaṇīyā; yeṣāṃ camūs te 'bhibhavanti śatrūn
GE07mbh_12_u:103.013a: śuśrūṣavaś cānabhimāninaś ca; parasparaṃ sauhṛdam āsthitāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:103.013c: yeṣāṃ yodhāḥ śaucam anuṣṭhitāś ca; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.014a: śabdāḥ sparśās tathā gandhā vicaranti manaḥpriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.014c: dhairyaṃ cāviśate yodhān vijayasya mukhaṃ tu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:103.017a: jaghanya eṣa vijayo yad yuddhaṃ nāma bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:103.017c: yādṛcchiko yudhi jayo daivo veti vicāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:103.018a: apām iva mahāvegas trastā mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:103.019a: bhagnā ity eva bhajyante vidvāṃso 'pi nakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:103.021a: atha vā pañca ṣaṭ sapta sahitāḥ kṛtaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.022a: saṃnipāto na gantavyaḥ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:103.023a: saṃsarpaṇād dhi senāyā bhayaṃ bhīrūn prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:103.023c: vajrād iva prajvalitād iyaṃ kva nu patiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:103.024a: abhiprayātāṃ samitiṃ jñātvā ye pratiyānty atha
GE07mbh_12_u:103.024c: teṣāṃ spandanti gātrāṇi yodhānāṃ viṣayasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:103.026a: teṣāṃ sāntvaṃ krūramiśraṃ praṇetavyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.026c: saṃpīḍyamānā hi pare yogam āyānti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.027c: yaś ca tasmāt paro rājā tena saṃdhiḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:103.028a: na hi tasyānyathā pīḍā śakyā kartuṃ tathāvidhā
GE07mbh_12_u:103.029a: kṣamā vai sādhumāyā hi na hi sādhv akṣamā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:103.029c: kṣamāyāś cākṣamāyāś ca viddhi pārtha prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:103.030c: mahāparādhā hy apy asmin viśvasanti hi śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.031a: manyate karśayitvā tu kṣamā sādhv iti śambaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.031c: asaṃtaptaṃ tu yad dāru pratyeti prakṛtiṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.032a: naitat praśaṃsanty ācāryā na ca sādhu nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:103.033a: dveṣyo bhavati bhūtānām ugro rājā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:103.033c: mṛdum apy avamanyante tasmād ubhayabhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:103.034a: prahariṣyan priyaṃ brūyāt praharann api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:103.034c: prahṛtya ca kṛpāyeta śocann iva rudann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:103.035a: na me priyaṃ yat sa hataḥ saṃprāhaivaṃ puro vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.035c: na cakartha ca me vākyam ucyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
