GE07mbh_12_u:103.036a: aho jīvitam ākāṅkṣe nedṛśo vadham arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:103.037a: kṛtaṃ mamāpriyaṃ tena yenāyaṃ nihato mṛdhe
GE07mbh_12_u:103.037c: iti vācā vadan hantṝn pūjayeta rahogataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.038a: hantṝṇāṃ cāhatānāṃ ca yat kuryur aparādhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.039c: priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ dharmajño vītabhīr nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:103.041c: sarvataḥ parirakṣec ca yo mahīṃ bhoktum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:104.001a: kathaṃ mṛdau kathaṃ tīkṣṇe mahāpakṣe ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:104.001c: arau varteta nṛpatis tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:104.002c: bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:104.005c: kiṃ kurvāṇaṃ na māṃ jahyāj jvalitā śrīḥ pratāpinī
GE07mbh_12_u:104.007c: bālasaṃsevitaṃ hy etad yad amarṣo yad akṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.007e: na śatrur vivṛtaḥ kāryo vadham asyābhikāṅkṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.008a: krodhaṃ balam amarṣaṃ ca niyamyātmajam ātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:104.009a: priyam eva vaden nityaṃ nāpriyaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:104.010c: tān dvijān kurute vaśyāṃs tathā yukto mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.010e: vaśaṃ copanayec chatrūn nihanyāc ca puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:104.011a: na nityaṃ paribhūyārīn sukhaṃ svapiti vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:104.011c: jāgarty eva ca duṣṭātmā saṃkare 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.012a: na saṃnipātaḥ kartavyaḥ sāmānye vijaye sati
GE07mbh_12_u:104.012d-0241_01: vaśe kuryān na śamayet tīkṣṇān karkaśapīḍanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.012d-0241_03: hetāv īrṣuḥ phalenerṣuḥ syāc chakra vyavasāyavit
GE07mbh_12_u:104.012d-0241_04: doṣeṇa guṇarūpeṇa dviṣato yo jayet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.014a: athāsya praharet kāle kiṃ cid vicalite pade
GE07mbh_12_u:104.014c: daṇḍaṃ ca dūṣayed asya puruṣair āptakāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.015c: balāni dūṣayed asya jānaṃś caiva pramāṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.016c: na tv eva celasaṃsargaṃ racayed aribhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:104.017a: dīrghakālam api kṣāntvā vihanyād eva śātravān
GE07mbh_12_u:104.017c: kālākāṅkṣī yāmayec ca yathā visrambham āpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.018c: na yaḥ śalyaṃ ghaṭṭayati navaṃ ca kurute vraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:104.019a: prāpte ca praharet kāle na sa saṃvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.020a: yaḥ kālo hi vyatikrāmet puruṣaṃ kālakāṅkṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:104.022a: vihāya kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca tathāhaṃkāram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:104.023a: mārdavaṃ daṇḍa ālasyaṃ pramādaś ca surottama
GE07mbh_12_u:104.023c: māyāś ca vividhāḥ śakra sādhayanty avicakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:104.025c: yacchanti sacivā guhyaṃ mitho vidrāvayanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:104.026a: aśakyam iti kṛtvā vā tato 'nyaiḥ saṃvidaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:104.027a: bhedaṃ ca prathamaṃ yuñjyāt tūṣṇīṃdaṇḍaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:104.027c: kāle prayojayed rājā tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tadā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.028a: praṇipātaṃ ca gaccheta kāle śatror balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.029c: amitram upaseveta na tu jātu viśaṅkayet
GE07mbh_12_u:104.030a: sthānāni śaṅkitānāṃ ca nityam eva vivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:104.030c: na ca teṣv āśvased drugdhvā jāgratīha nirākṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.031a: na hy ato duṣkaraṃ karma kiṃ cid asti surottama
GE07mbh_12_u:104.033a: mṛdum apy avamanyante tīkṣṇād udvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.033c: mātīkṣṇo māmṛdur bhūs tvaṃ tīkṣṇo bhava mṛdur bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:104.034c: nityaṃ vivaraṇād bādhas tathā rājyaṃ pramādyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.035c: sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍena ca puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:104.036a: ekaikam eṣāṃ niṣpiṃṣañ śiṣṭeṣu nipuṇaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:104.036c: na ca śakto 'pi medhāvī sarvān evārabhen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.039a: na sāma daṇḍopaniṣat praśasyate; na mārdavaṃ śatruṣu yātrikaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.039c: na sasyaghāto na ca saṃkarakriyā; na cāpi bhūyaḥ prakṛter vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:104.040c: āptair manuṣyair upacārayeta; pureṣu rāṣṭreṣu ca saṃprayuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.041a: purāṇi caiṣām anusṛtya bhūmipāḥ; pureṣu bhogān nikhilān ihājayan
GE07mbh_12_u:104.041c: pureṣu nītiṃ vihitāṃ yathāvidhi; prayojayanto balavṛtrasūdana
GE07mbh_12_u:104.042a: pradāya gūḍhāni vasūni nāma; pracchidya bhogān avadhāya ca svān
GE07mbh_12_u:104.042c: duṣṭāḥ svadoṣair iti kīrtayitvā; pureṣu rāṣṭreṣu ca yojayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:104.044c: kathaṃ duṣṭaṃ vijānīyād etat pṛṣṭo bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:104.045c: parair vā kīrtyamāneṣu tūṣṇīm āste parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.046a: tūṣṇīṃbhāve 'pi hi jñānaṃ na ced bhavati kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:104.047a: karoty abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃsṛṣṭam asaṃsṛṣṭaś ca bhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:104.048a: pṛthag etya samaśnāti nedam adya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:104.048c: āsane śayane yāne bhāvā lakṣyā viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.049a: ārtir ārte priye prītir etāvan mitralakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:104.049c: viparītaṃ tu boddhavyam arilakṣaṇam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:104.051a: iti duṣṭasya vijñānam uktaṃ te surasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:104.052a: sa tad vacaḥ śatrunibarhaṇe ratas; tathā cakārāvitathaṃ bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:104.052c: cacāra kāle vijayāya cārihā; vaśaṃ ca śatrūn anayat puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.001c: cyutaḥ kośāc ca daṇḍāc ca sukham icchan kathaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:105.002c: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:105.004a: artheṣu bhāgī puruṣa īhamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.004c: alabdhvā madvidho rājyaṃ brahman kiṃ kartum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.005c: kṣudrād anyatra cācārāt tan mamācakṣva sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:105.007a: nirvidya hi naraḥ kāmān niyamya sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:105.007c: tyaktvā prītiṃ ca śokaṃ ca labdhvāprītimayaṃ vasu
GE07mbh_12_u:105.008a: sukham arthāśrayaṃ yeṣām anuśocāmi tān aham
GE07mbh_12_u:105.008c: mama hy arthāḥ subahavo naṣṭāḥ svapna ivāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.009a: duṣkaraṃ bata kurvanti mahato 'rthāṃs tyajanti ye
GE07mbh_12_u:105.009c: vayaṃ tv enān parityaktum asato 'pi na śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.010a: imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ dīnam ārtaṃ śriyaś cyutam
GE07mbh_12_u:105.010c: yad anyat sukham astīha tad brahmann anuśādhi mām
GE07mbh_12_u:105.012a: purastād eva te buddhir iyaṃ kāryā vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.012c: anityaṃ sarvam evedam ahaṃ ca mama cāsti yat
GE07mbh_12_u:105.013a: yat kiṃ cin manyase 'stīti sarvaṃ nāstīti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:105.013c: evaṃ na vyathate prājñaḥ kṛcchrām apy āpadaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.014a: yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dhruvaṃ tan na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.015a: yac ca pūrve samāhāre yac ca pūrvatare pare
GE07mbh_12_u:105.015c: sarvaṃ tan nāsti tac caiva taj jñātvā ko 'nusaṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:105.016a: bhūtvā ca na bhavaty etad abhūtvā ca bhavaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:105.016c: śoke na hy asti sāmarthyaṃ śokaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.017a: kva nu te 'dya pitā rājan kva nu te 'dya pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.017c: na tvaṃ paśyasi tān adya na tvā paśyanti te 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:105.018a: ātmano 'dhruvatāṃ paśyaṃs tāṃs tvaṃ kim anuśocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:105.018c: buddhyā caivānubudhyasva dhruvaṃ hi na bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:105.019a: ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca nṛpate śatravaḥ suhṛdaś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:105.019c: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.020a: ye tu viṃśativarṣā vai triṃśadvarṣāś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.020c: arvāg eva hi te sarve mariṣyanti śaracchatāt
GE07mbh_12_u:105.021a: api cen mahato vittād vipramucyeta pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.021c: naitan mameti tan matvā kurvīta priyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.022a: anāgataṃ yan na mameti vidyād; atikrāntaṃ yan na mameti vidyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:105.022c: diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamānās; te paṇḍitās tat satāṃ sthānam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.023a: anāḍhyāś cāpi jīvanti rājyaṃ cāpy anuśāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:105.024a: na ca tvam iva śocanti tasmāt tvam api mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.024c: kiṃ nu tvaṃ tair na vai śreyāṃs tulyo vā buddhipauruṣaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.025a: yādṛcchikaṃ mamāsīt tad rājyam ity eva cintaye
GE07mbh_12_u:105.025c: hriyate sarvam evedaṃ kālena mahatā dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:105.028c: pratyutpannān anubhavan mā śucas tvam anāgatān
GE07mbh_12_u:105.029c: kaccic chuddhasvabhāvena śriyā hīno na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:105.030c: dhātāraṃ garhate nityaṃ labdhārthāṃś ca na mṛṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:105.031a: anarhān api caivānyān manyate śrīmato janān
GE07mbh_12_u:105.032c: kaccit tvaṃ na tathā prājña matsarī kosalādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:105.033a: sahasva śriyam anyeṣāṃ yady api tvayi nāsti sā
GE07mbh_12_u:105.033c: anyatrāpi satīṃ lakṣmīṃ kuśalā bhuñjate janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.033e: abhiviṣyandate śrīr hi saty api dviṣato janāt
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034a: śriyaṃ ca putrapautraṃ ca manuṣyā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034c: tyāgadharmavido vīrāḥ svayam eva tyajanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034d-0243_01: tyaktaṃ svāyaṃbhuve vaṃśe śubhena bharatena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034d-0243_03: tathānyair bhūmipālaiś ca tyaktaṃ rājyaṃ mahodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034d-0243_04: tyaktvā rājyāni te sarve vane vanyaphalāśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.034d-0243_05: gatāś ca tapasaḥ pāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ ca bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.036a: tvaṃ punaḥ prājñarūpaḥ san kṛpaṇaṃ paritapyase
GE07mbh_12_u:105.037a: tāṃ buddhim upajijñāsus tvam evainān parityaja
GE07mbh_12_u:105.038a: arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃ cid dhananāśo bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:105.038c: anantyaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ matvā śriyam anyaḥ parīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:105.039a: ramamāṇaḥ śriyā kaś cin nānyac chreyo 'bhimanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:105.040a: kṛcchrāl labdham abhipretaṃ yadā kausalya naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.040d-0244_01: anityāṃ tāṃ śriyaṃ matvā śriyaṃ vā kaḥ parīpsati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.041c: paratra sukham icchanto nirvidyeyuś ca laukikāt
GE07mbh_12_u:105.042c: na jīvitārthaṃ manyante puruṣā hi dhanād ṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:105.043a: paśya teṣāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ paśya teṣām abuddhitām
GE07mbh_12_u:105.044a: saṃcaye ca vināśānte maraṇānte ca jīvite
GE07mbh_12_u:105.044c: saṃyoge viprayogānte ko nu vipraṇayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.045a: dhanaṃ vā puruṣaṃ rājan puruṣo vā punar dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:105.045c: avaśyaṃ prajahāty etat tad vidvān ko 'nusaṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:105.045d-0245_01: anyatropanatā hy āpat puruṣaṃ toṣayaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:105.045d-0245_02: tena śāntiṃ na labhate nāham eveti kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:105.046a: anyeṣām api naśyanti suhṛdaś ca dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:105.046c: paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājann āpadam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.046e: niyaccha yaccha saṃyaccha indriyāṇi mano giram
GE07mbh_12_u:105.048a: alpam icchann acapalo mṛdur dāntaḥ susaṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:105.049a: na tv eva jālmīṃ kāpālīṃ vṛttim eṣitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:105.051c: yad eko ramate 'raṇye yac cāpy alpena tuṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:105.053c: daive pratiniviṣṭe ca kiṃ śreyo manyate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:106.001a: atha cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyātmani paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:106.001c: bravīmi hanta te nītiṃ rājyasya pratipattaye
GE07mbh_12_u:106.002a: tāṃ cec chakṣyasy anuṣṭhātuṃ karma caiva kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:106.002c: śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:106.003c: rājyaṃ rājyasya mantraṃ vā mahatīṃ vā punaḥ śriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:106.003e: yady etad rocate rājan punar brūhi bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:106.004a: bravītu bhagavān nītim upapanno 'smy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:106.004c: amogham idam adyāstu tvayā saha samāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:106.005a: hitvā stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaharṣau bhayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:106.006c: dātum arhati te vṛttiṃ vaidehaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:106.010e: parair vā saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā balam apy asya ghātaya
GE07mbh_12_u:106.011a: alabhyā ye śubhā bhāvāḥ striyaś cācchādanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:106.012a: pakṣiṇo mṛgajātāni rasā gandhāḥ phalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:106.012c: teṣv eva sajjayethās tvaṃ yathā naśyet svayaṃ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:106.013a: yady eva pratiṣeddhavyo yady upekṣaṇam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:106.013c: na jātu vivṛtaḥ kāryaḥ śatrur vinayam icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:106.015a: ārambhāṃś cāsya mahato duṣkarāṃs tvaṃ prayojaya
GE07mbh_12_u:106.017c: te tvatpriyaṃ kariṣyanti taṃ ceṣyanti vṛkā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:106.018e: kośakṣaye tv amitrāṇāṃ vaśaṃ kausalya gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:106.019a: ubhayatra prasaktasya dharme cādharma eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:106.022c: api tyāgaṃ bubhūṣeta kaccid gacched anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:106.023c: nāgān aśvān manuṣyāṃś ca kṛtakair upaghātaya
GE07mbh_12_u:106.024a: ete cānye ca bahavo dambhayogāḥ suniścitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.001a: na nikṛtyā na dambhena brahmann icchāmi jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:107.002c: yena māṃ nābhiśaṅketa yad vā kṛtsnaṃ hitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:107.003a: ānṛśaṃsyena dharmeṇa loke hy asmiñ jijīviṣuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.003c: nāham etad alaṃ kartuṃ naitan mayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:107.004a: upapannas tvam etena yathā kṣatriya bhāṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:107.005a: ubhayor eva vām arthe yatiṣye tava tasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:107.005c: saṃśleṣaṃ vā kariṣyāmi śāśvataṃ hy anapāyinam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.006a: tvādṛśaṃ hi kule jātam anṛśaṃsaṃ bahuśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.007a: yas tvaṃ pravrajito rājyād vyasanaṃ cottamaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.008c: yathāhaṃ taṃ niyokṣyāmi tat kariṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.009a: tata āhūya vaidehaṃ munir vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:107.010a: ādarśa iva śuddhātmā śāradaś candramā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:107.010c: nāsmin paśyāmi vṛjinaṃ sarvato me parīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.011a: tena te saṃdhir evāstu viśvasāsmin yathā mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:107.011c: na rājyam anamātyena śakyaṃ śāstum amitrahan
GE07mbh_12_u:107.012a: amātyaḥ śūra eva syād buddhisaṃpanna eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:107.012c: tābhyāṃ caiva bhayaṃ rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.012e: dharmātmanāṃ kva cil loke nānyāsti gatir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:107.013e: saṃsevyamānaḥ śatrūṃs te gṛhṇīyān mahato gaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:107.014a: yady ayaṃ pratiyudhyet tvāṃ svakarma kṣatriyasya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:107.015c: ayuddhvaiva niyogān me vaśe vaideha te sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.016a: sa tvaṃ dharmam avekṣasva tyaktvādharmam asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.016c: na hi kāmān na ca drohāt svadharmaṃ hātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:107.017a: naiva nityaṃ jayas tāta naiva nityaṃ parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.017c: tasmād bhojayitavyaś ca bhoktavyaś ca paro janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.018a: ātmany eva hi saṃdṛśyāv ubhau jayaparājayau
GE07mbh_12_u:107.020a: yathā brūyān mahāprājño yathā brūyād bahuśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:107.020c: śreyaskāmo yathā brūyād ubhayor yat kṣamaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:107.021a: tathā vacanam ukto 'smi kariṣyāmi ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:107.021c: etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:107.022a: tataḥ kauśalyam āhūya vaideho vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:107.022c: dharmato nītitaś caiva balena ca jito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:107.023a: so 'haṃ tvayā tv ātmaguṇair jitaḥ pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:107.024a: nāvamanye ca te buddhiṃ nāvamanye ca pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:107.025a: yathāvat pūjito rājan gṛhaṃ gantāsi me gṛhāt
GE07mbh_12_u:107.025c: tataḥ saṃpūjya tau vipraṃ viśvastau jagmatur gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:107.026a: vaidehas tv atha kausalyaṃ praveśya gṛham añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:107.027a: dadau duhitaraṃ cāsmai ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:107.027c: eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ sahyau jayaparājayau
GE07mbh_12_u:108.001c: dharmo vṛttaṃ ca vṛttiś ca vṛttyupāyaphalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:108.002a: rājñāṃ vṛttaṃ ca kośaś ca kośasaṃjananaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:108.003c: duṣṭasya ca parijñānam aduṣṭasya ca lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:108.004c: madhyamasya ca tuṣṭyarthaṃ yathā stheyaṃ vivardhatā
GE07mbh_12_u:108.006a: vijigīṣos tathāvṛttam uktaṃ caiva tathaiva te
GE07mbh_12_u:108.006c: gaṇānāṃ vṛttim icchāmi śrotuṃ matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:108.007a: yathā gaṇāḥ pravardhante na bhidyante ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:108.007c: arīn hi vijigīṣante suhṛdaḥ prāpnuvanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:108.008c: mantrasaṃvaraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahūnām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.009a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ nikhilena paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:108.009c: yathā ca te na bhidyeraṃs tac ca me brūhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:108.010a: gaṇānāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:108.011a: lobham eko hi vṛṇute tato 'marṣam anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:108.013c: bhinnā vimanasaḥ sarve gacchanty arivaśaṃ bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:108.014a: bhedād gaṇā vinaśyanti bhinnāḥ sūpajapāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.015c: bāhyāś ca maitrīṃ kurvanti teṣu saṃghātavṛttiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:108.017a: dharmiṣṭhān vyavahārāṃś ca sthāpayantaś ca śāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.018a: putrān bhrātṝn nigṛhṇanto vinaye ca sadā ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.020c: mānayantaḥ sadā yuktā vivardhante gaṇā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:108.021a: dravyavantaś ca śūrāś ca śastrajñāḥ śāstrapāragāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.021c: kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃmūḍhān gaṇān uttārayanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:108.022a: krodho bhedo bhayo daṇḍaḥ karśanaṃ nigraho vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.024c: na gaṇāḥ kṛtsnaśo mantraṃ śrotum arhanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:108.025a: gaṇamukhyais tu saṃbhūya kāryaṃ gaṇahitaṃ mithaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.026c: nigrahaḥ paṇḍitaiḥ kāryaḥ kṣipram eva pradhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.028a: ābhyantaraṃ bhayaṃ rakṣyaṃ surakṣyaṃ bāhyato bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:108.028c: abhyantarād bhayaṃ jātaṃ sadyo mūlaṃ nikṛntati
GE07mbh_12_u:108.029a: akasmāt krodhalobhād vā mohād vāpi svabhāvajāt
GE07mbh_12_u:108.030a: jātyā ca sadṛśāḥ sarve kulena sadṛśās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:108.030c: na tu śauryeṇa buddhyā vā rūpadravyeṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.031a: bhedāc caiva pramādāc ca nāmyante ripubhir gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:108.031c: tasmāt saṃghātam evāhur gaṇānāṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:109.001a: mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:109.001c: kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.002a: kiṃ kāryaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ garīyo bhavato matam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.002c: yathāyaṃ puruṣo dharmam iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:109.003a: mātāpitror gurūṇāṃ ca pūjā bahumatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:109.003c: atra yukto naro lokān yaśaś ca mahad aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:109.004a: yad ete hy abhijānīyuḥ karma tāta supūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.004c: dharmyaṃ dharmaviruddhaṃ vā tat kartavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:109.005a: na tair anabhyanujñāto dharmam anyaṃ prakalpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:109.005c: yam ete 'bhyanujānīyuḥ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.006a: eta eva trayo lokā eta evāśramās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.006c: eta eva trayo vedā eta eva trayo 'gnayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.007a: pitā hy agnir gārhapatyo mātāgnir dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.008a: triṣv apramādyann eteṣu trīṃl lokān avajeṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:109.008c: pitṛvṛttyā tv imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛvṛttyā tathāparam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.008e: brahmalokaṃ guror vṛttyā nityam eva cariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:109.009a: samyag eteṣu vartasva triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:109.009c: yaśaḥ prāpsyasi bhadraṃ te dharmaṃ ca sumahāphalam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.010a: naitān atiśayej jātu nātyaśnīyān na dūṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:109.010c: nityaṃ paricarec caiva tad vai sukṛtam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.010e: kīrtiṃ puṇyaṃ yaśo lokān prāpsyase ca janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:109.011a: sarve tasyādṛtā lokā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.011c: anādṛtās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.012a: naivāyaṃ na paro lokas tasya caiva paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:109.012c: amānitā nityam eva yasyaite guravas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.013a: na cāsmin na pare loke yaśas tasya prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:109.013c: na cānyad api kalyāṇaṃ pāratraṃ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.014a: tebhya eva tu tat sarvaṃ kṛtyayā visṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:109.014c: tad āsīn me śataguṇaṃ sahasraguṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:109.014e: tasmān me saṃprakāśante trayo lokā yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:109.016a: pitṝn daśa tu mātaikā sarvāṃ vā pṛthivīm api
GE07mbh_12_u:109.016e: gurur garīyān pitṛto mātṛtaś ceti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.017c: śarīram etau sṛjataḥ pitā mātā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:109.017e: ācāryaśiṣṭā yā jātiḥ sā divyā sājarāmarā
GE07mbh_12_u:109.018a: avadhyā hi sadā mātā pitā cāpy apakāriṇau
GE07mbh_12_u:109.018c: na saṃduṣyati tat kṛtvā na ca te dūṣayanti tam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.019a: ya āvṛṇoty avitathena karṇāv; ṛtaṃ bruvann amṛtaṃ saṃprayacchan
GE07mbh_12_u:109.019c: taṃ vai manye pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca; tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan
GE07mbh_12_u:109.020a: vidyāṃ śrutvā ye guruṃ nādriyante; pratyāsannaṃ manasā karmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_12_u:109.020c: yathaiva te gurubhir bhāvanīyās; tathā teṣāṃ guravo 'py arcanīyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.021a: tasmāt pūjayitavyāś ca saṃvibhajyāś ca yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.022a: yena prītāś ca pitaras tena prītaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.022c: prīṇāti mātaraṃ yena pṛthivī tena pūjitā
GE07mbh_12_u:109.023a: yena prīṇāty upādhyāyaṃ tena syād brahma pūjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.023c: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaś caiva tasmāt pūjyatamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.023e: ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca prīyante pitṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:109.024a: na kena cana vṛttena hy avajñeyo gurur bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:109.024c: na ca mātā na ca pitā tādṛśo yādṛśo guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.025a: na te 'vamānam arhanti na ca te dūṣayanti tam
GE07mbh_12_u:109.025c: gurūṇām eva satkāraṃ vidur devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.026a: upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca; ye 'bhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_12_u:109.026c: teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ; tasmān nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loke
GE07mbh_12_u:109.026d-0250_01: bhṛto vṛddho yo na bibharti putraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:109.028a: etat sarvam atideśena sṛṣṭaṃ; yat kartavyaṃ puruṣeṇeha loke
GE07mbh_12_u:109.028c: etac chreyo nānyad asmād viśiṣṭaṃ; sarvān dharmān anusṛtyaitad uktam
GE07mbh_12_u:110.001a: kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan naro varteta bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:110.002a: satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ cobhe lokān āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.002c: tayoḥ kim ācared rājan puruṣo dharmaniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.003a: kiṃ svit satyaṃ kim anṛtaṃ kiṃ svid dharmyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:110.003c: kasmin kāle vadet satyaṃ kasmin kāle 'nṛtaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:110.004a: satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:110.004c: yad bhūloke sudurjñātaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:110.005a: bhavet satyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:110.005c: yatrānṛtaṃ bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ vāpy anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:110.006a: tādṛśe muhyate bālo yatra satyam aniṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:110.008a: kim āścaryaṃ ca yan mūḍho dharmakāmo 'py adharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:110.008c: sumahat prāpnuyāt pāpaṃ gaṅgāyām iva kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.010c: yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.010d-0251_02: yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.010d-0252_01: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tapo dānaṃ damo matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.010d-0252_02: anasūyāpy amātsaryam anīrṣyā śīlam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:110.010d-0252_05: asmin dharme sthito rājan naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:110.011a: dhāraṇād dharma ity āhur dharmeṇa vidhṛtāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.011c: yat syād dhāraṇasaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.011d-0253_01: hitaṃ syād yatra bhūtānāṃ patitānāṃ susaṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:110.012a: śrutidharma iti hy eke nety āhur apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.012c: na tu tat pratyasūyāmo na hi sarvaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:110.013a: ye 'nyāyena jihīrṣanto dhanam icchanti karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:110.013c: tebhyas tan na tad ākhyeyaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.014a: akūjanena cen mokṣo nātra kūjet kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:110.014c: avaśyaṃ kūjitavyaṃ vā śaṅkeran vāpy akūjanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:110.014d-0254_01: ye 'nye cāpy anṛtaṃ kuryuḥ kuryād eva vicāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:110.015a: śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti vicāritam
GE07mbh_12_u:110.015b-0255_03: na stenaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād api
GE07mbh_12_u:110.015b-0255_04: śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti hi dhāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:110.015c: yaḥ pāpaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:110.016a: na ca tebhyo dhanaṃ deyaṃ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:110.016c: pāpebhyo hi dhanaṃ dattaṃ dātāram api pīḍayet
GE07mbh_12_u:110.017c: satyasaṃpratipattyarthaṃ ye brūyuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:110.017e: anuktvā tatra tad vācyaṃ sarve te 'nṛtavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.018a: prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:110.018e: pareṣāṃ dharmam ākāṅkṣan nīcaḥ syād dharmabhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.019a: pratiśrutya tu dātavyaṃ śvaḥkāryas tu balātkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.019c: yaḥ kaś cid dharmasamayāt pracyuto 'dharmam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.019d-0256_01: dambhenaiva sa hantavyas taṃ panthānaṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.020a: śaṭhaḥ svadharmam utsṛjya tam icched upajīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:110.021a: dhanam ity eva pāpānāṃ sarveṣām iha niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.021c: ye 'viṣahyā hy asaṃbhojyā nikṛtyā patanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.022a: cyutā devamanuṣyebhyo yathā pretās tathaiva te
GE07mbh_12_u:110.022b-0257_01: niryajñās tapasā hīnā mā sma taiḥ saha saṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.023a: ayaṃ vo rocatāṃ dharma iti vācyaḥ prayatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.023c: na kaś cid asti pāpānāṃ dharma ity eṣa niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.024a: tathāgataṃ ca yo hanyān nāsau pāpena lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:110.024c: svakarmaṇā hataṃ hanti hata eva sa hanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:110.024e: teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kaś cit kurvīta hatabuddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:110.025a: yathā kākaś ca gṛdhraś ca tathaivopadhijīvinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.026a: yasmin yathā vartate yo manuṣyas; tasmiṃs tathā vartitavyaṃ sa dharmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:110.026c: māyācāro māyayā vartitavyaḥ; sādhvācāraḥ sādhunā pratyudeyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.001a: kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tais tair bhāvais tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.001c: durgāṇy atitared yena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:111.003a: ye dambhān na japanti sma yeṣāṃ vṛttiś ca saṃvṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:111.003c: viṣayāṃś ca nigṛhṇanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.003d-0258_01: pratyāhur nocyamānā ye na hiṃsanti ca hiṃsitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.003d-0258_02: prayacchanti na yācante durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.004a: vāsayanty atithīn nityaṃ nityaṃ ye cānasūyakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.004c: nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.005a: mātāpitroś ca ye vṛttiṃ vartante dharmakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.006a: sveṣu dāreṣu vartante nyāyavṛtteṣv ṛtāv ṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:111.007a: ye na lobhān nayanty arthān rājāno rajasāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.008a: āhaveṣu ca ye śūrās tyaktvā maraṇajaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:111.008c: dharmeṇa jayam icchanto durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.009a: ye pāpāni na kurvanti karmaṇā manasā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:111.011a: anadhyāyeṣu ye viprāḥ svādhyāyaṃ naiva kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:111.012a: karmāṇy akuhakārthāni yeṣāṃ vācaś ca sūnṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.012c: yeṣām arthāś ca sādhvarthā durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.014a: ye ca saṃśāntarajasaḥ saṃśāntatamasaś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:111.014c: satye sthitā mahātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.015a: yeṣāṃ na kaś cit trasati trasanti na ca kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:111.015c: yeṣām ātmasamo loko durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.016a: paraśriyā na tapyante ye santaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.016c: grāmyād annān nivṛttāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.017a: sarvān devān namasyanti sarvān dharmāṃś ca śṛṇvate
GE07mbh_12_u:111.017c: ye śraddadhānā dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.018a: ye na mānitam icchanti mānayanti ca ye param
GE07mbh_12_u:111.018c: mānyamānā na manyante durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.019a: ye śrāddhāni ca kurvanti tithyāṃ tithyāṃ prajārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.020a: ye krodhaṃ naiva kurvanti kruddhān saṃśamayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:111.020c: na ca kupyanti bhṛtyebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.021a: madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.021c: janmaprabhṛti madyaṃ ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.022a: yātrārthaṃ bhojanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃtānārthaṃ ca maithunam
GE07mbh_12_u:111.023c: bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.024c: suhṛd bhrātā ca mitraṃ ca saṃbandhī ca tavācyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.025a: ya imān sakalāṃl lokāṃś carmavat pariveṣṭayet
GE07mbh_12_u:111.026a: sthitaḥ priyahite jiṣṇoḥ sa eṣa puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:111.026c: rājaṃs tava ca durdharṣo vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027a: ya enaṃ saṃśrayantīha bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027c: te tarantīha durgāṇi na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027d-0259_04: devam indraṃ namasyanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027d-0259_06: yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027d-0259_07: yaṃ viṣṇur indraḥ śaṃbhuś ca brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:111.027d-0259_09: tam arcayanti ye śaśvad durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.028a: durgātitaraṇaṃ ye ca paṭhanti śrāvayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:111.028c: pāṭhayanti ca viprebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:111.029c: saṃtared yena durgāṇi paratreha ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.001c: īdṛśān puruṣāṃs tāta kathaṃ vidyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.003a: purikāyāṃ puri purā śrīmatyāṃ pauriko nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.004a: sa tv āyuṣi parikṣīṇe jagāmānīpsitāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:112.005a: saṃsmṛtya pūrvajātiṃ sa nirvedaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.005c: na bhakṣayati māṃsāni parair upahṛtāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:112.006c: cakāra ca yathākāmam āhāraṃ patitaiḥ phalaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.006d-0260_01: parṇāhāraḥ kadā cic ca niyamavratavān api
GE07mbh_12_u:112.008a: tasya śaucam amṛṣyantaḥ sarve te sahajātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.008c: cālayanti sma tāṃ buddhiṃ vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.009a: vasan pitṛvane raudre śaucaṃ lapsitum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.009c: iyaṃ vipratipattis te yadā tvaṃ piśitāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.010a: tatsamo vā bhavāsmābhir bhakṣyān dāsyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.010c: bhuṅkṣva śaucaṃ parityajya yad dhi bhuktaṃ tad asti te
GE07mbh_12_u:112.011a: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvāca samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.012a: apramāṇaṃ prasūtir me śīlataḥ kriyate kulam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.012c: prārthayiṣye tu tat karma yena vistīryate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.013a: śmaśāne yadi vāso me samādhir me niśāmyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:112.014a: āśrame yo dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā dadyād anāśrame
GE07mbh_12_u:112.014c: kiṃ nu tat pātakaṃ na syāt tad vā dattaṃ vṛthā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:112.015c: anubandhe tu ye doṣās tān na paśyanti mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.016c: iha cāmutra cāniṣṭāṃ tasmād vṛttiṃ na rocaye
GE07mbh_12_u:112.017a: taṃ śuciṃ paṇḍitaṃ matvā śārdūlaḥ khyātavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.018a: saumya vijñātarūpas tvaṃ gaccha yātrāṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:112.018c: vriyantām īpsitā bhogāḥ parihāryāś ca puṣkalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.019a: tīkṣṇā vayam iti khyātā bhavato jñāpayāmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:112.020a: atha saṃpūjya tad vākyaṃ mṛgendrasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.020c: gomāyuḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe kiṃ cid ānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.024a: tān atītopadhān prājñān hite yuktān manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.025a: na tv evaṃ mama saṃtoṣād rocate 'nyan mṛgādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:112.025c: na kāmaye sukhān bhogān aiśvaryaṃ vā tvadāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.026a: na yokṣyati hi me śīlaṃ tava bhṛtyaiḥ purātanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.027a: saṃśrayaḥ ślāghanīyas tvam anyeṣām api bhāsvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:112.029a: kiṃ tu svenāsmi saṃtuṣṭo duḥkhā vṛttir anuṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.031c: na tat tiṣṭhati tuṣṭānāṃ vane mūlaphalāśinām
GE07mbh_12_u:112.032a: pānīyaṃ vā nirāyāsaṃ svādv annaṃ vā bhayottaram
GE07mbh_12_u:112.032c: vicārya khalu paśyāmi tat sukhaṃ yatra nirvṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.033a: aparādhair na tāvanto bhṛtyāḥ śiṣṭā narādhipaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.033c: upaghātair yathā bhṛtyā dūṣitā nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.034a: yadi tv etan mayā kāryaṃ mṛgendro yadi manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.034c: samayaṃ kṛtam icchāmi vartitavyaṃ yathā mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.035a: madīyā mānanīyās te śrotavyaṃ ca hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.035c: kalpitā yā ca te vṛttiḥ sā bhavet tava susthirā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.036a: na mantrayeyam anyais te sacivaiḥ saha karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:112.036c: nītimantaḥ parīpsanto vṛthā brūyuḥ pare mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.037a: eka ekena saṃgamya raho brūyāṃ hitaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:112.037c: na ca te jñātikāryeṣu praṣṭavyo 'haṃ hitāhite
GE07mbh_12_u:112.038a: mayā saṃmantrya paścāc ca na hiṃsyāḥ sacivās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.038c: madīyānāṃ ca kupito mā tvaṃ daṇḍaṃ nipātayeḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.040a: taṃ tathā satkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā yujyamānaṃ ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.041a: mitrabuddhyā ca gomāyuṃ sāntvayitvā praveśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:112.042c: aśaktāḥ kiṃ cid ādātuṃ dravyaṃ gomāyuyantritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.043c: dhanena mahatā caiva buddhir asya vilobhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.044a: na cāpi sa mahāprājñas tasmād dhairyāc cacāla ha
GE07mbh_12_u:112.044c: athāsya samayaṃ kṛtvā vināśāya sthitāḥ pare
GE07mbh_12_u:112.045a: īpsitaṃ ca mṛgendrasya māṃsaṃ yat tatra saṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.045c: apanīya svayaṃ tad dhi tair nyastaṃ tasya veśmani
GE07mbh_12_u:112.046a: yadarthaṃ cāpy apahṛtaṃ yena yac caiva mantritam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.046c: tasya tad viditaṃ sarvaṃ kāraṇārthaṃ ca marṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.047c: nopaghātas tvayā grāhyo rājan maitrīm ihecchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.047d-0261_01: iti tasya ca mantrasya sthityarthaṃ tad upekṣitam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:112.048a: bhojane copahartavye tan māṃsaṃ na sma dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.048c: mṛgarājena cājñaptaṃ mṛgyatāṃ cora ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:112.050a: saroṣas tv atha śārdūlaḥ śrutvā gomāyucāpalam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.051a: chidraṃ tu tasya tad dṛṣṭvā procus te pūrvamantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.051d-0263_01: niścityaivaṃ tatas tasya te tat karmāṇy avarṇayan
GE07mbh_12_u:112.052a: idaṃ cāsyedṛśaṃ karma vāllabhyena tu rakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.052c: śrutaś ca svāminā pūrvaṃ yādṛśo naiṣa tādṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.053f-0264_01: yadi vipratyayo hy eṣa tad idaṃ darśayāma te
GE07mbh_12_u:112.053f-0264_02: tanmāṃsaṃ caiva gomāyos tatkṣaṇāt tais tu ḍaukitam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.054a: māṃsāpanayanaṃ jñātvā vyāghras teṣāṃ tu tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.054c: ājñāpayām āsa tadā gomāyur vadhyatām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:112.057a: nocchritaṃ sahate kaś cit prakriyā vairakārikā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.057c: śucer api hi yuktasya doṣa eva nipātyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.057d-0265_01: muner api vanasthasya svāni karmāṇi kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.060a: śūnyāt tac ca gṛhān māṃsaṃ yad adyāpahṛtaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:112.060c: necchate dīyamānaṃ ca sādhu tāvad vimṛśyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:112.061c: dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās teṣu yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.062a: talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva
GE07mbh_12_u:112.062c: na caivāsti talaṃ vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.063c: parīkṣya jñāpayan hy arthān na paścāt paritapyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.064a: na duṣkaram idaṃ putra yat prabhur ghātayet param
GE07mbh_12_u:112.064c: ślāghanīyā ca varyā ca loke prabhavatāṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.065a: sthāpito 'yaṃ putra tvayā sāmanteṣv adhi viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.065c: duḥkhenāsādyate pātraṃ dhāryatām eṣa te suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:112.066a: dūṣitaṃ paradoṣair hi gṛhṇīte yo 'nyathā śucim
GE07mbh_12_u:112.067a: tasmād athārisaṃghātād gomāyoḥ kaś cid āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.067c: dharmātmā tena cākhyātaṃ yathaitat kapaṭaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.068c: pariṣvaktaś ca sasnehaṃ mṛgendreṇa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.071a: taṃ sa gomāyur ālokya snehād āgatasaṃbhramam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.072a: pūjito 'haṃ tvayā pūrvaṃ paścāc caiva vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.072c: pareṣām āspadaṃ nīto vastuṃ nārhāmy ahaṃ tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.073c: svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpy upahṛtāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.074a: parikṣīṇāś ca lubdhāś ca krūrāḥ kārābhitāpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.074c: hṛtasvā mānino ye ca tyaktopāttā mahepsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.075a: saṃtāpitāś ca ye ke cid vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.076a: avamānena yuktasya sthāpitasya ca me punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.076c: kathaṃ yāsyasi viśvāsam aham eṣyāmi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.077a: samartha iti saṃgṛhya sthāpayitvā parīkṣya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:112.077c: kṛtaṃ ca samayaṃ bhittvā tvayāham avamānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.078a: prathamaṃ yaḥ samākhyātaḥ śīlavān iti saṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:112.078c: na vācyaṃ tasya vaiguṇyaṃ pratijñāṃ parirakṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:112.079c: tvayi caiva hy aviśvāse mamodvego bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:112.080a: śaṅkitas tvam ahaṃ bhītaḥ pare chidrānudarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.080c: asnigdhāś caiva dustoṣāḥ karma caitad bahucchalam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.081a: duḥkhena śleṣyate bhinnaṃ śliṣṭaṃ duḥkhena bhidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.081c: bhinnaśliṣṭā tu yā prītir na sā snehena vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.082a: kaś cid eva hi bhītas tu dṛśyate na parātmanoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.082c: kāryāpekṣā hi vartante bhāvāḥ snigdhās tu durlabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:112.083a: suduḥkhaṃ puruṣajñānaṃ cittaṃ hy eṣāṃ calācalam
GE07mbh_12_u:112.083c: samartho vāpy aśakto vā śateṣv eko 'dhigamyate
GE07mbh_12_u:112.086c: gomāyuḥ prāyam āsīnas tyaktvā dehaṃ divaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:113.001a: kiṃ pārthivena kartavyaṃ kiṃ ca kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:113.001c: tan mamācakṣva tattvena sarvaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:113.002c: yathā rājñeha kartavyaṃ yac ca kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:113.003a: na tv evaṃ vartitavyaṃ sma yathedam anuśuśrumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.003c: uṣṭrasya sumahad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:113.005a: tapasas tasya cānte vai prītimān abhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.005c: vareṇa chandayām āsa tataś cainaṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.006a: bhagavaṃs tvatprasādān me dīrghā grīvā bhaved iyam
GE07mbh_12_u:113.006c: yojanānāṃ śataṃ sāgraṃ yā gacchec carituṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:113.007a: evam astv iti coktaḥ sa varadena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:113.007c: pratilabhya varaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yayāv uṣṭraḥ svakaṃ vanam
GE07mbh_12_u:113.008a: sa cakāra tad ālasyaṃ varadānāt sa durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.008c: na caicchac carituṃ gantuṃ durātmā kālamohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.009a: sa kadā cit prasāryaivaṃ tāṃ grīvāṃ śatayojanām
GE07mbh_12_u:113.010a: sa guhāyāṃ śirogrīvaṃ nidhāya paśur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.010c: āstātha varṣam abhyāgāt sumahat plāvayaj jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:113.011c: sadāras tāṃ guhām āśu praviveśa jalārditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.012a: sa dṛṣṭvā māṃsajīvī tu subhṛśaṃ kṣucchramānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.013a: yadā tv abudhyatātmānaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ sa vai paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.014a: yāvad ūrdhvam adhaś caiva grīvāṃ saṃkṣipate paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.014c: tāvat tena sadāreṇa jambukena sa bhakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.015a: sa hatvā bhakṣayitvā ca jambukoṣṭraṃ tatas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:113.016a: evaṃ durbuddhinā prāptam uṣṭreṇa nidhanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:113.016c: ālasyasya kramāt paśya mahad doṣam upāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:113.017a: tvam apy etaṃ vidhiṃ tyaktvā yogena niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:113.017c: vartasva buddhimūlaṃ hi vijayaṃ manur abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:113.019d-0267_01: asahāyavato hy arthā na tiṣṭhanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:113.021a: idaṃ hi sadbhiḥ kathitaṃ vidhijñaiḥ; purā mahendrapratimaprabhāva
GE07mbh_12_u:113.021c: mayāpi coktaṃ tava śāstradṛṣṭyā; tvam atra yuktaḥ pracarasva rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:114.002c: saritāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ sāgarasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:114.003c: papraccha saritaḥ sarvāḥ saṃśayaṃ jātam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.004c: yuṣmābhir iha pūrṇābhir anyāṃs tatra na vetasam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.005a: akāyaś cālpasāraś ca vetasaḥ kūlajaś ca vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.005c: avajñāya naśakyo vā kiṃ cid vā tena vaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.006a: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvāsām eva vo matam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.006c: yathā kūlāni cemāni bhittvā nānīyate vaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.007a: tataḥ prāha nadī gaṅgā vākyam uttaram arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:114.007c: hetumad grāhakaṃ caiva sāgaraṃ saritāṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:114.008a: tiṣṭhanty ete yathāsthānaṃ nagā hy ekaniketanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.008c: tatas tyajanti tat sthānaṃ prātilomyād acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.009a: vetaso vegam āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā namati netaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.009c: sa ca vege 'bhyatikrānte sthānam āsādya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:114.010a: kālajñaḥ samayajñaś ca sadā vaśyaś ca nodrumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.011c: oṣadhyaḥ pādapā gulmā na te yānti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.012a: yo hi śatror vivṛddhasya prabhor vadhavināśane
GE07mbh_12_u:114.012c: pūrvaṃ na sahate vegaṃ kṣipram eva sa naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:114.013a: sārāsāraṃ balaṃ vīryam ātmano dviṣataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:114.013c: jānan vicarati prājño na sa yāti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:114.014a: evam eva yadā vidvān manyetātibalaṃ ripum
GE07mbh_12_u:115.003c: duṣkṛtaṃ cātmano marṣī ruṣyaty evāpamārṣṭi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:115.005a: iti sa ślāghate nityaṃ tena pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:115.005c: idam ukto mayā kaś cit saṃmato janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:115.007a: yad yad brūyād alpamatis tat tad asya sahet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:115.007c: prākṛto hi praśaṃsan vā nindan vā kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:115.008a: yadi vāgbhiḥ prayogaḥ syāt prayoge pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:115.008c: vāg evārtho bhavet tasya na hy evārtho jighāṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:115.009c: mayūra iva kaupīnaṃ nṛtyan saṃdarśayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:115.010a: yasyāvācyaṃ na loke 'sti nākāryaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:115.010c: vācaṃ tena na saṃdadhyāc chuciḥ saṃkliṣṭakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:115.011a: pratyakṣaṃ guṇavādī yaḥ parokṣaṃ tu vinindakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:115.012a: tādṛg janaśatasyāpi yad dadāti juhoti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:115.013a: tasmāt prājño naraḥ sadyas tādṛśaṃ pāpacetasam
GE07mbh_12_u:115.014a: parivādaṃ bruvāṇo hi durātmā vai mahātmane
GE07mbh_12_u:115.014c: prakāśayati doṣān svān sarpaḥ phaṇam ivocchritam
GE07mbh_12_u:115.015a: taṃ svakarmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ pratikartuṃ ya icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:115.016c: mātaṅgam unmattam ivonnadantaṃ; tyajeta taṃ śvānam ivātiraudram
GE07mbh_12_u:115.017a: adhīrajuṣṭe pathi vartamānaṃ; damād apetaṃ vinayāc ca pāpam
GE07mbh_12_u:115.017c: arivrataṃ nityam abhūtikāmaṃ; dhig astu taṃ pāpamatiṃ manuṣyam
GE07mbh_12_u:115.018a: pratyucyamānas tu hi bhūya ebhir; niśāmya mā bhūs tvam athārtarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:115.018c: uccasya nīcena hi saṃprayogaṃ; vigarhayanti sthirabuddhayo ye
GE07mbh_12_u:115.019a: kruddho daśārdhena hi tāḍayed vā; sa pāṃsubhir vāpakiret tuṣair vā
GE07mbh_12_u:115.019c: vivṛtya dantāṃś ca vibhīṣayed vā; siddhaṃ hi mūrkhe kupite nṛśaṃse
GE07mbh_12_u:115.020a: vigarhaṇāṃ paramadurātmanā kṛtāṃ; saheta yaḥ saṃsadi durjanān naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:115.020c: paṭhed idaṃ cāpi nidarśanaṃ sadā; na vāṅmayaṃ sa labhati kiṃ cid apriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:116.001a: pitāmaha mahāprājña saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:116.001c: sa cchettavyas tvayā rājan bhavān kulakaro hi naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.003a: yad dhitaṃ rājyatantrasya kulasya ca sukhodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:116.003c: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca kṣemavṛddhikaraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:116.004c: annapāne śarīre ca hitaṃ yat tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:116.005a: abhiṣikto hi yo rājā rājyastho mitrasaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.005c: asuhṛt samupeto vā sa kathaṃ rañjayet prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.007a: tasya bhṛtyā viguṇatāṃ yānti sarve kulodgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.007c: na ca bhṛtyaphalair arthaiḥ sa rājā saṃprayujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:116.009a: śaṃsitā puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ naḥ kulahite rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.009c: kṣattā caiva paṭuprajño yo naḥ śaṃsati sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:116.011a: kīdṛṣāḥ saṃnikarṣasthā bhṛtyāḥ syur vā guṇānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.011c: kīdṛśaiḥ kiṃkulīnair vā saha yātrā vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:116.012a: na hy eko bhṛtyarahito rājā bhavati rakṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:116.012c: rājyaṃ cedaṃ janaḥ sarvas tat kulīno 'bhiśaṃsati
GE07mbh_12_u:116.013a: na hi praśāstuṃ rājyaṃ hi śakyam ekena bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:116.013c: asahāyavatā tāta naivārthāḥ ke cid apy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:116.013e: labdhuṃ labdhvā cāpi sadā rakṣituṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:116.014c: hitaiṣī kulajaḥ snigdhaḥ sa rājyaphalam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:116.019c: āptais tuṣṭaiś ca satataṃ dhāryate sa nṛpottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:116.022c: ṣaḍvargaṃ pratigṛhṇan sa dharmāt phalam upāśnute yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:117.000-0268_01: na santi kulajā yatra sahāyāḥ pārthivasya
GE07mbh_12_u:117.000-0268_02: akulīnāś ca kartavyā na vā bharatasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:117.002a: asyaivārthasya sadṛśaṃ yac chrutaṃ me tapovane
GE07mbh_12_u:117.008a: dattvā ca te sukhapraśnaṃ sarve yānti yathāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.008c: grāmyas tv ekaḥ paśus tatra nājahāc chvā mahāmunim
GE07mbh_12_u:117.013a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā krūram āyāntaṃ jīvitārthī narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:117.013c: provāca śvā muniṃ tatra yat tac chṛṇu mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:117.014a: śvaśatrur bhagavann atra dvīpī māṃ hantum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:117.014c: tvatprasādād bhayaṃ na syāt tasmān mama mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:117.014d-0269_01: tathā kuru mahābāho sarvajñas tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.014d-0270_01: sa munis tasya vijñāya bhāvajño bhayakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.015a: na bhayaṃ dvīpinaḥ kāryaṃ mṛtyutas te kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:117.016c: citrāṅgo visphuran hṛṣṭo vane vasati nirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.016d-0271_01: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa punar dvīpī ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:117.019a: tataḥ saṃvāsajaṃ sneham ṛṣiṇā kurvatā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.019c: sa dvīpī vyāghratāṃ nīto ripubhir balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.019e: tato dṛṣṭvā sa śārdūlo nābhyahaṃs taṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:117.020a: sa tu śvā vyāghratāṃ prāpya balavān piśitāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.020c: na mūlaphalabhogeṣu spṛhām apy akarot tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.021c: tathaiva sa mahārāja vyāghraḥ samabhavat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.022a: vyāghras tūṭajamūlasthas tṛptaḥ supto hatair mṛgaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.022c: nāgaś cāgāt tam uddeśaṃ matto megha ivotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.024a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuñjaraṃ mattam āyāntaṃ madagarvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.024c: vyāghro hastibhayāt trastas tam ṛṣiṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:117.025c: mahāmeghopamaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa bhīto 'bhavad gajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.027a: kadā cid ramamāṇasya hastinaḥ sumukhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.029a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃham āyāntaṃ nāgaḥ siṃhabhayākulaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.030a: tataḥ sa siṃhatāṃ nīto nāgendro muninā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.031a: dṛṣṭvā ca so 'naśat siṃho vanyo bhīsannavāgbalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.031c: sa cāśrame 'vasat siṃhas tasminn eva vane sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:117.034c: taṃ siṃhaṃ hantum āgacchan munes tasya niveśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.034d-0272_01: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śarabhaṃ yāntaṃ siṃhaḥ parabhayāturaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.035a: taṃ muniḥ śarabhaṃ cakre balotkaṭam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:117.035c: tataḥ sa śarabho vanyo muneḥ śarabham agrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.035e: dṛṣṭvā balinam atyugraṃ drutaṃ saṃprādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:117.036a: sa evaṃ śarabhasthāne nyasto vai muninā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.036c: muneḥ pārśvagato nityaṃ śārabhyaṃ sukham āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039c: iyeṣa taṃ muniṃ hantum akṛtajñaḥ śvayonijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_01: cintayām āsa ca tadā śarabhaḥ śvānapūrvakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_02: asya prabhāvāt saṃprāpto vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_04: anye 'py atra bhayatrastāḥ santi sattvā bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_05: munim āśritya jīvanto mṛgāḥ pakṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_06: teṣām api kadā cic ca śarabhatvaṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_08: pakṣiṇām apy ayaṃ dadyāt kadā cid gāruḍaṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_09: yāvad anyatra saṃprītaḥ kāruṇyaṃ tu samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_10: na dadāti balaṃ tuṣṭaḥ sattvasyānyasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_11: tāvad enam ahaṃ vipraṃ vadhiṣyāmi ca śīghrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.039d-0273_12: sthātuṃ mayā śakyam iha munighātān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040c: vijñāya ca mahāprājño muniḥ śvānaṃ tam uktavān munir uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040d-0274_02: manasā nirdahe sarvaṃ jagat saṃdhārayāmi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040d-0274_03: mama vaśyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ devān varjya carācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040d-0274_04: santi devāś ca me bhītāḥ svadharmaṃ na tyajanti ye
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040d-0274_06: kim aṅga tvaṃ mayā nītaḥ śarabhatvam anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:117.040d-0274_07: krūraḥ sa sarvabhūteṣu hīnaś cāśucir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:117.041a: śvā tvaṃ dvīpitvam āpanno dvīpī vyāghratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:117.041c: vyāghro nāgo madapaṭur nāgaḥ siṃhatvam āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:117.043a: yasmād evam apāpaṃ māṃ pāpa hiṃsitum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:117.043c: tasmāt svayonim āpannaḥ śvaiva tvaṃ hi bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:117.043d-0275_01: śvā pūrvaṃ dvīpy asi vyāghraḥ gajaḥ siṃhas tathāśva[ṣṭa]pāt
GE07mbh_12_u:117.043d-0275_02: nijena ca svabhāvena punaḥ śvāno bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:117.044c: ṛṣiṇā śarabhaḥ śaptaḥ svaṃ rūpaṃ punar āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:118.001a: sa śvā prakṛtim āpannaḥ paraṃ dainyam upāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:118.002c: ārjavaṃ prakṛtiṃ sattvaṃ kulaṃ vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ damam
GE07mbh_12_u:118.003a: anukrośaṃ balaṃ vīryaṃ bhāvaṃ saṃpraśamaṃ kṣamām
GE07mbh_12_u:118.003c: bhṛtyā ye yatra yogyāḥ syus tatra sthāpyāḥ suśikṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.005c: na pāpe kurute buddhiṃ nindyamāno 'py anāgasi
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0001: kākaḥ śvāno 'kulīnaś ca biḍālaḥ sarpa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0002: akulīnā ca yā nārī tulyās te parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0004: nārīṃ vā puruṣaṃ vātha śīlaṃ tatrāpi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0005: duṣkulīnā ca yā strī syād duṣkulīnaś ca yaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0007: dharmaṃ prati mahārāja ślokān āha bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0008: śṛṇu sarvān mahīpāla hṛdi tāṃś ca kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0010: vṛttastham api caṇḍālaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0011: yadi ghātayate kaś cit pāpasattvaṃ prajāhite
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0013: dvīpinaṃ śarabhaṃ siṃhaṃ vyāghraṃ kuñjaram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0017: brāhmaṇaḥ pāpakarmā ca mleccho vā dhārmikaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0018: śreyāṃs tatra bhaven mleccho brāhmaṇaḥ pāpakṛn na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0019: duṣkulīnaḥ kulīno vā yaḥ kaś cic chīlavān naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0020: prakṛtiṃ tasya vijñāya sthirāṃ vā yadi vāsthirām
GE07mbh_12_u:118.006d-012_0021: śīlavān uttamaṃ karma kuryād rājā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.008a: kṛtajñaṃ balavantaṃ ca kṣāntaṃ dāntaṃ jitendriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:118.011d-0276_02: ekaḥ kruddho raṇe kuryāt kuñjaraḥ sādhunoditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.011d-0276_06: kaḥ samarthaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ stabdhakarṇasya danti[naḥ]
GE07mbh_12_u:118.011d-0276_08: tat sainyaṃ kuñjarā yatra sa nṛpo yasya kuñjarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.014a: astabdhaṃ praśritaṃ śaktaṃ mṛduvādinam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:118.015a: sacivaṃ yaḥ prakurute na cainam avamanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:118.015c: tasya vistīryate rājyaṃ jyotsnā grahapater iva
GE07mbh_12_u:118.016a: etair eva guṇair yukto rājā śāstraviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.017a: dhīro marṣī śuciḥ śīghraḥ kāle puruṣakāravit
GE07mbh_12_u:118.018c: dāntaḥ sadā priyābhāṣī kṣamāvāṃś ca viparyaye
GE07mbh_12_u:118.023c: yodhāś caiva manuṣyendra sarvair guṇaguṇair vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:118.024c: na vimānayitavyāś ca rājñā vṛddhim abhīpsatā
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_02: naipuṇyaṃ cārthacaryāsu yasyaite tasya sā mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_03: ālasyaṃ caiva nidrā ca vyasanāny atihāsyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_04: yasyaitāni na vidyante tasyeyaṃ suciraṃ mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_06: dharmacaryā sadā yasya tasyeyaṃ suciraṃ mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_09: utthānaṃ caiva daivaṃ ca tayor nānātvam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_10: manunā varṇitaṃ pūrvaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu tad eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:118.026d-0277_14: viśeṣavic ca bhṛtyānāṃ sa rājyaphalam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:118.027a: sarvasaṃgrahaṇe yukto nṛpo bhavati yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.001a: evaṃ śunāsamān bhṛtyān svasthāne yo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.002a: na śvā svasthānam utkramya pramāṇam abhi satkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.002c: āropyaḥ śvā svakāt sthānād utkramyānyat prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:119.003c: prakartavyā budhā bhṛtyā nāsthāne prakriyā kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.005c: vyāghro vyāghra iva sthāpyo dvīpī dvīpī yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.006c: pratilomaṃ na bhṛtyās te sthāpyāḥ karmaphalaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.007c: bhṛtyān sthāpayate 'buddhir na sa rañjayate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.008a: na bāliśā na ca kṣudrā na cāpratimitendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.008c: nākulīnā narāḥ pārśve sthāpyā rājñā hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.009c: akṣudrāḥ śucayo dakṣā narāḥ syuḥ pāripārśvakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.010a: nyagbhūtās tatparāḥ kṣāntāś caukṣāḥ prakṛtijāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.010c: sve sve sthāne 'parikruṣṭās te syū rājño bahiścarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.011a: siṃhasya satataṃ pārśve siṃha eva jano bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:119.012a: yas tu siṃhaḥ śvabhiḥ kīrṇaḥ siṃhakarmaphale rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.012c: na sa siṃhaphalaṃ bhoktuṃ śaktaḥ śvabhir upāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.013a: evam etair manuṣyendra śūraiḥ prājñair bahuśrutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.013c: kulīnaiḥ saha śakyeta kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:119.015c: ye bhṛtyāḥ pārthivahitās teṣāṃ sāntvaṃ prayojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:119.016a: kośaś ca satataṃ rakṣyo yatnam āsthāya rājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.017a: koṣṭhāgāraṃ ca te nityaṃ sphītaṃ dhānyaiḥ susaṃcitam
GE07mbh_12_u:119.018a: nityayuktāś ca te bhṛtyā bhavantu raṇakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:119.020a: eṣā te naiṣṭhikī buddhiḥ prajñā cābhihitā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:119.020c: śvā te nidarśanaṃ tāta kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:120.002a: tad eva vistareṇoktaṃ pūrvair dṛṣṭaṃ satāṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.003a: rakṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānām iti kṣatre paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.003c: tad yathā rakṣaṇaṃ kuryāt tathā śṛṇu mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:120.004c: tathā bahuvidhaṃ rājā rūpaṃ kurvīta dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:120.005a: taikṣṇyaṃ jihmatvam ādāntyaṃ satyam ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:120.005c: madhyasthaḥ sattvam ātiṣṭhaṃs tathā vai sukham ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:120.006a: yasminn arthe hitaṃ yat syāt tad varṇaṃ rūpam āviśet
GE07mbh_12_u:120.006c: bahurūpasya rājño hi sūkṣmo 'py artho na sīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:120.007a: nityaṃ rakṣitamantraḥ syād yathā mūkaḥ śaracchikhī
GE07mbh_12_u:120.009e: loke cāyavyayau dṛṣṭvā vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāplavan
GE07mbh_12_u:120.010a: mṛjāvān syāt svayūthyeṣu bhāvāni caraṇaiḥ kṣipet
GE07mbh_12_u:120.012c: śrayec chāyām avijñātāṃ guptaṃ śaraṇam āśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:120.013e: na jahyāc ca tanutrāṇaṃ rakṣed ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:120.014c: pīḍayec cāpi tāṃ bhūmiṃ praṇaśyed gahane punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.016c: sarvataś cādadet prajñāṃ pataṃgān gahaneṣv iva
GE07mbh_12_u:120.019a: nigūḍhabuddhir dhīraḥ syād vaktavye vakṣyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:120.019c: saṃnikṛṣṭāṃ kathāṃ prājño yadi buddhyā bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.020c: āgamair upadiṣṭāni svasya caiva parasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:120.021a: kṣudraṃ krūraṃ tathā prājñaṃ śūraṃ cārthaviśāradam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.022c: sarvāṃs tān anuvarteta svarāṃs tantrīr ivāyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:120.023c: mamāyam iti rājā yaḥ sa parvata ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.025c: madhye vayasi nirdoṣān hite yuktāñ jitendriyān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.029a: vyaktaś cānugraho yasya yathārthaś cāpi nigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.029c: guptātmā guptarāṣṭraś ca sa rājā rājadharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:120.030a: nityaṃ rāṣṭram avekṣeta gobhiḥ sūrya ivotpatan
GE07mbh_12_u:120.030c: cārāṃś ca nacarān vidyāt tathā buddhyā na saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:120.031c: ahany ahani saṃduhyān mahīṃ gām iva buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.032a: yathā krameṇa puṣpebhyaś cinoti madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.032c: tathā dravyam upādāya rājā kurvīta saṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.033a: yad dhi guptāvaśiṣṭaṃ syāt tad dhitaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.035a: dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ saṃyamo buddhir agryā; dhairyaṃ śauryaṃ deśakālo 'pramādaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.035c: svalpasya vā mahato vāpi vṛddhau; dhanasyaitāny aṣṭa samindhanāni
GE07mbh_12_u:120.036a: agnistoko vardhate hy ājyasikto; bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasram eti
GE07mbh_12_u:120.036c: kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniśāmya; tasmād alpaṃ nāvamanyeta vidvān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.037a: bālo 'bālaḥ sthaviro vā ripur yaḥ; sadā pramattaṃ puruṣaṃ nihanyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:120.037c: kālenānyas tasya mūlaṃ hareta; kālajñātā pārthivānāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.038a: haret kīrtiṃ dharmam asyoparundhyād; arthe dīrghaṃ vīryam asyopahanyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:120.038c: ripur dveṣṭā durbalo vā balī vā; tasmāc chatrau naiva heḍed yatātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:120.039a: kṣayaṃ śatroḥ saṃcayaṃ pālanaṃ cāpy; ubhau cārthau sahitau dharmakāmau
GE07mbh_12_u:120.039c: ataś cānyan matimān saṃdadhīta; tasmād rājā buddhimantaṃ śrayeta
GE07mbh_12_u:120.040a: buddhir dīptā balavantaṃ hinasti; balaṃ buddhyā vardhate pālyamānam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.040c: śatrur buddhyā sīdate vardhamāno; buddheḥ paścāt karma yat tat praśastam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.041a: sarvān kāmān kāmayāno hi dhīraḥ; sattvenālpenāplute hīnadehaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.041c: yathātmānaṃ prārthayate 'rthamānaiḥ; śreyaḥpātraṃ pūrayate hy analpam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.042a: tasmād rājā pragṛhītaḥ pareṣu; mūlaṃ lakṣmyāḥ sarvato 'bhyādadīta
GE07mbh_12_u:120.042c: dīrghaṃ kālam api saṃpīḍyamāno; vidyutsaṃpātam iva mānorjitaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:120.043a: vidyā tapo vā vipulaṃ dhanaṃ vā; sarvam etad vyavasāyena śakyam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.043c: brahma yattaṃ nivasati dehavatsu; tasmād vidyād vyavasāyaṃ prabhūtam
GE07mbh_12_u:120.044a: yatrāsate matimanto manasvinaḥ; śakro viṣṇur yatra sarasvatī ca
GE07mbh_12_u:120.044c: vasanti bhūtāni ca yatra nityaṃ; tasmād vidvān nāvamanyeta deham
GE07mbh_12_u:120.045a: lubdhaṃ hanyāt saṃpradānena nityaṃ; lubdhas tṛptiṃ paravittasya naiti
GE07mbh_12_u:120.045c: sarvo lubdhaḥ karmaguṇopabhoge; yo 'rthair hīno dharmakāmau jahāti
GE07mbh_12_u:120.046a: dhanaṃ bhojyaṃ putradāraṃ samṛddhiṃ; sarvo lubdhaḥ prārthayate pareṣām
GE07mbh_12_u:120.046c: lubdhe doṣāḥ saṃbhavantīha sarve; tasmād rājā na pragṛhṇīta lubdhān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.047c: ārambhān dviṣatāṃ prājñaḥ sarvān arthāṃs tu sūdayet
GE07mbh_12_u:120.048a: dharmānviteṣu vijñāto mantrī guptaś ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:120.048c: āpto rājan kulīnaś ca paryāpto rājyasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:120.049a: vidhipravṛttān naradevadharmān; uktān samāsena nibodha buddhyā
GE07mbh_12_u:120.049c: imān vidadhyād vyanusṛtya yo vai; rājā mahīṃ pālayituṃ sa śaktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.050a: anītijaṃ yady avidhānajaṃ sukhaṃ; haṭhapraṇītaṃ vividhaṃ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:120.050c: na vidyate tasya gatir mahīpater; na vidyate rāṣṭrajam uttamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:120.051a: dhanair viśiṣṭān matiśīlapūjitān; guṇopapannān yudhi dṛṣṭavikramān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.051c: guṇeṣu dṛṣṭān acirād ihātmavān; sato 'bhisaṃdhāya nihanti śātravān
GE07mbh_12_u:120.052a: paśyed upāyān vividhaiḥ kriyāpathair; na cānupāyena matiṃ niveśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:120.052c: śriyaṃ viśiṣṭāṃ vipulaṃ yaśo dhanaṃ; na doṣadarśī puruṣaḥ samaśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:120.053a: prītipravṛttau vinivartane tathā; suhṛtsu vijñāya nivṛtya cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.053c: yad eva mitraṃ gurubhāram āvahet; tad eva susnigdham udāhared budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:120.054a: etān mayoktāṃs tava rājadharmān; nṛṇāṃ ca guptau matim ādadhatsva
GE07mbh_12_u:120.054c: avāpsyase puṇyaphalaṃ sukhena; sarvo hi lokottamadharmamūlaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.001c: īśvaraś ca mahādaṇḍo daṇḍe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:121.002a: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:121.003a: sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ loke tiryakṣv api nivāsinām
GE07mbh_12_u:121.003c: sarvavyāpī mahātejā daṇḍaḥ śreyān iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:121.004a: ity etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ daṇḍyaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:121.005a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:121.005c: ko daṇḍaḥ kīdṛśo daṇḍaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.006c: jāgarti sa kathaṃ daṇḍaḥ prajāsv avahitātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.007a: kaś ca pūrvāparam idaṃ jāgarti paripālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:121.007c: kaś ca vijñāyate pūrvaṃ ko 'paro daṇḍasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.007e: kiṃsaṃsthaś ca bhaved daṇḍaḥ kā cāsya gatir iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:121.008a: śṛṇu kauravya yo daṇḍo vyavahāryo yathā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.008c: yasmin hi sarvam āyattaṃ sa daṇḍa iha kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.009c: tasya lopaḥ kathaṃ na syāl lokeṣv avahitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.010a: api caitat purā rājan manunā proktam āditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.010e: prajā rakṣati yaḥ samyag dharma eva sa kevalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.011a: athoktam etad vacanaṃ prāg eva manunā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:121.011c: janma coktaṃ vasiṣṭhena brahmaṇo vacanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:121.012a: prāg idaṃ vacanaṃ proktam ataḥ prāgvacanaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.013c: daivaṃ hi paramo daṇḍo rūpato 'gnir ivocchikhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.015c: etad rūpaṃ bibharty ugraṃ daṇḍo nityaṃ durāvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.016a: asir gadā dhanuḥ śaktis triśūlaṃ mudgaraḥ śaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.017c: daṇḍa eva hi sarvātmā loke carati mūrtimān
GE07mbh_12_u:121.018a: bhindaṃś chindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pāṭayaṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:121.018c: ghātayann abhidhāvaṃś ca daṇḍa eva caraty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:121.020a: śāstraṃ brāhmaṇamantraś ca śāstā prāgvacanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.022a: daṇḍo hi bhagavān viṣṇur yajño nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.022c: śaśvad rūpaṃ mahad bibhran mahāpuruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:121.025a: kāmākāmāv ṛtur māsaḥ śarvarī divasaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.025c: aprasādaḥ prasādaś ca harṣaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.027a: antaś cādiś ca madhyaṃ ca kṛtyānāṃ ca prapañcanam
GE07mbh_12_u:121.027c: madaḥ pramādo darpaś ca dambho dhairyaṃ nayānayau
GE07mbh_12_u:121.028a: aśaktiḥ śaktir ity eva mānastambhau vyayāvyayau
GE07mbh_12_u:121.028c: vinayaś ca visargaś ca kālākālau ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:121.029a: anṛtaṃ jñājñatā satyaṃ śraddhāśraddhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.030c: virāddhiś caiva rāddhiś ca kāryākārye balābale
GE07mbh_12_u:121.031a: asūyā cānasūyā ca dharmādharmau tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.031c: apatrapānapatrape hrīś ca saṃpad vipac ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:121.033a: na syād yadīha daṇḍo vai pramatheyuḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:121.033c: bhayād daṇḍasya cānyonyaṃ ghnanti naiva yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:121.034a: daṇḍena rakṣyamāṇā hi rājann aharahaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.036a: dharmayuktā dvijāḥ śreṣṭhā vedayuktā bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.036c: babhūva yajño vedebhyo yajñaḥ prīṇāti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.037a: prītāś ca devatā nityam indre paridadaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:121.037c: annaṃ dadāti śakraś cāpy anugṛhṇann imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.038a: prāṇāś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ nityam anne pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.038c: tasmāt prajāḥ pratiṣṭhante daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.040a: īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ vittaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.040c: bhūtātmā jīva ity eva nāmabhiḥ procyate 'ṣṭabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.041a: adadad daṇḍa evāsmai dhruvam aiśvaryam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.041c: bale nayaś ca saṃyuktaḥ sadā pañcavidhātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.042c: āhāryaṃ cāṣṭakair dravyair balam anyad yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:121.043a: hastino 'śvā rathāḥ pattir nāvo viṣṭis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.043c: daiśikāś cārakāś caiva tad aṣṭāṅgaṃ balaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:121.044c: aśvārohāḥ padātāś ca mantriṇo rasadāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:121.045c: kośo mitrāṇi dhānyaṃ ca sarvopakaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.046a: saptaprakṛti cāṣṭāṅgaṃ śarīram iha yad viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.046c: rājyasya daṇḍa evāṅgaṃ daṇḍaḥ prabhava eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.047c: daṇḍo dattaḥ samānātmā daṇḍo hīdaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:121.049c: maulaś ca naraśārdūla śāstroktaś ca tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.050c: jñeyo na sa narendrastho daṇḍapratyaya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:121.051c: vyavahāraḥ smṛto yaś ca sa vedaviṣayātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.052a: yaś ca vedaprasūtātmā sa dharmo guṇadarśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.053c: trīn dhārayati lokān vai satyātmā bhūtivardhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.054a: yaś ca daṇḍaḥ sa dṛṣṭo no vyavahāraḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.054c: vyavahāraś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa dharma iti naḥ śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.054e: yaś ca vedaḥ sa vai dharmo yaś ca dharmaḥ sa satpathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.057a: mātā pitā ca bhrātā ca bhāryā cātha purohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:121.057c: nādaṇḍyo vidyate rājñāṃ yaḥ svadharme na tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:122.001c: aṅgeṣu rājā dyutimān vasuhoma iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.002a: sa rājā dharmanityaḥ san saha patnyā mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.004c: muñjapṛṣṭha iti proktaḥ sa deśo rudrasevitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.005a: sa tatra bahubhir yuktaḥ sadā śrutimayair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.006a: taṃ kadā cid adīnātmā sakhā śakrasya mānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.008a: vasuhomo 'pi rājño vai gām arghyaṃ ca nyavedayat
GE07mbh_12_u:122.008c: aṣṭāṅgasya ca rājyasya papraccha kuśalaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.009c: apṛcchad vasuhomas taṃ rājan kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:122.011a: bṛhaspater mataṃ rājann adhītaṃ sakalaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.012a: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi daṇḍa utpadyate katham
GE07mbh_12_u:122.012c: kiṃ vāpi pūrvaṃ jāgarti kiṃ vā paramam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:122.013a: kathaṃ kṣatriyasaṃsthaś ca daṇḍaḥ saṃpraty avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.014a: śṛṇu rājan yathā daṇḍaḥ saṃbhūto lokasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.015c: ṛtvijaṃ nātmanā tulyaṃ dadarśeti hi naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.016a: sa garbhaṃ śirasā devo varṣapūgān adhārayat
GE07mbh_12_u:122.016c: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu sa garbhaḥ kṣuvato 'patat
GE07mbh_12_u:122.017a: sa kṣupo nāma saṃbhūtaḥ prajāpatir ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:122.017c: ṛtvig āsīt tadā rājan yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.018a: tasmin pravṛtte satre tu brahmaṇaḥ pārthivarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:122.019c: naiva kāryaṃ na cākāryaṃ bhojyābhojyaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:122.020a: peyāpeyaṃ kutaḥ siddhir hiṃsanti ca parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.020c: gamyāgamyaṃ tadā nāsīt parasvaṃ svaṃ ca vai samam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.023a: atra sādhv anukampāṃ vai kartum arhasi kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.023b-0279_01: ayaṃ viṣṇuḥ sakhā tubhyaṃ dharmasya parirakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:122.023b-0279_02: tvaṃ hi sarvavidhānajñaḥ sattvānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.023c: saṃkaro na bhaved atra yathā vai tad vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:122.024a: tataḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlajaṭādharaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025a: tasmāc ca dharmacaraṇāṃ nītiṃ devīṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025c: asṛjad daṇḍanītiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0002: daṇḍasya nayanāt sā hi daṇḍanītir ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0003: bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūladharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0008: purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0009: āyurvedo dhanurvedo gāndharvaś ceti te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0010: arthaśāstraṃ caturthaṃ tu vidyā hy aṣṭādaśaiva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0011: daśa cāṣṭau ca vikhyātā etā dharmasya saṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0012: etāsām eva vidyānāṃ vyāsam āha maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0013: śatāni trīṇi śāstrāṇām āha tantrāṇi saptatim
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0014: vyāsa eva tu vidyānāṃ mahādevena kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0015: tantraṃ pāśupataṃ nāma pāñcarātraṃ ca viśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0016: yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca tantraṃ lokāyataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0019: tarkavidyās tathā cāṣṭau sa cokto nyāyavistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0020: daśa cāṣṭau ca vijñeyāḥ paurāṇā yajñasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0021: purāṇāś ca praṇītāś ca tāvad eva hi saṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0025: provāca bhagavān devaḥ kālajñānāni yāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0030: punar bhedasahasraṃ ca tāsām eva tu vistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0032: śaśvad abhyasyate loke veda eva ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0033: vidyāś catasraḥ saṃkṣiptā vedavādāś ca te smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0034: etāsāṃ pārago yaś ca sa cokto vedapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0035: vedānāṃ pārago rudro viṣṇur indro bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0037: brahmā ca paramo devaḥ sadā sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0039: ahaṃ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ prasādān mādhavasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0040: śaṃkarasya prasādāc ca brahmaṇaś ca kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0041: vedapāraga ity ukto yājñavalkyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0043: ṛṣiputrair ṛṣīkaiś ca bhidyante miśrakair api
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0044: śivena brahmaṇā caiva viṣṇunā ca vikalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0045: ādikalpe punaś caiva bhidyante sādhubhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.025d-013_0046: idānīm api vidvadbhir bhidyante ca vikalpakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.026a: bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlavarāyudhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.027c: yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ cāpi pitṝṇām akarot patim
GE07mbh_12_u:122.028a: dhanānāṃ rakṣasāṃ cāpi kuberam api ceśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:122.028c: parvatānāṃ patiṃ meruṃ saritāṃ ca mahodadhim
GE07mbh_12_u:122.029a: apāṃ rājye surāṇāṃ ca vidadhe varuṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:122.029c: mṛtyuṃ prāṇeśvaram atho tejasāṃ ca hutāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.030a: rudrāṇām api ceśānaṃ goptāraṃ vidadhe prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.030d-0281_01: daśa caikaṃ ca ye rudrās tasyaite mūrtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.030d-0281_02: nānārūpadharo devaḥ sa eva bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.032a: vīrudhām aṃśumantaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca prabhuṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.033c: mṛtyoś caturvibhāgasya duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034c: sarveṣām eva rudrāṇāṃ śūlapāṇir iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034d-0282_01: īśvaraś cetanaḥ kartā puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034d-0282_02: viṣṇur brahmā śaśī sūryaḥ śakro devāś ca sānvayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034d-0282_03: jñānātmakaḥ śivo hy eva eteṣām api kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034d-0282_04: sṛjate grasate caiva tamobhūtam idaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.034d-0282_05: aprajñātaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tadā hy eko maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.035a: tam ekaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putram anujātaṃ kṣupaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:122.036a: mahādevas tatas tasmin vṛtte yajñe yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:122.036c: daṇḍaṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ viṣṇave satkṛtaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:122.038a: bhṛgur dadāv ṛṣibhyas tu taṃ daṇḍaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.039a: kṣupas tu manave prādād ādityatanayāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:122.039e: taṃ dadau sūryaputras tu manur vai rakṣaṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.040a: vibhajya daṇḍaḥ kartavyo dharmeṇa na yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.041a: vyaṅgatvaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vā nālpakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:122.041c: śarīrapīḍās tās tās tu dehatyāgo vivāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:122.042a: ānupūrvyā ca daṇḍo 'sau prajā jāgarti pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:122.042c: indro jāgarti bhagavān indrād agnir vibhāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.043a: agner jāgarti varuṇo varuṇāc ca prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.044a: dharmāc ca brahmaṇaḥ putro vyavasāyaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.045a: oṣadhyas tejasas tasmād oṣadhibhyaś ca parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.045c: parvatebhyaś ca jāgarti raso rasaguṇāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.046a: jāgarti nirṛtir devī jyotīṃṣi nirṛter api
GE07mbh_12_u:122.046c: vedāḥ pratiṣṭhā jyotirbhyas tato hayaśirāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.047a: brahmā pitāmahas tasmāj jāgarti prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.048a: viśvedevāḥ śivāc cāpi viśvebhyaś ca tatharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.048c: ṛṣibhyo bhagavān somaḥ somād devāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.049c: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca rājanyā lokān rakṣanti dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.050a: prajā jāgrati loke 'smin daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:122.051a: jāgarti kālaḥ pūrvaṃ ca madhye cānte ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:122.052a: devadevaḥ śivaḥ śarvo jāgarti satataṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.052c: kapardī śaṃkaro rudro bhavaḥ sthāṇur umāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.053a: ity eṣa daṇḍo vikhyāta ādau madhye tathāvare
GE07mbh_12_u:122.054a: itīdaṃ vasuhomasya śṛṇuyād yo mataṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.054c: śrutvā ca samyag varteta sa kāmān āpnuyān nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:122.055a: iti te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yo daṇḍo manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:122.055d-0283_01: vasuhomāc chrutaṃ rājñā māndhātrā bhūbhṛtā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:122.055d-0283_02: mayāpi kathitaṃ puṇyam ākhyānaṃ prathitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:123.001c: lokayātrā hi kārtsnyena triṣv eteṣu pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:123.002a: dharmārthakāmāḥ kiṃmūlās trayāṇāṃ prabhavaś ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.002c: anyonyaṃ cānuṣajjante vartante ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:123.005c: mūlam etat trivargasya nivṛttir mokṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:123.006c: kāmo ratiphalaś cātra sarve caite rajasvalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.007a: saṃnikṛṣṭāṃś cared enān na cainān manasā tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:123.008a: śreṣṭhabuddhis trivargasya yad ayaṃ prāpnuyāt kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:123.008b-0284_01: karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty artho na vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.008c: buddhyā budhyed ihārthe na tad ahnā tu nikṛṣṭayā
GE07mbh_12_u:123.013a: adharmo dharma iti ha yo 'jñānād ācared iha
GE07mbh_12_u:123.013c: taṃ cāpi prathitaṃ loke kathaṃ rājā nivartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:123.015c: tasmān nāstikatā caiva durācāraś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:123.016a: durācārān yadā rājā praduṣṭān na niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:123.016c: tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:123.017a: taṃ prajā nānuvartante brāhmaṇā na ca sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.017c: tataḥ saṃkṣayam āpnoti tathā vadhyatvam eti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:123.018a: apadhvastas tv avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:123.018c: jīvec ca yad apadhvastas tac chuddhaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:123.019a: atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya ca nibarhaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:123.019c: sevitavyā trayī vidyā satkāro brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:123.020a: mahāmanā bhaved dharme vivahec ca mahākule
GE07mbh_12_u:123.021a: japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt sumukho nānyad āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.022a: prasādayen madhuraya vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:123.022c: ity asmīti vaden nityaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:123.023a: apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:123.023c: pāpāny api ca kṛcchrāṇi śamayen nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:123.024a: guravo 'pi paraṃ dharmaṃ yad brūyus tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:123.024c: gurūṇāṃ hi prasādād dhi śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:124.001a: ime janā naraśreṣṭha praśaṃsanti sadā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:124.001c: dharmasya śīlam evādau tato me saṃśayo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:124.002a: yadi tac chakyam asmābhir jñātuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:124.002c: śrotum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ yathaitad upalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:124.003a: kathaṃ nu prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:124.003c: kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ ca tat proktaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:124.005c: sabhāyāṃ cāvahasanaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:124.006a: bhavatas tāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ cāpy anuttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:124.008a: kimarthaṃ tapyase putra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.008c: śrutvā tvām anuneṣyāmi yadi samyag bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:124.009a: yathā tvaṃ mahad aiśvaryaṃ prāptaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:124.009c: kiṃkarā bhrātaraḥ sarve mitrāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.010c: ājāneyā vahanti tvāṃ kasmāc chocasi putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:124.012a: dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ divyapuṣpaphalānvitām
GE07mbh_12_u:124.013a: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pāṇḍaveyānām ṛddhim indropamāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:124.014a: yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta yādṛśīṃ tāṃ yudhiṣṭhire
GE07mbh_12_u:124.014c: viśiṣṭāṃ vā naravyāghra śīlavān bhava putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:124.015a: śīlena hi trayo lokāḥ śakyā jetuṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.015c: na hi kiṃ cid asādhyaṃ vai loke śīlavatāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:124.017a: ete hi pārthivāḥ sarve śīlavanto damānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.017c: atas teṣāṃ guṇakrītā vasudhā svayam āgamat duryodhana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:124.017d-0286_01: kathaṃ tat prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:124.017d-0286_02: yena śīlena saṃprāptāḥ kṣipram ete vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:124.018c: nāradena purā proktaṃ śīlam āśritya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:124.019c: śīlam āśritya daityena trailokyaṃ ca vaśīkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.020c: uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ śreya icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:124.021a: tato bṛhaspatis tasmai jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:124.022a: etāvac chreya ity eva bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:124.022c: indras tu bhūyaḥ papraccha kva viśeṣo bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:124.023c: tatrāgamaya bhadraṃ te bhūya eva puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:124.024a: ātmanas tu tataḥ śreyo bhārgavāt sumahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.024c: jñānam āgamayat prītyā punaḥ sa paramadyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.025c: śreyo 'stīti punar bhūyaḥ śukram āha śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.026a: bhārgavas tv āha dharmajñaḥ prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.026c: jñānam asti viśeṣeṇa tato hṛṣṭaś ca so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:124.027a: sa tato brāhmaṇo bhūtvā prahrādaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.027c: sṛtvā provāca medhāvī śreya icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:124.028a: prahrādas tv abravīd vipraṃ kṣaṇo nāsti dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:124.029a: brāhmaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ kasmin kāle kṣaṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:124.029c: tatopadiṣṭam icchāmi yad yat kāryāntaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:124.030c: tathety uktvā śubhe kāle jñānatattvaṃ dadau tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.032a: pṛṣṭaś ca tena bahuśaḥ prāptaṃ katham ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:124.032c: trailokyarājyaṃ dharmajña kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:124.033c: kavyāni vadatāṃ tāta saṃyacchāmi vahāmi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:124.034a: te visrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.034c: te mā kavyapade saktaṃ śuśrūṣum anasūyakam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.035c: samācinvanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.037a: etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.037c: yad brāhmaṇamukhe kavyam etac chrutvā pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:124.038a: etāvac chreya ity āha prahrādo brahmavādinam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.038c: śuśrūṣitas tena tadā daityendro vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:124.039c: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te pradātāsmi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.040a: kṛtam ity eva daityendram uvāca sa ca vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.040c: prahrādas tv abravīt prīto gṛhyatāṃ vara ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:124.041a: yadi rājan prasannas tvaṃ mama cecchasi ced dhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.041c: bhavataḥ śīlam icchāmi prāptum eṣa varo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:124.042a: tataḥ prītaś ca daityendro bhayaṃ cāsyābhavan
GE07mbh_12_u:124.042c: vare pradiṣṭe vipreṇa nālpatejāyam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:124.043a: evam astv iti taṃ prāha prahrādo vismitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.044a: datte vare gate vipre cintāsīn mahatī tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.044c: prahrādasya mahārāja niścayaṃ na ca jagmivān
GE07mbh_12_u:124.045c: tejo vigrahavat tāta śarīram ajahāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.046a: tam apṛcchan mahākāyaṃ prahrādaḥ ko bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:124.046c: pratyāha nanu śīlo 'smi tyakto gacchāmy ahaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.047a: tasmin dvijavare rājan vatsyāmy aham aninditam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.047c: yo 'sau śiṣyatvam āgamya tvayi nityaṃ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.047e: ity uktvāntarhitaṃ tad vai śakraṃ cānvaviśat prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:124.048a: tasmiṃs tejasi yāte tu tādṛgrūpas tato 'paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.048c: śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya ko bhavān iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:124.049a: dharmaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yatrāsau dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.049c: tatra yāsyāmi daityendra yataḥ śīlaṃ tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:124.051a: ko bhavān iti pṛṣṭaś ca tam āha sa mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.051c: satyam asmy asurendrāgrya yāsye 'haṃ dharmam anv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:124.052c: niścakrāma tatas tasmāt pṛṣṭaś cāha mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.052e: vṛttaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yataḥ satyaṃ tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:124.053a: tasmin gate mahāśvetaḥ śarīrāt tasya niryayau
GE07mbh_12_u:124.053c: pṛṣṭaś cāha balaṃ viddhi yato vṛttam ahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.053e: ity uktvā ca yayau tatra yato vṛttaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:124.054a: tataḥ prabhāmayī devī śarīrāt tasya niryayau
GE07mbh_12_u:124.054c: tām apṛcchat sa daityendraḥ sā śrīr ity evam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:124.055c: tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi balaṃ yatra tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:124.056c: apṛcchata ca tāṃ bhūyaḥ kva yāsi kamalālaye
GE07mbh_12_u:124.057a: tvaṃ hi satyavratā devī lokasya parameśvarī
GE07mbh_12_u:124.057c: kaś cāsau brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhas tattvam icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:124.058a: sa śakro brahmacārī ca yas tvayā copaśikṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.058c: trailokye te yad aiśvaryaṃ tat tenāpahṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:124.059a: śīlena hi tvayā lokāḥ sarve dharmajña nirjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.059c: tad vijñāya mahendreṇa tava śīlaṃ hṛtaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:124.060a: dharmaḥ satyaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ balaṃ caiva tathā hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:124.060c: śīlamūlā mahāprājña sadā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:124.061a: evam uktvā gatā tu śrīs te ca sarve yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:124.061c: duryodhanas tu pitaraṃ bhūya evābravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.062c: prāpyate ca yathā śīlaṃ tam upāyaṃ vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:124.063c: saṃkṣepatas tu śīlasya śṛṇu prāptiṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:124.064c: anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca śīlam etat praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:124.065a: yad anyeṣāṃ hitaṃ na syād ātmanaḥ karma pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.065c: apatrapeta vā yena na tat kuryāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:124.066a: tat tu karma tathā kuryād yena ślāgheta saṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:124.067a: yady apy aśīlā nṛpate prāpnuvanti kva cic chriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.067c: na bhuñjate ciraṃ tāta samūlāś ca patanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:124.068a: etad viditvā tattvena śīlavān bhava putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:124.068d-0288_01: jitā sabhā śāstravatā samāsā[? -masyā] gomatā jitā
GE07mbh_12_u:124.068d-0288_02: adhvā jito yānavatā sarvaṃ śīlavatā jitam
GE07mbh_12_u:124.068d-0289_01: adhikāṃ vāpi rājendra tatas tvaṃ śīlavān bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:124.069c: etat kuruṣva kaunteya tataḥ prāpsyasi tat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:125.001a: śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣe kathitaṃ te pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:125.001c: katham āśā samutpannā yā ca sā tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:125.002a: saṃśayo me mahān eṣa samutpannaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:125.002c: chettā ca tasya nānyo 'sti tvattaḥ parapuraṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:125.003c: prāpte yuddhe tu yad yuktaṃ tat kartāyam iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:125.005a: so 'haṃ hatāśo durbuddhiḥ kṛtas tena durātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:125.006a: āśāṃ mahattarāṃ manye parvatād api sadrumāt
GE07mbh_12_u:125.006c: ākāśād api vā rājann aprameyaiva vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.007c: durlabhatvāc ca paśyāmi kim anyad durlabhaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.008a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tat
GE07mbh_12_u:125.009a: sumitro nāma rājarṣir haihayo mṛgayāṃ gataḥ
