GE07mbh_12_u:125.009c: sasāra sa mṛgaṃ viddhvā bāṇena nataparvaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:125.010a: sa mṛgo bāṇam ādāya yayāv amitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.010c: sa ca rājā balī tūrṇaṃ sasāra mṛgam antikāt
GE07mbh_12_u:125.011a: tato nimnaṃ sthalaṃ caiva sa mṛgo 'dravad āśugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.011c: muhūrtam eva rājendra samena sa pathāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:125.012a: tataḥ sa rājā tāruṇyād aurasena balena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:125.013a: tīrtvā nadān nadīś caiva palvalāni vanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:125.014a: sa tu kāmān mṛgo rājann āsādyāsādya taṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_12_u:125.014c: punar abhyeti javano javena mahatā tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.015a: sa tasya bāṇair bahubhiḥ samabhyasto vanecaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.015c: prakrīḍann iva rājendra punar abhyeti cāntikam
GE07mbh_12_u:125.016a: punaś ca javam āsthāya javano mṛgayūthapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.018c: tasya bāṇapathaṃ tyaktvā tasthivān prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:125.019a: tasmin nipatite bāṇe bhūmau prajvalite tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.020c: āsasāda tato rājā śrāntaś copāviśat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.021a: taṃ kārmukadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā śramārtaṃ kṣudhitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:125.021c: sametya ṛṣayas tasmin pūjāṃ cakrur yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:125.021d-0290_01: sa pūjām ṛṣibhir dattāṃ pratigṛhya narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.021d-0290_02: apṛcchat tāpasān sarvāṃs tapaso vṛddhim uttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:125.021d-0290_03: te tasya rājño vacanaṃ pratigṛhya tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.023c: etad icchāma vijñātuṃ kutaḥ prāpto 'si mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:125.023e: kasmin kule hi jātas tvaṃ kiṃnāmāsi bravīhi naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.024a: tataḥ sa rājā sarvebhyo dvijebhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:125.024c: ācakhyau tad yathānyāyaṃ paricaryāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:125.026a: mṛgas tu viddho bāṇena mayā sarati śalyavān
GE07mbh_12_u:125.026c: taṃ dravantam anu prāpto vanam etad yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:125.027a: kiṃ nu duḥkham ato 'nyad vai yad ahaṃ śramakarśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.028c: duḥkhaṃ karoti tat tīvraṃ yathāśā vihatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:125.029a: himavān vā mahāśailaḥ samudro vā mahodadhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.029e: āśāyās tapasi śreṣṭhās tathā nāntam ahaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.030a: bhavatāṃ viditaṃ sarvaṃ sarvajñā hi tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.031a: āśāvān puruṣo yaḥ syād antarikṣam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:125.031c: kiṃ nu jyāyastaraṃ loke mahattvāt pratibhāti vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.031e: etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ kim iha durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:125.032a: yadi guhyaṃ taponityā na vo brūteha māciram
GE07mbh_12_u:125.032c: na hi guhyam ataḥ śrotum icchāmi dvijapuṃgavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.033a: bhavattapovighāto vā yena syād virame tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.033c: yadi vāsti kathāyogo yo 'yaṃ praśno mayeritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:125.034c: bhavanto hi taponityā brūyur etat samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.001c: ṛṣabho nāma viprarṣiḥ smayann iva tato 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:126.003a: yatra sā badarī ramyā hrado vaihāyasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.003c: yatra cāśvaśirā rājan vedān paṭhati śāśvatān
GE07mbh_12_u:126.004a: tasmin sarasi kṛtvāhaṃ vidhivat tarpaṇaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.004c: pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca tato ''śramam iyāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.005a: remāte yatra tau nityaṃ naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:126.005c: adūrād āśramaṃ kaṃ cid vāsārtham agamaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.006a: tataś cīrājinadharaṃ kṛśam uccam atīva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.006c: adrākṣam ṛṣim āyāntaṃ tanuṃ nāma taponidhim
GE07mbh_12_u:126.007c: kṛśatā cāpi rājarṣe na dṛṣṭā tādṛśī kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:126.008c: grīvā bāhū tathā pādau keśāś cādbhutadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.009a: śiraḥ kāyānurūpaṃ ca karṇau netre tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.009c: tasya vāk caiva ceṣṭā ca sāmānye rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.010a: dṛṣṭvāhaṃ taṃ kṛśaṃ vipraṃ bhītaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.011a: nivedya nāma gotraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:126.011c: pradiṣṭe cāsane tena śanair aham upāviśam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.012a: tataḥ sa kathayām āsa kathā dharmārthasaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.013a: tasmiṃs tu kathayaty eva rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.014a: smaran putram araṇye vai naṣṭaṃ paramadurmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.015a: iha drakṣyāmi taṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīheti pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.015c: evam āśākṛto rājaṃś caran vanam idaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.016a: durlabhaḥ sa mayā draṣṭuṃ nūnaṃ paramadhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.016c: ekaḥ putro mahāraṇye naṣṭa ity asakṛt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.017a: durlabhaḥ sa mayā draṣṭum āśā ca mahatī mama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.018a: etac chrutvā sa bhagavāṃs tanur munivarottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.019c: uvāca vākyaṃ dīnātmā mandaṃ mandam ivāsakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:126.020a: durlabhaṃ kiṃ nu viprarṣe āśāyāś caiva kiṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:126.020c: bravītu bhagavān etad yadi guhyaṃ na tan mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:126.021a: maharṣir bhagavāṃs tena pūrvam āsīd vimānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.022a: arthayan kalaśaṃ rājan kāñcanaṃ valkalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.022c: nirviṇṇaḥ sa tu viprarṣir nirāśaḥ samapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:126.023c: śrānto nyaṣīdad dharmātmā yathā tvaṃ narasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.024a: arghyaṃ tataḥ samānīya pādyaṃ caiva mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.025a: tatas te munayaḥ sarve parivārya nararṣabham
GE07mbh_12_u:126.026a: apṛcchaṃś caiva te tatra rājānam aparājitam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.026c: prayojanam idaṃ sarvam āśramasya praveśanam rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.027a: vīradyumna iti khyāto rājāhaṃ dikṣu viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.027c: bhūridyumnaṃ sutaṃ naṣṭam anveṣṭuṃ vanam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.028a: ekaputraḥ sa viprāgrya bāla eva ca so 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:126.028c: na dṛśyate vane cāsmiṃs tam anveṣṭuṃ carāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:126.029a: evam ukte tu vacane rājñā munir adhomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.029c: tūṣṇīm evābhavat tatra na ca pratyuktavān nṛpam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.030a: sa hi tena purā vipro rājñā nātyarthamānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.030c: āśākṛśaṃ ca rājendra tapo dīrghaṃ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.031a: pratigraham ahaṃ rājñāṃ na kariṣye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:126.031c: anyeṣāṃ caiva varṇānām iti kṛtvā dhiyaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.032a: āśā hi puruṣaṃ bālaṃ lālāpayati tasthuṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:126.032c: tām ahaṃ vyapaneṣyāmi iti kṛtvā vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.032d-0292_01: vīradyumnas tu taṃ bhūyaḥ papraccha munisattamam rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.033a: āśāyāḥ kiṃ kṛśatvaṃ ca kiṃ ceha bhuvi durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:126.033c: bravītu bhagavān etat tvaṃ hi dharmārthadarśivān
GE07mbh_12_u:126.034a: tataḥ saṃsmṛtya tat sarvaṃ smārayiṣyann ivābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:126.034c: rājānaṃ bhagavān vipras tataḥ kṛśatanus tanuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.035a: kṛśatve na samaṃ rājann āśāyā vidyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:126.035c: tasyā vai durlabhatvāt tu prārthitāḥ pārthivā mayā rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.036a: kṛśākṛśe mayā brahman gṛhīte vacanāt tava
GE07mbh_12_u:126.036c: durlabhatvaṃ ca tasyaiva vedavākyam iva dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:126.037a: saṃśayas tu mahāprājña saṃjāto hṛdaye mama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.037c: tan me sattama tattvena vaktum arhasi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.038a: tvattaḥ kṛśataraṃ kiṃ nu bravītu bhagavān idam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.038c: yadi guhyaṃ na te vipra loke 'smin kiṃ nu durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:126.039a: durlabho 'py atha vā nāsti yo 'rthī dhṛtim ivāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:126.040c: saktā yā sarvabhūteṣu sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.040d-0293_01: kṛtaghneṣu ca yā saktā nṛśaṃseṣv alaseṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.040d-0293_02: apakāriṣu yā saktā sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.041a: ekaputraḥ pitā putre naṣṭe vā proṣite tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.041c: pravṛttiṃ yo na jānāti sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.042c: tathā narendra dhaninām āśā kṛśatarī mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.042d-0294_02: śrutvā kathās tathāyuktāḥ sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.043a: etac chrutvā tato rājan sa rājā sāvarodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.043c: saṃspṛśya pādau śirasā nipapāta dvijarṣabhe rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.044b-0295_01: yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā saṃprati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.044c: vṛṇīṣva ca varaṃ vipra yam icchasi yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:126.045a: abravīc ca hi taṃ vākyaṃ rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.045c: satyam etad yathā vipra tvayoktaṃ nāsty ato mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:126.046a: tataḥ prahasya bhagavāṃs tanur dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.046c: putram asyānayat kṣipraṃ tapasā ca śrutena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:126.047a: taṃ samānāyya putraṃ tu tadopālabhya pārthivam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.047c: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.049a: etad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā rājaṃs tataś ca vacanaṃ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:126.051a: evaṃ tvam api kaunteya śrutvā vāṇīm imāṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:126.051c: sthiro bhava yathā rājan himavān acalottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:126.052a: tvaṃ hi draṣṭā ca śrotā ca kṛcchreṣv arthakṛteṣv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:126.052c: śrutvā mama mahārāja na saṃtaptum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:127.001b-0296_01: yady api syāt parāvṛttis tathātṛpto 'smi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:127.001c: tasmāt kathaya bhūyas tvaṃ dharmam eva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:127.001d-0297_01: na hi tṛptiṃ parāṃ yāmi dharme kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:127.002c: gautamasya ca saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:127.003c: uvāsa gautamo yatra kālaṃ tad api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:127.004c: tam ugratapasaṃ yuktaṃ tapasā bhāvitaṃ munim
GE07mbh_12_u:127.005c: tam apaśyat sutapasam ṛṣiṃ vai gautamaṃ munim
GE07mbh_12_u:127.006a: sa taṃ viditvā brahmarṣir yamam āgatam ojasā
GE07mbh_12_u:127.007c: nyamantrayata dharmeṇa kriyatāṃ kim iti bruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:127.008c: kathaṃ ca lokān aśnāti puruṣo durlabhāñ śubhān yama uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:127.009-0298_01: nānyat tīrthaṃ na devo 'nyo dharmo 'nyo na kathaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:127.009-0298_03: tasmāt pāpaṃ parityajya bhaktim āsthāya śāśvatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:127.009-0298_04: karmaṇā manasā vācāto bhajann anṛṇo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.004a: aprāpyaṃ ca bhavet sāntvaṃ bhedo vāpy atipīḍanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:128.004c: jīvitaṃ cārthahetor vā tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.005a: guhyaṃ mā dharmam aprākṣīr atīva bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:128.005c: apṛṣṭo notsahe vaktuṃ dharmam enaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:128.006a: dharmo hy aṇīyān vacanād buddheś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:128.006c: śrutvopāsya sadācāraiḥ sādhur bhavati sa kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:128.007a: karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty āḍhyo na vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.007c: tādṛśo 'yam anupraśnaḥ sa vyavasyas tvayā dhiyā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.008e: duḥkhādāna ihāḍhyeṣu syāt tu paścāt kṣamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.009a: anugamya gatīnāṃ ca sarvāsām eva niścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.009c: yathā yathā hi puruṣo nityaṃ śāstram avekṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:128.009e: tathā tathā vijānāti vijñānaṃ cāsya rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:128.010c: avijñānād ayogo hi yogo bhūtikaraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.012a: kośaṃ saṃjanayed rājā nirjalebhyo yathā jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.013c: anyo dharmaḥ samarthānām āpatsv anyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:128.014a: prākkośaḥ procyate dharmo buddhir dharmād garīyasī
GE07mbh_12_u:128.014c: dharmaṃ prāpya nyāyavṛttim abalīyān na vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:128.016a: adharmo jāyate yasminn iti vai kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.017a: yathāsya dharmo na glāyen neyāc chatruvaśaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.017c: tat kartavyam ihety āhur nātmānam avasādayet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.018a: sannātmā naiva dharmasya na parasya na cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.019c: udyamo jīvanaṃ kṣatre bāhuvīryād iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.020c: anyatra tāpasasvāc ca brāhmaṇasvāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:128.021a: yathā vai brāhmaṇaḥ sīdann ayājyam api yājayet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.022a: pīḍitasya kim advāram utpatho nidhṛtasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.023c: bhaikṣacaryā na vihitā na ca viṭśūdrajīvikā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.025c: api hy etad brāhmaṇeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ vṛttiparikṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:128.026a: kṣatriye saṃśayaḥ kaḥ syād ity etan niścitaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.027a: hantāraṃ rakṣitāraṃ ca prajānāṃ kṣatriyaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.028a: anyatra rājan hiṃsāyā vṛttir nehāsti kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:128.029a: na śaṅkhalikhitāṃ vṛttiṃ śakyam āsthāya jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:128.030c: nityam eveha kartavyā eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.031c: rāṣṭreṇa rājā vyasane parirakṣyas tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.032a: kośaṃ daṇḍaṃ balaṃ mitraṃ yad anyad api saṃcitam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.032c: na kurvītāntaraṃ rāṣṭre rājā parigate kṣudhā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.033a: bījaṃ bhaktena saṃpādyam iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.034a: dhik tasya jīvitaṃ rājño rāṣṭre yasyāvasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:128.034c: avṛttyāntyamanuṣyo 'pi yo vai veda śiber vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.035a: rājñaḥ kośabalaṃ mūlaṃ kośamūlaṃ punar balam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.035c: tan mūlaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmamūlāḥ punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.036a: nānyān apīḍayitveha kośaḥ śakyaḥ kuto balam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.036c: tadarthaṃ pīḍayitvā ca doṣaṃ na prāptum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:128.037c: etasmāt kāraṇād rājā na doṣaṃ prāptum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:128.038c: anarthārtham athāpy anyat tat sarvaṃ hy arthalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.039a: yajñārtham anyad bhavati yajñe nārthas tathāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.040c: yūpaṃ chindanti yajñārthaṃ tatra ye paripanthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.041a: drumāḥ ke cana sāmantā dhruvaṃ chindanti tān api
GE07mbh_12_u:128.041c: te cāpi nipatanto 'nyān nighnanti ca vanaspatīn
GE07mbh_12_u:128.042a: evaṃ kośasya mahato ye narāḥ paripanthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.042c: tān ahatvā na paśyāmi siddhim atra paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:128.043a: dhanena jayate lokāv ubhau param imaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.043c: satyaṃ ca dharmavacanaṃ yathā nāsty adhanas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.044c: na tulyadoṣaḥ syād evaṃ kāryākāryeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:128.045a: naitau saṃbhavato rājan kathaṃ cid api bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:128.045c: na hy araṇyeṣu paśyāmi dhanavṛddhān ahaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:128.046a: yad idaṃ dṛśyate vittaṃ pṛthivyām iha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:128.046c: mamedaṃ syān mamedaṃ syād ity ayaṃ kāṅkṣate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:128.047a: na ca rājyasamo dharmaḥ kaś cid asti paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:128.047c: dharmaṃ śaṃsanti te rājñām āpadartham ito 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:128.048c: buddhyā dākṣyeṇa cāpy anye cinvanti dhanasaṃcayān
GE07mbh_12_u:128.049a: adhanaṃ durbalaṃ prāhur dhanena balavān bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:128.049c: sarvaṃ dhanavataḥ prāpyaṃ sarvaṃ tarati kośavān
GE07mbh_12_u:128.049e: kośād dharmaś ca kāmaś ca paro lokas tathāpy ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:128.049f-0300_01: taṃ ca dharmeṇa lipseta nādharmeṇa kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:128.049f-0301_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:129.004a: bāhyaś ced vijigīṣuḥ syād dharmārthakuśalaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:129.004c: javena saṃdhiṃ kurvīta pūrvān pūrvān vimokṣayan
GE07mbh_12_u:129.006a: apāsya rājadhānīṃ vā tared anyena vāpadam
GE07mbh_12_u:129.007a: yās tu syuḥ kevalatyāgāc chakyās taritum āpadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:129.008c: na tv evātmā pradātavyaḥ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:129.009c: kṣīṇe kośe srute mantre kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:129.010a: kṣipraṃ vā saṃdhikāmaḥ syāt kṣipraṃ vā tīkṣṇavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:129.011c: alpenāpi hi sainyena mahīṃ jayati pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:129.012a: hato vā divam ārohed vijayī kṣitim āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:129.012c: yuddhe tu saṃtyajan prāṇāñ śakrasyaiti salokatām
GE07mbh_12_u:129.013a: sarvalokāgamaṃ kṛtvā mṛdutvaṃ gantum eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:129.013c: viśvāsād vinayaṃ kuryād vyavasyed vāpy upānahau
GE07mbh_12_u:129.014a: apakramitum icched vā yathākāmaṃ tu sāntvayet
GE07mbh_12_u:130.002a: kenāsmin brāhmaṇo jīvej jaghanye kāla āgate
GE07mbh_12_u:130.003c: sarvaṃ sādhvartham evedam asādhvarthaṃ na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:130.004c: ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnadharmavid eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:130.005c: adattam apy ādadīta dātur vittaṃ mameti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:130.006c: vṛttavijñānavān dhīraḥ kas taṃ kiṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:130.008a: yad eva prakṛtaṃ śāstram aviśeṣeṇa vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:130.008c: tad eva madhyāḥ sevante medhāvī cāpy athottaram
GE07mbh_12_u:130.009c: na brāhmaṇān yātayeta doṣān prāpnoti yātayan
GE07mbh_12_u:130.010a: etat pramāṇaṃ lokasya cakṣur etat sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:130.010c: tat pramāṇo 'vagāheta tena tat sādhv asādhu vā
GE07mbh_12_u:130.011c: na teṣāṃ vacanād rājā satkuryād yātayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:130.012a: na vācyaḥ parivādo vai na śrotavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:130.012c: karṇāv eva pidhātavyau prastheyaṃ vā tato 'nyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:130.013a: na vai satāṃ vṛttam etat parivādo na paiśunam
GE07mbh_12_u:130.013c: guṇānām eva vaktāraḥ santaḥ satsu yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:130.014c: dhuram udyamya vahatas tathā varteta vai nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:130.014e: yathā yathāsya vahataḥ sahāyāḥ syus tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:130.015e: mārdavād atha lobhād vā te brūyur vākyam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:130.016a: ārṣam apy atra paśyanti vikarmasthasya yāpanam
GE07mbh_12_u:130.016c: na cārṣāt sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cit pramāṇaṃ vidyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:130.017c: vyājena vindan vittaṃ hi dharmāt tu parihīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:130.019a: yaś caturguṇasaṃpannaṃ dharmaṃ veda sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:130.019c: aher iva hi dharmasya padaṃ duḥkhaṃ gaveṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:130.020a: yathā mṛgasya viddhasya mṛgavyādhaḥ padaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_12_u:130.021a: evaṃ sadbhir vinītena pathā gantavyam acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:131.001a: svarāṣṭrāt pararāṣṭrāc ca kośaṃ saṃjanayen nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:131.001c: kośād dhi dharmaḥ kaunteya rājyamūlaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:131.003a: na kośaḥ śuddhaśaucena na nṛśaṃsena jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:131.004a: abalasya kutaḥ kośo hy akośasya kuto balam
GE07mbh_12_u:131.004c: abalasya kuto rājyam arājñaḥ śrīḥ kuto bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:131.005a: uccair vṛtteḥ śriyo hānir yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:131.005c: tasmāt kośaṃ balaṃ mitrāṇy atha rājā vivardhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:131.006c: na cāsyālpena tuṣyanti kāryam abhyutsahanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:131.007a: śriyo hi kāraṇād rājā satkriyāṃ labhate parām
GE07mbh_12_u:131.007c: sāsya gūhati pāpāni vāso guhyam iva striyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:131.009a: udyacched eva na glāyed udyamo hy eva pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:131.009c: apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na nameteha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:131.010a: apy araṇyaṃ samāśritya cared dasyugaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:131.010c: na tv evoddhṛtamaryādair dasyubhiḥ sahitaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:131.011a: ekāntena hy amaryādāt sarvo 'py udvijate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:131.012c: alpāpy atheha maryādā loke bhavati pūjitā
GE07mbh_12_u:131.013a: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na para iti vyavasito janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:131.013c: nālaṃ gantuṃ ca viśvāsaṃ nāstike bhayaśaṅkini
GE07mbh_12_u:131.014a: yathā sadbhiḥ parādānam ahiṃsā dasyubhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:131.015e: striyā moṣaḥ paristhānaṃ dasyuṣv etad vigarhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:131.016a: sa eṣa eva bhavati dasyur etāni varjayan
GE07mbh_12_u:131.017a: tasmāt saśeṣaṃ kartavyaṃ svādhīnam api dasyubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:131.018c: niḥśeṣakāriṇo nityam aśeṣakaraṇād bhayam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:132.002a: adharmo dharma ity etad yathā vṛkapadaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:132.002c: dharmādharmaphale jātu na dadarśeha kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:132.003a: bubhūṣed balavān eva sarvaṃ balavato vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:132.003c: śriyaṃ balam amātyāṃś ca balavān iha vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:132.004a: yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:132.004c: bahv apathyaṃ balavati na kiṃ cit trāyate bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:132.005a: ubhau satyādhikārau tau trāyete mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:132.005c: ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:132.006a: bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharaṇyām iva jaṅgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:132.006c: dhūmo vāyor iva vaśaṃ balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:132.007a: anīśvare balaṃ dharmo drumaṃ vallīva saṃśritā
GE07mbh_12_u:132.007c: vaśyo balavatāṃ dharmaḥ sukhaṃ bhogavatām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:132.007e: nāsty asādhyaṃ balavatāṃ sarvaṃ balavatāṃ śuci
GE07mbh_12_u:132.008c: atha tasmād udvijate sarvo loko vṛkād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:132.009a: apadhvasto hy avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:132.009c: jīvitaṃ yad avakṣiptaṃ yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:132.010a: yad enam āhuḥ pāpena cāritreṇa vinikṣatam
GE07mbh_12_u:132.011c: trayīṃ vidyāṃ niṣeveta tathopāsīta sa dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:132.012a: prasādayen madhurayā vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:132.012c: mahāmanāś caiva bhaved vivahec ca mahākule
GE07mbh_12_u:132.013a: ity asmīti vaded evaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:132.014c: ucyamāno 'pi lokena bahu tat tad acintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:132.015a: apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:132.015c: sukhaṃ vittaṃ ca bhuñjīta vṛttenaitena gopayet
GE07mbh_12_u:132.015d-0303_01: api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nayec ca satataṃ vane
GE07mbh_12_u:132.015e: loke ca labhate pūjāṃ paratra ca mahat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:133.001c: yathā dasyuḥ samaryādaḥ pretyabhāve na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:133.003c: kāpavyo nāma naiṣādir dasyutvāt siddhim āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:133.006a: apy anekaśatāḥ senā eka eva jigāya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.007c: satkṛtya bhojayām āsa samyak paricacāra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:133.008c: api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nināya ca mahāvane
GE07mbh_12_u:133.009c: teṣām āsajya geheṣu kālya eva sa gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:133.011c: grāmaṇīr bhava no mukhyaḥ sarveṣām eva saṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.012a: yathā yathā vakṣyasi naḥ kariṣyāmas tathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:133.012c: pālayāsmān yathānyāyaṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:133.013a: mā vadhīs tvaṃ striyaṃ bhīruṃ mā śiśuṃ mā tapasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:133.013c: nāyudhyamāno hantavyo na ca grāhyā balāt striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.014a: sarvathā strī na hantavyā sarvasattveṣu yudhyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:133.014c: nityaṃ gobrāhmaṇe svasti yoddhavyaṃ ca tadarthataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.015a: sasyaṃ ca nāpahantavyaṃ sīravighnaṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.015b-0305_01: pitaro devatā viprāḥ śapanty atra nivārite
GE07mbh_12_u:133.015c: pūjyante yatra devāś ca pitaro 'tithayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:133.016a: sarvabhūteṣv api ca vai brāhmaṇo mokṣam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:133.016c: kāryā cāpacitis teṣāṃ sarvasvenāpi yā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:133.017a: yasya hy ete saṃpraruṣṭā mantrayanti parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:133.017c: na tasya triṣu lokeṣu trātā bhavati kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:133.018a: yo brāhmaṇān paribhaved vināśaṃ vāpi rocayet
GE07mbh_12_u:133.019c: ye ye no na pradāsyanti tāṃs tān senābhiyāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:133.020a: śiṣṭyarthaṃ vihito daṇḍo na vadhārthaṃ viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.020c: ye ca śiṣṭān prabādhante dharmas teṣāṃ vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.021a: ye hi rāṣṭroparodhena vṛttiṃ kurvanti ke cana
GE07mbh_12_u:133.021c: tad eva te 'nu mīyante kuṇapaṃ kṛmayo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:133.022a: ye punar dharmaśāstreṇa varterann iha dasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.022c: api te dasyavo bhūtvā kṣipraṃ siddhim avāpnuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:133.023c: vṛttiṃ ca lebhire sarve pāpebhyaś cāpy upāraman
GE07mbh_12_u:133.024a: kāpavyaḥ karmaṇā tena mahatīṃ siddhim āptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:133.024c: sādhūnām ācaran kṣemaṃ dasyūn pāpān nivartayan
GE07mbh_12_u:133.025c: nāraṇyebhyaḥ sa bhūtebhyo bhayam ārchet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:133.026a: bhayaṃ tasya na martyebhyo nāmartyebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:133.026c: na sato nāsato rājan sa hy araṇyeṣu gopatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134.001c: yena mārgeṇa rājānaḥ kośaṃ saṃjanayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:134.002a: na dhanaṃ yajñaśīlānāṃ hāryaṃ devasvam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:134.002c: dasyūnāṃ niṣkriyāṇāṃ ca kṣatriyo hartum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:134.003a: imāḥ prajāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ rakṣyāś cādyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:134.003c: dhanaṃ hi kṣatriyasyeha dvitīyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:134.004a: tad asya syād balārthaṃ vā dhanaṃ yajñārtham eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:134.004c: abhogyā hy oṣadhīś chittvā bhogyā eva pacanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:134.005a: yo vai na devān na pitṝn na martyān haviṣārcati
GE07mbh_12_u:134.005c: ānantikāṃ tāṃ dhanitām āhur vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134.006a: haret tad draviṇaṃ rājan dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134.006c: na hi tat prīṇayel lokān na kośaṃ tadvidhaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134.007c: ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā manye dharmavid eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:134.007d-0306_01: tathā tathā jayel lokāñ śaktyā caiva yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:134.008a: audbhijjā jantavaḥ ke cid yuktavāco yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:134.009c: saiva vṛttir ayajñeṣu tathā dharmo vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:134.010a: yathā hy akasmād bhavati bhūmau pāṃsutṛṇolapam
GE07mbh_12_u:134.010c: tathaiveha bhaved dharmaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmataro 'pi ca bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:135.001-0307_02: dvāv eva sukham edhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:135.004a: kadā cit taj jalasthāyaṃ matsyabandhāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.004c: niḥsrāvayām āsur atho nimneṣu vividhair mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.005c: abravīd dīrghadarśī tu tāv ubhau suhṛdau tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:135.006c: śīghram anyatra gacchāmaḥ panthā yāvan na duṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:135.007a: anāgatam anarthaṃ hi sunayair yaḥ prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:135.007c: na sa saṃśayam āpnoti rocatāṃ vāṃ vrajāmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:135.008a: dīrghasūtras tu yas tatra so 'bravīt samyag ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:135.008c: na tu kāryā tvarā yāvad iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.009c: prāpte kāle na me kiṃ cin nyāyataḥ parihāsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:135.013a: uddānaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ ca matsyānāṃ vīkṣya rajjubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.014a: grastam eva tad uddānaṃ gṛhītvāsta tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.014c: sarvān eva tu tāṃs tatra te vidur grathitā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:135.017a: evaṃ prāptatamaṃ kālaṃ yo mohān nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:135.017c: sa vinaśyati vai kṣipraṃ dīrghasūtro yathā jhaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.018a: ādau na kurute śreyaḥ kuśalo 'smīti yaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:135.019a: anāgatavidhānaṃ tu yo naraḥ kurute kṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:135.019c: śreyaḥ prāpnoti so 'tyarthaṃ dīrghadarśī yathā hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:135.020a: kalāḥ kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca dinā nāḍyaḥ kṣaṇā lavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:135.020c: pakṣā māsāś ca ṛtavas tulyāḥ saṃvatsarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:135.021a: pṛthivī deśa ity uktaḥ kālaḥ sa ca na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:135.021c: abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ nyāyato yac ca tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.001a: sarvatra buddhiḥ kathitā śreṣṭhā te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.002a: tad icchāmi parāṃ buddhiṃ śrotuṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:136.002c: yathā rājan na muhyeta śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.003c: pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.004a: śatrubhir bahubhir grasto yathā varteta pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.004c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ sarvam eva yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.007a: kathaṃ mitram ariṃ caiva vindeta bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.007c: ceṣṭitavyaṃ kathaṃ cātra śatror mitrasya cāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:136.008c: kathaṃ nu puruṣaḥ kuryāt kiṃ vā kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.009a: vigrahaṃ kena vā kuryāt saṃdhiṃ vā kena yojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.010a: etad vai sarvakṛtyānāṃ paraṃ kṛtyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:136.010c: naitasya kaś cid vaktāsti śrotā cāpi sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.011c: tad anviṣya mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:136.012c: śṛṇu me putra kārtsnyena guhyam āpatsu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:136.013a: amitro mitratāṃ yāti mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.013c: sāmarthyayogāt kāryāṇāṃ tadgatyā hi sadā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.014a: tasmād viśvasitavyaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ca samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:136.015a: saṃdhātavyaṃ budhair nityaṃ vyavasyaṃ ca hitārthibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.015c: amitrair api saṃdheyaṃ prāṇā rakṣyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:136.016a: yo hy amitrair naro nityaṃ na saṃdadhyād apaṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.016c: na so 'rtham āpnuyāt kiṃ cit phalāny api ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:136.017a: yas tv amitreṇa saṃdhatte mitreṇa ca virudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.018c: mārjārasya ca saṃvādaṃ nyagrodhe mūṣakasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.019a: vane mahati kasmiṃś cin nyagrodhaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.021a: tasya mūlaṃ samāśritya kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.021c: vasati sma mahāprājñaḥ palito nāma mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.022a: śākhāś ca tasya saṃśritya vasati sma sukhaṃ puraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.023c: ayojayat tam unmāthaṃ nityam astaṃ gate ravau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.024a: tatra snāyumayān pāśān yathāvat saṃnidhāya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.024c: gṛhaṃ gatvā sukhaṃ śete prabhātām eti śarvarīm
GE07mbh_12_u:136.025a: tatra sma nityaṃ badhyante naktaṃ bahuvidhā mṛgāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.025c: kadā cit tatra mārjāras tv apramatto 'py abadhyata
GE07mbh_12_u:136.026c: taṃ kālaṃ palito jñātvā vicacāra sunirbhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.028a: sa tam unmātham āruhya tad āmiṣam abhakṣayat
GE07mbh_12_u:136.029a: āmiṣe tu prasaktaḥ sa kadā cid avalokayan
GE07mbh_12_u:136.029c: apaśyad aparaṃ ghoram ātmanaḥ śatrum āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.031c: bhakṣārthaṃ lelihad vaktraṃ bhūmāv ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.033c: athāsyāsīd iyaṃ cintā tat prāpya sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.034c: samantād bhaya utpanne kathaṃ kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.035a: sa tathā sarvato ruddhaḥ sarvatra samadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.035c: abhavad bhayasaṃtaptaś cakre cemāṃ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:136.037a: gataṃ hi sahasā bhūmiṃ nakulo māṃ samāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.037b-0308_02: mārjāre pāśasaṃbaddhe kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.038a: na tv evāsmadvidhaḥ prājñaḥ saṃmohaṃ gantum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.039c: saṃbhramanty āpadaṃ prāpya mahato 'rthān avāpya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.040a: na tv anyām iha mārjārād gatiṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.040c: viṣamastho hy ayaṃ jantuḥ kṛtyaṃ cāsya mahan mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.041a: jīvitārthī kathaṃ tv adya prārthitaḥ śatrubhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.041c: tasmād imam ahaṃ śatruṃ mārjāraṃ saṃśrayāmi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:136.043a: ayam atyantaśatrur me vaiṣamyaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.043c: mūḍho grāhayituṃ svārthaṃ saṃgatyā yadi śakyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.044a: kadā cid vyasanaṃ prāpya saṃdhiṃ kuryān mayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.044e: kārya ity āhur ācāryā viṣame jīvitārthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.045a: śreyān hi paṇḍitaḥ śatrur na ca mitram apaṇḍitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.045c: mama hy amitre mārjāre jīvitaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.046c: apīdānīm ayaṃ śatruḥ saṃgatyā paṇḍito bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.048c: jīvitaṃ hi tavecchāmi śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.049a: na te saumya viṣattavyaṃ jīviṣyasi yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.049c: ahaṃ tvām uddhariṣyāmi prāṇāñ jahyāṃ hi te kṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:136.050a: asti kaś cid upāyo 'tra puṣkalaḥ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.050c: yena śakyas tvayā mokṣaḥ prāptuṃ śreyo yathā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.051a: mayā hy upāyo dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ vicārya matim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.051c: ātmārthaṃ ca tvadarthaṃ ca śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.052a: idaṃ hi nakulolūkaṃ pāpabuddhy abhitaḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.052c: na dharṣayati mārjāra tena me svasti sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.054a: satāṃ sāptapadaṃ sakhyaṃ savāso me 'si paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.054c: sāṃvāsyakaṃ kariṣyāmi nāsti te mṛtyuto bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.055a: na hi śaknoṣi mārjāra pāśaṃ chettuṃ vinā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.055c: ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ yadi māṃ tvaṃ na hiṃsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.056a: tvam āśrito nagasyāgraṃ mūlaṃ tv aham upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.056c: ciroṣitāv ihāvāṃ vai vṛkṣe 'smin viditaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:136.057a: yasminn āśvasate kaś cid yaś ca nāśvasate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:136.057c: na tau dhīrāḥ praśaṃsanti nityam udvignacetasau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.058a: tasmād vivardhatāṃ prītiḥ satyā saṃgatir astu nau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.058c: kālātītam apārthaṃ hi na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.059c: tava jīvitam icchāmi tvaṃ mamecchasi jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.060a: kaś cit tarati kāṣṭhena sugambhīrāṃ mahānadīm
GE07mbh_12_u:136.060c: sa tārayati tat kāṣṭhaṃ sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.061c: ahaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmi tvaṃ ca māṃ tārayiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.062a: evam uktvā tu palitas tadartham ubhayor hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.063a: atha suvyāhṛtaṃ tasya śrutvā śatrur vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.066a: nandāmi saumya bhadraṃ te yo māṃ jīvantam icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.066c: śreyaś ca yadi jānīṣe kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:136.067a: ahaṃ hi dṛḍham āpannas tvam āpannataro mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.067c: dvayor āpannayoḥ saṃdhiḥ kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:136.068a: vidhatsva prāptakālaṃ yat kāryaṃ sidhyatu cāvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.068c: mayi kṛcchrād vinirmukte na vinaṅkṣyati te kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.070a: ity evam uktaḥ palito mārjāraṃ vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.071a: udāraṃ yad bhavān āha naitac citraṃ bhavadvidhe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.071c: vidito yas tu mārgo me hitārthaṃ śṛṇu taṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:136.072a: ahaṃ tvānupravekṣyāmi nakulān me mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.072c: trāyasva māṃ mā vadhīś ca śakto 'smi tava mokṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.073a: ulūkāc caiva māṃ rakṣa kṣudraḥ prārthayate hi mām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.073c: ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśān sakhe satyena te śape
GE07mbh_12_u:136.074a: tad vacaḥ saṃgataṃ śrutvā lomaśo yuktam arthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:136.075a: sa taṃ saṃpūjya palitaṃ mārjāraḥ sauhṛde sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.075c: suvicintyābravīd dhīraḥ prītas tvarita eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.076a: kṣipram āgaccha bhadraṃ te tvaṃ me prāṇasamaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.076c: tava prājña prasādād dhi kṣipraṃ prāpsyāmi jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.077a: yad yad evaṃgatenādya śakyaṃ kartuṃ mayā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:136.077c: tad ājñāpaya kartāhaṃ saṃdhir evāstu nau sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.078c: sarvakāryāṇi kartāhaṃ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.079a: muktaś ca vyasanād asmāt saumyāham api nāma te
GE07mbh_12_u:136.079c: prītim utpādayeyaṃ ca pratikartuṃ ca śaknuyām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.079d-0310_01: pratyapakurvan bahv api na bhāti pūrvopakāriṇā tulyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.079d-0310_02: ekaḥ karoti hi kṛte niṣkāraṇam eva kurute 'nyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.080a: grāhayitvā tu taṃ svārthaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.080c: praviveśa suvisrabdhaḥ samyag arthāṃś cacāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.081a: evam āśvāsito vidvān mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082a: līnaṃ tu tasya gātreṣu mārjārasyātha mūṣakam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082c: tau dṛṣṭvā nakulolūkau nirāśau jagmatur gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082d-0311_02: dṛṣṭvā tayoḥ parāṃ prītiṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082d-0311_03: balinau matimantau ca suvṛttau cāpy upāsitau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082d-0311_04: aśaktau tu nayāt tasmāt saṃpradharṣayituṃ balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.082d-0311_06: ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatus tau svam ālayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.083a: līnas tu tasya gātreṣu palito deśakālavit
GE07mbh_12_u:136.083c: ciccheda pāśān nṛpate kālākāṅkṣī śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.084c: chindantaṃ vai tadā pāśān atvarantaṃ tvarānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.085a: tam atvarantaṃ palitaṃ pāśānāṃ chedane tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.086c: chindhi pāśān amitraghna purā śvapaca eti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.087a: ity uktas tvaratā tena matimān palito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.088a: tūṣṇīṃ bhava na te saumya tvarā kāryā na saṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.088c: vayam evātra kālajñā na kālaḥ parihāsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.089a: akāle kṛtyam ārabdhaṃ kartuṃ nārthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.089c: tad eva kāla ārabdhaṃ mahate 'rthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.090a: akālavipramuktān me tvatta eva bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.090c: tasmāt kālaṃ pratīkṣasva kim iti tvarase sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.091c: tataś chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ prāpte sādhāraṇe bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:136.092a: tasmin kāle pramuktas tvaṃ tarum evādhirohasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.092c: na hi te jīvitād anyat kiṃ cit kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.093a: tato bhavaty atikrānte traste bhīte ca lomaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:136.093c: ahaṃ bilaṃ pravekṣyāmi bhavāñ śākhāṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.094a: evam uktas tu mārjāro mūṣakeṇātmano hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.096a: na hy evaṃ mitrakāryāṇi prītyā kurvanti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.096c: yathā tvaṃ mokṣitaḥ kṛcchrāt tvaramāṇena vai mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.097a: tathaiva tvaramāṇena tvayā kāryaṃ hitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:136.097c: yatnaṃ kuru mahāprājña yathā svasty āvayor bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.098a: atha vā pūrvavairaṃ tvaṃ smaran kālaṃ vikarṣasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.099a: yac ca kiṃ cin mayājñānāt purastād vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.099c: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ kṣamaye tvāṃ prasīda me
GE07mbh_12_u:136.100c: uvācedaṃ vacaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.101a: śrutaṃ me tava mārjāra svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.101c: mamāpi tvaṃ vijānīhi svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.102a: yan mitraṃ bhītavat sādhyaṃ yan mitraṃ bhayasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.102c: surakṣitaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ pāṇiḥ sarpamukhād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:136.103a: kṛtvā balavatā saṃdhim ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.103c: apathyam iva tad bhuktaṃ tasyānarthāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.104a: na kaś cit kasya cin mitraṃ na kaś cit kasya cit suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.104b-0312_01: arthatas tu nibadhyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.104c: arthair arthā nibadhyante gajair vanagajā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:136.105a: na hi kaś cit kṛte kārye kartāraṃ samavekṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.107c: chetsyāmy ahaṃ tad apy āśu nirvṛto bhava lomaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:136.108c: kṣayaṃ jagāma sā rātrir lomaśaṃ cāviśad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.111c: uvāca palitaṃ bhītaḥ kim idānīṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.112a: atha cāpi susaṃtrastau taṃ dṛṣṭvā ghoradarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.113a: balinau matimantau ca saṃghātaṃ cāpy upāgatau
GE07mbh_12_u:136.114c: ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatuḥ svaṃ svam ālayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.115a: tataś ciccheda taṃ tantuṃ mārjārasya sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.116a: sa ca tasmād bhayān mukto mukto ghoreṇa śatruṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.116c: bilaṃ viveśa palitaḥ śākhāṃ bheje ca lomaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.117a: unmātham apy athādāya caṇḍālo vīkṣya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.118a: tatas tasmād bhayān mukto durlabhaṃ prāpya jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.119a: akṛtvā saṃvidaṃ kāṃ cit sahasāham upaplutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.120a: gatvā ca mama viśvāsaṃ dattvā ca mama jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.121a: kṛtvā hi pūrvaṃ mitrāṇi yaḥ paścān nānutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.121c: na sa mitrāṇi labhate kṛcchrāsv āpatsu durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.122a: tat kṛto 'haṃ tvayā mitraṃ sāmarthyād ātmanaḥ sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.122c: sa māṃ mitratvam āpannam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.123a: yāni me santi mitrāṇi ye ca me santi bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.123c: sarve tvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti śiṣyā gurum iva priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.124c: jīvitasya pradātāraṃ kṛtajñaḥ ko na pūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.125a: īśvaro me bhavān astu śarīrasya gṛhasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.125c: arthānāṃ caiva sarveṣām anuśāstā ca me bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:136.126a: amātyo me bhava prājña piteva hi praśādhi mām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.126c: na te 'sti bhayam asmatto jīvitenātmanaḥ śape
GE07mbh_12_u:136.127a: buddhyā tvam uśanāḥ sākṣād bale tv adhikṛtā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.127c: tvanmantrabalayukto hi vindeta jayam eva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.128a: evam uktaḥ paraṃ sāntvaṃ mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.129a: yad bhavān āha tat sarvaṃ mayā te lomaśa śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.129c: mamāpi tāvad bruvataḥ śṛṇu yat pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.131a: śatrurūpāś ca suhṛdo mitrarūpāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.131b-0313_01: eṣāṃ saumyāni mitrāṇi krodhanāś caiva śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.131b-0313_02: sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.131c: sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.132a: nāsti jātyā ripur nāma mitraṃ nāma na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.133a: yo yasmiñ jīvati svārthaṃ paśyet tāvat sa jīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.133c: sa tasya tāvan mitraṃ syād yāvan na syād viparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.134a: nāsti maitrī sthirā nāma na ca dhruvam asauhṛdam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.134c: arthayuktyā hi jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.135a: mitraṃ ca śatrutām eti kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye
GE07mbh_12_u:136.135c: śatruś ca mitratām eti svārtho hi balavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.136a: yo viśvasati mitreṣu na cāśvasati śatruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:136.137a: arthayuktim avijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim
GE07mbh_12_u:136.137c: mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.138a: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:136.138c: viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.139a: arthayuktyā hi dṛśyante pitā mātā sutās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.140a: putraṃ hi mātāpitaru tyajataḥ patitaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.140c: loko rakṣati cātmānaṃ paśya svārthasya sāratām
GE07mbh_12_u:136.141a: taṃ manye nikṛtiprajñaṃ yo mokṣaṃ pratyanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:136.142a: asmin nilaya eva tvaṃ nyagrodhād avatāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.142c: pūrvaṃ niviṣṭam unmāthaṃ capalatvān na buddhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:136.143c: tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi capalo hanty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.144a: bravīti madhuraṃ kaṃ cit priyo me ha bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:136.144c: tan mithyākaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ vistareṇāpi me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:136.145a: kāraṇāt priyatām eti dveṣyo bhavati kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.145c: arthārthī jīvaloko 'yaṃ na kaś cit kasya cit priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.146a: sakhyaṃ sodarayor bhrātror daṃpatyor vā parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.146c: kasya cin nābhijānāmi prītiṃ niṣkāraṇām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.147a: yady api bhrātaraḥ kruddhā bhāryā vā kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:136.147c: svabhāvatas te prīyante netaraḥ prīyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.149a: utpanne kāraṇe prītir nāsti nau kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:136.150a: kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ manye yenāhaṃ bhavataḥ priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.151a: kālo hetuṃ vikurute svārthas tam anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.152a: na tv īdṛśaṃ tvayā vācyaṃ viduṣi svārthapaṇḍite
GE07mbh_12_u:136.153a: tasmān nāhaṃ cale svārthāt susthitaḥ saṃdhivigrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.153c: abhrāṇām iva rūpāṇi vikurvanti kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.154a: adyaiva hi ripur bhūtvā punar adyaiva sauhṛdam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.154c: punaś ca ripur adyaiva yuktīnāṃ paśya cāpalam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.155a: āsīt tāvat tu maitrī nau yāvad dhetur abhūt purā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.155c: sā gatā saha tenaiva kālayuktena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.156a: tvaṃ hi me 'tyantataḥ śatruḥ sāmarthyān mitratāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.156c: tat kṛtyam abhinirvṛttaṃ prakṛtiḥ śatrutāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.157a: so 'ham evaṃ praṇītāni jñātvā śāstrāṇi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.157c: praviśeyaṃ kathaṃ pāśaṃ tvatkṛtaṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:136.159a: tvaṃ hi saumya kṛtārtho 'dya nirvṛttārthās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.159c: na te 'sty anyan mayā kṛtyaṃ kiṃ cid anyatra bhakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.160a: aham annaṃ bhavān bhoktā durbalo 'haṃ bhavān balī
GE07mbh_12_u:136.160c: nāvayor vidyate saṃdhir niyukte viṣame bale
GE07mbh_12_u:136.161a: saṃmanye 'haṃ tava prajñāṃ yan mokṣāt pratyanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:136.162a: bhakṣyārtham eva baddhas tvaṃ sa muktaḥ prasṛtaḥ kṣudhā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.163a: jānāmi kṣudhitaṃ hi tvām āhārasamayaś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:136.163c: sa tvaṃ mām abhisaṃdhāya bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayase punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.164a: yac cāpi putradāraṃ svaṃ tat saṃnisṛjase mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.164c: śuśrūṣāṃ nāma me kartuṃ sakhe mama na tatkṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.165a: tvayā māṃ sahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā priyā bhāryā sutāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:136.165c: kasmān māṃ te na khādeyur hṛṣṭāḥ praṇayinas tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.166a: nāhaṃ tvayā sameṣyāmi vṛtto hetuḥ samāgame
GE07mbh_12_u:136.166c: śivaṃ dhyāyasva me 'trasthaḥ sukṛtaṃ smaryate yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.167a: śatror annādyabhūtaḥ san kliṣṭasya kṣudhitasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.167c: bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayamāṇasya kaḥ prājño viṣayaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.168a: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi dūrād api tavodvije
GE07mbh_12_u:136.168c: nāhaṃ tvayā sameṣyāmi nirvṛto bhava lomaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:136.168d-0314_01: yadi tvaṃ sukṛtaṃ vetsi tatsakhyam anusāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:136.168d-0314_02: viśvastaṃ vā pramattaṃ vā etad eva kṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:136.169a: balavat saṃnikarṣo hi na kadā cit praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.169c: praśāntād api me prājña bhetavyaṃ balinaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.170a: yadi tv arthena me kāryaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:136.170c: kāmaṃ sarvaṃ pradāsyāmi na tv ātmānaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:136.171a: ātmārthe saṃtatis tyājyā rājyaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.171c: api sarvasvam utsṛjya rakṣed ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.172c: dṛṣṭā hi punar āvṛttir jīvatām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.173a: na tv ātmanaḥ saṃpradānaṃ dhanaratnavad iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:136.173c: ātmā tu sarvato rakṣyo dārair api dhanair api
GE07mbh_12_u:136.175a: śatrūn samyag vijānanti durbalā ye balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.175b-0315_01: śaṅkanīyaḥ sa sarvatra priyam apy ācaran sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.175c: teṣāṃ na cālyate buddhir ātmārthaṃ kṛtaniścayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.176c: mārjāro vrīḍito bhūtvā mūṣakaṃ vākyam abravīt lomaśa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.176d-0317_01: satāṃ saptapadaṃ mitraṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ na viśvaseḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.177a: saṃmanye 'haṃ tava prajñāṃ yas tvaṃ mama hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.178a: na tu mām anyathā sādho tvaṃ vijñātum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.180a: tan mām evaṃgate sādho na yāvayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.180c: tvayā hi yāvyamāno 'haṃ prāṇāñ jahyāṃ sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.181a: dhik śabdo hi budhair dṛṣṭo madvidheṣu manasviṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:136.181c: maraṇaṃ dharmatattvajña na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:136.182a: iti saṃstūyamāno hi mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.183a: sādhur bhavāñ śrutārtho 'smi prīyate na ca viśvase
GE07mbh_12_u:136.183c: saṃstavair vā dhanaughair vā nāhaṃ śakyaḥ punas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.184a: na hy amitravaśaṃ yānti prājñā niṣkāraṇaṃ sakhe
GE07mbh_12_u:136.184c: asminn arthe ca gāthe dve nibodhośanasā kṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:136.185c: samāhitaś cared yuktyā kṛtārthaś ca na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:136.185d-0318_02: nityaṃ viśvāsayed anyān pareṣāṃ tu na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:136.186a: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣej jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.186c: dravyāṇi saṃtatiś caiva sarvaṃ bhavati jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.187c: nṛṣu tasmād aviśvāsaḥ puṣkalaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.188a: vadhyante na hy aviśvastāḥ śatrubhir durbalā api
GE07mbh_12_u:136.188c: viśvastās tv āśu vadhyante balavanto 'pi durbalaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.189a: tvadvidhebhyo mayā hy ātmā rakṣyo mārjāra sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:136.189c: rakṣa tvam api cātmānaṃ caṇḍālāj jātikilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.190a: sa tasya bruvatas tv evaṃ saṃtrāsāj jātasādhvasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.190c: svabilaṃ hi javenāśu mārjāraḥ prayayau tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.191c: viśrāvya palitaḥ prājño bilam anyaj jagāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:136.193c: mūṣakaś ca biḍālaś ca muktāv anyonyasaṃśrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:136.195c: anyonyam abhisaṃdhātum abhūc caiva tayor matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.197c: na hy apramattaś calati calito vā vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:136.198a: kālena ripuṇā saṃdhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.198c: kārya ity eva tattvajñāḥ prāhur nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:136.199a: evaṃ matvā mahārāja śāstrārtham abhigamya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.199c: abhiyukto 'pramattaś ca prāg bhayād bhītavac caret
GE07mbh_12_u:136.200a: bhītavat saṃvidhiḥ kāryaḥ pratisaṃdhis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:136.201a: na bhayaṃ vidyate rājan bhītasyānāgate bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:136.201c: abhītasya tu visrambhāt sumahaj jāyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.202a: na bhīrur iti cātyantaṃ mantro 'deyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:136.203c: kāryāṇāṃ gurutāṃ buddhvā nānṛtaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:136.204a: evam etan mayā proktam itihāsaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:136.204c: śrutvā tvaṃ suhṛdāṃ madhye yathāvat samupācara
GE07mbh_12_u:136.206c: samāgamaṃ cared yuktyā kṛtārtho na ca viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:136.207c: abhyuttiṣṭha śrutād asmād bhūyas tvaṃ rañjayan prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:136.208a: brāhmaṇaiś cāpi te sārdhaṃ yātrā bhavatu pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:136.208c: brāhmaṇā hi paraṃ śreyo divi ceha ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:136.209a: ete dharmasya vettāraḥ kṛtajñāḥ satataṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:136.210a: rājyaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ rājan yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca lapsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:136.211a: dvayor imaṃ bhārata saṃdhivigrahaṃ; subhāṣitaṃ buddhiviśeṣakāritam
GE07mbh_12_u:136.211c: tathānvavekṣya kṣitipena sarvadā; niṣevitavyaṃ nṛpa śatrumaṇḍale
GE07mbh_12_u:137.001a: ukto mantro mahābāho na viśvāso 'sti śatruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.001c: kathaṃ hi rājā varteta yadi sarvatra nāśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:137.002a: viśvāsād dhi paraṃ rājño rājann utpadyate bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.002c: kathaṃ vai nāśvasan rājā śatrūñ jayati pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:137.003a: etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi mano me saṃpramuhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.007a: abhiprajātā sā tatra putram ekaṃ suvarcasam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.007c: samakālaṃ ca rājño 'pi devyāḥ putro vyajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:137.007d-0319_01: tayor arthe kṛtajñā sā khecarī pūjanī sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.008a: samudratīraṃ gatvā sā tv ājahāra phaladvayam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.008c: puṣṭyarthaṃ ca svaputrasya rājaputrasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:137.009d-0320_01: ādāyādāya saivāśu tayoḥ prādāt punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.009f-0321_01: tataḥ sa dhātryā kakṣeṇa uhyamāno nṛpātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.009f-0321_02: dadarśa taṃ pakṣisutaṃ bālyād āgatya bālakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.010c: śūnye tu tam upādāya pakṣiṇaṃ samajātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.010e: hatvā tataḥ sa rājendra dhātryā hastam upāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:137.011a: atha sā śakunī rājann āgamat phalahārikā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.011c: apaśyan nihataṃ putraṃ tena bālena bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:137.012a: bāṣpapūrṇamukhī dīnā dṛṣṭvā sā tu hataṃ sutam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.013a: kṣatriye saṃgataṃ nāsti na prītir na ca sauhṛdam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.015a: aham asya karomy adya sadṛśīṃ vairayātanām
GE07mbh_12_u:137.016c: śaraṇāgatasya ca vadhas trividhaṃ hy asya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.017a: ity uktvā caraṇābhyāṃ tu netre nṛpasutasya sā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.017c: bhittvā svasthā tata idaṃ pūjanī vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.019a: pāpaṃ karma kṛtaṃ kiṃ cin na tasmin yadi vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.019c: nipātyate 'sya putreṣu na cet pautreṣu naptṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.019d-0322_02: kṛte pratikṛtaṃ matvā pūjanīm idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.020a: asti vai kṛtam asmābhir asti pratikṛtaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.020c: ubhayaṃ tat samībhūtaṃ vasa pūjani mā gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.021c: na tad budhāḥ praśaṃsanti śreyas tatrāpasarpaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.022a: sāntve prayukte nṛpate kṛtavaire na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:137.022c: kṣipraṃ prabadhyate mūḍho na hi vairaṃ praśāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.025a: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:137.025b-0323_01: viśvāsād bhayam utpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.025c: kāmaṃ viśvāsayed anyān pareṣāṃ tu na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:137.025d-0324_01: aviśvāsāt paraṃ hanti viśvāsād vadhyate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.026a: mātā pitā bāndhavānāṃ variṣṭhau; bhāryā jarā bījamātraṃ tu putraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.026c: bhrātā śatruḥ klinnapāṇir vayasya; ātmā hy ekaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya vettā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.027c: sa ca hetur atikrānto yadartham aham āvasam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.028c: ceto bhavaty aviśvastaṃ pūrvaṃ trāsayate balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.029a: pūrvaṃ saṃmānanā yatra paścāc caiva vimānanā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.030c: tad idaṃ vairam utpannaṃ sukham āssva vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:137.031a: yatkṛte pratikuryād vai na sa tatrāparādhnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.031c: anṛṇas tena bhavati vasa pūjani mā gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.032a: na kṛtasya na kartuś ca sakhyaṃ saṃdhīyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.032c: hṛdayaṃ tatra jānāti kartuś caiva kṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:137.033a: kṛtasya caiva kartuś ca sakhyaṃ saṃdhīyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.034c: viśvāsād badhyate bālas tasmāc chreyo hy adarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.035a: tarasā ye na śakyante śastraiḥ suniśitair api
GE07mbh_12_u:137.035c: sāmnā te vinigṛhyante gajā iva kareṇubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.036c: anyonyasya ca viśvāsaḥ śvapacena śuno yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.037c: naiva tiṣṭhati tad vairaṃ puṣkarastham ivodakam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.038a: vairaṃ pañcasamutthānaṃ tac ca budhyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.040a: kṛtavaire na viśvāsaḥ kāryas tv iha suhṛdy api
GE07mbh_12_u:137.040c: channaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate vairaṃ gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.041a: na vittena na pāruṣyair na sāntvena na ca śrutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.041c: vairāgniḥ śāmyate rājann aurvāgnir iva sāgare
GE07mbh_12_u:137.042a: na hi vairāgnir udbhūtaḥ karma vāpy aparādhajam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.042c: śāmyaty adagdhvā nṛpate vinā hy ekatarakṣayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.043c: naiva śāntir na viśvāsaḥ karma trāsayate balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.044a: naivāpakāre kasmiṃś cid ahaṃ tvayi tathā bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:137.044c: viśvāsād uṣitā pūrvaṃ nedānīṃ viśvasāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:137.045a: kālena kriyate kāryaṃ tathaiva vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.046a: tulyaṃ cobhe pravartete maraṇaṃ janma caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:137.046c: kāryate caiva kālena tannimittaṃ hi jīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.047a: badhyante yugapat ke cid ekaikasya na cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:137.048a: nāhaṃ pramāṇaṃ naiva tvam anyonyakaraṇe śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:137.048c: kālo nityam upādhatte sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca dehinām
GE07mbh_12_u:137.049c: yat kṛtaṃ tac ca me kṣāntaṃ tvaṃ caiva kṣama pūjani
GE07mbh_12_u:137.050a: yadi kālaḥ pramāṇaṃ te na vairaṃ kasya cid bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:137.050c: kasmāt tv apacitiṃ yānti bāndhavā bāndhave hate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.052a: bhiṣajo bheṣajaṃ kartuṃ kasmād icchanti rogiṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:137.052c: yadi kālena pacyante bheṣajaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.053c: yadi kālaḥ pramāṇaṃ te kasmād dharmo 'sti kartṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.054a: tava putro mamāpatyaṃ hatavān hiṃsito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.055c: tathā tvayā prahartavyaṃ mayi tattvaṃ ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.056a: bhakṣārthaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ vā narā vāñchanti pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.056c: tṛtīyo nāsti saṃyogo vadhabandhād ṛte kṣamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.058a: sarvasya dayitāḥ prāṇāḥ sarvasya dayitāḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.058c: duḥkhād udvijate sarvaḥ sarvasya sukham īpsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.061a: na duḥkhaṃ paraduḥkhe vai ke cid āhur abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.061c: yo duḥkhaṃ nābhijānāti sa jalpati mahājane
GE07mbh_12_u:137.062a: yas tu śocati duḥkhārtaḥ sa kathaṃ vaktum utsahet
GE07mbh_12_u:137.062b-0343_01: bhinnāḥ śliṣṭā na śakyante śastraiḥ suniśitair api
GE07mbh_12_u:137.062b-0343_02: sāmnā te 'pi nigṛhyante gajā iva kareṇubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.063a: yat kṛtaṃ te mayā rājaṃs tvayā ca mama yat kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.063c: na tad varṣaśataiḥ śakyaṃ vyapohitum ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:137.064a: āvayoḥ kṛtam anyonyaṃ tatra saṃdhir na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.064c: smṛtvā smṛtvā hi te putraṃ navaṃ vairaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.065a: vairam antikam āsajya yaḥ prītiṃ kartum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.065c: mṛnmayasyeva bhagnasya tasya saṃdhir na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.066c: uśanāś cātha gāthe dve prahrādāyābravīt purā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.067a: ye vairiṇaḥ śraddadhate satye satyetare 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.067c: te śraddadhānā vadhyante madhu śuṣkatṛṇair yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.068a: na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti kuleṣv ā daśamād yugāt
GE07mbh_12_u:137.068c: ākhyātāraś ca vidyante kule ced vidyate pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:137.070a: sadā na viśvased rājan pāpaṃ kṛtveha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:137.070c: apakṛtya pareṣāṃ hi viśvāsād duḥkham aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:137.071a: nāviśvāsāc cinvate 'rthān nehante cāpi kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:137.071c: bhayād ekatarān nityaṃ mṛtakalpā bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:137.072a: yasyeha vraṇinau pādau padbhyāṃ ca parisarpati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.072c: kṣaṇyete tasya tau pādau suguptam abhidhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.074a: duṣṭaṃ panthānam āśritya yo mohād abhipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.074c: ātmano balam ajñātvā tad antaṃ tasya jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.075a: yas tu varṣam avijñāya kṣetraṃ kṛṣati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.076a: yaś ca tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vāpy āsvādavidhuraṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.077a: pathyaṃ bhuktvā naro lobhād yo 'nyad aśnāti bhojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.077c: pariṇāmam avijñāya tad antaṃ tasya jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.078c: udāttānāṃ karma tantraṃ daivaṃ klībā upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.079a: karma cātmahitaṃ kāryaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vā yadi vā mṛdu
GE07mbh_12_u:137.080a: tasmāt saṃśayite 'py arthe kārya eva parākramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.080c: sarvasvam api saṃtyajya kāryam ātmahitaṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.081a: vidyā śauryaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca balaṃ dhairyaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.081c: mitrāṇi sahajāny āhur vartayantīha yair budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.082a: niveśanaṃ ca kupyaṃ ca kṣetraṃ bhāryā suhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.082c: etāny upacitāny āhuḥ sarvatra labhate pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:137.083a: sarvatra ramate prājñaḥ sarvatra ca virocate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.083c: na vibhīṣayate kaṃ cid bhīṣito na bibheti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:137.084a: nityaṃ buddhimato hy arthaḥ svalpako 'pi vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.085c: kustrī khādati māṃsāni māghamā segavām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:137.086a: gṛhaṃ kṣetrāṇi mitrāṇi svadeśa iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:137.087c: anyatra vastuṃ gacched vā vased vā nityamānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.088a: tasmād anyatra yāsyāmi vastuṃ nāham ihotsahe
GE07mbh_12_u:137.088c: kṛtam etad anāhāryaṃ tava putreṇa pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:137.089a: kubhāryāṃ ca kuputraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kusauhṛdam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.090a: kumitre nāsti viśvāsaḥ kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.090c: kurājye nirvṛtir nāsti kudeśe na prajīvyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.092a: sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yatra nirvṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.092c: tan mitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.093a: yatra nāsti balātkāraḥ sa rājā tīvraśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.093c: na caiva hy abhisaṃbandho daridraṃ yo bubhūṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:137.096c: na rakṣati prajāḥ samyag yaḥ sa pārthivataskaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.097a: dattvābhayaṃ yaḥ svayam eva rājā; na tat pramāṇaṃ kurute yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:137.097c: sa sarvalokād upalabhya pāpam; adharmabuddhir nirayaṃ prayāti
GE07mbh_12_u:137.098a: dattvābhayaṃ yaḥ sma rājā pramāṇaṃ kurute sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:137.098c: sa sarvasukhakṛj jñeyaḥ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:137.099a: pitā mātā gurur goptā vahnir vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.099c: sapta rājño guṇān etān manur āha prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.100a: pitā hi rājā rāṣṭrasya prajānāṃ yo 'nukampakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.100c: tasmin mithyāpraṇīte hi tiryag gacchati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.101c: dahaty agnir ivāniṣṭān yamayan bhavate yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.102a: iṣṭeṣu visṛjaty arthān kubera iva kāmadaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.103a: yas tu rañjayate rājā paurajānapadān guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:137.104c: sa sukhaṃ modate bhūpa iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:137.107a: balinā vigraho rājan na kathaṃ cit praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:137.107c: balinā vigṛhītasya kuto rājyaṃ kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:137.109a: etat te brahmadattasya pūjanyā saha bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:137.109c: mayoktaṃ bharataśreṣṭha kim anyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:138.001a: yugakṣayāt parikṣīṇe dharme loke ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:138.001c: dasyubhiḥ pīḍyamāne ca kathaṃ stheyaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:138.002a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi nītim āpatsu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:138.002c: utsṛjyāpi ghṛṇāṃ kāle yathā varteta bhūmipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.005a: alabdhasya kathaṃ lipsā labdhaṃ kena vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:138.005c: vardhitaṃ pālayet kena pālitaṃ praṇayet katham
GE07mbh_12_u:138.006c: uvāca brāhmaṇo vākyam idaṃ hetumad uttaram
GE07mbh_12_u:138.009c: tasmāc catuṣṭaye tasmin pradhāno daṇḍa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:138.010a: chinnamūle hy adhiṣṭhāne sarve tajjīvino hatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.010c: kathaṃ hi śākhās tiṣṭheyuś chinnamūle vanaspatau
GE07mbh_12_u:138.011c: tataḥ sahāyān pakṣaṃ ca sarvam evānusārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.013a: vāṅmātreṇa vinītaḥ syād dhṛdayena yathā kṣuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.014a: sapatnasahite kārye kṛtvā saṃdhiṃ na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:138.015c: nityaśaś codvijet tasmāt sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:138.016a: yasya buddhiṃ paribhavet tam atītena sāntvayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.017a: añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ praṇamya śirasā vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.018c: athainam āgate kāle bhindyād ghaṭam ivāśmani
GE07mbh_12_u:138.019c: na tuṣāgnir ivānarcir dhūmāyeta naraś ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:138.021c: vyāḍasya bhakticitrasya yac chreṣṭhaṃ tat samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:138.022a: utthāyotthāya gacchec ca nityayukto ripor gṛhān
GE07mbh_12_u:138.022c: kuśalaṃ cāpi pṛccheta yady apy akuśalaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.023a: nālasāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān na klībā na ca māninaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.023c: na ca lokaravād bhītā na ca śaśvat pratīkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.024a: nāsya chidraṃ paro vidyād vidyāc chidraṃ parasya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:138.024c: gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.025a: bakavac cintayed arthān siṃhavac ca parākramet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.026a: pānam akṣās tathā nāryo mṛgayā gītavāditam
GE07mbh_12_u:138.026c: etāni yuktyā seveta prasaṅgo hy atra doṣavān
GE07mbh_12_u:138.027c: andhaḥ syād andhavelāyāṃ bādhiryam api saṃśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.030a: daṇḍenopanataṃ śatruṃ yo rājā na niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:138.030c: sa mṛtyum upagūhyās te garbham aśvatarī yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.031a: supuṣpitaḥ syād aphalaḥ phalavān syād durāruhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.031c: āmaḥ syāt pakvasaṃkāśo na ca śīryeta kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:138.031d-0344_01: ādātavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ priyaṃ brūyān nirarthakam
GE07mbh_12_u:138.032a: āśāṃ kālavatīṃ kuryāt tāṃ ca vighnena yojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.032c: vighnaṃ nimittato brūyān nimittaṃ cāpi hetutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.033c: āgataṃ tu bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahartavyam abhītavat
GE07mbh_12_u:138.034a: na saṃśayam anāruhya naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:138.034c: saṃśayaṃ punar āruhya yadi jīvati paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:138.035c: punar vṛddhikṣayāt kiṃ cid abhivṛttaṃ niśāmayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.037a: yo 'riṇā saha saṃdhāya sukhaṃ svapiti viśvasan
GE07mbh_12_u:138.038a: karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.038c: uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:138.039a: ye sapatnāḥ sapatnānāṃ sarvāṃs tān apavatsayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.039c: ātmanaś cāpi boddhavyāś cārāḥ praṇihitāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.040a: cāraḥ suvihitaḥ kārya ātmano 'tha parasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:138.041c: pānāgāreṣu veśeṣu tīrtheṣu ca sabhāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:138.042c: samāgacchanti tān buddhvā niyacchec chamayed api
GE07mbh_12_u:138.043a: na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste nāpi viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:138.043c: viśvastaṃ bhayam anveti nāparīkṣya ca viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:138.044c: athāsya praharet kāle kiṃ cid vicalite pade
GE07mbh_12_u:138.045a: aśaṅkyam api śaṅketa nityaṃ śaṅketa śaṅkitāt
GE07mbh_12_u:138.045c: bhayaṃ hi śaṅkitāj jātaṃ samūlam api kṛntati
GE07mbh_12_u:138.047a: putro vā yadi vā bhrātā pitā vā yadi vā suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:138.050b-0346_01: nāvicārya ciraṃ kāle naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:138.051a: nāsti jātyā ripur nāma mitraṃ nāma na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:138.052a: amitraṃ naiva muñceta bruvantaṃ karuṇāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:138.052c: duḥkhaṃ tatra na kurvīta hanyāt pūrvāpakāriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:138.053c: nigrahaś cāpi yatnena kartavyo bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.054c: api cāsya śiraś chittvā rudyāc choced athāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.055c: āśākāraṇam ity etat kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.056a: na śuṣkavairaṃ kurvīta na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret
GE07mbh_12_u:138.056e: dantāś ca parighṛṣyante rasaś cāpi na labhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:138.057a: trivarge trividhā pīḍānubandhās traya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:138.059a: vardhamānam ṛṇaṃ tiṣṭhat paribhūtāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.059c: āvahanty anayaṃ tīvraṃ vyādhayaś cāpy upekṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.060a: nāsamyak kṛtakārī syād apramattaḥ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.060c: kaṇṭako 'pi hi duśchinno vikāraṃ kurute ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:138.061a: vadhena ca manuṣyāṇāṃ mārgāṇāṃ dūṣaṇena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:138.064a: mṛdur ity avamanyante tīkṣṇa ity udvijanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:138.064c: tīkṣṇakāle ca tīkṣṇaḥ syān mṛdukāle mṛdur bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.065a: mṛdunā sumṛduṃ hanti mṛdunā hanti dāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:138.065c: nāsādhyaṃ mṛdunā kiṃ cit tasmāt tīkṣṇataraṃ mṛdu
GE07mbh_12_u:138.066a: kāle mṛdur yo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.067a: paṇḍitena viruddhaḥ san dūre 'smīti na viśvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:138.067c: dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.068a: na tat tared yasya na pāram uttaren; na tad dhared yat punar āharet paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.068c: na tat khaned yasya na mūlam utkhanen; na taṃ hanyād yasya śiro na pātayet
GE07mbh_12_u:138.069a: itīdam uktaṃ vṛjinābhisaṃhitaṃ; na caitad evaṃ puruṣaḥ samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:138.069c: paraprayuktaṃ tu kathaṃ niśāmayed; ato mayoktaṃ bhavato hitārthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:138.070a: yathāvad uktaṃ vacanaṃ hitaṃ tadā; niśamya vipreṇa suvīrarāṣṭriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:138.070c: tathākarod vākyam adīnacetanaḥ; śriyaṃ ca dīptāṃ bubhuje sabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.001c: adharme dharmatāṃ nīte dharme cādharmatāṃ gate
GE07mbh_12_u:139.002c: rājabhiḥ pīḍite loke corair vāpi viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:139.003c: kāmān mohāc ca lobhāc ca bhayaṃ paśyatsu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:139.005c: avarṣati ca parjanye mitho bhede samutthite
GE07mbh_12_u:139.006c: kena svid brāhmaṇo jīvej jaghanye kāla āgate
GE07mbh_12_u:139.007c: katham āpatsu varteta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:139.008a: kathaṃ ca rājā varteta loke kaluṣatāṃ gate
GE07mbh_12_u:139.008c: katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyeta paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:139.009c: prajāsu vyādhayaś caiva maraṇaṃ ca bhayāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:139.010a: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:139.010c: rājamūlāni sarvāṇi mama nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.011a: tasmiṃs tv abhyāgate kāle prajānāṃ doṣakārake
GE07mbh_12_u:139.017a: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva kūpāḥ prasravaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:139.021a: kva cic coraiḥ kva cic chastraiḥ kva cid rājabhir āturaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.024a: tasmin pratibhaye kāle kṣīṇe dharme yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:139.024c: babhramuḥ kṣudhitā martyāḥ khādantaḥ sma parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.026d-0348_01: tyaktvā dārāṃś ca putrāṃś ca kasmiṃś cij janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:139.027a: sa kadā cit paripatañ śvapacānāṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.027c: hiṃsrāṇāṃ prāṇihantṝṇām āsasāda vane kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:139.029d-0349_02: tad yoṣidbhiḥ kharair vākyaiḥ kalahadbhiḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.031a: tat praviśya kṣudhāviṣṭo gādheḥ putro mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.032a: na ca kva cid avindat sa bhikṣamāṇo 'pi kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.032c: māṃsam annaṃ mūlaphalam anyad vā tatra kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:139.033a: aho kṛcchraṃ mayā prāptam iti niścitya kauśikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.034a: cintayām āsa sa muniḥ kiṃ nu me sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:139.034c: kathaṃ vṛthā na mṛtyuḥ syād iti pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:139.035a: sa dadarśa śvamāṃsasya kutantīṃ vitatāṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.035c: caṇḍālasya gṛhe rājan sadyaḥ śastrahatasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:139.036a: sa cintayām āsa tadā steyaṃ kāryam ito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:139.037c: paraṃ paraṃ bhavet pūrvam asteyam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.038a: hīnād ādeyam ādau syāt samānāt tadanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:139.039c: na steyadoṣaṃ paśyāmi hariṣyāmy etad āmiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.040c: tasmin deśe prasuṣvāpa patito yatra bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:139.041a: sa vigāḍhāṃ niśāṃ dṛṣṭvā supte caṇḍālapakkaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:139.044a: viśvāmitro 'ham ity eva sahasā tam uvāca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.044d-0350_02: mā vadhīr mama sadbuddher yadi samyak prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:139.045a: caṇḍālas tad vacaḥ śrutvā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.046c: uvāca kauśikaṃ rātrau brahman kiṃ te cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.048a: avasīdanti me prāṇāḥ smṛtir me naśyati kṣudhā
GE07mbh_12_u:139.049a: aṭan bhaikṣaṃ na vindāmi yadā yuṣmākam ālaye
GE07mbh_12_u:139.049c: tadā buddhiḥ kṛtā pāpe hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
GE07mbh_12_u:139.050a: tṛṣitaḥ kaluṣaṃ pātā nāsti hrīr aśanārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.050c: kṣud dharmaṃ dūṣayaty atra hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
GE07mbh_12_u:139.051a: agnir mukhaṃ purodhāś ca devānāṃ śucipād vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.051c: yathā sa sarvabhug brahmā tathā māṃ viddhi dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.052a: tam uvāca sa caṇḍālo maharṣe śṛṇu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.052c: śrutvā tathā samātiṣṭha yathā dharmān na hīyase
GE07mbh_12_u:139.052d-0353_01: dharmaṃ tavāpi viprarṣe śṛṇu yat te bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:139.054a: nedaṃ samyag vyavasitaṃ maharṣe karma vaikṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.055a: sādhv anyam anupaśya tvam upāyaṃ prāṇadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:139.055c: na māṃsalobhāt tapaso nāśas te syān mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:139.056c: mā sma dharmaṃ parityākṣīs tvaṃ hi dharmavid uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.057a: viśvāmitras tato rājann ity ukto bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:139.058c: na vidyate 'bhyupāyaś ca kaś cin me prāṇadhāraṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:139.059a: yena tena viśeṣeṇa karmaṇā yena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:139.060c: brahmavahnir mama balaṃ bhakṣyāmi samayaṃ kṣudhā
GE07mbh_12_u:139.061a: yathā yathā vai jīved dhi tat kartavyam apīḍayā
GE07mbh_12_u:139.061c: jīvitaṃ maraṇāc chreyo jīvan dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:139.062c: vyavasye buddhipūrvaṃ vai tad bhavān anumanyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:139.063a: jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi praṇotsyāmy aśubhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:139.063c: tapobhir vidyayā caiva jyotīṃṣīva mahat tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.064a: naitat khādan prāpsyase prāṇam anyaṃ; nāyur dīrghaṃ nāmṛtasyeva tṛptim
GE07mbh_12_u:139.064c: bhikṣām anyāṃ bhikṣa mā te mano 'stu; śvabhakṣaṇe śvā hy abhakṣo dvijānām
GE07mbh_12_u:139.065a: na durbhikṣe sulabhaṃ māṃsam anyac; chvapāka nānnaṃ na ca me 'sti vittam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.065c: kṣudhārtaś cāham agatir nirāśaḥ; śvamāṃse cāsmin ṣaḍrasān sādhu manye
GE07mbh_12_u:139.066a: pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣatrasya vai dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:139.066b-0354_01: śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhāḥ śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.066c: yadi śāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te mābhakṣye mānasaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.068a: bhikṣām anyām āhareti na caitat kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:139.068c: na nūnaṃ kāryam etad vai hara kāmaṃ śvajāghanīm
GE07mbh_12_u:139.069a: śiṣṭā vai kāraṇaṃ dharme tadvṛttam anuvartaye
GE07mbh_12_u:139.069c: parāṃ medhyāśanād etāṃ bhakṣyāṃ manye śvajāghanīm
GE07mbh_12_u:139.070a: asatā yat samācīrṇaṃ na sa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.070c: nāvṛttam anukāryaṃ vai mā chalenānṛtaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.071a: na pātakaṃ nāvamatam ṛṣiḥ san kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:139.071c: samau ca śvamṛgau manye tasmād bhakṣyā śvajāghanī
GE07mbh_12_u:139.072a: yad brāhmaṇārthe kṛtam arthitena; tenarṣiṇā tac ca bhakṣyādhikāram
GE07mbh_12_u:139.072c: sa vai dharmo yatra na pāpam asti; sarvair upāyair hi sa rakṣitavyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.073a: mitraṃ ca me brāhmaṇaś cāyam ātmā; priyaś ca me pūjyatamaś ca loke
GE07mbh_12_u:139.073c: taṃ bhartukāmo 'ham imāṃ hariṣye; nṛśaṃsānām īdṛśānāṃ na bibhye
GE07mbh_12_u:139.074a: kāmaṃ narā jīvitaṃ saṃtyajanti; na cābhakṣyaiḥ pratikurvanti tatra
GE07mbh_12_u:139.074c: sarvān kāmān prāpnuvantīha vidvan; priyasva kāmaṃ sahitaḥ kṣudhā vai
GE07mbh_12_u:139.075a: sthāne tāvat saṃśayaḥ pretyabhāve; niḥsaṃśayaṃ karmaṇāṃ vā vināśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.075c: ahaṃ punar varta ity āśayātmā; mūlaṃ rakṣan bhakṣayiṣyāmy abhakṣyam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.076a: buddhyātmake vyastam astīti tuṣṭo; mohād ekatvaṃ yathā carma cakṣuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.076c: yady apy enaḥ saṃśayād ācarāmi; nāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi yathā tvam eva
GE07mbh_12_u:139.077a: patanīyam idaṃ duḥkham iti me vartate matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.077c: duṣkṛtī brāhmaṇaṃ santaṃ yas tvām aham upālabhe
GE07mbh_12_u:139.078a: pibanty evodakaṃ gāvo maṇḍūkeṣu ruvatsv api
GE07mbh_12_u:139.078c: na te 'dhikāro dharme 'sti mā bhūr ātmapraśaṃsakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.079a: suhṛd bhūtvānuśāsmi tvā kṛpā hi tvayi me dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:139.079c: tad evaṃ śreya ādhatsva mā lobhāc chvānam ādithāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.080a: suhṛn me tvaṃ sukhepsuś ced āpado māṃ samuddhara
GE07mbh_12_u:139.081a: naivotsahe bhavate dātum etāṃ; nopekṣituṃ hriyamāṇaṃ annam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.081c: ubhau syāvaḥ svamalenāvaliptau; dātāhaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vipra pratīcchan
GE07mbh_12_u:139.082a: adyāham etad vṛjinaṃ karma kṛtvā; jīvaṃś cariṣyāmi mahāpavitram
GE07mbh_12_u:139.082c: prapūtātmā dharmam evābhipatsye; yad etayor guru tad vai bravīhi
GE07mbh_12_u:139.083a: ātmaiva sākṣī kila lokakṛtye; tvam eva jānāsi yad atra duṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.083c: yo hy ādriyed bhakṣyam iti śvamāṃsaṃ; manye na tasyāsti vivarjanīyam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.084a: upādāne khādane vāsya doṣaḥ; kāryo nyāyair nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.084c: yasmin na hiṃsā nānṛte vākyaleśo; bhakṣyakriyā tatra na tad garīyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.085a: yady eṣa hetus tava khādanasya; na te vedaḥ kāraṇaṃ nānyadharmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.085c: tasmād abhakṣye bhakṣaṇād vā dvijendra; doṣaṃ na paśyāmi yathedam āttha
GE07mbh_12_u:139.086a: na pātakaṃ bhakṣaṇam asya dṛṣṭaṃ; surāṃ pītvā patatītīha śabdaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.086c: anyonyakarmāṇi tathā tathaiva; na leśamātreṇa kṛtyaṃ hinasti
GE07mbh_12_u:139.087a: asthānato hīnataḥ kutsitād vā; taṃ vidvāṃsaṃ bādhate sādhuvṛttam
GE07mbh_12_u:139.087c: sthānaṃ punar yo labhate niṣaṅgāt; tenāpi daṇḍaḥ sahitavya eva
GE07mbh_12_u:139.088a: evam uktvā nivavṛte mātaṅgaḥ kauśikaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:139.089c: sadāras tām upākṛtya vane yāto mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.089d-0357_05: tataḥ samārabhat karma daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:139.089d-0357_06: āhūya devān indrādīn bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ vidhikramāt
GE07mbh_12_u:139.090a: etasminn eva kāle tu pravavarṣātha vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.090c: saṃjīvayan prajāḥ sarvā janayām āsa cauṣadhīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.091d-0358_01: sa saṃhṛtya ca tat karma anāsvādya ca tad dhaviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.091d-0358_02: toṣayām āsa devāṃś ca pitṝṃś ca dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:139.093a: etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya jīvitavyaṃ sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:139.093c: jīvan puṇyam avāpnoti naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:140.001a: yad idaṃ ghoram uddiṣṭam aśraddheyam ivānṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.001c: asti svid dasyumaryādā yām ahaṃ parivarjaye
GE07mbh_12_u:140.004a: bahvyaḥ pratividhātavyāḥ prajñā rājñā tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.005c: jayo bhavati kauravya tadā tad viddhi me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.006c: dharmaḥ pratividhātavyo buddhyā rājñā tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.008a: advaidhajñaḥ pathi dvaidhe saṃśayaṃ prāptum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:140.009a: pārśvataḥkaraṇaṃ prajñā viṣūcī tv āpagā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:140.010c: tad vai yathātathaṃ buddhvā jñānam ādadate satām
GE07mbh_12_u:140.014c: vijñānam atha vidyānāṃ na samyag iti vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:140.015a: nindayā paravidyānāṃ svāṃ vidyāṃ khyāpayanti ye
GE07mbh_12_u:140.015e: tān vidyāvaṇijo viddhi rākṣasān iva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:140.016a: vyājena kṛtsno vidito dharmas te parihāsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:140.016c: na dharmavacanaṃ vācā na buddhyā ceti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.017a: iti bārhaspataṃ jñānaṃ provāca maghavā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.017c: na tv eva vacanaṃ kiṃ cid animittād ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:140.018c: lokayātrām ihaike tu dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.019a: samuddiṣṭaṃ satāṃ dharmaṃ svayam ūhen na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.020a: śāstraṃ prājñasya vadataḥ samūhe yāty adarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.022c: jñānam avyapadeśyaṃ hi yathā nāsti tathaiva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:140.023a: tena tvaṃ chinnamūlena kaṃ toṣayitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:140.023c: atathyavihitaṃ yo vā nedaṃ vākyam upāśnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:140.024a: ugrāyaiva hi sṛṣṭo 'si karmaṇe na tv avekṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:140.024e: yayā pramucyate tv anyo yadarthaṃ ca pramodate
GE07mbh_12_u:140.025a: ajo 'śvaḥ kṣatram ity etat sadṛśaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.025c: tasmān natīkṣṇabhūtānāṃ yātrā kā cit prasidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:140.026a: yas tv avadhyavadhe doṣaḥ sa vadhyasyāvadhe smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.026c: eṣaiva khalu maryādā yām ayaṃ parivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:140.027a: tasmāt tīkṣṇaḥ prajā rājā svadharme sthāpayed uta
GE07mbh_12_u:140.027c: anyonyaṃ bhakṣayanto hi pracareyur vṛkā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:140.028a: yasya dasyugaṇā rāṣṭre dhvāṅkṣā matsyāñ jalād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:140.029c: praśādhi pṛthivīṃ rājan prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:140.031c: ubhayaṃ na vyatikrāmed ugro bhūtvā mṛdur bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:140.032a: kaṣṭaḥ kṣatriyadharmo 'yaṃ sauhṛdaṃ tvayi yat sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:140.032c: ugre karmaṇi sṛṣṭo 'si tasmād rājyaṃ praśādhi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:140.032d-0360_01: aruṣṭaḥ kasya cid rājann evam eva samācara
GE07mbh_12_u:140.034a: asti svid dasyumaryādā yām anyo nātilaṅghayet
GE07mbh_12_u:140.034c: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:140.036a: yā devatāsu vṛttis te sāstu vipreṣu sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:140.036c: kruddhair hi vipraiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni bahudhā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:140.037a: teṣāṃ prītyā yaśo mukhyam aprītyā tu viparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:140.037c: prītyā hy amṛtavad viprāḥ kruddhāś caiva yathā viṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:141.001c: śaraṇaṃ pālayānasya yo dharmas taṃ vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:141.002c: arhaḥ praṣṭuṃ bhavāṃś caiva praśnaṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:141.004a: śrūyate hi kapotena śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.004c: pūjitaś ca yathānyāyaṃ svaiś ca māṃsair nimantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.005a: kathaṃ kapotena purā śatruḥ śaraṇam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.005c: svamāṃsair bhojitaḥ kāṃ ca gatiṃ lebhe sa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:141.007a: imam arthaṃ purā pārtha mucukundo narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.008c: iyaṃ yathā kapotena siddhiḥ prāptā narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:141.012a: naiva tasya suhṛt kaś cin na saṃbandhī na bāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.012c: sa hi taiḥ saṃparityaktas tena ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:141.012d-0361_02: ātmānaṃ yo 'bhisaṃdhatte so 'nyasya syāt kathaṃ hitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.012d-0361_04: udvejanīyā bhūtānāṃ vyālā iva bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:141.013a: sa vai kṣārakam ādāya dvijān hatvā vane sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:141.014a: evaṃ tu vartamānasya tasya vṛttiṃ durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.014c: agamat sumahān kālo na cādharmam abudhyata
GE07mbh_12_u:141.016a: tataḥ kadā cit tasyātha vanasthasya samudgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.016c: pātayann iva vṛkṣāṃs tān sumahān vātasaṃbhramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.020a: naiva nimnaṃ sthalaṃ vāpi so 'vindata vihaṃgahā
GE07mbh_12_u:141.020c: pūrito hi jalaughena mārgas tasya vanasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:141.021c: mṛgāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca sthalāny āśritya tasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:141.022c: bhayārtāś ca kṣudhārtāś ca babhramuḥ sahitā vane
GE07mbh_12_u:141.023a: sa tu śītahatair gātrair jagāmaiva na tasthivān
GE07mbh_12_u:141.023b-0362_02: dṛṣṭvārto 'pi hi pāpātmā sa tāṃ pañjarake 'kṣipat
GE07mbh_12_u:141.023b-0362_04: pāpātmā pāpakāritvāt pāpam eva cakāra saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.023d-0363_02: dhātrā paropakārāya sa sādhur iva nirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.024a: tārāḍhyaṃ kumudākāram ākāśaṃ nirmalaṃ ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:141.024c: meghair muktaṃ nabho dṛṣṭvā lubdhakaḥ śītavihvalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:141.025c: dūre grāmaniveśaś ca tasmād deśād iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:141.025e: kṛtabuddhir vane tasmin vastuṃ tāṃ rajanīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:141.026a: so 'ñjaliṃ prayataḥ kṛtvā vākyam āha vanaspatim
GE07mbh_12_u:141.026c: śaraṇaṃ yāmi yāny asmin daivatānīha bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:141.027a: sa śilāyāṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā parṇāny āstīrya bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:142.002a: tasya kālyaṃ gatā bhāryā carituṃ nābhyavartata
GE07mbh_12_u:142.002c: prāptāṃ ca rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa pakṣī paryatapyata
GE07mbh_12_u:142.003a: vātavarṣaṃ mahac cāsīn na cāgacchati me priyā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.003c: kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena sādyāpi na nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.004a: api svasti bhavet tasyāḥ priyāyā mama kānane
GE07mbh_12_u:142.004c: tayā virahitaṃ hīdaṃ śūnyam adya gṛhaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:142.004d-0364_02: bhāryāhīnaṃ gṛhasthasya śūnyam eva gṛhaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:142.004d-0364_03: na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.005c: adya nābhyeti me kāntā na kāryaṃ jīvitena me
GE07mbh_12_u:142.005d-0365_01: na bhuṅkte mayy abhukte yā nāsnāte snāti suvratā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.005d-0365_02: nātiṣṭhaty upatiṣṭheta śete ca śayite mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:142.005d-0365_03: hṛṣṭe bhavati sā hṛṣṭā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.006c: sā hi śrāntaṃ kṣudhārtaṃ ca jānīte māṃ tapasvinī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007a: anuraktā hitā caiva snigdhā caiva pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007c: yasya vai tādṛśī bhāryā dhanyaḥ sa manujo bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0366_01: vṛkṣamūle 'pi dayitā yasya tiṣṭhati tad gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0366_02: prāsādo 'pi tayā hīnaḥ kāntāra iti niścitam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_01: yasya bhāryā sadā raktā tathā chandānuvartinī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_02: vibhave 'pi hi saṃtoṣas tasya svarga ihaiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_03: sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryā yā pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_04: sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sā bhāryā yā manoramā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_05: yasya bhāryā guṇajñā ca bhartāram anugāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.007d-0367_06: yā cātīva hi saṃhṛṣṭā sā śrīḥ sākṣān na vai dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.008a: bhāryā hi paramo nāthaḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.009c: nāsti bhāryāsamaṃ kiṃ cin narasyārtasya bheṣajam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.010a: nāsti bhāryāsamo bandhur nāsti bhāryāsamā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.010d-0368_01: yasya bhāryā gṛhe nāsti sādhvī ca priyavādinī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.010d-0368_02: araṇyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ yathāraṇyaṃ tathā gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:142.010d-0369_01: aho mama vinā vahniṃ dahyate gātrasaṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.011a: evaṃ vilapatas tasya dvijasyārtasya tatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:142.011c: gṛhītā śakunaghnena bhāryā śuśrāva bhāratīm kapoty uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:142.011d-0370_01: aho 'tīva subhāgyāhaṃ yasyā me dayitaḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.011d-0370_02: asato vā sato vāpi guṇān evaṃ prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.012a: na sā strīty abhibhāṣā syād yasyā bhartā na tuṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:142.012b-0371_01: tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.012c: agnisākṣikam apy etad bhartā hi śaraṇaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.012d-0372_02: bhasmībhavatu sā nārī yasyā bhartā na tuṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:142.013a: iti saṃcintya duḥkhārtā bhartāraṃ duḥkhitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.014a: hanta vakṣyāmi te śreyaḥ śrutvā ca kuru tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.015a: eṣa śākunikaḥ śete tava vāsaṃ samāśritaḥ
