GE07mbh_12_u:142.015c: śītārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca pūjām asmai prayojaya
GE07mbh_12_u:142.016a: yo hi kaś cid dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram
GE07mbh_12_u:142.016c: śaraṇāgataṃ ca yo hanyāt tulyaṃ teṣāṃ ca pātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.018a: yas tu dharmaṃ yathāśakti gṛhastho hy anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.018c: sa pretya labhate lokān akṣayān iti śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:142.019a: sa tvaṃ saṃtānavān adya putravān api ca dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:142.019c: tat svadehe dayāṃ tyaktvā dharmārthau parigṛhya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:142.019e: pūjām asmai prayuṅkṣva tvaṃ prīyetāsya mano yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.019f-0373_01: matkṛte mā ca saṃtāpaṃ kurvīthās tvaṃ vihaṃgama
GE07mbh_12_u:142.020a: iti sā śakunī vākyaṃ kṣārakasthā tapasvinī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.022a: taṃ vai śākunikaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.022c: pūjayām āsa yatnena sa pakṣī pakṣijīvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.023a: uvāca ca svāgataṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:142.023c: saṃtāpaś ca na kartavyaḥ svagṛhe vartate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:142.024a: tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ kiṃ karomi kim icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:142.024c: praṇayena bravīmi tvāṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ śaraṇāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.024d-0374_01: arāv apy ucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛham āgate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.024d-0374_02: chettum apy āgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.026a: pañcayajñāṃs tu yo mohān na karoti gṛhāśramī
GE07mbh_12_u:142.026c: tasya nāyaṃ na ca paro loko bhavati dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.027a: tad brūhi tvaṃ suvisrabdho yat tvaṃ vācā vadiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:142.027c: tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ mā tvaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.028a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śakuner lubdhako 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:142.028c: bādhate khalu mā śītaṃ himatrāṇaṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:142.029a: evam uktas tataḥ pakṣī parṇāny āstīrya bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:142.031a: susaṃdīptaṃ mahat kṛtvā tam āha śaraṇāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.032a: sa tathoktas tathety uktvā lubdho gātrāṇy atāpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:142.033a: dattam āhāram icchāmi tvayā kṣud bādhate hi mām
GE07mbh_12_u:142.033c: tad vacaḥ sa pratiśrutya vākyam āha vihaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.034a: na me 'sti vibhavo yena nāśayāmi tava kṣudhām
GE07mbh_12_u:142.034c: utpannena hi jīvāmo vayaṃ nityaṃ vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.035a: saṃcayo nāsti cāsmākaṃ munīnām iva kānane
GE07mbh_12_u:142.035c: ity uktvā sa tadā tatra vivarṇavadano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:142.036a: kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam iti cintāparaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.037a: muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu sa pakṣī pakṣighātakam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.038a: ity uktvā śuṣkaparṇaiḥ sa saṃprajvālya hutāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.038c: harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ kapotaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:142.039a: devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:142.040a: kuruṣvānugrahaṃ me 'dya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:142.041a: tataḥ satyapratijño vai sa pakṣī prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:142.041c: tam agniṃ triḥ parikramya praviveśa mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:142.042a: agnimadhyaṃ praviṣṭaṃ taṃ lubdho dṛṣṭvātha pakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:142.042c: cintayām āsa manasā kim idaṃ nu kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:142.043c: adharmaḥ sumahān ghoro bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.044a: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhūri vilalāpa sa lubdhakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:142.044c: garhayan svāni karmāṇi dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:143.001c: kapotam agnau patitaṃ vākyaṃ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:143.002a: kim īdṛśaṃ nṛśaṃsena mayā kṛtam abuddhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:143.002c: bhaviṣyati hi me nityaṃ pātakaṃ hṛdi jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:143.003a: sa vinindann athātmānaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:143.003c: dhiṅ mām astu sudurbuddhiṃ sadā nikṛtiniścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:143.005a: so 'haṃ tyakṣye priyān prāṇān putradāraṃ visṛjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:143.006a: adya prabhṛti dehaṃ svaṃ sarvabhogair vivarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:143.006c: yathā svalpaṃ jalaṃ grīṣme śoṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:143.008c: tasmād dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:143.008e: dṛṣṭo hi dharmo dharmiṣṭhair yādṛśo vihagottame
GE07mbh_12_u:143.009a: evam uktvā viniścitya raudrakarmā sa lubdhakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:143.010a: tato yaṣṭiṃ śalākāś ca kṣārakaṃ pañjaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:143.010c: tāṃś ca baddhā kapotān sa saṃpramucyotsasarja ha
GE07mbh_12_u:144.001a: tato gate śākunike kapotī prāha duḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:144.002a: nāhaṃ te vipriyaṃ kānta kadā cid api saṃsmare
GE07mbh_12_u:144.002c: sarvā vai vidhavā nārī bahuputrāpi khecara
GE07mbh_12_u:144.003a: lālitāhaṃ tvayā nityaṃ bahumānāc ca sāntvitā
GE07mbh_12_u:144.004a: kandareṣu ca śailānāṃ nadīnāṃ nirjhareṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:144.004c: drumāgreṣu ca ramyeṣu ramitāhaṃ tvayā priya
GE07mbh_12_u:144.005c: vihṛtāsmi tvayā kānta tan me nādyāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:144.006a: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:144.006c: amitasya tu dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:144.007a: nāsti bhartṛsamo nātho na ca bhartṛsamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:144.007c: visṛjya dhanasarvasvaṃ bhartā vai śaraṇaṃ striyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:144.008a: na kāryam iha me nātha jīvitena tvayā vinā
GE07mbh_12_u:144.008c: patihīnāpi kā nārī satī jīvitum utsahet
GE07mbh_12_u:144.009a: evaṃ vilapya bahudhā karuṇaṃ sā suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_01: kapoto 'pi ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kapotīṃ ca surūpiṇīm
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_03: aho mām anugacchantyā kṛtaṃ sādhu śubhaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_05: tisraḥ koṭyardhakoṭī ca yāni lomāni mānave
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_06: tāvat kālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_07: vyālagrāhī yathā vyālaṃ bilād uddharate balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:144.011d-0376_08: tadvad bhartāram uddhṛtya tenaiva saha modate
GE07mbh_12_u:144.012a: tataḥ svargagataḥ pakṣī bhāryayā saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:144.012c: karmaṇā pūjitas tena reme tatra sa bhāryayā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.001a: vimānasthau tu tau rājaṃl lubdhako vai dadarśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:145.001c: dṛṣṭvā tau daṃpatī duḥkhād acintayata sadgatim
GE07mbh_12_u:145.004e: pipāsārto 'pi tad dṛṣṭvā tṛptaḥ syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:145.006a: mahāntaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā lubdhakaḥ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:145.006c: praviśann eva ca vanaṃ nigṛhītaḥ sa kaṇṭakaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:145.008a: tato drumāṇāṃ mahatāṃ pavanena vane tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.014a: evaṃ khalu kapotaś ca kapotī ca pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.014c: lubdhakena saha svargaṃ gatāḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.015c: virājate hi sā kṣipraṃ kapotīva divi sthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.016a: evam etat purā vṛttaṃ lubdhakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:145.016c: kapotasya ca dharmiṣṭhā gatiḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:145.017a: yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_12_u:145.018a: yudhiṣṭhira mahān eṣa dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:145.018c: goghneṣv api bhaved asmin niṣkṛtiḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:145.018e: niṣkṛtir na bhavet tasmin yo hanyāc charaṇāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:145.018f-0377_02: na durgatim avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:146.001c: mucyate sa kathaṃ tasmād enasas tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:146.002c: indrotaḥ śaunako vipro yad āha janamejayam
GE07mbh_12_u:146.004a: taṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarva eva tatyajuḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:146.004c: jagāma sa vanaṃ rājā dahyamāno divāniśam
GE07mbh_12_u:146.005a: sa prajābhiḥ parityaktaś cakāra kuśalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:146.005c: ativelaṃ tapas tepe dahyamānaḥ sa manyunā
GE07mbh_12_u:146.005d-0379_02: paryaṭan pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ deśe deśe narādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:146.008a: tato bhīto mahāprājño jagarhe subhṛśaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:146.008c: kartā pāpasya mahato bhrūṇahā kim ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:146.009a: kiṃ tavāsmāsu kartavyaṃ mā mā sprākṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:146.009c: gaccha gaccha na te sthānaṃ prīṇāty asmān iha dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:146.010a: rudhirasyeva te gandhaḥ śavasyeva ca darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:146.012a: moghaṃ te jīvitaṃ rājan parikliṣṭaṃ ca jīvasi
GE07mbh_12_u:146.012c: pāpāyeva ca sṛṣṭo 'si karmaṇe ha yavīyase
GE07mbh_12_u:146.013a: bahu kalyāṇam icchanta īhante pitaraḥ sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:146.014a: pitṛvaṃśam imaṃ paśya tvatkṛte narakaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:146.015a: yān pūjayanto vindanti svargam āyur yaśaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:146.015c: teṣu te satataṃ dveṣo brāhmaṇeṣu nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:146.016a: imaṃ lokaṃ vimucya tvam avāṅmūrdhā patiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:146.016c: aśāśvatīḥ śāśvatīś ca samāḥ pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:146.018a: yad idaṃ manyase rājan nāyam asti paraḥ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:147.001a: evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca taṃ muniṃ janamejayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:147.001c: garhyaṃ bhavān garhayati nindyaṃ nindati mā bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:147.002a: dhikkāryaṃ mā dhikkurute tasmāt tvāhaṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_12_u:147.002c: sarvaṃ hīdaṃ svakṛtaṃ me jvalāmy agnāv ivāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:147.003c: prāptaṃ nūnaṃ mayā ghoraṃ bhayaṃ vaivasvatād api
GE07mbh_12_u:147.004a: tat tu śalyam anirhṛtya kathaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:147.004c: sarvamanyūn vinīya tvam abhi mā vada śaunaka
GE07mbh_12_u:147.005c: astu śeṣaṃ kulasyāsya mā parābhūd idaṃ kulam
GE07mbh_12_u:147.006a: na hi no brahmaśaptānāṃ śeṣo bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:147.008c: na hy ayajñā amuṃ lokaṃ prāpnuvanti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:147.009c: brahman piteva putrebhyaḥ prati māṃ vāñcha śaunaka
GE07mbh_12_u:147.010a: kim āścaryaṃ yataḥ prājño bahu kuryād dhi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:147.010c: iti vai paṇḍito bhūtvā bhūtānāṃ nopatapyati
GE07mbh_12_u:147.012a: na copalabhate tatra na ca kāryāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:147.013c: kuruṣveha mahāśāntiṃ brahmā śaraṇam astu te
GE07mbh_12_u:147.014a: tad vai pāratrikaṃ cāru brāhmaṇānām akupyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:147.014c: atha cet tapyase pāpair dharmaṃ ced anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:147.015a: anutapye ca pāpena na cādharmaṃ carāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:147.016a: chittvā stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca prītim icchāmi te nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:147.017a: na bhayān na ca kārpaṇyān na lobhāt tvām upāhvaye
GE07mbh_12_u:147.017c: tāṃ me devā giraṃ satyāṃ śṛṇvantu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:147.018a: so 'haṃ na kena cic cārthī tvāṃ ca dharmam upāhvaye
GE07mbh_12_u:147.018c: krośatāṃ sarvabhūtānām aho dhig iti kurvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:147.019a: vakṣyanti mām adharmajñā vakṣyanty asuhṛdo janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:147.019c: vācas tāḥ suhṛdaḥ śrutvā saṃjvariṣyanti me bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:147.020a: ke cid eva mahāprājñāḥ parijñāsyanti kāryatām
GE07mbh_12_u:147.020c: jānīhi me kṛtaṃ tāta brāhmaṇān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:147.021a: yathā te matkṛte kṣemaṃ labheraṃs tat tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:147.022a: naiva vācā na manasā na punar jātu karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:147.022c: drogdhāsmi brāhmaṇān vipra caraṇāv eva te spṛśe
GE07mbh_12_u:148.001c: śrīmān mahābalas tuṣṭo yas tvaṃ dharmam avekṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:148.001e: purastād dāruṇo bhūtvā sucitrataram eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:148.002c: kṛtsne nūnaṃ sadasatī iti loko vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:148.002e: yatra tvaṃ tādṛśo bhūtvā dharmam adyānupaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:148.003a: hitvā suruciraṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhogāṃś ca tapa āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.003c: ity etad api bhūtānām adbhutaṃ janamejaya
GE07mbh_12_u:148.004a: yo durbalo bhaved dātā kṛpaṇo vā tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.004c: anāścaryaṃ tad ity āhur nātidūre hi vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:148.005a: etad eva hi kārpaṇyaṃ samagram asamīkṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:148.005c: tasmāt samīkṣayaiva syād bhavet tasmiṃs tato guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.006a: yajño dānaṃ dayā vedāḥ satyaṃ ca pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:148.007a: tad eva rājñāṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ janamejaya
GE07mbh_12_u:148.007c: tena samyag gṛhītena śreyāṃsaṃ dharmam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:148.008c: api hy udāharantīmā gāthā gītā yayātinā
GE07mbh_12_u:148.009a: yo martyaḥ pratipadyeta āyur jīveta vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.009c: yajñam ekāntataḥ kṛtvā tat saṃnyasya tapaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:148.010c: yatrāvagāhya pītvā vā naivaṃ śvomaraṇaṃ tapet
GE07mbh_12_u:148.011c: kālodaṃ tv eva gantāsi labdhāyur jīvite punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.014a: yathā kumāraḥ satyo vai na puṇyo na ca pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:148.014c: na hy asti sarvabhūteṣu duḥkham asmin kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:148.016a: yat tv eva rājño jyāyo vai kāryāṇāṃ tad vadāmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:148.016c: balena saṃvibhāgaiś ca jaya svargaṃ punīṣva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:148.017a: yasyaivaṃ balam ojaś ca sa dharmasya prabhur naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.017c: brāhmaṇānāṃ sukhārthaṃ tvaṃ paryehi pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:148.019a: ātmano darśanaṃ vidvan nāhantāsmīti mā krudhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.021a: na niḥśeṣeṇa mantavyam acikitsyena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.021c: na jātu nāham asmīti prasaktavyam asādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:148.022c: naitat kāryaṃ punar iti dvitīyāt parimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:148.023c: ye sugandhīni sevante tathāgandhā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:148.023e: ye durgandhīni sevante tathāgandhā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:148.026a: api vāpsu nimajjeta trir japann aghamarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:148.027a: kṣipraṃ praṇudate pāpaṃ satkāraṃ labhate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:148.028a: bṛhaspatiṃ devaguruṃ surāsurāḥ; sametya sarve nṛpate 'nvayuñjan
GE07mbh_12_u:148.028c: dharme phalaṃ vettha kṛte maharṣe; tathetarasmin narake pāpaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:148.029a: ubhe tu yasya sukṛte bhavetāṃ; kiṃ svit tayos tatra jayottaraṃ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:148.029c: ācakṣva naḥ karmaphalaṃ maharṣe; kathaṃ pāpaṃ nudate puṇyaśīlaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.030a: kṛtvā pāpaṃ pūrvam abuddhipūrvaṃ; puṇyāni yaḥ kurute buddhipūrvam
GE07mbh_12_u:148.030c: sa tat pāpaṃ nudate puṇyaśīlo; vāso yathā malinaṃ kṣārayuktyā
GE07mbh_12_u:148.031a: pāpaṃ kṛtvā na manyeta nāham asmīti pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:148.032c: yaḥ pāpaṃ puruṣaḥ kṛtvā kalyāṇam abhipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:148.033a: yathādityaḥ punar udyaṃs tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_12_u:148.033c: kalyāṇam ācarann evaṃ sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati
GE07mbh_12_u:148.034a: evam uktvā sa rājānam indroto janamejayam
GE07mbh_12_u:148.035a: tataḥ sa rājā vyapanītakalmaṣaḥ; śriyā yutaḥ prajvalitāgnirūpayā
GE07mbh_12_u:148.035c: viveśa rājyaṃ svam amitrakarśano; divaṃ yathā pūrṇavapur niśākaraḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.000-0383_01: kaccit pitāmahenāsīc chrutaṃ vā dṛṣṭam eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.000-0383_02: kaccin martyo mṛto rājan punar ujjīvito bhavet yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.000-0384_03: tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi mahāntaṃ hy api me sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.000-0384_04: ṛte pitāmahād bhīṣmāc chettā naivāsya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:149.001d-0385_01: kasya cid brāhmaṇasyāsīd duḥkhalabdhaḥ suto mṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.002a: duḥkhitāḥ ke cid ādāya bālam aprāptayauvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.003c: aṅkenāṅkaṃ ca saṃkramya rurudur bhūtale tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.003d-0386_01: śocantas tasya pūrvoktān bhāṣitāṃś cāsakṛt punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.003d-0386_02: taṃ bālaṃ bhūtale kṣipya pratigantuṃ na śaknuyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.004c: ekātmakam imaṃ loke tyaktvā gacchata māciram
GE07mbh_12_u:149.005a: iha puṃsāṃ sahasrāṇi strīsahasrāṇi caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:149.005c: samānītāni kālena kiṃ te vai jātv abāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.007a: gṛhītvā ye ca gacchanti ye 'nuyānti ca tān mṛtān
GE07mbh_12_u:149.007c: te 'py āyuṣaḥ pramāṇena svena gacchanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.009a: na punar jīvitaḥ kaś cit kāladharmam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.009c: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:149.011c: gamyatāṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ sutasnehaṃ visṛjya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:149.012a: tato gṛdhravacaḥ śrutvā vikrośantas tadā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:149.012d-0387_01: niścitārthāś ca te sarve gamanaṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:149.013a: viniścityātha ca tataḥ saṃtyajantaḥ svam ātmajam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.013a-0388_02: mṛtam ity eva gacchanto nirāśās tasya darśane
GE07mbh_12_u:149.014c: gacchamānān sma tān āha nirghṛṇāḥ khalu mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.015a: ādityo 'yaṃ sthito mūḍhāḥ snehaṃ kuruta mā bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.015c: bahurūpo muhūrtaś ca jīvetāpi kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:149.016c: śmaśāne putram utsṛjya kasmād gacchatha nirghṛṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.017a: na vo 'sty asmin sute sneho bāle madhurabhāṣiṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:149.018c: na yeṣāṃ dhārayitvā tān kaś cid asti phalāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.020a: teṣāṃ putrābhirāmāṇām iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.020c: na guṇo dṛśyate kaś cit prajāḥ saṃdhārayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.021c: na ca puṣṇanti saṃvṛddhās te mātāpitarau kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:149.022a: mānuṣāṇāṃ kutaḥ sneho yeṣāṃ śoko bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.022c: imaṃ kulakaraṃ putraṃ kathaṃ tyaktvā gamiṣyatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.023a: ciraṃ muñcata bāṣpaṃ ca ciraṃ snehena paśyata
GE07mbh_12_u:149.025a: sarvasya dayitāḥ prāṇāḥ sarvaḥ snehaṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.025c: tiryagyoniṣv api satāṃ snehaṃ paśyata yādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.027c: nyavartanta tadā sarve śavārthaṃ te sma mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.029c: kasmāc chocatha niśceṣṭam ātmānaṃ kiṃ na śocatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.030a: tapaḥ kuruta vai tīvraṃ mucyadhvaṃ yena kilbiṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:149.030c: tapasā labhyate sarvaṃ vilāpaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.031a: aniṣṭāni ca bhāgyāni jānīta saha mūrtibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.031c: yena gacchati loko 'yaṃ dattvā śokam anantakam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.032a: dhanaṃ gāś ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇiratnam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.032c: apatyaṃ ca tapomūlaṃ tapoyogāc ca labhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:149.033c: gṛhītvā jāyate jantur duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.034a: na karmaṇā pituḥ putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.035c: vartadhvaṃ ca yathākālaṃ daivateṣu dvijeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.036a: śokaṃ tyajata dainyaṃ ca sutasnehān nivartata
GE07mbh_12_u:149.036c: tyajyatām ayam ākāśe tataḥ śīghraṃ nivartata
GE07mbh_12_u:149.037a: yat karoti śubhaṃ karma tathādharmaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.037c: tat kartaiva samaśnāti bāndhavānāṃ kim atra hi
GE07mbh_12_u:149.038a: iha tyaktvā na tiṣṭhanti bāndhavā bāndhavaṃ priyam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.039a: prājño vā yadi vā mūrkhaḥ sadhano nirdhano 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.040a: kiṃ kariṣyatha śocitvā mṛtaṃ kim anuśocatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.040c: sarvasya hi prabhuḥ kālo dharmataḥ samadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.041a: yauvanasthāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vṛddhān garbhagatān api
GE07mbh_12_u:149.041c: sarvān āviśate mṛtyur evaṃbhūtam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:149.043a: samaiḥ samyak prayuktaiś ca vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.043b-0389_01: sarvam etat prapadyāśu kurutāṃ mā vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:149.043c: yad gacchatha jalasthāyaṃ sneham utsṛjya dustyajam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.044c: krośatāṃ vai bhṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivatsānāṃ gavām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:149.045c: snehaṃ hi karuṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpy aśrūṇy athāgaman
GE07mbh_12_u:149.046a: yatno hi satataṃ kāryaḥ kṛto daivena sidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.047a: anirvedaḥ sadā kāryo nirvedād dhi kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:149.047c: prayatnāt prāpyate hy arthaḥ kasmād gacchatha nirdayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.048c: pitṝṇāṃ vaṃśakartāraṃ vane tyaktvā kva yāsyatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.049a: atha vāstaṃ gate sūrye saṃdhyākāla upasthite
GE07mbh_12_u:149.049c: tato neṣyatha vā putram ihasthā vā bhaviṣyatha śrībhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.049d-0390_01: jambukasya vacaḥ śrutvā gṛdhro rājan yad abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:149.049d-0390_02: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tvam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:149.050a: adya varṣasahasraṃ me sāgraṃ jātasya mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.050c: na ca paśyāmi jīvantaṃ mṛtaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.053c: dahyamānāḥ sma śokena gṛhaṃ gacchanti nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.055a: tyajyatām eṣa nistejāḥ śūnyaḥ kāṣṭhatvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.056a: bhrāntajīvasya vai bāṣpaṃ kasmād dhitvā na gacchatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.056c: nirarthako hy ayaṃ sneho nirarthaś ca parigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.057a: na cakṣurbhyāṃ na karṇābhyāṃ saṃśṛṇoti samīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:149.057c: tasmād enaṃ samutsṛjya svagṛhān gacchatāśu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:149.058c: mayoktā gacchata kṣipraṃ svaṃ svam eva niveśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.059d-0391_01: śoko dviguṇatāṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā ca ceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.059d-0391_02: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃnivṛttās tu mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.059d-0391_03: apaśyat taṃ tadā suptaṃ drutam āgatya jambukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.059d-0392_01: gṛdhrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jambuko vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:149.061c: mṛtasyāsya parityāgāt tāpo vai bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.063a: tathā śvetasya rājarṣer bālo diṣṭāntam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.064a: tathā kaś cid bhavet siddho munir vā devatāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.064c: kṛpaṇānām anukrośaṃ kuryād vo rudatām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.067a: tapasāpi hi saṃyukto na kāle nopahanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:149.068c: dināni caiva rātrīś ca duḥkhaṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūtale
GE07mbh_12_u:149.069c: apratyayaṃ kuto hy asya punar adyeha jīvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.071a: na vai mūrtipradānena na jambukaśatair api
GE07mbh_12_u:149.071c: śakyo jīvayituṃ hy eṣa bālo varṣaśatair api
GE07mbh_12_u:149.072a: api rudraḥ kumāro vā brahmā vā viṣṇur eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.072c: varam asmai prayaccheyus tato jīved ayaṃ śiśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.073a: na ca bāṣpavimokṣeṇa na cāśvāsakṛtena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:149.074a: ahaṃ ca kroṣṭukaś caiva yūyaṃ caivāsya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.074d-0394_01: yadi jīved ayaṃ bhūyo yāvad evaṃ karomy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:149.075c: adharmam anṛtaṃ caiva dūrāt prājño nivartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:149.076a: satyaṃ dharmaṃ śubhaṃ nyāyyaṃ prāṇināṃ mahatīṃ dayām
GE07mbh_12_u:149.077a: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva bāndhavān suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.077c: jīvato ye na paśyanti teṣāṃ dharmaviparyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.078a: yo na paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ neṅgate ca kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:149.079a: ity uktās taṃ sutaṃ tyaktvā bhūmau śokapariplutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.082a: na me mānuṣaloko 'yaṃ muhūrtam api rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:149.083c: kathaṃ gacchatha sasnehāḥ sutasnehaṃ visṛjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.085c: kulaśokākaraṃ mūḍhāḥ putraṃ tyaktvā kva yāsyatha
GE07mbh_12_u:149.086c: jīvantam enaṃ paśyāmi manasā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.087a: vināśaś cāpy anarho 'sya sukhaṃ prāpsyatha mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.087c: putraśokāgnidagdhānāṃ mṛtam apy adya vaḥ kṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.093a: bhānur yāvan na yāty astaṃ yāvac ca vimalā diśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.094a: nadanti paruṣaṃ śyenāḥ śivāḥ krośanti dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.094c: mṛgendrāḥ pratinandanti ravir astaṃ ca gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.096a: sarve vikrāntavīryāś ca asmin deśe sudāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.097a: dūrāc cāyaṃ vanoddeśo bhayam atra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.099a: sthīyatāṃ neha bhetavyaṃ yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.100a: svairaṃ rudata visrabdhāḥ svairaṃ snehena paśyata
GE07mbh_12_u:149.100b-0395_01: dāruṇe 'smin vanoddeśe bhayaṃ vo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.100c: sthīyatāṃ yāvad ādityaḥ kiṃ vaḥ kravyādabhāṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.101a: yadi gṛdhrasya vākyāni tīvrāṇi rabhasāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.101c: gṛhṇīta mohitātmānaḥ suto vo na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:149.102a: gṛdhro 'nastamite tv āha gate 'stam iti jambukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.102c: mṛtasya taṃ parijanam ūcatus tau kṣudhānvitau
GE07mbh_12_u:149.103a: svakāryadakṣiṇau rājan gṛdhro jambuka eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.104c: vākyair amṛtakalpair hi prātiṣṭhanta vrajanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:149.107a: tatas tān āha manujān varado 'smīti śūlabhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:149.107c: te pratyūcur idaṃ vākyaṃ duḥkhitāḥ praṇatāḥ sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.108c: putrasya no jīvadānāj jīvitaṃ dātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:149.109a: evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān vāripūrṇena pāṇinā
GE07mbh_12_u:149.109c: jīvaṃ tasmai kumārāya prādād varṣaśatāya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:149.111c: kṛtakṛtyāḥ sukhaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prātiṣṭhanta tadā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:149.113a: paśya devasya saṃyogaṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca niścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.114c: prasādaṃ śaṃkarāt prāpya duḥkhitāḥ sukham āpnuvan
GE07mbh_12_u:149.115a: te vismitāḥ prahṛṣṭāś ca putrasaṃjīvanāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:149.116a: tatas te tvaritā rājañ śrutvā śokam aghodbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:149.117c: śrutvā manuṣyaḥ satatam iha pretya ca modate yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:150.000-0397_05: ātmano balam āsthāya kathaṃ varteta mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.003a: tatra sma mattā mātaṅgā dharmārtāḥ śramakarśitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.004d-0399_01: taṃ kadā cin munir dṛṣṭvā nārado vismito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.004d-0399_02: dhanyas tvam eka evāsi śālmale vāyuvallabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.005a: sārthikā vaṇijaś cāpi tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.006a: tasyā tā vipulāḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā skandhāṃś ca sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.007a: aho nu ramaṇīyas tvam aho cāsi manoramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.008a: sadaiva śakunās tāta mṛgāś cādhas tathā gajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.009a: tava śākhā mahāśākha skandhaṃ ca vipulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:150.009c: na vai prabhagnān paśyāmi mārutena kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:150.010a: kiṃ nu te mārutas tāta prītimān atha vā suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.010c: tvāṃ rakṣati sadā yena vane 'smin pavano dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:150.011a: vivān hi pavanaḥ sthānād vṛkṣān uccāvacān api
GE07mbh_12_u:150.012a: śoṣayaty eva pātālaṃ vivān gandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.012c: hradāṃś ca saritaś caiva sāgarāṃś ca tathaiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:150.013a: tvāṃ saṃrakṣeta pavanaḥ sakhitvena na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.014a: idaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ te pratibhāti vanaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:150.014c: yad ime vihagās tāta ramante muditās tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:150.015a: eṣāṃ pṛthak samastānāṃ śrūyate madhuraḥ svaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.016c: gharmārtās tvāṃ samāsādya sukhaṃ vindanti śalmale
GE07mbh_12_u:150.017c: tathā sārthādhivāsaiś ca śobhase meruvad druma
GE07mbh_12_u:150.018a: brāhmaṇaiś ca tapaḥsiddhais tāpasaiḥ śramaṇair api
GE07mbh_12_u:150.019a: bandhutvād atha vā sakhyāc chalmale nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.020a: nyagbhāvaṃ paramaṃ vāyoḥ śalmale tvam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.020c: tavāham asmīti sadā yena rakṣati mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.021a: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ parvataṃ vāpi taṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_12_u:150.021c: yo na vāyubalād bhagnaḥ pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.022a: tvaṃ punaḥ kāraṇair nūnaṃ śalmale rakṣyase sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:150.023a: na me vāyuḥ sakhā brahman na bandhur na ca me suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.023c: parameṣṭhī tathā naiva yena rakṣati mānilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.024a: mama tejobalaṃ vāyor bhīmam api hi nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:150.024c: kalām aṣṭādaśīṃ prāṇair na me prāpnoti mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.025a: āgacchan paramo vāyur mayā viṣṭambhito balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.025c: rujan drumān parvatāṃś ca yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:150.026a: sa mayā bahuśo bhagnaḥ prabhañjan vai prabhañjanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.026c: tasmān na bibhye devarṣe kruddhād api samīraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.027a: śalmale viparītaṃ te darśanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.027c: na hi vāyor balenāsti bhūtaṃ tulyabalaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:150.028a: indro yamo vaiśravaṇo varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.028c: na te 'pi tulyā marutaḥ kiṃ punas tvaṃ vanaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:150.029a: yad dhi kiṃ cid iha prāṇi śalmale ceṣṭate bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:150.030a: eṣa ceṣṭayate samyak prāṇinaḥ samyag āyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.030c: asamyag āyato bhūyaś ceṣṭate vikṛto nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:150.031a: sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ vāyuṃ sarvasattvabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:150.031c: na pūjayasi pūjyaṃ taṃ kim anyad buddhilāghavāt
GE07mbh_12_u:150.032a: asāraś cāsi durbuddhe kevalaṃ bahu bhāṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:150.033a: mama roṣaḥ samutpannas tvayy evaṃ saṃprabhāṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:150.033c: bravīmy eṣa svayaṃ vāyos tava durbhāṣitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:150.034c: vetasair bandhanaiś cāpi ye cānye balavattarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.035a: taiś cāpi naivaṃ durbuddhe kṣipto vāyuḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.035c: te hi jānanti vāyoś ca balam ātmana eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:150.036a: tasmāt te vai namasyanti śvasanaṃ drumasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:150.036c: tvaṃ tu mohān na jānīṣe vāyor balam anantakam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.001a: evam uktvā tu rājendra śalmaliṃ brahmavittamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.001c: nāradaḥ pavane sarvaṃ śalmaler vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:151.003a: bahūny ākṣepayuktāni tvām āha vacanāni saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.003c: na yuktāni mayā vāyo tāni vaktuṃ tvayi prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:151.004a: jānāmi tvām ahaṃ vāyo sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.004c: variṣṭhaṃ ca gariṣṭhaṃ ca krodhe vaivasvataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.005a: evaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.005c: śalmaliṃ tam upāgamya kruddho vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:151.006a: śalmale nārade yat tat tvayoktaṃ madvigarhaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.006c: ahaṃ vāyuḥ prabhāvaṃ te darśayāmy ātmano balam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.007a: nāhaṃ tvā nābhijānāmi viditaś cāsi me druma
GE07mbh_12_u:151.008a: tasya viśramaṇād eva prasādo yaḥ kṛtas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:151.009a: yan mā tvam avajānīṣe yathānyaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.009c: darśayāmy eṣa ātmānaṃ yathā mām avabhotsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:151.010a: evam uktas tataḥ prāha śalmaliḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:151.010c: pavana tvaṃ vane kruddho darśayātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.011a: mayi vai tyajyatāṃ krodhaḥ kiṃ me kruddhaḥ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:151.011c: na te bibhemi pavana yady api tvaṃ svayaṃprabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.011d-0402_01: balādhiko 'haṃ tvattaś ca na bhīḥ kāryā mayā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:151.011d-0402_02: ye tu buddhyā hi balinas te bhavanti balīyasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.011d-0402_03: prāṇamātrabalā ye vai naiva te balino matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.012a: ity evam uktaḥ pavanaḥ śva ity evābravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.012c: darśayiṣyāmi te tejas tato rātrir upāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:151.014a: nārade yan mayā proktaṃ pavanaṃ prati tan mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.014c: asamartho hy ahaṃ vāyor balena balavān hi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.015c: ahaṃ hi durbalo 'nyebhyo vṛkṣebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.016a: kiṃ tu buddhyā samo nāsti mama kaś cid vanaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.016c: tad ahaṃ buddhim āsthāya bhayaṃ mokṣye samīraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:151.017a: yadi tāṃ buddhim āsthāya careyuḥ parṇino vane
GE07mbh_12_u:151.017c: ariṣṭāḥ syuḥ sadā kruddhāt pavanān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.018a: te 'tra bālā na jānanti yathā nainān samīraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.018c: samīrayeta saṃkruddho yathā jānāmy ahaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.019a: tato niścitya manasā śalmaliḥ kṣubhitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.019c: śākhāḥ skandhān praśākhāś ca svayam eva vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_12_u:151.020a: sa parityajya śākhāś ca patrāṇi kusumāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:151.021a: tataḥ kruddhaḥ śvasan vāyuḥ pātayan vai mahādrumān
GE07mbh_12_u:151.021c: ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sthito yatra sa śalmaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.022a: taṃ hīnaparṇaṃ patitāgraśākhaṃ; viśīrṇapuṣpaṃ prasamīkṣya vāyuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.022c: uvāca vākyaṃ smayamāna enaṃ; mudā yutaṃ śalmaliṃ rugṇaśākham
GE07mbh_12_u:151.023a: aham apy evam eva tvāṃ kurvāṇaḥ śalmale ruṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.023c: ātmanā yat kṛtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śākhānām apakarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.025a: etac chrutvā vaco vāyoḥ śalmalir vrīḍitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.025c: atapyata vacaḥ smṛtvā nārado yat tadābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:151.026a: evaṃ yo rājaśārdūla durbalaḥ san balīyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.026c: vairam āsajjate bālas tapyate śalmalir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.027a: tasmād vairaṃ na kurvīta durbalo balavattaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.027c: śoced dhi vairaṃ kurvāṇo yathā vai śalmalis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.028a: na hi vairaṃ mahātmāno vivṛṇvanty apakāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:151.028c: śanaiḥ śanair mahārāja darśayanti sma te balam
GE07mbh_12_u:151.029a: vairaṃ na kurvīta naro durbuddhir buddhijīvinā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.029c: buddhir buddhimato yāti tūleṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.030a: na hi buddhyā samaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate puruṣe nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:151.030c: tathā balena rājendra na samo 'stīti cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:151.031a: tasmāt kṣameta bālāya jaḍāya badhirāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:151.031c: balādhikāya rājendra tad dṛṣṭaṃ tvayi śatruhan
GE07mbh_12_u:151.032a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca sapta caiva mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:151.032c: balena na samā rājann arjunasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:151.033a: hatās tāś caiva bhagnāś ca pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
GE07mbh_12_u:151.034a: uktās te rājadharmāś ca āpaddharmāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:151.034c: vistareṇa mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ prabravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:152.001a: pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ pāpaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:152.001c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:152.002a: pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:152.002c: eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:152.003a: ataḥ pāpam adharmaś ca tathā duḥkham anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:152.003c: nikṛtyā mūlam etad dhi yena pāpakṛto janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.004a: lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt kāmaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:152.004c: lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānastambhaḥ parāsutā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.006a: anyāyaś cāvitarkaś ca vikarmasu ca yāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.008a: vāgvego mānaso vego nindāvegas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.009a: īrṣyāvegaś ca balavān mithyāvegaś ca dustyajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.009c: rasavegaś ca durvāraḥ śrotravegaś ca duḥsahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.010c: sāhasānāṃ ca sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ kriyās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.011a: jātau bālye 'tha kaumāre yauvane cāpi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.011c: na saṃtyajaty ātmakarma yan na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.012a: yo na pūrayituṃ śakyo lobhaḥ prāptyā kurūdvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:152.012e: na prahṛṣyati lābhair yo yaś ca kāmair na tṛpyati
GE07mbh_12_u:152.013a: yo na devair na gandharvair nāsurair na mahoragaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.013c: jñāyate nṛpa tattvena sarvair bhūtagaṇais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.013e: sa lobhaḥ saha mohena vijetavyo jitātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.014a: dambho drohaś ca nindā ca paiśunyaṃ matsaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.016c: antaḥkṣurā vāṅmadhurāḥ kūpāś channās tṛṇair iva
GE07mbh_12_u:152.017a: kurvate ca bahūn mārgāṃs tāṃs tān hetubalāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.018c: yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sābhiprapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:152.019a: darpaḥ krodho madaḥ svapno harṣaḥ śoko 'timānitā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.019c: tata eva hi kauravya dṛśyante lubdhabuddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:152.020a: śiṣṭāṃs tu paripṛcchethā yān vakṣyāmi śucivratān
GE07mbh_12_u:152.020c: yeṣu vṛttibhayaṃ nāsti paralokabhayaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.021a: nāmiṣeṣu prasaṅgo 'sti na priyeṣv apriyeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.021c: śiṣṭācāraḥ priyo yeṣu damo yeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.022a: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yeṣāṃ satyaṃ yeṣāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:152.022c: dātāro na gṛhītāro dayāvantas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.025a: na teṣāṃ bhidyate vṛttaṃ yat purā sādhubhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:152.025c: na trāsino na capalā na raudrāḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.026a: te sevyāḥ sādhubhir nityaṃ yeṣv ahiṃsā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.026e: suvratāḥ sthiramaryādās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.027a: na gavārthaṃ yaśorthaṃ vā dharmas teṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:152.027c: avaśyakārya ity eva śarīrasya kriyās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:152.028a: na bhayaṃ krodhacāpalyaṃ na śokas teṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:152.028c: na dharmadhvajinaś caiva na guhyaṃ kiṃ cid āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.029a: yeṣv alobhas tathāmoho ye ca satyārjave ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.029c: teṣu kaunteya rajyethā yeṣv atandrīkṛtaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.030a: ye na hṛṣyanti lābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.031a: lābhālābhau sukhaduḥkhe ca tāta; priyāpriye maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:152.031c: samāni yeṣāṃ sthiravikramāṇāṃ; buddhātmanāṃ sattvam avasthitānām
GE07mbh_12_u:152.032a: sukhapriyais tān sumahāpratāpān; yatto 'pramattaś ca samarthayethāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:152.032c: daivāt sarve guṇavanto bhavanti; śubhāśubhā vākpralāpā yathaiva
GE07mbh_12_u:153.001c: ajñānam api vai tāta śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:153.002a: karoti pāpaṃ yo 'jñānān nātmano vetti ca kṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:153.002c: pradveṣṭi sādhuvṛttāṃś ca sa lokasyaiti vācyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:153.004a: ajñānasya pravṛttiṃ ca sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ kṣayodayau
GE07mbh_12_u:153.004c: mūlaṃ yogaṃ gatiṃ kālaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetum eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:153.005a: śrotum icchāmi tattvena yathāvad iha pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:153.006a: rāgo dveṣas tathā moho harṣaḥ śoko 'bhimānitā
GE07mbh_12_u:153.006c: kāmaḥ krodhaś ca darpaś ca tandrīr ālasyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:153.007c: ajñānam etan nirdiṣṭaṃ pāpānāṃ caiva yāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:153.008a: etayā yā pravṛttiś ca vṛddhyādīn yāṃś ca pṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:153.008c: vistareṇa mahābāho śṛṇu tac ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:153.009a: ubhāv etau samaphalau samadoṣau ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:153.009c: ajñānaṃ cātilobhaś cāpy ekaṃ jānīhi pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:153.010c: sthāne sthānaṃ kṣaye kṣaiṇyam upaiti vividhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:153.011a: mūlaṃ lobhasya mahataḥ kālātmagatir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:153.011c: chinne 'cchinne tathā lobhe kāraṇaṃ kāla eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:153.012a: tasyājñānāt tu lobho hi lobhād ajñānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:153.012c: sarve doṣās tathā lobhāt tasmāl lobhaṃ vivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:153.014a: pratyakṣaṃ tu kuruśreṣṭha tyaja lobham ihātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:153.014c: tyaktvā lobhaṃ sukhaṃ loke pretya cānucariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:154.001c: dharmakāmasya dharmātman kiṃ nu śreya ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.002a: bahudhādarśane loke śreyo yad iha manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:154.002c: asmiṃl loke pare caiva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:154.003a: mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:154.003c: kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.004c: yan mūlaṃ paramaṃ tāta tat sarvaṃ brūhy atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:154.005a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yena śreyaḥ prapatsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:154.006a: dharmasya vidhayo naike te te proktā maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:154.006c: svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam āśritya damas teṣāṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.008c: damo dānaṃ tathā yajñān adhītaṃ cātivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.009a: damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ ca damaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:154.009c: vipāpmā tejasā yuktaḥ puruṣo vindate mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:154.010a: damena sadṛśaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ lokeṣu śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:154.010c: damo hi paramo loke praśastaḥ sarvadharmiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:154.011a: pretya cāpi manuṣyendra paramaṃ vindate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:154.011c: damena hi samāyukto mahāntaṃ dharmam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:154.012a: sukhaṃ dāntaḥ prasvapiti sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.012c: sukhaṃ paryeti lokāṃś ca manaś cāsya prasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:154.013c: anarthāṃś ca bahūn anyān prasṛjaty ātmadoṣajān
GE07mbh_12_u:154.014a: āśrameṣu caturṣv āhur damam evottamaṃ vratam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.014c: tasya liṅgāni vakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:154.015a: kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.017a: gurupūjā ca kauravya dayā bhūteṣv apaiśunam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.018a: kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca darpaḥ stambho vikatthanam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.018c: moha īrṣyāvamānaś cety etad dānto na sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.019c: samudrakalpaḥ sa naro na kadā cana pūryate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.020a: ahaṃ tvayi mama tvaṃ ca mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:154.021a: sarvā grāmyās tathāraṇyā yāś ca loke pravṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:154.021c: nindāṃ caiva praśaṃsāṃ ca yo nāśrayati mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.022c: muktaś ca vividhaiḥ saṅgais tasya pretya mahat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:154.024a: karma yac chubham eveha sadbhir ācaritaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:154.024c: tad eva jñānayuktasya muner dharmo na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:154.026a: abhayaṃ yasya bhūtebhyo bhūtānām abhayaṃ yataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:154.026c: tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś cana

GE07mbh_12_u:159.070c: māṃsaṃ mūtrapurīṣaṃ ca prāśya saṃskāram arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:159.071c: apas tryahaṃ pibed uṣṇās tryaham uṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibet
GE07mbh_12_u:159.071e: tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pītvā vāyubhakṣo bhavet tryaham
GE07mbh_12_u:160.002a: dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭham iti vādaḥ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:160.002c: matas tu mama dharmajña khaḍga eva susaṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.003a: viśīrṇe kārmuke rājan prakṣīṇeṣu ca vājiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:160.003c: khaḍgena śakyate yuddhe sādhv ātmā parirakṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:160.005a: atra me saṃśayaś caiva kautūhalam atīva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:160.005c: kiṃ svit praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvayuddheṣu pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:160.006a: kathaṃ cotpāditaḥ khaḍgaḥ kasyārthāya ca kena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.007a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.010a: tattvaṃ śṛṇuṣva mādreya yad etat paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:160.011a: salilaikārṇavaṃ tāta purā sarvam abhūd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.012c: niḥśabdaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca tatra jajñe pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.013a: so 'sṛjad vāyum agniṃ ca bhāskaraṃ cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:160.013c: ākāśam asṛjac cordhvam adho bhūmiṃ ca nairṛtim
GE07mbh_12_u:160.014a: nabhaḥ sacandratāraṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.014c: saṃvatsarān ahorātrān ṛtūn atha lavān kṣaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:160.016a: marīcim ṛṣim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum
GE07mbh_12_u:160.016c: vasiṣṭhāṅgirasau cobhau rudraṃ ca prabhum īśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:160.017a: prācetasas tathā dakṣaḥ kanyāḥ ṣaṣṭim ajījanat
GE07mbh_12_u:160.017c: tā vai brahmarṣayaḥ sarvāḥ prajārthaṃ pratipedire
GE07mbh_12_u:160.018a: tābhyo viśvāni bhūtāni devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.020a: audbhidāḥ svedajāś caiva aṇḍajāś ca jarāyujāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.020c: jajñe tāta tathā sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.021c: śāśvataṃ vedapaṭhitaṃ dharmaṃ ca yuyuje punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.024a: ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca prabhāsāḥ sikatās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.027c: śambaro vipracittiś ca prahrādo namucir baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.028a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ sagaṇā daityadānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.029a: sarve sma tulyajātīyā yathā devās tathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.029c: ity evaṃ hetum āsthāya spardhamānāḥ surarṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.030a: na priyaṃ nāpy anukrośaṃ cakrur bhūteṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:160.030c: trīn upāyān atikramya daṇḍena rurudhuḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.030e: na jagmuḥ saṃvidaṃ taiś ca darpād asurasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.031a: atha vai bhagavān brahmā brahmarṣibhir upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.036c: tatra ghoratamaṃ vṛttam ṛṣīṇāṃ me pariśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.037c: vidāryāgniṃ tathā bhūtam utthitaṃ śrūyate tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.038c: prāṃśu durdarśanaṃ caivāpy atitejas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:160.040a: petur ulkā mahotpātāḥ śākhāś ca mumucur drumāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.040c: aprasannā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pavanaś cāśivo vavau
GE07mbh_12_u:160.040e: muhur muhuś ca bhūtāni prāvyathanta bhayāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.041a: tataḥ sutumulaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutam upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.042a: mayaitac cintitaṃ bhūtam asir nāmaiṣa vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:160.043a: tatas tad rūpam utsṛjya babhau nistriṃśa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.045c: pragṛhyāsim ameyātmā rūpam anyac cakāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:160.047e: śuśubhāte ca vimale dve netre kṛṣṇapiṅgale
GE07mbh_12_u:160.050a: tasya nādaṃ vinadato mahāhāsaṃ ca muñcataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.050c: babhau pratibhayaṃ rūpaṃ tadā rudrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:160.052a: aśmabhiś cāpy avarṣanta pradīptaiś ca tatholmukaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.054c: tam ekam asurāḥ sarve sahasram iti menire
GE07mbh_12_u:160.055a: chindan bhindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pramathann api
GE07mbh_12_u:160.058a: bhūmiṃ ke cit praviviśuḥ parvatān apare tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.062a: sa rudro dānavān hatvā kṛtvā dharmottaraṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:160.062c: raudraṃ rūpaṃ vihāyāśu cakre rūpaṃ śivaṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.063a: tato maharṣayaḥ sarve sarve devagaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.064c: asiṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ dadau satkṛtya viṣṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:160.065a: viṣṇur marīcaye prādān marīcir bhagavāṃś ca tam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.065c: maharṣibhyo dadau khaḍgam ṛṣayo vāsavāya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:160.067a: ūcuś cainaṃ tathaivādyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tvam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.068c: vibhajya daṇḍaṃ rakṣyāḥ syur dharmato na yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.071a: adhisṛjyātha putraṃ svaṃ prajānām adhipaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.071c: manuḥ prajānāṃ rakṣārthaṃ kṣupāya pradadāv asim
GE07mbh_12_u:160.072a: kṣupāj jagrāha cekṣvākur ikṣvākoś ca purūravāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.072c: āyuś ca tasmāl lebhe taṃ nahuṣaś ca tato bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:160.073a: yayātir nahuṣāc cāpi pūrus tasmāc ca labdhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:160.074a: bharataś cāpi dauḥṣantir lebhe bhūmiśayād asim
GE07mbh_12_u:160.074c: tasmāc ca lebhe dharmajño rājann aiḍabiḍas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:160.076a: mucukundān maruttaś ca maruttād api raivataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.076c: raivatād yuvanāśvaś ca yuvanāśvāt tato raghuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.077c: hariṇāśvād asiṃ lebhe śunakaḥ śunakād api
GE07mbh_12_u:160.078a: uśīnaro vai dharmātmā tasmād bhojāḥ sayādavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.078c: yadubhyaś ca śibir lebhe śibeś cāpi pratardanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.079c: ruśadaśvād bharadvājo droṇas tasmāt kṛpas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.079e: tatas tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ paramāsim avāptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:160.080a: kṛttikāś cāsya nakṣatram aser agniś ca daivatam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.080c: rohiṇyo gotram asyātha rudraś ca gurur uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.081a: aser aṣṭau ca nāmāni rahasyāni nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:160.081c: pāṇḍaveya sadā yāni kīrtayaṃl labhate jayam
GE07mbh_12_u:160.082c: śrīgarbho vijayaś caiva dharmapālas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:160.083d-0421_01: etāni caiva nāmāni purāṇe niścitāni vai
GE07mbh_12_u:160.084a: pṛthus tūtpādayām āsa dhanur ādyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:160.084b-0422_01: teneyaṃ pṛthivī dugdhā sasyāni subahūny api
GE07mbh_12_u:160.085a: tad etad ārṣaṃ mādreya pramāṇaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:160.085c: aseś ca pūjā kartavyā sadā yuddhaviśāradaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.086a: ity eṣa prathamaḥ kalpo vyākhyātas te suvistaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:160.087c: labhate puruṣaḥ kīrtiṃ pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:161.001a: ity uktavati bhīṣme tu tūṣṇīṃbhūte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.002a: dharme cārthe ca kāme ca lokavṛttiḥ samāhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:161.002c: teṣāṃ garīyān katamo madhyamaḥ ko laghuś ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.003c: saṃtuṣṭā naiṣṭhikaṃ vākyaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:161.005a: bāhuśrutyaṃ tapas tyāgaḥ śraddhā yajñakriyā kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:161.006a: etad evābhipadyasva mā te bhūc calitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.006c: etan mūlau hi dharmārthāv etad ekapadaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.007c: dharmeṇa devā divigā dharme cārthaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.008a: dharmo rājan guṇaśreṣṭho madhyamo hy artha ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:161.008c: kāmo yavīyān iti ca pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.010a: karmabhūmir iyaṃ rājann iha vārttā praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:161.011a: artha ity eva sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām avyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.011c: na ṛte 'rthena vartete dharmakāmāv iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.012a: vijayī hy arthavān dharmam ārādhayitum uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.012c: kāmaṃ ca carituṃ śakto duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.013c: arthasiddhyā hi nirvṛttāv ubhāv etau bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.015c: muṇḍā nistantavaś cāpi vasanty arthārthinaḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:161.016c: vidvāṃsaś caiva śāntāś ca muktāḥ sarvaparigrahaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.017a: arthārthinaḥ santi ke cid apare svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.017c: kulapratyāgamāś caike svaṃ svaṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.018a: āstikā nāstikāś caiva niyatāḥ saṃyame pare
GE07mbh_12_u:161.019a: bhṛtyān bhogair dviṣo daṇḍair yo yojayati so 'rthavān
GE07mbh_12_u:161.019c: etan matimatāṃ śreṣṭha mataṃ mama yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:161.019e: anayos tu nibodha tvaṃ vacanaṃ vākyakaṇṭhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.020c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vākyaṃ jagadatuḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:161.021a: āsīnaś ca śayānaś ca vicarann api ca sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.021c: arthayogaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kuryād yogair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_12_u:161.022a: asmiṃs tu vai susaṃvṛtte durlabhe paramapriye
GE07mbh_12_u:161.022c: iha kāmān avāpnoti pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.023a: yo 'rtho dharmeṇa saṃyukto dharmo yaś cārthasaṃyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.023c: madhv ivāmṛtasaṃyuktaṃ tasmād etau matāv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:161.024c: tasmād udvijate loko dharmārthād yo bahiṣkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.025c: viśvasteṣu ca bhūteṣu kalpate sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:161.026c: tataḥ kāmaṃ caret paścāt siddhārthasya hi tat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.027a: virematus tu tad vākyam uktvā tāv aśvinoḥ sutau
GE07mbh_12_u:161.027c: bhīmasenas tadā vākyam idaṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_12_u:161.028a: nākāmaḥ kāmayaty arthaṃ nākāmo dharmam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:161.029a: kāmena yuktā ṛṣayas tapasy eva samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.031a: vaṇijaḥ karṣakā gopāḥ kāravaḥ śilpinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:161.032a: samudraṃ cāviśanty anye narāḥ kāmena saṃyutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.032c: kāmo hi vividhākāraḥ sarvaṃ kāmena saṃtatam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.033a: nāsti nāsīn nābhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ kāmātmakāt param
GE07mbh_12_u:161.033c: etat sāraṃ mahārāja dharmārthāv atra saṃśritau
GE07mbh_12_u:161.034c: śreyas tailaṃ ca piṇyākād dhṛtaṃ śreya udaśvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.035a: śreyaḥ puṣpaphalaṃ kāṣṭhāt kāmo dharmārthayor varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.035c: puṣpato madhv iva rasaḥ kāmāt saṃjāyate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:161.035d-0425_01: kāmo dharmārthayor yoniḥ kāmaś cātha tadātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.036c: ramasva yoṣābhir upetya kāmaṃ; kāmo hi rājaṃs tarasābhipātī
GE07mbh_12_u:161.037a: buddhir mamaiṣā pariṣat sthitasya; mā bhūd vicāras tava dharmaputra
GE07mbh_12_u:161.037c: syāt saṃhitaṃ sadbhir aphalgusāraṃ; sametya vākyaṃ param ānṛśaṃsyam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.038a: dharmārthakāmāḥ samam eva sevyā; yas tv ekasevī sa naro jaghanyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.038b-0426_01: trayos tu nityaṃ tv aviśeṣito hi
GE07mbh_12_u:161.038c: dvayos tu dakṣaṃ pravadanti madhyaṃ; sa uttamo yo niratas trivarge
GE07mbh_12_u:161.039c: tato vacaḥ saṃgrahavigraheṇa; proktvā yavīyān virarāma bhīmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.040a: tato muhūrtād atha dharmarājo; vākyāni teṣām anucintya samyak
GE07mbh_12_u:161.040c: uvāca vācāvitathaṃ smayan vai; bahuśruto dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.041c: vijñātukāmasya mameha vākyam; uktaṃ yad vai naiṣṭhikaṃ tac chrutaṃ me
GE07mbh_12_u:161.041e: iha tv avaśyaṃ gadato mamāpi; vākyaṃ nibodhadhvam ananyabhāvāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.042a: yo vai na pāpe nirato na puṇye; nārthe na dharme manujo na kāme
GE07mbh_12_u:161.043c: bhūyaś ca tais taiḥ pratibodhitāni; mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti na taṃ ca vidmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:161.044a: snehe nabaddhasya na santi tānīty; evaṃ svayaṃbhūr
GE07mbh_12_u:161.044c: budhāś ca nirvāṇaparā vadanti; tasmān na kuryāt priyam apriyaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:161.045a: etat pradhānaṃ na tu kāmakāro; yathā niyukto 'smi tathā carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:161.045c: bhūtāni sarvāṇi vidhir niyuṅkte; vidhir balīyān iti vitta sarve
GE07mbh_12_u:161.046a: na karmaṇāpnoty anavāpyam arthaṃ; yad bhāvi sarvaṃ bhavatīti vitta
GE07mbh_12_u:161.046c: trivargahīno 'pi hi vindate 'rthaṃ; tasmād idaṃ lokahitāya guhyam
GE07mbh_12_u:161.047a: tatas tad agryaṃ vacanaṃ manonugaṃ; samastam ājñāya tato 'tihetumat
GE07mbh_12_u:161.047c: tadā praṇeduś ca jaharṣire ca te; kurupravīrāya ca cakrur añjalīn
GE07mbh_12_u:161.048c: niśamya tāṃ pārthiva pārthabhāṣitāṃ; giraṃ narendrāḥ praśaśaṃsur eva te
GE07mbh_12_u:161.048e: punaś ca papraccha saridvarāsutaṃ; tataḥ paraṃ dharmam ahīnasattvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.001c: praśnaṃ kaṃ cit pravakṣyāmi tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:162.002a: kīdṛśā mānavāḥ saumyāḥ kaiḥ prītiḥ paramā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:162.002c: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca ke kṣamās tān vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:162.003a: na hi tatra dhanaṃ sphītaṃ na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.003c: tiṣṭhanti yatra suhṛdas tiṣṭhantīti matir mama
GE07mbh_12_u:162.004a: durlabho hi suhṛc chrotā durlabhaś ca hitaḥ suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:162.004c: etad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:162.005a: saṃdheyān puruṣān rājann asaṃdheyāṃś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.005c: vadato me nibodha tvaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:162.006a: lubdhaḥ krūras tyaktadharmā nikṛtaḥ śaṭha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:162.010c: mitrair arthakṛtī nityam icchaty arthaparaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.011a: vahataś ca yathāśakti yo na tuṣyati mandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.011c: amitram iva yo bhuṅkte sadā mitraṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:162.012a: asthānakrodhano yaś ca akasmāc ca virajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:162.012c: suhṛdaś caiva kalyāṇān āśu tyajati kilbiṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:162.013a: alpe 'py apakṛte mūḍhas tathājñānāt kṛte 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:162.014a: śatrur mitramukho yaś ca jihmaprekṣī vilobhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.014c: na rajyati ca kalyāṇe yas tyajet tādṛśaṃ naram
GE07mbh_12_u:162.015a: pānapo dveṣaṇaḥ krūro nirghṛṇaḥ paruṣas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.016a: kṛtaghnaś cādhamo loke na saṃdheyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:162.016c: chidrānveṣī na saṃdheyaḥ saṃdheyān api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:162.017c: mitrajñāś ca kṛtajñāś ca sarvajñāḥ śokavarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.019c: doṣair viyuktāḥ prathitais te grāhyāḥ pārthivena ha
GE07mbh_12_u:162.020c: nāsthāne krodhavantaś ca na cākasmād virāgiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.021a: viraktāś ca na ruṣyanti manasāpy arthakovidāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.021e: na virajyanti mitrebhyo vāso raktam ivāvikam
GE07mbh_12_u:162.022a: doṣāṃś ca lobhamohādīn artheṣu yuvatiṣv atha
GE07mbh_12_u:162.024a: īdṛśaiḥ puruṣaśreṣṭhaiḥ saṃdhiṃ yaḥ kurute nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.024c: tasya vistīryate rāṣṭraṃ jyotsnā grahapater iva
GE07mbh_12_u:162.025d-0432_01: mantrihīnas tu yo rājann acirāyur bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:162.025d-0432_02: tasmāt suśīlaṃ vijñāya mantriṇaṃ ca bahuśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:162.026a: ye ca doṣasamāyuktā narāḥ proktā mayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:162.026c: teṣām apy adhamo rājan kṛtaghno mitraghātakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.026e: tyaktavyaḥ sa durācāraḥ sarveṣām iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.027c: mitradrohī kṛtaghnaś ca yaḥ proktas taṃ ca me vada
GE07mbh_12_u:162.028c: udīcyāṃ diśi yad vṛttaṃ mleccheṣu manujādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:162.030c: brahmaṇyaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca dāne ca nirato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:162.031a: tasya kṣayam upāgamya tato bhikṣām ayācata
GE07mbh_12_u:162.031c: pratiśrayaṃ ca vāsārthaṃ bhikṣāṃ caivātha vārṣikīm
GE07mbh_12_u:162.032a: prādāt tasmai sa viprāya vastraṃ ca sadṛśaṃ navam
GE07mbh_12_u:162.032c: nārīṃ cāpi vayopetāṃ bhartrā virahitāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.033a: etat saṃprāpya hṛṣṭātmā dasyoḥ sarvaṃ dvijas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.033c: tasmin gṛhavare rājaṃs tayā reme sa gautamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.034a: kuṭumbārtheṣu dasyoḥ sa sāhāyyaṃ cāpy athākarot
GE07mbh_12_u:162.034e: bāṇavedhye paraṃ yatnam akaroc caiva gautamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.035a: vakrāṅgāṃs tu sa nityaṃ vai sarvato bāṇagocare
GE07mbh_12_u:162.035c: jaghāna gautamo rājan yathā dasyugaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.037a: tathā tu vasatas tasya dasyugrāme sukhaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.037c: agacchan bahavo māsā nighnataḥ pakṣiṇo bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:162.038a: tataḥ kadā cid aparo dvijas taṃ deśam āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:162.041c: gautamaś cāpi saṃprāptas tāv anyonyena saṃgatau
GE07mbh_12_u:162.043c: abhijñāya dvijo vrīḍām agamad vākyam āha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:162.044a: kim idaṃ kuruṣe mauḍhyād vipras tvaṃ hi kulodgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:162.045a: pūrvān smara dvijāgryāṃs tān prakhyātān vedapāragān
GE07mbh_12_u:162.046c: anukrośaṃ ca saṃsmṛtya tyaja vāsam imaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:162.047a: evam uktaḥ sa suhṛdā tadā tena hitaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:162.048a: adhano 'smi dvijaśreṣṭha na ca vedavid apy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:162.048c: vṛttyartham iha saṃprāptaṃ viddhi māṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:162.049a: tvaddarśanāt tu viprarṣe kṛtārthaṃ vedmy ahaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:162.049c: ātmānaṃ saha yāsyāvaḥ śvo vasādyeha śarvarīm
GE07mbh_12_u:162.049d-0435_01: sa tatra nyavasad vipro ghṛṇī kiṃ cid asaṃspṛśan
GE07mbh_12_u:163.001a: tasyāṃ niśāyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ gate tasmin dvijottame
GE07mbh_12_u:163.002a: sāmudrakān sa vaṇijas tato 'paśyat sthitān pathi
GE07mbh_12_u:163.002c: sa tena sārthena saha prayayau sāgaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:163.003a: sa tu sārtho mahārāja kasmiṃś cid girigahvare
GE07mbh_12_u:163.004a: sa kathaṃ cit tatas tasmāt sārthān mukto dvijas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:163.005a: sa sarvataḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ sārthād deśāt tathārthataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:163.005c: ekākī vyadravat tatra vane kiṃpuruṣo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:163.009a: samantato dvijaśreṣṭhā valgu kūjanti tatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:163.009c: manuṣyavadanās tv anye bhāruṇḍā iti viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:163.014a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā gautamaḥ prīto munikāntam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:163.014e: tam āgamya mudā yuktas tasyādhastād upāviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:163.016a: sa tu vipraḥ pariśrāntaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ puṇyena vāyunā
GE07mbh_12_u:163.016c: sukham āsādya suṣvāpa bhāskaraś cāstam abhyagāt
GE07mbh_12_u:163.018a: nāḍījaṅgha iti khyāto dayito brahmaṇaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_12_u:163.021a: tam āgataṃ dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismito gautamo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:163.022a: svāgataṃ bhavate vipra diṣṭyā prāpto 'si me gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:163.022c: astaṃ ca savitā yātaḥ saṃdhyeyaṃ samupasthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:163.023a: mama tvaṃ nilayaṃ prāptaḥ priyātithir aninditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.001a: giraṃ tāṃ madhurāṃ śrutvā gautamo vismitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:164.002a: bhoḥ kaśyapasya putro 'haṃ mātā dākṣāyaṇī ca me
GE07mbh_12_u:164.002c: atithis tvaṃ guṇopetaḥ svāgataṃ te dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:164.003a: tasmai dattvā sa satkāraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:164.004c: ye caranti mahāmīnās tāṃś ca tasyānvakalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:164.005a: vahniṃ cāpi susaṃdīptaṃ mīnāṃś caiva supīvarān
GE07mbh_12_u:164.006a: bhuktavantaṃ ca taṃ vipraṃ prītātmānaṃ mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.008c: gandhāḍhyaṃ śayanaṃ prādāt sa śiśye tatra vai sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:164.011a: taṃ kāśyapo 'bravīt prīto notkaṇṭhāṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:164.012c: pāraṃparyaṃ tathā daivaṃ karma mitram iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:164.013a: prādurbhūto 'smi te mitraṃ suhṛttvaṃ ca mama tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:164.015c: virūpākṣa iti khyātaḥ sakhā mama mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.016a: taṃ gaccha dvijamukhya tvaṃ mama vākyapracoditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.016c: kāmān abhīpsitāṃs tubhyaṃ dātā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.017a: ity uktaḥ prayayau rājan gautamo vigataklamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.018c: tasmin pathi mahārāja sevamāno drutaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:164.020c: prahitaḥ suhṛdā rājan prīyatā vai priyātithiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.021a: tataḥ sa rākṣasendraḥ svān preṣyān āha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:164.023a: te tam ūcur mahārāja preṣyā rakṣaḥpater dvijam
GE07mbh_12_u:164.023c: tvarasva tūrṇam āgaccha rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:164.024c: sa tvāṃ tvarati vai draṣṭuṃ tat kṣipraṃ saṃvidhīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:164.025a: tataḥ sa prādravad vipro vismayād vigataklamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:164.026a: tair eva sahito rājño veśma tūrṇam upādravat
GE07mbh_12_u:165.001a: tataḥ sa vidito rājñaḥ praviśya gṛham uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:165.002b-0438_01: pṛṣṭo rājñā sa nājñāsīd gotramātram athābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:165.002c: na tatra vyājahārānyad gotramātrād ṛte dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.004a: kva te nivāsaḥ kalyāṇa kiṃgotrā brāhmaṇī ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:165.004c: tattvaṃ brūhi na bhīḥ kāryā viśramasva yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:165.005c: śūdrā punarbhūr bhāryā me satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:165.006a: tato rājā vimamṛśe kathaṃ kāryam idaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:165.006c: kathaṃ vā sukṛtaṃ me syād iti buddhyānvacintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:165.007a: ayaṃ vai jananād vipraḥ suhṛt tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.008a: tasya priyaṃ kariṣyāmi sa hi mām āśritaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:165.008c: bhrātā me bāndhavaś cāsau sakhā ca hṛdayaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.009a: kārttikyām adya bhoktāraḥ sahasraṃ me dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.009c: tatrāyam api bhoktā vai deyam asmai ca me dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:165.009d-0439_01: sa cādya divasaḥ puṇyo hy atithiś cāyam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.009d-0439_02: saṃkalpitaṃ caiva dhanaṃ kiṃ vicāryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:165.011a: tān āgatān dvijaśreṣṭhān virūpākṣo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:165.012a: bṛsyas teṣāṃ tu saṃnyastā rākṣasendrasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:165.013a: tāsu te pūjitā rājñā niṣaṇṇā dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.014a: tato jāmbūnadāḥ pātrīr vajrāṅkā vimalāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.015a: tasya nityaṃ tathāṣāḍhyāṃ māghyāṃ ca bahavo dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.017a: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ caiva maṇīn atha ca mauktikam
GE07mbh_12_u:165.019c: yeṣu yeṣu ca bhāṇḍeṣu bhuktaṃ vo dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.021a: tato mahārhais te sarve ratnair abhyarcitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.022a: tatas tān rākṣasendraś ca dvijān āha punar vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.023a: adhyaikadivasaṃ viprā na vo 'stīha bhayaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:165.025c: nyaṣīdac ca pariśrāntaḥ klāntaś ca kṣudhitaś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:165.026a: tatas tam abhyagād rājan rājadharmā khagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.027c: pūjāṃ cāpy akarod dhīmān bhojanaṃ cāpy akalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:165.027d-0442_03: gautamaś cintayām āsa rātrau tasya samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:165.028e: gṛhīto lobhamohād vai dūraṃ ca gamanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:165.029a: na cāsti pathi bhoktavyaṃ prāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:165.029c: kiṃ kṛtvā dhārayeyaṃ vai prāṇān ity abhyacintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:165.030a: tataḥ sa pathi bhoktavyaṃ prekṣamāṇo na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:165.031a: ayaṃ bakapatiḥ pārśve māṃsarāśiḥ sthito mama
GE07mbh_12_u:165.031c: imaṃ hatvā gṛhītvā ca yāsye 'haṃ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.002a: sa cāpi pārśve suṣvāpa viśvasto bakarāṭ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.002c: kṛtaghnas tu sa duṣṭātmā taṃ jighāṃsur ajāgarat
GE07mbh_12_u:166.003c: nihatya ca mudā yuktaḥ so 'nubandhaṃ na dṛṣṭavān
GE07mbh_12_u:166.004a: sa taṃ vipakṣaromāṇaṃ kṛtvāgnāv apacat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.004c: taṃ gṛhītvā suvarṇaṃ ca yayau drutataraṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.004d-0444_01: tato dākṣāyaṇīputraṃ nāgataṃ taṃ tu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:166.005c: na prekṣe rājadharmāṇam adya putra khagottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.006a: sa pūrvasaṃdhyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ vandituṃ yāti sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.006b-0445_01: aparāṃ caiva māṃ draṣṭum āyāti sa vihaṃgarāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.006c: māṃ cādṛṣṭvā kadā cit sa na gacchati gṛhān khagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.007a: ubhe dvirātraṃ saṃdhye vai nābhyagāt sa mamālayam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.007c: tasmān na śudhyate bhāvo mama sa jñāyatāṃ suhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:166.008c: taṃ gatas tatra me śaṅkā hanyāt taṃ sa dvijādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.009a: durācāras tu durbuddhir iṅgitair lakṣito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.010a: gautamaḥ sa gatas tatra tenodvignaṃ mano mama
GE07mbh_12_u:166.010e: jñāyatāṃ sa viśuddhātmā yadi jīvati māciram
GE07mbh_12_u:166.011a: sa evam uktas tvarito rakṣobhiḥ sahito yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:166.012a: sa rudann agamat putro rākṣasendrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.014a: tam ādāyātha rakṣāṃsi drutaṃ meruvrajaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.014c: rājñaś ca darśayām āsuḥ śarīraṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.014e: kṛtaghnaṃ puruṣaṃ taṃ ca gautamaṃ pāpacetasam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.015a: ruroda rājā taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.015c: ārtanādaś ca sumahān abhūt tasya niveśane
GE07mbh_12_u:166.016c: athābravīn nṛpaḥ putraṃ pāpo 'yaṃ vadhyatām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:166.017a: asya māṃsair ime sarve viharantu yatheṣṭataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.017e: hantavyo 'yaṃ mama matir bhavadbhir iti rākṣasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.018c: naicchanta taṃ bhakṣayituṃ pāpakarmāyam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:166.019a: dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa sādhv adya puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.019c: ity ūcus taṃ mahārāja rākṣasendraṃ niśācarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.020a: śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmim ūcū rakṣogaṇādhipam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.020c: na dātum arhasi tvaṃ no bhakṣaṇāyāsya kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.021a: evam astv iti tān āha rākṣasendro niśācarān
GE07mbh_12_u:166.022a: ity ukte tasya te dāsāḥ śūlamudgarapāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.022c: chittvā taṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ pāpaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pradadus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.023a: dasyavaś cāpi naicchanta tam attuṃ pāpakāriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.024a: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.024c: niṣkṛtir vihitā rājan kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025a: mitradrohī nṛśaṃsaś ca kṛtaghnaś ca narādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025c: kravyādaiḥ kṛmibhiś cānyair na bhujyante hi tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_02: ruditvā bahu tat tad vai vilapya ca sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_06: merupṛṣṭhe ca nagaraṃ yātudhānās tato gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_09: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimanā rājā sāmātyaḥ sagaṇo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_10: ārtanādo mahān āsīd gṛhe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_12: rākṣasā ūcuḥ rājā caivābravīt putraṃ pāpo 'yaṃ vadhyatām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_13: asya māṃsaṃ vayaṃ sarve khādiṣyāmaḥ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_14: pāpakṛt pāpakarmā ca pāpātmā pāpam āsthitaḥ virūpākṣa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_17: dāsebhyo dīyatām eṣa mitradhruk puruṣādhamaḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_19: necchanti sma kṛtaghnaṃ taṃ khādituṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_20: śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmiṃ mahārāja tato balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_21: mā nārthaṃ jātanirbandhaṃ kilbiṣaṃ dātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_25: khaṇḍaśo vikṛtaṃ hatvā kravyādbhyo hy adadus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_26: kravyādās tv api rājendra necchanti piśitāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_27: mṛtān api hi kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_29: niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_30: mitradruhaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca narādhamam
GE07mbh_12_u:166.025d-0446_31: kravyādāḥ krimayaś caiva nopabhuñjanti vai sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:167.001a: tataś citāṃ bakapateḥ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:167.001c: ratnair gandhaiś ca bahubhir vastraiś ca samalaṃkṛtām
GE07mbh_12_u:167.003a: tasmin kāle 'tha surabhir devī dākṣāyaṇī śubhā
GE07mbh_12_u:167.003c: upariṣṭāt tatas tasya sā babhūva payasvinī
GE07mbh_12_u:167.004a: tasyā vaktrāc cyutaḥ phenaḥ kṣīramiśras tadānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:167.004c: so 'patad vai tatas tasyāṃ citāyāṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:167.006c: prāha cedaṃ virūpākṣaṃ diṣṭyāyaṃ jīvatīty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:167.007a: śrāvayām āsa cendras taṃ virūpākṣaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:167.007c: yathā śāpaḥ purā datto brahmaṇā rājadharmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:167.008c: tato roṣād idaṃ prāha bakendrāya pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:167.009a: yasmān mūḍho mama sado nāgato 'sau bakādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:167.009c: tasmād vadhaṃ sa duṣṭātmā nacirāt samavāpsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:167.010a: tadāyaṃ tasya vacanān nihato gautamena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:167.011e: sakhāyaṃ me sudayitaṃ gautamaṃ jīvayety uta
GE07mbh_12_u:167.012c: saṃjīvayitvā sakhye vai prādāt taṃ gautamaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:167.015a: yathocitaṃ ca sa bako yayau brahmasadas tadā

GE07mbh_12_u:170.001a: dhanino vādhanā ye ca vartayanti svatantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:170.001c: sukhaduḥkhāgamas teṣāṃ kaḥ kathaṃ vā pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:170.003a: abravīn māṃ purā kaś cid brāhmaṇas tyāgam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:170.004a: utpannam iha loke vai janmaprabhṛti mānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.004c: vividhāny upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:170.005a: tayor ekatare mārge yady enam abhisaṃnayet
GE07mbh_12_u:170.005c: na sukhaṃ prāpya saṃhṛṣyen na duḥkhaṃ prāpya saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:170.006a: na vai carasi yac chreya ātmano vā yad īhase
GE07mbh_12_u:170.006c: akāmātmāpi hi sadā dhuram udyamya caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:170.007c: akiṃcanaḥ sukhaṃ śete samuttiṣṭhati caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:170.008a: ākiṃcanyaṃ sukhaṃ loke pathyaṃ śivam anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.008c: anamitram atho hy etad durlabhaṃ sulabhaṃ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:170.009c: avekṣamāṇas trīṃl lokān na tulyam upalakṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:170.010a: ākiṃcanyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.011a: ākiṃcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ sumahān ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.011c: nityodvigno hi dhanavān mṛtyor āsyagato yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:170.012a: naivāsyāgnir na cādityo na mṛtyur na ca dasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:170.015c: kas tam icchet paridraṣṭuṃ dātum icchati cen mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:170.016a: śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso mohayaty avicakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.016c: sā tasya cittaṃ harati śāradābhram ivānilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:170.017a: athainaṃ rūpamānaś ca dhanamānaś ca vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:170.017e: ity ebhiḥ kāraṇais tasya tribhiś cittaṃ prasicyate
GE07mbh_12_u:170.020a: evam etāni duḥkhāni tāni tānīha mānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:170.022a: nātyaktvā sukham āpnoti nātyaktvā vindate param
GE07mbh_12_u:170.022c: nātyaktvā cābhayaḥ śete tyaktvā sarvaṃ sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:170.023c: śamyākena purā mahyaṃ tasmāt tyāgaḥ paro mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.001c: dhanatṛṣṇābhibhūtaś ca kiṃ kurvan sukham āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:171.002c: nirvedaś cāvivitsā ca yasya syāt sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.003a: etāny eva padāny āhuḥ pañca vṛddhāḥ praśāntaye
GE07mbh_12_u:171.003c: eṣa svargaś ca dharmaś ca sukhaṃ cānuttamaṃ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:171.004c: nirvedān maṅkinā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:171.005a: īhamāno dhanaṃ maṅkir bhagnehaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.008a: hriyamāṇau tu tau damyau tenoṣṭreṇa pramāthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.008c: mriyamāṇau ca saṃprekṣya maṅkis tatrābravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.010c: imaṃ paśyata saṃgatyā mama daivam upaplavam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.012a: maṇī voṣṭrasya lambete priyau vatsatarau mama
GE07mbh_12_u:171.012c: śuddhaṃ hi daivam evedam ato naivāsti pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.013a: yadi vāpy upapadyeta pauruṣaṃ nāma karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:171.014a: tasmān nirveda eveha gantavyaḥ sukham īpsatā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.016a: yaḥ kāmān prāpnuyāt sarvān yaś cainān kevalāṃs tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:171.017c: śarīre jīvite caiva tṛṣṇā mandasya vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.018c: asakṛc cāsi nikṛto na ca nirvidyase tano
GE07mbh_12_u:171.019a: yadi nāhaṃ vināśyas te yady evaṃ ramase mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.019c: mā māṃ yojaya lobhena vṛthā tvaṃ vittakāmuka
GE07mbh_12_u:171.020a: saṃcitaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ tava punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.021a: aho nu mama bāliśyaṃ yo 'haṃ krīḍanakas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:171.021c: kiṃ naiva jātu puruṣaḥ pareṣāṃ preṣyatām iyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:171.022a: na pūrve nāpare jātu kāmānām antam āpnuvan
GE07mbh_12_u:171.023a: nūnaṃ te hṛdayaṃ kāma vajrasāramayaṃ dṛdham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.024a: tyajāmi kāma tvāṃ caiva yac ca kiṃ cit priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:171.024c: tavāhaṃ sukham anvicchann ātmany upalabhe sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.025a: kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpāt kila jāyase
GE07mbh_12_u:171.025c: na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi samūlo na bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:171.026a: īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī
GE07mbh_12_u:171.026c: labdhanāśo yathā mṛtyur labdhaṃ bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.027a: paretya yo na labhate tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07mbh_12_u:171.027c: na ca tuṣyati labdhena bhūya eva ca mārgati
GE07mbh_12_u:171.029a: ya imaṃ māmakaṃ dehaṃ bhūtagrāmaḥ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.029c: sa yātv ito yathākāmaṃ vasatāṃ vā yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.030a: na yuṣmāsv iha me prītiḥ kāmalobhānusāriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:171.030c: tasmād utsṛjya sarvān vaḥ satyam evāśrayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.031a: sarvabhūtāny ahaṃ dehe paśyan manasi cātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.031c: yoge buddhiṃ śrute sattvaṃ mano brahmaṇi dhārayan
GE07mbh_12_u:171.032c: yathā mā tvaṃ punar naivaṃ duḥkheṣu praṇidhāsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:171.033a: tvayā hi me praṇunnasya gatir anyā na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.033c: tṛṣṇāśokaśramāṇāṃ hi tvaṃ kāma prabhavaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.034c: jñātayo hy avamanyante mitrāṇi ca dhanacyutam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.035c: dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhair vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.036a: dhanam asyeti puruṣaṃ purā nighnanti dasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.036c: kliśyanti vividhair daṇḍair nityam udvejayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:171.037a: mandalolupatā duḥkham iti buddhaṃ cirān mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.037c: yad yad ālambase kāma tat tad evānurudhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:171.038c: naiva tvaṃ vettha sulabhaṃ naiva tvaṃ vettha durlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.039a: pātālam iva duṣpūro māṃ duḥkhair yoktum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:171.039c: nāham adya samāveṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ kāma punas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.040c: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāpya nādya kāmān vicintaye
GE07mbh_12_u:171.042c: na tvaṃ mayā punaḥ kāma nasyoteneva raṃsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:171.043c: dveṣyamuktaḥ priyaṃ vakṣyāmy anādṛtya tad apriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.044c: na sakāmaṃ kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ śatrum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.045a: nirvedaṃ nirvṛtiṃ tṛptiṃ śāntiṃ satyaṃ damaṃ kṣamām
GE07mbh_12_u:171.046a: tasmāt kāmaś ca lobhaś ca tṛṣṇā kārpaṇyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:171.046c: tyajantu māṃ pratiṣṭhantaṃ sattvastho hy asmi sāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.047a: prahāya kāmaṃ lobhaṃ ca krodhaṃ pāruṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:171.047c: nādya lobhavaśaṃ prāpto duḥkhaṃ prāpsyāmy anātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:171.048a: yad yat tyajati kāmānāṃ tat sukhasyābhipūryate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.048c: kāmasya vaśago nityaṃ duḥkham eva prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.049a: kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiṃ cit puruṣo rajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.049c: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ duḥkham ahrīr aratir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:171.050a: eṣa brahmapraviṣṭo 'haṃ grīṣme śītam iva hradam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.050c: śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.051a: yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.052a: ātmanā saptamaṃ kāmaṃ hatvā śatrum ivottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:171.052c: prāpyāvadhyaṃ brahmapuraṃ rājeva syām ahaṃ sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:171.053a: etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya maṅkir nirvedam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.053c: sarvān kāmān parityajya prāpya brahma mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.054c: acchinat kāmamūlaṃ sa tena prāpa mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:171.055b-0474_01: asminn arthe purā gītaṃ śṛṇu rājan mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.056a: anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:171.056c: mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:171.058a: bodhyaṃ dāntam ṛṣiṃ rājā nahuṣaḥ paryapṛcchata
GE07mbh_12_u:171.059c: kāṃ buddhiṃ samanudhyāya śāntaś carasi nirvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.060c: lakṣaṇaṃ tasya vakṣye 'haṃ tat svayaṃ pravimṛśyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061c: iṣukāraḥ kumārī ca ṣaḍ ete guravo mama bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061d-0475_02: āśāṃ nirāśāṃ kṛtvā tu sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061d-0475_05: gṛhārambho hi duḥkhāya na sukhāya kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061d-0475_06: sarpaḥ parakṛtaṃ veśma praviśya sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061d-0475_09: iṣukāro naraḥ kaś cid iṣāv āhitamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:171.061d-0475_11: bahūnāṃ kalaho nityaṃ dvayoḥ saṃgharṣaṇaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:172.001a: kena vṛttena vṛttajña vītaśokaś caren mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:172.001c: kiṃ ca kurvan naro loke prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:172.002c: prahrādasya ca saṃvādaṃ muner ājagarasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:172.003a: carantaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kaṃ cit kalyacittam anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:172.004c: suvāg bahumato loke prājñaś carasi bālavat
GE07mbh_12_u:172.005c: nityatṛpta iva brahman na kiṃ cid avamanyase
GE07mbh_12_u:172.007a: nānutiṣṭhasi dharmārthau na kāme cāpi vartase
GE07mbh_12_u:172.008a: kā nu prajñā śrutaṃ vā kiṃ vṛttir vā kā nu te mune
GE07mbh_12_u:172.008c: kṣipram ācakṣva me brahmañ śreyo yad iha manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:172.010c: hrāsaṃ vṛddhiṃ vināśaṃ ca na prahṛṣye na ca vyathe
GE07mbh_12_u:172.011c: svabhāvaniratāḥ sarvāḥ paritapye na kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:172.012c: saṃcayāṃś ca vināśāntān na kva cid vidadhe manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.014c: mahatām api kāyānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ ca mahodadhau
GE07mbh_12_u:172.015c: pārthivānām api vyaktaṃ mṛtyuṃ paśyāmi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.017a: divi saṃcaramāṇāni hrasvāni ca mahānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:172.019a: sumahāntam api grāsaṃ grase labdhaṃ yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:172.019c: śaye punar abhuñjāno divasāni bahūny api
GE07mbh_12_u:172.020a: āsravaty api mām annaṃ punar bahuguṇaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:172.021a: kaṇān kadā cit khādāmi piṇyākam api ca grase
GE07mbh_12_u:172.022a: śaye kadā cit paryaṅke bhūmāv api punaḥ śaye
GE07mbh_12_u:172.022c: prāsāde 'pi ca me śayyā kadā cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:172.023a: dhārayāmi ca cīrāṇi śāṇīṃ kṣaumājināni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:172.023c: mahārhāṇi ca vāsāṃsi dhārayāmy aham ekadā
GE07mbh_12_u:172.024c: pratyācakṣe na cāpy enam anurudhye sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:172.025a: acalam anidhanaṃ śivaṃ viśokaṃ; śucim atulaṃ viduṣāṃ mate niviṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:172.025c: anabhimatam asevitaṃ ca mūḍhair; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.026c: vigatabhayakaṣāyalobhamoho; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.027c: hṛdayasukham asevitaṃ kadaryair; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.028a: idam idam iti tṛṣṇayābhibhūtaṃ; janam anavāptadhanaṃ viṣīdamānam
GE07mbh_12_u:172.028c: nipuṇam anuniśāmya tattvabuddhyā; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.029a: bahuvidham anudṛśya cārthahetoḥ; kṛpaṇam ihāryam anāryam āśrayantam
GE07mbh_12_u:172.029c: upaśamarucir ātmavān praśānto; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.030a: sukham asukham anartham arthalābhaṃ; ratim aratiṃ maraṇaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:172.030c: vidhiniyatam avekṣya tattvato 'haṃ; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.031c: upagataphalabhogino niśāmya; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.032c: apagataphalasaṃcayaḥ prahṛṣṭo; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.033a: abhigatam asukhārtham īhanārthair; upagatabuddhir avekṣya cātmasaṃsthaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.033c: tṛṣitam aniyataṃ mano niyantuṃ; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.034a: na hṛdayam anurudhyate mano vā; priyasukhadurlabhatām anityatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:172.034c: tad ubhayam upalakṣayann ivāhaṃ; vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:172.035a: bahu kathitam idaṃ hi buddhimadbhiḥ; kavibhir abhiprathayadbhir ātmakīrtim
GE07mbh_12_u:172.035c: idam idam iti tatra tatra tat tat; svaparamatair gahanaṃ pratarkayadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.036a: tad aham anuniśāmya viprayātaṃ; pṛthag abhipannam ihābudhair manuṣyaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.037a: ajagaracaritaṃ vrataṃ mahātmā; ya iha naro 'nucared vinītarāgaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:172.037c: apagatabhayamanyulobhamohaḥ; sa khalu sukhī vihared imaṃ vihāram
GE07mbh_12_u:173.001a: bāndhavāḥ karma vittaṃ vā prajñā veha pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:173.001c: narasya kā pratiṣṭhā syād etat pṛṣṭo vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:173.002a: prajñā pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ prajñā lābhaḥ paro mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.002c: prajñā naiḥśreyasī loke prajñā svargo mataḥ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:173.003c: prahrādo namucir maṅkis tasyāḥ kiṃ vidyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:173.005a: vaiśyaḥ kaś cid ṛṣiṃ tāta kāśyapaṃ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_12_u:173.005c: rathena pātayām āsa śrīmān dṛptas tapasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:173.006a: ārtaḥ sa patitaḥ kruddhas tyaktvātmānam athābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:173.009a: manuṣyo brāhmaṇaś cāsi śrotriyaś cāsi kāśyapa
GE07mbh_12_u:173.010a: sarve lābhāḥ sābhimānā iti satyā bata śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.011a: aho siddhārthatā teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ santīha pāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.011c: pāṇimadbhyaḥ spṛhāsmākaṃ yathā tava dhanasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:173.012a: na pāṇilābhād adhiko lābhaḥ kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:173.012d-0477_01: jantūn uccāvacān aṅge daśato na kaṣāma ca
GE07mbh_12_u:173.013a: atha yeṣāṃ punaḥ pāṇī devadattau daśāṅgulī
GE07mbh_12_u:173.013c: uddharanti kṛmīn aṅgād daśamānān kaṣanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:173.014c: celam annaṃ sukhaṃ śayyāṃ nivātaṃ copabhuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:173.015a: adhiṣṭhāya ca gāṃ loke bhuñjate vāhayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:173.015c: upāyair bahubhiś caiva vaśyān ātmani kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:173.016a: ye khalv ajihvāḥ kṛpaṇā alpaprāṇā apāṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.016c: sahante tāni duḥkhāni diṣṭyā tvaṃ na tathā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:173.017a: diṣṭyā tvaṃ na sṛgālo vai na kṛmir na ca mūṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.017c: na sarpo na ca maṇḍūko na cānyaḥ pāpayonijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.018c: kiṃ punar yo 'si sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:173.019a: ime māṃ kṛmayo 'danti teṣām uddharaṇāya me
GE07mbh_12_u:173.019c: nāsti śaktir apāṇitvāt paśyāvasthām imāṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:173.020a: akāryam iti caivemaṃ nātmānaṃ saṃtyajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:173.020c: netaḥ pāpīyasīṃ yoniṃ pateyam aparām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:173.021a: madhye vai pāpayonīnāṃ sārgālī yām ahaṃ gataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:178.002c: prāṇinām anilo dehān yathā ceṣṭayate balī
GE07mbh_12_u:178.003a: śrito mūrdhānam agnis tu śarīraṃ paripālayan
GE07mbh_12_u:178.003c: prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
GE07mbh_12_u:178.004a: sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.004c: mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.005a: evaṃ tv iha sa sarvatra prāṇena paripālyate
GE07mbh_12_u:178.005c: pṛṣṭhataś ca samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.006a: vastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.006c: vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:178.007a: prayatne karmaṇi bale ya ekas triṣu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:178.007c: udāna iti taṃ prāhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.008a: saṃdhiṣv api ca sarveṣu saṃniviṣṭas tathānilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.009a: dhātuṣv agnis tu vitataḥ samānena samīritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.009c: rasān dhātūṃś ca doṣāṃś ca vartayann avatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:178.011a: āsyaṃ hi pāyusaṃyuktam ante syād gudasaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_12_u:178.012c: ūṣmā cāgnir iti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām
GE07mbh_12_u:178.013c: sa ūrdhvam āgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:178.014a: pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:178.015a: prasṛtā hṛdayāt sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:178.016a: eṣa mārgo 'tha yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tat padam
GE07mbh_12_u:178.017c: tasmin sthito nityam agniḥ sthālyām iva samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.001a: yadi prāṇāyate vāyur vāyur eva viceṣṭate
GE07mbh_12_u:179.001c: śvasity ābhāṣate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.002a: yady ūṣmabhāva āgneyo vahninā pacyate yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:179.002c: agnir jarayate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.003c: vāyur eva jahāty enam ūṣmabhāvaś ca naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.004a: yadi vātopamo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā
GE07mbh_12_u:179.005a: śleṣo yadi ca vātena yadi tasmāt praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.006a: kūpe vā salilaṃ dadyāt pradīpaṃ vā hutāśane
GE07mbh_12_u:179.006c: prakṣiptaṃ naśyati kṣipraṃ yathā naśyaty asau tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:179.006d-0492_01: tan naśyaty ubhayaṃ tadvaj jīvo vātānalātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.007a: pañcasādhāraṇe hy asmiñ śarīre jīvitaṃ kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.008a: naśyanty āpo hy anāhārād vāyur ucchvāsanigrahāt
