GE07mbh_12_u:179.008c: naśyate koṣṭhabhedāt kham agnir naśyaty abhojanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:179.009c: pīḍite 'nyatare hy eṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:179.010a: tasmin pañcatvam āpanne jīvaḥ kim anudhāvati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.010c: kiṃ vedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:179.011a: eṣā gauḥ paralokasthaṃ tārayiṣyati mām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:179.011c: yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.012a: gauś ca pratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:179.012c: ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutas teṣāṃ samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:179.014a: chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.014c: bījāny asya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punar eṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:179.015a: bījamātraṃ purā sṛṣṭaṃ yad etat parivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:179.015c: mṛtā mṛtāḥ praṇaśyanti bījād bījaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.001a: na praṇāśo 'sti jīvānāṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:180.001c: yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.002a: na śarīrāśrito jīvas tasmin naṣṭe praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:180.002c: yathā samitsu dagdhāsu na praṇaśyati pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.003a: agner yathā tathā tasya yadi nāśo na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.004a: naśyatīty eva jānāmi śāntam agnim anindhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.004c: gatir yasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na dṛśyate bhṛgur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:180.005-0493_01: jīvasya cendhanāgneś ca sadā nāśo na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.005a: samidhām upayogānte sann evāgnir na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.006a: tathā śarīrasaṃtyāge jīvo hy ākāśavat sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.006c: na gṛhyate susūkṣmatvād yathā jyotir na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.007a: prāṇān dhārayate hy agniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām
GE07mbh_12_u:180.008a: tasmin naṣṭe śarīrāgnau śarīraṃ tad acetanam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.008c: patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvam ayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.009a: jaṅgamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:180.009e: tatra trayāṇām ekatvaṃ dvayaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.010a: yatra khaṃ tatra pavanas tatrāgnir yatra mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.010c: amūrtayas te vijñeyā āpo mūrtās tathā kṣitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.011a: yady agnimārutau bhūmiḥ kham āpaś ca śarīriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:180.011c: jīvaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇas tatrety etad ācakṣva me 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:180.012c: śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ jñātum icchāmi yādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.014c: śārīre mānase duḥkhe kas tāṃ vedayate rujam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.015a: śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃ na śṛṇoti tat
GE07mbh_12_u:180.015c: maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.016a: sarvaṃ paśyati yad dṛśyaṃ manoyuktena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:180.016c: manasi vyākule tad dhi paśyann api na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:180.017a: na paśyati na ca brūte na śṛṇoti na jighrati
GE07mbh_12_u:180.017c: na ca sparśarasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.018a: hṛṣyati krudhyati ca kaḥ śocaty udvijate ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.018c: icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vācam īrayate ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.019a: na pañcasādhāraṇam atra kiṃ cic; charīram eko vahate
GE07mbh_12_u:180.019c: sa vetti gandhāṃś ca rasāñ śrutiṃ ca; sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāś ca ye 'nye
GE07mbh_12_u:180.020c: sa vetti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra; tadviprayogāt tu na vetti dehaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.021a: yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣmabhāvaś ca pāvake
GE07mbh_12_u:180.021c: tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehaṃ tyaktvā sa naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:180.022a: ammayaṃ sarvam evedam āpo mūrtiḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:180.022d-0494_01: ātmā kṣetrajña ity uktaḥ saṃyuktaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.022d-0494_02: tair eva tu vinirmuktaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.023c: tasmin yaḥ saṃśrito dehe hy abbindur iva puṣkare
GE07mbh_12_u:180.024c: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imān
GE07mbh_12_u:180.025a: sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti; sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam
GE07mbh_12_u:180.025c: tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravidaṃ vadanti; prāvartayad yo bhuvanāni sapta
GE07mbh_12_u:180.026a: na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede; mithyaitad āhur mṛta ity abuddhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.026c: jīvas tu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti; daśārdhataivāsya śarīrabhedaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.027a: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhaś carati saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.027c: dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:180.029a: cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:181.001a: asṛjad brāhmaṇān eva pūrvaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.002a: tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tapo brahma ca śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:181.002c: ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ devadānavagandharvadaityāsuramahoragāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.004a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:181.004c: ye cānye bhūtasaṃghānāṃ saṃghās tāṃś cāpi nirmame
GE07mbh_12_u:181.005a: brāhmaṇānāṃ sito varṇaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu lohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.005c: vaiśyānāṃ pītako varṇaḥ śūdrāṇām asitas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:181.007a: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lobhaḥ śokaś cintā kṣudhā śramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.007c: sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhavati kasmād varṇo vibhajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:181.008c: tanuḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmād varṇo vibhajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:181.010a: na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brāhmam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:181.010c: brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmabhir varṇatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:181.011c: tyaktasvadharmā raktāṅgās te dvijāḥ kṣatratāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.012c: svadharmaṃ nānutiṣṭhanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.013c: kṛṣṇāḥ śaucaparibhraṣṭās te dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.014a: ity etaiḥ karmabhir vyastā dvijā varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.014c: dharmo yajñakriyā caiṣāṃ nityaṃ na pratiṣidhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:181.015a: varṇāś catvāra ete hi yeṣāṃ brāhmī sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:181.015c: vihitā brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ lobhāt tv ajñānatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.016a: brāhmaṇā dharmatantrasthās tapas teṣāṃ na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:181.016c: brahma dhārayatāṃ nityaṃ vratāni niyamāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:181.017a: brahma caitat purā sṛṣṭaṃ ye na jānanty atadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.017c: teṣāṃ bahuvidhās tv anyās tatra tatra hi jātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:181.019c: ṛṣibhiḥ svena tapasā sṛjyante cāpare paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.001a: brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:182.001c: vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ca viprarṣe tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:182.002a: jātakarmādibhir yas tu saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.003c: nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:182.004a: satyaṃ dānaṃ damo 'droha ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā ghṛṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:182.004c: tapaś ca dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.005c: dānādānaratir yaś ca sa vai kṣatriya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:182.007c: tyaktavedas tv anācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.008a: śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije caitan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:182.008c: na vai śūdro bhavec chūdro brāhmaṇo na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.009a: sarvopāyais tu lobhasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.009d-0496_01: vāryau sarvātmanā tau hi śreyoghātārtham utthitau
GE07mbh_12_u:182.010a: nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:182.011a: yasya sarve samārambhā nirāśīrbandhanās tv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:182.011c: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:182.012c: avisrambhe na gantavyaṃ visrambhe dhārayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.013c: aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭhed iha cāmutra cābhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:182.015a: indriyair gṛhyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:182.016a: manaḥ prāṇe nigṛhṇīyāt prāṇaṃ brahmaṇi dhārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:182.016c: nirvāṇād eva nirvāṇo na ca kiṃ cid vicintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:182.016e: sukhaṃ vai brāhmaṇo brahma sa vai tenādhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:182.017c: sānukrośaś ca bhūteṣu tad dvijātiṣu lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:183.001a: satyaṃ brahma tapaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ sṛjati ca prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:183.001c: satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svargaṃ satyena gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:183.002a: anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hy adhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:183.003a: svargaḥ prakāśa ity āhur narakaṃ tama eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:183.004a: tatra tv evaṃvidhā vṛttir loke satyānṛtā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:183.004c: dharmādharmau prakāśaś ca tamo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:183.005A: tatra yat satyaṃ sa dharmo yo dharmaḥ sa prakāśo yaḥ prakāśas tat sukham iti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.005B: tatra yad anṛtaṃ so 'dharmo yo 'dharmas tat tamo yat tamas tad duḥkham iti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.006a: śārīrair mānasair duḥkhaiḥ sukhaiś cāpy asukhodayaiḥ atrocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:183.007c: sukhaṃ hy anityaṃ bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:183.008a: rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:183.009A: tat khalu dvividhaṃ sukham ucyate śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:183.009B: iha khalv amuṣmiṃś ca loke sarvārambhapravṛttayaḥ sukhārthā abhidhīyante
GE07mbh_12_u:183.009C: na hy atas trivargaphalaṃ viśiṣṭataram asti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.009D: sa eṣa kāmyo guṇaviśeṣo dharmārthayor ārambhas taddhetur asyotpattiḥ sukhaprayojanā
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010A: yad etad bhavatābhihitaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti tan na gṛhṇīmaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010B: na hy eṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām aprāpya eṣa guṇaviśeṣo na cainam abhilaṣanti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010C: śrūyate ca bhagavāṃs trilokakṛd brahmā prabhur ekākī tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010E: api ca bhagavān viśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmam abhivartamānam anaṅgatvena śamam anayat
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010F: tasmād brūmo na mahātmabhir ayaṃ pratigṛhīto na tv eṣa tāvad viśiṣṭo guṇa iti naitad bhagavataḥ pratyemi
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010G: bhagavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.010H: lokapravādo 'pi ca bhavati dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtāt sukham avāpyate duṣkṛtād duḥkham iti atrocyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:183.011A: anṛtāt khalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tamograstā adharmam evānuvartante na dharmam
GE07mbh_12_u:183.011B: krodhalobhamohamānānṛtādibhir avacchannā na khalv asmiṃl loke na cāmutra sukham āpnuvanti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.011E: caṇḍavātātyuṣṇātiśītakṛtaiś ca pratibhayaiḥ śārīrair duḥkhair upatapyante
GE07mbh_12_u:183.011F: bandhudhanavināśaviprayogakṛtaiś ca mānasaiḥ śokair abhibhūyante jarāmṛtyukṛtaiś cānyair iti
GE07mbh_12_u:183.012A: yas tv etaiḥ śārīrair mānasair duḥkhair na spṛśyate sa sukhaṃ veda
GE07mbh_12_u:183.013a: susukhaḥ pavanaḥ svarge gandhaś ca surabhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:183.013c: kṣutpipāsāśramo nāsti na jarā na ca pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:183.014a: nityam eva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkham ihobhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:183.014c: narake duḥkham evāhuḥ samaṃ tu paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:183.015c: pumān prajāpatis tatra śukraṃ tejomayaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:183.016a: ity etal lokanirmāṇaṃ brahmaṇā vihitaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:183.016c: prajā viparivartante svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir āvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:184.001a: dānasya kiṃ phalaṃ prāhur dharmasya caritasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:184.001c: tapasaś ca sutaptasya svādhyāyasya hutasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:184.002a: hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntir uttamā
GE07mbh_12_u:184.002c: dānena bhoga ity āhus tapasā sarvam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:184.003a: dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārtham ihaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:184.003c: sadbhyo yad dīyate kiṃ cit tat paratropatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:184.004a: asatsu dīyate yat tu tad dānam iha bhujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:184.004c: yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalam āpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:184.005a: kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:184.005c: dharmaḥ katividho vāpi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:184.007c: teṣāṃ sve sve ya ācārās tān me vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:184.008A: pūrvam eva bhagavatā lokahitam anutiṣṭhatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārtham āśramāś catvāro 'bhinirdiṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:184.008B: tatra gurukulavāsam eva tāvat prathamam āśramam udāharanti
GE07mbh_12_u:184.008C: samyag atra śaucasaṃskāravinayaniyamapraṇīto vinītātmā ubhe saṃdhye bhāskarāgnidaivatāny upasthāya vihāya tandrālasye guror abhivādanavedābhyāsaśravaṇapavitrīkṛtāntarātmā triṣavaṇam upaspṛśya brahmacaryāgniparicaraṇaguruśuśrūṣānityo bhaikṣādisarvaniveditāntarātmā guruvacananirdeśānuṣṭhānāpratikūlo guruprasādalabdhasvādhyāyatatparaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:184.009a: guruṃ yas tu samārādhya dvijo vedam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:184.010D: dharmārthakāmāvāptir hy atra trivargasādhanam avekṣyāgarhitena karmaṇā dhanāny ādāya svādhyāyaprakarṣopalabdhena brahmarṣinirmitena vā adrisāragatena vā havyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena vā dhanena gṛhastho gārhasthyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:184.010F: gurukulavāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye cānye saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭhāyinas teṣām apy ata eva bhikṣābalisaṃvibhāgāḥ pravartante
GE07mbh_12_u:184.011A: vānaprasthānāṃ dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalv ete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyadarśanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṅginas tīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti
GE07mbh_12_u:184.012c: sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:184.013A: api cātra yajñakriyābhir devatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vedābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena
GE07mbh_12_u:184.016A: api cātra mālyābharaṇavastrābhyaṅgagandhopabhoganṛttagītavāditraśrutisukhanayanābhirāmasaṃdarśanānāṃ prāptir bhakṣyabhojyapeyalehyacoṣyāṇām abhyavahāryāṇāṃ vividhānām upabhogaḥ svadāravihārasaṃtoṣaḥ kāmasukhāvāptir iti
GE07mbh_12_u:184.017c: sa sukhāny anubhūyeha śiṣṭānāṃ gatim āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:185.001A: vānaprasthāḥ khalu ṛṣidharmam anusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprasravaṇāni suvivikteṣv araṇyeṣu mṛgamahiṣavarāhasṛmaragajākīrṇeṣu tapasyanto 'nusaṃcaranti
GE07mbh_12_u:185.001B: tyaktagrāmyavastrāhāropabhogā vanyauṣadhimūlaphalaparṇaparimitavicitraniyatāhārāḥ bhūmipāṣāṇasikatāśarkarāvālukābhasmaśāyinaḥ kāśakuśacarmavalkalasaṃvṛtāṅgāḥ keśaśmaśrunakharomadhāriṇo niyatakālopasparśanā askannahomabalikālānuṣṭhāyinaḥ samitkuśakusumopahārahomārjanalabdhaviśrāmāḥ śītoṣṇapavananiṣṭaptavibhinnasarvatvaco vividhaniyamayogacaryāvihitadharmānuṣṭhānahṛtamāṃsaśoṇitās tvagasthibhūtā dhṛtiparāḥ sattvayogāc charīrāṇy udvahanti
GE07mbh_12_u:185.002a: yas tv etāṃ niyataś caryāṃ brahmarṣivihitāṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:185.002c: sa dahed agnivad doṣāñ jayel lokāṃś ca durjayān
GE07mbh_12_u:185.003B: vimucyāgnidhanakalatraparibarhasaṅgān ātmanaḥ snehapāśān avadhūya parivrajanti samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanās trivargapravṛtteṣv ārambheṣv asaktabuddhayo 'rimitrodāsīneṣu tulyavṛttayaḥ sthāvarajarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjānāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāṅmanaḥkarmabhir anabhidrohiṇo 'niketāḥ parvatapulinavṛkṣamūladevatāyatanāny anucaranto vāsārtham upeyur nagaraṃ grāmaṃ vā nagare pañcarātrikā grāmaikarātrikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.003C: praviśya ca prāṇadhāraṇamātrārthaṃ dvijātīnāṃ bhavanāny asaṃkīrṇakarmaṇām upatiṣṭheyuḥ pātrapatitāyācitabhaikṣāḥ kāmakrodhadarpamohalobhakārpaṇyadambhaparivādābhimānahiṃsānivṛttā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:185.004a: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā carati yo muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.004c: na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayam utpadyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:185.005a: kṛtvāgnihotraṃ svaśarīrasaṃsthaṃ; śārīram agniṃ svamukhe juhoti
GE07mbh_12_u:185.005c: yo bhaikṣacaryopagatair havirbhiś; citāgnināṃ sa vyatiyāti lokān
GE07mbh_12_u:185.006a: mokṣāśramaṃ yaḥ kurute yathoktaṃ; śuciḥ susaṃkalpitabuddhiyuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.006c: anindhanaṃ jyotir iva praśāntaṃ; sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.007a: asmāl lokāt paro lokaḥ śrūyate nopalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.007c: tam ahaṃ jñātum icchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:185.008c: puṇyaḥ kṣemyaś ca kāmyaś ca sa varo loka ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.010a: sa svargasadṛśo deśas tatra hy uktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.010c: kāle mṛtyuḥ prabhavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:185.011c: na cānyonyavadhas tatra dravyeṣu na ca vismayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.012a: kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣam upalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.013c: śrameṇa mahatā ke cit kurvanti prāṇadhāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:185.014a: iha dharmaparāḥ ke cit ke cin naikṛtikā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.014c: sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ ke cin nirdhanā dhanino 'pare
GE07mbh_12_u:185.015a: iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.015c: lobhaś cārthakṛto nṝṇāṃ yena muhyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.016c: yas tad vedobhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.017c: paropaghāto hiṃsā ca paiśunyam anṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:185.018a: etān āsevate yas tu tapas tasya prahīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.018c: yas tv etān nācared vidvāṃs tapas tasyābhivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:185.019a: karmabhūmir iyaṃ loka iha kṛtvā śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:185.020a: iha prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:185.021c: ihatyās tatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.023c: ihaiva parivartante na te yānty uttarāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:185.025a: ity ukto 'yaṃ mayā dharmaḥ saṃkṣepād brahmanirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.025c: dharmādharmau hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:185.026a: ity ukto bhṛguṇā rājan bharadvājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:185.027a: eṣa te prabhavo rājañ jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:185.027c: nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:186.001c: śrotum icchāmi dharmajña sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.003a: purīṣaṃ yadi vā mūtraṃ ye na kurvanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.003c: rājamārge gavāṃ madhye dhānyamadhye ca te śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.003d-0497_01: agnyāgāre tathā tīre ye na kurvanti te śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.004a: śaucam āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:186.004c: dharmam āhur manuṣyāṇām upaspṛśya nadīṃ taret
GE07mbh_12_u:186.005c: sāyaṃ prātar japan saṃdhyāṃ tiṣṭhet pūrvāṃ tathāparām
GE07mbh_12_u:186.006a: pañcārdro bhojanaṃ kuryāt prāṅmukho maunam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.006c: na ninded annabhakṣyāṃś ca svādv asvādu ca bhakṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:186.008c: brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caiva nityaṃ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:186.009a: atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:186.010c: nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsī tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:186.011a: homakāle tathā juhvann ṛtukāle tathā vrajan
GE07mbh_12_u:186.012c: upāsīta janaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ santa upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:186.012d-0498_01: loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī tu yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.013c: na bhakṣayed vṛthāmāṃsaṃ pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:186.015c: gurūn abhyarcya yujyante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:186.016a: nekṣetādityam udyantaṃ na ca nagnāṃ parastriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:186.016c: maithunaṃ samaye dharmyaṃ guhyaṃ caiva samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:186.017a: tīrthānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.018c: sāyaṃ prātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pradiṣṭam abhivādanam
GE07mbh_12_u:186.019c: svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharet
GE07mbh_12_u:186.019d-0499_01: sāyaṃprātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pūjanaṃ ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:186.020a: paṇyānāṃ śobhanaṃ paṇyaṃ kṛṣīṇāṃ bādyate kṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.020c: bahukāraṃ ca sasyānāṃ vāhye vāhyaṃ tathā gavām
GE07mbh_12_u:186.021a: saṃpannaṃ bhojane nityaṃ pānīye tarpaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:186.021c: suśṛtaṃ pāyase brūyād yavāgvāṃ kṛsare tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:186.023a: pratyādityaṃ na meheta na paśyed ātmanaḥ śakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:186.023c: sutastriyā ca śayanaṃ sahabhojyaṃ ca varjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:186.027a: pāpena hi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pāpam evānuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:186.028a: pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ na smaratīha mūḍho; vivartamānasya tad eti kartuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:186.028c: rāhur yathā candram upaiti cāpi; tathābudhaṃ pāpam upaiti karma
GE07mbh_12_u:186.029a: āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle neha bhujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:186.029c: tad budhā na praśaṃsanti maraṇaṃ na pratīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:186.030c: tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu manasā śivam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:186.031a: eka eva cared dharmaṃ nāsti dharme sahāyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:186.031c: kevalaṃ vidhim āsādya sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:186.032a: devā yonir manuṣyāṇāṃ devānām amṛtaṃ divi
GE07mbh_12_u:186.032c: pretyabhāve sukhaṃ dharmāc chaśvat tair upabhujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.001a: adhyātmaṃ nāma yad idaṃ puruṣasyeha cintyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.001c: yad adhyātmaṃ yataś caitat tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:187.001d-0502_01: kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.001d-0502_02: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan me vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:187.002a: adhyātmam iti māṃ pārtha yad etad anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:187.002c: tad vyākhyāsyāmi te tāta śreyaskarataraṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:187.003a: yaj jñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.003c: phalalābhaś ca sadyaḥ syāt sarvabhūtahitaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:187.003d-0504_02: tasmin prakāśate nityaṃ tamaḥ somo yathaiva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:187.004a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.005a: tataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006a: prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006c: tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭvā saṃharate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006d-0505_02: satataṃ pravilīyante guṇās te prabhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006d-0505_03: yad vinā naiva śṛṇute na paśyati na dīpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006d-0505_04: yad adhīnaṃ yatas tasmād adhyātmam iti kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006d-0505_06: na te vācānurūpaṃ syād yayā[thā] rā[ra]savivarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.006d-0505_09: pralaye ca tam abhyeti tasmād utsṛjyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.007c: akarot teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ tat tu jīvo 'nu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.008a: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśayonijam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.008c: vāyos tvaksparśaceṣṭāś ca vāg ity etac catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.009a: rūpaṃ cakṣus tathā paktis trividhaṃ teja ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.009c: rasaḥ kledaś ca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.010a: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca te tu bhūmiguṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.010c: mahābhūtāni pañcaiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.011a: indriyāṇi manaś caiva vijñānāny asya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:187.011c: saptamī buddhir ity āhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ punar aṣṭamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.012d-0506_02: cetanānantaro jīvas tad āvetti ca lakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.012d-0506_03: notsṛjan visṛjaṃś caiva śarīraṃ dṛśyate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.012d-0506_04: tasmiṃś cetopalabdhiḥ syāt tamo vācchādayaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:187.013a: ūrdhvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ yad arvāg ūrdhvaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.013c: etena sarvam evedaṃ viddhy abhivyāptam antaram
GE07mbh_12_u:187.014c: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi bhāvāṃs tadāśrayān
GE07mbh_12_u:187.015a: etāṃ buddhvā naro buddhyā bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:187.015c: samavekṣya śanaiś caiva labhate śamam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.016a: guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:187.016d-0507_01: yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tanmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.018a: yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.018c: jighrati ghrāṇam ity āhū rasaṃ jānāti jihvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.019a: tvacā spṛśati ca sparśān buddhir vikriyate 'sakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:187.019c: yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tan manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.020a: adhiṣṭhānāni buddher hi pṛthag arthāni pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.021c: kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid anuśocati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.022a: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid api vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.022c: evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣv avasthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.023a: seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān nātivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.025a: indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pradarśayati sā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.025c: prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokas tamo mohaś ca te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.026a: ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'smin sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:187.026c: iti buddhigatiḥ sarvā vyākhyātā tava bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:187.027c: sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva prāṇināṃ saṃśritāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.028c: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:187.030a: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:187.030c: vartate sāttviko bhāva ity avekṣeta tat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.031c: pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tann asaṃrabhya cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:187.032a: atha yan mohasaṃyuktam avyaktam iva yad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:187.033c: kathaṃ cid abhivartanta ity ete sāttvikā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.034a: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.035c: kathaṃ cid abhivartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.036c: manaḥ suniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretya ceha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:187.037c: sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:187.038c: anyonyam anyau ca yathā saṃprayogas tathā tayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.039a: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.039c: yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau
GE07mbh_12_u:187.040a: na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ sa guṇān vetti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.040c: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ ca saṃsraṣṭā manyate sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.042a: sṛjate hi guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.043a: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:187.043c: sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjati na guṇān vai kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:187.044a: raśmīṃs teṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅ niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:187.044c: tadā prakāśate 'syātmā ghaṭe dīpo jvalann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:187.045a: tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityam ātmaratir muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.045c: sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ syāt sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:187.046a: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī lipyamāno na lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.048a: svabhāvasiddhyā saṃsiddhān sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:187.048c: ūrṇanābhir yathā sraṣṭā vijñeyās tantuvad guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.050a: evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:187.051c: vimucya sukham āsīta na śocec chinnasaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.052a: malināḥ prāpnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.052c: avagāhya suvidvaṃso viddhi jñānam idaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.053a: mahānadīṃ hi pārajñas tapyate na taran yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.053b-0509_01: na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ phale jñāte taraty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:187.053c: evaṃ ye vidur adhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.054a: etāṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:187.054c: avekṣya ca śanair buddhyā labhate śaṃ paraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.055a: trivargo yasya viditaḥ prāgjyotiḥ sa vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.056a: na cātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyeṣu vibhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057a: etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057b-0510_01: pratigṛhya ca nihnoti hy anyathā ca pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057b-0510_02: na sarpati ca yaṃ prāhuḥ sarvatra pratihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057b-0510_04: dhiṣṇyādhipe prasanne tu sthitim etāṃ nirīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057b-0510_05: atidūrāc ca sūkṣmatvāt prasthānaṃ na prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057b-0510_06: prapadya tac chrutāhvāni cinmayaṃ svīkṛtaṃ vinā
GE07mbh_12_u:187.057c: vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.058a: na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ; yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:187.058c: na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cit; sati hi guṇe pravadanty atulyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:187.059a: yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ; tac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:187.059c: nāpriyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ; tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.060a: loka āturajanān virāviṇas; tat tad eva bahu paśya śocataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:187.060c: tatra paśya kuśalān aśocato; ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ padaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:188.001a: hanta vakṣyāmi te pārtha dhyānayogaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:188.001c: yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:188.002a: yathā svanuṣṭhitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:188.006a: śabdaṃ na vindec chrotreṇa sparśaṃ tvacā na vedayet
GE07mbh_12_u:188.006c: rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vidyāj jihvayā na rasāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:188.007a: ghreyāṇy api ca sarvāṇi jahyād dhyānena yogavit
GE07mbh_12_u:188.008c: samādadhyān mano bhrāntam indriyaiḥ saha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:188.010a: indriyāṇi manaś caiva yadā piṇḍīkaroty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:188.012a: jalabindur yathā lolaḥ parṇasthaḥ sarvataś calaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:188.012c: evam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati dhyānavartmani
GE07mbh_12_u:188.013a: samāhitaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cid dhyānavartmani tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:188.013c: punar vāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat
GE07mbh_12_u:188.015a: vicāraś ca vitarkaś ca vivekaś copajāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:188.016a: manasā kliśyamānas tu samādhānaṃ ca kārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:188.016c: na nirvedaṃ munir gacchet kuryād evātmano hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:188.017c: sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanām
GE07mbh_12_u:188.018a: kiṃ cit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syāc chuṣkacūrṇam abhāvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:188.018c: kramaśas tu śanair gacchet sarvaṃ tat paribhāvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:188.019c: saṃharet kramaśaś caiva sa samyak praśamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:188.020a: svayam eva manaś caiva pañcavargaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:188.021a: na tat puruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:188.021c: sukham eṣyati tat tasya yad evaṃ saṃyatātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:188.022c: gacchanti yogino hy evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tan nirāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:189.001a: cāturāśramyam uktaṃ te rājadharmās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:189.002a: śrutās tvattaḥ kathāś caiva dharmayuktā mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:189.002c: saṃdeho 'sti tu kaś cin me tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:189.003c: kiṃ phalaṃ japatām uktaṃ kva vā tiṣṭhanti jāpakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.004a: japasya ca vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi me 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:189.005a: kiṃ yajñavidhir evaiṣa kim etaj japyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:189.005c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.006c: yamasya yat purā vṛttaṃ kālasya brāhmaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:189.006d-0511_01: sāṃkhyayogau tu yāv uktau munibhir mokṣadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.006d-0512_01: ikṣvākoś caiva mṛtyoś ca vivādo dharmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:189.007a: saṃnyāsa eva vedānte vartate japanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:189.007e: mārgau tāv apy ubhāv etau saṃśritau na ca saṃśritau
GE07mbh_12_u:189.008a: yathā saṃśrūyate rājan kāraṇaṃ cātra vakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:189.009c: dhyānaṃ tapo damaḥ kṣāntir anasūyā mitāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:189.010c: eṣa pravṛttako dharmo nivṛttakam atho śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:189.011b-0514_01: na japo na ca vai dhyānaṃ necchā na dveṣaharṣaṇau
GE07mbh_12_u:189.011b-0514_02: yujyate nṛpaśārdūla susaṃvedyaṃ hi tat kila
GE07mbh_12_u:189.011b-0514_03: japam āvartayan nityaṃ japan vai brahmacārikam
GE07mbh_12_u:189.011b-0514_05: yathā saṃśrūyate jāpo yena vai jāpako bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:189.011b-0514_07: yad anyad ucitaṃ śuddhaṃ vedasmṛty upapāditam
GE07mbh_12_u:189.012c: cīraiḥ parivṛtas tasmin madhye channaḥ kuśais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:189.013a: viṣayebhyo namaskuryād viṣayān na ca bhāvayet
GE07mbh_12_u:189.013c: sāmyam utpādya manaso manasy eva mano dadhat
GE07mbh_12_u:189.014a: tad dhiyā dhyāyati brahma japan vai saṃhitāṃ hitām
GE07mbh_12_u:189.014c: saṃnyasyaty atha vā tāṃ vai samādhau paryavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.015d-0515_03: samādhau sa hi mantre tu saṃhitāṃ vā yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:189.016a: arāgamoho nirdvaṃdvo na śocati na sajjate
GE07mbh_12_u:189.016c: na kartākaraṇīyānāṃ na kāryāṇām iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.017a: na cāhaṃkārayogena manaḥ prasthāpayet kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:189.017c: na cātmagrahaṇe yukto nāvamānī na cākriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:189.018c: dhyāne samādhim utpādya tad api tyajati kramāt
GE07mbh_12_u:189.019a: sa vai tasyām avasthāyāṃ sarvatyāgakṛtaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:189.019c: nirīhas tyajati prāṇān brāhmīṃ saṃśrayate tanum
GE07mbh_12_u:189.019d-0516_02: sarvāṃl lokān samākramya kramāt prāpnoti vai param
GE07mbh_12_u:189.020c: utkrāmati ca mārgastho naiva kva cana jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:190.001a: gatīnām uttamā prāptiḥ kathitā jāpakeṣv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:190.001c: ekaivaiṣā gatis teṣām uta yānty aparām api
GE07mbh_12_u:190.003a: yathoktam etat pūrvaṃ yo nānutiṣṭhati jāpakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:190.004a: avajñānena kurute na tuṣyati na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:190.004c: īdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:190.006a: abhidhyāpūrvakaṃ japyaṃ kurute yaś ca mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:190.006c: yatrābhidhyāṃ sa kurute taṃ vai nirayam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:190.007c: sa eva nirayas tasya nāsau tasmāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:190.008a: rāgeṇa jāpako japyaṃ kurute tatra mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:190.009c: calām eva gatiṃ yāti nirayaṃ vādhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:190.010c: sa mohān nirayaṃ yāti tatra gatvānuśocati
GE07mbh_12_u:190.011c: na saṃpūrṇo na vā yukto nirayaṃ so 'dhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:190.012a: animittaṃ paraṃ yat tad avyaktaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:190.012c: sadbhūto jāpakaḥ kasmāt sa śarīram athāviśet
GE07mbh_12_u:190.013c: praśastaṃ jāpakatvaṃ ca doṣāś caite tadātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.001a: kīdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ varṇayasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:191.001c: kautūhalaṃ hi me jātaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:191.006c: ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.007a: abhayaṃ cānimittaṃ ca na ca kleśabhayāvṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:191.007c: dvābhyāṃ muktaṃ tribhir muktam aṣṭābhis tribhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:191.009a: kālaḥ saṃpacyate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.009c: sa kālasya prabhū rājan svargasyāpi tatheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.009d-0517_01: etad vai brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ jāpakasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.010a: ātmakevalatāṃ prāptas tatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:191.010c: īdṛśaṃ paramaṃ sthānaṃ nirayās te ca tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:191.011a: ete te nirayāḥ proktāḥ sarva eva yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.001c: vivādo vyāhṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.002c: ikṣvākoḥ sūryaputrasya yad vṛttaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.003a: kālasya mṛtyoś ca tathā yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:192.003c: yathā sa teṣāṃ saṃvādo yasmin sthāne 'pi cābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:192.004a: brāhmaṇo jāpakaḥ kaś cid dharmavṛtto mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.006a: so 'ntyaṃ brāhmaṃ tapas tepe saṃhitāṃ saṃyato japan
GE07mbh_12_u:192.006c: tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu niyamena tathā gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.007a: sa devyā darśitaḥ sākṣāt prītāsmīti tadā kila
GE07mbh_12_u:192.007c: japyam āvartayaṃs tūṣṇīṃ na ca tāṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:192.008c: vedamātā tatas tasya taj japyaṃ samapūjayat
GE07mbh_12_u:192.009c: papāta devyā dharmātmā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:192.010a: diṣṭyā devi prasannā tvaṃ darśanaṃ cāgatā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:192.010c: yadi vāpi prasannāsi japye me ramatāṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.011a: kiṃ prārthayasi viprarṣe kiṃ ceṣṭaṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:192.011c: prabrūhi japatāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ tat te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.012a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā devyā vipraḥ provāca dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:192.012c: japyaṃ prati mameccheyaṃ vardhatv iti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.013a: manasaś ca samādhir me vardhetāhar ahaḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:192.013c: tat tatheti tato devī madhuraṃ pratyabhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:192.014c: nirayaṃ naiva yātāsi yatra yātā dvijarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.015c: sādhaye bhavitā caitad yat tvayāham ihārthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.016a: niyato japa caikāgro dharmas tvāṃ samupaiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.016c: kālo mṛtyur yamaś caiva samāyāsyanti te 'ntikam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.016e: bhavitā ca vivādo 'tra tava teṣāṃ ca dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.017a: evam uktvā bhagavatī jagāma bhavanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.017c: brāhmaṇo 'pi japann āste divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.018a: samāpte niyame tasminn atha viprasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.018c: sākṣāt prītas tadā dharmo darśayām āsa taṃ dvijam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.019a: dvijāte paśya māṃ dharmam ahaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.019c: japyasya ca phalaṃ yat te saṃprāptaṃ tac ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:192.020a: jitā lokās tvayā sarve ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.020c: devānāṃ nirayān sādho sarvān utkramya yāsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.021a: prāṇatyāgaṃ kuru mune gaccha lokān yathepsitān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.021c: tyaktvātmanaḥ śarīraṃ ca tato lokān avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.022a: kṛtaṃ lokair hi me dharma gaccha ca tvaṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.022d-0521_01: acalaṃ te manaḥ kṛtvā tyaja dehaṃ mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.022d-0521_02: anena kiṃ te saṃyogaḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.023a: avaśyaṃ bhoḥ śarīraṃ te tyaktavyaṃ munipuṃgava
GE07mbh_12_u:192.023c: svarga ārohyatāṃ vipra kiṃ vā te rocate 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:192.024a: na rocaye svargavāsaṃ vinā dehād ahaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.024c: gaccha dharma na me śraddhā svargaṃ gantuṃ vinātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.025a: alaṃ dehe manaḥ kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:192.025c: gaccha lokān arajaso yatra gatvā na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.026a: rame japan mahābhāga kṛtaṃ lokaiḥ sanātanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.026c: saśarīreṇa gantavyo mayā svargo na vā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.027a: yadi tvaṃ necchasi tyaktuṃ śarīraṃ paśya vai dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:192.027c: eṣa kālas tathā mṛtyur yamaś ca tvām upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.028a: atha vaivasvataḥ kālo mṛtyuś ca tritayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.029c: phalaprāptis tava śreṣṭhā yamo 'haṃ tvām upabruve
GE07mbh_12_u:192.030a: yathāvad asya japyasya phalaṃ prāptas tvam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.030c: kālas te svargam āroḍhuṃ kālo 'haṃ tvām upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.031a: mṛtyuṃ mā viddhi dharmajña rūpiṇaṃ svayam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.031c: kālena coditaṃ vipra tvām ito netum adya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:192.032c: mṛtyave cātha dharmāya kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.033a: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca dattvā sa tebhyas tatra samāgame
GE07mbh_12_u:192.033c: abravīt paramaprītaḥ svaśaktyā kiṃ karomi vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.033d-0523_02: bhavanto lokasāmānyāḥ kimarthaṃ brūta sattamāḥ dharma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.033d-0523_03: vayam apy evam avyagrair dhātur ājñāpuraḥsaraiḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.034a: tasminn evātha kāle tu tīrthayātrām upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.034c: ikṣvākur agamat tatra sametā yatra te vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.035a: sarvān eva tu rājarṣiḥ saṃpūjyābhipraṇamya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.036a: tasmai so 'thāsanaṃ dattvā pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.037a: svāgataṃ te mahārāja brūhi yad yad ihecchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.037c: svaśaktyā kiṃ karomīha tad bhavān prabravītu me rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.038a: rājāhaṃ brāhmaṇaś ca tvaṃ yadi ṣaṭkarmasaṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.038c: dadāmi vasu kiṃ cit te prārthitaṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:192.039a: dvividhā brāhmaṇā rājan dharmaś ca dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.039c: pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca nivṛtto 'smi pratigrahāt
GE07mbh_12_u:192.040a: tebhyaḥ prayaccha dānāni ye pravṛttā narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.040c: ahaṃ na pratigṛhṇāmi kim iṣṭaṃ kiṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_12_u:192.040e: brūhi tvaṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭha tapasā sādhayāmi kim rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.041a: kṣatriyo 'haṃ na jānāmi dehīti vacanaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:192.041c: prayaccha yuddham ity evaṃ vādinaḥ smo dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:192.042a: tuṣyasi tvaṃ svadharmeṇa tathā tuṣṭā vayaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.042c: anyonyasyottaraṃ nāsti yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.043c: yāce tvāṃ dīyatāṃ mahyaṃ japyasyāsya phalaṃ dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:192.044a: yuddhaṃ mama sadā vāṇī yācatīti vikatthase
GE07mbh_12_u:192.044c: na ca yuddhaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ kimarthaṃ yācase punaḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.045c: vāgyuddhaṃ tad idaṃ tīvraṃ mama vipra tvayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:192.046a: saivādyāpi pratijñā me svaśaktyā kiṃ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:192.046c: brūhi dāsyāmi rājendra vibhave sati māciram rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.047a: yat tad varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ japyaṃ vai japatā tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.047c: phalaṃ prāptaṃ tat prayaccha mama ditsur bhavān yadi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.048a: paramaṃ gṛhyatāṃ tasya phalaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.048c: ardhaṃ tvam avicāreṇa phalaṃ tasya samāpnuhi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.049a: atha vā sarvam eveha japyakaṃ māmakaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.049c: rājan prāpnuhi kāmaṃ tvaṃ yadi sarvam ihecchasi rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.050a: kṛtaṃ sarveṇa bhadraṃ te japyaṃ yad yācitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.050c: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi kiṃ ca tasya phalaṃ vada
GE07mbh_12_u:192.051a: phalaprāptiṃ na jānāmi dattaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.051c: ayaṃ dharmaś ca kālaś ca yamo mṛtyuś ca sākṣiṇaḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.052a: ajñātam asya dharmasya phalaṃ me kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.052b-0524_01: phalaṃ bravīṣi dharmasya na cej japyakṛtasya mām
GE07mbh_12_u:192.052c: prāpnotu tat phalaṃ vipro nāham icche sasaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.053c: vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ rājarṣe mamāpi tava caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.053d-0525_01: sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.053d-0525_02: sakṛd eva dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:192.054a: nābhisaṃdhir mayā japye kṛtapūrvaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:192.054c: japyasya rājaśārdūla kathaṃ jñāsyāmy ahaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.055a: dadasveti tvayā coktaṃ dadāmīti tathā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.055c: na vācaṃ dūṣayiṣyāmi satyaṃ rakṣa sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:192.056a: athaivaṃ vadato me 'dya vacanaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.056c: mahān adharmo bhavitā tava rājan mṛṣākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.057a: na yuktaṃ tu mṛṣā vāṇī tvayā vaktum ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:192.057c: tathā mayāpy abhyadhikaṃ mṛṣā vaktuṃ na śakyate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.058a: saṃśrutaṃ ca mayā pūrvaṃ dadānīty avicāritam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.058c: tad gṛhṇīṣvāvicāreṇa yadi satye sthito bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.059a: ihāgamya hi māṃ rājañ jāpyaṃ phalam ayācithāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.059c: tan mannisṛṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīṣva bhava satye sthiro 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.060a: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na ca pūrvān sa tārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:192.061a: na yajñādhyayane dānaṃ niyamās tārayanti hi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.061c: tathā satyaṃ pare loke yathā vai puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:192.062a: tapāṃsi yāni cīrṇāni cariṣyasi ca yat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.062c: samāḥ śataiḥ sahasraiś ca tat satyān na viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.063a: satyam ekākṣaraṃ brahma satyam ekākṣaraṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.063c: satyam ekākṣaro yajñaḥ satyam ekākṣaraṃ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.064a: satyaṃ vedeṣu jāgarti phalaṃ satye paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.064c: satyād dharmo damaś caiva sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.065a: satyaṃ vedās tathāṅgāni satyaṃ yajñas tathā vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.065c: vratacaryās tathā satyam oṃkāraḥ satyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.066a: prāṇināṃ jananaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ saṃtatir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.066c: satyena vāyur abhyeti satyena tapate raviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.067a: satyena cāgnir dahati svargaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.067c: satyaṃ yajñas tapo vedāḥ stobhā mantrāḥ sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:192.068a: tulām āropito dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiveti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.068c: samāṃ kakṣāṃ dhārayato yataḥ satyaṃ tato 'dhikam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.069a: yato dharmas tataḥ satyaṃ sarvaṃ satyena vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.069c: kimartham anṛtaṃ karma kartuṃ rājaṃs tvam icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.070a: satye kuru sthiraṃ bhāvaṃ mā rājann anṛtaṃ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.070c: kasmāt tvam anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ dehīti kuruṣe 'śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.071a: yadi japyaphalaṃ dattaṃ mayā neṣiṣyase nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.072a: saṃśrutya yo na ditseta yācitvā yaś ca necchati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.072c: ubhāv ānṛtikāv etau na mṛṣā kartum arhasi rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.073a: yoddhavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ ca kṣatradharmaḥ kila dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:192.073c: dātāraḥ kṣatriyāḥ proktā gṛhṇīyāṃ bhavataḥ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.074a: na chandayāmi te rājan nāpi te gṛham āvrajam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.074c: ihāgamya tu yācitvā na gṛhṇīṣe punaḥ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.075a: avivādo 'stu yuvayor vittaṃ māṃ dharmam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.075c: dvijo dānaphalair yukto rājā satyaphalena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.076a: svargaṃ māṃ viddhi rājendra rūpiṇaṃ svayam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.076c: avivādo 'stu yuvayor ubhau tulyaphalau yuvām rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.077a: kṛtaṃ svargeṇa me kāryaṃ gaccha svarga yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.077c: vipro yadīcchate dātuṃ pratīcchatu ca me dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.078a: bālye yadi syād ajñānān mayā hastaḥ prasāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.079a: nivṛttaṃ māṃ ciraṃ rājan vipraṃ lobhayase katham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.079c: svena kāryaṃ kariṣyāmi tvatto necche phalaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.080a: yadi vipra nisṛṣṭaṃ te japyasya phalam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.080c: āvayor yat phalaṃ kiṃ cit sahitaṃ nau tad astv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:192.081c: yadi dharmaḥ śruto vipra sahaiva phalam astu nau
GE07mbh_12_u:192.082a: mā vā bhūt sahabhojyaṃ nau madīyaṃ phalam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.082c: pratīccha matkṛtaṃ dharmaṃ yadi te mayy anugrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.084a: na me dhārayasīty eko dhārayāmīti cāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.085a: satyaṃ bravīmy aham idaṃ na me dhārayate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.085c: anṛtaṃ vadasīha tvam ṛṇaṃ te dhārayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:192.086a: tāv ubhau bhṛśasaṃtaptau rājānam idam ūcatuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.086c: parīkṣyatāṃ yathā syāva nāvām iha vigarhitau
GE07mbh_12_u:192.087c: dadataś ca na gṛhṇāti vikṛto me mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.088a: na me dhārayate kiṃ cid virūpo 'yaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.088c: mithyā bravīty ayaṃ hi tvā mithyābhāsaṃ narādhipa rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.089a: virūpa kiṃ dhārayate bhavān asya vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:192.089c: śrutvā tathā kariṣyāmīty evaṃ me dhīyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.092a: tasyāś cāyaṃ mayā rājan phalam abhyetya yācitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.093a: tato me sukṛtaṃ karma kṛtam ātmaviśuddhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:192.093c: gāvau hi kapile krītvā vatsale bahudohane
GE07mbh_12_u:192.094c: yathāvidhi yathāśraddhaṃ tad asyāhaṃ punaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.095a: ihādya vai gṛhītvā tat prayacche dviguṇaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.095c: ekasyāḥ puruṣavyāghra kaḥ śuddhaḥ ko 'tra doṣavān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.096a: evaṃ vivadamānau svas tvām ihābhyāgatau nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:192.096c: kuru dharmam adharmaṃ vā vinaye nau samādhaya
GE07mbh_12_u:192.097a: yadi necchati me dānaṃ yathā dattam anena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:192.097c: bhavān atra sthiro bhūtvā mārge sthāpayatu prabhuḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.098a: dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāsi ṛṇaṃ kasmāt tvam adya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:192.099a: dīyatām ity anenoktaṃ dadānīti tathā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.099c: nāyaṃ me dhārayaty atra gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchati rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.100a: dadato 'sya na gṛhṇāsi viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_12_u:192.100c: daṇḍyo hi tvaṃ mama mato nāsty atra khalu saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.101a: mayāsya dattaṃ rājarṣe gṛhṇīyāṃ tat kathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.101c: kāmam atrāparādho me daṇḍyam ājñāpaya prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:192.102a: dīyamānaṃ yadi mayā neṣiṣyasi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:192.103a: svaṃ mayā yāciteneha dattaṃ katham ihādya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:192.103c: gṛhṇīyāṃ gacchatu bhavān abhyanujñāṃ dadāni te
GE07mbh_12_u:192.104a: śrutam etat tvayā rājann anayoḥ kathitaṃ dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.104c: pratijñātaṃ mayā yat te tad gṛhāṇāvicāritam rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.105a: prastutaṃ sumahat kāryam āvayor gahvaraṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.106c: kathaṃ na lipyeyam ahaṃ doṣeṇa mahatādya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:192.107a: tau covāca sa rājarṣiḥ kṛtakāryau gamiṣyathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.107c: nedānīṃ mām ihāsādya rājadharmo bhaven mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.108a: svadharmaḥ paripālyaś ca rājñām eṣa viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.108c: vipradharmaś ca sugurur mām anātmānam āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:192.109a: gṛhāṇa dhāraye 'haṃ te yācitaṃ te śrutaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.109c: na ced grahīṣyase rājañ śapiṣye tvāṃ na saṃśayaḥ rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.110c: ityarthaṃ me grahītavyaṃ kathaṃ tulyaṃ bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:192.111a: eṣa pāṇir apūrvaṃ bho nikṣepārthaṃ prasāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.111c: yan me dhārayase vipra tad idānīṃ pradīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:192.112a: saṃhitāṃ japatā yāvān mayā kaś cid guṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.112c: tat sarvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva yadi kiṃ cid ihāsti me rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.113a: jalam etan nipatitaṃ mama pāṇau dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:192.113c: samam astu sahaivāstu pratigṛhṇātu vai bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.114a: kāmakrodhau viddhi nau tvam āvābhyāṃ kārito bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.114c: sameti ca yad uktaṃ te samā lokās tavāsya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:192.115a: nāyaṃ dhārayate kiṃ cij jijñāsā tvatkṛte kṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.115c: kālo dharmas tathā mṛtyuḥ kāmakrodhau tathā yuvām
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116b-0527_03: sarve gacchāma yatra svān svāṃl lokāṃś ca tathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116c: gaccha lokāñ jitān svena karmaṇā yatra vāñchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116d-0528_01: tato dharmayamādyās te vākyam ūcur nṛpadvijau
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116d-0528_02: asmākaṃ yaḥ smṛto mūrdhā brahmalokam iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116d-0528_03: tatrasthau hi bhavantau hi yuvābhyāṃ nirjitā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.116d-0528_04: yuvayoḥ kāma āpannas tat kāmyam aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.117c: gatiḥ sthānaṃ ca lokāś ca jāpakena yathā jitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.118c: atha vāgniṃ samāyāti sūryam āviśate 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.119a: sa taijasena bhāvena yadi tatrāśnute ratim
GE07mbh_12_u:192.120c: sarāgas tatra vasati guṇāṃs teṣāṃ samācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:192.121a: atha tatra virāgī sa gacchati tv atha saṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:192.121c: param avyayam icchan sa tam evāviśate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.122c: brahmabhūtaḥ sa nirdvaṃdvaḥ sukhī śānto nirāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.123c: aduḥkham ajaraṃ śāntaṃ sthānaṃ tat pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.124a: caturbhir lakṣaṇair hīnaṃ tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ saṣoḍaśaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:192.125a: atha vecchati rāgātmā sarvaṃ tad adhitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:192.125c: yac ca prārthayate tac ca manasā pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:192.126a: atha vā vīkṣate lokān sarvān nirayasaṃsthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:192.126c: niḥspṛhaḥ sarvato muktas tatraiva ramate sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:192.127a: evam eṣā mahārāja jāpakasya gatir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:192.127c: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:193.001a: kim uttaraṃ tadā tau sma cakratus tena bhāṣite
GE07mbh_12_u:193.001c: brāhmaṇo vātha vā rājā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:193.002a: atha vā tau gatau tatra yad etat kīrtitaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:193.002c: saṃvādo vā tayoḥ ko 'bhūt kiṃ vā tau tatra cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.003a: tathety evaṃ pratiśrutya dharmaṃ saṃpūjya cābhibho
GE07mbh_12_u:193.003c: yamaṃ kālaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca svargaṃ saṃpūjya cārhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.004a: pūrvaṃ ye cāpare tatra sametā brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.004c: sarvān saṃpūjya śirasā rājānaṃ so 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.005c: bhavatā cābhyanujñāto japeyaṃ bhūya eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:193.006a: varaś ca mama pūrvaṃ hi devyā datto mahābala
GE07mbh_12_u:193.006c: śraddhā te japato nityaṃ bhaviteti viśāṃ pate rājovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.007a: yady evam aphalā siddhiḥ śraddhā ca japituṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:193.007c: gaccha vipra mayā sārdhaṃ jāpakaṃ phalam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_12_u:193.008a: kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ sumahān sarveṣāṃ saṃnidhāv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:193.008c: saha tulyaphalau cāvāṃ gacchāvo yatra nau gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.009c: saha devair upayayau lokapālais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.010a: sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto jyotīṃṣi sumahānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.010c: nadyaḥ śailāḥ samudrāś ca tīrthāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.011c: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva viśvāvasur hahā huhūḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.011d-0529_01: tumburupramukhāś caiva hāhā hūhūs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.012c: nāgāḥ siddhāś ca munayo devadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.014a: atha svargas tathā rūpī brāhmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:193.014c: saṃsiddhas tvaṃ mahābhāga tvaṃ ca siddhas tathā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:193.015a: atha tau sahitau rājann anyonyena vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.016a: prāṇāpānau tathodānaṃ samānaṃ vyānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.016c: evaṃ tān manasi sthāpya dadhatuḥ prāṇayor manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.017c: kuṅkuṇyāṃ caiva manasā śanair dhārayataḥ sma tau
GE07mbh_12_u:193.018c: jitāsanau tathādhāya mūrdhany ātmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.020a: hāhākāras tato dikṣu sarvāsu sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:193.020c: taj jyotiḥ stūyamānaṃ sma brahmāṇaṃ prāviśat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:193.021a: tataḥ svāgatam ity āha tat tejaḥ sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.022a: bhūyaś caivāparaṃ prāha vacanaṃ madhuraṃ sma saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.024a: uṣyatāṃ mayi cety uktvācetayat sa tataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.026c: jāpakārtham ayaṃ yatnas tadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.027a: kṛtapūjāv imau tulyaṃ tvayā tulyaphalāv imau
GE07mbh_12_u:193.027c: yogajāpakayor dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ sumahad adya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:193.027e: sarvāṃl lokān atītyaitau gacchetāṃ yatra vāñchitam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:193.028a: mahāsmṛtiṃ paṭhed yas tu tathaivānusmṛtiṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:193.028c: tāv apy etena vidhinā gacchetāṃ matsalokatām
GE07mbh_12_u:193.029a: yaś ca yoge bhaved bhaktaḥ so 'pi nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:193.030a: ity uktvā sa tadā devas tatraivāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_12_u:193.030c: āmantrya taṃ tato devā yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:193.031a: te ca sarve mahātmāno dharmaṃ satkṛtya tatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:193.032a: etat phalaṃ jāpakānāṃ gatiś caiva prakīrtitā
GE07mbh_12_u:193.032c: yathāśrutaṃ mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:194.001a: kiṃ phalaṃ jñānayogasya vedānāṃ niyamasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.001c: bhūtātmā vā kathaṃ jñeyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:194.002c: manoḥ prajāpater vādaṃ maharṣeś ca bṛhaspateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.003c: bṛhaspatiḥ praśnam imaṃ purāṇaṃ; papraccha śiṣyo 'tha guruṃ praṇamya
GE07mbh_12_u:194.004a: yatkāraṇaṃ mantravidhiḥ pravṛtto; jñāne phalaṃ yat pravadanti viprāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.004c: yan mantraśabdair akṛtaprakāśaṃ; tad ucyatāṃ me bhagavan yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.005c: phalaṃ mahadbhir yad upāsyate ca; tat kiṃ kathaṃ vā bhavitā kva vā tat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.006a: mahī mahījāḥ pavano 'ntarikṣaṃ; jalaukasaś caiva jalaṃ divaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.006c: divaukasaś caiva yataḥ prasūtās; tad ucyatāṃ me bhagavan purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.007a: jñānaṃ yataḥ prārthayate naro vai; tatas tadarthā bhavati pravṛttiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.007c: na cāpy ahaṃ veda paraṃ purāṇaṃ; mithyāpravṛttiṃ ca kathaṃ nu kuryām
GE07mbh_12_u:194.008a: ṛk sāmasaṃghāṃś ca yajūṃṣi cāhaṃ; chandāṃsi nakṣatragatiṃ niruktam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.008c: adhītya ca vyākaraṇaṃ sakalpaṃ; śikṣāṃ ca bhūtaprakṛtiṃ na vedmi
GE07mbh_12_u:194.009a: sa me bhavāñ śaṃsatu sarvam etaj; jñāne phalaṃ karmaṇi vā yad asti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.009a-0531_02: sa me bhavāñ śaṃsatu tāvad etat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.009c: yathā ca dehāc cyavate śarīrī; punaḥ śarīraṃ ca yathābhyupaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.010a: yad yat priyaṃ yasya sukhaṃ tad āhus; tad eva duḥkhaṃ pravadanty aniṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.010c: iṣṭaṃ ca me syād itarac ca na syād; etatkṛte karmavidhiḥ pravṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.010e: iṣṭaṃ tv aniṣṭaṃ ca na māṃ bhajetety; etatkṛte jñānavidhiḥ pravṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.011a: kāmātmakāś chandasi karmayogā; ebhir vimuktaḥ param aśnuvīta
GE07mbh_12_u:194.011c: nānāvidhe karmapathe sukhārthī; naraḥ pravṛtto na paraṃ prayāti bṛhaspatir uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.011d-0532_01: iṣṭaṃ tv aniṣṭaṃ ca sukhāsukhe ca manur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.011e: paraṃ hi tat karmapathād apetaṃ; nirāśiṣaṃ brahmaparaṃ hy avaśyam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.012a: prajāḥ sṛṣṭā manasā karmaṇā ca; dvāv apy etau satpathau lokajuṣṭau
GE07mbh_12_u:194.012c: dṛṣṭvā karma śāśvataṃ cāntavac ca; manastyāgaḥ kāraṇaṃ nānyad asti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.013a: svenātmanā cakṣur iva praṇetā; niśātyaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:194.013c: jñānaṃ tu vijñānaguṇena yuktaṃ; karmāśubhaṃ paśyati varjanīyam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.014a: sarpān kuśāgrāṇi tathodapānaṃ; jñātvā manuṣyāḥ parivarjayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.014c: ajñānatas tatra patanti mūḍhā; jñāne phalaṃ paśya yathā viśiṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:194.015a: kṛtsnas tu mantro vidhivat prayukto; yajñā yathoktās tv atha dakṣiṇāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.015c: annapradānaṃ manasaḥ samādhiḥ; pañcātmakaṃ karmaphalaṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.016a: guṇātmakaṃ karma vadanti vedās; tasmān mantrā mantramūlaṃ hi karma
GE07mbh_12_u:194.016c: vidhir vidheyaṃ manasopapattiḥ; phalasya bhoktā tu yathā śarīrī
GE07mbh_12_u:194.017a: śabdāś ca rūpāṇi rasāś ca puṇyāḥ; sparśāś ca gandhāś ca śubhās tathaiva
GE07mbh_12_u:194.017c: naro nasaṃsthānagataḥ prabhuḥ syād; etat phalaṃ sidhyati karmaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:194.018a: yad yac charīreṇa karoti karma; śarīrayuktaḥ samupāśnute tat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.018c: śarīram evāyatanaṃ sukhasya; duḥkhasya cāpy āyatanaṃ śarīram
GE07mbh_12_u:194.019a: vācā tu yat karma karoti kiṃ cid; vācaiva sarvaṃ samupāśnute tat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.019c: manas tu yat karma karoti kiṃ cin; manaḥstha evāyam upāśnute tat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.020a: yathāguṇaṃ karmagaṇaṃ phalārthī; karoty ayaṃ karmaphale niviṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:194.020c: tathā tathāyaṃ guṇasaṃprayuktaḥ; śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhunakti
GE07mbh_12_u:194.021a: matsyo yathā srota ivābhipātī; tathā kṛtaṃ pūrvam upaiti karma
GE07mbh_12_u:194.021c: śubhe tv asau tuṣyati duṣkṛte tu; na tuṣyate vai paramaḥ śarīrī
GE07mbh_12_u:194.022a: yato jagat sarvam idaṃ prasūtaṃ; jñātvātmavanto vyatiyānti yat tat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.022c: yan mantraśabdair akṛtaprakāśaṃ; tad ucyamānaṃ śṛṇu me paraṃ yat
GE07mbh_12_u:194.023a: rasair viyuktaṃ vividhaiś ca gandhair; aśabdam asparśam arūpavac ca
GE07mbh_12_u:194.023c: agrāhyam avyaktam avarṇam ekaṃ; pañcaprakāraṃ sasṛje prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:194.024a: na strī pumān vāpi napuṃsakaṃ ca; na san na cāsat sad asac ca tan na
GE07mbh_12_u:194.024c: paśyanti yad brahmavido manuṣyās; tad akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīti viddhi
GE07mbh_12_u:195.001a: akṣarāt khaṃ tato vāyur vāyor jyotis tato jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.001c: jalāt prasūtā jagatī jagatyāṃ jāyate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:195.002a: ime śarīrair jalam eva gatvā; jalāc ca tejaḥ pavano 'ntarikṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.002c: khād vai nivartanti nabhāvinas te; ye bhāvinas te param āpnuvanti
GE07mbh_12_u:195.003a: noṣṇaṃ na śītaṃ mṛdu nāpi tīkṣṇaṃ; nāmlaṃ kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ na tiktam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.003c: na śabdavan nāpi ca gandhavat tan; na rūpavat tat paramasvabhāvam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.004a: sparśaṃ tanur veda rasaṃ tu jihvā; ghrāṇaṃ ca gandhāñ śravaṇe ca śabdān
GE07mbh_12_u:195.004c: rūpāṇi cakṣur na ca tatparaṃ yad; gṛhṇanty anadhyātmavido manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.005a: nivartayitvā rasanaṃ rasebhyo; ghrāṇaṃ ca gandhāc chravaṇe ca śabdāt
GE07mbh_12_u:195.005c: sparśāt tanuṃ rūpaguṇāt tu cakṣus; tataḥ paraṃ paśyati svaṃ svabhāvam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.006a: yato gṛhītvā hi karoti yac ca; yasmiṃś ca tām ārabhate pravṛttim
GE07mbh_12_u:195.006c: yasmiṃś ca yad yena ca yaś ca kartā; tatkāraṇaṃ taṃ samupāyam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.007a: yac cābhibhūḥ sādhakaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca; yan mantravac chaṃsyate caiva loke
GE07mbh_12_u:195.007c: yaḥ sarvahetuḥ paramārthakārī; tat kāraṇaṃ kāryam ato yad anyat
GE07mbh_12_u:195.008a: yathā ca kaś cit sukṛtair manuṣyaḥ; śubhāśubhaṃ prāpnute 'thāvirodhāt
GE07mbh_12_u:195.008c: evaṃ śarīreṣu śubhāśubheṣu; svakarmajair jñānam idaṃ nibaddham
GE07mbh_12_u:195.009a: yathā pradīpaḥ purataḥ pradīptaḥ; prakāśam anyasya karoti dīpyan
GE07mbh_12_u:195.010a: yathā hi rājño bahavo hy amātyāḥ; pṛthak pramānaṃ pravadanti yuktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.010c: tadvac charīreṣu bhavanti pañca; jñānaikadeśaḥ paramaḥ sa tebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.011a: yathārciṣo 'gneḥ pavanasya vegā; marīcayo 'rkasya nadīṣu cāpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.011c: gacchanti cāyānti ca tanyamānās; tadvac charīrāṇi śarīriṇāṃ tu
GE07mbh_12_u:195.012a: yathā ca kaś cit paraśuṃ gṛhītvā; dhūmaṃ na paśyej jvalanaṃ ca kāṣṭhe
GE07mbh_12_u:195.012c: tadvac charīrodarapāṇipādaṃ; chittvā na paśyanti tato yad anyat
GE07mbh_12_u:195.013a: tāny eva kāṣṭhāni yathā vimathya; dhūmaṃ ca paśyej jvalanaṃ ca yogāt
GE07mbh_12_u:195.013c: tadvat subuddhiḥ samam indriyatvād; budhaḥ paraṃ paśyati svaṃ svabhāvam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.014a: yathātmano 'ṅgaṃ patitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ; svapnāntare paśyati cātmano 'nyat
GE07mbh_12_u:195.014c: śrotrādiyuktaḥ sumanāḥ subuddhir; liṅgāt tathā gacchati liṅgam anyat
GE07mbh_12_u:195.015c: anena liṅgena tu liṅgam anyad; gacchaty adṛṣṭaḥ pratisaṃdhiyogāt
GE07mbh_12_u:195.016a: na cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam ātmano; na cāpi saṃsparśam upaiti kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:195.016c: na cāpi taiḥ sādhayate 'tha kāryaṃ; te taṃ na paśyanti sa paśyate tān
GE07mbh_12_u:195.017a: yathā pradīpe jvalato 'nalasya; saṃtāpajaṃ rūpam upaiti kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:195.017c: na cāntaraṃ rūpaguṇaṃ bibharti; tathaiva tad dṛśyate rūpam asya
GE07mbh_12_u:195.018a: yathā manuṣyaḥ parimucya kāyam; adṛśyam anyad viśate śarīram
GE07mbh_12_u:195.018c: visṛjya bhūteṣu mahatsu dehaṃ; tadāśrayaṃ caiva bibharti rūpam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.019a: khaṃ vāyum agniṃ salilaṃ tathorvīṃ; samantato 'bhyāviśate śarīrī
GE07mbh_12_u:195.019c: nānāśrayāḥ karmasu vartamānāḥ; śrotrādayaḥ pañca guṇāñ śrayante
GE07mbh_12_u:195.020a: śrotraṃ khato ghrāṇam atho pṛthivyās; tejomayaṃ rūpam atho vipākaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:195.020c: jalāśrayaḥ sveda ukto rasaś ca; vāyvātmakaḥ sparśakṛto guṇaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:195.021a: mahatsu bhūteṣu vasanti pañca; pañcendriyārthāś ca tathendriyeṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:195.021c: sarvāṇi caitāni manonugāni; buddhiṃ mano 'nveti manaḥ svabhāvam
GE07mbh_12_u:195.022a: śubhāśubhaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yad asya; tad eva pratyādadate svadehe
GE07mbh_12_u:195.023a: calaṃ yathā dṛṣṭipathaṃ paraiti; sūkṣmaṃ mahad rūpam ivābhipāti
GE07mbh_12_u:195.023c: svarūpam ālocayate ca rūpaṃ; paraṃ tathā buddhipathaṃ paraiti
GE07mbh_12_u:196.001a: yad indriyais tūpakṛtān purastāt; prāptān guṇān saṃsmarate cirāya
GE07mbh_12_u:196.001c: teṣv indriyeṣūpahateṣu paścāt; sa buddhirūpaḥ paramaḥ svabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.002a: yathendriyārthān yugapat samastān; nāvekṣate kṛtsnam atulyakālam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.002c: yathābalaṃ saṃcarate sa vidvāṃs; tasmāt sa ekaḥ paramaḥ śarīrī
GE07mbh_12_u:196.003a: rajas tamaḥ sattvam atho tṛtīyaṃ; gacchaty asau jñānaguṇān virūpān
GE07mbh_12_u:196.003b-0533_01: na tair nibaddhaḥ sa tu badhnāti viśvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.003c: tathendriyāṇy āviśate śarīrī; hutāśanaṃ vāyur ivendhanastham
GE07mbh_12_u:196.004a: na cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam ātmano; na paśyati sparśam indriyendriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.004c: na śrotraliṅgaṃ śravaṇe nidarśanaṃ; tathāgataṃ paśyati tad vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.005a: śrotrādīni na paśyanti svaṃ svam ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:196.005c: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca kṣetrajñas tāni paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.006a: yathā himavataḥ pārśvaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ candramaso yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:196.006c: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ manujair na ca tan nāsti tāvatā
GE07mbh_12_u:196.007a: tadvad bhūteṣu bhūtātmā sūkṣmo jñānātmavān asau
GE07mbh_12_u:196.007c: adṛṣṭapūrvaś cakṣurbhyāṃ na cāsau nāsti tāvatā
GE07mbh_12_u:196.008a: paśyann api yathā lakṣma jagat some na vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.008c: evam asti na vety etan na ca tan na parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.011a: na hi khalv anupāyena kaś cid artho 'bhisidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.012a: mṛgair mṛgāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ pakṣiṇāṃ pakṣibhir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:196.012c: gajānāṃ ca gajair evaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānena gṛhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:196.013a: ahir eva hy aheḥ pādān paśyatīti nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.013c: tadvan mūrtiṣu mūrtiṣṭhaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānena paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.014a: notsahante yathā vettum indriyair indriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:196.014c: tathaiveha parā buddhiḥ paraṃ buddhyā na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:196.015a: yathā candro hy amāvāsyām aliṅgatvān na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:196.015c: na ca nāśo 'sya bhavati tathā viddhi śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.016a: kṣīṇakośo hy amāvāsyāṃ candramā na prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:196.017a: yathā kośāntaraṃ prāpya candramā bhrājate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.017c: tadval liṅgāntaraṃ prāpya śarīrī bhrājate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.018c: sā tu candramaso vyaktir na tu tasya śarīriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.019c: candra eva tv amāvāsyāṃ tathā bhavati mūrtimān
GE07mbh_12_u:196.020a: nābhisarpad vimuñcad vā śaśinaṃ dṛśyate tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:196.020c: visṛjaṃś copasarpaṃś ca tadvat paśya śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:196.023a: yathā candro hy amāvāsyāṃ nakṣatrair yujyate gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.001a: yathā vyaktam idaṃ śete svapne carati cetanam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.002a: yathāmbhasi prasanne tu rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:197.003a: sa eva lulite tasmin yathā rūpaṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:197.006c: nivartate tathā tarṣaḥ pāpam antaṃ gataṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:197.007c: manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:197.008a: jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.009a: prasṛtair indriyair duḥkhī tair eva niyataiḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:197.010a: indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvaṃ buddhiḥ paratarā tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.010c: buddheḥ parataraṃ jñānaṃ jñānāt parataraṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:197.011a: avyaktāt prasṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tato buddhis tato manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.011c: manaḥ śrotrādibhir yuktaṃ śabdādīn sādhu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:197.012a: yas tāṃs tyajati śabdādīn sarvāś ca vyaktayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013a: udyan hi savitā yadvat sṛjate raśmimaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013b-0536_01: dṛśyate maṇḍalaṃ tasya na ca dṛśyeta maṇḍalī
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013b-0536_02: tadvad dehas tu saṃdṛśya ātmādṛśyaḥ paraḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013b-0536_03: grastaṃ hy udgirate nityam udgīthaṃ vetti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013b-0536_04: bālye rathābhyāṃ yogena tattvajñānaṃ tu saṃmatam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.013c: sa evāstam upāgacchaṃs tad evātmani yacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:197.014d-0538_01: raśmimaṇḍalahīnas tu na cāsau nāsti tāvatā
GE07mbh_12_u:197.015a: praṇītaṃ karmaṇā mārgaṃ nīyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.015c: prāpnoty ayaṃ karmaphalaṃ pravṛddhaṃ dharmam ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:197.016c: rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:197.017a: buddhiḥ karmaguṇair hīnā yadā manasi vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:197.017c: tadā saṃpadyate brahma tatraiva pralayaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018c: aghrāṇam avitarkaṃ ca sattvaṃ praviśate param
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_01: avyaktāt prasṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tato buddhis tato manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_02: ātmanaḥ prasṛtā buddhir avyaktaṃ jñānam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_03: tasmād buddhiḥ smṛtā tajjñair manas tasmāt tataḥ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_04: tasmād ākṛtayaḥ pañca manaḥ paramam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_05: tasmāt paratarā buddhir jñānaṃ tasmāt paraṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:197.018d-0539_06: tataḥ sūkṣmas tato hy ātmā tasmāt parataraṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:197.019a: manasy ākṛtayo magnā manas tv atigataṃ matim
GE07mbh_12_u:197.019c: matis tv atigatā jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tv abhigataṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:197.020a: indriyair manasaḥ siddhir na buddhiṃ budhyate manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:197.020c: na buddhir budhyate 'vyaktaṃ sūkṣmas tv etāni paśyati manur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_02: yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas taṃ nānucintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_03: bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_04: cintyamānaṃ hi cābhyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_05: prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_06: etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_08: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_09: na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_11: sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_13: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_14: abhyeti brahma so 'tyantaṃ na te śocanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_15: duḥkham arthā hi yujyante pālane na ca te sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:198.001-0540_16: duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:198.004a: yadā nirguṇam āpnoti dhyānaṃ manasi pūrvajam
GE07mbh_12_u:198.004c: tadā prajñāyate brahma nikaṣyaṃ nikaṣe yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:198.006a: sarvāṇy etāni saṃvārya dvārāṇi manasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:198.006c: manasy ekāgratāṃ kṛtvā tat paraṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:198.010c: yatra nāsti padanyāsaḥ kas taṃ viṣayam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:198.011a: tapasā cānumānena guṇair jātyā śrutena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:198.012a: guṇahīno hi taṃ mārgaṃ bahiḥ samanuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:198.014c: tathā tat paramaṃ brahma vimuktaṃ prakṛteḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:198.015c: nivartante nivṛttau ca sargaṃ naivopayānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:198.016a: puruṣaḥ prakṛtir buddhir viśeṣāś cendriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:198.018c: rāgavān prakṛtiṃ hy eti virakto jñānavān bhavet manur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0001: tad eva satataṃ manye na śakyam anuvarṇitum
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0003: yathā hi sāraṃ jānāti na kathaṃ cana saṃsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0005: vinā kāyaṃ na sā chāyā tāṃ vinā kāyam asty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0006: tadvad eva vinā nāsti prakṛter iha vartanam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0007: idaṃ vinā paraṃ nāsti nedam asti paraṃ vinā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0008: jīvātmanā tv asau chinnas tv eṣa caiva parātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0009: tat tatheti viduḥ ke cid atathyam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0010: ubhayaṃ me mataṃ vidvan muktihetau samāhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0011: vimuktaiś ca mṛgaḥ so 'pi dṛśyate saṃyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0012: sarveṣāṃ na hi dṛśyo hi taḍidvat sphurati hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0013: brāhmaṇasya samādṛśyo vartate so 'pi kiṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0015: śrutir eṣā tato nityā tasmād ekaḥ paro mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0016: na prayojanam uddiśya ceṣṭā tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0017: tādṛśo 'stv iti mantavyas tathā satyaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001-014_0019: tasya bhedaḥ samākhyāto bhedo hy asti tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001a: yadā te pañcabhiḥ pañca vimuktā manasā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:199.001c: atha tad drakṣyase brahma maṇau sūtram ivārpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.002a: tad eva ca yathā sūtraṃ suvarṇe vartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.002c: muktāsv atha pravāleṣu mṛnmaye rājate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.004a: yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.004c: tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:199.007a: phalaṃ karmātmakaṃ vidyāt karma jñeyātmakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.007d-0541_01: tad evam iṣyate brahma saṃkhyānād vinibhidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:199.008a: jñānānāṃ ca phalānāṃ ca jñeyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.008c: kṣayānte tat phalaṃ divyaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyapratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.009a: mahad dhi paramaṃ bhūtaṃ yuktāḥ paśyanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.009c: abudhās taṃ na paśyanti hy ātmasthā guṇabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.010c: adbhyo mahattaraṃ tejas tejasaḥ pavano mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:199.011a: pavanāc ca mahad vyoma tasmāt parataraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.011c: manaso mahatī buddhir buddheḥ kālo mahān smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.012a: kālāt sa bhagavān viṣṇur yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.012c: nādir na madhyaṃ naivāntas tasya devasya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:199.013c: atyeti sarvaduḥkhāni duḥkhaṃ hy antavad ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:199.014a: tad brahma paramaṃ proktaṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.014c: tad gatvā kālaviṣayād vimuktā mokṣam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.015a: guṇais tv etaiḥ prakāśante nirguṇatvāt tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:199.017c: na yatnasādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.018a: ṛcām ādis tathā sāmnāṃ yajuṣām ādir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:199.018c: antaś cādimatāṃ dṛṣṭo na cādir brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.019c: avyayatvāc ca nirdvaṃdvaṃ dvaṃdvābhāvāt tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:199.020a: adṛṣṭato 'nupāyāc ca apy abhisaṃdheś ca karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.020c: na tena martyāḥ paśyanti yena gacchanti tat param
GE07mbh_12_u:199.021a: viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāc chāśvatasya ca darśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:199.021c: manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:199.022a: guṇān yad iha paśyanti tad icchanty apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.023a: guṇair yas tv avarair yuktaḥ kathaṃ vidyād guṇān imān
GE07mbh_12_u:199.023c: anumānād dhi gantavyaṃ guṇair avayavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:199.024a: sūkṣmeṇa manasā vidmo vācā vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.024c: mano hi manasā grāhyaṃ darśanena ca darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.025a: jñānena nirmalīkṛtya buddhiṃ buddhyā tathā manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.026a: buddhiprahīṇo manasāsamṛddhas; tathā nirāśīr guṇatām upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:199.026c: paraṃ tyajantīha vilobhyamānā; hutāśanaṃ vāyur ivendhanastham
GE07mbh_12_u:199.027a: guṇādāne viprayoge ca teṣāṃ; manaḥ sadā buddhiparāvarābhyām
GE07mbh_12_u:199.027c: anenaiva vidhinā saṃpravṛtto; guṇādāne brahmaśarīram eti
GE07mbh_12_u:199.028a: avyaktātmā puruṣo 'vyaktakarmā; so 'vyaktatvaṃ gacchati hy antakāle
GE07mbh_12_u:199.028c: tair evāyaṃ cendriyair vardhamānair; glāyadbhir vā vartate karmarūpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.029a: sarvair ayaṃ cendriyaiḥ saṃprayukto; dehaḥ prāptaḥ pañcabhūtāśrayaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:199.029c: nāsāmarthyād gacchati karmaṇeha; hīnas tena parameṇāvyayena
GE07mbh_12_u:199.030a: pṛthvyā naraḥ paśyati nāntam asyā; hy antaś cāsyā bhavitā ceti viddhi
GE07mbh_12_u:199.030c: paraṃ nayantīha vilobhyamānaṃ; yathā plavaṃ vāyur ivārṇavastham
GE07mbh_12_u:199.031a: divākaro guṇam upalabhya nirguṇo; yathā bhaved vyapagataraśmimaṇḍalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.031c: tathā hy asau munir iha nirviśeṣavān; sa nirguṇaṃ praviśati brahma cāvyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032a: anāgatiṃ sukṛtimatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ; svayaṃbhuvaṃ prabhavanidhānam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032c: sanātanaṃ yad amṛtam avyayaṃ padaṃ; vicārya taṃ śamam amṛtatvam aśnute yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0002: saṃsāracakre lokānāṃ nirvedo nāsti kiṃ nv idam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0007: putraṃ dṛṣṭvāpy uvācārtaṃ mātā bhogavatī tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0008: uttiṣṭha mūḍha kiṃ śeṣe nirapekṣaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0009: nirālambo dhanopāye paitṛkaṃ tava kiṃ dhanam nibandhana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0010: paitṛkaṃ me mahan mātaḥ sarvaduḥkhālayaṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0011: asty etat tadvighātāya yatiṣye tatra mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0012: idaṃ śarīram atyugraṃ pitrā dattam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0013: tam eva pitaraṃ gatvā dhanaṃ tiṣṭhati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0014: kaś cin mahati saṃsāre vartamāno dhanecchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0017: samantāt suparikṣiptaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā vyathate pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0018: sa tad vanaṃ hy anucaran vipradhāvann itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0023: sa papāta dvijas tatra vijane salilāśaye
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0026: sa tathā lambate tatra ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0027: adhas tatraiva jātaś ca jambūvṛkṣaḥ sudustaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0031: teṣāṃ madhūnāṃ bahudhā dhārā pravavṛte tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0032: vilambamānaḥ sa pumān dhārāṃ pibati sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0033: na tasya tṛṣṇā viratā pīyamānasya saṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0034: parīpsati ca tāṃ nityam atṛptaḥ sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0035: evaṃ sa vasate tatra duḥkhiduḥkhī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0036: mayā tu tad dhanaṃ deyaṃ tava dāsyāmi cecchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0037: tasya ca prārthitaḥ so 'tha dattvā muktim avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0038: sā ca tyaktvārthasaṃkalpaṃ jagāma paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0039: evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpajñā nṛpottama yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0040: paraṃ vairāgyam āgamya gacchanti paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0041: evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpaṃ viditaṃ na me
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0042: paitṛkaṃ tu dhanaṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad vidvan mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0043: kāntāram iti kiṃ proktaṃ ko hastī sa tu kūpakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0045: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ viddhi dhanaśabdaṃ kim ucyate bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0046: kathaṃ labdhaṃ dhanaṃ tena tathā ca kim idaṃ tv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0048: sumatiṃ vindate yena bandhanāśaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0049: etad uktaṃ hi kāntāraṃ mahān saṃsāra eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0050: ye te pratiṣṭhitā vyālā vyādhayas te prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0052: tām āhuś ca jarāṃ prājñāḥ pariṣvaktaṃ yayā jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0053: yas tatra kūpe vasate mahāhiḥ kāla eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0054: yo vṛkṣaḥ sa ca mṛtyur hi svakṛtaṃ tasya tat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0055: ye tu kṛṣṇāḥ sitā rājan mūṣikā rātryahāni vai
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0057: sa ca saṃvatsaraḥ proktaḥ pādamāsartavo mukhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0059: evaṃ labdhadhanaṃ rājaṃs tat svarūpaṃ vināśaya
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0060: etaj jñātvā tu sā rājan paraṃ vairāgyam āsthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0061: yathoktavidhinā bhūyaḥ paraṃ padam avāpa saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0062: dhatte dhārayate caiva etasmāt kāraṇād dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0063: tad gaccha cāmṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ hiraṇyam amṛtaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0065: tasya prasādād duḥkhasya nāśaṃ prāpsyasi mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0066: ekaḥ kartā sa kṛṣṇaś ca jñānināṃ paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0067: idam āśritya devendro devā rudrās tathāśvinau
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0068: sve sve pade viviśire bhuktimuktivido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0070: śrūyatām asya sadbhāvaḥ samyag jñānaṃ yathā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0071: bhaved etan nibodha tvaṃ nāradāya purā hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0072: darśayitvātmano rūpaṃ yad avocat svayaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0073: purā deva ṛṣiḥ śrīmān nāradaḥ paramārthavān
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0074: cacāra pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ tīrthāny anucaran prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0075: himavatpādam āśritya vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0078: śobhamānāṃ śriyā rājan krīḍantīm utpalais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0079: sā mahātmānam ālokya nāradety āha bhāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0081: vīkṣamāṇaṃ tam ājñāya sā kanyā cāruhāsinī
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0088: pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā vividhadhvanayas tu tām
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0089: tataḥ sarveṇa viprarṣiḥ kanyāṃ papraccha tāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0091: na jāne tvāṃ mahādevi brūhi satyam anindite
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0092: sāvitrī nāma viprarṣe śṛṇu bhadraṃ tavāstu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0093: kiṃ kariṣyāmi tad brūhi tava yac cetasi sthitam nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0095: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ devi vaktum arhasi śobhane
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0096: yas tu vai prathamotpannaḥ ko 'sau sa puruṣākṛtiḥ 12,199.032d@015_0097
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0099: tṛtīyaḥ sāmavedas tu saṃśayo vyetu te mune
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0101: yat tad dṛṣṭaṃ mahaj jyotir jyotir ity ucyate budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0102: ṛṣe jñeyaṃ mayā cāpīty uktvā cāntaradhīyata
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0104: dhyānayuktaḥ sa tu ciraṃ na bubodha mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0106: tuṣṭāva puruṣavyāghro jijñāsuś ca tad adbhutam
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0120: tataḥ sa bhagavāñ śrīmān meghagambhīrayā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0122: bhadram astu ṛṣe tubhyaṃ varaṃ varaya suvrata
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0123: yat te manasi suvyaktam asti ca pradadāmi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0124: sa cemaṃ jayaśabdena prasīdety āturo muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0127: tat prasīda hṛṣīkeśa śrotum icchāmi tad dhare
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0129: yad dṛṣṭaṃ mama rūpaṃ tu vedānāṃ śirasi tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0131: taṃ māṃ paśyanti satataṃ tān pṛccha yad ihecchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0132: ye yogino mahāprājñā madaṃśā ye vyavasthitāḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0133: teṣāṃ prasādaṃ devarṣe matprasādam avaihi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0134: ity uktvā sa jagāmātha bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0136: etam ārādhya govindaṃ gatā muktiṃ maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0138: mayāpy etac chrutaṃ rājan nāradāt tu nibodha tat
GE07mbh_12_u:199.032d-015_0139: svayam eva samācaṣṭa nārado bhagavān muniḥ samastasaṃsāravighātakāraṇaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.004a: asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.004c: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca govinde kathayaty adbhutaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:200.004d-0542_01: keśavasya mayā rājan na śakyā varṇituṃ guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.005c: puruṣaḥ sarvam ity eva śrūyate bahudhā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.006a: kiṃ tu yāni vidur loke brāhmaṇāḥ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.007a: yāni cāhur manuṣyendra ye purāṇavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.007c: aśeṣeṇa hi govinde kīrtayiṣyāmi tāny aham
GE07mbh_12_u:200.008c: vāyur jyotis tathā cāpaḥ khaṃ gāṃ caivānvakalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:200.009a: sa dṛṣṭvā pṛthivīṃ caiva sarvabhūteśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.009c: apsv eva śayanaṃ cakre mahātmā puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.013a: sa tatra bhagavān devaḥ puṣkare bhāsayan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.014c: tamasaḥ pūrvajo jajñe madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.015a: tam ugram ugrakarmāṇam ugrāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:200.017a: brahmā tu sasṛje putrān mānasān dakṣasaptamān
GE07mbh_12_u:200.018a: marīciḥ kaśyapaṃ tāta putraṃ cāsṛjad agrajam
GE07mbh_12_u:200.019a: aṅguṣṭhād asṛjad brahmā marīcer api pūrvajam
GE07mbh_12_u:200.020a: tasya pūrvam ajāyanta daśa tisraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:200.021c: mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tāta sarvāsām abhavat patiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.022a: utpādya tu mahābhāgas tāsām avarajā daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:200.022c: dadau dharmāya dharmajño dakṣa eva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.023c: viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca marutvantaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:200.024c: somas tāsāṃ mahābhāgaḥ sarvāsām abhavat patiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.025a: itarās tu vyajāyanta gandharvāṃs turagān dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:200.025c: gāś ca kiṃpuruṣān matsyān audbhidāṃś ca vanaspatīn
GE07mbh_12_u:200.026c: teṣāṃ viṣṇur vāmano 'bhūd govindaś cābhavat prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.027a: tasya vikramaṇād eva devānāṃ śrīr vyavardhata
GE07mbh_12_u:200.027c: dānavāś ca parābhūtā daiteyī cāsurī prajā
GE07mbh_12_u:200.028c: ditis tu sarvān asurān mahāsattvān vyajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:200.029a: ahorātraṃ ca kālaṃ ca yathartu madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.031a: tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhuḥ punar eva yudhiṣṭhira
