GE07mbh_12_u:200.031c: brāhmaṇānāṃ śataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mukhād asṛjata prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.033a: sa evaṃ caturo varṇān samutpādya mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.033d-0545_05: yādasām asṛjan nāthaṃ varuṇaṃ ca jaleśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:200.034a: yāvad yāvad abhūc chraddhā dehaṃ dhārayituṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:200.034c: tāvat tāvad ajīvaṃs te nāsīd yamakṛtaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:200.035a: na caiṣāṃ maithuno dharmo babhūva bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:200.036a: tatra tretāyuge kāle saṃkalpāj jāyate prajā
GE07mbh_12_u:200.036c: na hy abhūn maithuno dharmas teṣām api janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:200.037a: dvāpare maithuno dharmaḥ prajānām abhavan nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:200.037c: tathā kaliyuge rājan dvaṃdvam āpedire janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.038a: eṣa bhūtapatis tāta svadhyakṣaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.038c: niradhyakṣāṃs tu kaunteya kīrtayiṣyāmi tān api
GE07mbh_12_u:200.039c: utsāḥ pulindāḥ śabarāś cūcupā maṇḍapaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:200.041a: ete pāpakṛtas tāta caranti pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:200.042a: naite kṛtayuge tāta caranti pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0001: aindraṃ rūpaṃ samāsthāya hy asurebhyaś caran mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0002: sa eva bhagavān devo veditvaṃ ca gatā mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0012: dehavān iha viśvātmā saṃbandhī te janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0016: krīḍā harer idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaram ity eva dhāryatām
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0017: akṣaraṃ tatparaṃ nityaṃ vairūpyaṃ jagato hareḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0018: tad viddhi rūpam atulam amṛtatvaṃ bhavajjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0019: tad eva kṛṣṇo dāśārhaḥ śrīmāñ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0021: dehavān iha yo viṣṇur asau māyāmayo hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0025: ya enaṃ prativartante vedāntāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0026: bhaktihīnā na tair yānti nityam enaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:200.043d-016_0028: tasmād buddhas tvam evainaṃ dhyāhi nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:200.045a: nārado 'py atha kṛṣṇasya paraṃ mene narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:200.046d-0546_01: evaṃvidho 'sau puruṣaḥ ko vainaṃ vetti sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:200.046d-0546_02: etat te kathitaṃ rājan bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:201.001a: ke pūrvam āsan patayaḥ prajānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:201.001c: ke carṣayo mahābhāgā dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.002a: śrūyatāṃ bharataśreṣṭha yan mā tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:201.002c: prajānāṃ patayo ye sma dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.003a: ekaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān ādyo brahmā sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.003c: brahmaṇaḥ sapta putrā vai mahātmānaḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.004c: vasiṣṭhaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sadṛśā vai svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.005a: sapta brahmāṇa ity eṣa purāṇe niścayo gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.005c: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvān eva prajāpatīn
GE07mbh_12_u:201.007a: daśānāṃ tanayas tv eko dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.007c: tasya dve nāmanī loke dakṣaḥ ka iti cocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:201.008a: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tasya dve nāmanī śrute
GE07mbh_12_u:201.008c: ariṣṭanemir ity ekaṃ kaśyapety aparaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.009a: aṅgaś caivaurasaḥ śrīmān rājā bhaumaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:201.009c: sahasraṃ yaś ca divyānāṃ yugānāṃ paryupāsitā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.010a: aryamā caiva bhagavān ye cānye tanayā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:201.011c: ekaikasyāṃ sahasraṃ tu tanayānām abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.012c: putrāṇāṃ na ca te kaṃ cid icchanty anyaṃ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:201.014b-0547_03: sa yogī yogam āpannas tataḥ sāyujyatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.015a: bhago 'ṃśaś cāryamā caiva mitro 'tha varuṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.015c: savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.016a: pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathaivendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:201.017a: nāsatyaś caiva dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv api
GE07mbh_12_u:201.019a: haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaś ca sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.019c: sāvitraś ca jayantaś ca pinākī cāparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.019d-0549_01: dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca āpaś caivānilo 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.019d-0549_02: pratyūṣaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sāvitraś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.020a: eta evaṃvidhā devā manor eva prajāpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.020c: te ca pūrve surāś ceti dvividhāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.021c: ṛbhavo marutaś caiva devānāṃ coditā gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.022c: ādityāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ viśas tu marutas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.023a: aśvinau tu matau śūdrau tapasy ugre samāhitau
GE07mbh_12_u:201.023c: smṛtās tv aṅgiraso devā brāhmaṇā iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.024a: etān vai prātar utthāya devān yas tu prakīrtayet
GE07mbh_12_u:201.025c: auśijaś caiva kakṣīvān nalaś cāṅgirasaḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.026a: ṛṣer medhātitheḥ putraḥ kaṇvo barhiṣadas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:201.027a: unmuco vimucaś caiva svastyātreyaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:201.027c: pramucaś cedhmavāhaś ca bhagavāṃś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.028c: ete brahmarṣayo nityam āśritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:201.029a: ruṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyaḥ parivyādhaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:201.029c: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.030a: atreḥ putraś ca bhagavāṃs tathā sārasvataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.030c: ete nava mahātmānaḥ paścimām āśritā diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:201.031a: ātreyaś ca vasiṣṭhaś ca kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.032c: jamadagniś ca saptaite udīcīṃ diśam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.034a: evam ete mahātmānaḥ sthitāḥ pratyekaśo diśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.035a: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi hy ete tāṃ diśaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:201.035c: mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svastimāṃś ca gṛhān vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:202.001c: śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena kṛṣṇam avyayam īśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:202.002a: yac cāsya tejaḥ sumahad yac ca karma purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.002c: tan me sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:202.003c: kena kāryavisargeṇa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:202.005a: tatas te madhuparkeṇa pūjāṃ cakrur atho mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:202.005c: pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ pratyanandam ṛṣīn aham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.006d-0550_01: dharmo hi bhagavān viṣṇur varāho yajñarūpadhṛk
GE07mbh_12_u:202.006d-0550_02: tanmayaṃ ca jagat sarvam ātmā sarvasya cātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:202.008c: na sahante sma devānāṃ samṛddhiṃ tām anuttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.008d-0551_02: udyogaṃ paramaṃ cakrur devānāṃ nigrahe tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.009a: dānavair ardyamānās tu devā devarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.009c: na śarma lebhire rājan viśamānās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.010f-0552_01: gṛhītvā pṛthivī devī pātāle nyavasat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_02: na śakṣyāmo vayaṃ tatra praveṣṭuṃ jaladurgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_03: tān āha bhagavān brahmā munir eva prasādyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_04: agastyo 'sau mahātejāḥ pātu taj jalam añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_05: tatheti coktvā te devā munim ūcur mudānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_06: trāyasva lokān viprarṣe jalam etat kṣayaṃ naya
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_08: dhyāyañ jalādanivahaṃ sa kṣaṇena papau jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_09: śoṣite tu samudre ca devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.011d-0553_11: iti bhūyaḥ samācakṣva kiṃ kariṣyāmahe vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:202.012a: svayaṃbhūs tān uvācedaṃ nisṛṣṭo 'tra vidhir mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.012c: te vareṇābhisaṃmattā balena ca madena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.014a: eṣa vegena gatvā hi yatra te dānavādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.015a: tato viṣṇur mahātejā vārāhaṃ rūpam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.016a: dṛṣṭvā ca sahitāḥ sarve daityāḥ sattvam amānuṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.017a: sarve ca samabhidrutya varāhaṃ jagṛhuḥ samam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.017c: saṃkruddhāś ca varāhaṃ taṃ vyakarṣanta samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.018c: nāśaknuvaṃś ca kiṃ cit te tasya kartuṃ tadā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:202.019a: tato 'gaman vismayaṃ te dānavendrā bhayāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.019c: saṃśayaṃ gatam ātmānaṃ menire ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.021c: saṃnāditā yena lokāḥ sarvāś caiva diśo daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:202.022c: saṃbhrāntāś ca diśaḥ sarvā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.023c: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva tena nādena mohitam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.024a: tatas te dānavāḥ sarve tena śabdena bhīṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.024d-0554_01: trastāṃś ca devān ālokya brahmā prāha pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.024d-0554_04: evam uktvā tato brahmā namaścakre pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.024d-0554_05: devatā munayaś caiva viṣṇuṃ vai muktihetave
GE07mbh_12_u:202.024d-0554_06: tato harir mahātejā brahmāṇam abhinandya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.026a: nādena tena mahatā sanātana iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.027b-0555_01: tatra gatvā mahātmānam ūcuś caiva jagatpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.027c: nādo 'yaṃ kīdṛśo deva nainaṃ vidma vayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:202.027e: ko 'sau hi kasya vā nādo yena vihvalitaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.027f-0556_01: devāś ca dānavāś caiva mohitās tasya tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.028a: etasminn antare viṣṇur vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.028c: udatiṣṭhan mahādevaḥ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ pitāmaha uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.028d-0557_04: tad ākarṇya mahātejā brahmā madhuram abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:202.032a: na saṃtāpo na bhīḥ kāryā śoko vā surasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.032c: vidhir eṣa prabhāvaś ca kālaḥ saṃkṣayakārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0002: vaktum arhasi tattvena māhātmyaṃ punar eva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0003: na tṛpyāmy aham apy enaṃ paśyañ śṛṇvaṃś ca bhārata bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0004: evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāho tasmād etad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0005: śṛṇu rājan kathām etāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ pāpanāśanīm
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0006: nārado māṃ purā prāha yām ahaṃ te vadāmi tām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0007: devarṣir nāradaḥ pūrvaṃ tattvaṃ vetsyāmi vai hareḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0008: iti saṃcintya manasā dadhyau brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0009: himālaye śubhe divye divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ kila
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0011: tato 'ntarikṣe vāg āsīt taṃ munipravaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0014: ahaṃ dadāmi te jñānaṃ dharmādyaṃ vā vṛṇīṣva mām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0016: kiṃ nu syād iti saṃcintya vākyam āhāparaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0019: na rūpam anyat tava dṛśyate vai
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0021: punas tam āha sa munim ananto 'haṃ bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0022: na māṃ mūḍhā vijānanti jñānino māṃ vidanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0023: taṃ pratyāha muniḥ śrīmān praṇato vinayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0024: bhavantaṃ jñātum icchāmi tava tattvaṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0025: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradaṃ prāha lokapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0026: jñānena māṃ vijānīhi nānyathā śaktir asti te nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0027: kīdṛgvidhaṃ tu taj jñānaṃ yena jānāmi te tanum lokapāla uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0028: ananta tan me brūhi tvaṃ yady anugrahavān aham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0029: vikalpahīnaṃ vipulaṃ tasya cū[?dū]raṃ śivaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0030: jñānaṃ tat tena jānāsi sādhanaṃ prati te mune
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0031: atrāvṛtya sthitaṃ hy etat tac chuddham itaran mṛṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0032: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepān munisattama nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0033: tvam eva tava tat tattvaṃ brūhi lokaguro mama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0034: bhavantaṃ jñātum icchāmi kīdṛgbhūtas tvam avyaya
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0036: prāheśaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na me cāsyaṃ śrutir na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0037: na ghrāṇajihve dṛk caiva tvacā nāsti tathā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0038: kathaṃ vakṣyāmi cātmānam aśarīras tathāpy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0039: taj jñātvā vismayāviṣṭo munir āha praṇamya tam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0040: yena tvaṃ pūrvam ātmānam ananto 'haṃ bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0041: śakto 'ham iti māṃ prītaḥ proktavān asi tat katham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0042: punas tam āha bhagavāṃs tavāpy akṣāṇi santi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0043: tvam enaṃ brūhi cātmānaṃ yadi śaknoṣi nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0044: ātmā yathā tava mune viditas tu bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0045: māṃ ca jānāsi tena tvam ekaṃ sādhanam āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0046: ity uktvā bhagavān devas tato novāca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0047: nārado 'py utsmayan khinnaḥ kva gato 'sāv iti prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0048: sthitvā sa dīrghakālaṃ ca munir vyāmūḍhamānasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0049: āha māṃ bhagavān devas tv ananto 'haṃ bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0050: tenāham iti sarvasya ko vānanto bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0051: keyam urvī hy anantākhyā bṛhatī nūnam eva sā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0052: yasyāṃ jānanti bhūtāni vilīnāni tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0053: enāṃ pṛcchāmi taruṇīṃ saiṣā nūnam uvāca mām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0054: ity evaṃ sa muniḥ śrīmān kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0056: āścaryāsi ca dhanyāsi bṛhatī tvaṃ vasuṃdhare
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0057: tvām atra vettum icchāmi yādṛgbhūtāsi śobhane
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0058: tac chrutvā dharaṇī devī smayamānābravīd idam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0059: nāhaṃ hi bṛhatī vipra na cānantā ca sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0060: kāraṇaṃ mama yo gandho gandhātmānaṃ bravīhi tam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0061: tato munis tad dhi tattvaṃ praṇipatyedam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0062: āścaryo 'si ca dhanyo 'si hy ananto 'si bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0063: bhavantaṃ vettum icchāmi kīdṛgbhūtas tvam avyaya
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0065: kāraṇaṃ me jalaṃ matto bṛhattaratamaṃ hi tat

GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0141: aiśānam āsthitaḥ śrīmān hanti nityaṃ hi pāti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0142: viṣṇuḥ svarūparūpo 'sau kāraṇaṃ sa harir mama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0143: taṃ pṛccha muniśārdūla sa cānanto bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0148: gāhamānair hasadbhiś ca nṛtyadbhiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0151: āścaryo 'si ca dhanyo 'si hy anantaś ca bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0152: vettāsi cāvyayaś cāsi vettum icchāmi yādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0153: tataḥ prahasya bhagavān nāradaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0154: mattaḥ parataraṃ nāsti mattaḥ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0155: matto bṛhattaraṃ nānyad aham eva bṛhattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0156: ākāśe ca sthitaḥ pūrvam uktavān aham eva te
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0157: na māṃ vetti janaḥ kaś cin māyā mama duratyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0158: bhaktyā tv ananyayā yuktā māṃ vijānanti yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0159: priyo 'si mama bhakto 'si mama tattvaṃ vilokaya
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0160: dadāmi tava taj jñānaṃ yena tattvaṃ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0162: dadāmi divyaṃ jñānaṃ ca tena te yānti matpadam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0163: evam uktvā yayau kṛṣṇo nandagopagṛhaṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0164: etat te kathitaṃ rājan viṣṇutattvam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0166: mohayan māṃ tathā tvāṃ ca śṛṇoty eṣa mayeritān
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017A_0167: dharmātmā ca mahābāho bhaktān rakṣati nānyathā yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0003: kim anusmaran kuruśreṣṭha maraṇe paryupasthite bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0004: prāpnuyāt paramāṃ siddhiṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0005: tvadyuktaś ca hitaḥ sūkṣma uktaḥ praśnas tvayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0009: tvām akṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma nirguṇaṃ tamasaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0013: kiṃ japyaṃ kiṃ japen nityaṃ kālyam utthāya mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0014: kathaṃ yuñjan sadā dhyāyed brūhi tattvaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0015: śrutvā ca nāradoktaṃ tu devānām īśvaraḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0016: provāca bhagavān viṣṇur nāradaṃ varadaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0017: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi imāṃ divyām anusmṛtim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0019: oṃkāram agrataḥ kṛtvā māṃ namaskṛtya nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0020: ekāgraḥ prayato bhūtvā imaṃ mantram udīrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0022: ity ukto nāradaḥ prāha prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0025: prapadye prāñjalir viṣṇum akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0033: prabhoḥ prabhum anādyantaṃ prapadye taṃ raviprabham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0038: yaḥ prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0039: carācaragurur viṣṇuḥ sa me devaḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0041: brahmayonir hi viśvātmā sa me viṣṇuḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0042: yaḥ purā pralaye prāpte naṣṭe sthāvarajaṅgame
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0045: ekas tiṣṭhati viśvātmā sa me viṣṇuḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0046: caturbhiś ca caturbhiś ca dvābhyāṃ pañcabhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0047: hūyate ca punar dvābhyāṃ sa me viṣṇuḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0048: parjanyaḥ pṛthivī sasyaṃ kālo dharmaḥ kriyākriye
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0049: guṇākaraḥ sa me babhrur vāsudevaḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0051: yas tejayati tejāṃsi sa me viṣṇuḥ prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0056: ajas tv anāmayaḥ panthā hy amūrtir viśvamūrtidhṛk
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0058: avyaktād vyaktam utpannam avyaktād yaḥ paro 'kṣaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0059: yasmāt parataraṃ nāsti tam asmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0060: na pradhāno na ca mahān puruṣaś cetano hy ajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0061: anayor yaḥ parataras tam asmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0062: cintayanto hi yaṃ nityaṃ brahmeśānādayaḥ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0063: niścayaṃ nādhigacchanti tam asmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0065: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tam asmi śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0066: ekāṃśena jagat sarvam avaṣṭabhya vibhuḥ sthitaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0068: somārkāgnimayaṃ tejo yā ca tāramayī dyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0069: divi saṃjāyate yo 'yaṃ sa mahātmā prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0070: guṇādir nirguṇaś cādyo lakṣmīvāṃś cetano hy ajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0071: sūkṣmaḥ sarvagato yogī sa mahātmā prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0073: āsthitaḥ paramaṃ bhuṅkte sa mahātmā prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0074: kṣetrajñaḥ pañcadhā bhuṅkte prakṛtiṃ pañcabhir mukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0075: mahān guṇāṃś ca yo bhuṅkte sa mahātmā prasīdatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0076: sūryamadhye sthitaḥ somas tasya madhye ca yā sthitā

GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0080: atīndriya namas tubhyaṃ liṅgair vyaktair na mīyase
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0081: ye ca tvāṃ nābhijānanti saṃsāre saṃsaranti te
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0083: mānyabhaktā vijānanti na punar mārakā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0089: tvayi tāni ca teṣu tvaṃ na teṣu tvaṃ na te tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0090: ekatvānyatvanānātvaṃ ye vidur yānti te param
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0091: samo 'si sarvabhūteṣu na te dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0094: tvayā tvayy eva tat protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0095: sraṣṭā bhoktāsi kūṭastho hy atattvas tattvasaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0096: akartā hetur acalaḥ pṛthag ātmany avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0098: ahaṃkāreṇa buddhyā vā na me yogas tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0099: na me dharmo 'sty adharmo vā nārambho janma vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0101: viṣayair indriyair vāpi na me bhūyaḥ samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0102: pṛthivīṃ yātu me ghrāṇaṃ yātu me rasanaṃ jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0103: rūpaṃ hutāśanaṃ yātu sparśo yātu ca mārutam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0104: śrotram ākāśam apy etu mano vaikārikaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0105: indriyāṇy api saṃyāntu svāsu svāsu ca yoniṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0107: vāyur ākāśam apy etu manaś cākāśa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0109: ahaṃkāras tato buddhiṃ buddhir avyaktam acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0111: viyogaḥ sarvakaraṇair guṇair bhūtaiś ca me bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0112: niṣkevalaṃ padaṃ deva kāṅkṣe 'haṃ paramaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0113: ekībhāvas tvayā me 'stu na me janma bhavet punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0116: pūrvadehakṛtā me tu vyādhayaḥ praviśantu mām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0117: ardayantu ca duḥkhāni ṛṇaṃ me pratimuñcatu
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0118: anudhyāto 'si deveśa na me janma bhavet punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0119: tasmād bravīmi karmāṇi ṛṇaṃ me na bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0120: nopatiṣṭhantu māṃ sarve vyādhayaḥ pūrvasaṃcitāḥ śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0121: anṛṇo gantum icchāmi tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0122: ahaṃ bhagavatas tasya mama cāsau sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0123: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0126: ahaṃkāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhim ātmani yojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0127: yatabuddhīndriyaḥ paśyed buddhyā budhyet parāt param
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0128: mamāyam iti tasyāhaṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0130: tato buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā labhate na punarbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0131: maraṇe samanuprāpte yaś caivaṃ mām anusmaret
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0132: api pāpasamācāraḥ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0136: svapan vibudhyaṃś ca paṭhed yatra tatra samabhyaset
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0138: śrāvayec chraddadhānāṃś ca madbhaktāṃś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0140: kurvaṃs tatphalam āpnoti punarāvartanaṃ tu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0141: abhyarcayan pitṝn devān paṭhañ juhvan baliṃ dadat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0142: jvalann agniṃ smared yo māṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0143: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0144: yajñaṃ dānaṃ tapas tasmāt kuryād āśīrvivarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0145: nama ity eva yo brūyān madbhaktaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0147: kiṃ punar ye yajante māṃ sādhakā vidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0148: śraddhāvanto yatātmānas te māṃ yānti madāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0150: mām eva tasmād devarṣe dhyāhi nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0151: avāpsyasi tataḥ siddhiṃ drakṣyasy eva padaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0152: ajñānāya ca yo jñānaṃ dadyād dharmopadeśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0153: kṛtsnāṃ vā pṛthivīṃ dadyāt tena tulyaṃ na tat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0155: evaṃ dattvā naraśreṣṭha śreyo vīryaṃ ca vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0156: aśvamedhasahasrāṇāṃ sahasraṃ yaḥ samācaret bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0157: nāsau padam avāpnoti madbhaktair yad avāpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0158: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ purā tena nāradena surarṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0159: yad uvāca tadā śaṃbhus tad uktaṃ tava suvrata
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0160: tvam apy ekamanā bhūtvā dhyāhi jñeyaṃ guṇātigam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0164: nārāyaṇam ṛṣiṃ devaṃ daśa varṣāṇy ananyabhāk
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0165: idaṃ japan vai prāpnoti tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0166: kiṃ tasya bahubhir mantrair bhaktir yasya janārdane
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017B_0171: sa vītarāgo vicaran mahīm imām yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0002: viṣṇos tattvaṃ yathākhyātaṃ ko vidvān anuvetti tat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0003: etan me sarvam ācakṣva na me tṛptir hi tattvataḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0005: kā[?smā]rito 'haṃ tvayā rājan yad vṛttaṃ ca purā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0008: dhyāyan stuvan namasyaṃś ca yajamānas tam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0010: mātā ca mama sā devī jananī lokapāvanī
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0017: so 'pi devo mahābhāgām abhinandya ca jāhnavīm
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0018: tayā ca pūjitaḥ śrīmān upopāviśad āsane
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0019: tataḥ kathāntare taṃ vai vacanaṃ cedam abravam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0022: jānāsi taṃ yathā vaktuṃ yādṛgbhūto janārdanaḥ garuḍa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0023: mamāpi tasya sadbhāvaṃ vaktum arhasi sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0024: śṛṇu bhīṣma yathānyāyaṃ purā tva[?tvā]m iha sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0027: pakṣīndra vāsudevasya tat tvaṃ vetsi paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0028: tvayā samo na tasyāsti saṃnikṛṣṭapriyo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0029: teṣām ahaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā praṇipatya mahāharim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0030: abravaṃ ca yathāvṛttaṃ mama nārāyaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0031: śṛṇudhvaṃ muniśārdūlā hṛtvā somam ahaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0032: ākāśe patamānas tu vākyaṃ tatra śṛṇomi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0033: sādhu sādhu mahābāho prīto 'smi tava darśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0035: tvām ahaṃ bhaktitattvajño bravai vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0036: ity āha sma dhruvaṃ tatra mām āha bhagavān punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0037: ṛṣir asmi mahāvīrya na māṃ jānāti vā mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0038: asūyati ca māṃ mūḍhas tac chrutvā garvam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0040: ṛṣe pūrvaṃ varaṃ mattas tvaṃ vṛṇīṣva tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0041: vṛṇe tvatto varaṃ paścād ity evaṃ munisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0042: yasmāt tvāṃ bhagavān devaḥ śrīmāñ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0043: adya paśyati pakṣīndra vāhanaṃ bhava me sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0044: vṛṇe 'haṃ varam etad dhi tvatto 'dya patageśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0046: jetukāmo hy ahaṃ viṣṇuṃ māyayā māyinaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0047: tvatto hy ahaṃ vṛṇe tv adya varam ṛṣivarottama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0048: tavopariṣṭāt sthāsyāmi varam etat prayaccha me
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0049: tatheti ca hasan prāha harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0050: dhvajaṃ ca me bhava sadā tvam eva vihageśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0051: upariṣṭāt sthitis te 'stu mama pakṣīndra sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0057: kva cit saṃdṛśyamānas tu caturbāhuḥ kva cid dhariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0058: kva cij jyotirmayo 'cintyaḥ kva cit skandhe samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0061: asyā vimucya jananīṃ mayā saha munīśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0062: acintyo 'yam ahaṃ bhūyo ko 'sau mām abravīt purā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0063: kīdṛgvidhaḥ sa bhagavān iti matvā tam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0066: avaśas tasya bhāvena yatra yatra sa cecchati
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0067: vismayāpannahṛdayo hy ahaṃ kim iti cintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0070: stūyamāno hy aham api tais tair abhyarcitaḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0072: vaikarṇaṃ nāma sadanaṃ hares tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0073: divyaṃ tejomayaṃ śrīmad acintyam amarair api
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0077: śṛṇomi śabdaṃ tatrāhaṃ na paśyāmi śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0078: na ca sthalaṃ na cānyac ca pādayos taṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0079: vepamāno hy ahaṃ tatra viṣṭhito 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0080: tato brahmādayo devā lokāpālās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0094: na kaś cid vadate kaś cin na vyāharati kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0097: tato 'cintyo hariḥ śrīmān ālokya ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0098: kṛtvā ca prasthitaṃ tatra jagatāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0099: gacchadhvam iti mām uktvā garuḍety āha māṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0101: āgaccheti ca mām uktvā pūrvottarapathaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0102: atīva mṛdubhāvena gacchann iva sa dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0103: ayutaṃ niyutaṃ cāhaṃ prayutaṃ cārbudaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0105: nanu tat tvām ahaṃ bhakto viṣṭhito 'smi praśāstu naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0106: āgaccha garuḍety evaṃ punar āha sa mādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0107: tato bhūyo hy ahaṃ pātaṃ patamāno vihāyasam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0111: tato māṃ kiṃkaro ghoraḥ śatayojanam āyatam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0112: nigṛhya pāṇinā tasmāc cikṣepa ca sa loṣṭavat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0113: tat tamo 'ham atikramya hy āpaṃ caiva vihāyasam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0115: karṇamūle hy aśṛṇavaṃ tato bhūtaiḥ samāsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0117: ity abravam ahaṃ tatra tato viṣṇur uvāca mām
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0118: suṣirasya mukhe kaś cin māṃ cikṣepa bhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0121: tatrāhaṃ duḥkhito bhūtaḥ krośamāno hy avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0125: māṃ dṛṣṭvāpy atha saṃsthe 'tha hy alpakālo 'tidurbalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0127: māṃ dṛṣṭvocur ahaṃ tatra paśyāmi garuḍadhvajam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0133: svayaṃ buddhaś ca saṃvignas tato hy aśṛṇavaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0134: āgaccha garuḍety eva tato 'haṃ yānam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0135: parārdhyaṃ ca tato gatvā yojanānāṃ śataṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0136: tatrāpaśyam ahaṃ yo vai brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0141: tatra sthito hariḥ śrīmān aṇḍam ekaṃ bibheda ha
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0142: mahad bhūtaṃ hi māṃ gṛhya dattvā vai prākṣipat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0143: tanmadhye sāgarān sapta brahmāṇaṃ ca tathā surān
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0144: paśyāmy ahaṃ yathāyogaṃ mātaraṃ svakulaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0147: ity evam abravaṃ viprān bhīṣma yan me purābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0148: tat te sarvaṃ yathānyāyam uktavān asmi sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0149: yoginas taṃ prapaśyanti jñānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0151: ananyayā ca bhaktyā ca prāptuṃ śakyo mahāhariḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0152: ity evam uktvā bhagavān suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:202.033d-017C_0155: jñānena bhaktyā sulabho nānyatheti matir mama
GE07mbh_12_u:203.001a: yogaṃ me paramaṃ tāta mokṣasya vada bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:203.001c: tam ahaṃ tattvato jñātum icchāmi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:203.001d-0558_01: bhūyo 'pi jñānasadbhāve sthityarthaṃ tvāṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:203.003a: kaś cid brāhmaṇam āsīnam ācāryam ṛṣisattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.004a: upāsanāt prasanno 'si yadi vai bhagavan mama
GE07mbh_12_u:203.004c: saṃśayo me mahān kaś cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:203.005a: kutaś cāhaṃ kutaś ca tvaṃ tat samyag brūhi yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:203.006a: vedeṣu cāpi yad vākyaṃ laukikaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:203.006c: etad vidvan yathātattvaṃ sarvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:203.007a: śṛṇu śiṣya mahāprājña brahmaguhyam idaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:203.007c: adhyātmaṃ sarvabhūtānām āgamānāṃ ca yad vasu
GE07mbh_12_u:203.008a: vāsudevaḥ sarvam idaṃ viśvasya brahmaṇo mukham
GE07mbh_12_u:203.008c: satyaṃ dānam atho yajñas titikṣā dama ārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.009a: puruṣaṃ sanātanaṃ viṣṇuṃ yat tad vedavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.009e: tad idaṃ brahma vārṣṇeyam itihāsaṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010a: brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaiḥ śrāvyo rājanyaḥ kṣatriyais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010b-0561_01: vaiśyo vaiśyais tathā śrāvyaḥ śūdraḥ śūdrair mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010e: arhas tvam asi kalyāṇa vārṣṇeyaṃ śṛṇu yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010f-0562_01: yam acyutaṃ paraṃ nityaṃ liṅgahīnaṃ ca nirmalam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010f-0562_02: nirvāṇam amṛtaṃ śrīmat tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010f-0562_03: bhave ca bhedavad bhinnaṃ pradānaṃ guṇakārakam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010f-0562_04: tasmin na sajjate nityaṃ sa eṣa puruṣo 'paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.010f-0562_08: tad dṛṣṭvā puruṣo 'tattvaṃ sākṣī bhūtvā pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012a: yat tad akṣaram avyaktam amṛtaṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012d-0563_01: tad akṣaram acintyaṃ vai bhinnarūpeṇa dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012d-0563_02: paśya kālākhyam aniśaṃ na coṣṇaṃ nātiśītalam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012d-0563_03: na santy ete guṇās tasmiṃs tathā tasmāt pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012d-0563_04: śītalo 'yam anuprāptaḥ kālo grīṣmas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:203.012d-0563_05: vakṣyanti sarvabhūtāni hy ete sūryodayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:203.013a: pitṝn devān ṛṣīṃś caiva tathā vai yakṣadānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:203.014c: pralaye prakṛtiṃ prāpya yugādau sṛjate prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.015c: dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā brahmāharātriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:203.016a: atha yad yad yadā bhāvi kālayogād yugādiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:203.016d-0564_02: anāmnāyavidhānād vai vedā hy antarhitā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.016d-0564_03: yugānte hy astabhūtāni śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:203.018c: bhārgavo nītiśāstraṃ ca jagāda jagato hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.019d-0566_01: nyāyatantraṃ hi kārtsnyena gautamo veda tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.020a: nyāyatantrāṇy anekāni tais tair uktāni vādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.021a: anādyaṃ yat paraṃ brahma na devā narṣayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.021c: ekas tad veda bhagavān dhātā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.022d-0567_01: vakṣye 'haṃ tava yat prāptam ṛṣer dvaipāyanān mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.024a: dīpād anye yathā dīpāḥ pravartante sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.026a: vāyos tejas tataś cāpas tv adbhyo hi vasudhodgatā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.027a: jñānendriyāṇy ataḥ pañca pañca karmendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:203.027c: viṣayāḥ pañca caikaṃ ca vikāre ṣoḍaśaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.028a: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ pañcendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:203.028c: pādau pāyur upasthaś ca hastau vāk karmaṇām api
GE07mbh_12_u:203.029a: śabdaḥ sparśo 'tha rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:203.029c: vijñeyaṃ vyāpakaṃ cittaṃ teṣu sarvagataṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.030a: rasajñāne tu jihveyaṃ vyāhṛte vāk tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:203.030c: indriyair vividhair yuktaṃ sarvaṃ vyastaṃ manas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.032a: tadvat somaguṇā jihvā gandhas tu pṛthivīguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.032c: śrotraṃ śabdaguṇaṃ caiva cakṣur agner guṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.033a: manaḥ sattvaguṇaṃ prāhuḥ sattvam avyaktajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:203.034a: ete bhāvā jagat sarvaṃ vahanti sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:203.034c: śritā virajasaṃ devaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.035a: navadvāraṃ puraṃ puṇyam etair bhāvaiḥ samanvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:203.035c: vyāpya śete mahān ātmā tasmāt puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.037a: yathā dīpaḥ prakāśātmā hrasvo vā yadi vā mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:203.038a: so 'tra vedayate vedyaṃ sa śṛṇoti sa paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:203.038c: kāraṇaṃ tasya deho 'yaṃ sa kartā sarvakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:203.039a: agnir dārugato yadvad bhinne dārau na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.039d-0569_01: agnir yathā hy upāyena mathitvā dāru dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:203.040a: nadīṣv āpo yathā yuktā yathā sūrye marīcayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:203.040c: saṃtanvānā yathā yānti tathā dehāḥ śarīriṇām

GE07mbh_12_u:209.018d-0602_05: niśādikā ye kathitā lokānāṃ kaluṣā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:209.018d-0602_06: tair hīnaṃ yat puraṃ śuddhaṃ bāhyābhyantaravartinam
GE07mbh_12_u:209.018d-0602_07: sadānandamayaṃ nityaṃ bhūtvā tat param anviyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:209.019a: brahma tat paramaṃ vedyam amṛtaṃ jyotir akṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:209.019c: ye vidur bhāvitātmānas te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:209.020c: pratyāhāreṇa vā śakyam avyaktaṃ brahma veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:210.001a: na sa veda paraṃ dharmaṃ yo na veda catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.001c: vyaktāvyakte ca yat tattvaṃ saṃprāptaṃ paramarṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:210.002a: vyaktaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ vidyād avyaktam amṛtaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.005a: tāṃ gatiṃ paramām eti nivṛttiparamo muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.006a: tad evam etau vijñeyāv avyaktapuruṣāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:210.006c: avyaktapuruṣābhyāṃ tu yat syād anyan mahattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:210.007c: anādyantāv ubhāv etāv aliṅgau cāpy ubhāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:210.008a: ubhau nityau sūkṣmatarau mahadbhyaś ca mahattarau
GE07mbh_12_u:210.008c: sāmānyam etad ubhayor evaṃ hy anyad viśeṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.009c: viparītam ato vidyāt kṣetrajñasya ca lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.010b-0603_01: kṣetrajñam āhur jīvaṃ tu kartāraṃ guṇasaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.010b-0604_01: agrāhyaṃ yena jānanti taj jñanaṃ daṃśitaś ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:210.010b-0604_02: tenaiva daṃśito nityaṃ na guṇaḥ paribhūyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.011c: karaṇaiḥ karmanirvṛttaiḥ kartā yad yad viceṣṭate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.011e: kīrtyate śabdasaṃjñābhiḥ ko 'ham eṣo 'py asāv iti
GE07mbh_12_u:210.011f-0605_01: mamāpi kāyam iti ca tad ajño nityasaṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.012a: uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastrais tribhir bhavati saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.012d-0606_01: bhedavastu tv abhedena jānāti sa yadā pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:210.012d-0606_02: tadā paraṃ parātmāsau bhavaty eva nirañjanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.012d-0606_03: kriyāyoge ca bhedākhye bahu saṃkṣipyate kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:210.012d-0606_05: evam eṣa paraḥ sattvo nānārūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.013a: tasmāc catuṣṭayaṃ vedyam etair hetubhir ācitam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.013c: yathāsaṃjño hy ayaṃ samyag antakāle na muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:210.013d-0607_01: vāyur vidho yathā bhānur viprakāśaṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:210.014a: śriyaṃ divyām abhiprepsur brahma vāṅmanasā śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.014c: śārīrair niyamair ugraiś caren niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.015c: sūryaś ca candramāś caiva bhāsatas tapasā divi
GE07mbh_12_u:210.015d-0608_01: anyac ca dharmasāmyaṃ yat tapas tat kīrtyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.016a: pratāpas tapaso jñānaṃ loke saṃśabditaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.016c: rajastamoghnaṃ yat karma tapasas tat svalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.016d-0609_01: tritayaṃ hy etad ākhyātaṃ yady asmād bhāsituṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.016d-0609_02: svabhāsā bhāsayaṃś cāpi candramā hy atra vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.016d-0609_03: sūryayoge tu yaḥ saṃdhis tapaḥ sarvaṃ pradīpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.017a: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.019a: vaimanasyaṃ ca viṣaye yānty asya karaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:210.019c: tasmāt tanmātram ādadyād yāvad atra prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.020c: evaṃ yuktena manasā jñānaṃ tad upapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.021a: rajasā cāpy ayaṃ dehī dehavāñ śabdavac caret
GE07mbh_12_u:210.021e: ā dehād apramādāc ca dehāntād vipramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.023e: sthānebhyo dhvaṃsamānāś ca sūkṣmatvāt tān upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.024a: yathāgamaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ buddhyā tan naiva budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.024c: dehāntaṃ kaś cid anvāste bhāvitātmā nirāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.024e: yukto dhāraṇayā kaś cit sattāṃ ke cid upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:210.026a: sarva ete mahātmāno gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:210.027a: dehaṃ tu paramaṃ vidyād vimuktam aparigraham
GE07mbh_12_u:210.028c: brahmabhūtā virajasas tato yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:210.028d-0610_01: evam ekāyanaṃ dharmam āhur vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.028d-0610_02: yathājñānam upāsantaḥ sarve yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:210.029c: te yānti paramāṃl lokān viśudhyanto yathābalam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.030c: bhāvena yānti śuddhā ye jñānatṛptā nirāśiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.031a: jñātvātmasthaṃ hariṃ caiva nivartante na te 'vyayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.031c: prāpya tat paramaṃ sthānaṃ modante 'kṣaram avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.032a: etāvad etad vijñānam etad asti ca nāsti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:210.034a: sūcyā sūtraṃ yathā vastre saṃsārayati vāyakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:210.035a: vikāraṃ prakṛtiṃ caiva puruṣaṃ ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:210.035c: yo yathāvad vijānāti sa vitṛṣṇo vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.001c: jagāma mokṣaṃ dharmajño bhogān utsṛjya mānuṣān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.002c: yena vṛttena vṛttajñaḥ sa jagāma mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:211.004a: tasya sma śatam ācāryā vasanti satataṃ gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:211.005a: sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretyajātau viniścaye
GE07mbh_12_u:211.005c: āgamasthaḥ sa bhūyiṣṭham ātmatattve na tuṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.006c: paridhāvan mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mithilām api
GE07mbh_12_u:211.008a: ṛṣīṇām āhur ekaṃ yaṃ kāmād avasitaṃ nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:211.008c: śāśvataṃ sukham atyantam anvicchan sa sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:211.009a: yam āhuḥ kapilaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ paramarṣiṃ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:211.009c: sa manye tena rūpeṇa vismāpayati hi svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.010a: āsureḥ prathamaṃ śiṣyaṃ yam āhuś cirajīvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.011a: taṃ samāsīnam āgamya maṇḍalaṃ kāpilaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.012a: iṣṭisatreṇa saṃsiddho bhūyaś ca tapasā muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.013a: yat tad ekākṣaraṃ brahma nānārūpaṃ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.013b-0613_01: tan me brūhi dvijaśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi vettāsya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.013c: āsurir maṇḍale tasmin pratipede tad avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.014a: tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.014c: brāhmaṇī kapilā nāma kā cid āsīt kuṭumbinī
GE07mbh_12_u:211.015a: tasyāḥ putratvam āgamya striyāḥ sa pibati stanau
GE07mbh_12_u:211.015c: tataḥ sa kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭhikīm
GE07mbh_12_u:211.016a: etan me bhagavān āha kāpileyāya saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.017c: upetya śatam ācāryān mohayām āsa hetubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.017d-0615_01: nirākariṣṇus tān sarvāṃs teṣāṃ hetuguṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:211.017d-0615_02: śrāvayām āsa matimān muniḥ pañcaśikho nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:211.019c: abravīt paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yat tat sāṃkhyaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.021c: tad anāśvāsikaṃ moghaṃ vināśi calam adhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.022c: āgamāt param astīti bruvann api parājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.023a: anātmā hy ātmano mṛtyuḥ kleśo mṛtyur jarāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.023c: ātmānaṃ manyate mohāt tad asamyak paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.024a: atha ced evam apy asti yal loke nopapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.024c: ajaro 'yam amṛtyuś ca rājāsau manyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.025a: asti nāstīti cāpy etat tasminn asati lakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:211.026a: pratyakṣaṃ hy etayor mūlaṃ kṛtāntaitihyayor api
GE07mbh_12_u:211.026c: pratyakṣo hy āgamo 'bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:211.027c: anyo jīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.029c: mṛte karmanivṛttiś ca pramāṇam iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.030a: na tv ete hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.031c: kāraṇaṃ lobhamohau tu doṣāṇāṃ ca niṣevaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.032a: avidyāṃ kṣetram āhur hi karma bījaṃ tathā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.033a: tasmin vyūḍhe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:211.033c: anyo 'nyāj jāyate dehas tam āhuḥ sattvasaṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.034a: yadā sa rūpataś cānyo jātitaḥ śrutito 'rthataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.034c: katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.035a: evaṃ sati ca kā prītir dānavidyātapobalaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.035c: yad anyācaritaṃ karma sarvam anyaḥ prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.036a: yadā hy ayam ihaivānyaiḥ prākṛtair duḥkhito bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:211.036c: sukhitair duḥkhitair vāpi dṛśyo 'py asya vinirṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.037a: tathā hi musalair hanyuḥ śarīraṃ tat punar bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:211.037c: pṛthag jñānaṃ yad anyac ca yenaitan nopalabhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.038a: ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaras tithyaḥ śītoṣṇe ca priyāpriye
GE07mbh_12_u:211.039a: jarayā hi parītasya mṛtyunā vā vināśinā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.040a: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.040c: ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.041c: yadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.042a: iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.042c: etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.043a: teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:211.043c: kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.044a: evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.044d-0616_01: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.045a: arthāṃs tathātyantasukhāvahāṃś ca; lipsanta ete bahavo viśulkāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.045c: mahattaraṃ duḥkham abhiprapannā; hitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti
GE07mbh_12_u:211.046a: vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasya; kiṃ bandhubhir mitraparigrahaiś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.046c: vihāya yo gacchati sarvam eva; kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.047c: itīdam ālakṣya kuto ratir bhaved; vināśino hy asya na śarma vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048a: idam anupadhi vākyam acchalaṃ; paramanirāmayam ātmasākṣikam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048c: narapatir abhivīkṣya vismitaḥ; punar anuyoktum idaṃ pracakrame bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0003: bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0004: evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0005: vivādād eva siddho 'sau kāraṇasyeva vedanā pañcaśikha uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0006: cetano vidyate hy atra haitukaṃ ca manogatam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0007: āgamād eva siddho 'sau svataḥsiddha iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0008: vartate pṛthag anyonyaṃ na hy apāśritya karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0009: cetano hy aṃśavas tatra svamūrtaṃ dhārayanty ataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0010: svabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ karma hy ātmānaṃ tam upāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0012: guṇajñānam abhijñānaṃ yasya liṅgā na śabdavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0013: pṛthivyādiṣu bhūteṣu tat tad āhur nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0014: ātmāsau vartate bhinnas tatra tatra samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0015: paramātmā tathaivaiko dehe 'sminn iti vai śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0016: ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0017: yathā tridhā pravartante tathāsau puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0018: payasy antarhitaṃ yadvat tadvad vyāptaṃ mahātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0019: pūrvaṃ naiśvaryayogena tasmād etan na śeṣavān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0020: śabdaḥ kālaḥ kriyā deho mamaikasyaiva kalpanā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0021: svabhāvaṃ tanmayaṃ tv etan māyārūpaṃ tu bhedavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0023: liṅgādi devamadhyās te jñānaṃ devasya tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0024: cinmayo 'yaṃ hi nādākhyaḥ śabdaś cāsau mano mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0025: gatimān uta saṃdhatte varṇavat tat padānvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0026: kāyo nāsti ca teṣāṃ vai avakāśas tathā param
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0027: ete noḍhā iti cākhyātāḥ sarve te dharmadūṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0028: anubandhān na vijñānaṃ jñānato dhruvam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0030: prakṛter aparas teṣāṃ bahavo hy ātmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0031: virodho hy ātmasanmāyāṃ na teṣāṃ siddha eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0032: anyadā ca gṛhītai* vedabāhyās tataḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0034: tasmād vedasya hṛdayam advaidhyam iti viddhi tat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0036: tasmāc ca smṛtayo jātāḥ setihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0037: na yan na sādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0038: indriyāṇi sabhūtāni parā ca prakṛtir manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0039: ātmā ca paramaḥ śuddhaḥ prokto 'sau paramaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0041: yo vetti prakṛtiṃ nityaṃ tathā caivātmanas tu tām
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0046: duḥkham āste sa nirduḥkhas tad vidvān na ca lipyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0047: asāv aśnāti yadvat tad bhramaro 'śnāti yan madhu
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0048: evam eṣa mahān ātmā nātmā tad avabudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0049: evaṃbhūtas tvam ity atra svādhīto budhyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0050: budhasya bodhanaṃ tatra kriyate sadbhir ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0051: na budhasyeti vai kaś cin na tathāvac chruṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0052: śokam asya na gatvā te śāstrāṇāṃ śāstradasyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0053: lokaṃ nighnanti saṃbhinnā jñātino 'tra vadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0054: evaṃ tasya vibhoḥ kṛtyaṃ dhātur asya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0057: kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0058: tasya saṃyogayogena śucir apy aśucir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0059: aśuciś ca śuciś cāpi jñānād dehādayo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0060: dṛśyaṃ na caiva dṛṣṭaṃ syād dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu naiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0065: buddhyā bhavati buddhyāttaṃ yad buddhaṃ cātmarūpavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0066: tamasy andhe na saṃdehāt paraṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0070: na yujyante 'tha vā kleśair ahaṃbhāvodbhavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0071: itas tataḥ samāhṛtya jñānaṃ nirvarṇayanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0072: jñānānvitas tamo hanyād arkavat sa mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0075: tam eva sarvaduḥkhāt tu mocayet paramātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0078: indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0079: ānupūrvyād vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0080: kāraṇānugataṃ kāryaṃ yadi tac ca vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0081: aliṅgasya kathaṃ liṅgaṃ yujyate tan mṛṣā dṛḍham
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0082: na tv eva hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0084: lokadṛṣṭo yathā jāteḥ svedajaḥ puruṣaḥ striyām
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0087: yathā śākhā hi vai śākhā taroḥ saṃbadhyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0088: śrutyā tathā paro 'py ātmā dṛśyate so 'py aliṅgavān
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0089: aliṅgasādhyaṃ tad brahma bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0091: tadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0092: iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0093: etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratidṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0094: teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0095: kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavat
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0096: evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0098: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:211.048d-018_0111: vināśino hy asya na karma vidyate bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.002a: bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:212.002c: evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.003a: sarvam ucchedaniṣṭhaṃ syāt paśya caitad dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:212.003c: apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.004a: asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:212.004c: kasmai kriyeta kalpena niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.005a: tamasā hi praticchannaṃ vibhrāntam iva cāturam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.006e: vartate pṛthag anyonyam apy apāśritya karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:212.007a: dhātavaḥ pañcaśākho 'yaṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotir ambu bhūḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.008a: ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.008d-0617_02: vācām agocaraṃ nityaṃ jñeyam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.008d-0617_03: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathājñānaṃ trividhaṃ jñānam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.008e: jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.009c: prāṇāpānau vikāraś ca dhātavaś cātra niḥsṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.009d-0618_01: prāṇādayas tathā sparśā na saṃbādhagatās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.009d-0618_02: putrādhīnaṃ bhaviṣyeta cinmātraḥ sa paraḥ pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:212.010a: śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭir nāsā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.011c: sukhaduḥkheti yām āhur aduḥkhety asukheti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.012a: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca mūrty atha
GE07mbh_12_u:212.012c: ete hy āmaraṇāt pañca ṣaḍguṇā jñānasiddhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:212.013c: tam āhuḥ paramaṃ śukraṃ buddhir ity avyayaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:212.013c-0619_02: virāgād vartate tasmin mano rajasi nityagam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.014d-0620_01: tasmād eteṣu medhāvī na prasajyeta buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:212.015a: anātmeti ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mamety api
GE07mbh_12_u:212.016a: tatra samyaṅ mano nāma tyāgaśāstram anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.016c: śṛṇu yat tava mokṣāya bhāṣyamāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.017a: tyāga eva hi sarveṣām uktānām api karmaṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:212.018a: dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāny api
GE07mbh_12_u:212.019c: viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatir hy anyathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.021a: hastau karmendriyaṃ jñeyam atha pādau gatīndriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.022a: vāk tu śabdaviśeṣārthaṃ gatiṃ pañcānvitāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.022c: evam ekādaśaitāni buddhyā tv avasṛjen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023a: karṇau śabdaś ca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023c: tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023d-0622_01: cakṣū rūpaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayo darśanasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023d-0622_02: nāsā gandhas tathā cittaṃ trayo ghrāṇasya saṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023d-0622_03: tvacaḥ sparśaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayaḥ sparśanasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.023d-0622_04: jihvā rasas tathā cittaṃ trayo rasanasaṃgrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.024a: evaṃ pañcatrikā hy ete guṇās tad upalabdhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:212.024c: yena yas trividho bhāvaḥ paryāyāt samupasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.025a: sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś caiva te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.026c: akutaś cit kutaś cid vā cittataḥ sāttviko guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.027a: atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.028c: kathaṃ cid api vartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.029a: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.029c: vartate sāttviko bhāva ity apekṣeta tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.030c: pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tatas tad abhicintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.031a: atha yan mohasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.032a: tad dhi śrotrāśrayaṃ bhūtaṃ śabdaḥ śrotraṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.033a: evaṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:212.033c: sparśe rūpe rase gandhe tāni ceto manaś ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:212.034c: cittam ekādaśaṃ viddhi buddhir dvādaśamī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.037a: yat tamopahataṃ cittam āśu saṃcāram adhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.037c: karoty uparamaṃ kāle tad āhus tāmasaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:212.038a: yad yad āgamasaṃyuktaṃ na kṛtsnam upaśāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.038c: atha tatrāpy upādatte tamo vyaktam ivānṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039c: kathaṃ cid vartate samyak keṣāṃ cid vā na vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_01: aham ity eṣa vai bhāvo nānyatra pratitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_02: yasya bhāvo dṛḍho nityaṃ sa vai vidvāṃs tathetaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_03: dehadharmas tathā nityaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vai dṛḍhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_04: etenaivānumānena tyājyo dharmas tathā hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_05: jñānena mucyate jantur dharmātmā jñānavān bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_06: dharmeṇa dhāryate lokaḥ sarvaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.039d-0623_08: sarvo hi dṛśyate loke na sarvārthaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:212.040c: sthito manasi yo bhāvaḥ sa vai kṣetrajña ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.041a: evaṃ sati ka ucchedaḥ śāśvato vā kathaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.042a: yathārṇavagatā nadyo vyaktīr jahati nāma ca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.042c: na ca svatāṃ niyacchanti tādṛśaḥ sattvasaṃkṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.043a: evaṃ sati kutaḥ saṃjñā pretyabhāve punar bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:212.044a: imāṃ tu yo veda vimokṣabuddhim; ātmānam anvicchati cāpramattaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.044c: na lipyate karmaphalair aniṣṭaiḥ; patraṃ bisasyeva jalena siktam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.045a: dṛḍhaiś ca pāśair bahubhir vimuktaḥ; prajānimittair api daivataiś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.045c: yadā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe jahāti; muktas tadāgryāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.046a: kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe; tatonimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.046c: alepam ākāśam aliṅgam evam; āsthāya paśyanti mahad dhy asaktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.047c: tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ; vidhvaṃsate loṣṭa ivādrim arcchan
GE07mbh_12_u:212.048a: yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgam atho purāṇaṃ; hitvā tvacaṃ vāpy urago yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:212.048c: vihāya gacchaty anavekṣamāṇas; tathā vimukto vijahāti duḥkham
GE07mbh_12_u:212.049a: drumaṃ yathā vāpy udake patantam; utsṛjya pakṣī prapataty asaktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.049c: tathā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe vihāya; muktaḥ parārdhyāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.049d-0624_03: imāṃ hi gāthāṃ pralapan yathāsti samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.049d-0624_06: hy ahaṃ tadantar hy aham eva bhoktā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.050a: api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ; nagaram upāhitam agninābhivīkṣya
GE07mbh_12_u:212.050c: na khalu mama tuṣo 'pi dahyate 'tra; svayam idam āha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.051a: idam amṛtapadaṃ videharājaḥ; svayam iha pañcaśikhena bhāṣyamāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.051c: nikhilam abhisamīkṣya niścitārthaṃ; paramasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052a: imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ; na hīyate satatam avekṣate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052c: upadravān nānubhavaty aduḥkhitaḥ; pramucyate kapilam ivaitya maithilaḥ yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0001: kiṃkāraṇaṃ mahāprājña dahyamānaś ca maithilaḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0002: mithilāṃ neha dharmātmā prāha vīkṣya vidāhitām
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0004: vahninā dīpitā sā tu tan me śṛṇu mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0005: janako janadevas tu karmāṇy ādhāya cātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0007: yajan dadaṃs tathā juhvan pālayan pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0009: sa tasya hṛdi saṃkalpaṃ jñātum aicchat svayaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0011: mithilāyāṃ mahābuddhir vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid ācaran
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0014: na tvāṃ brāhmaṇa daṇḍena niyokṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0015: mama rājyād vinirgaccha yāvat sīmā bhuvo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0016: tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo gatvā rājānaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0017: kariṣye vacanaṃ rājan bravīhi mama jānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0018: kā sīmā tava bhūmes tu brūhi dharmaṃ mamādya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0020: novāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ tattvabuddhyā samīkṣya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0021: punaḥ punaś ca taṃ vipraś codayām āsa satvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0022: brūhi rājendra gacchāmi tava rājyād vivāsitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0024: āvāso vā na me 'sty atra sarvā vā pṛthivī mama
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0025: gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā brahmann iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0026: ity uktaḥ sa tathā tena maithilena dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0027: abravīt taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0029: aho siddhārtharūpo 'si gamiṣye svasti te 'stu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0030: ity uktvā prayayau vipras taj jijñāsur dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0031: adahac cāgninā tasya mithilāṃ bhagavān svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0032: pradīpyamānāṃ mithilāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā na kampitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0033: janaiḥ sa paripṛṣṭas tu vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0034: anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ bhāvyaṃ me nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0035: mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me kiṃ cana dahyate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0036: tad asya bhāṣamāṇasya śrutvā śrutvā hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0037: punaḥ saṃjīvayām āsa mithilāṃ tāṃ dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0038: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa varaṃ cāsmai dadau punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0039: dharme tiṣṭhatu sadbhāvo buddhis te 'rthe narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0040: satye tiṣṭhasva nirviṇṇaḥ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0042: etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0043: asti kaś cid yadi vibho sadāro niyato gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0045: taṃ me brūhi mahāprājña durlabhaḥ puruṣo mahān bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0046: śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ pṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0052: pradānasamayaṃ prāptā pitā tasya hy acintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0053: asyāḥ patiḥ kuto veti brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0054: vidvān vipro hy akuṭumbaḥ priyavādī mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0055: ity evaṃ cintayānaṃ taṃ rahasy āha suvarcalā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0056: andhāya māṃ mahāprājña dehy anandhāya vai pitaḥ pitovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0057: evaṃ smara sadā vidvan mamedaṃ prārthitaṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0058: na śakyaṃ prārthitaṃ vatse tvayādya pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0059: andhatānandhatā ceti vikāro mama jāyate suvarcalovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0062: vidyate cet patis tādṛk sa māṃ bharati vedavit
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0063: yebhyas tvaṃ manyase dātuṃ mām ihānaya tān dvijān bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0064: tādṛśaṃ taṃ patiṃ teṣu varayiṣye yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0065: tatheti coktvā tāṃ kanyām ṛṣiḥ śiṣyān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0067: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ śuddhāñ śuddhān ācārataḥ śubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0072: tac chrutvā tvaritāḥ śiṣyā hy āśrameṣu tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0073: grāmeṣu ca tato gatvā brāhmaṇebhyo nyavedayan
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0074: ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ matvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0077: abhyarcya vidhivat tatra kanyāṃ prāha pitā mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0080: ye 'mī teṣu varaṃ bhadre tvam icchasi mahāvratam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0081: taṃ kumāraṃ vṛṇīṣvādya tasmai dāsyām ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0085: yady asti samitau vipro hy andho 'nandhaḥ sa me varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0086: tac chrutvā munayas tatra vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0087: nocur viprā mahābhāgāḥ kanyāṃ matvā hy avedikām
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0090: kanyā ca saṃsthitā tatra pitṛveśmani bhāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0091: tataḥ kadā cid brahmaṇyo vidvān nyāyaviśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0095: śvetaketur iti khyātaḥ śrutvā vṛttāntam ādarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0101: tac chrutvā kupitā kanyā ṛṣiputram udaikṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0102: tāṃ kanyām āha viprarṣiḥ so 'haṃ bhadre samāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0103: andho 'ham atra tattvaṃ hi tathā manye ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0105: vṛṇīṣva māṃ varārohe bhaje ca tvām anindite
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0106: yenedaṃ vīkṣate nityaṃ śṛṇoti spṛśate 'tha vā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0107: ghrāyate vakti satataṃ yenedaṃ rasayate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0108: yenedaṃ manyate tattvaṃ yena budhyati vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0109: na cakṣur vidyate hy etat sa vai bhūtāndha ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0110: yasmin pravartate cedaṃ paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśann api
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0111: jighraṃś ca rasayaṃs tadvad vartate yena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:212.052d-019_0112: tan me nāsti tato hy andho vṛṇu bhadre 'dya mām ataḥ
