GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0022: nāhaṃ jānāmi viprendrāḥ pratyuvāca sa tān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0023: te sarve sahitā viprā nāradam ṛṣim abruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0024: tvaṃ no brūhi mahābhāga tattvavic ca bhavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0025: nāhaṃ dvijā vijānāmi kva hi gacchāma saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0026: iti tān āha bhagavāṃs tataḥ prāha ca sa dvijān
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0027: ko vidvān iha loke 'sminn amoho 'mṛtam adbhutam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0028: tac ca te śuśruvur vākyaṃ brāhmaṇā hy aśarīriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0029: sanaddhāma dvijā gatvā pṛcchadhvaṃ sa ca vakṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0041: na satsvarūpam atha vā punaḥ kim
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0049: na cāsya mantā na ca vidyate cet
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0050: na śuśruvus tatas tat tu prativākyaṃ dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0052: āścaryam iti matvā te yayur haimaṃ mahāgirim
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0054: taṃ parvataṃ samāruhya dadṛśur dhyānam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0059: jñātaṃ mayā munigaṇā vākyaṃ tad aśarīriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0073: yathāha pūrvaṃ yuṣmāsu hy aśarīrī dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0074: tathaiva vākyaṃ tat satyam ajānantaś ca kīrtitam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0075: śṛṇudhvaṃ paramaṃ kāraṇam asti | katham avagamyate | ahany ahani
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0076: pākaviśeṣo dṛśyate | tena miśraṃ sarvaṃ miśrayate | yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0077: maṇḍalī dṛśi sarveṣām asti nidarśanam | asti cakṣuṣmatām asti
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0078: jñāne svarūpaṃ paśyati | yathā darpaṇāntarnidarśanam | sa eva sarvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0079: vidvān na bibheti na gacchati | kutrāhaṃ kasya nāhaṃ kenety avartamāno
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0080: vijānāti | sa yugato vyāpī | sa pṛthak sthitaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0081: tad aparamārtham | yathā vāyur ekaḥ san bahudheritaḥ | āśrayaviśeṣo
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0082: vā yasyāśrayo vā | yathāvad dvije mṛge vyāghre ca | manuje veṇu saṃśrayo
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0083: bhidyate vāyur athaikaḥ | ātmā tathāsau paramātmāsāv
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0084: iva bhāti | evam ātmā sa eva gacchati | sarvam ātmā paśyañ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0086: cakre 'sya taṃ mahātmānaṃ parito daśa raśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0087: viniṣkramya yathā sūryam anugacchati taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0088: dine dine 'stam abhyeti punar udgacchate diśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0089: tāv ubhau na ravau cāstāṃ tathā vitta śarīriṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0090: patite vitta viprendrāḥ bhakṣaṇe caraṇe paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0091: ūrdhvam ekas tathādhastād ekas tiṣṭhati cāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0093: ātmanā hy ātmadīpaṃ tam ātmani hy ātmapūruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0094: saṃcitaṃ saṃcitaṃ pūrvaṃ bhramaro vartate bhraman
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0095: yo 'bhimānīva jānāti na muhyati na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0100: brāhmaṇasya na sādṛśye vartate so 'pi kiṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0101: ijyate yas tu mantreṇa yajamāno dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0102: naiva dharmī na cādharmī dvaṃdvātīto vimatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0103: jñānatṛptaḥ sukhaṃ śete hy amṛtātmā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0104: evam eṣa jagatsṛṣṭiṃ kurute māyayā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0105: na jānāti virūḍhātmā kāraṇaṃ cātmano hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0106: dhyātā draṣṭā tathā mantā boddhā dṛṣṭān sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0108: yat tu śakyaṃ mayā proktaṃ gacchadhvaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0110: sanatkumāraṃ saṃdṛṣṭvā jagmus te ruciraṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0111: tasmāt tvam api kaunteya jñānayogaparo bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0117: yad idaṃ tapa ity āhuḥ kiṃ tapaḥ saṃprakīrtitam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0118: upavāsam athānyat tu vedācāram atho nu kim bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0119: śāstraṃ tapo mahāprājña tan me brūhi
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0123: yathāvihitam ācāras tapaḥ sarvaṃ vrataṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0125: tyāgas tapas tathā śāntis tapa indriyanigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0126: brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ proktam āhur evaṃ dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0127: sadopavāso yo vidvān brahmacārī sadā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0128: yo muniś ca sadā dhīmān vighasāśī vimatsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0129: tatas tv anantam apy āhur yo nityam atithipriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0131: ṛtugāmī tathā prokto vighasāśī smṛto budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0132: bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte yajñaśeṣaṃ tathāmṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0134: keṣāṃ lokā hy aparyantāḥ sarve satyavrate sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0135: ye 'pi karmamayaṃ prāhus te dvijā brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0136: ramante divyabhogaiś ca pūjitā hy apsarogaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0139: etat te nṛpaśārdūla proktaṃ yat pṛṣṭavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0140: yathāvastūni saṃjñāni vividhāni bhavanty uta yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0142: anyāni ca sahasrāṇi nāmāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0143: pratiyogīni vai teṣāṃ channāny astamitāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0144: dṛḍhaṃ sarvaṃ prākṛtakam idaṃ sarvatra paśya vai bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0145: tasmād yathāgataṃ rājan yathāruci nṛṇāṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0146: asminn arthe purāvṛttaṃ śṛṇu rājan yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0147: brāhmaṇānāṃ samūhe tu yad uvāca suvarcalā
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0150: hetunā kena jātā sā nirdvaṃdvā naṣṭasaṃśayā
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0152: andhāya māṃ mahāprājña dehi vīkṣya sulocanam pitovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0153: evaṃ sma ca pitaḥ śaśvan mayedaṃ [prārthitaṃ] mune
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0154: na śakyaṃ prārthituṃ vatse tvayādya pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0155: andhatānandhatā ceti vicāro mama jāyate kanyovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0158: viddhi vai tādṛśaṃ loke sa māṃ bhajati vedavit
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0159: yān yāṃs tvaṃ manyase dātuṃ māṃ dvijottama tān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0160: ānayānyān mahābhāga hy ahaṃ drakṣyāmi teṣu tam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0161: tatheti coktvā tāṃ vipraḥ preṣayām āsa śiṣyakān
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0162: ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0164: tān āgatān athābhyarcya kanyām āha pitā mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0165: yadīcchasi varaṃ bhadre taṃ vipraṃ varaya svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0168: yady asti saṃmato vipro hy andho 'nandhaḥ sa me varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0169: nocur viprā mahābhāgāṃ prativākyaṃ yayuś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0170: kanyā ca tiṣṭhatām atra pitur veśmani bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0172: śrutvā brahmā tadāgamya kanyām āha mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0173: so 'haṃ bhadre samāvṛttas tvayokto yaḥ purā dvijaḥ suvarcalovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0174: viśālanayanaṃ viddhi mām andho 'haṃ vṛṇīṣva mām
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0175: kathaṃ viśālanetro 'si kathaṃ vā tvam alocanaḥ dvija uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0176: brūhi paścād ahaṃ vidvan parīkṣe tvāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0178: śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe sahetukam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0179: na me pravartate ceto na pratyakṣaṃ hi teṣu me
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0180: alocano 'haṃ tasmād dhi na gatir vidyate yataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0181: yena paśyati suśroṇi bhāṣate spṛśate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0182: bhujyate ghrāyate nityaṃ śṛṇoti manute tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0183: tac cakṣur vidyate mahyaṃ yena paśyati vai sphuṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0184: sulocano 'haṃ bhadre vai pṛccha vā kiṃ vadāmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0185: sarvam asmin na me 'vidyā vidvān hi paramārthataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0186: sā viśuddhā tato bhūtvā śvetaketuṃ mahāmunim
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0187: praṇamya pūjayām āsa tāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca labdhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0189: prāptā rājan mahāprājña tasmād arthaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:214.016d-020_0190: etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:215.001a: yad idaṃ karma loke 'smiñ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:215.002a: kartā svit tasya puruṣa utāho neti saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.002c: etad icchāmi tattvena tvattaḥ śrotuṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:215.003c: prahrādasya ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:215.006c: kāñcane vātha loṣṭe vā ubhayoḥ samadarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.009a: yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇaiḥ syāt puruṣo nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:215.009c: bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:215.010a: atha te lakṣyate buddhiḥ samā bālajanair iha
GE07mbh_12_u:215.010c: ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ sañ śreyaḥ kim iha manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:215.011a: baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.011c: śriyā vihīnaḥ prahrāda śocitavye na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:215.013c: uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā svāṃ prajñām anuvarṇayan
GE07mbh_12_u:215.014a: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.014c: tasya stambho bhaved bālyān nāsti stambho 'nupaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.014d-0635_05: sa vai pāti jagatsraṣṭā viṣṇur ity abhiśabditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.015c: sarve bhāvās tathābhāvāḥ puruṣārtho na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.016a: puruṣārthasya cābhāve nāsti kaś cit svakārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.016c: svayaṃ tu kurvatas tasya jātu māno bhaved iha
GE07mbh_12_u:215.017a: yas tu kartāram ātmānaṃ manyate sādhvasādhunoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.017c: tasya doṣavatī prajñā svamūrtyajñeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.018a: yadi syāt puruṣaḥ kartā śakrātmaśreyase dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.018c: ārambhās tasya sidhyeran na ca jātu parābhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:215.019a: aniṣṭasya hi nirvṛttir anivṛttiḥ priyasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:215.020c: aprayatnena paśyāmaḥ keṣāṃ cit tat svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.022c: śubhāśubhās tadā tatra tasya kiṃ mānakāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.023a: svabhāvād eva tat sarvam iti me niścitā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.024a: karmajaṃ tv iha manye 'haṃ phalayogaṃ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:215.024c: karmaṇāṃ viṣayaṃ kṛtsnam ahaṃ vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:215.025a: yathā vedayate kaś cid odanaṃ vāyaso vadan
GE07mbh_12_u:215.026a: vikārān eva yo veda na veda prakṛtiṃ parām
GE07mbh_12_u:215.026c: tasya stambho bhaved bālyān nāsti stambho 'nupaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.027c: budhyamānasya darpo vā māno vā kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:215.028a: veda dharmavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ bhūtānāṃ cāpy anityatām
GE07mbh_12_u:215.028c: tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
GE07mbh_12_u:215.031a: prakṛtau ca vikāre ca na me prītir na ca dviṣe
GE07mbh_12_u:215.031c: dveṣṭāraṃ na ca paśyāmi yo mamādya mamāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.032a: nordhvaṃ nāvāṅ na tiryak ca na kva cic chakra kāmaye
GE07mbh_12_u:215.032c: na vijñāne na vijñeye nājñāne śarma vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.033a: yenaiṣā labhyate prajñā yena śāntir avāpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.033c: prabrūhi tam upāyaṃ me samyak prahrāda pṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035a: svabhāvāl labhate prajñāṃ śāntim eti svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035c: svabhāvād eva tat sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cid anupaśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0006: karoti sadbhiḥ saṃsargamalaṃ santaḥ sukhāya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0010: dharmahānim avāpnoti kramāt tena naraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0012: vācake vāpi ca sthānaṃ na hanty eva vimocitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0013: sārkṣye (sic) cāsya ratir nityaṃ saṃsāre ca ratir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0014: tasya nityam avijñānād ātmā caiva na sidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0016: āśaucaṃ vardhate nityaṃ na śāmyati kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0020: svataḥsiddhaṃ na bhogas taṃ svataḥsiddhaṃ na vetti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0025: anukūleṣu dharmeṣu cinoty enaṃ tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0026: ācārya iti ca khyātas tenāsau balavṛtrahan
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0030: anukūlavṛttiṃ satataṃ chinatty eva bhṛgur yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0036: suṣuptyākhyas turīyo 'sau na ca hy āvaraṇānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0037: lokavṛttyā tam īśānaṃ yajañ juhvan yamī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0038: ātmany āyāsayogena niṣkriyaḥ sa parāt param
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0044: tadabhāve tu śokādyā na vartante sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0046: upāyam etad ākhyātaṃ mā vakraṃ gaccha devapa
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0047: jñānena paśyate karma jñānināṃ na pravartakam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0049: tadante taṃ prayāty eva na vidvān iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0050: yad asya vācakaṃ vakṣye tasmād etad bhavet sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0051: tena tena ca bhāvena apāyaṃ tatra paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0052: sthānabhedeṣu vāg eṣā tālusaṃsthā yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0053: tadvad buddhigatā hy arthā buddhim ātmagataṃ sadā samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0057: viṣṇur vibhur vāsti guṇo na nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0063: na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaś cid enam
GE07mbh_12_u:215.035d-021_0066: vadanti tan me bhagavān dadau sa
GE07mbh_12_u:215.036a: ity ukto daityapatinā śakro vismayam āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:215.036c: prītimāṃś ca tadā rājaṃs tad vākyaṃ pratyapūjayat
GE07mbh_12_u:216.001a: yayā buddhyā mahīpālo bhraṣṭaśrīr vicaren mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:216.002c: vāsavasya ca saṃvādaṃ baler vairocanasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.003c: sarvān evāsurāñ jitvā baliṃ papraccha vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.004a: yasya sma dadato vittaṃ na kadā cana hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:216.004c: taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim
GE07mbh_12_u:216.005a: sa eva hy astam ayate sa sma vidyotate diśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.005c: sa varṣati sma varṣāṇi yathākālam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.005e: taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim
GE07mbh_12_u:216.006a: sa vāyur varuṇaś caiva sa raviḥ sa ca candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.006c: so 'gnis tapati bhūtāni pṛthivī ca bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:216.006e: taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.007a: naitat te sādhu maghavan yad etad anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.007c: pṛṣṭas tu nānṛtaṃ brūyāt tasmād vakṣyāmi te balim
GE07mbh_12_u:216.008a: uṣṭreṣu yadi vā goṣu khareṣv aśveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.009a: yadi sma balinā brahmañ śūnyāgāre sameyivān
GE07mbh_12_u:216.009c: hanyām enaṃ na vā hanyāṃ tad brahmann anuśādhi mām brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.010a: mā sma śakra baliṃ hiṃsīr na balir vadham arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:216.010c: nyāyāṃs tu śakra praṣṭavyas tvayā vāsava kāmyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:216.011a: evam ukto bhagavatā mahendraḥ pṛthivīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:216.012a: tato dadarśa sa baliṃ kharaveṣeṇa saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:216.013c: iyaṃ te yonir adhamā śocasy āho na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.014a: adṛṣṭaṃ bata paśyāmi dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:216.015c: lokān pratāpayan sarvān yāsy asmān avitarkayan
GE07mbh_12_u:216.016a: tvanmukhāś caiva daiteyā vyatiṣṭhaṃs tava śāsane
GE07mbh_12_u:216.016e: idaṃ ca te 'dya vyasanaṃ śocasy āho na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.017c: jñātibhyo vibhajan vittaṃ tadāsīt te manaḥ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:216.019c: katham adya tadā caiva manas te dānaveśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:216.021d-0636_01: anantaraṃ sahasreṇa tadāsīd daitya kā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.022c: śamyākṣepeṇa vidhinā tadāsīt kiṃ nu te hṛdi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.023a: na te paśyāmi bhṛṅgāraṃ na chatraṃ vyajanaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.023c: brahmadattāṃ ca te mālāṃ na paśyāmy asurādhipa bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.023d-0637_01: tataḥ prahasya sa balir vāsavena samīritam
GE07mbh_12_u:216.023d-0637_03: aho hi tava bāliśyam iha devagaṇādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:216.023d-0637_04: ayuktaṃ devarājasya tava kaṣṭam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:216.024a: na tvaṃ paśyasi bhṛṅgāraṃ na chatraṃ vyajanaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:216.024c: brahmadattāṃ ca me mālāṃ na tvaṃ drakṣyasi vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:216.025a: guhāyāṃ nihitāni tvaṃ mama ratnāni pṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.025c: yadā me bhavitā kālas tadā tvaṃ tāni drakṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:216.025d-0638_02: kālena bhavitā sarvo nātra gacchati vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:216.026a: na tv etad anurūpaṃ te yaśaso vā kulasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:216.027a: na hi duḥkheṣu śocanti na prahṛṣyanti carddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:216.028a: tvaṃ tu prākṛtayā buddhyā puraṃdara vikatthase
GE07mbh_12_u:216.028c: yadāham iva bhāvī tvaṃ tadā naivaṃ vadiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:217.001a: punar eva tu taṃ śakraḥ prahasann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:217.002c: lokān pratāpayan sarvān yāsy asmān avitarkayan
GE07mbh_12_u:217.003a: dṛṣṭvā sukṛpaṇāṃ cemām avasthām ātmano bale
GE07mbh_12_u:217.004a: prītiṃ prāpyātulāṃ pūrvaṃ lokāṃś cātmavaśe sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:217.004c: vinipātam imaṃ cādya śocasy āho na śocasi balir uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:217.005-0640_01: garvaṃ hitvā tathā mānaṃ devarāja śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:217.005-0640_02: mayā ca tvānu sadbhāvaṃ pūrvam ācaritaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:217.005c: tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
GE07mbh_12_u:217.006c: tena śakra na śocāmi nāparādhād idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:217.007a: jīvitaṃ ca śarīraṃ ca pretya vai saha jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.007c: ubhe saha vivardhete ubhe saha vinaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.008a: tad īdṛśam idaṃ bhāvam avaśaḥ prāpya kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.008c: yady evam abhijānāmi kā vyathā me vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.009a: bhūtānāṃ nidhanaṃ niṣṭhā srotasām iva sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.009c: naitat samyag vijānanto narā muhyanti vajrabhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:217.010c: te kṛcchraṃ prāpya sīdanti buddhir yeṣāṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:217.011a: buddhilābhe hi puruṣaḥ sarvaṃ nudati kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.012a: tatas tu ye nivartante jāyante vā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.013a: arthasiddhim anarthaṃ ca jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.013c: sukhaduḥkhaphalaṃ caiva na dveṣmi na ca kāmaye
GE07mbh_12_u:217.014a: hataṃ hanti hato hy eva yo naro hanti kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:217.014c: ubhau tau na vijānīto yaś ca hanti hataś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.015a: hatvā jitvā ca maghavan yaḥ kaś cit puruṣāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.015c: akartā hy eva bhavati kartā tv eva karoti tat
GE07mbh_12_u:217.016a: ko hi lokasya kurute vināśaprabhavāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:217.016c: kṛtaṃ hi tat kṛtenaiva kartā tasyāpi cāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.017a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.018a: mahāvidyo 'lpavidyaś ca balavān durbalaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.018c: darśanīyo virūpaś ca subhago durbhagaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.019a: sarvaṃ kālaḥ samādatte gambhīraḥ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.019c: tasmin kālavaśaṃ prāpte kā vyathā me vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.020c: naśyate naṣṭam evāgre labdhavyaṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.021a: nāsya dvīpaḥ kutaḥ pāraṃ nāvāraḥ saṃpradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.021c: nāntam asya prapaśyāmi vidher divyasya cintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:217.022a: yadi me paśyataḥ kālo bhūtāni na vināśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:217.022c: syān me harṣaś ca darpaś ca krodhaś caiva śacīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.023a: tuṣabhakṣaṃ tu māṃ jñātvā praviviktajane gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:217.024a: icchann ahaṃ vikuryāṃ hi rūpāṇi bahudhātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.024c: vibhīṣaṇāni yānīkṣya palāyethās tvam eva me
GE07mbh_12_u:217.025a: kālaḥ sarvaṃ samādatte kālaḥ sarvaṃ prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:217.025c: kālena vidhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śakra pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.026a: purā sarvaṃ pravyathate mayi kruddhe puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:217.026b-0641_01: vidravanti tvayā sārdhaṃ sarva eva divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.026c: avaimi tv asya lokasya dharmaṃ śakra sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.027a: tvam apy evam apekṣasva mātmanā vismayaṃ gamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.027c: prabhavaś ca prabhāvaś ca nātmasaṃsthaḥ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:217.028a: kaumāram eva te cittaṃ tathaivādya yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.029c: āsan sarve mama vaśe tat sarvaṃ vettha vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:217.030a: namas tasyai diśe 'py astu yasyāṃ vairocano baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.031c: evaṃ me niścitā buddhiḥ śāstus tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:217.032a: dṛśyate hi kule jāto darśanīyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:217.032c: duḥkhaṃ jīvan sahāmātyo bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.033a: dauṣkuleyas tathā mūḍho durjātaḥ śakra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.033c: sukhaṃ jīvan sahāmātyo bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.034c: alakṣaṇā virūpā ca subhagā śakra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.035a: naitad asmatkṛtaṃ śakra naitac chakra tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.035c: yat tvam evaṃgato vajrin yad vāpy evaṃgatā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.036a: na karma tava nānyeṣāṃ kuto mama śatakrato
GE07mbh_12_u:217.036c: ṛddhir vāpy atha vā narddhiḥ paryāyakṛtam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:217.037c: śrīmantaṃ dyutimantaṃ ca garjantaṃ ca mamopari
GE07mbh_12_u:217.038a: etac caivaṃ na cet kālo mām ākramya sthito bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:217.038c: pātayeyam ahaṃ tvādya savajram api muṣṭinā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.039c: kālaḥ sthāpayate sarvaṃ kālaḥ pacati vai tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.040a: māṃ ced abhyāgataḥ kālo dānaveśvaram ūrjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.040c: garjantaṃ pratapantaṃ ca kam anyaṃ nāgamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:217.041c: tejāṃsy ekena sarveṣāṃ devarāja hṛtāni me
GE07mbh_12_u:217.042a: aham evodvahāmy āpo visṛjāmi ca vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:217.042c: tapāmi caiva trailokyaṃ vidyotāmy aham eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:217.044a: tad adya vinivṛttaṃ me prabhutvam amarādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:217.045a: nāhaṃ kartā na caiva tvaṃ nānyaḥ kartā śacīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.045c: paryāyeṇa hi bhujyante lokāḥ śakra yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.047a: āhuḥ sarvam idaṃ cintyaṃ janāḥ ke cin manīṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.047c: asyāḥ pañcaiva cintāyāḥ paryeṣyāmi ca pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.047d-0643_01: tatas tāni na paśyāmi kāle tam api vṛtrahan
GE07mbh_12_u:217.048a: gambhīraṃ gahanaṃ brahma mahat toyārṇavaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.048c: anādinidhanaṃ cāhur akṣaraṃ param eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:217.049a: sattveṣu liṅgam āveśya naliṅgam api tat svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.049c: manyante dhruvam evainaṃ ye narās tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.050a: bhūtānāṃ tu viparyāsaṃ manyate gatavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:217.050c: na hy etāvad bhaved gamyaṃ na yasmāt prakṛteḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:217.051a: gatiṃ hi sarvabhūtānām agatvā kva gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:217.051c: yo dhāvatā na hātavyas tiṣṭhann api na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:217.052a: āhuś cainaṃ ke cid agniṃ ke cid āhuḥ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:217.052c: ṛtumāsārdhamāsāṃś ca divasāṃs tu kṣaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.053a: pūrvāhṇam aparāhṇaṃ ca madhyāhnam api cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:217.053c: muhūrtam api caivāhur ekaṃ santam anekadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:217.053e: taṃ kālam avajānīhi yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:217.055a: tvām apy atibalaṃ śakraṃ devarājaṃ balotkaṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:217.056a: ya idaṃ sarvam ādatte tasmāc chakra sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:217.056c: mayā tvayā ca pūrvaiś ca na sa śakyo 'tivartitum
GE07mbh_12_u:217.057a: yām etāṃ prāpya jānīṣe rājaśriyam anuttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:217.057c: sthitā mayīti tan mithyā naiṣā hy ekatra tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:217.058c: māṃ ca lolā parityajya tvām agād vibudhādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059a: maivaṃ śakra punaḥ kārṣīḥ śānto bhavitum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059c: tvām apy evaṃgataṃ tyaktvā kṣipram anyaṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059d-0644_01: kālena coditā śakra mā te garvaḥ śatakrato
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059d-0644_02: kṣamasva kālayogaṃ tam āgataṃ viddhi devapa
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059d-0644_03: nirlajjaś caiva kasmāt tvaṃ devarāja vikatthase
GE07mbh_12_u:217.059d-0644_05: jitavān brahmaṇo lokaṃ ko vidyād āgataṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:218.001c: svarūpiṇīṃ śarīrād dhi tadā niṣkrāmatīṃ śriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:218.002a: tāṃ dīptāṃ prabhayā dṛṣṭvā bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.004a: na hīmām āsurīṃ vedmi na daivīṃ na ca mānuṣīm
GE07mbh_12_u:218.004c: tvam evaināṃ pṛccha mā vā yatheṣṭaṃ kuru vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:218.005a: kā tvaṃ baler apakrāntā rocamānā śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_12_u:218.006a: kā tvaṃ tiṣṭhasi māyeva dīpyamānā svatejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.006c: hitvā daityeśvaraṃ subhru tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.007a: na mā virocano veda na mā vairocano baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.007c: āhur māṃ duḥsahety evaṃ vidhitseti ca māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.008a: bhūtir lakṣmīti mām āhuḥ śrīr ity evaṃ ca vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:218.008c: tvaṃ māṃ śakra na jānīṣe sarve devā na māṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.009a: kim idaṃ tvaṃ mama kṛte utāho balinaḥ kṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:218.009b-0645_01: yad guṇeṣu ca lubdhāsi baler apanayas tu kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.010a: na dhātā na vidhātā māṃ vidadhāti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:218.010c: kālas tu śakra paryāyān mainaṃ śakrāvamanyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.011a: kathaṃ tvayā balis tyaktaḥ kimarthaṃ vā śikhaṇḍini
GE07mbh_12_u:218.011c: kathaṃ ca māṃ na jahyās tvaṃ tan me brūhi śucismite
GE07mbh_12_u:218.012a: satye sthitāsmi dāne ca vrate tapasi caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:218.012c: parākrame ca dharme ca parācīnas tato baliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.013c: abhyasūyad brāhmaṇān vai ucchiṣṭaś cāspṛśad ghṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:218.014a: yajñaśīlaḥ purā bhūtvā mām eva yajatety ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:218.015a: apākṛtā tataḥ śakra tvayi vatsyāmi vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:218.016c: yas tvām eko viṣahituṃ śaknuyāt kamalālaye
GE07mbh_12_u:218.017a: naiva devo na gandharvo nāsuro na ca rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.017c: yo mām eko viṣahituṃ śaktaḥ kaś cit puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:218.018a: tiṣṭhethā mayi nityaṃ tvaṃ yathā tad brūhi me śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:218.018c: tat kariṣyāmi te vākyam ṛtaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:218.019a: sthāsyāmi nityaṃ devendra yathā tvayi nibodha tat
GE07mbh_12_u:218.020a: ahaṃ vai tvā nidhāsyāmi yathāśakti yathābalam
GE07mbh_12_u:218.020c: na tu me 'tikramaḥ syād vai sadā lakṣmi tavāntike
GE07mbh_12_u:218.021c: sā te pādaṃ titikṣeta samarthā hīti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.022a: eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.022c: dvitīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:218.023c: tās te pādaṃ titikṣantām alam āpas titikṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:218.024a: eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yam apsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.024c: tṛtīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:218.025a: yasmin devāś ca yajñāś ca yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.025c: tṛtīyaṃ pādam agnis te sudhṛtaṃ dhārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:218.026a: eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yam agnau pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.026c: caturthaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:218.027a: ye vai santo manuṣyeṣu brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.027c: te te pādaṃ titikṣantām alaṃ santas titikṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:218.028a: eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yaṃ satsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.028c: evaṃ vinihitāṃ śakra bhūteṣu paridhatsva mām śakra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:218.029-0646_02: bhūtāni ca yajanty agnau teṣāṃ tvam anapāyinī
GE07mbh_12_u:218.029a: bhūtānām iha vai yas tvā mayā vinihitāṃ satīm
GE07mbh_12_u:218.029c: upahanyāt sa me dviṣyāt tathā śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:218.030-0647_02: vāsavaṃ pālayām āsa sā devī kamalālayā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.030a: tatas tyaktaḥ śriyā rājā daityānāṃ balir abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:218.030c: yāvat purastāt pratapet tāvad vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:218.031c: tathā madhyaṃdine sūryo astam eti yadā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.031e: punar devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ bhāvi jetāsmi vas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.032c: tadā devāsure yuddhe jetāhaṃ tvāṃ śatakrato
GE07mbh_12_u:218.033a: brahmaṇāsmi samādiṣṭo na hantavyo bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:218.033c: tena te 'haṃ bale vajraṃ na vimuñcāmi mūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:218.034a: yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha daityendra svasti te 'stu mahāsura
GE07mbh_12_u:218.034c: ādityo nāvatapitā kadā cin madhyataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.035a: sthāpito hy asya samayaḥ pūrvam eva svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.036a: ayanaṃ tasya ṣaṇmāsā uttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:218.036c: yena saṃyāti lokeṣu śītoṣṇe visṛjan raviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.037a: evam uktas tu daityendro balir indreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:218.037c: jagāma dakṣiṇām āśām udīcīṃ tu puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:218.038c: vākyaṃ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ kham evāruruhe tadā bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:219.001-0648_01: vyasaneṣu nimagnasya kiṃ śreyas tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:219.001-0648_02: bhūya eva mahābāho sthityarthaṃ taṃ bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:219.001c: śatakratoś ca saṃvādaṃ namuceś ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:219.002a: śriyā vihīnam āsīnam akṣobhyam iva sāgaram
GE07mbh_12_u:219.003a: baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.003c: śriyā vihīno namuce śocasy āho na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:219.004c: amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti nāsti śoke sahāyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.005a: tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
GE07mbh_12_u:219.005c: saṃtāpād bhraśyate rūpaṃ dharmaś caiva sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:219.006a: vinīya khalu tad duḥkham āgataṃ vaimanasyajam
GE07mbh_12_u:219.007a: yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.008a: ekaḥ śāstā na dvitīyo 'sti śāstā; garbhe śayānaṃ puruṣaṃ śāsti śāstā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.008c: tenānuśiṣṭaḥ pravaṇād ivodakaṃ; yathā niyukto 'smi tathā vahāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:219.009a: bhāvābhāvāv abhijānan garīyo; jānāmi śreyo na tu tat karomi
GE07mbh_12_u:219.009c: āśāḥ suśarmyāḥ suhṛdāṃ sukurvan; yathā niyukto 'smi tathā vahāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:219.010a: yathā yathāsya prāptavyaṃ prāpnoty eva tathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.010c: bhavitavyaṃ yathā yac ca bhavaty eva tathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.011a: yatra yatraiva saṃyuṅkte dhātā garbhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.011c: tatra tatraiva vasati na yatra svayam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:219.012a: bhāvo yo 'yam anuprāpto bhavitavyam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:219.012c: iti yasya sadā bhāvo na sa muhyet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:219.013c: duḥkham etat tu yad dveṣṭā kartāham iti manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:219.014a: ṛṣīṃś ca devāṃś ca mahāsurāṃś ca; traividyavṛddhāṃś ca vane munīṃś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:219.014c: kān nāpado nopanamanti loke; parāvarajñās tu na saṃbhramanti
GE07mbh_12_u:219.015a: na paṇḍitaḥ krudhyati nāpi sajjate; na cāpi saṃsīdati na prahṛṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:219.015c: na cārthakṛcchravyasaneṣu śocati; sthitaḥ prakṛtyā himavān ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.016a: yam arthasiddhiḥ paramā na harṣayet; tathaiva kāle vyasanaṃ na mohayet
GE07mbh_12_u:219.016c: sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca tathaiva madhyamaṃ; niṣevate yaḥ sa dhuraṃdharo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.017a: yāṃ yām avasthāṃ puruṣo 'dhigacchet; tasyāṃ rametāparitapyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.017c: evaṃ pravṛddhaṃ praṇuden manojaṃ; saṃtāpam āyāsakaraṃ śarīrāt
GE07mbh_12_u:219.018a: tat sadaḥ sa pariṣatsabhāsadaḥ; prāpya yo na kurute sabhābhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:219.018c: dharmatattvam avagāhya buddhimān; yo 'bhyupaiti sa pumān dhuraṃdharaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.019a: prājñasya karmāṇi duranvayāni; na vai prājño muhyati mohakāle
GE07mbh_12_u:219.019c: sthānāc cyutaś cen na mumoha gautamas; tāvat kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāpya vṛddhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:219.020b-0650_01: na śīlena na vṛttena tathā naivārthasaṃpadā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.020c: alabhyaṃ labhate martyas tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.021a: yad evam anujātasya dhātāro vidadhuḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:219.021c: tad evānubhaviṣyāmi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:219.022a: labdhavyāny eva labhate gantavyāny eva gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:219.022c: prāptavyāny eva prāpnoti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:219.023a: etad viditvā kārtsnyena yo na muhyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.001a: magnasya vyasane kṛcchre kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣasya hi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.002a: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo vaktā loke 'smin bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:220.002c: etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tan me vaktum ihārhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.003a: putradāraiḥ sukhaiś caiva viyuktasya dhanena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:220.003c: magnasya vyasane kṛcchre dhṛtiḥ śreyaskarī nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:220.004a: dhairyeṇa yuktasya sataḥ śarīraṃ na viśīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.004b-0651_01: viśokatā sukhaṃ dhatte dhatte cārogyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.004b-0652_01: vaśyā bhavanti dhairyeṇa na vā rājño na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.004b-0652_02: dhairyavāñ śriyam āpnoti dhairyād dharmo vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.004c: ārogyāc ca śarīrasya sa punar vindate śriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.005a: yasya rājño narās tāta sāttvikīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.005c: tasya sthairyaṃ ca dhairyaṃ ca vyavasāyaś ca karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:220.009a: rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyām api carṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.009c: gandharvair bhujagendraiś ca siddhaiś cānyair vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.010a: caturdantaṃ sudāntaṃ ca vāraṇendraṃ śriyā vṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.011a: sa kadā cit samudrānte kasmiṃś cid girigahvare
GE07mbh_12_u:220.012c: surendram indraṃ daityendro na śuśoca na vivyathe
GE07mbh_12_u:220.013a: dṛṣṭvā tam avikārasthaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ nirbhayaṃ balim
GE07mbh_12_u:220.014a: daitya na vyathase śauryād atha vā vṛddhasevayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.015a: śatrubhir vaśam ānīto hīnaḥ sthānād anuttamāt
GE07mbh_12_u:220.015c: vairocane kim āśritya śocitavye na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.016a: śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāpya svajātīnāṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān
GE07mbh_12_u:220.016c: hṛtasvabalarājyas tvaṃ brūhi kasmān na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.017a: īśvaro hi purā bhūtvā pitṛpaitāmahe pade
GE07mbh_12_u:220.017c: tat tvam adya hṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā sapatnaiḥ kiṃ na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.018a: baddhaś ca vāruṇaiḥ pāśair vajreṇa ca samāhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.018c: hṛtadāro hṛtadhano brūhi kasmān na śocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.019a: bhraṣṭaśrīr vibhavabhraṣṭo yan na śocasi duṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:220.020a: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ bruvantaṃ paribhūya tam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.021a: nigṛhīte mayi bhṛśaṃ śakra kiṃ katthitena te
GE07mbh_12_u:220.021c: vajram udyamya tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyāmi tvāṃ puraṃdara
GE07mbh_12_u:220.022a: aśaktaḥ pūrvam āsīs tvaṃ kathaṃ cic chaktatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.022c: kas tvad anya imā vācaḥ sukrūrā vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.023a: yas tu śatror vaśasthasya śakto 'pi kurute dayām
GE07mbh_12_u:220.023c: hastaprāptasya vīrasya taṃ caiva puruṣaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.024c: ekaḥ prāpnoti vijayam ekaś caiva parābhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.025a: mā ca te bhūt svabhāvo 'yaṃ mayā daivatapuṃgava
GE07mbh_12_u:220.026a: naitad asmatkṛtaṃ śakra naitac chakra tvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.026c: yat tvam evaṃgato vajrin yad vāpy evaṃgatā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.027a: aham āsaṃ yathādya tvaṃ bhavitā tvaṃ yathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.027c: māvamaṃsthā mayā karma duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:220.028c: paryāyeṇāsi śakratvaṃ prāptaḥ śakra na karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.029a: kālaḥ kāle nayati māṃ tvāṃ ca kālo nayaty ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.029c: tenāhaṃ tvaṃ yathā nādya tvaṃ cāpi na yathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.031a: na vidyā na tapo dānaṃ na mitrāṇi na bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.033c: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yac chakra kartāham iti manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.034a: yadi kartā bhavet kartā na kriyeta kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:220.034c: yasmāt tu kriyate kartā tasmāt kartāpy anīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.035a: kālena tvāham ajayaṃ kālenāhaṃ jitas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.035c: gantā gatimatāṃ kālaḥ kālaḥ kalayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.036c: ke cit tvāṃ bahu manyante śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.038a: nityaṃ kālaparītasya mama vā madvidhasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.038c: buddhir vyasanam āsādya bhinnā naur iva sīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.039a: ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ye cānye bhaviṣyanti surādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.039c: te sarve śakra yāsyanti mārgam indraśatair gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.040a: tvām apy evaṃ sudurdharṣaṃ jvalantaṃ parayā śriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.040c: kāle pariṇate kālaḥ kālayiṣyati mām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:220.042a: idaṃ tu labdhvā tvaṃ sthānam ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.043a: na cedam acalaṃ sthānam anantaṃ vāpi kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:220.043c: tvaṃ tu bāliśayā buddhyā mamedam iti manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.044c: mameyam iti mohāt tvaṃ rājaśriyam abhīpsasi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.045a: neyaṃ tava na cāsmākaṃ na cānyeṣāṃ sthirā matā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.045c: atikramya bahūn anyāṃs tvayi tāvad iyaṃ sthitā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.046a: kaṃ cit kālam iyaṃ sthitvā tvayi vāsava cañcalā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.046c: gaur nipānam ivotsṛjya punar anyaṃ gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.047a: rājalokā hy atikrāntā yān na saṃkhyātum utsahe
GE07mbh_12_u:220.048c: tān idānīṃ na paśyāmi yair bhukteyaṃ purā mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:220.049a: pṛthur ailo mayo bhaumo narakaḥ śambaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.050c: hrīniṣedhaḥ suhotraś ca bhūrihā puṣpavān vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.052c: viśvajit pratiśauriś ca vṛṣāṇḍo viṣkaro madhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.053c: daityāś ca kālakhañjāś ca sarve te nairṛtaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:220.054a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pūrve pūrvatarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:220.054c: daityendrā dānavendrāś ca yāṃś cānyān anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:220.056a: sarvaiḥ kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ na tvam ekaḥ śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.058c: sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.063a: tvaṃ caivemāṃ yadā bhuktvā pṛthivīṃ tyakṣyase punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.063c: na śakṣyasi tadā śakra niyantuṃ śokam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.065a: śokakāle śuco mā tvaṃ harṣakāle ca mā hṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.066a: māṃ ced abhyāgataḥ kālaḥ sadāyuktam atandritam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.066c: kṣamasva nacirād indra tvām apy upagamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.067a: trāsayann iva devendra vāgbhis takṣasi mām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:220.067c: saṃyate mayi nūnaṃ tvam ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.068a: kālaḥ prathamam āyān māṃ paścāt tvām anudhāvati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.068c: tena garjasi devendra pūrvaṃ kālahate mayi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.069a: ko hi sthātum alaṃ loke kruddhasya mama saṃyuge
GE07mbh_12_u:220.069c: kālas tu balavān prāptas tena tiṣṭhasi vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:220.070a: yat tad varṣasahasrāntaṃ pūrṇaṃ bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.071a: aham aindrac cyutaḥ sthānāt tvam indraḥ prakṛto divi
GE07mbh_12_u:220.072a: kiṃ hi kṛtvā tvam indro 'dya kiṃ hi kṛtvā cyutā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.072c: kālaḥ kartā vikartā ca sarvam anyad akāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.073c: vidvān prāpyaivam atyarthaṃ na prahṛṣyen na ca vyathet
GE07mbh_12_u:220.074a: tvam eva hīndra vetthāsmān vedāhaṃ tvāṃ ca vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:220.074c: vikatthase māṃ kiṃ baddhaṃ kālena nirapatrapa
GE07mbh_12_u:220.075a: tvam eva hi purā vettha yat tadā pauruṣaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:220.075c: samareṣu ca vikrāntaṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.076a: ādityāś caiva rudrāś ca sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:220.076c: mayā vinirjitāḥ sarve marutaś ca śacīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.077c: sametā vibudhā bhagnās tarasā samare mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.078c: saṭaṅkaśikharā ghorāḥ samare mūrdhni te mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.079a: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ yat kālo duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.079c: na hi tvāṃ notsahe hantuṃ savajram api muṣṭinā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.080c: tena tvā marṣaye śakra durmarṣaṇataras tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.081a: tvaṃ mā pariṇate kāle parītaṃ kālavahninā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.082a: ayaṃ sa puruṣaḥ śyāmo lokasya duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.082c: baddhvā tiṣṭhati māṃ raudraḥ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.083c: vadho bandhaḥ pramokṣaś ca sarvaṃ kālena labhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.084a: nāhaṃ kartā na kartā tvaṃ kartā yas tu sadā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.084c: so 'yaṃ pacati kālo māṃ vṛkṣe phalam ivāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.085a: yāny eva puruṣaḥ kurvan sukhaiḥ kālena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.085c: punas tāny eva kurvāṇo duḥkhaiḥ kālena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.086a: na ca kālena kālajñaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ śocitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.086c: tena śakra na śocāmi nāsti śoke sahāyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.087a: yadā hi śocatāṃ śoko vyasanaṃ nāpakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:220.087c: sāmarthyaṃ śocato nāsti nādya śocāmy ahaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.089a: savajram udyataṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā pāśāṃś ca vāruṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:220.089c: kasyeha na vyathed buddhir mṛtyor api jighāṃsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.090a: sā te na vyathate buddhir acalā tattvadarśinī
GE07mbh_12_u:220.090c: bruvan na vyathase sa tvaṃ vākyaṃ satyaparākrama
GE07mbh_12_u:220.091a: ho hi viśvāsam artheṣu śarīre vā śarīrabhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:220.091c: kartum utsahate loke dṛṣṭvā saṃprasthitaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:220.092a: aham apy evam evainaṃ lokaṃ jānāmy aśāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.093a: na cātra parihāro 'sti kālaspṛṣṭasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:220.094c: anivṛttasya kālasya kṣayaṃ prāpto na mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:220.095c: prayatnenāpy atikrānto dṛṣṭapūrvo na kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:220.096c: kālo na parihāryaś ca na cāsyāsti vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.097a: ahorātrāṃś ca māsāṃś ca kṣaṇān kāṣṭhāḥ kalā lavān
GE07mbh_12_u:220.097c: saṃpiṇḍayati naḥ kālo vṛddhiṃ vārdhuṣiko yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.098a: idam adya kariṣyāmi śvaḥ kartāsmīti vādinam
GE07mbh_12_u:220.099a: idānīṃ tāvad evāsau mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ mṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.099c: iti kālena hriyatāṃ pralāpaḥ śrūyate nṛṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:220.100a: naśyanty arthās tathā bhogāḥ sthānam aiśvaryam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:220.100c: anityam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyo hi duṣkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:220.100d-0655_01: ahaṃ sukhīti nityaṃ ca manasāpi na cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:220.101a: sā te na vyathate buddhir acalā tattvadarśinī
GE07mbh_12_u:220.101c: aham āsaṃ purā ceti manasāpi na budhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.102c: ajyeṣṭham akaniṣṭhaṃ ca kṣipyamāṇo na budhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.104c: kālaṃ paśyati suvyaktaṃ pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.106a: sarvaloko hy ayaṃ manye buddhyā parigatas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:220.106c: viharan sarvatomukto na kva cit pariṣajjase
GE07mbh_12_u:220.107a: rajaś ca hi tamaś ca tvā spṛśato na jitendriyam

GE07mbh_12_u:221.001c: parābhaviṣyataś caiva tvaṃ me brūhi pitāmaha

GE07mbh_12_u:221.006d-0657_02: sa vīkṣamāṇo hṛṣṭātmā taṃ deśam abhijagmivān

GE07mbh_12_u:221.015c: abhyagacchat trilokeśaṃ śakraṃ carṣiṃ ca nāradam

GE07mbh_12_u:221.021a: ahaṃ lakṣmīr ahaṃ bhūtiḥ śrīś cāhaṃ balasūdana

GE07mbh_12_u:221.029c: viprāṇām atithīnāṃ ca teṣāṃ nityam avartata
GE07mbh_12_u:221.032a: amarṣaṇā na cānyonyaṃ spṛhayanti kadā cana

GE07mbh_12_u:221.044a: naivākāśe na paśuṣu nāyonau na ca parvasu

GE07mbh_12_u:221.046c: mitreṣu cānabhidrohaḥ sarvaṃ teṣv abhavat prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:221.047c: aratiś ca viṣādaś ca na spṛhā cāviśanta tān
GE07mbh_12_u:221.048a: sāham evaṃguṇeṣv eva dānaveṣv avasaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.050a: sabhāsadāṃ te vṛddhānāṃ satyāḥ kathayatāṃ kathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:221.053a: tathā dharmād apetena karmaṇā garhitena ye
GE07mbh_12_u:221.053c: mahataḥ prāpnuvanty arthāṃs teṣv eṣām abhavat spṛhā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.054a: ucchaiś cāpy avadan rātrau nīcais tatrāgnir ajvalat
GE07mbh_12_u:221.054c: putrāḥ pitṝn abhyavadan bhāryāś cābhyavadan patīn
GE07mbh_12_u:221.055a: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vṛddham ācāryam atithiṃ gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:221.056a: bhikṣāṃ balim adattvā ca svayam annāni bhuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057a: na śaucam anurudhyanta teṣāṃ sūdajanās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057c: manasā karmaṇā vācā bhaktam āsīd anāvṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0002: eko dāso bhavet teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dāsīdvayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0003: trigavā dānavāḥ ke cic caturojās tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0005: rātrau dadhi ca saktūṃś ca nityam evāvivarjitā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0008: anāthāṃ kṛpaṇāṃ bhāryāṃ ghnanti nityaṃ śapanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0009: śūdrānnapuṣṭā viprās tu nirlajjāś ca bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0013: yajñiyāś ca tathā vṛścyās teṣām āsan durātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0015: tilān aśnanti rātrau ca tailābhyaktāś ca śerate
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0017: karavīraṃ ca te puṣpaṃ dhārayanti ca mohitāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0021: homadhūmo na tatrāsīd vedaghoṣas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:221.057d-022_0022: yajñāś ca na pravartante yathāpūrvaṃ gṛhe gṛhe
GE07mbh_12_u:221.060b-0663_01: kṣudrāḥ saṃskārahīnāś ca nāryo hy udarapoṣaṇāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:221.061c: tathā bhṛtyajanaṃ sarvaṃ paryaśnanti ca dānavāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:221.078d-0664_02: svakarmaṇā ca jāto 'ham ity evaṃvādinas tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:221.087a: tato divaṃ prāpya sahasralocanaḥ; śriyopapannaḥ suhṛdā surarṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:221.087c: rathena haryaśvayujā surarṣabhaḥ; sadaḥ surāṇām abhisatkṛto yayau
GE07mbh_12_u:221.088a: atheṅgitaṃ vajradharasya nāradaḥ; śriyāś ca devyā manasā vicārayan

GE07mbh_12_u:221.090a: yathartu sasyeṣu vavarṣa vāsavo; na dharmamārgād vicacāla kaś cana

GE07mbh_12_u:221.093c: paṭhanti ye viprasadaḥ samāgame; samṛddhakāmāḥ śriyam āpnuvanti te

GE07mbh_12_u:222.002c: prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam

GE07mbh_12_u:222.006a: iti tenānuyuktaḥ sa tam uvāca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.007a: yā gatir yā parā niṣṭhā yā śāntiḥ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:222.007c: tāṃ te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi vai dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:222.008a: nindatsu ca samo nityaṃ praśaṃsatsu ca devala
GE07mbh_12_u:222.008c: nihnuvanti ca ye teṣāṃ samayaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:222.009a: uktāś ca na vivakṣanti vaktāram ahite ratam
GE07mbh_12_u:222.009c: pratihantuṃ na cecchanti hantāraṃ vai manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.010c: na cātītāni śocanti na cainān pratijānate

GE07mbh_12_u:222.012c: manasā karmaṇā vācā nāparādhyanti kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:222.013a: anīrṣavo na cānyonyaṃ vihiṃsanti kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:222.014a: nindāpraśaṃse cātyarthaṃ na vadanti parasya ye
GE07mbh_12_u:222.014c: na ca nindāpraśaṃsābhyāṃ vikriyante kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:222.015a: sarvataś ca praśāntā ye sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:222.016a: na yeṣāṃ bāndhavāḥ santi ye cānyeṣāṃ na bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.016c: amitrāś ca na santy eṣāṃ ye cāmitrā na kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:222.017a: ya evaṃ kurvate martyāḥ sukhaṃ jīvanti sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:222.017e: ye hy ato vicyutā mārgāt te hṛṣyanty udvijanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:222.018a: āsthitas tam ahaṃ mārgam asūyiṣyāmi kaṃ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:222.018c: nindyamānaḥ praśasto vā hṛṣyeyaṃ kena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:222.019a: yad yad icchanti tan mārgam abhigacchanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.021a: avajñātaḥ sukhaṃ śete iha cāmutra cobhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.022a: parāṃ gatiṃ ca ye ke cit prārthayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.022c: etad vrataṃ samāśritya sukham edhanti te janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.023a: sarvataś ca samāhṛtya kratūn sarvāñ jitendriyaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024a: nāsya devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0003: athānyat tu purā vṛttaṃ jaigīṣavyasya dhīmataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0008: yasya svābhāvikī śaktir idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0015: lokapālāḥ samudrāś ca nadyaḥ śailāḥ sarāṃsi ca

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0017: upāsāṃ cakrire devaṃ prajānāṃ patayas tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0022: arthaḥ ko 'thārthaśaktiḥ kā bhagavan brūhi me 'rthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0024: artho 'ham arthaśaktis tvaṃ bhoktāhaṃ bhojyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0025: rūpaṃ viddhi mahābhāge prakṛtis tvaṃ paro hy aham

GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0028: tathāpi vidmas te bhedaṃ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0029: evam uktā tataḥ prāha hy adhikaṃ hy etayor vada
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0030: śreṣṭhaṃ veda mahādeva nama ity eva bhāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0032: jaigīṣavyaḥ smayan prāha hy artha ity eva nādayan
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0035: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ devī ko 'sāv ity abravīd ruṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0036: vākyam asyādya saṃbhaṅktvā proktavān iti śaṃkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0037: tac chrutvā nirgato dhīmān āśramaṃ svaṃ mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0041: bhakto mama sakhā caiva śiṣyaś cātra mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0042: jaigīṣavya iti khyātaḥ proktvāsau nirgataḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0043: tac chrutvā sātha saṃkruddhā na nyāyyaṃ tena vai kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0044: vikṛtāhaṃ tvayā deva muninā ca tathā kṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0045: atajjñād atha deveśa madhye prāptaṃ na tac chrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0046: tac chrutvā bhagavān āha mahādevaḥ pinākabhṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0047: nirapekṣo munir yogī mām upāśritya saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0049: tasmāt kṣamasva taṃ devi rakṣitavyas tvayā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0050: ity uktā prāha sā devī munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0052: tatheti coktvā tāṃ devo vṛṣam āruhya satvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0056: dehaprāvaraṇārthaṃ vai saṃsaran sa tadā muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0058: punaḥ sa pūrvavat kanthāṃ sūcyā sūtreṇa sūcayat
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0059: tam āha bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ kiṃ pradāsyāmi te mune
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0060: vṛṇīṣva mattaḥ sarvaṃ tvaṃ jaigīṣavya yadīcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0063: kṛtārthaḥ paripūrṇo 'haṃ yat te kāryaṃ tu gamyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0064: prahasaṃs tu punaḥ śarvo vṛṇīṣveti tam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0065: avaśyaṃ hi varo mattaḥ śrāvyaṃ varam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0066: jaigīṣavyas tam āhedaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca tvayā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0068: tataḥ prahasya bhagavān gaurīm ālokya śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0070: etat te kathitaṃ rājan yasmāt tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:222.024d-024_0071: nirdvaṃdvā yogino nityāḥ sarvaśas te svayaṃbhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.001c: guṇaiḥ sarvair upetaś ca ko nv asti bhuvi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.003c: manye sa guṇasaṃpanno brūhi tan mama pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.004a: kukurādhipa yān manye śṛṇu tān me vivakṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.004b-0666_01: yac chrutvā pārameṣṭhyena bhavec cāpy amalā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.005d-0667_02: adīrghasūtraḥ śūraś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.006a: tapasvī nārado bāḍhaṃ vāci nāsya vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.006c: kāmād vā yadi vā lobhāt tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.007c: ṛjuś ca satyavādī ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.008a: tejasā yaśasā buddhyā nayena vinayena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.008c: janmanā tapasā vṛddhas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.009c: suvākyaś cāpy anīrṣyaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.010a: kalyānaṃ kurute bāḍhaṃ pāpam asmin na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:223.010c: na prīyate parān arthais tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.011c: titikṣur anavajñaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.012a: samatvād dhi priyo nāsti nāpriyaś ca kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:223.014a: nārthe na dharme kāme vā bhūtapūrvo 'sya vigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.014c: doṣāś cāsya samucchinnās tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.017a: samādhir nāsya mānārthe nātmānaṃ stauti karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:223.018a: lokasya vividhaṃ vṛttaṃ prakṛteś cāpy akutsayan
GE07mbh_12_u:223.019a: nāsūyaty āgamaṃ kaṃ cit svaṃ tapo nopajīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:223.020a: kṛtaśramaḥ kṛtaprajño na ca tṛptaḥ samādhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.021a: sāpatrapaś ca yuktaś ca suneyaḥ śreyase paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.022a: na hṛṣyaty arthalābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023c: kālajñaṃ ca nayajñaṃ ca kaḥ priyaṃ na kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0001: ity uktaḥ saṃpraśasyainam ugraseno gato gṛhāt
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0003: kadā cit tatra bhagavān praviveśa mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0004: tam abhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ tūṣṇīm āste janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0005: taṃ khinnam iva saṃlakṣya keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0006: kim idaṃ keśava tava vaimanasyaṃ janārdana śrīvāsudeva uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0007: abhūtapūrvaṃ govinda tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0009: apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0010: sa tvaṃ suhṛc ca vidvāṃś ca jitātmā śrotum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0011: apy etad dhṛdi yad duḥkhaṃ tad bhavāñ śrotum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0012: dāsyam aiśvaryavādena jñātīnāṃ ca karomy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0014: divyā api tathā bhogā dattās teṣāṃ mayā pṛthak nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0015: tathāpi ca dviṣanto māṃ vartante ca parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0016: anāyasena śastreṇa parimṛjyānumṛjya ca bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0017: jihvām uddhara caiteṣāṃ na vakṣyanti tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0018: anāyasaṃ kathaṃ vindyāṃ śastraṃ munivarottama nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0019: yenaiṣām uddhare jihvāṃ brūhi tan me yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0020: gohiraṇyaṃ ca vāsāṃsi ratnādyaṃ yad dhanaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0021: āsye prakṣipa caiteṣāṃ śastram etad anāyasam
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0023: ākhyātaṃ śastram etad dhi tena chindhi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0024: tavaiśvaryapradānāni ślāghyam eṣāṃ vacāṃsi ca bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0025: samarthaṃ tvām abhijñāya pravadanti ca te narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0026: tataḥ prahasya bhagavān saṃpūjya ca mahāmunim
GE07mbh_12_u:223.023d-025_0029: pṛṣṭavān asi yan māṃ tvaṃ tad uktaṃ rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:224.001c: dhyānaṃ karma ca kālaṃ ca tathaivāyur yuge yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.002a: lokatattvaṃ ca kārtsnyena bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:224.002c: sargaś ca nidhanaṃ caiva kuta etat pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.002d-0668_01: bhedakaṃ bhedatattvaṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ mataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.003a: yadi te 'nugrahe buddhir asmāsv iha satāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:224.003c: etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:224.004a: pūrvaṃ hi kathitaṃ śrutvā bhṛgubhāṣitam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.004c: bharadvājasya viprarṣes tato me buddhir uttamā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.005c: tato bhūyas tu pṛcchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:224.006c: jagau yad bhagavān vyāsaḥ putrāya paripṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009b-0669_01: jñānaṃ brahma ca yogaṃ ca gavātmakam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009b-0669_02: tritaye tv enam āyāti tathā hy eṣo 'pi vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009b-0669_03: kenaiva ca vibhāgaḥ syāt turīyo lakṣaṇair vinā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009b-0669_04: jñānajñeyāntare ko 'sau ko 'yaṃ bhāvas tu bhedavat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009b-0669_05: yaj jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva teṣāṃ kartāram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:224.009c: brāhmaṇasya ca yat kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010a: tasmai provāca tat sarvaṃ pitā putrāya pṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0001: pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvat kīrtayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0004: jñānaṃ tad ubhayaṃ vittvā satyaṃ ca paramaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0005: brahmeti cābhivikhyātaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0007: āsīd ādau tatas tv āhuḥ prādhānyam iti tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0008: triguṇāṃ tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ prakṛtiṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0009: tad īdṛśam anādyantam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0010: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahmāgre vikṛtaṃ ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0011: tad vai pradhānam uddiṣṭaṃ trisūkṣmaṃ triguṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0012: samyag yogaguṇaṃ svasthaṃ tad icchākṣobhitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0018: manas tadvad aśeṣasya parāt para iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0019: sṛṣṭvā praviśya tat tasmin kṣobhayām āsa viṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0020: sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhā mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0021: pradhānatattvād udbhūto mahattvāc ca mahān smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0024: puruṣaś cāprameyātmā sa eva iti gīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0025: triguṇo 'sau mahājñātaḥ pradhāna iti vai śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0026: sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0030: bhūtādiḥ sa vikurvāṇaḥ śiṣṭaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0033: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sparśamātraṃ sasarja ha
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0035: sasarja vāyus tenāsau pīḍyamāna iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0037: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāgnim iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0039: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu rasamātraṃ sasarja ha
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0041: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāmbha iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0043: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu gandhaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0044: sasarja gandhaṃ tanmātram āvṛṇot karakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0045: tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu kāṭhinyaṃ ca sasarja ha
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0047: ammayaṃ sarvam evedam āpas tastambhire punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0049: bhūtānāṃ mūrtir evaiṣām annaṃ caiṣāṃ matā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0050: tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tu tanmātrā tanmātrā iti te smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0052: ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0055: eka eva tridhā bhinnaḥ karoti vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0057: rudro hanti jaganmūrtiḥ kāla eṣa kriyābudhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.010d-026_0060: kālātmanā tv idaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ śrūyate hi yat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.011a: anādyantam ajaṃ divyam ajaraṃ dhruvam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.012a: kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva; triṃśat tu kāṣṭhā gaṇayet kalāṃ tām
GE07mbh_12_u:224.012c: triṃśat kalāś cāpi bhaven muhūrto; bhāgaḥ kalāyā daśamaś ca yaḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:224.013a: triṃśan muhūrtaś ca bhaved ahaś ca; rātriś ca saṃkhyā munibhiḥ praṇītā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.013c: māsaḥ smṛto rātryahanī ca triṃśat; saṃvatsaro dvādaśamāsa uktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.013e: saṃvatsaraṃ dve ayane vadanti; saṃkhyāvido dakṣiṇam uttaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:224.014c: rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇām ahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.015a: pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.016a: daive rātryahanī varṣaṃ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.017a: ye te rātryahanī pūrve kīrtite daivalaukike
GE07mbh_12_u:224.017c: tayoḥ saṃkhyāya varṣāgraṃ brāhme vakṣyāmy ahaḥkṣape
GE07mbh_12_u:224.018c: kṛte tretāyuge caiva dvāpare ca kalau tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.019a: catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.019c: tasya tāvac chatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.021c: etad brahmavidāṃ tāta viditaṃ brahma śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.022a: catuṣpāt sakalo dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiva kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.022c: nādharmeṇāgamaḥ kaś cit paras tasya pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.023a: itareṣv āgamād dharmaḥ pādaśas tv avaropyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.023b-0670_01: satyaṃ śaucaṃ tathāyuś ca dharmaś cāpaiti pādaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.024c: kṛte tretādiṣv eteṣāṃ pādaśo hrasate vayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.025a: vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ca naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.025c: āyūṃṣi cāśiṣaś caiva vedasyaiva ca yat phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.027a: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.027c: dvāpare yajñam evāhur dānam eva kalau yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.028c: sahasraṃ parivṛttaṃ tad brāhmaṃ divasam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.029a: rātris tāvat tithī brāhmī tadādau viśvam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.031c: sṛjate ca mahad bhūtaṃ tasmād vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.032a: brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.033a: ahar mukhe vibuddhaḥ san sṛjate vidyayā jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.033c: agra eva mahābhūtam āśu vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.035c: ākāśaṃ jāyate tasmāt tasya śabdo guṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.036c: balavāñ jāyate vāyus tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.037a: vāyor api vikurvāṇāj jyotir bhūtaṃ tamonudam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.037c: rociṣṇu jāyate tatra tad rūpaguṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.038c: adbhyo gandhaguṇā bhūmiḥ pūrvaiṣā sṛṣṭir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.039c: teṣāṃ yāvat tithaṃ yad yat tat tat tāvad guṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.040a: upalabhyāpsu ced gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:224.040c: pṛthivyām eva taṃ vidyād āpo vāyuṃ ca saṃśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.041a: ete tu sapta puruṣā nānāviryāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:224.043c: tad āviśanti bhūtāni mahānti saha karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.045a: sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.046a: lokān nadīḥ samudrāṃś ca diśaḥ śailān vanaspatīn
GE07mbh_12_u:224.046e: avyayaṃ ca vyayaṃ caiva dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.047a: teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāk sṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire
GE07mbh_12_u:224.047c: tāny eva pratipadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.048c: ato yan manyate dhātā tasmāt tat tasya rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.049c: viniyogaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ dhātaiva vidadhāty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:224.050a: ke cit puruṣakāraṃ tu prāhuḥ karmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.050c: daivam ity apare viprāḥ svabhāvaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.051c: traya ete 'pṛthagbhūtā navivekaṃ tu ke cana
GE07mbh_12_u:224.052a: evam etac ca naivaṃ ca yad bhūtaṃ sṛjate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.053a: tapo niḥśreyasaṃ jantos tasya mūlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.053c: tena sarvān avāpnoti yān kāmān manasecchati
GE07mbh_12_u:224.054a: tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtaṃ sṛjate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.054c: sa tadbhūtaś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.055d-0671_01: ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.056a: ṛṣīṇāṃ nāmadheyāni yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.056b-0672_01: nānārūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.056b-0672_03: nāmadheyāni carṣīṇāṃ yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.056c: śarvaryanteṣu jātānāṃ tāny evaibhyo dadāti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.057c: ātmasiddhis tu vedeṣu procyate daśabhiḥ kramaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.059c: ātmasiddhis tu vijñātā jahāti prāyaśo balam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.060a: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:224.062a: tretāyuge vidhis tv eṣāṃ yajñānāṃ na kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.062c: dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti yajñāḥ kaliyuge tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.063c: kāmyāṃ puṣṭiṃ pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapobhis tapa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:224.064a: tretāyāṃ tu samastās te prādurāsan mahābalāḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:224.065c: saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.067a: kṛte yuge yas tu dharmo brāhmaṇeṣu pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:224.069a: yathā viśvāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā bhūyāṃsi prāvṛṣi
GE07mbh_12_u:224.069c: sṛjyante jaṅgamasthāni tathā dharmā yuge yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:224.070c: dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā brahmāharātriṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:224.071c: kīrtitaṃ yat purastāt te tat sūte cātti ca prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.072a: dadhāti prabhave sthānaṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyamo yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:224.073a: sargaḥ kālaḥ kriyā vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:224.073c: proktaṃ te putra sarvaṃ vai yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:224.075a: divi sūryās tathā sapta dahanti śikhino 'rciṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:224.075c: sarvam etat tadārcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:225.001a: pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni jaṅgamāni dhruvāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:225.001c: tāny evāgre pralīyante bhūmitvam upayānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:225.002a: tataḥ pralīne sarvasmin sthāvare jaṅgame tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:225.003a: bhūmer api guṇaṃ gandham āpa ādadate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:225.004c: sarvam evedam āpūrya tiṣṭhanti ca caranti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:225.005a: apām api guṇāṃs tāta jyotir ādadate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:225.005c: āpas tadā āttaguṇā jyotiṣy uparamanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:225.006c: sarvam evedam arcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:225.007a: jyotiṣo 'pi guṇaṃ rūpaṃ vāyur ādadate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:225.007c: praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:225.008a: tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbhavam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:225.008c: adhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:225.009a: vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:225.009c: praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
GE07mbh_12_u:225.009d-0673_01: arūpam arasasparśam agandhaṃ na ca mūrtimat
GE07mbh_12_u:225.010b-0674_01: grasate ca yadā so 'pi śāmyati pratisaṃcare
GE07mbh_12_u:225.010c: manaso vyaktam avyaktaṃ brāhmaḥ sa pratisaṃcaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:225.011a: tad ātmaguṇam āviśya mano grasati candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:225.012a: taṃ tu kālena mahatā saṃkalpaḥ kurute vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:225.012c: cittaṃ grasati saṃkalpas tac ca jñānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:225.013a: kālo girati vijñānaṃ kālo balam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:225.013c: balaṃ kālo grasati tu taṃ vidvān kurute vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:225.014a: ākāśasya tadā ghoṣaṃ taṃ vidvān kurute ''tmani
GE07mbh_12_u:225.014c: tad avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tac chāśvatam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:225.015a: yathāvat kīrtitaṃ samyag evam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:225.016c: yugasāhasrayor ādāv ahno rātryās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:226.001a: bhūtagrāme niyuktaṃ yat tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:226.001c: brāhmaṇasya tu yat kṛtyaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:226.002c: kriyā syād ā samāvṛtter ācārye vedapārage
GE07mbh_12_u:226.005a: prajāsargeṇa dāraiś ca brahmacaryeṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.005c: vane gurusakāśe vā yatidharmeṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.006a: gṛhasthas tv eva sarveṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mūlam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:226.006c: tatra pakvakaṣāyo hi dāntaḥ sarvatra sidhyati

GE07mbh_12_u:226.007c: athānyān āśramān paścāt pūto gacchati karmabhiḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:226.011c: na vṛthā pratigṛhṇīyān na ca dadyāt kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_12_u:226.013a: gṛham āvasato hy asya nānyat tīrthaṃ pratigrahāt
GE07mbh_12_u:226.014c: dravyāṇām atiśaktyāpi deyam eṣāṃ kṛtād api

GE07mbh_12_u:226.015c: uccaiḥśravasam apy aśvaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ satāṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.015d-0674A_01: dattvā jagāma brahmādau lokān daivair abhiṣṭutān
GE07mbh_12_u:226.016c: svaiḥ prāṇair brāhmaṇaprāṇān paritrāya divaṃ gataḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:226.022a: sāṃkṛtiś ca tathātreyaḥ śiṣyebhyo brahma nirguṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:226.025c: ramyam āvasathaṃ caiva dattvāmuṃ lokam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.026a: nimī rāṣṭraṃ ca vaideho jāmadagnyo vasuṃdharām
GE07mbh_12_u:226.026c: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau cāpi gayaś corvīṃ sapattanām
GE07mbh_12_u:226.027c: vasiṣṭho jīvayām āsa prajāpatir iva prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.028a: karaṃdhamasya putras tu marutto nṛpatis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:226.028c: kanyām aṅgirase dattvā divam āśu jagāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:226.029a: brahmadattaś ca pāñcālyo rājā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.029c: nidhiṃ śaṅkhaṃ dvijāgryebhyo dattvā lokān avāptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:226.030c: madayantīṃ priyāṃ dattvā tayā saha divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.031a: sahasrajic ca rājarṣiḥ prāṇān iṣṭān mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.032a: sarvakāmaiś ca saṃpūrṇaṃ dattvā veśma hiraṇmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:226.033a: nāmnā ca dyutimān nāma śālvarājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:226.033c: dattvā rājyam ṛcīkāya gato lokān anuttamān
GE07mbh_12_u:226.034a: madirāśvaś ca rājarṣir dattvā kanyāṃ sumadhyamām
GE07mbh_12_u:226.035a: lomapādaś ca rājarṣiḥ śāntāṃ dattvā sutāṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:226.036a: dattvā śatasahasraṃ tu gavāṃ rājā prasenajit
GE07mbh_12_u:226.037a: ete cānye ca bahavo dānena tapasā ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:226.038a: teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhitā kīrtir yāvat sthāsyati medinī
GE07mbh_12_u:227.001d-0675_01: tiṣṭhaty eteṣu bhagavān ṣaṭsu karmasu saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.002a: vedavādeṣu kuśalā hy adhyātmakuśalāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:227.003a: evaṃ dharmeṇa varteta kriyāḥ śiṣṭavad ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:227.003c: asaṃrodhena bhūtānāṃ vṛttiṃ lipseta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.005a: tiṣṭhaty eteṣu gṛhavān ṣaṭsu karmasu sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.005c: pañcabhiḥ satataṃ yajñaiḥ śraddadhāno yajeta ca

GE07mbh_12_u:227.007a: dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñas tapo hrīr ārjavaṃ damaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:227.009a: agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cārced devatāḥ praṇameta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:227.017c: plavair aplavavanto hi kiṃ kariṣyanty acetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.018a: upapannaṃ hi yat prājño nistaren netaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.018c: dūrato guṇadoṣau hi prājñaḥ sarvatra paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:227.019c: aprājño na taraty eva yo hy āste na sa gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:227.020c: kāmagrāhagṛhītasya jñānam apy asya na plavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:227.021c: etad unmajjanaṃ tasya yad ayaṃ brāhmaṇo bhavet

GE07mbh_12_u:227.030c: dharmaṃ cādharmasaṃkāśaṃ śocann iva karoti saḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:228.001a: atha ced rocayed etad druhyeta manasā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:228.001c: unmajjaṃś ca nimajjaṃś ca jñānavān plavavān bhavet

GE07mbh_12_u:228.002c: nābudhās tārayanty anyān ātmānaṃ vā kathaṃ cana

GE07mbh_12_u:228.004a: cakṣur ācāravit prājño manasā darśanena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:228.004c: yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā ya icchej jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:228.004e: jñānena yacched ātmānaṃ ya icchec chāntim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.005c: yadi vā sarvavedajño yadi vāpy anṛco 'japaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:228.006c: yadi vā puruṣavyāghro yadi vā klaibyadhāritā
GE07mbh_12_u:228.007c: evaṃ hy etena yogena yuñjāno 'py ekam antataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.013a: sapta yo dhāraṇāḥ kṛtsnā vāgyataḥ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:228.013c: pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvataś cānyā yāvatyas tāḥ pradhāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.014a: kramaśaḥ pārthivaṃ yac ca vāyavyaṃ khaṃ tathā payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.014c: jyotiṣo yat tad aiśvaryam ahaṃkārasya buddhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.015c: vikramāś cāpi yasyaite tathā yuṅkte sa yogataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.017a: śaiśiras tu yathā dhūmaḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃśrayate nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.017c: tathā dehād vimuktasya pūrvarūpaṃ bhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:228.020a: atha śvetāṃ gatiṃ gatvā vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy ajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.020c: aśuklaṃ cetasaḥ saukṣmyam avyaktaṃ brahmaṇo 'sya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:228.021a: eteṣv api hi jāteṣu phalajātāni me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:228.023a: pṛthivīṃ kampayaty eko guṇo vāyor iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.024a: varṇato gṛhyate cāpi kāmāt pibati cāśayān
GE07mbh_12_u:228.024c: na cāsya tejasā rūpaṃ dṛśyate śāmyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:228.025c: ṣaṇṇām ātmani buddhau ca jitāyāṃ prabhavaty atha
GE07mbh_12_u:228.026a: nirdoṣā pratibhā hy enaṃ kṛtsnā samabhivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:228.027c: tatrāvyaktamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa me
GE07mbh_12_u:228.027e: tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva saṃkhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:228.028c: yoge sāṃkhye 'pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs tatra me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:228.029a: proktaṃ tad vyaktam ity eva jāyate vardhate ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:228.029c: jīryate mriyate caiva caturbhir lakṣaṇair yutam
GE07mbh_12_u:228.030a: viparītam ato yat tu tad avyaktam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:228.030c: dvāv ātmānau ca vedeṣu siddhānteṣv apy udāhṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:228.031c: vyaktam avyaktajaṃ caiva tathā buddham athetarat
GE07mbh_12_u:228.031e: sattvaṃ kṣetrajña ity etad dvayam apy anudarśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:228.032a: dvāv ātmānau ca vedeṣu viṣayeṣu ca rajyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.033c: naiva krudhyati na dveṣṭi nānṛtā bhāṣate giraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.034a: ākruṣṭas tāḍitaś caiva maitreṇa dhyāti nāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:228.036a: alolupo 'vyatho dānto na kṛtī na nirākṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.036d-0679_03: aspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo brahmacarye dṛḍhaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:228.037a: atha yogād vimucyante kāraṇair yair nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:228.038a: ity eṣā bhāvajā buddhiḥ kathitā te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.001a: atha jñānaplavaṃ dhīro gṛhītvā śāntim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.001c: unmajjaṃś ca nimajjaṃś ca jñānam evābhisaṃśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:229.002a: kiṃ taj jñānam atho vidyā yayā nistarati dvayam
GE07mbh_12_u:229.002c: pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛttir iti caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:229.003a: yas tu paśyet svabhāvena vinā bhāvam acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.003c: puṣyate ca punaḥ sarvān prajñayā muktahetukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.004c: pūtvā tṛṇabusīkāṃ vai te labhante na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:229.005a: ye cainaṃ pakṣam āśritya vartayanty alpacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.005c: svabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ jñātvā na śreyaḥ prāpnuvanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:229.008a: ākrīḍānāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ ca gadānām agadasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:229.010c: vidyayā tāta sṛṣṭānāṃ vidyaiva paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.012c: upapannaṃ hi yac ceṣṭā viśiṣyeta viśeṣyayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.014c: pārthivāni viśiṣṭāni tāni hy annāni bhuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:229.015a: pārthivāni dvayāny āhur madhyamāny uttamāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:229.017c: vedajñāni viśiṣṭāni vedo hy eṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.021a: dharmadvayaṃ hi yo veda sa sarvaḥ sarvadharmavid
GE07mbh_12_u:229.021c: sa tyāgī satyasaṃkalpaḥ sa tu kṣāntaḥ sa īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.022a: dharmajñānapratiṣṭhaṃ hi taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.023c: jānanti tān namasyāmas te devās tāta te dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:229.024a: teṣu viśvam idaṃ bhūtaṃ sāgraṃ ca jagad āhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:229.024c: teṣāṃ māhātmyabhāvasya sadṛśaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:229.025a: ādiṃ te nidhanaṃ caiva karma cātītya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.001c: jñānavān eva karmāṇi kurvan sarvatra sidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:230.002a: tatra cen na bhaved evaṃ saṃśayaḥ karmaniścaye
GE07mbh_12_u:230.002c: kiṃ nu karma svabhāvo 'yaṃ jñānaṃ karmeti vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.003a: tatra ceha vivitsā syāj jñānaṃ cet puruṣaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:230.004a: pauruṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ ke cid āhuḥ karmasu mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.004c: daivam eke praśaṃsanti svabhāvaṃ cāpare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.005c: trayam etat pṛthagbhūtam avivekaṃ tu ke cana
GE07mbh_12_u:230.006a: evam etan na cāpy evam ubhe cāpi na cāpy ubhe

GE07mbh_12_u:230.007c: tapasvinaḥ praśāntāś ca sattvasthāś ca kṛte yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:230.008c: kāmadveṣau pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapaḥ kṛta upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:230.009c: tena sarvān avāpnoti kāmān yān manasecchati
GE07mbh_12_u:230.010a: tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtvā sṛjate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:230.010c: tadbhūtaś ca tataḥ sarvo bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.013c: kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:230.014a: tretādau sakalā vedā yajñā varṇāśramās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:230.014c: saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:230.015a: dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti vedāḥ kaliyuge tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:230.015c: dṛśyante nāpi dṛśyante kaler ante punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.016c: gavāṃ bhūmeś ca ye cāpām oṣadhīnāṃ ca ye rasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:230.018a: yathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vṛṣṭir bhaumāni varṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:230.018c: sṛjate sarvato 'ṅgāni tathā vedā yuge yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:230.019c: kīrtitaṃ tat purastān me yataḥ saṃyānti yānti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:230.021a: sargaḥ kālo dhṛtir vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:230.021c: etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:231.003c: sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoge etat pṛṣṭo 'bhidhatsva me
GE07mbh_12_u:231.004c: yenopāyena puruṣais tac ca vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:231.005c: nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.007a: bhūmer deho jalāt sāro jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:231.008a: krānte viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe 'gnir bhuktam archati
GE07mbh_12_u:231.008c: karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:231.009a: karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:231.010a: śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:231.010c: indriyāṇi pṛthak tv arthān manaso darśayanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:231.011a: indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte vaśyān yanteva vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.011c: manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.012c: niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:231.013c: prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehinām
GE07mbh_12_u:231.014a: āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanā
GE07mbh_12_u:231.014c: sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.015a: evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehe vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.015c: manīṣī manasā vipraḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:231.016a: na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.019c: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.020a: sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:231.020c: vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_12_u:231.021c: yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:231.022a: yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:231.022c: ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:231.024c: yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathaiva sumahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.025c: yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas taṃ na vedeha kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.026a: na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca tiraḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.026b-0681_01: indriyair api buddhyā vā gṛhyate na kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.026c: na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kaś cit kutaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.027a: sarve 'ntaḥsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:231.027c: yaḥ sahasraṃ samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.028a: naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.028c: tasmāt sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti sthūlataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.030a: tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:231.030c: tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:231.031a: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvaidhībhāvo 'yam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:231.031c: kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ hy amṛtam akṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:231.032a: navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso hi niyato vaśī
GE07mbh_12_u:231.032c: īśaḥ sarvasya bhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:231.034a: haṃsoktaṃ cākṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:231.034c: tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī
GE07mbh_12_u:232.001a: pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvad iha tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.001c: sāṃkhyanyāyena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.002a: yogakṛtyaṃ tu te kṛtsnaṃ vartayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:232.002e: ātmano dhyāyinas tāta jñānam etad anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:232.004a: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.004c: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:232.006a: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.006c: cakṣuḥ śrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.007c: evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.008a: agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cārced devatāḥ praṇameta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:232.009a: brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ rasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.010a: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.011c: sidhyanti cāsya sarvārthā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:232.012e: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:232.014a: jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yad ekaṃ chidram indriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:232.014c: tato 'sya sravati prajñā dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam
GE07mbh_12_u:232.015a: manas tu pūrvam ādadyāt kumīnān iva matsyahā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.015c: tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavit
GE07mbh_12_u:232.016a: tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.016c: tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:232.017a: pañca jñānena saṃdhāya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.017e: prasīdanti ca saṃsthāya tadā brahma prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:232.018a: vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimān
GE07mbh_12_u:232.018e: sarvaṃ ca tatra sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:232.019a: taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.023a: kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge traikālyaṃ niyato muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.023c: giriśṛṅge tathā caitye vṛkṣāgreṣu ca yojajet
GE07mbh_12_u:232.024c: ekāgraś cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvejayen manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.025c: taṃ taṃ yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.027a: nābhiṣvajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:232.028a: yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam apavādayet
GE07mbh_12_u:232.028c: samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:232.029a: na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:232.031c: etasmin nirato mārge viramen na vimohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.032a: api varṇāv akṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:232.032c: tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:232.033a: ajaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ sanātanaṃ; yad indriyair upalabhate naro 'calaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:232.033c: aṇor aṇīyo mahato mahattaraṃ; tadātmanā paśyati yukta ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:232.034a: idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ mahātmano; yathāvad uktaṃ manasānudṛśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:232.034c: avekṣya ceyāt parameṣṭhisātmyatāṃ; prayānti yāṃ bhūtagatiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.001a: yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:233.001c: kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:233.002a: etad vai śrotum icchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:233.004a: yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:233.004c: śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ putra gahvaraṃ hy etad antaram
GE07mbh_12_u:233.005a: asti dharma iti proktaṃ nāstīty atraiva yo vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:233.005c: tasya pakṣasya sadṛśam idaṃ mama bhaved atha
GE07mbh_12_u:233.006a: dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.007a: karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā tu pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:233.007c: tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.008c: vidyayā jāyate nityam avyayo hy avyayātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.009a: karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhitarā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.010c: na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:233.011c: vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:233.012a: yatra gatvā na mriyate yatra gatvā na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:233.012c: na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:233.013a: yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:233.014a: dvaṃdvair yatra na bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:233.014c: samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.015c: viddhi candramasaṃ darśe sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:233.016c: navajaṃ śaśinaṃ dṛṣṭvā vakraṃ tantum ivāmbare
GE07mbh_12_u:233.017c: mūrtimān iti taṃ viddhi tāta karmaguṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:233.017d-0683_01: tasmin yaḥ saṃsthito hy agnir nityaṃ sthālyām ivāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:233.018a: devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasminn abbindur iva puṣkare
GE07mbh_12_u:233.019a: tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imān
GE07mbh_12_u:233.020a: sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti; sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam
GE07mbh_12_u:233.020c: tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti; prāvartayad yo bhuvanāni sapta
GE07mbh_12_u:234.001a: kṣarāt prabhṛti yaḥ sargaḥ saguṇānīndriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:234.002a: bhūya eva tu loke 'smin sadvṛttiṃ vṛttihaitukīm
GE07mbh_12_u:234.002c: yayā santaḥ pravartante tad icchāmy anuvarṇitam
