GE07mbh_12_u:234.003a: vede vacanam uktaṃ tu kuru karma tyajeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:234.003c: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tac ca vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:234.004c: kṛtvā buddhiṃ viyuktātmā tyakṣyāmy ātmānam avyathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.005a: yaiṣā vai vihitā vṛttiḥ purastād brahmaṇā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:234.006c: ātmanaś ca hṛdi śreyas tv anviccha manasātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:234.007a: vane mūlaphalāśī ca tapyan suvipulaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.008c: kāle prāpte caran bhaikṣaṃ kalpate brahmabhūyase
GE07mbh_12_u:234.009c: araṇye vicaraikākī yena kena cid āśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.010c: pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.011a: ity etac chrotum icchāmi bhagavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:234.012a: ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ gandhavatyāḥ sutaḥ sutam
GE07mbh_12_u:234.014a: eko ya āśramān etān anutiṣṭhed yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:234.015a: catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī brahmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:234.016c: gurau vā guruputre vā vased dharmārthakovidaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.017c: dakṣiṇo nāpavādī syād āhūto gurum āśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:234.018c: yac ca śiṣyeṇa kartavyaṃ kāryaṃ dāsena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.019a: kṛtam ity eva tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭheta pārśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.020a: śucir dakṣo guṇopeto brūyād iṣur ivātvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.021c: na tiṣṭhati tathāsīta nāsupte prasvapeta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:234.022a: uttānābhyāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ pādāv asya mṛdu spṛśet
GE07mbh_12_u:234.023a: abhivādya guruṃ brūyād adhīṣva bhagavann iti
GE07mbh_12_u:234.023c: idaṃ kariṣye bhagavann idaṃ cāpi kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:234.023d-0684_01: brahmaṃs tad api kartāsmi yad bhavān vakṣyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.024a: iti sarvam anujñāpya nivedya gurave dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:234.024c: kuryāt kṛtvā ca tat sarvam ākhyeyaṃ gurave punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.025a: yāṃs tu gandhān rasān vāpi brahmacārī na sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:234.025c: seveta tān samāvṛtta iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.026a: ye ke cid vistareṇoktā niyamā brahmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.026c: tān sarvān anugṛhṇīyād bhavec cānapago guroḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:234.027a: sa evaṃ gurave prītim upahṛtya yathābalam
GE07mbh_12_u:234.027c: āśrameṣv āśrameṣv evaṃ śiṣyo varteta karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:234.029a: dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.001a: dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhī gṛhe vaset
GE07mbh_12_u:235.001c: dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya suvrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.003c: teṣāṃ paraḥ paro jyāyān dharmato lokajittamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.004a: ṣaṭkarmā vartayaty ekas tribhir anyaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:235.004c: dvābhyām ekaś caturthas tu brahmasatre vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.005a: nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūn
GE07mbh_12_u:235.005c: prāṇī vā yadi vāprāṇī saṃskāraṃ yajuṣārhati
GE07mbh_12_u:235.006a: na divā prasvapej jātu na pūrvāpararātrayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.007a: nāsyānaśnan vased vipro gṛhe kaś cid apūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.008e: teṣāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ cāpy arhaṇārthaṃ vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:235.011c: amṛtaṃ yajñaśeṣaṃ syād bhojanaṃ haviṣā samam
GE07mbh_12_u:235.011e: bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yo 'śnāti tam āhur vighasāśinam
GE07mbh_12_u:235.015a: etair jitais tu jayati sarvāṃl lokān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.018a: bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ samaḥ pitrā bhāryā putraḥ svakā tanuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.018c: chāyā svā dāśavargas tu duhitā kṛpaṇaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:235.019a: tasmād etair adhikṣiptaḥ sahen nityam asaṃjvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.020a: na cārthabaddhaḥ karmāṇi dharmaṃ vā kaṃ cid ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:235.021c: ye coktā niyamās teṣāṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ bubhūṣatā
GE07mbh_12_u:235.022c: yasmiṃś caite vasanty arhās tad rāṣṭram abhivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:235.023a: daśa pūrvān daśa parān punāti ca pitāmahān
GE07mbh_12_u:235.023c: gṛhasthavṛttayas tv etā vartayed yo gatavyathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:235.024c: yatendriyāṇām atha vā gatir eṣā vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:235.026c: brahmaṇā vihitā śreṇir eṣā yasmāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:235.027a: ataḥ paraṃ paramam udāram āśramaṃ; tṛtīyam āhus tyajatāṃ kalevaram
GE07mbh_12_u:236.001a: proktā gṛhasthavṛttis te vihitā yā manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:236.001c: tadanantaram uktaṃ yat tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:236.002a: kramaśas tv avadhūyaināṃ tṛtīyāṃ vṛttim uttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:236.004a: gṛhasthas tu yadā paśyed valīpalitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.006c: tad agnihotraṃ tā gāvo yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.007a: akṛṣṭaṃ vai vrīhiyavaṃ nīvāraṃ vighasāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:236.008c: sadyaḥprakṣālakāḥ ke cit ke cin māsikasaṃcayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.009a: vārṣikaṃ saṃcayaṃ ke cit ke cid dvādaśavārṣikam
GE07mbh_12_u:236.010c: grīṣme ca pañcatapasaḥ śaśvac ca mitabhojanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.011a: bhūmau viparivartante tiṣṭhed vā prapadair api
GE07mbh_12_u:236.012c: śuklapakṣe pibanty eke yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ sakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:236.013a: kṛṣṇapakṣe pibanty eke bhuñjate ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:236.013c: mūlair eke phalair eke puṣpair eke dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.014c: etāś cānyāś ca vividhā dīkṣās teṣāṃ manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:236.016a: asminn eva yuge tāta vipraiḥ sarvārthadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.017c: ahovīryas tathā kāvyas tāṇḍyo medhātithir budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.018a: śalo vākaś ca nirvākaḥ śūnyapālaḥ kṛtaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.021c: gatāḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇas te sarve vanam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.022a: jarayā ca paridyūno vyādhinā ca prapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.024a: sadyaskrāṃś ca yajed yajñān iṣṭīś caiveha sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:236.025a: trīṃś caivāgnīn yajet samyag ātmany evātmamokṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:236.025c: prāṇebhyo yajuṣā pañca ṣaṭ prāśnīyād akutsayan
GE07mbh_12_u:236.026c: āśramād āśramaṃ sadyaḥ pūto gacchati karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.027a: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dattvā pravrajed dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.027c: lokās tejomayās tasya pretya cānantyam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:236.028a: suśīlavṛtto vyapanītakalmaṣo; na ceha nāmutra ca kartum īhate
GE07mbh_12_u:236.028c: aroṣamoho gatasaṃdhivigraho; bhaved udāsīnavad ātmavin naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:236.029c: bhaved yatheṣṭā gatir ātmayājino; na saṃśayo dharmapare jītendriye
GE07mbh_12_u:236.030a: tataḥ paraṃ śreṣṭham atīva sadguṇair; adhiṣṭhitaṃ trīn adhivṛttam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:236.030c: caturtham uktaṃ paramāśramaṃ śṛṇu; prakīrtyamānaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:237.001c: yoktavyo ''tmā yathā śaktyā paraṃ vai kāṅkṣatā padam
GE07mbh_12_u:237.002a: prāpya saṃskāram etābhyām āśramābhyāṃ tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:237.002c: yat kāryaṃ paramārthārthaṃ tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:237.003a: kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā tu śreṇisthāneṣu ca triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:237.003c: pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ parivrajyām anuttamām
GE07mbh_12_u:237.004a: tad bhavān evam abhyasya vartatāṃ śrūyatāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:237.004c: eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavān
GE07mbh_12_u:237.005a: ekaś carati yaḥ paśyan na jahāti na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:237.005c: anagnir aniketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayet
GE07mbh_12_u:237.008a: yasmin vācaḥ praviśanti kūpe prāptāḥ śilā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:237.008c: na vaktāraṃ punar yānti sa kaivalyāśrame vaset
GE07mbh_12_u:237.009a: naiva paśyen na śṛṇuyād avācyaṃ jātu kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:237.009c: brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:237.010a: yad brāhmaṇasya kuśalaṃ tad eva satataṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:237.010c: tūṣṇīm āsīta nindāyāṃ kurvan bheṣajam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.011a: yena pūrṇam ivākāśaṃ bhavaty ekena sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:237.011c: śūnyaṃ yena janākīrṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.012a: yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.012c: yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.013a: aher iva gaṇād bhītaḥ sauhityān narakād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:237.013c: kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.014a: na krudhyen na prahṛṣyec ca mānito 'mānitaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.014c: sarvabhūteṣv abhayadas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.015c: kālam eva pratīkṣeta nideśaṃ bhṛtako yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:237.017c: tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:237.019c: amṛtaḥ sa nityaṃ vasati yo 'hiṃsāṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:237.021c: na mṛtyur atigo bhāvaḥ sa mṛtyum adhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:237.022c: asvam ekacaraṃ śāntaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.023a: jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthaṃ dharmo 'ratyartham eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:237.023c: ahorātrāś ca puṇyārthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.024c: akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.025a: sarvāṇi bhūtāni sukhe ramante; sarvāṇi duḥkhasya bhṛśaṃ trasanti
GE07mbh_12_u:237.025c: teṣāṃ bhayotpādanajātakhedaḥ; kuryān na karmāṇi hi śraddadhānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.026a: dānaṃ hi bhūtābhayadakṣiṇāyāḥ; sarvāṇi dānāny adhitiṣṭhatīha
GE07mbh_12_u:237.026c: tīkṣṇāṃ tanuṃ yaḥ prathamaṃ jahāti; so 'nantam āpnoty abhayaṃ prajābhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.027a: uttāna āsyena havir juhoti; lokasya nābhir jagataḥ pratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_12_u:237.027c: tasyāṅgam aṅgāni kṛtākṛtaṃ ca; vaiśvānaraḥ sarvam eva prapede
GE07mbh_12_u:237.028a: prādeśamātre hṛdi niśritaṃ yat; tasmin prāṇān ātmayājī juhoti
GE07mbh_12_u:237.028c: tasyāgnihotraṃ hutam ātmasaṃsthaṃ; sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaivateṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:237.029a: daivaṃ tridhātuṃ trivṛtaṃ suparṇaṃ; ye vidyur agryaṃ paramārthatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:237.029c: te sarvalokeṣu mahīyamānā; devāḥ samarthāḥ sukṛtaṃ vrajanti
GE07mbh_12_u:237.030a: vedāṃś ca vedyaṃ ca vidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam; atho niruktaṃ paramārthatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:237.030c: sarvaṃ śarīrātmani yaḥ praveda; tasmai sma devāḥ spṛhayanti nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:237.031a: bhūmāv asaktaṃ divi cāprameyaṃ; hiraṇmayaṃ yo 'ṇḍajam aṇḍamadhye
GE07mbh_12_u:237.031c: patatriṇaṃ pakṣiṇam antarikṣe; yo veda bhogyātmani dīptaraśmiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:237.032a: āvartamānam ajaraṃ vivartanaṃ; ṣaṇṇemikaṃ dvādaśāraṃ suparva
GE07mbh_12_u:237.032c: yasyedam āsye pariyāti viśvaṃ; tat kālacakraṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām
GE07mbh_12_u:237.033a: yaḥ saṃprasādaṃ jagataḥ śarīraṃ; sarvān sa lokān adhigacchatīha
GE07mbh_12_u:237.033c: tasmin hutaṃ tarpayatīha devāṃs; te vai tṛptās tarpayanty āsyam asya
GE07mbh_12_u:237.034a: tejomayo nityatanuḥ purāṇo; lokān anantān abhayān upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:237.034c: bhūtāni yasmān na trasante kadā cit; sa bhūtebhyo na trasate kadā cit
GE07mbh_12_u:237.035a: agarhaṇīyo na ca garhate 'nyān; sa vai vipraḥ paramātmānam īkṣet
GE07mbh_12_u:237.035c: vinītamoho vyapanītakalmaṣo; na ceha nāmutra ca yo 'rtham ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:237.036c: apetanindāstutir apriyāpriyaś; carann udāsīnavad eṣa bhikṣukaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.001a: prakṛtes tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñas taiḥ pariśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.001c: te cainaṃ na prajānanti sa tu jānāti tān api
GE07mbh_12_u:238.002a: taiś caiṣa kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.003a: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.003c: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.004c: amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃ cit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.005a: evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho ''tmā na prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:238.009a: hitvā tu sarvasaṃkalpān sattve cittaṃ niveśayet
GE07mbh_12_u:238.009c: sattve cittaṃ samāveśya tataḥ kālaṃjaro bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:238.011a: lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
GE07mbh_12_u:238.011c: nivāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyamāno na kampate
GE07mbh_12_u:238.012a: evaṃ pūrvāpare rātre yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:238.015a: navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:238.018e: rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:238.019a: yady apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.019c: idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:238.020c: yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:238.020e: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:238.020f-0687_01: yac ca te manasi vartate paraṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:238.020f-0687_02: yatra cāsti tava saṃśayaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:238.020f-0687_04: putra kiṃ hi kathayāmi te punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.001a: adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:239.001c: yad adhyātmaṃ yathā cedaṃ bhagavann ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:239.002a: adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ tāta puruṣasyeha vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:239.002c: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:239.003a: bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:239.005c: sarge ca pralaye caiva tasmān nirdiśyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:239.006c: akarot tāta vaiṣamyaṃ yasmin yad anupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:239.007a: akarod yac charīreṣu kathaṃ tad upalakṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.007c: indriyāṇi guṇāḥ ke cit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.008a: etat te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad iha darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:239.008c: śṛṇu tattvam ihaikāgro yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:239.009a: śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:239.009c: prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.010a: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:239.010c: raso 'tha rasanaṃ sneho guṇās tv ete trayo 'mbhasām
GE07mbh_12_u:239.011a: ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.011b-0688_01: śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:239.012a: vāyoḥ sparśo raso 'dbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:239.013a: mano buddhiś ca bhāvaś ca traya ete ''tmayonijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.013c: na guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.014a: indriyāṇi nare pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:239.014c: saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ punar aṣṭamam
GE07mbh_12_u:239.016a: rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.018a: yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avāṅmūrdhnaś ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:239.018c: etasminn eva kṛtye vai vartate buddhir uttamā
GE07mbh_12_u:239.019a: guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api
GE07mbh_12_u:239.020a: tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃ cid ātmani lakṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.020c: praśāntam iva saṃśuddhaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.021a: yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.021c: rajaḥ pravartakaṃ tat syāt satataṃ hāri dehinām
GE07mbh_12_u:239.021d-0689_01: pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:239.023c: akasmād yadi vā kasmād vartate sāttviko guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:239.025a: tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:239.025c: kathaṃ cid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.002a: indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.002c: manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paro mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.003c: yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.004a: indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikriyate hy aṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:240.004c: śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.005a: paśyantī bhavate dṛṣṭī rasatī rasanaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:240.005c: jighratī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikriyate pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:240.006c: tiṣṭhatī puruṣe buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.007a: kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid api śocate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.007c: na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid iha yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.008a: seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.009a: yadā prārthayate kiṃ cit tadā bhavati sā manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.009c: adhiṣṭhānāni vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret
GE07mbh_12_u:240.010e: pravartamānaṃ tu rajaḥ sattvam apy anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.011a: ye caiva bhāvā vartante sarva eṣv eva te triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:240.013a: evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti vidvān na muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:240.014a: na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:240.015a: teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:240.015c: tadā prakāśate hy ātmā ghaṭe dīpa iva jvalan
GE07mbh_12_u:240.015e: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy apagate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:240.016a: yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caran
GE07mbh_12_u:240.016b-0691_01: vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.016c: evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś caran
GE07mbh_12_u:240.016e: asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃ cana lipyate
GE07mbh_12_u:240.017a: tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:240.018a: sattvam ātmā prasavati guṇān vāpi kadā ca na
GE07mbh_12_u:240.018c: na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:240.019a: paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ sa sraṣṭā caiva yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:240.020a: sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:240.020c: pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:240.021a: yathā matsyo 'dbhir anyaḥ san saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau
GE07mbh_12_u:240.022a: iṣīkā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:241.001a: sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv anutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:241.002a: svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:241.002c: ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tantuvad guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:241.003c: evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0002: atha satvaram āsādya ratham evaṃ yuyuṅkṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0006: kramaśaḥ pārthivaṃ yac ca vāyavyaṃ khaṃ tathā payaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0007: jyotiṣo yat tad aiśvaryam ahaṃkārasya buddhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0009: vyaktamāś cāpi (sic) yasyaite tathā yuktena yogataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0012: śaiśiras tu yathā dhūmaḥ sūkṣmaṃ saṃśrayate nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0013: tathā dehād vimuktasya pūrvarūpaṃ tad apy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0017: tasminn uparate vāsya vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy atha
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0018: rūpaṃ prakāśate tatra pītavarṇavad apy ajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0020: ūhyā savarṇarūpaṃ tat tasya rūpaṃ prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0022: suśuklaṃ cetasaḥ samyag avyakte brāhmaṇasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0023: eteṣv apīha jāteṣu phalajātāni me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0026: varṇato gṛhyate vāpsu nāyaṃ pibati cāśayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0027: snācāsya (sic) tejasā rūpaṃ dahyate śāmyate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0029: pṛthivīṃ kampayanty ete guṇāpāyād iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0030: ākāśabhūtaś cākāśe svarṇastvān na ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0031: ahaṃkārasya vijaye pañca te syur vaśānugāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0032: ṣaṇṇām ātmani buddhau tu nitāyaṃ (sic) prabhavaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0036: tatrāsannamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa vai
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0037: tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva vyākhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0039: yoge sāṃkhye 'pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs tatra me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0040: proktaṃ tad vyartham ity eva jāyate vartate ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0041: jīvate mriyate caiva caturbhir lakṣaṇair yutam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0042: viparītam ato yat tad avyaktaṃ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0043: pāpātmānau ca deveṣu siddhānteṣv apy udāhṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0045: vyaktam avyaktajaṃ caiva tathā buddhir athetarat
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0046: sattvaṃ kṣetrajña ity etad dvayam avyaktadarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0047: dvāv ātmānau ca deveṣu viṣayeṣu ca rājataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0050: naiva krudhyati na dveṣṭi nātmatā bhavato giraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0051: ākruṣṭas tāḍitaś cāpi maitraṃ dhyāyati nāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:241.005b-027_0055: alolupo 'py atho dānto nākṛtir na nirākṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.007a: tapyeyuḥ pracyutāḥ pṛthvyā yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.007c: avagāḍhā hy avidvāṃso viddhi lokam imaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:241.008a: na tu tāmyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:241.008c: evaṃ yo vindate ''tmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:241.009a: evaṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:241.009c: samavekṣya śanaiḥ samyag labhate śamam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.011a: etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.012a: na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃ; yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:241.012c: na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cid; bhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanī
GE07mbh_12_u:241.013a: lokamāturam asūyate janas; tat tad eva ca nirīkṣya śocate
GE07mbh_12_u:241.013c: tatra paśya kuśalān aśocato; ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.014a: yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ; tac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:241.014c: na priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na cāpriyaṃ; tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:242.001a: yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:242.001c: yo viśiṣṭaś ca dharmebhyas taṃ bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:242.004a: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca hy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:242.004c: taj jyāyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:242.006c: tadā tvam ātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyasi śāśvatam
GE07mbh_12_u:242.007c: taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:242.008c: ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:242.009a: evam ātmā na jānīte kva gamiṣye kuto nv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:242.009c: anyo hy atrāntar ātmāsti yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:242.010c: dṛṣṭvā tvam ātmanātmānaṃ nirātmā bhava sarvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:242.019a: evaṃ vai sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:242.021c: abruvaṃ yad ahaṃ tāta ātmasākṣikam añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:242.022a: naiva strī na pumān etan naiva cedaṃ napuṃsakam
GE07mbh_12_u:242.023a: naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:242.024a: yathā matāni sarvāṇi na caitāni yathā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:242.024c: kathitāni mayā putra bhavanti na bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:242.025c: pṛṣṭo hīdaṃ prītimatā hitārthaṃ; brūyāt sutasyeha yad uktam etat
GE07mbh_12_u:243.001a: gandhān rasān nānurundhyāt sukhaṃ vā; nālaṃkārāṃś cāpnuyāt tasya tasya
GE07mbh_12_u:243.001c: mānaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca yaśaś ca necchet; sa vai pracāraḥ paśyato brāhmaṇasya
GE07mbh_12_u:243.002c: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni na tena na sa brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:243.003c: nākāmo mriyate jātu na tena na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:243.004a: iṣṭīś ca vividhāḥ prāpya kratūṃś caivāptadakṣiṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:243.004c: naiva prāpnoti brāhmaṇyam abhidhyānāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:243.005a: yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:243.005c: yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:243.006a: yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:243.006c: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:243.008a: kāmato mucyamānas tu dhūmrābhrād iva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:243.008c: virajāḥ kālam ākāṅkṣan dhīro dhairyeṇa vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:243.009a: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ; samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
GE07mbh_12_u:243.009c: sa kāmakānto na tu kāmakāmaḥ; sa vai lokāt svargam upaiti dehī
GE07mbh_12_u:243.013c: ṣaḍbhir lakṣaṇavān etaiḥ samagraḥ punar eṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:243.014c: ye viduḥ pretya cātmānam ihasthāṃs tāṃs tathā viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:243.016a: niṣpracāraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya ca sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:243.016c: yām ayaṃ labhate tuṣṭiṃ sā na śakyam ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:243.017a: yena tṛpyaty abhuñjāno yena tuṣyaty avittavān
GE07mbh_12_u:243.017c: yenāsneho balaṃ dhatte yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
GE07mbh_12_u:243.018a: saṃgopya hy ātmano dvārāṇy apidhāya vicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:243.018c: yo hy āste brāhmaṇaḥ śiṣṭaḥ sa ātmaratir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:243.019c: sarvataḥ sukham anveti vapuś cāndramasaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:243.022a: sa yadā sarvato muktaḥ samaḥ paryavatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_12_u:244.001c: vaktrā guṇavatā śiṣyaḥ śrāvyaḥ pūrvam idaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:244.002a: ākāśaṃ māruto jyotir āpaḥ pṛthvī ca pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:244.002c: bhāvābhāvau ca kālaś ca sarvabhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_12_u:244.004c: sparśanaṃ cendriyaṃ vidyāt tathā sparśaṃ ca tanmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:244.005a: tataḥ pākaḥ prakāśaś ca jyotiś cakṣuś ca tanmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:244.006a: prakledaḥ kṣudratā sneha ity āpo hy upadiśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:244.006b-0694_01: asṛṅ majjā ca yac cānyat snigdhaṃ vidyāt tadātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:244.006c: rasanaṃ cendriyaṃ jihvā rasaś cāpāṃ guṇo mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:244.007c: śmaśru loma ca keśāś ca sirāḥ snāyu ca carma ca
GE07mbh_12_u:244.009a: uttareṣu guṇāḥ santi sarve sarveṣu cottarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:244.010a: mano navamam eṣāṃ tu buddhis tu daśamī smṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:244.012a: ebhiḥ kālāṣṭamair bhāvair yaḥ sarvaiḥ sarvam anvitam
GE07mbh_12_u:244.012c: paśyaty akaluṣaṃ prājñaḥ sa mohaṃ nānuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:245.002a: yathā marīcyaḥ sahitāś caranti; gacchanti tiṣṭhanti ca dṛśyamānāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:245.002c: dehair vimuktā vicaranti lokāṃs; tathaiva sattvāny atimānuṣāṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:245.003c: sattvavāṃs tu tathā sattvaṃ pratirūpaṃ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:245.006a: yathāhani tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathāhani
GE07mbh_12_u:245.007a: teṣāṃ nityaṃ sadānityo bhūtātmā satataṃ guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:245.007c: saptabhis tv anvitaḥ sūkṣmaiś cariṣṇur ajarāmaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:245.008c: svapneṣv api bhavaty eṣa vijñātā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:245.009a: tatrāpi labhate duḥkhaṃ tatrāpi labhate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:245.009c: krodhalobhau tu tatrāpi kṛtvā vyasanam archati
GE07mbh_12_u:245.010a: prīṇitaś cāpi bhavati mahato 'rthān avāpya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:245.010c: karoti puṇyaṃ tatrāpi jāgrann iva ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:245.010d-0695_02: daśa māsān vasan kukṣau naiṣo 'nnam iva jīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:245.011a: tam evam atitejoṃśaṃ bhūtātmānaṃ hṛdi sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:245.013c: samādhau yogam evaitac chāṇḍilyaḥ śamam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:245.014a: viditvā sapta sūkṣmāṇi ṣaḍaṅgaṃ ca maheśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:246.005a: yas tān pāśān vaśe kṛtvā taṃ vṛkṣam apakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:246.005c: gataḥ sa duḥkhayor antaṃ yatamānas tayor dvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:246.006c: sa tam eva tato hanti viṣaṃ grastam ivāturam
GE07mbh_12_u:246.008a: evaṃ yo veda kāmasya kevalaṃ parikarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:246.008c: vadhaṃ vai kāmaśāstrasya sa duḥkhāny ativartate
GE07mbh_12_u:246.009a: śarīraṃ puram ity āhuḥ svāminī buddhir iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:246.010a: indriyāṇi janāḥ paurās tadarthaṃ tu parā kṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:246.010c: tatra dvau dāruṇau doṣau tamo nāma rajas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:246.011c: advāreṇa tam evārthaṃ dvau doṣāv upajīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:246.012a: tatra buddhir hi durdharṣā manaḥ sādharmyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:246.012c: paurāś cāpi manas trastās teṣām api calā sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:246.013a: yadarthaṃ buddhir adhyāste na so 'rthaḥ pariṣīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:246.013c: yadarthaṃ pṛthag adhyāste manas tat pariṣīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:246.014a: pṛthagbhūtaṃ yadā buddhyā mano bhavati kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:246.015a: tan manaḥ kurute sakhyaṃ rajasā saha saṃgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:246.015c: taṃ cādāya janaṃ pauraṃ rajase saṃprayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:247.002c: tato 'ham api vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ putra nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:247.003a: bhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ pṛthutvaṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:247.003c: gandho gurutvaṃ śaktiś ca saṃghātaḥ sthāpanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.004a: apāṃ śaityaṃ rasaḥ kledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:247.005a: agner durdharṣatā tejas tāpaḥ pākaḥ prakāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:247.005c: śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇyaṃ daśamaṃ cordhvabhāgitā
GE07mbh_12_u:247.006c: balaṃ śaighryaṃ ca mohaś ca ceṣṭā karmakṛtā bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.007a: ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:247.009a: calopapattir vyaktiś ca visargaḥ kalpanā kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:247.009c: sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.010c: saṃśayaḥ pratipattiś ca buddhau pañceha ye guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.011a: kathaṃ pañcaguṇā buddhiḥ kathaṃ pañcendriyā guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.011c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva sūkṣmajñānaṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:247.012a: āhuḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ bhūtaguṇān vai; bhūtaviśiṣṭā nityaviṣaktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:247.012c: bhūtaviṣaktāś cākṣarasṛṣṭāḥ; putra na nityaṃ tad iha vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:247.013a: tat putra cintākalitaṃ yad uktam; anāgataṃ vai tava saṃpratīha
GE07mbh_12_u:247.013c: bhūtārthatattvaṃ tad avāpya sarvaṃ; bhūtaprabhāvād bhava śāntabuddhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.002c: ete hi nihatāḥ saṃkhye tulyatejobalair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.003a: naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge purā
GE07mbh_12_u:248.004a: atha ceme mahāprājña śerate hi gatāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.004c: mṛtā iti ca śabdo 'yaṃ vartaty eṣu gatāsuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:248.005c: tatra me saṃśayo jātaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:248.006a: kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur iha prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.006c: haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:248.008a: tatra putro harir nāma nārāyaṇasamo bale
GE07mbh_12_u:248.008c: sa śatrubhir hataḥ saṃkhye sabalaḥ sapadānugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.010a: sa tasmai sarvam ācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.010c: śatrubhir grahaṇaṃ saṃkhye putrasya maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:248.011a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado 'tha tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.012c: yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:248.013c: atīva vṛddhā bahulā nāmṛṣyata punaḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.014a: na hy antaram abhūt kiṃ cit kva cij jantubhir acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:248.015a: tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati bhūpate
GE07mbh_12_u:248.016c: tena sarvā diśo rājan dadāha sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:248.017a: tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jagac ca sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:248.020c: abravīd varado devo jvalann iva tadā śivam
GE07mbh_12_u:248.021a: karavāṇy adya kaṃ kāmaṃ varārho 'si mato mama
GE07mbh_12_u:248.021c: kartā hy asmi priyaṃ śambho tava yad dhṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:249.001c: viddhi sṛṣṭās tvayā hīmā mā kupyāsāṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:249.002a: tava tejogninā deva prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.002c: tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ mā kupyāsāṃ jagatprabho
GE07mbh_12_u:249.003a: na kupye na ca me kāmo na bhaveran prajā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:249.003c: lāghavārthaṃ dharaṇyās tu tataḥ saṃhāra iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:249.004a: iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacodayat
GE07mbh_12_u:249.005c: saṃhāram āsāṃ vṛddhānāṃ tato māṃ krodha āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:249.006c: mā prajāḥ sthāvaraṃ vaica jaṅgamaṃ ca vinīnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.007a: palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarvaṃ caiva tṛṇolapam
GE07mbh_12_u:249.008a: tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ jagat sarvam upaplutam
GE07mbh_12_u:249.008c: prasīda bhagavan sādho vara eṣa vṛto mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:249.009a: naṣṭā na punar eṣyanti prajā hy etāḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:249.009c: tasmān nivartyatām etat tejaḥ svenaiva tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:249.012a: tvad bhavaṃ hi jagannātha jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:249.012c: prasādya tvāṃ mahādeva yācāmy āvṛttijāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.013a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor niyatavāṅmanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.013c: tejas tat svaṃ nijagrāha punar evāntar ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:249.014c: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.015a: upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:249.017a: sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇām āśritā diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:249.017c: dadṛśāte 'tha tau kanyāṃ devau viśveśvarāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:249.018a: tām āhūya tadā devo lokānām ādir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.018c: mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā iti
GE07mbh_12_u:249.019a: tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyā me cintitā ruṣitena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:249.019c: tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.020a: aviśeṣeṇa caiva tvaṃ prajāḥ saṃhara bhāmini
GE07mbh_12_u:249.020c: mama tvaṃ hi niyogena śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:249.021a: evam uktā tu sā devī mṛtyuḥ kamalamālinī
GE07mbh_12_u:249.021c: pradadhyau duḥkhitā bālā sāśrupātam atīva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:249.022a: pāṇibhyāṃ caiva jagrāha tāny aśrūṇi janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:249.022c: mānavānāṃ hitārthāya yayāce punar eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:250.001a: vinīya duḥkham abalā sā tv atīvāyatekṣaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.002a: tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī mādṛśī vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:250.003a: bibhemy aham adharmasya dharmyam ādiśa karma me
GE07mbh_12_u:250.003c: tvaṃ māṃ bhītām avekṣasva śiveneśvara cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.004a: bālān vṛddhān vayaḥsthāṃś ca na hareyam anāgasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.004c: prāṇinaḥ prāṇinām īśa namas te 'bhiprasīda me
GE07mbh_12_u:250.005a: priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn api
GE07mbh_12_u:250.005c: apadhyāsyanti yad deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:250.006c: tebhyo 'haṃ balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvām upāgatā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.007a: yamasya bhavane deva yāty ante pāpakarmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.007c: prasādaye tvā varada prasādaṃ kuru me prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:250.008a: etam icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:250.008c: iccheyaṃ tvatprasādāc ca tapas taptuṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:250.009b-0700_01: tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyā me cintitā ruṣitena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:250.009c: gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā ca vicāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:250.010a: etad evam avaśyaṃ hi bhavitā naitad anyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.011c: na vyājahāra tasthau ca prahvā bhagavadunmukhī
GE07mbh_12_u:250.012a: punaḥ punar athoktā sā gatasattveva bhāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:250.012c: tūṣṇīm āsīt tato devo devānām īśvareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.013c: smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:250.014c: sā kanyāpajagāmāsya samīpād iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.016a: sā tatra paramaṃ devī tapo 'carata duścaram
GE07mbh_12_u:250.016c: samā hy ekapade tasthau daśa padmāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_12_u:250.017a: tāṃ tathā kurvatīṃ tatra tapaḥ paramaduścaram
GE07mbh_12_u:250.017c: punar eva mahātejā brahmā vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:250.018a: kuruṣva me vaco mṛtyo tad anādṛtya satvarā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.018c: tathaivaikapade tāta punar anyāni sapta sā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.019a: tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva pañca dve caiva mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:250.019c: bhūyaḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.020a: punar gatvā tato rājan maunam ātiṣṭhad uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.020c: apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:250.021a: tato jagāma sā kanyā kauśikīṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:250.022a: tato yayau mahābhāgā gaṅgāṃ meruṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.022c: tasthau dārv iva niśceṣṭā bhūtānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.023a: tato himavato mūrdhni yatra devāḥ samījire
GE07mbh_12_u:250.023e: tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.024a: tatas tām abravīt tatra lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.024c: kim idaṃ vartate putri kriyatāṃ tad vaco mama
GE07mbh_12_u:250.025c: na hareyaṃ prajā deva punas tvāhaṃ prasādaye
GE07mbh_12_u:250.026a: tām adharmabhayatrastāṃ punar eva ca yācatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:250.027a: adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃyacchemāḥ prajāḥ śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:250.027c: mayā hy uktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā neha kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:250.028c: ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva tvaddhite niratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.029a: imam anyaṃ ca te kāmaṃ dadāmi manasepsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.029c: na tvā doṣeṇa yāsyanti vyādhisaṃpīḍitāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.030a: puruṣeṣu ca rūpeṇa puruṣas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:250.031a: saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:250.031c: punar eva mahātmānaṃ neti deveśam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.032a: tām abravīt tadā devo mṛtyo saṃhara mānavān
GE07mbh_12_u:250.032c: adharmas te na bhavitā tathā dhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:250.032d-0702_01: tvaṃ hi yattā ca yuktā ca pūrvotpannā ca bhāminī
GE07mbh_12_u:250.032d-0702_02: anuśiṣṭā ca nirdoṣā tasmāt tvaṃ kuru me matam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.033a: yān aśrubindūn patitān apaśyaṃ; ye pāṇibhyāṃ dhāritās te purastāt
GE07mbh_12_u:250.033c: te vyādhayo mānavān ghorarūpāḥ; prāpte kāle pīḍayiṣyanti mṛtyo
GE07mbh_12_u:250.034a: sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ prāṇinām antakāle; kāmakrodhau sahitau yojayethāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.034c: evaṃ dharmas tvām upaiṣyaty ameyo; na cādharmaṃ lapsyase tulyavṛttiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.035a: evaṃ dharmaṃ pālayiṣyasy athoktaṃ; na cātmānaṃ majjayiṣyasy adharme
GE07mbh_12_u:250.035c: tasmāt kāmaṃ rocayābhyāgataṃ tvaṃ; saṃyojyātho saṃharasveha jantūn
GE07mbh_12_u:250.036a: sā vai tadā mṛtyusaṃjñāpadeśāc; chāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tam
GE07mbh_12_u:250.036c: atho prāṇān prāṇinām antakāle; kāmakrodhau prāpya nirmohya hanti
GE07mbh_12_u:250.037a: mṛtyor ye te vyādhayaś cāśrupātā; manuṣyāṇāṃ rujyate yaiḥ śarīram
GE07mbh_12_u:250.037c: sarveṣāṃ vai prāṇināṃ prāṇanānte; tasmāc chokaṃ mā kṛthā budhya buddhyā
GE07mbh_12_u:250.038a: sarve devāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇanānte; gatvā vṛttāḥ saṃnivṛttās tathaiva
GE07mbh_12_u:250.038c: evaṃ sarve mānavāḥ prāṇanānte; gatvāvṛttā devavad rājasiṃha
GE07mbh_12_u:250.039a: vāyur bhīmo bhīmanādo mahaujāḥ; sarveṣāṃ ca prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.039c: nānāvṛttir dehināṃ dehabhede; tasmād vāyur devadevo viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.040a: sarve devā martyasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥ; sarve martyā devasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:250.040c: tasmāt putraṃ mā śuco rājasiṃha; putraḥ svargaṃ prāpya te modate ha
GE07mbh_12_u:250.041a: evaṃ mṛtyur devasṛṣṭā prajānāṃ; prāpte kāle saṃharantī yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:250.041c: tasyāś caiva vyādhayas te 'śrupātāḥ; prāpte kāle saṃharantīha jantūn
GE07mbh_12_u:251.001a: ime vai mānavāḥ sarve dharmaṃ prati viśaṅkitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.001c: ko 'yaṃ dharmaḥ kuto dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:251.002a: dharmo nv ayam ihārthaḥ kim amutrārtho 'pi vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:251.002c: ubhayārtho 'pi vā dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:251.003c: caturtham artham ity āhuḥ kavayo dharmalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:251.004a: api hy uktāni karmāṇi vyavasyanty uttarāvare
GE07mbh_12_u:251.004e: ubhayatra sukhodarka iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:251.005a: alabdhvā nipuṇaṃ dharmaṃ pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjati
GE07mbh_12_u:251.005c: na ca pāpakṛtaḥ pāpān mucyante ke cid āpadi
GE07mbh_12_u:251.006c: dharmasya niṣṭhā svācāras tam evāśritya bhotsyase
GE07mbh_12_u:251.008a: yadāsya tad dharanty anye tadā rājānam icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:251.008c: tadā teṣāṃ spṛhayate ye vai tuṣṭāḥ svakair dhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.009c: na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid antarātmani paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:251.010a: satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:251.010c: satyena vidhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:251.011a: api pāpakṛto raudrāḥ satyaṃ kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:251.011e: te cen mitho 'dhṛtiṃ kuryur vinaśyeyur asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:251.012a: na hartavyaṃ paradhanam iti dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.013a: na hy atyantaṃ balayutā bhavanti sukhino 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:251.013c: tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:251.014a: asādhubhyo 'sya na bhayaṃ na corebhyo na rājataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.014c: na kiṃ cit kasya cit kurvan nirbhayaḥ śucir āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:251.015a: sarvataḥ śaṅkate steno mṛgo grāmam iveyivān
GE07mbh_12_u:251.016a: muditaḥ śucir abhyeti sarvato nirbhayaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:251.016c: na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid ātmano 'nyeṣu paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:251.017a: dātavyam ity ayaṃ dharma ukto bhūtahite rataiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.018c: na hy atyantaṃ dhanavanto bhavanti sukhino 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:251.019a: yad anyair vihitaṃ necched ātmanaḥ karma pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.019c: na tat pareṣu kurvīta jānann apriyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.020a: yo 'nyasya syād upapatiḥ sa kaṃ kiṃ vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:251.020c: yad anyas tasya tat kuryān na mṛṣyed iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:251.021a: jīvituṃ yaḥ svayaṃ cecchet kathaṃ so 'nyaṃ praghātayet
GE07mbh_12_u:251.021c: yad yad ātmana iccheta tat parasyāpi cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:251.023a: yasmiṃs tu devāḥ samaye saṃtiṣṭheraṃs tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:251.023c: atha cel lābhasamaye sthitir dharme 'pi śobhanā
GE07mbh_12_u:251.026c: tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:252.001c: pratibhā tv asti me kā cit tāṃ brūyām anumānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:252.002a: bhūyāṃso hṛdaye ye me praśnās te vyāhṛtās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:252.002c: imam anyaṃ pravakṣyāmi na rājan vigrahād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:252.003a: imāni hi prāpayanti sṛjanty uttārayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:252.003c: na dharmaḥ paripāṭhena śakyo bhārata veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:252.004c: āpadas tu kathaṃ śakyāḥ paripāṭhena veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:252.005a: sadācāro mato dharmaḥ santas tv ācāralakṣaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:252.005c: sādhyāsādhyaṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ sadācāro hy alakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:252.006c: dharmaṃ cādharmarūpeṇa kaś cid aprākṛtaś caran
GE07mbh_12_u:252.007a: punar asya pramāṇaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaṃ śāstrakovidaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:252.007c: vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ha naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:252.010a: te cet sarve pramāṇaṃ vai pramāṇaṃ tan na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:252.010c: pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:252.011c: yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sāpi praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:252.012a: vidma caivaṃ na vā vidma śakyaṃ vā vedituṃ na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:252.014c: smṛto 'pi śāśvato dharmo viprahīṇo na dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:252.015a: kāmād anye kṣayād anye kāraṇair aparais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:252.016a: dharmo bhavati sa kṣipraṃ vilīnas tv eva sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:252.016c: anye tān āhur unmattān api cāvahasanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:252.017c: na hi sarvahitaḥ kaś cid ācāraḥ saṃpradṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:252.018c: dṛśyate caiva sa punas tulyarūpo yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.002a: vane vanacaraḥ kaś cij jājalir nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.004a: sa kadā cin mahātejā jalavāso mahīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:253.005a: sa cintayām āsa munir jalamadhye kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:253.006c: apsu vaihāyasaṃ gacchen mayā yo 'nyaḥ saheti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:253.007c: abruvaṃś ca piśācās taṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:253.008c: so 'py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:253.009a: ity ukto jājalir bhūtaiḥ pratyuvāca mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.009c: paśyeyaṃ tam ahaṃ prājñaṃ tulādhāraṃ yaśasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:253.010a: iti bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ rakṣāṃsy uddhṛtya sāgarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:253.011a: ity ukto jājalir bhūtair jagāma vimanās tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.012a: kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ karma tāta jājalinā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.012c: yena siddhiṃ parāṃ prāptas tan no vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:253.013a: atīva tapasā yukto ghoreṇa sa babhūva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:253.015a: satye tapasi tiṣṭhan sa na ca dharmam avaikṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:253.016a: vatātapasaho grīṣme na ca dharmam avindata
GE07mbh_12_u:253.016c: duḥkhaśayyāś ca vividhā bhūmau ca parivartanam
GE07mbh_12_u:253.017a: tataḥ kadā cit sa munir varṣāsv ākāśam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.017c: antarikṣāj jalaṃ mūrdhnā pratyagṛhṇān muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.018a: atha tasya jaṭāḥ klinnā babhūvur grathitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:253.018b-0703_01: klinnā babhūvur grathitā āplutasya jaṭāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:253.019a: sa kadā cin nirāhāro vāyubhakṣo mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.019c: tasthau kāṣṭhavad avyagro na cacāla ca karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:253.021a: sa tau dayāvān viprarṣir upapraikṣata dampatī
GE07mbh_12_u:253.022a: yadā sa na calaty eva sthāṇubhūto mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.022c: tatas tau pariviśvastau sukhaṃ tatroṣatus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.024c: tāny abudhyata tejasvī sa vipraḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.025a: buddhvā ca sa mahātejā na cacālaiva jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.025c: dharme dhṛtamanā nityaṃ nādharmaṃ sa tv arocayat
GE07mbh_12_u:253.026a: ahany ahani cāgamya tatas tau tasya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:253.026c: āśvāsitau vai vasataḥ saṃprahṛṣṭau tadā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:253.027a: aṇḍebhyas tv atha puṣṭebhyaḥ prajāyanta śakuntakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.027c: vyavardhanta ca tatraiva na cākampata jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.028a: sa rakṣamāṇas tv aṇḍāni kuliṅgānāṃ yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.029a: tatas tu kālasamaye babhūvus te 'tha pakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.029c: bubudhe tāṃś ca sa munir jātapakṣāñ śakuntakān
GE07mbh_12_u:253.030a: tataḥ kadā cit tāṃs tatra paśyan pakṣīn yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.031a: tathā tān abhisaṃvṛddhān dṛṣṭvā cāpnuvatāṃ mudam
GE07mbh_12_u:253.031c: śakunau nirbhayau tatra ūṣatuś cātmajaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:253.032c: sāyaṃ sāyaṃ dvijān vipro na cākampata jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.033a: kadā cit punar abhyetya punar gacchanti saṃtatam
GE07mbh_12_u:253.033c: tyaktā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ te na cākampata jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.034a: atha te divasaṃ cārīṃ gatvā sāyaṃ punar nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:253.035a: kadā cid divasān pañca samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.036a: krameṇa ca punaḥ sarve divasāni bahūny api
GE07mbh_12_u:253.036c: nopāvartanta śakunā jātaprāṇāḥ sma te yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.037c: naivāgacchaṃs tato rājan prātiṣṭhata sa jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.038c: siddho 'smīti matiṃ cakre tatas taṃ māna āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:253.039a: sa tathā nirgatān dṛṣṭvā śakuntān niyatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.041a: saṃbhāvya caṭakān mūrdhni jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.041c: āsphoṭayat tadākāśe dharmaḥ prāpto mayeti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:253.042a: athāntarikṣe vāg āsīt tāṃ sa śuśrāva jājaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.042c: dharmeṇa na samas tvaṃ vai tulādhārasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:253.043c: so 'py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:253.045a: kālena mahatāgacchat sa tu vārāṇasīṃ purīm
GE07mbh_12_u:253.045c: vikrīṇantaṃ ca paṇyāni tulādhāraṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.046a: so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ vipram āyāntaṃ bhāṇḍajīvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.047a: āyān evāsi vidito mama brahman na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.047c: bravīmi yat tu vacanaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:253.048a: sāgarānūpam āśritya tapas taptaṃ tvayā mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:253.048c: na ca dharmasya saṃjñāṃ tvaṃ purā vettha kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:253.049a: tataḥ siddhasya tapasā tava vipra śakuntakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.049c: kṣipraṃ śirasy ajāyanta te ca saṃbhāvitās tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:253.050a: jātapakṣā yadā te ca gatāś cārīm itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:253.050e: khe vācaṃ tvam athāśrauṣīr māṃ prati dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:253.051a: amarṣavaśam āpannas tataḥ prāpto bhavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:253.051c: karavāṇi priyaṃ kiṃ te tad brūhi dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:254.001a: ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena tulādhāreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.001c: provāca vacanaṃ dhīmāñ jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.002c: vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca teṣāṃ mūlaphalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:254.003a: adhyagā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ kutas tvām idam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:254.003c: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ nikhilena mahāmate
GE07mbh_12_u:254.005c: sarvabhūtahitaṃ maitraṃ purāṇaṃ yaṃ janā viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.006c: yā vṛttiḥ sa paro dharmas tena jīvāmi jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.007c: alaktaṃ padmakaṃ tuṅgaṃ gandhāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.008a: rasāṃś ca tāṃs tān viprarṣe madyavarjān ahaṃ bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:254.009a: sarveṣāṃ yaḥ suhṛn nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.009c: karmaṇā manasā vācā sa dharmaṃ veda jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.010a: nāhaṃ pareṣāṃ karmāṇi praśaṃsāmi śapāmi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.011a: nānurudhye virudhye vā na dveṣmi na ca kāmaye
GE07mbh_12_u:254.011c: samo 'smi sarvabhūteṣu paśya me jājale vratam
GE07mbh_12_u:254.012c: tulā me sarvabhūteṣu samā tiṣṭhati jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.013a: iti māṃ tvaṃ vijānīhi sarvalokasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.016a: yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:254.016c: yadā necchati na dveṣṭi tadā sidhyati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.017a: yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:254.017c: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.018a: na bhūto na bhaviṣyaś ca na ca dharmo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:254.018c: yo 'bhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa prāpnoty abhayaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:254.019a: yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarvo mṛtyumukhād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:254.019c: vākkrūrād daṇḍapāruṣyāt sa prāpnoti mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:254.021c: tena vaidyas tapasvī vā balavān vā vimohyate
GE07mbh_12_u:254.022a: ācārāj jājale prājñaḥ kṣipraṃ dharmam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:254.022c: evaṃ yaḥ sādhubhir dāntaś cared adrohacetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.023a: nadyāṃ yathā ceha kāṣṭham uhyamānaṃ yadṛcchayā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.023c: yadṛcchayaiva kāṣṭhena saṃdhiṃ gaccheta kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:254.024e: evam evāyam ācāraḥ prādurbhūto yatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.025a: yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:254.025c: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sa prāpnoti sadā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:254.026a: yasmād udvijate vidvan sarvaloko vṛkād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:254.026c: krośatas tīram āsādya yathā sarve jalecarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.027c: tatas tān eva kavayaḥ śāstreṣu pravadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:254.028a: tapobhir yajñadānaiś ca vākyaiḥ prajñāśritais tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.028c: prāpnoty abhayadānasya yad yat phalam ihāśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:254.029e: na bhūtānām ahiṃsāyā jyāyān dharmo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:254.030a: yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:254.031a: yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:254.031c: na sa dharmam avāpnoti iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:254.033c: bravīmi te satyam idaṃ śraddadhasva ca jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.034a: sa eva subhago bhūtvā punar bhavati durbhagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.034c: vyāpattiṃ karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā jugupsanti janāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.035a: akāraṇo hi nehāsti dharmaḥ sūkṣmo 'pi jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.036a: sūkṣmatvān na sa vijñātuṃ śakyate bahunihnavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.037a: ye ca chindanti vṛṣaṇān ye ca bhindanti nastakān
GE07mbh_12_u:254.037c: vahanti mahato bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:254.038a: hatvā sattvāni khādanti tān kathaṃ na vigarhase
GE07mbh_12_u:254.039c: ātmanā cāpi jānāsi yad duḥkhaṃ vadhatāḍane
GE07mbh_12_u:254.040c: ādityaś candramā vāyur brahmā prāṇaḥ kratur yamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.041a: tāni jīvāni vikrīya kā mṛteṣu vicāraṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.041b-0704_01: ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.041b-0704_02: dhenur vatsaś ca somo vai vikrīyaitan na sidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:254.041c: kā taile kā ghṛte brahman madhuny apsv auṣadheṣu vā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.042c: tāṃś ca mātuḥ priyāñ jānann ākramya bahudhā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.043c: na manye bhrūṇahatyāpi viśiṣṭā tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.044a: kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante sā ca vṛttiḥ sudāruṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:254.044c: bhūmiṃ bhūmiśayāṃś caiva hanti kāṣṭham ayomukham
GE07mbh_12_u:254.045a: aghnyā iti gavāṃ nāma ka enān hantum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:254.046a: ṛṣayo yatayo hy etan nahuṣe pratyavedayan
GE07mbh_12_u:254.046c: gāṃ mātaraṃ cāpy avadhīr vṛṣabhaṃ ca prajāpatim
GE07mbh_12_u:254.047a: śataṃ caikaṃ ca rogāṇāṃ sarvabhūteṣv apātayan
GE07mbh_12_u:254.047c: ṛṣayas te mahābhāgāḥ prajāsv eva hi jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.047e: bhrūṇahaṃ nahuṣaṃ tv āhur na te hoṣyāmahe haviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.048a: ity uktvā te mahātmānaḥ sarve tattvārthadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:254.049a: īdṛśān aśivān ghorān ācārān iha jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.050a: kāraṇād dharmam anvicchen na lokacaritaṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:254.050c: yo hanyād yaś ca māṃ stauti tatrāpi śṛṇu jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:254.051a: samau tāv api me syātāṃ na hi me staḥ priyāpriye
GE07mbh_12_u:254.052a: upapattyā hi saṃpanno yatibhiś caiva sevyate
GE07mbh_12_u:255.001a: yathā pravartito dharmas tulāṃ dhārayatā tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:255.001c: svargadvāraṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca bhūtānām avarotsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:255.002a: kṛṣyā hy annaṃ prabhavati tatas tvam api jīvasi
GE07mbh_12_u:255.002c: paśubhiś cauṣadhībhiś ca martyā jīvanti vāṇija
GE07mbh_12_u:255.003a: yato yajñaḥ prabhavati nāstikyam api jalpasi
GE07mbh_12_u:255.003c: na hi varted ayaṃ loko vārtām utsṛjya kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:255.004a: vakṣyāmi jājale vṛttiṃ nāsmi brāhmaṇa nāstikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.004c: na ca yajñaṃ vinindāmi yajñavit tu sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.005a: namo brāhmaṇayajñāya ye ca yajñavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.005c: svayajñaṃ brāhmaṇā hitvā kṣātraṃ yajñam ihāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.007a: idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam iti nāntaṃ cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:255.007b-0705_01: devaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etaṃ viddhi dharmaṃ ca jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.007b-0705_02: aparā hy anavasthaiṣā nāsmākaṃ buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:255.007c: ataḥ stainyaṃ prabhavati vikarmāṇi ca jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.007e: tad eva sukṛtaṃ havyaṃ yena tuṣyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.008c: pūjā syād devatānāṃ hi yathā śāstranidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:255.009c: lubdhebhyo jāyate lubdhaḥ samebhyo jāyate samaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.010a: yajamāno yathātmānam ṛtvijaś ca tathā prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.011c: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.012a: tasmāt svanuṣṭhitāt pūrve sarvān kāmāṃś ca lebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:255.012e: na te yajñeṣv ātmasu vā phalaṃ paśyanti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:255.013a: śaṅkamānāḥ phalaṃ yajñe ye yajeran kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:255.014a: sa sma pāpakṛtāṃ lokān gacched aśubhakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:255.014c: pramāṇam apramāṇena yaḥ kuryād aśubhaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.015a: kartavyam iti kartavyaṃ vetti yo brāhmaṇobhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:255.015c: brahmaiva vartate loke naiti kartavyatāṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.016a: viguṇaṃ ca punaḥ karma jyāya ity anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:255.018c: brāhmaṃ vedam adhīyantas toṣayanty amarān api
GE07mbh_12_u:255.019c: tṛpyanti tṛpyato devās tṛptās tṛptasya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.020a: yathā sarvarasais tṛpto nābhinandati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:255.021c: asti nas tattvato bhūya iti prajñāgaveṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.022a: jñānavijñāninaḥ ke cit paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.023a: yatra gatvā na śocanti na cyavanti vyathanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:255.023c: te tu tad brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ prāpnuvantīha sāttvikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.024a: naiva te svargam icchanti na yajanti yaśodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.025a: vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca phalamūlaṃ ca te viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.025c: na caitān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanti dhanārthinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.026a: svam eva cārthaṃ kurvāṇā yajñaṃ cakruḥ punar dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.026d-0706_01: tasmāt tān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanty aśubhān narān
GE07mbh_12_u:255.027c: iti me vartate buddhiḥ samā sarvatra jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.028a: prayuñjate yāni yajñe sadā prājñā dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:255.028c: tena te devayānena pathā yānti mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:255.029a: āvṛttis tatra caikasya nāsty āvṛttir manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:255.029c: ubhau tau devayānena gacchato jājale pathā
GE07mbh_12_u:255.030a: svayaṃ caiṣām anaḍuho yujyanti ca vahanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:255.031c: yas tathābhāvitātmā syāt sa gām ālabdhum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:255.032a: oṣadhībhis tathā brahman yajeraṃs te natādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.033c: akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.034a: nāśrāvayan na ca yajan na dadad brāhmaṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:255.034c: grāmyāṃ vṛttiṃ lipsamānaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ yāti jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.034e: idaṃ tu daivataṃ kṛtvā yathā yajñam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:255.035a: na vai munīnāṃ śṛṇumaḥ sma tattvaṃ; pṛcchāmi tvā vāṇija kaṣṭam etat
GE07mbh_12_u:255.035c: pūrve pūrve cāsya nāvekṣamāṇā; nātaḥ paraṃ tam ṛṣayaḥ sthāpayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:255.036a: asminn evātmatīrthe na paśavaḥ prāpnuyuḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:255.036c: atha svakarmaṇā kena vāṇija prāpnuyāt sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:255.036e: śaṃsa me tan mahāprājña bhṛśaṃ vai śraddadhāmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:255.037a: uta yajñā utāyajñā makhaṃ nārhanti te kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:255.037e: vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaurmakham
GE07mbh_12_u:255.038c: puroḍāśo hi sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ medhya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:255.039a: sarvā nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarve puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:255.039c: jājale tīrtham ātmaiva mā sma deśātithir bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:255.040a: etān īdṛśakān dharmān ācarann iha jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:255.040c: kāraṇair dharmam anvicchan na lokān āpnute śubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:255.041c: upapattyā hi saṃpannān nityaṃ sadbhir niṣevitān
GE07mbh_12_u:256.001a: sadbhir vā yadi vāsadbhir ayaṃ panthāḥ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.001c: pratyakṣaṃ kriyatāṃ sādhu tato jñāsyasi tad yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:256.002a: ete śakuntā bahavaḥ samantād vicaranti hi
GE07mbh_12_u:256.002c: tavottamāṅge saṃbhūtāḥ śyenāś cānyāś ca jātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.003c: paśyemān hastapādeṣu śliṣṭān dehe ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.004c: asaṃśayaṃ pitā ca tvaṃ putrān āhvaya jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:256.005c: vācam uccārayan divyāṃ dharmasya vacanāt kila
GE07mbh_12_u:256.006a: ahiṃsādikṛtaṃ karma iha caiva paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:256.006c: spardhā nihanti vai brahman sāhatā hanti taṃ naram
GE07mbh_12_u:256.007a: śraddhāvṛddhaṃ vāṅmanasī na yajñas trātum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:256.010a: prajāpatis tān uvāca viṣamaṃ kṛtam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:256.010e: bhojyam annaṃ vadānyasya kadaryasya na vārdhuṣeḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.011c: tasyaivānnaṃ na bhoktavyam iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.012c: jahāti pāpaṃ śraddhāvān sarpo jīrṇām iva tvacam
GE07mbh_12_u:256.013a: jyāyasī yā pavitrāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ śraddhayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:256.013c: nivṛttaśīladoṣo yaḥ śraddhāvān pūta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.014a: kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ vṛttena kim ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:256.014c: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.016a: spardhāṃ jahi mahāprājña tataḥ prāpsyasi yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:256.016c: śraddhāvāñ śraddadhānaś ca dharmāṃś caiveha vāṇijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.016e: svavartmani sthitaś caiva garīyān eṣa jājale
GE07mbh_12_u:256.017c: samyak caivam upālabdho dharmaś coktaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.018a: tasya vikhyātavīryasya śrutvā vākyāni sa dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:256.019a: tato 'cireṇa kālena tulādhāraḥ sa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:256.020c: kurvatāṃ yajña ity eva na yajño jātu neṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:256.021a: śraddhā vai sāttvikī devī sūryasya duhitā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:256.022a: vāgvṛddhaṃ trāyate śraddhā manovṛddhaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:257.002a: chinnasthūṇaṃ vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā virāvaṃ ca gavāṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.003a: svasti gobhyo 'stu lokeṣu tato nirvacanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.005a: sarvakarmasv ahiṃsā hi dharmātmā manur abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:257.005c: kāmarāgād vihiṃsanti bahir vedyāṃ paśūn narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:257.006a: tasmāt pramāṇataḥ kāryo dharmaḥ sūkṣmo vijānatā
GE07mbh_12_u:257.006c: ahiṃsaiva hi sarvebhyo dharmebhyo jyāyasī matā
GE07mbh_12_u:257.007a: upoṣya saṃśito bhūtvā hitvā vedakṛtāḥ śrutīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:257.008a: yadi yajñāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃś ca yūpāṃś coddiśya mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:257.008c: vṛthā māṃsāni khādanti naiṣa dharmaḥ praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:257.009a: māṃsaṃ madhu surā matsyā āsavaṃ kṛsaraudanam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.009c: dhūrtaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etan naitad vedeṣu kalpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.010a: kāmān mohāc ca lobhāc ca laulyam etat pravartitam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.010e: pāyasaiḥ sumanobhiś ca tasyāpi yajanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.011a: yajñiyāś caiva ye vṛkṣā vedeṣu parikalpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:257.011c: yac cāpi kiṃ cit kartavyam anyac cokṣaiḥ susaṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:257.011e: mahāsattvaiḥ śuddhabhāvaiḥ sarvaṃ devārham eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:257.013a: yathā śarīraṃ na glāyen neyān mṛtyuvaśaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:257.013c: tathā karmasu varteta samartho dharmam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:258.001a: kathaṃ kāryaṃ parīkṣeta śīghraṃ vātha cireṇa vā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.001c: sarvathā kāryadurge 'smin bhavān naḥ paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.002c: cirakāres tu yat pūrvaṃ vṛttam āṅgirase kule
GE07mbh_12_u:258.003a: cirakārika bhadraṃ te bhadraṃ te cirakārika
GE07mbh_12_u:258.005a: ciraṃ saṃcintayann arthāṃś ciraṃ jāgrac ciraṃ svapan
GE07mbh_12_u:258.007a: vyabhicāre tu kasmiṃś cid vyatikramyāparān sutān
GE07mbh_12_u:258.007d-0707_01: ity uktvā sa tadā vipro gautamas tapatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.007d-0707_02: avimṛśya mahābhāgo vanam eva jagāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:258.008c: vimṛśya cirakāritvāc cintayām āsa vai ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:258.009a: pitur ājñāṃ kathaṃ kuryāṃ na hanyāṃ mātaraṃ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:258.010a: pitur ājñā paro dharmaḥ svadharmo mātṛrakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.010c: asvatantraṃ ca putratvaṃ kiṃ nu māṃ nātra pīḍayet
GE07mbh_12_u:258.011a: striyaṃ hatvā mātaraṃ ca ko hi jātu sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:258.011c: pitaraṃ cāpy avajñāya kaḥ pratiṣṭhām avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:258.013a: pitā hy ātmānam ādhatte jāyāyāṃ jajñiyām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:258.014a: so 'ham ātmā svayaṃ pitrā putratve prakṛtaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.014c: vijñānaṃ me kathaṃ na syād bubudhe cātmasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.015a: jātakarmaṇi yat prāha pitā yac copakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:258.016a: gurur agryaḥ paro dharmaḥ poṣaṇādhyayanād dhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.016c: pitā yad āha dharmaḥ sa vedeṣv api suniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.017a: prītimātraṃ pituḥ putraḥ sarvaṃ putrasya vai pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.017c: śarīrādīni deyāni pitā tv ekaḥ prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.018a: tasmāt pitur vacaḥ kāryaṃ na vicāryaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:258.020a: pitā svargaḥ pitā dharmaḥ pitā paramakaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.020c: pitari prītim āpanne sarvāḥ prīyanti devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.021a: āśiṣas tā bhajanty enaṃ puruṣaṃ prāha yāḥ pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.022a: mucyate bandhanāt puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vṛntāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.022c: kliśyann api sutasnehaiḥ pitā snehaṃ na muñcati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.023c: pitā hy alpataraṃ sthānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi mātaram
GE07mbh_12_u:258.024a: yo hy ayaṃ mayi saṃghāto martyatve pāñcabhautikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.024c: asya me jananī hetuḥ pāvakasya yathāraṇiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.025a: na ca śocati nāpy enaṃ sthāviryam apakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.025c: śriyā hīno 'pi yo gehe ambeti pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.025d-0709_01: prāpnuyād eva harṣaṃ sa cintātmā mānuṣaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.027a: samarthaṃ vāsamarthaṃ vā kṛśaṃ vāpy akṛśaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.027c: rakṣaty eva sutaṃ mātā nānyaḥ poṣṭā vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.028a: tadā sa vṛddho bhavati yadā bhavati duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.028c: tadā śūnyaṃ jagat tasya yadā mātrā viyujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.029a: nāsti mātṛsamā chāyā nāsti mātṛsamā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.029c: nāsti mātṛsamaṃ trāṇaṃ nāsti mātṛsamā prapā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.031a: śiśoḥ śuśrūṣaṇāc chuśrūr mātā deham anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:258.031c: cetanāvān naro hanyād yasya nāsuṣiraṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.032c: taṃ mātā vā pitā veda bhūtārtho mātari sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.033a: mātā jānāti yad gotraṃ mātā jānāti yasya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.033c: mātur bharaṇamātreṇa prītiḥ snehaḥ pituḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.034a: pāṇibandhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtvā sahadharmam upetya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:258.034c: yadi yāpyanti puruṣāḥ striyo nārhanti yāpyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:258.035a: bharaṇād dhi striyo bhartā pātyāc caiva striyāḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.035c: guṇasyāsya nivṛttau tu na bhartā na patiḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.037a: striyā hi paramo bhartā daivataṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.037c: tasyātmanā tu sadṛśam ātmānaṃ paramaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:258.038a: yaś canokto hi nirdeśaḥ striyā maithunatṛptaye
GE07mbh_12_u:258.038c: tasya smārayato vyaktam adharmo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.039a: yāvan nārīṃ mātaraṃ ca gaurave cādhike sthitām
GE07mbh_12_u:258.040c: martyānāṃ devatānāṃ ca snehād abhyeti mātaram
GE07mbh_12_u:258.041c: dīrghaḥ kālo vyatikrāntas tatas tasyāgamat pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.046a: paravaty asmi cāpy uktaḥ praṇayiṣye nayena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:258.046c: atra cākuśale jāte striyo nāsti vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.047a: evaṃ na strī na caivāhaṃ nādhvagas tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.048c: īrṣyayā tv aham ākṣipto magno duṣkṛtasāgare
GE07mbh_12_u:258.049a: hatvā sādhvīṃ ca nārīṃ ca vyasanitvāc ca śāsitām
GE07mbh_12_u:258.049c: bhartavyatvena bhāryāṃ ca ko nu māṃ tārayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.050c: yady adya cirakārī syāt sa māṃ trāyeta pātakāt
GE07mbh_12_u:258.051a: cirakārika bhadraṃ te bhadraṃ te cirakārika
GE07mbh_12_u:258.051c: yady adya cirakārī tvaṃ tato 'si cirakārikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.052a: trāhi māṃ mātaraṃ caiva tapo yac cārjitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.053b-0710_01: āvayoś cittasaṃtāpaḥ na hy asatphalatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.054a: ciram āśaṃsito mātrā ciraṃ garbheṇa dhāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.055a: cirāyate ca saṃtāpāc ciraṃ svapiti vāritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.056a: evaṃ sa duḥkhito rājan maharṣir gautamas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.058a: gautamas tu sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śirasā patitaṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:258.058c: patnīṃ caiva nirākārāṃ parām abhyagaman mudam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.059a: na hi sā tena saṃbhedaṃ patnī nītā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:258.060a: hanyāt tv anapavādena śastrapāṇau sute sthite
GE07mbh_12_u:258.061a: buddhiś cāsīt sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pituś caraṇayor natam
GE07mbh_12_u:258.062a: tataḥ pitrā ciraṃ stutvā ciraṃ cāghrāya mūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:258.062c: ciraṃ dorbhyāṃ pariṣvajya ciraṃ jīvety udāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.064a: cirakārika bhadraṃ te cirakārī ciraṃ bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:258.064c: cirāyamāṇe tvayi ca ciram asmi suduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.065a: gāthāś cāpy abravīd vidvān gautamo munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.066a: cireṇa mitraṃ badhnīyāc cireṇa ca kṛtaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:258.066c: cireṇa hi kṛtaṃ mitraṃ ciraṃ dhāraṇam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.067a: rāge darpe ca māne ca drohe pāpe ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:258.068a: bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ strījanasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:258.069a: evaṃ sa gautamas tasya prītaḥ putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:258.070a: evaṃ sarveṣu kāryeṣu vimṛśya puruṣas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:258.070c: cireṇa niścayaṃ kṛtvā ciraṃ na paritapyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.071a: ciraṃ dhārayate roṣaṃ ciraṃ karma niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:258.071c: paścāttāpakaraṃ karma na kiṃ cid upapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.072a: ciraṃ vṛddhān upāsīta ciram anvāsya pūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:258.072c: ciraṃ dharmān niṣeveta kuryāc cānveṣaṇaṃ ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:258.073a: ciram anvāsya viduṣaś ciraṃ śiṣṭān niṣevya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:258.073c: ciraṃ vinīya cātmānaṃ ciraṃ yāty anavajñatām
GE07mbh_12_u:258.074c: ciraṃ pṛcchec ciraṃ brūyāc ciraṃ na paribhūyate
GE07mbh_12_u:258.075c: samāḥ svargaṃ gato vipraḥ putreṇa sahitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:259.001a: kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣen na ca kiṃ cit pratāpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:259.001c: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:259.003a: avyāhṛtaṃ vyājahāra satyavān iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:259.004a: adharmatāṃ yāti dharmo yāty adharmaś ca dharmatām
GE07mbh_12_u:259.004c: vadho nāma bhaved dharmo naitad bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:259.005a: atha ced avadho dharmo dharmaḥ ko jātu cid bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:259.005c: dasyavaś cen na hanyeran satyavan saṃkaro bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:259.006a: mamedam iti nāsyaitat pravarteta kalau yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:259.006c: lokayātrā na caiva syād atha ced vettha śaṃsa naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.007a: sarva eva trayo varṇāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇabandhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.008a: yo yas teṣām apacaret tam ācakṣīta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.008c: ayaṃ me na śṛṇotīti tasmin rājā pradhārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:259.009a: tattvābhedena yac chāstraṃ tat kāryaṃ nānyathā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.010a: dasyūn hinasti vai rājā bhūyaso vāpy anāgasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.010c: bhāryā mātā pitā putro hanyate puruṣe hate
GE07mbh_12_u:259.011a: asādhuś caiva puruṣo labhate śīlam ekadā
GE07mbh_12_u:259.011c: sādhoś cāpi hy asādhubhyo jāyate 'śobhanā prajā
GE07mbh_12_u:259.012a: na mūlaghātaḥ kartavyo naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.014a: yadā purohitaṃ vā te paryeyuḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.014c: kariṣyāmaḥ punar brahman na pāpam iti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.015a: tadā visargam arhāḥ syur itīdaṃ nṛpaśāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:259.016c: tathā visargam arhanti na yathā prathame tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:259.017a: yatra yatraiva śakyeran saṃyantuṃ samaye prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.017c: sa tāvat procyate dharmo yāvan na pratilaṅghyate
GE07mbh_12_u:259.018c: pūrve pūrvatare caiva suśāsyā abhavañ janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.020c: vadhenāpi na śakyante niyantum apare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.021a: naiva dasyur manuṣyāṇāṃ na devānām iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.021c: na gandharvapitṝṇāṃ ca kaḥ kasyeha na kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:259.022a: padmaṃ śmaśānād ādatte piśācāc cāpi daivatam
GE07mbh_12_u:259.022c: teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kuryād ajñeṣu hatabuddhiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:259.023a: tān na śaknoṣi cet sādhūn paritrātum ahiṃsayā
GE07mbh_12_u:259.023c: kasya cid bhūtabhavyasya lābhenāntaṃ tathā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:259.025a: vitrāsyamānāḥ sukṛto na kāmād ghnanti duṣkṛtīn
GE07mbh_12_u:259.026c: sadaiva hi guror vṛttam anuvartanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:259.028a: yo rājño dambhamohena kiṃ cit kuryād asāṃpratam
GE07mbh_12_u:259.028c: sarvopāyair niyamyaḥ sa tathā pāpān nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:259.029c: daṇḍayec ca mahādaṇḍair api bandhūn anantarān
GE07mbh_12_u:259.030a: yatra vai pāpakṛt kleśyo na mahad duḥkham archati
GE07mbh_12_u:259.030c: vardhante tatra pāpāni dharmo hrasati ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:259.030e: iti kāruṇyaśīlas tu vidvān vai brāhmaṇo 'nvaśāt
GE07mbh_12_u:259.032e: dvāpare tu dvipādena pādena tv apare yuge
GE07mbh_12_u:259.033a: tathā kaliyuge prāpte rājñāṃ duścaritena ha
GE07mbh_12_u:259.034c: āyuḥ śaktiṃ ca kālaṃ ca nirdiśya tapa ādiśet
GE07mbh_12_u:259.035a: satyāya hi yathā neha jahyād dharmaphalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:260.001c: yaḥ syād ubhayabhāg dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:260.003c: ubhau mahāphalau tāta sadbhir ācaritāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:260.004a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi prāmāṇyam ubhayos tayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.005c: kapilasya goś ca saṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:260.006a: āmnāyam anupaśyan hi purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:260.006c: nahuṣaḥ pūrvam ālebhe tvaṣṭur gām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:260.007a: tāṃ niyuktām adīnātmā sattvasthaḥ samaye rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.008a: sa buddhim uttamāṃ prāpto naiṣṭhikīm akutobhayām
GE07mbh_12_u:260.008c: smarāmi śithilaṃ satyaṃ vedā ity abravīt sakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:260.009a: tāṃ gām ṛṣiḥ syūmaraśmiḥ praviśya yatim abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:260.009c: haṃho vedā yadi matā dharmāḥ kenāpare matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.010c: sarvam ārṣaṃ hi manyante vyāhṛtaṃ viditātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.012a: nāhaṃ vedān vinindāmi na vivakṣāmi karhi cit
GE07mbh_12_u:260.012c: pṛthag āśramiṇāṃ karmāṇy ekārthānīti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:260.013a: gacchaty eva parityāgī vānaprasthaś ca gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:260.013c: gṛhastho brahmacārī ca ubhau tāv api gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.014a: devayānā hi panthānaś catvāraḥ śāśvatā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.015a: evaṃ viditvā sarvārthān ārabhed iti vaidikam
GE07mbh_12_u:260.015c: nārabhed iti cānyatra naiṣṭhikī śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.016a: anārambhe hy adoṣaḥ syād ārambhe 'doṣa uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.017a: yady atra kiṃ cit pratyakṣam ahiṃsāyāḥ paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:260.017c: ṛte tv āgamaśāstrebhyo brūhi tad yadi paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:260.018c: phalaṃ prakalpya pūrvaṃ hi tato yajñaḥ pratāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:260.019a: ajaś cāśvaś ca meṣaś ca gauś ca pakṣigaṇāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:260.020a: tathaivānnaṃ hy aharahaḥ sāyaṃ prātar nirupyate
GE07mbh_12_u:260.020c: paśavaś cātha dhānyaṃ ca yajñasyāṅgam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.022a: te smānyonyaṃcarāḥ sarve prāṇinaḥ sapta sapta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:260.022b-0711_02: ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.022b-0711_03: siṃhā vyāghrā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:260.022b-0711_04: mahiṣī vānarāś caiva saptāraṇyās tathā smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.023c: ko jātu na vicinvīta vidvān svāṃ śaktim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.024a: paśavaś ca manuṣyāś ca drumāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:260.024c: svargam evābhikāṅkṣante na ca svargas tv ṛte makham
GE07mbh_12_u:260.025a: oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣā vīrud ājyaṃ payo dadhi
GE07mbh_12_u:260.025c: havir bhūmir diśaḥ śraddhā kālaś caitāni dvādaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:260.026a: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajamānaś ca ṣoḍaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.026c: agnir jñeyo gṛhapatiḥ sa saptadaśa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:260.026e: aṅgāny etāni yajñasya yajño mūlam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.027c: vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaur makham
GE07mbh_12_u:260.027e: evaṃ pratyekaśaḥ sarvaṃ yad yad asya vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:260.029a: yajñārthāni hi sṛṣṭāni yathā vai śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.029c: evaṃ pūrve pūrvatarāḥ pravṛttāś caiva mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.030a: na hinasti hy ārabhate nābhidruhyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:260.030c: yajño yaṣṭavya ity eva yo yajaty aphalepsayā
GE07mbh_12_u:260.032a: āmnāyam ārṣaṃ paśyāmi yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.033c: anu yajñaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yajñaś cānu jagat sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:260.034a: om iti brahmaṇo yonir namaḥ svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.035a: na tasya triṣu lokeṣu paralokabhayaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.035c: iti vedā vadantīha siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.036a: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni stobhāś ca vidhicoditāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.036c: yasminn etāni sarvāṇi bahir eva sa vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.037a: agnyādheye yad bhavati yac ca some sute dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:260.037c: yac cetarair mahāyajñair veda tad bhagavān svataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:260.039a: nāyaṃ loko 'sty ayajñānāṃ paraś ceti viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.001c: naiṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kaś cid asti vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.003c: brahmiṣṭhā brahmabhūtāś ca brahmaṇy eva kṛtālayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.004c: teṣāṃ gatiṃ parāṃ prāpya gārhasthye kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.005a: yady eṣā paramā niṣṭhā yady eṣā paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.006a: yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.007a: gṛhastha eva yajate gṛhasthas tapyate tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.007c: gārhasthyam asya dharmasya mūlaṃ yat kiṃ cid ejate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.008a: prajanād dhy abhinirvṛttāḥ sarve prāṇabhṛto mune
GE07mbh_12_u:261.008c: prajanaṃ cāpy utānyatra na kathaṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.009a: yās tāḥ syur bahir oṣadhyo bahv araṇyās tathā dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:261.009c: oṣadhibhyo bahir yasmāt prāṇī kaś cin na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.009e: kasyaiṣā vāg bhavet satyā mokṣo nāsti gṛhād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:261.011a: trailokyasyaiva hetur hi maryādā śāśvatī dhruvā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.012a: prāg garbhādhānān mantrā hi pravartante dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:261.013c: dānaṃ gavāṃ paśūnāṃ vā piṇḍānāṃ cāpsu majjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.014c: mṛtasyāpy anumanyante mantrā mantrāś ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.015a: evaṃ krośatsu vedeṣu kuto mokṣo 'sti kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:261.017a: na vai pāpair hriyate kṛṣyate vā; yo brāhmaṇo yajate vedaśāstraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.017c: ūrdhvaṃ yajñaḥ paśubhiḥ sārdham eti; saṃtarpitas tarpayate ca kāmaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.018a: na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.018c: mahat prāpnoti puruṣo brahma brahmaṇi vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:261.019a: darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca agnihotraṃ ca dhīmatām
GE07mbh_12_u:261.020c: brahmaṇaiva sma te devāṃs tarpayanty amṛtaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.022a: caturdvāraṃ puruṣaṃ caturmukhaṃ; caturdhā cainam upayāti nindā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.022c: bāhubhyāṃ vāca udarād upasthāt; teṣāṃ dvāraṃ dvārapālo bubhūṣet
GE07mbh_12_u:261.023a: nākṣair dīvyen nādadītānyavittaṃ; na vāyonīyasya śṛtaṃ pragṛhṇet
GE07mbh_12_u:261.023c: kruddho na caiva prahareta dhīmāṃs; tathāsya tat pāṇipādaṃ suguptam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.024a: nākrośam archen na mṛṣā vadec ca; na paiśunaṃ janavādaṃ ca kuryāt
GE07mbh_12_u:261.024c: satyavrato mitabhāṣo 'pramattas; tathāsya vāgdvāram atho suguptam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.025a: nānāśanaḥ syān na mahāśanaḥ syād; alolupaḥ sādhubhir āgataḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:261.025c: yātrārtham āhāram ihādadīta; tathāsya syāj jāṭharī dvāraguptiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.026a: na vīrapatnīṃ vihareta nārīṃ; na cāpi nārīm anṛtāv āhvayīta
GE07mbh_12_u:261.026c: bhāryāvrataṃ hy ātmani dhārayīta; tathāsyopasthadvāraguptir bhaveta
GE07mbh_12_u:261.027c: upastham udaraṃ bāhū vāk caturthī sa vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.028a: moghāny aguptadvārasya sarvāṇy eva bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:261.028c: kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ yajñena kim ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.029c: bāhūpadhānaṃ śāmyantaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.030a: dvaṃdvārāmeṣu sarveṣu ya eko ramate muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.030c: pareṣām ananudhyāyaṃs taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.031a: yena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.031c: gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.032c: sarvabhūtātmabhūto yas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.033c: anujñāya ca tat sarvam anyad rocayate 'phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.034a: phalavanti ca karmāṇi vyuṣṭimanti dhruvāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:261.035a: guṇāś cātra sudurjñeyā jñātāś cāpi suduṣkarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.036a: yathā ca vedaprāmāṇyaṃ tyāgaś ca saphalo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.036c: tau panthānāv ubhau vyaktau bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:261.037a: pratyakṣam iha paśyanti bhavantaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.037c: pratyakṣaṃ tu kim atrāsti yad bhavanta upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.038e: imaṃ ca saṃśayaṃ ghoraṃ bhagavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:261.039a: pratyakṣam iha paśyanto bhavantaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.039c: kim atra pratyakṣatamaṃ bhavanto yad upāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.041a: naur nāvīva nibaddhā hi srotasā sanibandhanā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.041e: etad bravītu bhagavān upapanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.042a: naiva tyāgī na saṃtuṣṭo nāśoko na nirāmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.042c: na nirvivitso nāvṛtto nāpavṛtto 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:261.043a: bhavanto 'pi ca hṛṣyanti śocanti ca yathā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.045a: yad yad ācarate śāstram atha sarvapravṛttiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:261.045c: yasya yatra hy anuṣṭhānaṃ tatra tatra nirāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.046a: sarvaṃ pāvayate jñānaṃ yo jñānaṃ hy anuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.046c: jñānād apetya yā vṛttiḥ sā vināśayati prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.047a: bhavanto jñānino nityaṃ sarvataś ca nirāgamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.047c: aikātmyaṃ nāma kaś cid dhi kadā cid abhipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.048a: śāstraṃ hy abuddhvā tattvena ke cid vādabalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.050a: vaiguṇyam eva paśyanti na guṇān anuyuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:261.051a: yo yathāprakṛtir jantuḥ prakṛteḥ syād vaśānugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.051c: tasya dveṣaś ca kāmaś ca krodho dambho 'nṛtaṃ madaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.052c: parāṃ gatim abhīpsanto yatayaḥ saṃyame ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.052d-0712_02: katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.053a: sarvam etan mayā brahmañ śāstrataḥ parikīrtitam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.053c: na hy avijñāya śātrārthaṃ pravartante pravṛttayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.054a: yaḥ kaś cin nyāyya ācāraḥ sarvaṃ śāstram iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.054c: yad anyāyyam aśāstraṃ tad ity eṣā śrūyate śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.055a: na pravṛttir ṛte śāstrāt kā cid astīti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.055c: yad anyad vedavādebhyas tad aśāstram iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.056c: śāstradoṣān na paśyanti iha cāmutra cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:261.057a: śakyaṃ tv ekena muktena kṛtakṛtyena sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.058a: idaṃ tu duṣkaraṃ karma kuṭumbam abhisaṃśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:261.059a: yady etad evaṃ kṛtvāpi na vimokṣo 'sti kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:261.059c: dhik kartāraṃ ca kāryaṃ ca śramaś cāyaṃ nirarthakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.060a: nāstikyam anyathā ca syād vedānāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥkriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:261.061a: tathyaṃ vadasva me brahmann upasanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:261.061c: yathā te vidito mokṣas tathecchāmy upaśikṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:262.001a: vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ lokānāṃ na vedāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.001c: dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:262.002a: śarīram etat kurute yad vede kurute tanum
GE07mbh_12_u:262.003a: ānantyam anuyuṅkte yaḥ karmaṇā tad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:262.004a: dharma ity eva ye yajñān vitanvanti nirāśiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.004e: dhanānām eṣa vai panthās tīrtheṣu pratipādanam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.007c: rājānaś ca tathā yuktā brāhmaṇāś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:262.010a: saṃhatya dharmaṃ caratāṃ purāsīt sukham eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:262.010c: teṣāṃ nāsīd vidhātavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:262.011a: satyaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya durādharṣatamā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.011c: na mātrām anurudhyante na dharmacchalam antataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.012a: ya eva prathamaḥ kalpas tam evābhyācaran saha
GE07mbh_12_u:262.012c: asyāṃ sthitau sthitānāṃ hi prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:262.014a: teṣāṃ yajñāś ca vedāś ca karmāṇi ca yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.014c: āgamāś ca yathākālaṃ saṃkalpāś ca yathāvratam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.015e: sarvam ānantyam evāsīd iti naḥ śāśvatī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.017a: taṃ sadācāram āścaryaṃ purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.017c: aśaknuvadbhiś carituṃ kiṃ cid dharmeṣu sūcitam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.018c: sarvavarṇeṣu yat teṣu nāsīt kaś cid vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.019a: dharmam ekaṃ catuṣpādam āśritās te nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.019c: taṃ santo vidhivat prāpya gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:262.020a: gṛhebhya eva niṣkramya vanam anye samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.021a: dharmam etaṃ catuṣpādam āśramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.021c: ānantyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ brāhmaṇā nāma niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.022c: ta ete divi dṛśyante jyotirbhūtā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.024a: yady āgacchanti saṃsāraṃ punar yoniṣu tādṛśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.024c: na lipyante pāpakṛtyaiḥ kadā cit karmayonitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.025a: evaṃ yukto brāhmaṇaḥ syād anyo brāhmaṇako bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:262.025c: karmaiva puruṣasyāha śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:262.026c: sarvam ānantyam evāsīd evaṃ naḥ śāśvatī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.028a: sa siddhaiḥ sādhyate nityaṃ brāhmaṇair niyatātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.030c: brahmaṇaḥ padam anvicchan saṃsārān mucyate śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.031a: ye bhuñjate ye dadate yajante 'dhīyate ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:262.031c: mātrābhir dharmalabdhābhir ye vā tyāgaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.032c: etad ācakṣva me brahman yathātathyena pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.033a: parigrahāḥ śubhāḥ sarve guṇato 'bhyudayāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:262.033c: na tu tyāgasukhaṃ prāptā etat tvam api paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:262.034c: āśramāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ niṣṭhāyām aikyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:262.035a: ekatve ca pṛthaktve ca viśeṣo nānya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:262.035c: tad yathāvad yathānyāyaṃ bhagavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:262.036a: śarīrapaktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.036c: pakve kaṣāye vamanai rasajñāne na tiṣṭhati
