GE07mbh_12_u:262.037a: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā śāntir ahiṃsā satyam ārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.037c: adroho nābhimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā śamas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:262.038a: panthāno brahmaṇas tv ete etaiḥ prāpnoti yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:262.039a: yāṃ viprāḥ sarvataḥ śāntā viśuddhā jñānaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.039c: gatiṃ gacchanti saṃtuṣṭās tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:262.040a: vedāṃś ca veditavyaṃ ca viditvā ca yathāsthiti
GE07mbh_12_u:262.040c: evaṃ vedavid ity āhur ato 'nyo vātareṭakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.041a: sarvaṃ vidur vedavido vede sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.041c: vede hi niṣṭhā sarvasya yad yad asti ca nāsti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:262.042a: eṣaiva niṣṭhā sarvasya yad yad asti ca nāsti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:262.042c: etad antaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca sac cāsac ca vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.043a: samastatyāga ity eva śama ity eva niṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:262.043c: saṃtoṣa ity atra śubham apavarge pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.044a: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ viditaṃ veditavyaṃ; sarvasyātmā jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:262.044c: sarvaṃ sukhaṃ yac chivam uttamaṃ ca; brahmāvyaktaṃ prabhavaś cāvyayaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:262.045a: tejaḥ kṣamā śāntir anāmayaṃ śubhaṃ; tathāvidhaṃ vyoma sanātanaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:262.045c: etaiḥ śabdair gamyate buddhinetrais; tasmai namo brahmaṇe brāhmaṇāya
GE07mbh_12_u:263.001a: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca vedāḥ śaṃsanti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.001c: kasya lābho viśiṣṭo 'tra tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:263.003a: adhano brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cit kāmād dharmam avaikṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.004a: sa niścayam atho kṛtvā pūjayām āsa devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.004c: bhaktyā na caivādhyagacchad dhanaṃ saṃpūjya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.005a: tataś cintāṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ katamad daivataṃ nu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:263.005c: yan me drutaṃ prasīdeta mānuṣair ajaḍīkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.007a: dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mahātmānaṃ tasya bhaktir ajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.007c: ayaṃ me dhāsyati śreyo vapur etad dhi tādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.008a: saṃnikṛṣṭaś ca devasya na cānyair mānuṣair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.008c: eṣa me dāsyati dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ śīghram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.009a: tato dhūpaiś ca gandhaiś ca mālyair uccāvacair api
GE07mbh_12_u:263.009c: balibhir vividhaiś cāpi pūjayām āsa taṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.010a: tataḥ svalpena kālena tuṣṭo jaladharas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.010c: tasyopakāre niyatām imāṃ vācam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:263.011a: brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.011c: niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.012c: putro lobho nikṛtyās tu kṛtaghno nārhati prajām
GE07mbh_12_u:263.013a: tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ svapne kuṇḍadhārasya tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.014a: śamena tapasā caiva bhaktyā ca nirupaskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.016a: tatra devāḥ prayacchanti rājyāni ca dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.016c: śubhaiḥ karmabhir ārabdhāḥ pracchidanty aśubheṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.018c: uvāca patitaṃ bhūmau kuṇḍadhāra kim iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:263.019a: yadi prasannā devā me bhakto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:263.019c: asyānugraham icchāmi kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit sukhodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.020a: tatas taṃ maṇibhadras tu punar vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:263.021a: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te kṛtakāryaḥ sukhī bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:263.021b-0717_01: dhanārthī yadi vipro 'yaṃ dhanam asmai pradīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:263.021c: yāvad dhanaṃ prārthayate brāhmaṇo 'yaṃ sakhā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:263.021e: devānāṃ śāsanāt tāvad asaṃkhyeyaṃ dadāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:263.022a: vicārya kuṇḍadhāras tu mānuṣyaṃ calam adhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.024a: pṛthivīṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ vā mahad vā dhanasaṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.024c: bhaktāya nāham icchāmi bhaved eṣa tu dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.026a: yadā dharmaphalaṃ rājyaṃ sukhāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.027a: tatas tad eva bahuśaḥ kuṇḍadhāro mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.027c: abhyāsam akarod dharme tatas tuṣṭāsya devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.028a: prītās te devatāḥ sarvā dvijasyāsya tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.028c: bhaviṣyaty eṣa dharmātmā dharme cādhāsyate matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.029b-0718_01: brāhmaṇaḥ sa ca saṃtapto rājyalobhād ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:263.029c: īpsitaṃ manaso labdhvā varam anyaiḥ sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:263.031a: ayaṃ na sukṛtaṃ vetti ko nv anyo vetsyate kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.031c: gacchāmi vanam evāhaṃ varaṃ dharmeṇa jīvitum
GE07mbh_12_u:263.032a: nirvedād devatānāṃ ca prasādāt sa dvijottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.032c: vanaṃ praviśya sumahat tapa ārabdhavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.035a: vāyubhakṣas tataḥ paścād bahūn varṣagaṇān abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:263.035c: na cāsya kṣīyate prāṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:263.036a: dharme ca śraddadhānasya tapasy ugre ca vartataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.036c: kālena mahatā tasya divyā dṛṣṭir ajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.037a: tasya buddhiḥ prādurāsīd yadi dadyāṃ mahad dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.037a-0719_01: rājyaṃ vā mama saṃtuṣṭo naṣṭo 'haṃ syāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.037c: tuṣṭaḥ kasmai cid evāhaṃ na mithyā vāg bhaven mama
GE07mbh_12_u:263.038c: bhūyaś cācintayat siddho yat paraṃ so 'bhyapadyata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.039a: yadi dadyām ahaṃ rājyaṃ tuṣṭo vai yasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:263.039c: sa bhaved acirād rājā na mithyā vāg bhaven mama
GE07mbh_12_u:263.040a: tasya sākṣāt kuṇḍadhāro darśayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:263.041a: samāgamya sa tenātha pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:263.042a: tato 'bravīt kuṇḍadhāro divyaṃ te cakṣur uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.042c: paśya rājñāṃ gatiṃ vipra lokāṃś cāvekṣa cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.043a: tato rājñāṃ sahasrāṇi magnāni niraye tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.043c: dūrād apaśyad vipraḥ sa divyayuktena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:263.044a: māṃ pūjayitvā bhāvena yadi tvaṃ duḥkham āpnuyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.044c: kṛtaṃ mayā bhavet kiṃ te kaś ca te 'nugraho bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:263.045a: paśya paśya ca bhūyas tvaṃ kāmān icchet kathaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.046a: tato 'paśyat sa kāmaṃ ca krodhaṃ lobhaṃ bhayaṃ madam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.046c: nidrāṃ tandrīṃ tathālasyam āvṛtya puruṣān sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:263.047a: etair lokāḥ susaṃruddhā devānāṃ mānuṣād bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:263.048a: na devair ananujñātaḥ kaś cid bhavati dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.048c: eṣa śakto 'si tapasā rājyaṃ dātuṃ dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:263.049c: uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā mahān me 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.050c: mayā sneham avijñāya tatra me kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:263.051a: kṣāntam eva mayety uktvā kuṇḍadhāro dvijarṣabham
GE07mbh_12_u:263.052a: tataḥ sarvān imāṃl lokān brāhmaṇo 'nucacāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:263.053c: dharmāc chaktyā tathā yogād yā caiva paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.054c: dhārmikān pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyān na kāminaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.055a: suprasannā hi te devā yat te dharme ratā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:263.055c: dhane sukhakalā kā cid dharme tu paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:264.001c: dharmārthaṃ na sukhārthārthaṃ kathaṃ yajñaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:264.003a: rāṣṭre dharmottare śreṣṭhe vidarbheṣv abhavad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:264.003c: uñchavṛttir ṛṣiḥ kaś cid yajñe yajñaṃ samādadhe
GE07mbh_12_u:264.004c: tiktaṃ ca virasaṃ śākaṃ tapasā svādutāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:264.005c: api mūlaphalair ijyo yajñaḥ svargyaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:264.008e: vacobhir abravīt satyaṃ tvayā duṣkṛtakaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:264.009c: māṃ bhoḥ prakṣipa hotre tvaṃ gaccha svargam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:264.010a: tatas tu yajñe sāvitrī sākṣāt taṃ saṃnyamantrayat
GE07mbh_12_u:264.011a: evam uktā nivṛttā sā praviṣṭā yajñapāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:264.011c: kiṃ nu duścaritaṃ yajñe didṛkṣuḥ sā rasātalam
GE07mbh_12_u:264.012a: sā tu baddhāñjaliṃ satyam ayācad dhariṇaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:264.013a: tataḥ sa hariṇo gatvā padāny aṣṭau nyavartata
GE07mbh_12_u:264.013c: sādhu hiṃsaya māṃ satya hato yāsyāmi sadgatim
GE07mbh_12_u:264.014a: paśya hy apsaraso divyā mayā dattena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:264.016a: sa tu dharmo mṛgo bhūtvā bahuvarṣoṣito vane
GE07mbh_12_u:264.016c: tasya niṣkṛtim ādhatta na hy asau yajñasaṃvidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:264.017a: tasya tena tu bhāvena mṛgahiṃsātmanas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:264.017c: tapo mahat samucchinnaṃ tasmād dhiṃsā na yajñiyā
GE07mbh_12_u:264.018a: tatas taṃ bhagavān dharmo yajñaṃ yājayata svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:264.018c: samādhānaṃ ca bhāryāyā lebhe sa tapasā param
GE07mbh_12_u:264.019c: satyaṃ te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ satyavādinām
GE07mbh_12_u:265.001a: kathaṃ bhavati pāpātmā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karoti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:265.001c: kena nirvedam ādatte mokṣaṃ vā kena gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.002c: śṛṇu mokṣaṃ sanirvedaṃ pāpaṃ dharmaṃ ca mūlataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:265.003a: vijñānārthaṃ hi pañcānām icchā pūrvaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:265.003c: prāpya tāñ jāyate kāmo dveṣo vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:265.004a: tatas tadarthaṃ yatate karma cārabhate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:265.005a: tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:265.005c: tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:265.006c: na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṃ karoti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:265.008a: tatraiva kurute buddhiṃ tataḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.010a: pāpaṃ cintayate caiva prabravīti karoti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:265.011c: sa neha sukham āpnoti kuta eva paratra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:265.012a: evaṃ bhavati pāpātmā dharmātmānaṃ tu me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:265.013a: ya etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.014c: prajñā dharme ca ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.015a: so 'tha dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu kurute manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:265.015c: tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vai
GE07mbh_12_u:265.016a: dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ mitraṃ ca labhate śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:265.016c: sa mitradhanalābhāt tu pretya ceha ca nandati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.017a: śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:265.017c: prabhutvaṃ labhate jantur dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:265.018a: sa dharmasya phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:265.019c: virajyate tadā kāmān na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcati
GE07mbh_12_u:265.020a: sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:265.021a: śanair nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:265.021c: dharmātmā caiva bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate param
GE07mbh_12_u:265.022a: etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:265.022c: pāpaṃ dharmaṃ tathā mokṣaṃ nirvedaṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:265.023c: dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya siddhir bhavati śāśvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:266.001c: tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:266.003a: karaṇe ghaṭasya yā buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:266.004a: pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam
GE07mbh_12_u:266.004c: ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:266.006c: icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet
GE07mbh_12_u:266.007c: nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:266.008c: lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:266.009a: anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:266.009c: āyatyā ca jayed āśām arthaṃ saṅgavivarjanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:266.010a: anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhaṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:266.011a: utthānena jayet tandrīṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:266.011c: maunena bahubhāṣyaṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet
GE07mbh_12_u:266.012a: yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:266.012c: jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:266.013c: yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:266.014a: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:266.015a: dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā
GE07mbh_12_u:266.015c: śaucam āhārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:266.016a: etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam apahanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:266.016c: sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:266.017c: kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:266.019a: eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.002a: āsīnaṃ devalaṃ vṛddhaṃ buddhvā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.003a: kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ brahman sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.003c: pralaye ca kam abhyeti tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:267.005c: etebhyo yaḥ paraṃ brūyād asad brūyād asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.006a: viddhi nārada pañcaitāñ śāśvatān acalān dhruvān
GE07mbh_12_u:267.008a: nopapattyā na vā yuktyā tv asad brūyād asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.008c: vettha tān abhinirvṛttān ṣaḍ ete yasya rāśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.009a: pañcaiva tāni kālaś ca bhāvābhāvau ca kevalau
GE07mbh_12_u:267.010a: abhāvād bhāviteṣv eva tebhyaś ca prabhavanty api
GE07mbh_12_u:267.010c: vinaṣṭo 'pi ca tāny eva jantur bhavati pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:267.011c: sūryaś cakṣur asur vāyur adbhyas tu khalu śoṇitam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.012a: cakṣuṣī nāsikākarṇau tvag jihveti ca pañcamī
GE07mbh_12_u:267.013a: darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ sparśanaṃ rasanaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:267.013c: upapattyā guṇān viddhi pañca pañcasu pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:267.014a: rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ sparśaḥ śabdaś caivātha tadguṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.015a: rūpaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ caitāṃs tu tadguṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:267.015c: indriyāṇi na budhyante kṣetrajñas tais tu budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:267.016a: cittam indriyasaṃghātāt paraṃ tasmāt paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.016c: manasas tu parā buddhiḥ kṣetrajño buddhitaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.017a: pūrvaṃ cetayate jantur indriyair viṣayān pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:267.017c: vicārya manasā paścād atha buddhyā vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:267.017e: indriyair upalabdhārthān sarvān yas tv adhyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:267.019a: pāṇipādaṃ ca pāyuś ca mehanaṃ pañcamaṃ mukham
GE07mbh_12_u:267.020c: gamanendriyaṃ tathā pādau karmaṇaḥ karaṇe karau
GE07mbh_12_u:267.022a: balaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaḍ etāni vācā samyag yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.024c: sevate viṣayān eva tad vidyāt svapnadarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:267.025a: sāttvikāś caiva ye bhāvās tathā rājasatāmasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.026a: ānandaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiḥ pratipattiḥ parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.027a: jantuṣv ekatameṣv evaṃ bhāvā ye vidhim āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.028a: indriyāṇi ca bhāvāś ca guṇāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.028c: teṣām aṣṭādaśo dehī yaḥ śarīre sa śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.029a: atha vā saśarīrās te guṇāḥ sarve śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:267.029c: saṃśritās tadviyoge hi saśarīrā na santi te
GE07mbh_12_u:267.030c: ekaś ca daśa cāṣṭau ca guṇāḥ saha śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:267.030e: ūṣmaṇā saha viṃśo vā saṃghātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.031a: mahān saṃdhārayaty etac charīraṃ vāyunā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:267.032a: yathaivotpadyate kiṃ cit pañcatvaṃ gacchate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:267.033a: hitvā hitvā hy ayaṃ praiti dehād dehaṃ kṛtāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:267.033c: kālasaṃcoditaḥ kṣetrī viśīrṇād vā gṛhād gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:267.035a: na hy ayaṃ kasya cit kaś cin nāsya kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:267.035c: bhavaty eko hy ayaṃ nityaṃ śarīre sukhaduḥkhabhāk
GE07mbh_12_u:267.036a: naiva saṃjāyate jantur na ca jātu vipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:267.036c: yāti deham ayaṃ bhuktvā kadā cit paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:267.038c: tatkṣaye hy asya paśyanti brahmabhāve parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:268.001a: bhrātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:268.002a: yeyam arthodbhavā tṛṣṇā katham etāṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:268.002c: nivartayema pāpaṃ hi tṛṣṇayā kāritā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:268.004a: susukhaṃ bata jīvāmi yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:268.004c: mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:268.005a: arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām
GE07mbh_12_u:268.005c: asamṛddhās tv api sadā mohayanty avicakṣaṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:268.006a: yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:268.007a: yathaiva śṛṅgaṃ goḥ kāle vardhamānasya vardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:268.008a: kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:268.008c: tad eva paritāpāya nāśe saṃpadyate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:268.009a: na kāmān anurudhyeta duḥkhaṃ kāmeṣu vai ratiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:268.010c: kṛtakṛtyo viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ tyajati vai saha
GE07mbh_12_u:268.012a: yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:268.012c: yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:268.013c: dharmātmā labhate kīrtiṃ pretya ceha yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:268.014a: rājñas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītimān abhavad dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:268.014c: pūjayitvā ca tad vākyaṃ māṇḍavyo mokṣam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:269.001c: prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:269.002c: prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:269.002d-0723_02: hārītena purā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:269.004a: na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayed api
GE07mbh_12_u:269.004c: na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā dūṣaṇaṃ vyāharet kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:269.005c: nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:269.006c: krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:269.007a: pradakṣiṇaṃ prasavyaṃ ca grāmamadhye na cācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:269.008a: avakīrṇaḥ suguptaś ca na vācā hy apriyaṃ vadet
GE07mbh_12_u:269.008c: mṛduḥ syād apratikrūro visrabdhaḥ syād aroṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:269.009c: atīte pātrasaṃcāre bhikṣāṃ lipseta vai muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:269.010c: alābhe na vihanyeta lābhaś cainaṃ na harṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:269.012a: na cānnadoṣān nindeta na guṇān abhipūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:269.013a: śūnyāgāraṃ vṛkṣamūlam araṇyam atha vā guhām
GE07mbh_12_u:269.014d-0724_03: asvantaṃ bhautikaṃ sargaṃ paśyan bhūtātmikāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:269.015a: vāco vegaṃ manasaḥ krodhavegaṃ; vivitsāvegam udaropasthavegam
GE07mbh_12_u:269.015c: etān vegān vinayed vai tapasvī; nindā cāsya hṛdayaṃ nopahanyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:269.018c: ajñātalipsāṃ lipseta na cainaṃ harṣa āviśet
GE07mbh_12_u:269.019a: vijānatāṃ mokṣa eṣa śramaḥ syād avijānatām
GE07mbh_12_u:269.020a: abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt
GE07mbh_12_u:270.001a: dhanyā dhanyā iti janāḥ sarve 'smān pravadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:270.001c: na duḥkhitataraḥ kaś cit pumān asmābhir asti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:270.002c: prāpya jātiṃ manuṣyeṣu devair api pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:270.005c: kadā vayaṃ bhaviṣyāmo rājyaṃ hitvā paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:270.006c: punarbhāvo 'pi saṃkhyāto nāsti kiṃ cid ihācalam
GE07mbh_12_u:270.007a: na cāpi gamyate rājan naiṣa doṣaḥ prasaṅgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.008c: tata eva samutthena tamasā rudhyate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:270.011a: jñānena hi yadā jantur ajñānaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.012a: ayatnasādhyaṃ munayo vadanti; ye cāpi muktās ta upāsitavyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.012c: tvayā ca lokena ca sāmareṇa; tasmān na śāmyanti maharṣisaṃghāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.013a: asminn arthe purā gītaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:270.015a: bhraṣṭaiśvaryaṃ purā vṛtram uśanā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:270.015c: kaccit parājitasyādya na vyathā te 'sti dānava
GE07mbh_12_u:270.016a: satyena tapasā caiva viditvā saṃkṣayaṃ hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:270.016c: na śocāmi na hṛṣyāmi bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:270.018a: kṣapayitvā tu taṃ kālaṃ gaṇitaṃ kālacoditāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.020c: yathā karma tathā lābha iti śāstranidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:270.021a: tiryag gacchanti narakaṃ mānuṣyaṃ daivam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:270.021c: sukhaduḥkhe priyadveṣye caritvā pūrvam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:270.023e: bhīmān duṣṭapralāpāṃs tvaṃ tāta kasmāt prabhāṣase
GE07mbh_12_u:270.024c: mayā yaj jayalubdhena purā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.025a: gandhān ādāya bhūtānāṃ rasāṃś ca vividhān api
GE07mbh_12_u:270.025c: avardhaṃ trīn samākramya lokān vai svena tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:270.027a: aiśvaryaṃ tapasā prāptaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ tac ca svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.027c: dhṛtim āsthāya bhagavan na śocāmi tatas tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:270.028c: tato me bhagavān dṛṣṭo harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.030a: nūnaṃ tu tasya tapasaḥ sāvaśeṣaṃ mamāsti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:270.030c: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi bhavantaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:270.031a: aiśvaryaṃ vai mahad brahman kasmin varṇe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:270.031c: nivartate cāpi punaḥ katham aiśvaryam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:270.032a: kasmād bhūtāni jīvanti pravartante 'tha vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.032c: kiṃ vā phalaṃ paraṃ prāpya jīvas tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:270.033a: kena vā karmaṇā śakyam atha jñānena kena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:270.033c: brahmarṣe tat phalaṃ prāptuṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:270.034a: itīdam uktaḥ sa munis tadānīṃ; pratyāha yat tac chṛṇu rājasiṃha
GE07mbh_12_u:270.034c: mayocyamānaṃ puruṣarṣabha tvam; ananyacittaḥ saha sodarīyaiḥ uśanovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.002a: mūrdhā yasya tv anantaṃ ca sthānaṃ dānavasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:271.002c: tasyāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.005a: tam āsīnaṃ mahāprājñam uśanā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:271.005c: brūhy asmai dānavendrāya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.006a: sanatkumāras tu tataḥ śrutvā prāha vaco 'rthavat
GE07mbh_12_u:271.007a: śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ daitya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.007c: viṣṇau jagat sthitaṃ sarvam iti viddhi paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:271.008c: eṣa cākṣipate kāle kāle visṛjate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.008e: asmin gacchanti vilayam asmāc ca prabhavanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:271.009a: naiṣa dānavatā śakyas tapasā naiva cejyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.010a: bāhye cābhyantare caiva karmaṇā manasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.011a: yathā hiraṇyakartā vai rūpyam agnau viśodhayet
GE07mbh_12_u:271.013a: līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād ātmano rajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.014c: na muñcati svakaṃ gandhaṃ tadvat sūkṣmasya darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.015a: tad eva bahubhir mālyair vāsyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.016a: evaṃ jātiśatair yukto guṇair eva prasaṅgiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:271.017a: karmaṇā svena raktāni viraktāni ca dānava
GE07mbh_12_u:271.017c: yathā karmaviśeṣāṃś ca prāpnuvanti tathā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:271.018a: yathā ca saṃpravartante yasmiṃs tiṣṭhanti vā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:271.018c: tat te 'nupūrvyā vyākhyāsye tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:271.019c: sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.020a: eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.021a: pādau tasya mahīṃ viddhi mūrdhānaṃ divam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.021c: bāhavas tu diśo daitya śrotram ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.022a: tasya tejomayaḥ sūryo manaś candramasi sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.022c: buddhir jñānagatā nityaṃ rasas tv apsu pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:271.023c: nakṣatracakraṃ netrābhyāṃ pādayor bhūś ca dānava
GE07mbh_12_u:271.023d-0725_01: taṃ viśvabhūtaṃ viśvādiṃ paramaṃ viddhi ceśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:271.024a: rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi nārāyaṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.024c: so ''śramāṇāṃ mukhaṃ tāta karmaṇas tat phalaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.025a: akarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ caiva sa eva param avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.025c: chandāṃsi tasya romāṇi akṣaraṃ ca sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:271.026c: sa brahmaparamo dharmas tapaś ca sad asac ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.027c: pitāmahaś ca viṣṇuś ca so 'śvinau sa puraṃdaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.028a: mitraś ca varuṇaś caiva yamo 'tha dhanadas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.028e: ekasya viddhi devasya sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ vaśe
GE07mbh_12_u:271.029c: jantuḥ paśyati jñānena tataḥ sattvaṃ prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:271.030c: prajāvisargasya ca pārimāṇyaṃ; vāpīsahasrāṇi bahūni daitya
GE07mbh_12_u:271.031a: vāpyaḥ punar yojanavistṛtās tāḥ; krośaṃ ca gambhīratayāvagāḍhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.031c: āyāmataḥ pañcaśatāś ca sarvāḥ; pratyekaśo yojanataḥ pravṛddhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.032a: vāpyā jalaṃ kṣipyati vālakoṭyā; tv ahnā sakṛc cāpy atha na dvitīyam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.032c: tāsāṃ kṣaye viddhi kṛtaṃ visargaṃ; saṃhāram ekaṃ ca tathā prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:271.033a: ṣaḍ jīvavarṇāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇaṃ; kṛṣṇo dhūmro nīlam athāsya madhyam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.033c: raktaṃ punaḥ sahyataraṃ sukhaṃ tu; hāridravarṇaṃ susukhaṃ ca śuklam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.034a: paraṃ tu śuklaṃ vimalaṃ viśokaṃ; gataklamaṃ sidhyati dānavendra
GE07mbh_12_u:271.034c: gatvā tu yoniprabhavāni daitya; sahasraśaḥ siddhim upaiti jīvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.035a: gatiṃ ca yāṃ darśanam āha devo; gatvā śubhaṃ darśanam eva cāha
GE07mbh_12_u:271.035c: gatiḥ punar varṇakṛtā prajānāṃ; varṇas tathā kālakṛto 'surendra
GE07mbh_12_u:271.036a: śataṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśeha; parā gatir jīvaguṇasya daitya
GE07mbh_12_u:271.036c: ārohaṇaṃ tat kṛtam eva viddhi; sthānaṃ tathā niḥsaraṇaṃ ca teṣām
GE07mbh_12_u:271.037a: kṛṣṇasya varṇasya gatir nikṛṣṭā; sa majjate narake pacyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.037c: sthānaṃ tathā durgatibhis tu tasya; prajāvisargān subahūn vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:271.038a: śataṃ sahasrāṇi tataś caritvā; prāpnoti varṇaṃ haritaṃ tu paścāt
GE07mbh_12_u:271.038c: sa caiva tasmin nivasaty anīśo; yugakṣaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.039a: sa vai yadā sattvaguṇena yuktas; tamo vyapohan ghaṭate svabuddhyā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.039c: sa lohitaṃ varṇam upaiti nīlo; manuṣyaloke parivartate ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.040a: sa tatra saṃhāravisargam eva; svakarmajair bandhanaiḥ kliśyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.040c: tataḥ sa hāridram upaiti varṇaṃ; saṃhāravikṣepaśate vyatīte
GE07mbh_12_u:271.041a: hāridravarṇas tu prajāvisargān; sahasraśas tiṣṭhati saṃcaran vai
GE07mbh_12_u:271.041c: avipramukto niraye ca daitya; tataḥ sahasrāṇi daśāparāṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:271.042a: gatīḥ sahasrāṇi ca pañca tasya; catvāri saṃvartakṛtāni caiva
GE07mbh_12_u:271.042c: vimuktam enaṃ nirayāc ca viddhi; sarveṣu cānyeṣu ca saṃbhaveṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:271.043a: sa devaloke viharaty abhīkṣṇaṃ; tataś cyuto mānuṣatām upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:271.043c: saṃhāravikṣepaśatāni cāṣṭau; martyeṣu tiṣṭhann amṛtatvam eti
GE07mbh_12_u:271.044a: so 'smād atha bhraśyati kālayogāt; kṛṣṇe tale tiṣṭhati sarvakaṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:271.044c: yathā tv ayaṃ sidhyati jīvalokas; tat te 'bhidhāsyāmy asurapravīra
GE07mbh_12_u:271.045a: daivāni sa vyūhaśatāni sapta; rakto haridro 'tha tathaiva śuklaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.045c: saṃśritya saṃdhāvati śuklam etam; aṣṭāparān arcyatamān sa lokān
GE07mbh_12_u:271.046a: aṣṭau ca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca śatāni yāni; manoviruddhāni mahādyutīnām
GE07mbh_12_u:271.046c: śuklasya varṇasya parā gatir yā; trīṇy eva ruddhāni mahānubhāva
GE07mbh_12_u:271.047a: saṃhāravikṣepam aniṣṭam ekaṃ; catvāri cānyāni vasaty anīśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.047c: ṣaṣṭhasya varṇasya parā gatir yā; siddhā viśiṣṭasya gataklamasya
GE07mbh_12_u:271.048a: saptottaraṃ teṣu vasaty anīśaḥ; saṃhāravikṣepaśataṃ saśeṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.048c: tasmād upāvṛtya manuṣyaloke; tato mahān mānuṣatām upaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:271.049a: tasmād upāvṛtya tataḥ krameṇa; so 'gre sma saṃtiṣṭhati bhūtasargam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.049c: sa saptakṛtvaś ca paraiti lokān; saṃhāravikṣepakṛtapravāsaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.050a: saptaiva saṃhāram upaplavāni; saṃbhāvya saṃtiṣṭhati siddhaloke
GE07mbh_12_u:271.050c: tato 'vyayaṃ sthānam anantam eti; devasya viṣṇor atha brahmaṇaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.050e: śeṣasya caivātha narasya caiva; devasya viṣṇoḥ paramasya caiva
GE07mbh_12_u:271.051a: saṃhārakāle paridagdhakāyā; brahmāṇam āyānti sadā prajā hi
GE07mbh_12_u:271.051c: ceṣṭātmano devagaṇāś ca sarve; ye brahmalokād amarāḥ sma te 'pi
GE07mbh_12_u:271.052a: prajāvisargaṃ tu saśeṣakālaṃ; sthānāni svāny eva saranti jīvāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.052c: niḥśeṣāṇāṃ tat padaṃ yānti cānte; sarvāpadā ye sadṛśā manuṣyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.053a: ye tu cyutāḥ siddhalokāt krameṇa; teṣāṃ gatiṃ yānti tathānupūrvyā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.053c: jīvāḥ pare tadbalaveṣarūpā; vidhiṃ svakaṃ yānti viparyayeṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:271.054a: sa yāvad evāsti saśeṣabhukte; prajāś ca devyau ca tathaiva śukle
GE07mbh_12_u:271.054c: tāvat tadā teṣu viśuddhabhāvaḥ; saṃyamya pañcendriyarūpam etat
GE07mbh_12_u:271.055a: śuddhāṃ gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ paraiti; śuddhena nityaṃ manasā vicinvan
GE07mbh_12_u:271.055c: tato 'vyayaṃ sthānam upaiti brahma; duṣprāpam abhyeti sa śāśvataṃ vai
GE07mbh_12_u:271.055e: ity etad ākhyātam ahīnasattva; nārāyaṇasyeha balaṃ mayā te vṛtra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:271.056a: evaṃ gate me na viṣādo 'sti kaś cit; samyak ca paśyāmi vacas tavaitat
GE07mbh_12_u:271.056c: śrutvā ca te vācam adīnasattva; vikalmaṣo 'smy adya tathā vipāpmā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.057a: pravṛttam etad bhagavan maharṣe; mahādyuteś cakram anantavīryam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.057c: viṣṇor anantasya sanātanaṃ tat; sthānaṃ sargā yatra sarve pravṛttāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.057e: sa vai mahātmā puruṣottamo vai; tasmiñ jagat sarvam idaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:271.058a: evam uktvā sa kaunteya vṛtraḥ prāṇān avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:271.059a: ayaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ pitāmaha janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.059c: sanatkumāro vṛtrāya yat tad ākhyātavān purā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.060c: tatsthaḥ sṛjati tān bhāvān nānārūpān mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.061c: turīyārdhena lokāṃs trīn bhāvayaty eṣa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:271.062a: arvāk sthitas tu yaḥ sthāyī kalpānte parivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:271.062c: sa śete bhagavān apsu yo 'sāv atibalaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:271.062e: tān vidhātā prasannātmā lokāṃś carati śāśvatān
GE07mbh_12_u:271.063a: sarvāṇy aśūnyāni karoty anantaḥ; sanatkumāraḥ saṃcarate ca lokān
GE07mbh_12_u:271.063c: sa cāniruddhaḥ sṛjate mahātmā; tatsthaṃ jagat sarvam idaṃ vicitram
GE07mbh_12_u:271.064c: śubhā tasmāt sa sukhito na śocati pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:271.065c: tiryaggateś ca nirmukto nirayāc ca pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:271.066a: hāridravarṇe rakte vā vartamānas tu pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:271.067a: vayaṃ tu bhṛśam āpannā raktāḥ kaṣṭamukhe 'sukhe
GE07mbh_12_u:271.067c: kāṃ gatiṃ pratipatsyāmo nīlāṃ kṛṣṇādhamām atha
GE07mbh_12_u:271.069a: prajāvisargaṃ ca sukhena kāle; pratyetya deveṣu sukhāni bhuktvā
GE07mbh_12_u:271.069c: sukhena saṃyāsyatha siddhasaṃkhyāṃ; mā vo bhayaṃ bhūd vimalāḥ stha sarve
GE07mbh_12_u:272.001c: yasya vijñānam atulaṃ viṣṇor bhaktiś ca tādṛśī
GE07mbh_12_u:272.002c: kathaṃ vā rājaśārdūla padaṃ taj jñātavān asau
GE07mbh_12_u:272.003a: bhavatā kathitaṃ hy etac chraddadhe cāham acyuta
GE07mbh_12_u:272.003c: bhūyas tu me samutpannā buddhir avyaktadarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:272.004c: dharmiṣṭho viṣṇubhaktaś ca tattvajñaś ca padānvaye
GE07mbh_12_u:272.005a: etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi pṛcchato bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:272.005c: vṛtras tu rājaśārdūla yathā śakreṇa nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.006a: yathā caivābhavad yuddhaṃ tac cācakṣva pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:272.006c: vistareṇa mahābāho paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:272.007a: rathenendraḥ prayāto vai sārdhaṃ suragaṇaiḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:272.009a: tat prekṣya tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ trailokyenāpi durjayam
GE07mbh_12_u:272.009c: vṛtrasya devāḥ saṃtrastā na śāntim upalebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:272.010a: śakrasya tu tadā rājann ūrustambho vyajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:272.010c: bhayād vṛtrasya sahasā dṛṣṭvā tad rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:272.011a: tato nādaḥ samabhavad vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.012a: atha vṛtrasya kauravya dṛṣṭvā śakram upasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:272.012c: na saṃbhramo na bhīḥ kā cid āsthā vā samajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:272.013c: śakrasya ca surendrasya vṛtrasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.014c: śilābhir vividhābhiś ca kārmukaiś ca mahāsvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.015a: astraiś ca vividhair divyaiḥ pāvakolkābhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:272.015c: devāsurais tataḥ sainyaiḥ sarvam āsīt samākulam
GE07mbh_12_u:272.016c: ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgās tad yuddhaṃ draṣṭum āgaman
GE07mbh_12_u:272.023a: eṣa brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca śivaś caiva jagatprabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.023c: somaś ca bhagavān devaḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.023d-0730_01: samudvignaṃ samīkṣya tvāṃ svastīty ūcur jayāya te
GE07mbh_12_u:272.024a: mā kārṣīḥ kaśmalaṃ śakra kaś cid evetaro yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:272.024c: āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi śatruṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:272.025c: nirīkṣate tvāṃ bhagavāṃs tyaja mohaṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:272.026c: stavena śakra divyena stuvanti tvāṃ jayāya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:272.028c: yogena mahatā yuktas tāṃ māyāṃ vyapakarṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:272.030a: tato bhagavatas tejo jvaro bhūtvā jagatpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.032c: vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejāḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.033c: ūcur ekāgramanaso jahi vṛtram iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:272.034a: eṣa vṛtro mahāñ śakra balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.034c: viśvātmā sarvagaś caiva bahumāyaś ca viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.035c: jahi tvaṃ yogam āsthāya māvamaṃsthāḥ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:272.036a: anena hi tapas taptaṃ balārtham amarādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:272.036c: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi brahmā cāsmai varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:272.037a: mahattvaṃ yogināṃ caiva mahāmāyatvam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:272.037c: mahābalatvaṃ ca tathā tejaś cāgryaṃ sureśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:272.038a: etad vai māmakaṃ tejaḥ samāviśati vāsava
GE07mbh_12_u:272.038c: vṛtram enaṃ tvam apy evaṃ jahi vajreṇa dānavam
GE07mbh_12_u:272.040c: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca harṣān nādo mahān abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:272.041a: tato dundubhayaś caiva śaṅkhāś ca sumahāsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:272.043a: tam āviṣṭam atho jñātvā ṛṣayo devatās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:272.043c: stuvantaḥ śakram īśānaṃ tathā prācodayann api
GE07mbh_12_u:273.001c: abhavan yāni liṅgāni śarīre tāni me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:273.002c: gātrakampaś ca sumahāñ śvāsaś cāpy abhavan mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:273.002e: romaharṣaś ca tīvro 'bhūn niḥśvāsaś ca mahān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:273.003c: niṣpapāta mahāghorā smṛtiḥ sā tasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:273.003e: ulkāś ca jvalitās tasya dīptāḥ pārśve prapedire
GE07mbh_12_u:273.005a: tatas taṃ ratham āsthāya devāpyāyitam āhave
GE07mbh_12_u:273.006a: amānuṣam atho nādaṃ sa mumoca mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.006e: athāsya jṛmbhataḥ śakras tato vajram avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:273.007c: kṣipram eva mahākāyaṃ vṛtraṃ daityam apātayat
GE07mbh_12_u:273.008a: tato nādaḥ samabhavat punar eva samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.009a: vṛtraṃ tu hatvā bhagavān dānavārir mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.014a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya vṛtrahā kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:273.015a: bisān niḥsaramāṇaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ mahaujasam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.015c: kaṇṭhe jagrāha devendraṃ sulagnā cābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:273.016a: sa hi tasmin samutpanne brahmahatyākṛte bhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:273.017a: anusṛtya tu yatnāt sa tayā vai brahmahatyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:273.018a: tasyā vyapohane śakraḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:273.018c: na cāśakat tāṃ devendro brahmahatyāṃ vyapohitum
GE07mbh_12_u:273.019a: gṛhīta eva tu tayā devendro bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:273.022c: brūhi kiṃ te karomy adya kāmaṃ kaṃ tvam ihecchasi brahmahatyovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.023c: kṛtam eveha manye 'haṃ nivāsaṃ tu vidhatsva me
GE07mbh_12_u:273.024c: sthāpanā vai sumahatī tvayā deva pravartitā
GE07mbh_12_u:273.025a: prīte tu tvayi dharmajña sarvalokeśvare prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:273.025c: śakrād apagamiṣyāmi nivāsaṃ tu vidhatsva me
GE07mbh_12_u:273.026a: tatheti tāṃ prāha tadā brahmahatyāṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.027a: tataḥ svayaṃbhuvā dhyātas tatra vahnir mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:273.028c: yat kartavyaṃ mayā deva tad bhavān vaktum arhati brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.030a: mama mokṣasya ko 'nto vai brahman dhyāyasva vai prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:273.030c: etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ tattvato lokapūjita brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.031a: yas tvāṃ jvalantam āsādya svayaṃ vai mānavaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:273.032a: tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ tatraiva ca nivatsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:273.032c: brahmahatyā havyavāha vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.033a: ity uktaḥ pratijagrāha tad vaco havyakavyabhuk
GE07mbh_12_u:273.033c: pitāmahasya bhagavāṃs tathā ca tad abhūt prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:273.035c: vyathitaṃ vahnivad rājan brahmāṇam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:273.036c: svabhāvanihatān asmān na punar hantum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:273.037a: vayam agniṃ tathā śītaṃ varṣaṃ ca pavaneritam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.038a: brahmahatyām imām adya bhavataḥ śāsanād vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.038c: grahīṣyāmas trilokeśa mokṣaṃ cintayatāṃ bhavān brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.039a: parvakāle tu saṃprāpte yo vai chedanabhedanam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.041c: vācā madhurayā prāha sāntvayann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:273.042c: caturtham asyā bhāgaṃ hi mayoktāḥ saṃpratīcchata
GE07mbh_12_u:273.044a: rajasvalāsu nārīṣu yo vai maithunam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:273.044c: tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ vyetu vo mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.046a: tatas trilokakṛd devaḥ punar eva mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.046c: apaḥ saṃcintayām āsa dhyātās tāś cāpy athāgaman
GE07mbh_12_u:273.047a: tās tu sarvāḥ samāgamya brahmāṇam amitaujasam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.047c: idam ūcur vaco rājan praṇipatya pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:273.048a: imāḥ sma deva saṃprāptās tvatsakāśam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:273.048c: śāsanāt tava deveśa samājñāpaya no vibho brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.050a: evaṃ bhavatu lokeśa yathā vadasi naḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:273.051a: tvaṃ hi deveśa sarvasya jagataḥ paramo guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.051c: ko 'nyaḥ prasādo hi bhaved yaḥ kṛcchrān naḥ samuddharet brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:273.052a: alpā iti matiṃ kṛtvā yo naro buddhimohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.053a: tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ tatraiva ca nivatsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:273.053c: tathā vo bhavitā mokṣa iti satyaṃ bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.056a: śrūyate hi mahārāja saṃprāptā vāsavena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:273.057a: samavāpya śriyaṃ devo hatvārīṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.058a: vṛtrasya rudhirāc caiva khukhuṇḍāḥ pārtha jajñire
GE07mbh_12_u:273.058c: dvijātibhir abhakṣyās te dīkṣitaiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.059a: sarvāvasthaṃ tvam apy eṣāṃ dvijātīnāṃ priyaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:273.059c: ime hi bhūtale devāḥ prathitāḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:273.061a: evaṃ tvam api kauravya pṛthivyām aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:273.062a: ye tu śakrakathāṃ divyām imāṃ parvasu parvasu
GE07mbh_12_u:273.062c: vipramadhye paṭhiṣyanti na te prāpsyanti kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:273.063a: ity etad vṛtram āśritya śakrasyātyadbhutaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:273.063c: kathitaṃ karma te tāta kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:274.001c: asti vṛtravadhād eva vivakṣā mama jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.002a: jvareṇa mohito vṛtraḥ kathitas te janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:274.003a: katham eṣa mahāprājña jvaraḥ prādurabhūt kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.003c: jvarotpattiṃ nipuṇataḥ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:274.004c: vistaraṃ cāsya vakṣyāmi yādṛśaṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:274.006c: paryaṅka iva vibhrājann upaviṣṭo babhūva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:274.007a: śailarājasutā cāsya nityaṃ pārśve sthitā babhau
GE07mbh_12_u:274.007c: tathā devā mahātmāno vasavaś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.008a: tathaiva ca mahātmānāv aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau
GE07mbh_12_u:274.011a: vavau śivaḥ sukho vāyur nānāgandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.012a: tathā vidyādharāś caiva siddhāś caiva tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.013c: rākṣasāś ca mahāraudrāḥ piśācāś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.015a: nandī ca bhagavāṃs tatra devasyānumate sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.017a: evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pūjyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.018a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.019a: tatas tasya makhaṃ devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.021c: uvāca vacanaṃ sādhvī devaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:274.022a: bhagavan kva nu yānty ete devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.022c: brūhi tattvena tattvajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.023a: dakṣo nāma mahābhāge prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.024c: kena vā pratiṣedhena gamanaṃ te na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.025a: surair eva mahābhāge sarvam etad anuṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.025c: yajñeṣu sarveṣu mama na bhāga upakalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.026c: na me surāḥ prayacchanti bhāgaṃ yajñasya dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.027c: ajeyaś cāpradhṛṣyaś ca tejasā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.028c: atīva duḥkham utpannaṃ vepathuś ca mamānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:274.029a: evam uktvā tu sā devī devaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:274.030a: atha devyā mataṃ jñātvā hṛdgataṃ yac cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.030c: sa samājñāpayām āsa tiṣṭha tvam iti nandinam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.031c: taṃ yajñaṃ sumahātejā bhīmair anucarais tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.032a: ke cin nādān amuñcanta ke cid dhāsāṃś ca cakrire
GE07mbh_12_u:274.033a: ke cid yūpān samutpāṭya babhramur vikṛtānanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.034a: tataḥ sa yajño nṛpate vadhyamānaḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.034c: āsthāya mṛgarūpaṃ vai kham evābhyapatat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.035a: taṃ tu yajñaṃ tathārūpaṃ gacchantam upalabhya saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.035c: dhanur ādāya bāṇaṃ ca tadānvasarata prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.036c: lalāṭāt prasṛto ghoraḥ svedabindur babhūva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:274.037a: tasmin patitamātre tu svedabindau tathā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:274.039c: karālaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaś ca raktavāsās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.040a: taṃ yajñaṃ sa mahāsattvo 'dahat kakṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.040b-0735_01: vyacarat sarvato devān prādravat sa ṛṣīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.040c: devāś cāpy adravan sarve tato bhītā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:274.041a: tena tasmin vicaratā puruṣeṇa viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.042b-0736_01: hāhābhūtaṃ jagat sarvam upalakṣya tadā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.043a: bhavato 'pi surāḥ sarve bhāgaṃ dāsyanti vai prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:274.044a: imā hi devatāḥ sarvā ṛṣayaś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:274.044c: tava krodhān mahādeva na śāntim upalebhire
GE07mbh_12_u:274.045a: yaś caiṣa puruṣo jātaḥ svedāt te vibudhottama
GE07mbh_12_u:274.046a: ekībhūtasya na hy asya dhāraṇe tejasaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:274.046c: samarthā sakalā pṛthvī bahudhā sṛjyatām ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.047a: ity ukto brahmaṇā devo bhāge cāpi prakalpite
GE07mbh_12_u:274.048a: parāṃ ca prītim agamad utsmayaṃś ca pinākadhṛk
GE07mbh_12_u:274.048c: avāpa ca tadā bhāgaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.049a: jvaraṃ ca sarvadharmajño bahudhā vyasṛjat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.049c: śāntyarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śṛṇu tac cāpi putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:274.050c: apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyān nirmokaṃ bhujageṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.053a: abjānāṃ pittabhedaś ca sarveṣām iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.053c: śukānām api sarveṣāṃ hikkikā procyate jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.054a: śārdūleṣv atha dharmajña śramo jvara ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.054c: mānuṣeṣu tu dharmajña jvaro nāmaiṣa viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.054e: maraṇe janmani tathā madhye cāviśate naram
GE07mbh_12_u:274.055a: etan māheśvaraṃ tejo jvaro nāma sudāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.055c: namasyaś caiva mānyaś ca sarvaprāṇibhir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.056a: anena hi samāviṣṭo vṛtro dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.056c: vyajṛmbhata tataḥ śakras tasmai vajram avāsṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:274.057a: praviśya vajro vṛtraṃ tu dārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:274.057c: dāritaś ca sa vajreṇa mahāyogī mahāsuraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.058a: viṣṇubhaktyā hi tenedaṃ jagad vyāptam abhūt purā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.058c: tasmāc ca nihato yuddhe viṣṇoḥ sthānam avāptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:274.059a: ity eṣa vṛtram āśritya jvarasya mahato mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.059c: vistaraḥ kathitaḥ putra kim anyat prabravīmi te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060a: imāṃ jvarotpattim adīnamānasaḥ; paṭhet sadā yaḥ susamāhito naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060c: vimuktarogaḥ sa sukhī mudā yuto; labheta kāmān sa yathāmanīṣitān janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0003: devyā manyukṛtaṃ matvā kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0004: prasādāt tasya dakṣeṇa sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ katham vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0005: etad veditum icchāmi tan me brūhi yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0006: purā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe dakṣo vai yajñam āharat
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0010: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca ye ca svarlokavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0013: hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau tumburur nāradas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0015: ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāḥ saha marudgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0017: ūṣmapāḥ somapāś caiva dhūmapā ājyapās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0018: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva āgatā brahmaṇā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0019: ete cānye ca bahavo bhūtagrāmaś caturvidhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0021: āhūtā mantritāḥ sarve devāś ca saha patnibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0023: tān dṛṣṭvā manyunāviṣṭo dadhīcir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0024: nāyaṃ yajño na vā dharmo yatra rudro na ijyate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0025: vadhabandhaṃ prapannā vai kiṃ nu kālasya paryayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0026: kiṃ nu mohān na paśyanti vināśaṃ paryupasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0027: upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ na budhyanti mahādhvare
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0028: ity uktvā sa mahāyogī paśyati dhyānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0029: sa paśyati mahādevaṃ devīṃ ca varadāṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0030: nāradaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyāḥ samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0031: saṃtoṣaṃ paramaṃ lebhe iti niścitya yogavit
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0032: ekamantrās tu te sarve yeneśo na nimantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0033: tasmād deśād apakramya dadhīcir vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0036: anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0037: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca madhye satyaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0038: āgataṃ paśubhartāraṃ sraṣṭāraṃ jagataḥ patim dakṣa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0039: adhvare hy aprabhoktāraṃ sarveṣāṃ paśyata prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0040: santi no bahavo rudrāḥ śūlahastāḥ kapardinaḥ dadhīcir uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0043: yathāhaṃ śaṃkarād ūrdhvaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi daivatam dakṣa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0044: tathā dakṣasya vipulo yajño 'yaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0047: viṣṇor nayāmy apratimasya bhāgaṃ devy uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0049: kiṃ nāma dānaṃ niyamaṃ tapo vā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0051: labheta bhāgaṃ bhagavān acintyo vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0056: kiṃ nāma yuktaṃ mayi yan makheśe
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0063: māṃ brāhmaṇā brahmasatre yajante devy uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0065: suprākṛto 'pi bhagavan sarvaḥ strījanasaṃsadi bhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0066: stauti garvāyate cāpi svam ātmānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0067: nātmānaṃ staumi deveśi paśya me tanumadhyame vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0069: ity uktvā bhagavān patnīm umāṃ prāṇair api priyām
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0070: so 'sṛjad bhagavān vaktrād bhūtaṃ ghoraṃ praharṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0073: devyā manyuvyapohārthaṃ hato dakṣasya vai kratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0086: tena śabdena mahatā trastās tatra divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0087: parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0089: agnayo naiva dīpyante naiva dīpyati bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0090: grahā naiva prakāśante nakṣatrāṇi na candramāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0091: ṛṣayo na prakāśante na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0093: praharanty apare ghorā yūpān utpāṭayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0094: pramardanti tathā cānye vimardanti tathā pare
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0103: pānakāni ca divyāni lehyacoṣyāṇi yāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0104: bhuñjate vividhair vaktrair vilumpanty ākṣipanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0109: taṃ yajñam adahac chīghraṃ bhadrakālī samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0111: chittvā śiro vai yajñasya nanāda ca mumoda ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0112: tato brahmādayo devā dakṣaś caiva prajāpatiḥ vīrabhadra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0113: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve kathyatāṃ ko bhavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0114: nāhaṃ rudro na vā devī naiva bhoktum ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0115: devyā manyukṛtaṃ matvā kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0116: draṣṭuṃ vā naiva viprendrān naiva kautūhalena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0117: tava yajñavināśārthaṃ saṃprāptaṃ viddhi mām iha
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0121: śaraṇaṃ gaccha viprendra devadevam umāpatim vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0122: varaṃ krodho 'pi devasya varadānaṃ na cānyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0125: prapadye devam īśānaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0128: āhūtā devatāḥ sarvā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0130: tatra kruddhā mahādevī gaṇāṃs tatra vyasarjayat
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0142: smitaṃ kṛtvābravīd vākyaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0143: śrāvite ca makhādhyāye devānāṃ guruṇā tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0144: tam uvācāñjaliṃ kṛtvā dakṣo devaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0146: yadi prasanno bhagavān yadi cāhaṃ tava priyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0147: yadi vāham anugrāhyo yadi deyo varo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0148: yad dagdhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ pītam aśitaṃ yac ca nāśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0151: tan na mithyā bhaven mahyaṃ varam etam ahaṃ vṛṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0152: tathāstv ity āha bhagavān bhaganetraharo haraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0154: jānubhyām avanīṃ gatvā dakṣo labdhvā bhavād varam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0156: yair nāmadheyaiḥ stutavān dakṣo devaḥ prajāpatiḥ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0157: vaktum arhasi me tāta śrotuṃ śraddhā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0159: gūḍhavratasya guhyāni prakāśāni ca bhārata dakṣa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0168: gāyanti tvāṃ gāyatriṇo arcayanty arkam arkiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0169: brahmāṇaṃ tvāṃ śatakratum ūrdhvaṃ kham iva menire
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0171: sarvā vai devatā hy asmin gāvo goṣṭha ivāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0173: ādityam atha vai viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0174: bhagavān kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ kriyā karaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0175: asataś ca sataś caiva tathaiva prabhavāpyayau
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0176: namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0190: namaḥ stutāya stutyāya stūyamānāya vai namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0193: namo nābhāya nābhyāya namaḥ kaṭakaṭāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0203: ugrāya ca namo nityaṃ namo 'stu daśabāhave
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0208: namo vṛṣāya vṛṣyāya govṛṣāya vṛṣāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0215: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya namaḥ śāntatamāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0225: namo yajñāya yajine hutāya prahutāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0227: namas taṭāya taṭyāya taṭānāṃ pataye namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0233: namo vṛddhāya lubdhāya kṣubdhāya kṣobhaṇāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0237: namo ghuṣyāya ghoṣāya namaḥ kalakalāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0247: sarva sarvada sarvaghna saṃdhyārāga namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0255: tvam annam annabhoktā ca annado 'nnabhug eva
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0256: annasraṣṭā ca paktā ca pakvabhuk pavano 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0259: carācarasya sraṣṭā tvaṃ pratihartā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0260: tvām āhur brahmaviduṣo brahma brahmavidāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0261: manasaḥ paramā yoniḥ khaṃ vāyur jyotiṣāṃ nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0265: yajurmayo ṛṅmayaś ca tvām āhutimayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0266: paṭhyase stutibhis tvaṃ hi vedopaniṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0267: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā varṇāvarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0269: saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavo māso māsārdham eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0270: yugā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhās tvaṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahāḥ kalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0271: vṛkṣāṇāṃ kakudo 'si tvaṃ girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0272: vyāghro mṛgāṇāṃ patatāṃ tārkṣyo 'nantaś ca bhoginām
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0273: kṣīrodo hy udadhīnāṃ ca yantrāṇāṃ dhanur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0274: vajraḥ praharaṇānāṃ ca vratānāṃ satyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0275: tvam eva dveṣa icchā ca rāgo mohaḥ kṣamākṣame
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0277: tvaṃ gadī tvaṃ śarī cāpī khaṭvāṅgī jharjharī tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0278: chettā bhettā prahartā tvaṃ netā mantā pitā mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0280: gaṅgā samudrāḥ saritaḥ palvalāni sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0283: ādiś cāntaś ca devānāṃ gāyatry oṃkāra eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0284: harito lohito nīlaḥ kṛṣṇo raktas tathāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0285: kadruś ca kapilaś caiva kapoto mecakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0286: avarṇaś ca suvarṇaś ca varṇakāro hy anaupamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0287: suvarṇanāmā ca tathā suvarṇapriya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0288: tvam indraś ca yamaś caiva varuṇo dhanado 'nalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0289: upaplavaś citrabhānuḥ svarbhānur bhānur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0290: hotraṃ hotā ca homyaṃ ca hutaṃ caiva tathā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0292: pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0293: giriko hiṇḍuko vṛkṣo jīvaḥ pudgala eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0294: prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva tamaś cāpramadas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0295: prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0296: unmeṣaś ca nimeṣaś ca kṣutaṃ jṛmbhitam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0301: akālaś cātikālaś ca duṣkālaḥ kāla eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0302: mṛtyuḥ kṣuraś ca kṛtyaś ca pakṣo 'pakṣakṣayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0312: svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro namaskāro namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0315: brahmā tapaś ca satyaṃ ca brahmacaryam athārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0317: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaritaś caiva dhruvo dānto maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0327: śreṣṭhaḥ sthiraś ca sthāṇuś ca niṣkampaḥ kampa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0329: durdharṣo duṣprakampaś ca durviṣo durjayo jayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0331: ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva vyādhihā vyādhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0337: viṣāgnipā mṛtyupāś ca kṣīrapāḥ somapās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0340: tvaṃ strī pumāṃs tvaṃ ca napuṃsakaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0347: na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0348: māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yāthātathyena te śiva
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0349: yā mūrtayaḥ susūkṣmās te na mahyaṃ yānti darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0350: trāhi māṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putram ivaurasam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0351: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tavānagha namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0352: bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaś cāhaṃ sadā tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0353: yaḥ sahasrāṇy anekāni puṃsām āvṛtya durdṛśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0354: tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ samudrānte sa me goptās tu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0356: jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0360: kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0363: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhor yaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0364: grasaty arkaṃ ca svarbhānur bhūtvā māṃ so 'bhirakṣatu
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0366: namas tebhyaḥ svadhā svāhā prāpnuvantu mudantu te
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0368: rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ nityaṃ cāpyāyayantu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0369: ye na rodanti dehasthā dehino rodayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0370: harṣayanti na hṛṣyanti namas tebhyo 'stu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0371: ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0375: ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0377: rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmai paraṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0378: namas tebhyo namas tebhyo namas tebhyo 'stu nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0379: yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0382: sarvabhūtāntarātmā ca tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0383: tvam eva hījyase yasmād yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0384: tvam eva kartā sarvasya tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0385: atha vā māyayā deva sūkṣmayā tava mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0386: etasmāt kāraṇād vāpi tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0387: prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya me
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0388: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhir manas tvayi
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0390: bhagavān api suprītaḥ punar dakṣam abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0397: dakṣa dakṣa na kartavyo manyur vighnam imaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0398: ahaṃ yajñaharas tubhyaṃ dṛṣṭam etat purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0399: bhūyaś ca te varaṃ dadmi taṃ tvaṃ gṛhṇīṣva suvrata
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0401: vedāt ṣaḍaṅgād uddhṛtya sāṃkhyayogāc ca yuktitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0405: varṇāśramakṛtair dharmair viparītaṃ kva cit samam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0407: mayā pāśupataṃ dakṣa yogam utpāditaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0408: tasya cīrṇasya tat samyak phalaṃ bhavati puṣkalam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0409: tac cāstu te mahābhāga tyajyatāṃ mānaso jvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0412: dakṣaproktaṃ stavam imaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0413: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃ cid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0414: yathā sarveṣu deveṣu variṣṭho bhagavāñ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0417: śrotavyo bhaktim āsthāya vidyākāmaiś ca yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0420: anenaiva tu dehena gaṇānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0421: tejasā yaśasā caiva yukto bhavati nirmalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0422: na rākṣasāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0423: vighnaṃ kuryur gṛhe tasya yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0424: śṛṇuyāc caiva yā nārī tadbhaktā brahmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0426: śṛṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0427: tasya sarvāṇi karmāṇi siddhiṃ gacchanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0428: manasā cintitaṃ yac ca yac ca vācānukīrtitam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0430: devasya ca saguhasya devyā nandīśvarasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0431: baliṃ suvihitaṃ kṛtvā damena niyamena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0432: tatas tu yukto gṛhṇīyān nāmāny āśu yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0433: īpsitāṃl labhate so 'rthān kāmān bhogāṃś ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0434: mṛtaś ca svargam āpnoti tiryakṣu ca na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-028_0435: ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-0737_01: katheyaṃ kathitā puṇyā dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:274.060d-0737_02: kim anyat kathayāmīha tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:275.001a: śokād duḥkhāc ca mṛtyoś ca trasyanti prāṇinaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:275.001c: ubhayaṃ me yathā na syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:275.002c: nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ samaṅgasya ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:275.004a: udvegaṃ neha te kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:275.004c: nityatṛpta iva svastho bālavac ca viceṣṭase
GE07mbh_12_u:275.005a: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sattveṣu mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:275.005c: teṣāṃ tattvāni jānāmi tato na vimanā hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:275.006a: upakramān ahaṃ veda punar eva phalodayān
GE07mbh_12_u:275.006c: loke phalāni citrāṇi tato na vimanā hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:275.007a: agādhāś cāpratiṣṭhāś ca gatimantaś ca nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:275.007c: andhā jaḍāś ca jīvanti paśyāsmān api jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:275.009a: sahasriṇaś ca jīvanti jīvanti śatinas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:275.009c: śākena cānye jīvanti paśyāsmān api jīvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:275.010a: yadā na śocemahi kiṃ nu na syād; dharmeṇa vā nārada karmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_12_u:275.010c: kṛtāntavaśyāni yadā sukhāni; duḥkhāni vā yan na vidharṣayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:275.011a: yasmai prajñāṃ kathayante manuṣyāḥ; prajñāmūlo hīndriyāṇāṃ prasādaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:275.011c: muhyanti śocanti yadendriyāṇi; prajñālābho nāsti mūḍhendriyasya
GE07mbh_12_u:275.012a: mūḍhasya darpaḥ sa punar moha eva; mūḍhasya nāyaṃ na paro 'sti lokaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:275.012c: na hy eva duḥkhāni sadā bhavanti; sukhasya vā nityaśo lābha eva
GE07mbh_12_u:275.013a: bhāvātmakaṃ saṃparivartamānaṃ; na mādṛśaḥ saṃjvaraṃ jātu kuryāt
GE07mbh_12_u:275.013c: iṣṭān bhogān nānurudhyet sukhaṃ vā; na cintayed duḥkham abhyāgataṃ vā
GE07mbh_12_u:275.014a: samāhito na spṛhayet pareṣāṃ; nānāgataṃ nābhinandeta lābham
GE07mbh_12_u:275.014c: na cāpi hṛṣyed vipule 'rthalābhe; tathārthanāśe ca na vai viṣīdet
GE07mbh_12_u:275.015a: na bāndhavā na ca vittaṃ na kaulī; na ca śrutaṃ na ca mantrā na vīryam
GE07mbh_12_u:275.015c: duḥkhāt trātuṃ sarva evotsahante; paratra śīle na tu yānti śāntim
GE07mbh_12_u:275.016a: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya nāyogād vidyate sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:275.016c: dhṛtiś ca duḥkhatyāgaś cāpy ubhayaṃ naḥ sukhodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:275.017c: utseko narakāyaiva tasmāt taṃ saṃtyajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:275.019c: tṛṣṇāmohau tu saṃtyajya carāmi pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_12_u:275.020a: na mṛtyuto na cādharmān na lobhān na kutaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:275.021a: etad brahman vijānāmi mahat kṛtvā tapo 'vyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:275.021c: tena nārada saṃprāpto na māṃ śokaḥ prabādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:276.002c: śravaṇaṃ caiva vidyānāṃ kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:276.003c: gālavasya ca saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:276.005a: yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇais tu puruṣo nṛṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:276.005c: bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:276.007a: jñāne hy evaṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt kāryākārye vijānataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.007c: yat kāryaṃ na vyavasyāmas tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:276.008c: idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya iti nānāpradhāvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.009a: tāṃs tu viprasthitān dṛṣṭvā śāstraiḥ śāstrābhinandinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.010a: śāstraṃ yadi bhaved ekaṃ vyaktaṃ śreyo bhavet tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:276.010c: śāstraiś ca bahubhir bhūyaḥ śreyo guhyaṃ praveśitam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.011a: etasmāt kāraṇāc chreyaḥ kalilaṃ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:276.011c: bravītu bhagavāṃs tan me upasanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.012c: tān sarvān anupaśya tvaṃ samāśrityaiva gālava
GE07mbh_12_u:276.013a: teṣāṃ teṣāṃ tathā hi tvam āśramāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.013e: nayanti caiva te samyag abhipretam asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.014a: ṛju paśyaṃs tathā samyag āśramāṇāṃ parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:276.014c: yat tu niḥśreyasaṃ samyak tac caivāsaṃśayātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.015a: anugrahaṃ ca mitrāṇām amitrāṇāṃ ca nigraham
GE07mbh_12_u:276.015c: saṃgrahaṃ ca trivargasya śreya āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.016c: sadbhiś ca samudācāraḥ śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.017c: vāk caiva madhurā proktā śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.018c: asaṃtyāgaś ca bhṛtyānāṃ śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.019a: satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyajñānaṃ tu duṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:276.019c: yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ bravīmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:276.020a: ahaṃkārasya ca tyāgaḥ praṇayasya ca nigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.020c: saṃtoṣaś caikacaryā ca kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:276.021c: vidyārthānāṃ ca jijñāsā śreya etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.025a: nirguṇās tv eva bhūyiṣṭham ātmasaṃbhāvino narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.026a: anucyamānāś ca punas te manyante mahājanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:276.027a: abruvan kasya cin nindām ātmapūjām avarṇayan
GE07mbh_12_u:276.027c: vipaścid guṇasaṃpannaḥ prāpnoty eva mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.028a: abruvan vāti surabhir gandhaḥ sumanasāṃ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.029c: jvalanti yaśasā loke yāni na vyāharanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:276.031a: asann uccair api proktaḥ śabdaḥ samupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:276.031c: dīpyate tv eva lokeṣu śanair api subhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.033c: prajñālābho hi bhūtānām uttamaḥ pratibhāti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:276.034a: nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasya cid brūyān na cānyāyena pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.034c: jñānavān api medhāvī jaḍaval lokam ācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:276.036c: na tatra vāsaṃ kurvīta śreyorthī vai kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:276.037c: puṇyaṃ puṇyeṣu vimalaṃ pāpaṃ pāpeṣu cāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:276.038a: apām agnes tathendoś ca sparśaṃ vedayate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:276.040c: prabrūyād brahmaṇo dharmaṃ tyajet taṃ deśam ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:276.040d-0739_01: durvṛtto 'pi varo vipro na ca śūdro jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.040d-0739_02: kaḥ parityajya gāṃ duṣṭāṃ duhyec chīlavatīṃ kharīm
GE07mbh_12_u:276.040d-0739_04: vacanaṃ tasya na grāhyaṃ śunocchiṣṭaṃ havir yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:276.041c: yathāvac chāstrasaṃpannā kas taṃ deśaṃ parityajet
GE07mbh_12_u:276.042a: ākāśasthā dhruvaṃ yatra doṣaṃ brūyur vipaścitām
GE07mbh_12_u:276.042c: ātmapūjābhikāmā vai ko vaset tatra paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.043c: pradīptam iva śailāntaṃ kas taṃ deśaṃ na saṃtyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:276.044c: caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:276.045a: dharmam arthanimittaṃ tu careyur yatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.045c: na tān anuvasej jātu te hi pāpakṛto janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.046c: vyavadhāvet tatas tūrṇaṃ sasarpāc charaṇād iva
GE07mbh_12_u:276.047c: āditas tan na kartavyam icchatā bhavam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.048a: yatra rājā ca rājñaś ca puruṣāḥ pratyanantarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:276.048c: kuṭumbinām agrabhujas tyajet tad rāṣṭram ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:276.049c: yājanādhyāpane yuktā yatra tad rāṣṭram āvaset
GE07mbh_12_u:276.051c: tyajet tad rāṣṭram āsannam upasṛṣṭam ivāmiṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.053c: caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:276.055a: yatra rājā dharmanityo rājyaṃ vai paryupāsitā
GE07mbh_12_u:276.057a: pṛcchatas te mayā tāta śreya etad udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:276.057c: na hi śakyaṃ pradhānena śreyaḥ saṃkhyātum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.001a: kathaṃ nu muktaḥ pṛthivīṃ cared asmadvidho nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.001c: nityaṃ kaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ saṅgapāśād vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.003a: kiṃ śreyaḥ paramaṃ brahman kṛtveha sukham aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:277.003c: kathaṃ na śocen na kṣubhyed etad icchāmi veditum
GE07mbh_12_u:277.004c: vibudhya saṃpadaṃ cāgryāṃ sad vākyam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:277.005a: sukhaṃ mokṣasukhaṃ loke na ca loko 'vagacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:277.006a: saktabuddhir aśāntātmā na sa śakyaś cikitsitum
GE07mbh_12_u:277.006c: snehapāśasito mūḍho na sa mokṣāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.007a: snehajān iha te pāśān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tān mama
GE07mbh_12_u:277.008a: saṃbhāvya putrān kālena yauvanasthān niveśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:277.008c: samarthāñ jīvane jñātvā muktaś cara yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:277.009c: jñātvā prajahi kāle tvaṃ parārtham anudṛśya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:277.010a: sāpatyo nirapatyo vā muktaś cara yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:277.012a: eṣa tāvat samāsena tava saṃkīrtito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.012c: mokṣārtho vistareṇāpi bhūyo vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:277.013a: muktā vītabhayā loke caranti sukhino narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.013c: saktabhāvā vinaśyanti narās tatra na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.014c: asaktāḥ sukhino loke saktāś caiva vināśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.015a: svajane na ca te cintā kartavyā mokṣabuddhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.015c: ime mayā vinābhūtā bhaviṣyanti kathaṃ tv iti
GE07mbh_12_u:277.016a: svayam utpadyate jantuḥ svayam eva vivardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.017a: bhojanācchādane caiva mātrā pitrā ca saṃgraham
GE07mbh_12_u:277.019c: ko hetuḥ svajanaṃ poṣṭuṃ rakṣituṃ vādṛḍhātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.020a: svajanaṃ hi yadā mṛtyur hanty eva tava paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.020c: kṛte 'pi yatne mahati tatra boddhavyam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.021a: jīvantam api caivainaṃ bharaṇe rakṣaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.022a: yadā mṛtaś ca svajanaṃ na jñāsyasi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:277.022c: sukhitaṃ duḥkhitaṃ vāpi nanu boddhavyam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.023a: mṛte vā tvayi jīve vā yadi bhokṣyati vai janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.023c: svakṛtaṃ nanu buddhvaivaṃ kartavyaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.024a: evaṃ vijānaṃl loke 'smin kaḥ kasyety abhiniścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.024c: mokṣe niveśaya mano bhūyaś cāpy upadhāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:277.025c: krodho lobhas tathā mohaḥ sattvavān mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.026a: dyūte pāne tathā strīṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.026c: na pramādyati saṃmohāt satataṃ mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.027a: divase divase nāma rātrau rātrau sadā sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.027c: bhoktavyam iti yaḥ khinno doṣabuddhiḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.028a: ātmabhāvaṃ tathā strīṣu muktam eva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.028c: yaḥ paśyati sadā yukto yathāvan mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.029a: saṃbhavaṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.029c: yas tattvato vijānāti loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.030c: prāsāde mañcakasthānaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.031c: avṛttikarśitaṃ caiva yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.032a: yaḥ paśyati sukhī tuṣṭo napaśyaṃś ca vihanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.032c: yaś cāpy alpena saṃtuṣṭo loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.033a: agnīṣomāv idaṃ sarvam iti yaś cānupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:277.033c: na ca saṃspṛśyate bhāvair adbhutair mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.034a: paryaṅkaśayyā bhūmiś ca samāne yasya dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.034c: śālayaś ca kadannaṃ ca yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.035a: kṣaumaṃ ca kuśacīraṃ ca kauśeyaṃ valkalāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:277.035c: āvikaṃ carma ca samaṃ yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.036c: tathā ca vartate dṛṣṭvā loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.037c: icchādveṣau bhayodvegau sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.039c: kubjabhāvaṃ ca jarayā yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.040c: bādhiryaṃ prāṇamandatvaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.041a: gatān ṛṣīṃs tathā devān asurāṃś ca tathā gatān
GE07mbh_12_u:277.041c: lokād asmāt paraṃ lokaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.042a: prabhāvair anvitās tais taiḥ pārthivendrāḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.042c: ye gatāḥ pṛthivīṃ tyaktvā iti jñātvā vimucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.043a: arthāṃś ca durlabhāṃl loke kleśāṃś ca sulabhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.043c: duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:277.044a: apatyānāṃ ca vaiguṇyaṃ janaṃ viguṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:277.044c: paśyan bhūyiṣṭhaśo loke ko mokṣaṃ nābhipūjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:277.045a: śāstrāl lokāc ca yo buddhaḥ sarvaṃ paśyati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.045c: asāram iva mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.046a: etac chrutvā mama vaco bhavāṃś caratu muktavat
GE07mbh_12_u:277.046c: gārhasthye yadi te mokṣe kṛtā buddhir aviklavā
GE07mbh_12_u:277.047a: tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā samyak sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:277.047c: mokṣajaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ pālayām āsa ca prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.001a: tiṣṭhate me sadā tāta kautūhalam idaṃ hṛdi
GE07mbh_12_u:278.001c: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ kurupitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:278.002a: kathaṃ devarṣir uśanā sadā kāvyo mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.003a: vardhayām āsa tejaś ca kimartham amitaujasām
GE07mbh_12_u:278.004a: kathaṃ cāpy uśanā prāpa śukratvam amaradyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.004c: ṛddhiṃ ca sa kathaṃ prāptaḥ sarvam etad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:278.005a: na yāti ca sa tejasvī madhyena nabhasaḥ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:278.006a: śṛṇu rājann avahitaḥ sarvam etad yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:278.008a: indro 'tha dhanado rājā yakṣarakṣodhipaḥ sa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:278.008c: prabhaviṣṇuś ca kośasya jagataś ca tathā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.009c: ruddhvā dhanapatiṃ devaṃ yogena hṛtavān vasu
GE07mbh_12_u:278.010a: hṛte dhane tataḥ śarma na lebhe dhanadas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:278.013a: etac chrutvā tataḥ kruddho mahāyogī maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.014a: kvāsvau kvāsāv iti prāha gṛhītvā paramāyudham
GE07mbh_12_u:278.014c: uśanā dūratas tasya babhau jñātvā cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:278.015a: sa mahāyogino buddhvā taṃ roṣaṃ vai mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.015c: gatim āgamanaṃ vetti sthānaṃ vetti tataḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.017c: jñātvā śūlaṃ ca deveśaḥ pāṇinā samanāmayat
GE07mbh_12_u:278.018c: pinākam iti covāca śūlam ugrāyudhaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.018d-0740_01: sa tu praviṣṭa uśanā pāṇiṃ māheśvaraṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.019c: āsyaṃ vivṛtya kakudī pāṇiṃ saṃprākṣipac chanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.020a: sa tu praviṣṭa uśanā koṣṭhaṃ māheśvaraṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.021a: kimarthaṃ vyacarad rājann uśanā tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.022c: varṣāṇām abhavad rājan prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:278.023a: udatiṣṭhat tapas taptvā duścaraṃ sa mahāhradāt
GE07mbh_12_u:278.024a: tapovṛddhim apṛcchac ca kuśalaṃ cainam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:278.024c: tapaḥ sucīrṇam iti ca provāca vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.025a: tatsaṃyogena vṛddhiṃ cāpy apaśyat sa tu śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.026a: sa tenāḍhyo mahāyogī tapasā ca dhanena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:278.027c: uśanā tu samudvigno nililye jaṭhare tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.028a: tuṣṭāva ca mahāyogī devaṃ tatrastha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:278.029c: prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punar ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:278.030a: tam uvāca mahādevo gaccha śiśnena mokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:278.031c: paryakrāmad dahyamāna itaś cetaś ca tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:278.032c: kāryeṇa tena nabhaso nāgacchata ca madhyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.032d-0741_01: tata eva ca deveṣu sapratiṣṭho mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.033a: niṣkrāntam atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā jvalantam iva tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:278.034a: nyavārayata taṃ devī kruddhaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:278.034c: putratvam agamad devyā vārite śaṃkare ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.035a: hiṃsanīyas tvayā naiṣa mama putratvam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.035c: na hi devodarāt kaś cin niḥsṛto nāśam archati
GE07mbh_12_u:278.036a: tataḥ prīto 'bhavad devyāḥ prahasaṃś cedam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:278.036c: gacchatv eṣa yathākāmam iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.037a: tataḥ praṇamya varadaṃ devaṃ devīm umāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:278.037c: uśanā prāpa tad dhīmān gatim iṣṭāṃ mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.038a: etat te kathitaṃ tāta bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:278.038c: caritaṃ bharataśreṣṭha yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:279.001a: ataḥ paraṃ mahābāho yac chreyas tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:279.001c: na tṛpyāmy amṛtasyeva vacasas te pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:279.002a: kiṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā śubhaṃ puruṣasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:279.002c: śreyaḥ param avāpnoti pretya ceha ca tad vada
GE07mbh_12_u:279.003a: atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā pūrvaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:279.004a: kiṃ śreyaḥ sarvabhūtānām asmiṃl loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:279.004c: yad bhavet pratipattavyaṃ tad bhavān prabravītu me
GE07mbh_12_u:279.006a: dharma eva kṛtaḥ śreyān iha loke paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:279.006c: tasmād dhi paramaṃ nāsti yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:279.008a: caturvidhā hi lokasya yātrā tāta vidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.008c: martyā yatrāvatiṣṭhante sā ca kāmāt pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.010a: sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi yathā bhāṇḍaṃ niṣicyate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.011a: nābījāj jāyate kiṃ cin nākṛtvā sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.011c: sukṛtī vindati sukhaṃ prāpya dehakṣayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:279.012a: daivaṃ tāta na paśyāmi nāsti daivasya sādhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:279.013a: pretya jātikṛtaṃ karma na smaranti sadā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:279.013c: te vai tasya phalaprāptau karma cāpi caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:279.015a: cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:279.016a: nirantaraṃ ca miśraṃ ca phalate karma pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:279.016c: kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ na tu nāśo 'sya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.017a: kadā cit sukṛtaṃ tāta kūṭastham iva tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:279.018a: tato duḥkhakṣayaṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ karma sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.018c: sukṛtakṣayād duṣkṛtaṃ ca tad viddhi manujādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:279.019a: damaḥ kṣamā dhṛtis tejaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ satyavāditā
GE07mbh_12_u:279.020a: duṣkṛte sukṛte vāpi na jantur ayato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:279.021a: nāyaṃ parasya sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:279.022c: anyenaiva janaḥ sarvaḥ saṃgato yaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:279.023a: pareṣāṃ yad asūyeta na tat kuryāt svayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:279.023c: yo hy asūyus tathāyuktaḥ so 'vahāsaṃ niyacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:279.024a: bhīrū rājanyo brāhmaṇaḥ sarvabhakṣo; vaiśyo 'nīhāvān hīnavarṇo 'lasaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:279.024c: vidvāṃś cāśīlo vṛttahīnaḥ kulīnaḥ; satyād bhraṣṭo brāhmaṇaḥ strī ca duṣṭā
GE07mbh_12_u:279.025a: rāgī muktaḥ pacamāno ''tmahetor; mūrkho vaktā nṛpahīnaṃ ca rāṣṭram
GE07mbh_12_u:279.025c: ete sarve śocyatāṃ yānti rājan; yaś cāyuktaḥ snehahīnaḥ prajāsu
GE07mbh_12_u:280.001c: raśmibhir jñānasaṃbhūtair yo gacchati sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:280.002c: dvijātihastān nirvṛttā na tu tulyāt parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.003a: āyur nasulabhaṃ labdhvā nāvakarṣed viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:280.004a: varṇebhyo 'pi paribhraṣṭaḥ sa vai saṃmānam arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:280.004c: na tu yaḥ satkriyāṃ prāpya rājasaṃ karma sevate
GE07mbh_12_u:280.005c: durlabhaṃ tam alabdhā hi hanyāt pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:280.006c: pāpaṃ hi karma phalati pāpam eva svayaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.006e: tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta karma duḥkhaphalodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.007a: pāpānubandhaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.007c: na tat seveta medhāvī śuciḥ kusalilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:280.008c: pratyāpannasya hi sato nātmā tāvad virocate
GE07mbh_12_u:280.009a: pratyāpattiś ca yasyeha bāliśasya na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:280.010a: viraktaṃ śodhyate vastraṃ na tu kṛṣṇopasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.010c: prayatnena manuṣyendra pāpam evaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:280.011a: svayaṃ kṛtvā tu yaḥ pāpaṃ śubham evānutiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:280.011c: prāyaścittaṃ naraḥ kartum ubhayaṃ so 'śnute pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:280.012a: ajñānāt tu kṛtāṃ hiṃsām ahiṃsā vyapakarṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:280.014a: ahaṃ tu tāvat paśyāmi karma yad vartate kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.016a: bhavaty alpaphalaṃ karma sevitaṃ nityam ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.017a: kṛtāni yāni karmāṇi daivatair munibhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:280.017c: nācaret tāni dharmātmā śrutvā cāpi na kutsayet
GE07mbh_12_u:280.018a: saṃcintya manasā rājan viditvā śaktim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:280.018c: karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ karma sa vai bhadrāṇi paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:280.019a: nave kapāle salilaṃ saṃnyastaṃ hīyate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:280.020a: satoye 'nyat tu yat toyaṃ tasminn eva prasicyate
GE07mbh_12_u:280.020c: vṛddhe vṛddhim avāpnoti salile salilaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:280.022a: rājñā jetavyāḥ sāyudhāś connatāś ca; samyak kartavyaṃ pālanaṃ ca prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:280.022c: agniś ceyo bahubhiś cāpi yajñair; ante madhye vā vanam āśritya stheyam
GE07mbh_12_u:280.023a: damānvitaḥ puruṣo dharmaśīlo; bhūtāni cātmānam ivānupaśyet
GE07mbh_12_u:280.023c: garīyasaḥ pūjayed ātmaśaktyā; satyena śīlena sukhaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:281.001a: kaḥ kasya copakurute kaś ca kasmai prayacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:281.001c: prāṇī karoty ayaṃ karma sarvam ātmārtham ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:281.002c: sodaryaṃ bhrātaram api kim utānyaṃ pṛthagjanam
GE07mbh_12_u:281.003c: tayoḥ puṇyataraṃ dānaṃ tad dvijasya prayacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.004c: saṃrakṣyaṃ yatnam āsthāya dharmārtham iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.005a: na dharmārthī nṛśaṃsena karmaṇā dhanam arjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:281.006a: apo hi prayataḥ śītās tāpitā jvalanena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:281.007c: phalapatrair atho mūlair munīn arcitavān asau
GE07mbh_12_u:281.008a: tair eva phalapatraiś ca sa māṭharam atoṣayat
GE07mbh_12_u:281.008c: tasmāl lebhe paraṃ sthānaṃ śaibyo 'pi pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.009c: ṛṇavāñ jāyate martyas tasmād anṛṇatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:281.012a: prayatnena ca saṃsiddhā dhanair api vivarjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.012c: samyag ghutvā hutavahaṃ munayaḥ siddhim āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.013c: ṛgbhiḥ stutvā mahābhāgo devān vai yajñabhāginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.014c: devīṃ stutvā tu gagane modate tejasā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.015c: kakṣīvāñ jāmadagnyaś ca rāmas tāṇḍyas tathāṃśumān
GE07mbh_12_u:281.016a: vasiṣṭho jamadagniś ca viśvāmitro 'trir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:281.017a: ete maharṣayaḥ stutvā viṣṇum ṛgbhiḥ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.017c: lebhire tapasā siddhiṃ prasādāt tasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.018a: anarhāś cārhatāṃ prāptāḥ santaḥ stutvā tam eva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:281.018c: na tu vṛddhim ihānvicchet karma kṛtvā jugupsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:281.019a: ye 'rthā dharmeṇa te satyā ye 'dharmeṇa dhig astu tān
GE07mbh_12_u:281.019c: dharmaṃ vai śāśvataṃ loke na jahyād dhanakāṅkṣayā
GE07mbh_12_u:281.020a: āhitāgnir hi dharmātmā yaḥ sa puṇyakṛd uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:281.020c: vedā hi sarve rājendra sthitās triṣv agniṣu prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:281.021a: sa cāpy agnyāhito vipraḥ kriyā yasya na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:281.021c: śreyo hy anāhitāgnitvam agnihotraṃ na niṣkriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:281.022a: agnir ātmā ca mātā ca pitā janayitā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:281.023a: mānaṃ tyaktvā yo naro vṛddhasevī; vidvān klībaḥ paśyati prītiyogāt
GE07mbh_12_u:281.023c: dākṣyeṇāhīno dharmayukto nadānto; loke 'smin vai pūjyate sadbhir āryaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.001a: vṛttiḥ sakāśād varṇebhyas tribhyo hīnasya śobhanā
GE07mbh_12_u:282.002a: vṛttiś cen nāsti śūdrasya pitṛpaitāmahī dhruvā
GE07mbh_12_u:282.002c: na vṛttiṃ parato mārgec chuśrūṣāṃ tu prayojayet
GE07mbh_12_u:282.003a: sadbhis tu saha saṃsargaḥ śobhate dharmadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.003c: nityaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nāsadbhir iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.005a: yādṛśena hi varṇena bhāvyate śuklam ambaram
GE07mbh_12_u:282.005c: tādṛśaṃ kurute rūpam etad evam avaihi me
GE07mbh_12_u:282.006a: tasmād guṇeṣu rajyethā mā doṣeṣu kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:282.006c: anityam iha martyānāṃ jīvitaṃ hi calācalam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.007a: sukhe vā yadi vā duḥkhe vartamāno vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.007c: yaś cinoti śubhāny eva sa bhadrāṇīha paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:282.008a: dharmād apetaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.008c: na tat seveta medhāvī na tad dhitam ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:282.008d-0742_01: dharmeṇa sahitaṃ yat tu bhaved alpaphalodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.009a: yo hṛtvā gosahasrāṇi nṛpo dadyād arakṣitā
GE07mbh_12_u:282.010c: dhātāsṛjat putram ekaṃ prajānāṃ dhāraṇe ratam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.011a: tam arcayitvā vaiśyas tu kuryād atyartham ṛddhimat
GE07mbh_12_u:282.012c: śūdrair nirmārjanaṃ kāryam evaṃ dharmo na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:282.013a: apranaṣṭe tato dharme bhavanti sukhitāḥ prajāḥ
