GE07mbh_12_u:282.013c: sukhena tāsāṃ rājendra modante divi devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.014a: tasmād yo rakṣati nṛpaḥ sa dharmeṇābhipūjyate
GE07mbh_12_u:282.014c: adhīte cāpi yo vipro vaiśyo yaś cārjane rataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.015a: yaś ca śuśrūṣate śūdraḥ satataṃ niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.017a: satkṛtya tu dvijātibhyo yo dadāti narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:282.017c: yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ nityam aśnāti phalam ūrjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.018a: abhigamya dattaṃ tuṣṭyā yad dhanyam āhur abhiṣṭutam
GE07mbh_12_u:282.018c: yācitena tu yad dattaṃ tad āhur madhyamaṃ budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.019c: tad āhur adhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:282.020c: tathā prayatnaṃ kurvīta yathā mucyeta saṃśayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:282.021a: damena śobhate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vijayena tu
GE07mbh_12_u:282.021c: dhanena vaiśyaḥ śūdras tu nityaṃ dākṣyeṇa śobhate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.002a: nityaṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣur ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.002e: śūdrakarmā yadā tu syāt tadā patati vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.003c: śūdrasyāpi vidhīyante yadā vṛttir na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.005a: apūrviṇā na kartavyaṃ karma loke vigarhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:283.005c: kṛtapūrviṇas tu tyajato mahān dharma iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.006a: saṃsiddhaḥ puruṣo loke yad ācarati pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:283.007a: śrūyante hi purāṇe vai prajā dhigdaṇḍaśāsanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.008a: dharma eva sadā nṝṇām iha rājan praśasyate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.008c: dharmavṛddhā guṇān eva sevante hi narā bhuvi
GE07mbh_12_u:283.009a: taṃ dharmam asurās tāta nāmṛṣyanta janādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:283.010c: darpātmanāṃ tataḥ krodhaḥ punas teṣām ajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:283.011c: hrīś caivāpy anaśad rājaṃs tato moho vyajāyata
GE07mbh_12_u:283.012a: tato mohaparītās te nāpaśyanta yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:283.013a: tān prāpya tu sa dhig daṇḍo nakāraṇam ato 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:283.013c: tato 'bhyagacchan devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cāvamanya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:283.014a: etasminn eva kāle tu devā devavaraṃ śivam
GE07mbh_12_u:283.015a: tena sma te gaganagāḥ sapurāḥ pātitāḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_12_u:283.016a: teṣām adhipatis tv āsīd bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.017a: tasmin hate 'tha svaṃ bhāvaṃ pratyapadyanta mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.017c: prāvartanta ca vedā vai śāstrāṇi ca yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:283.019a: saptarṣīṇām athordhvaṃ ca vipṛthur nāma pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.019c: rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś caiva maṇḍaleṣu pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:283.020a: mahākuleṣu ye jātā vṛttāḥ pūrvatarāś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:283.022a: pratyatiṣṭhaṃś ca teṣv eva tāny eva sthāpayanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:283.022c: bhajante tāni cādyāpi ye bāliśatamā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.023a: tasmād ahaṃ bravīmi tvāṃ rājan saṃcintya śāstrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.024c: dharmārthaṃ nyāyam utsṛjya na tat kalyāṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.025a: sa tvam evaṃvidho dāntaḥ kṣatriyaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:283.025c: prajā bhṛtyāṃś ca putrāṃś ca svadharmeṇānupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:283.027a: tasmād guṇeṣu rajyethā mā doṣeṣu kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:283.027c: nirguṇo yo hi durbuddhir ātmanaḥ so 'rir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:283.029c: ātmabhūtaḥ sadā loke cared bhūtāny ahiṃsayan
GE07mbh_12_u:283.030a: yadā vyapetahṛllekhaṃ mano bhavati tasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:283.030c: nānṛtaṃ caiva bhavati tadā kalyāṇam ṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:284.001c: tapovidhiṃ tu vakṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:284.002a: prāyeṇa hi gṛhasthasya mamatvaṃ nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.003a: gṛhāṇy āśritya gāvaś ca kṣetrāṇi ca dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:284.003c: dārāḥ putrāś ca bhṛtyāś ca bhavantīha narasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:284.006a: kṛtārtho bhogato bhūtvā sa vai ratiparāyaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.008a: sa jānann api cākāryam arthārthaṃ sevate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.009c: karoti yena bhogī syām iti tasmād vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:284.010c: anvicchatāṃ śubhaṃ karma narāṇāṃ tyajatāṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:284.013c: yo vai priyasukhe kṣīṇe tapaḥ kartuṃ vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:284.015a: prajāpatiḥ prajāḥ pūrvam asṛjat tapasā vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.015c: kva cit kva cid vrataparo vratāny āsthāya pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:284.017c: saṃsiddhās tapasā tāta ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.018a: ye cādau brahmaṇā sṛṣṭā brāhmaṇās tapasā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:284.018c: te bhāvayantaḥ pṛthivīṃ vicaranti divaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:284.019a: martyaloke ca rājāno ye cānye gṛhamedhinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.019c: mahākuleṣu dṛśyante tat sarvaṃ tapasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:284.020a: kauśikāni ca vastrāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:284.021c: vāsaḥ prāsādapṛṣṭhe ca tat sarvaṃ tapasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:284.022a: śayanāni ca mukhyāni bhojyāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:284.023a: nāprāpyaṃ tapasā kiṃ cit trailokye 'smin paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:284.024a: sukhito duḥkhito vāpi naro lobhaṃ parityajet
GE07mbh_12_u:284.024c: avekṣya manasā śāstraṃ buddhyā ca nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:284.026a: naṣṭaprajño yadā bhavati tadā nyāyaṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:284.026c: tasmāt sukhakṣaye prāpte pumān ugraṃ tapaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:284.027a: yad iṣṭaṃ tat sukhaṃ prāhur dveṣyaṃ duḥkham ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.028c: prākāśyaṃ caiva gacchanti kṛtvā niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.030a: dharme tapasi dāne ca vicikitsāsya jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.030c: sa kṛtvā pāpakāny eva nirayaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.031a: sukhe tu vartamāno vai duḥkhe vāpi narottama
GE07mbh_12_u:284.031c: svavṛttād yo na calati śāstracakṣuḥ sa mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.032c: rasane darśane ghrāṇe śravaṇe ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.033a: tato 'sya jāyate tīvrā vedanā tatkṣayāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.033c: budhā yena praśaṃsanti mokṣaṃ sukham anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:284.034a: tataḥ phalārthaṃ carati bhavanti jyāyaso guṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.034c: dharmavṛttyā ca satataṃ kāmārthābhyāṃ na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.035c: prayatnenopagamyaś ca svadharma iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:284.037a: kriyamāṇaṃ yadā karma nāśaṃ gacchati mānuṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:284.037c: teṣāṃ nānyad ṛte loke tapasaḥ karma vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:284.039a: yathā nadīnadāḥ sarve sāgare yānti saṃsthitim
GE07mbh_12_u:284.039c: evam āśramiṇaḥ sarve gṛhasthe yānti saṃsthitim
GE07mbh_12_u:285.001c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:285.002a: yad etaj jāyate 'patyaṃ sa evāyam iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.003a: evam etan mahārāja yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.004a: sukṣetrāc ca subījāc ca puṇyo bhavati saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.005a: vaktrād bhujābhyām ūrubhyāṃ padbhyāṃ caivātha jajñire
GE07mbh_12_u:285.005c: sṛjataḥ prajāpater lokān iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.007c: ato 'nye tv atiriktā ye te vai saṃkarajāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.009a: āyogāḥ karaṇā vrātyāś caṇḍālāś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:285.009c: ete caturbhyo varṇebhyo jāyante vai parasparam
GE07mbh_12_u:285.010c: bahūnīha hi loke vai gotrāṇi munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:285.011a: yatra tatra kathaṃ jātāḥ svayoniṃ munayo gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.012a: rājan naitad bhaved grāhyam apakṛṣṭena janmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:285.013a: utpādya putrān munayo nṛpate yatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:285.013c: svenaiva tapasā teṣām ṛṣitvaṃ vidadhuḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.014a: pitāmahaś ca me pūrvam ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca kāśyapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.014c: vaṭas tāṇḍyaḥ kṛpaś caiva kakṣīvān kamaṭhādayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.015a: yavakrītaś ca nṛpate droṇaś ca vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.015c: āyur mataṅgo dattaś ca drupado matsya eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:285.016a: ete svāṃ prakṛtiṃ prāptā vaideha tapaso ''śrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:285.016c: pratiṣṭhitā vedavido dame tapasi caiva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:285.017c: aṅgirāḥ kaśyapaś caiva vasiṣṭho bhṛgur eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:285.018c: nāmadheyāni tapasā tāni ca grahaṇaṃ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:285.019c: tathā sāmānyadharmāṃś ca sarvatra kuśalo hy asi
GE07mbh_12_u:285.021a: kṛṣiś ca pāśupālyaṃ ca vāṇijyaṃ ca viśām api
GE07mbh_12_u:285.022c: dharmān sādhāraṇāṃs tāta vistareṇa śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:285.023c: śrāddhakarmātitheyaṃ ca satyam akrodha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:285.024c: ātmajñānaṃ titikṣā ca dharmāḥ sādhāraṇā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:285.025a: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyās trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.025c: atra teṣām adhīkāro dharmeṣu dvipadāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:285.027a: na cāpi śūdraḥ patatīti niścayo; na cāpi saṃskāram ihārhatīti vā
GE07mbh_12_u:285.027c: śrutipravṛttaṃ na ca dharmam āpnute; na cāsya dharme pratiṣedhanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:285.028a: vaidehakaṃ śūdram udāharanti; dvijā mahārāja śrutopapannāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.028c: ahaṃ hi paśyāmi narendra devaṃ; viśvasya viṣṇuṃ jagataḥ pradhānam
GE07mbh_12_u:285.029c: mantravarjaṃ na duṣyanti kurvāṇāḥ pauṣṭikīḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.030a: yathā yathā hi sadvṛttam ālambantītare janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.030c: tathā tathā sukhaṃ prāpya pretya ceha ca śerate
GE07mbh_12_u:285.031a: kiṃ karma dūṣayaty enam atha jātir mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:285.031c: saṃdeho me samutpannas tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:285.032c: karma caiva hi jātiś ca viśeṣaṃ tu niśāmaya
GE07mbh_12_u:285.033a: jātyā ca karmaṇā caiva duṣṭaṃ karma niṣevate
GE07mbh_12_u:285.033c: jātyā duṣṭaś ca yaḥ pāpaṃ na karoti sa pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:285.034a: jātyā pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma dhikkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:285.034c: karma tad dūṣayaty enaṃ tasmāt karma naśobhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:285.036a: śṛṇu me 'tra mahārāja yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:285.036c: yāni karmāṇy ahiṃsrāṇi naraṃ trāyanti sarvadā
GE07mbh_12_u:285.039a: sarve varṇā dharmakāryāṇi samyak; kṛtvā rājan satyavākyāni coktvā
GE07mbh_12_u:285.039c: tyaktvādharmaṃ dāruṇaṃ jīvaloke; yānti svargaṃ nātra kāryo vicāraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.001a: pitā sakhāyo guravaḥ striyaś ca; na nirguṇā nāma bhavanti loke
GE07mbh_12_u:286.001c: ananyabhaktāḥ priyavādinaś ca; hitāś ca vaśyāś ca tathaiva rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:286.002a: pitā paraṃ daivataṃ mānavānāṃ; mātur viśiṣṭaṃ pitaraṃ vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:286.002c: jñānasya lābhaṃ paramaṃ vadanti; jitendriyārthāḥ param āpnuvanti
GE07mbh_12_u:286.003a: raṇājire yatra śarāgnisaṃstare; nṛpātmajo ghātam avāpya dahyate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.003c: prayāti lokān amaraiḥ sudurlabhān; niṣevate svargaphalaṃ yathāsukham
GE07mbh_12_u:286.004a: śrāntaṃ bhītaṃ bhraṣṭaśastraṃ rudantaṃ; parāṅmukhaṃ paribarhaiś ca hīnam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.004c: anudyataṃ rogiṇaṃ yācamānaṃ; na vai hiṃsyād bālavṛddhau ca rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:286.006a: tulyād iha vadhaḥ śreyān viśiṣṭāc ceti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.006c: nihīnāt kātarāc caiva nṛpāṇāṃ garhito vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.007c: pāpa eva vadhaḥ prokto narakāyeti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.008a: na kaś cit trāti vai rājan diṣṭāntavaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.012c: adhvānaṃ gatakaś cāyaṃ prāptaś cāyaṃ gṛhād gṛham
GE07mbh_12_u:286.013a: dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra nānyat kiṃ cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.013c: tad dehaṃ dehināṃ yuktaṃ mokṣabhūteṣu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.014c: bhūtānām indriyāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca samāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.015c: guṇair api parikṣīṇaṃ śarīraṃ martyatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.016c: bhūtaiḥ prakṛtim āpannais tato bhūmau nimajjati
GE07mbh_12_u:286.017a: bhāvitaṃ karmayogena jāyate tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:286.017c: idaṃ śarīraṃ vaideha mriyate yatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:286.018a: na jāyate tu nṛpate kaṃ cit kālam ayaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.019a: sa punar jāyate rājan prāpyehāyatanaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:286.019c: manasaḥ paramo hy ātmā indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.020a: dvividhānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamāḥ paramā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:286.020c: jaṅgamānām api tathā dvipadāḥ paramā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.020e: dvipadānām api tathā dvijā vai paramāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.021a: dvijānām api rājendra prajñāvantaḥ parā matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.022a: jātam anveti maraṇaṃ nṛṇām iti viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.022c: antavanti hi karmāṇi sevante guṇataḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.023a: āpanne tūttarāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ sūrye yo nidhanaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:286.023c: nakṣatre ca muhūrte ca puṇye rājan sa puṇyakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:286.024a: ayojayitvā kleśena janaṃ plāvya ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.025a: viṣam udbandhanaṃ dāho dasyuhastāt tathā vadhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.025c: daṃṣṭribhyaś ca paśubhyaś ca prākṛto vadha ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.026c: evaṃvidhaiś ca bahubhir aparaiḥ prākṛtair api
GE07mbh_12_u:286.027a: ūrdhvaṃ hitvā pratiṣṭhante prāṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:286.028a: ekaḥ śatrur na dvitīyo 'sti śatrur; ajñānatulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:286.028c: yenāvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayukto; ghorāṇi karmāṇi sudāruṇāni
GE07mbh_12_u:286.029a: prabodhanārthaṃ śrutidharmayuktaṃ; vṛddhān upāsyaṃ ca bhaveta yasya
GE07mbh_12_u:286.029c: prayatnasādhyo hi sa rājaputra; prajñāśareṇonmathitaḥ paraiti
GE07mbh_12_u:286.030a: adhītya vedāṃs tapasā brahmacārī; yajñāñ śaktyā saṃnisṛjyeha pañca
GE07mbh_12_u:286.030c: vanaṃ gacchet puruṣo dharmakāmaḥ; śreyaś citvā sthāpayitvā svavaṃśam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.032a: iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.032c: ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.033a: kathaṃ na vipraṇaśyema yonito 'syā iti prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:286.034a: yo durlabhataraṃ prāpya mānuṣyam iha vai naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.034c: dharmāvamantā kāmātmā bhavet sa khalu vañcyate
GE07mbh_12_u:286.035a: yas tu prītipurogeṇa cakṣuṣā tāta paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:286.035c: dīpopamāni bhūtāni yāvad arcir na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:286.037a: dānaṃ tyāgaḥ śobhanā mūrtir adbhyo; bhūyaḥ plāvyaṃ tapasā vai śarīram
GE07mbh_12_u:286.037c: sarasvatīnaimiṣapuṣkareṣu; ye cāpy anye puṇyadeśāḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_12_u:286.038a: gṛheṣu yeṣām asavaḥ patanti; teṣām atho nirharaṇaṃ praśastam
GE07mbh_12_u:286.038c: yānena vai prāpaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne; śaucena nūnaṃ vidhinā caiva dāhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.039a: iṣṭiḥ puṣṭir yajanaṃ yājanaṃ ca; dānaṃ puṇyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca prayogaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:286.039c: śaktyā pitryaṃ yac ca kiṃ cit praśastaṃ; sarvāṇy ātmārthe mānavo yaḥ karoti
GE07mbh_12_u:286.041a: evad vai sarvam ākhyātaṃ muninā sumahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.001a: punar eva tu papraccha janako mithilādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.002a: kiṃ śreyaḥ kā gatir brahman kiṃ kṛtaṃ na vinaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.002c: kva gato na nivarteta tan me brūhi mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:287.003a: asaṅgaḥ śreyaso mūlaṃ jñānaṃ jñānagatiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.003c: cīrṇaṃ tapo na praṇaśyed vāpaḥ kṣetre na naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.005a: yo dadāti sahasrāṇi gavām aśvaśatāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:287.006a: vasan viṣayamadhye 'pi na vasaty eva buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:287.006c: saṃvasaty eva durbuddhir asatsu viṣayeṣv api
GE07mbh_12_u:287.007c: aprājñam adhikaṃ pāpaṃ śliṣyate jatu kāṣṭhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:287.008c: kartā khalu yathākālaṃ tat sarvam abhipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.009a: buddhikarmendriyāṇāṃ hi pramatto yo na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.010a: vītarāgo jitakrodhaḥ samyag bhavati yaḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.010c: viṣaye vartamāno 'pi na sa pāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.012a: yathā bhānugataṃ tejo maṇiḥ śuddhaḥ samādhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.013a: yathā tilānām iha puṣpasaṃśrayāt; pṛthak pṛthag yāti guṇo 'tisaumyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:287.013c: tathā narāṇāṃ bhuvi bhāvitātmanāṃ; yathāśrayaṃ sattvaguṇaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.014a: jahāti dārān ihate na saṃpadaḥ; sadaśvayānaṃ vividhāś ca yāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.014c: triviṣṭape jātamatir yadā naras; tadāsya buddhir viṣayeṣu bhidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.015a: prasaktabuddhir viṣayeṣu yo naro; yo budhyate hy ātmahitaṃ kadā ca na
GE07mbh_12_u:287.015c: sa sarvabhāvānugatena cetasā; nṛpāmiṣeṇeva jhaṣo vikṛṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.017a: na dharmakālaḥ puruṣasya niścito; na cāpi mṛtyuḥ puruṣaṃ pratīkṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.017c: kriyā hi dharmasya sadaiva śobhanā; yadā naro mṛtyumukhe 'bhivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.018a: yathāndhaḥ svagṛhe yukto hy abhyāsād eva gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.018c: tathā yuktena manasā prājño gacchati tāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:287.019a: maraṇaṃ janmani proktaṃ janma vai maraṇāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.020f-0743_01: yukto yadā sa bhavati tadā tat paśyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:287.022a: adhas tiryaggatiṃ caiva svarge caiva parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:287.023a: mṛnmaye bhājane pakve yathā vai nyasyate dravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.023c: tathā śarīraṃ tapasā taptaṃ viṣayam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:287.024a: viṣayān aśnute yas tu na sa bhokṣyaty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.024c: yas tu bhogāṃs tyajed ātmā sa vai bhoktuṃ vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.025c: jātyandha iva panthānam āvṛtātmā na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.026a: vaṇig yathā samudrād vai yathārthaṃ labhate dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.027c: mṛtyur grasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.028a: svayaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi jāto jantuḥ prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.028c: nākṛtaṃ labhate kaś cit kiṃ cid atra priyāpriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.029a: śayānaṃ yāntam āsīnaṃ pravṛttaṃ viṣayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:287.030a: na hy anyat tīram āsādya punas tartuṃ vyavasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.030c: durlabho dṛśyate hy asya vinipāto mahārṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:287.031a: yathā bhārāvasaktā hi naur mahāmbhasi tantunā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.034c: buddhimārgaprayātasya sukhaṃ tv iha paratra ca
GE07mbh_12_u:287.035c: parārthaṃ vistarāḥ sarve tyāgam ātmahitaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.036c: bhāryā dāsāś ca putrāś ca svam artham anuyuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.037a: na mātā na pitā kiṃ cit kasya cit pratipadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:287.038a: mātā putraḥ pitā bhrātā bhāryā mitrajanas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.039a: sarvāṇi karmāṇi purā kṛtāni; śubhāśubhāny ātmano yānti jantoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.039c: upasthitaṃ karmaphalaṃ viditvā; buddhiṃ tathā codayate 'ntarātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.040c: na tasya kaś cid ārambhaḥ kadā cid avasīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.041c: na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityam iva raśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:287.042c: yam ārabhaty anindyātmā na so 'rthaḥ parisīdati
GE07mbh_12_u:287.043a: sarvaḥ svāni śubhāśubhāni niyataṃ karmāṇi jantuḥ svayaṃ; garbhāt saṃpratipadyate tad ubhayaṃ yat tena pūrvaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.043c: mṛtyuś cāparihāravān samagatiḥ kālena viccheditā; dāroś cūrṇam ivāśmasāravihitaṃ karmāntikaṃ prāpayet
GE07mbh_12_u:287.044a: svarūpatām ātmakṛtaṃ ca vistaraṃ; kulānvayaṃ dravyasamṛddhisaṃcayam
GE07mbh_12_u:287.044c: naro hi sarvo labhate yathākṛtaṃ; śubhāśubhenātmakṛtena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.045a: ity ukto janako rājan yathātathyaṃ manīṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:287.045c: śrutvā dharmavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ parāṃ mudam avāpa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:288.001a: satyaṃ kṣamāṃ damaṃ prajñāṃ praśaṃsanti pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:288.001c: vidvāṃso manujā loke katham etan mataṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:288.002c: sādhyānām iha saṃvādaṃ haṃsasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:288.003a: haṃso bhūtvātha sauvarṇas tv ajo nityaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.003c: sa vai paryeti lokāṃs trīn atha sādhyān upāgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:288.004a: śakune vayaṃ sma devā vai sādhyās tvām anuyujmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:288.004c: pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mokṣadharmaṃ bhavāṃś ca kila mokṣavit
GE07mbh_12_u:288.005a: śruto 'si naḥ paṇḍito dhīravādī; sādhuśabdaḥ patate te patatrin
GE07mbh_12_u:288.005c: kiṃ manyase śreṣṭhatamaṃ dvija tvaṃ; kasmin manas te ramate mahātman
GE07mbh_12_u:288.006a: tan naḥ kāryaṃ pakṣivara praśādhi; yat kāryāṇāṃ manyase śreṣṭham ekam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.006c: yat kṛtvā vai puruṣaḥ sarvabandhair; vimucyate vihagendreha śīghram
GE07mbh_12_u:288.007a: idaṃ kāryam amṛtāśāḥ śṛṇomi; tapo damaḥ satyam ātmābhiguptiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.007c: granthīn vimucya hṛdayasya sarvān; priyāpriye svaṃ vaśam ānayīta
GE07mbh_12_u:288.008a: nāruṃtudaḥ syān na nṛśaṃsavādī; na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta
GE07mbh_12_u:288.008c: yayāsya vācā para udvijeta; na tāṃ vaded ruśatīṃ pāpalokyām
GE07mbh_12_u:288.009a: vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti; yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
GE07mbh_12_u:288.009c: parasya nāmarmasu te patanti; tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:288.010a: paraś ced enam ativādabāṇair; bhṛśaṃ vidhyec chama eveha kāryaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.010c: saṃroṣyamāṇaḥ pratimṛṣyate yaḥ; sa ādatte sukṛtaṃ vai parasya
GE07mbh_12_u:288.011a: kṣepābhimānād abhiṣaṅgavyalīkaṃ; nigṛhṇāti jvalitaṃ yaś ca manyum
GE07mbh_12_u:288.011c: aduṣṭacetā mudito 'nasūyuḥ; sa ādatte sukṛtaṃ vai pareṣām
GE07mbh_12_u:288.012a: ākruśyamāno na vadāmi kiṃ cit; kṣamāmy ahaṃ tāḍyamānaś ca nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.012c: śreṣṭhaṃ hy etat kṣamam apy āhur āryāḥ; satyaṃ tathaivārjavam ānṛśaṃsyam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.014a: vāco vegaṃ manasaḥ krodhavegaṃ; vivitsāvegam udaropasthavegam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.014c: etān vegān yo viṣahaty udīrṇāṃs; taṃ manye 'haṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vai muniṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:288.015a: akrodhanaḥ krudhyatāṃ vai viśiṣṭas; tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.015c: amānuṣān mānuṣo vai viśiṣṭas; tathājñānāj jñānavān vai pradhānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.017a: yo nātyuktaḥ prāha rūkṣaṃ priyaṃ vā; yo vā hato na pratihanti dhairyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:288.017c: pāpaṃ ca yo necchati tasya hantus; tasmai devāḥ spṛhayante sadaiva
GE07mbh_12_u:288.019a: sadāham āryān nibhṛto 'py upāse; na me vivitsā na ca me 'sti roṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.019c: na cāpy ahaṃ lipsamānaḥ paraimi; na caiva kiṃ cid viṣameṇa yāmi
GE07mbh_12_u:288.020a: nāhaṃ śaptaḥ pratiśapāmi kiṃ cid; damaṃ dvāraṃ hy amṛtasyeha vedmi
GE07mbh_12_u:288.020c: guhyaṃ brahma tad idaṃ vo bravīmi; na mānuṣāc chreṣṭhataraṃ hi kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:288.021c: virajāḥ kālam ākāṅkṣan dhīro dhairyeṇa sidhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:288.022a: yaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhavati hy arcanīya; utsecane stambha ivābhijātaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.022c: yasmai vācaṃ supraśastāṃ vadanti; sa vai devān gacchati saṃyatātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:288.023a: na tathā vaktum icchanti kalyāṇān puruṣe guṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:288.024a: yasya vāṅmanasī gupte samyak praṇihite sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:288.024c: vedās tapaś ca tyāgaś ca sa idaṃ sarvam āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:288.025c: tasmān na vardhayed anyaṃ na cātmānaṃ vihiṃsayet
GE07mbh_12_u:288.026c: sukhaṃ hy avamataḥ śete yo 'vamantā sa naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:288.027a: yat krodhano yajate yad dadāti; yad vā tapas tapyati yaj juhoti
GE07mbh_12_u:288.027c: vaivasvatas tad dharate 'sya sarvaṃ; moghaḥ śramo bhavati krodhanasya
GE07mbh_12_u:288.028c: upastham udaraṃ hastau vāk caturthī sa dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:288.029a: satyaṃ damaṃ hy ārjavam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ; dhṛtiṃ titikṣām abhisevamānaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.029c: svādhyāyanityo 'spṛhayan pareṣām; ekāntaśīly ūrdhvagatir bhavet saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.030a: sarvān etān anucaran vatsavac caturaḥ stanān
GE07mbh_12_u:288.030c: na pāvanatamaṃ kiṃ cit satyād adhyagamaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:288.031c: satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva
GE07mbh_12_u:288.032c: yādṛg icchec ca bhavituṃ tādṛg bhavati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.033a: yadi santaṃ sevate yady asantaṃ; tapasvinaṃ yadi vā stenam eva
GE07mbh_12_u:288.033c: vāso yathā raṅgavaśaṃ prayāti; tathā sa teṣāṃ vaśam abhyupaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:288.034a: sadā devāḥ sādhubhiḥ saṃvadante; na mānuṣaṃ viṣayaṃ yānti draṣṭum
GE07mbh_12_u:288.034c: nenduḥ samaḥ syād asamo hi vāyur; uccāvacaṃ viṣayaṃ yaḥ sa veda
GE07mbh_12_u:288.035c: tenaiva devāḥ prīyante satāṃ mārgasthitena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:288.036a: śiśnodare ye 'bhiratāḥ sadaiva; stenā narā vākparuṣāś ca nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.036c: apetadoṣān iti tān viditvā; dūrād devāḥ saṃparivarjayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:288.037a: na vai devā hīnasattvena toṣyāḥ; sarvāśinā duṣkṛtakarmaṇā vā
GE07mbh_12_u:288.037c: satyavratā ye tu narāḥ kṛtajñā; dharme ratās taiḥ saha saṃbhajante
GE07mbh_12_u:288.038a: avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtāc chreya āhuḥ; satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tad dvitīyam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.038c: dharmaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ; priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tac caturtham
GE07mbh_12_u:288.039a: kenāyam āvṛto lokaḥ kena vā na prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:288.039c: kena tyajati mitrāṇi kena svargaṃ na gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:288.040c: lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargaṃ na gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:288.041a: kaḥ svid eko ramate brāhmaṇānāṃ; kaḥ svid eko bahubhir joṣam āste
GE07mbh_12_u:288.041c: kaḥ svid eko balavān durbalo 'pi; kaḥ svid eṣāṃ kalahaṃ nānvavaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:288.042a: prājña eko ramate brāhmaṇānāṃ; prājña eko bahubhir joṣam āste
GE07mbh_12_u:288.042c: prājña eko balavān durbalo 'pi; prājña eṣāṃ kalahaṃ nānvavaiti
GE07mbh_12_u:288.043a: kiṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ devatvaṃ kiṃ ca sādhutvam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:288.043c: asādhutvaṃ ca kiṃ teṣāṃ kim eṣāṃ mānuṣaṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.044a: svādhyāya eṣāṃ devatvaṃ vrataṃ sādhutvam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:288.044c: asādhutvaṃ parīvādo mṛtyur mānuṣam ucyate bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:288.045-0744_01: ity uktvā varado devo bhagavān nitya avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.045-0744_02: sādhyair devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ divam evāruroha saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.045-0744_03: etad yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ putryaṃ svargāya tu dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:288.045a: saṃvāda ity ayaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sādhyānāṃ parikīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:288.045c: kṣetraṃ vai karmaṇāṃ yoniḥ sadbhāvaḥ satyam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:289.001a: sāṃkhye yoge ca me tāta viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:289.001c: tava sarvajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ kurusattama
GE07mbh_12_u:289.002a: sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ praśaṃsanti yogā yogaṃ dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.003a: anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ śatrukarśana
GE07mbh_12_u:289.003c: vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ yogāḥ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.004a: vadanti kāraṇaṃ cedaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ samyag dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.004c: vijñāyeha gatīḥ sarvā virakto viṣayeṣu yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.005a: ūrdhvaṃ sa dehāt suvyaktaṃ vimucyed iti nānyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:289.005c: etad āhur mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.006a: svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.006c: śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ tvadvidhaiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.007c: ubhe caite mate tattve mama tāta yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:289.008a: ubhe caite mate jñāne nṛpate śiṣṭasaṃmate
GE07mbh_12_u:289.009a: tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:289.009c: vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ tulyaṃ darśanaṃ na samaṃ tayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.009d-0745_01: tayos tu darśanaṃ samyak sūkṣme bhāve prasajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:289.010a: yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ dayā cātra pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:289.010c: tulyaṃ na darśanaṃ kasmāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:289.011a: rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.011c: yogāc chittvādito doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tat
GE07mbh_12_u:289.012a: yathā cānimiṣāḥ sthūlā jālaṃ chittvā punar jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.012c: prāpnuvanti tathā yogās tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.013a: tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.014c: chittvā yogāḥ paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalāḥ śivam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.015a: abalāś ca mṛgā rājan vāgurāsu tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:289.015c: vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:289.016a: balahīnāś ca kaunteya yathā jālagatā jhaṣāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.016c: antaṃ gacchanti rājendra tathā yogāḥ sudurbalāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.017a: yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmāḥ prāpya jālam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:289.017c: tatra saktā vipadyante mucyante ca balānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.018a: karmajair bandhanair baddhās tadvad yogāḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:289.018c: abalā vai vinaśyanti mucyante ca balānvitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.019a: alpakaś ca yathā rājan vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.019c: ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogo 'balaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:289.020a: sa eva ca yadā rājan vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.020c: samīraṇayutaḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm api
GE07mbh_12_u:289.022a: durbalaś ca yathā rājan srotasā hriyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.023a: tad eva ca yathā sroto viṣṭambhayati vāraṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.023c: tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā vyūhate viṣayān bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:289.025a: na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.026c: yogaḥ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret
GE07mbh_12_u:289.027a: prāpnuyād viṣayāṃś caiva punaś cograṃ tapaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:289.027c: saṃkṣipec ca punaḥ pārtha sūryas tejoguṇān iva
GE07mbh_12_u:289.029a: balāni yoge proktāni mayaitāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:289.029c: nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca punas tava
GE07mbh_12_u:289.030a: ātmanaś ca samādhāne dhāraṇāṃ prati cābhibho
GE07mbh_12_u:289.031a: apramatto yathā dhanvī lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.031c: yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.032a: snehapūrṇe yathā pātre mana ādhāya niścalam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.033a: yuktvā tathāyam ātmānaṃ yogaḥ pārthiva niścalam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.034a: yathā ca nāvaṃ kaunteya karṇadhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.035c: durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti hitvā deham imaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:289.036a: sārathiś ca yathā yuktvā sadaśvān susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.036c: deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:289.037c: prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣaṃ mukta ivāśugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.038c: pāpaṃ hanteva mīnānāṃ padam āpnoti so 'jaram
GE07mbh_12_u:289.039a: nābhyāṃ kaṇṭhe ca śīrṣe ca hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.040c: ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ yuṅkte samyag viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:289.041a: sa śīghram amalaprajñaḥ karma dagdhvā śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:289.042a: āhārān kīdṛśān kṛtvā kāni jitvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:289.042c: yogī balam avāpnoti tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:289.043a: kaṇānāṃ bhakṣaṇe yuktaḥ piṇyākasya ca bhakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:289.043c: snehānāṃ varjane yukto yogī balam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:289.045a: pakṣān māsān ṛtūṃś citrān saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:289.045c: apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā yogī balam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:289.046a: akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ satataṃ manujeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:289.046c: upoṣya samyak śuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:289.047a: kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ śītoṣṇe varṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:289.047c: bhayaṃ nidrāṃ tathā śvāsaṃ pauruṣaṃ viṣayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:289.048a: aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva ghorāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:289.048c: sparśān sarvāṃs tathā tandrīṃ durjayāṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:289.050a: durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ vipaścitām
GE07mbh_12_u:289.050c: na kaś cid vrajati hy asmin kṣemeṇa bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:289.051a: yathā kaś cid vanaṃ ghoraṃ bahusarpasarīsṛpam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.053a: yogamārgaṃ tathāsādya yaḥ kaś cid bhajate dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.053c: kṣemeṇoparamen mārgād bahudoṣo hi sa smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.055a: vipannā dhāraṇās tāta nayanti naśubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:289.055c: netṛhīnā yathā nāvaḥ puruṣān arṇave nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:289.056a: yas tu tiṣṭhati kaunteya dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:289.056c: maraṇaṃ janma duḥkhaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca sa vimuñcati
GE07mbh_12_u:289.057c: paraṃ yogaṃ tu yat kṛtsnaṃ niścitaṃ tad dvijātiṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:289.058a: paraṃ hi tad brahma mahan mahātman; brahmāṇam īśaṃ varadaṃ ca viṣṇum
GE07mbh_12_u:289.058c: bhavaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca ṣaḍānanaṃ ca; ṣaḍ brahmaputrāṃś ca mahānubhāvān
GE07mbh_12_u:289.059a: tamaś ca kaṣṭaṃ sumahad rajaś ca; sattvaṃ ca śuddhaṃ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:289.059c: siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ; tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.060a: tārādhipaṃ vai vimalaṃ satāraṃ; viśvāṃś ca devān uragān pitṝṃś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:289.060c: śailāṃś ca kṛtsnān udadhīṃś ca ghorān; nadīś ca sarvāḥ savanān ghanāṃś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:289.061a: nāgān nagān yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca; gandharvasaṃghān puruṣān striyaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:289.061c: parasparaṃ prāpya mahān mahātmā; viśeta yogī nacirād vimuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:289.062a: kathā ca yeyaṃ nṛpate prasaktā; deve mahāvīryamatau śubheyam
GE07mbh_12_u:289.062c: yogān sa sarvān abhibhūya martyān; nārāyaṇātmā kurute mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.002a: sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ kārtsnyena vidhiṃ prabrūhi pṛcchate
GE07mbh_12_u:290.002c: triṣu lokeṣu yaj jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_12_u:290.003a: śṛṇu me tvam idaṃ śuddhaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:290.004a: yasmin na vibhramāḥ ke cid dṛśyante manujarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:290.004c: guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo doṣahāniś ca kevalā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.005c: mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.006a: rākṣasān viṣayāñ jñātvā yakṣāṇāṃ viṣayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.007a: pitṝṇāṃ viṣayāñ jñātvā tiryakṣu caratāṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.008c: āsurān viṣayāñ jñātvā vaiśvadevāṃs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:290.009c: viṣayāṃś ca prajeśānāṃ brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.010a: āyuṣaś ca paraṃ kālaṃ loke vijñāya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.010c: sukhasya ca paraṃ tattvaṃ vijñāya vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:290.011a: prāpte kāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:290.011c: tiryak ca patatāṃ duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ narake ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:290.012a: svargasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān doṣān sarvāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.012c: vedavāde ca ye doṣā guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.013a: jñānayoge ca ye doṣā guṇā yoge ca ye nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.013c: sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣās tathaiva ca guṇā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.013d-0746_01: itareṣu ca ye doṣā guṇās teṣu ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.014a: sattvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ jñātvā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.014c: tamaś cāṣṭaguṇaṃ jñātvā buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.015a: ṣaḍguṇaṃ ca nabho jñātvā manaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.015c: buddhiṃ caturguṇāṃ jñātvā tamaś ca triguṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:290.016a: dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā sattvam ekaguṇaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.016c: mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena pralaye prekṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.017c: prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iha nabhaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:290.018a: rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:290.018c: śabde saktaṃ tathā śrotraṃ jihvāṃ rasaguṇeṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:290.019a: tanuṃ sparśe tathā saktāṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.019c: mohaṃ tamasi saṃsaktaṃ lobham artheṣu saṃśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.020a: viṣṇuṃ krānte bale śakraṃ koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.020c: apsu devīṃ tathā saktām apas tejasi cāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.021a: tejo vāyau tu saṃsaktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.021c: nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ mahad buddhau ca saṃśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.022a: buddhiṃ tamasi saṃsaktāṃ tamo rajasi cāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.022c: rajaḥ sattve tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:290.023a: saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.023c: devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃsaktaṃ mokṣaṃ saktaṃ tu na kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:290.024a: jñātvā sattvayutaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.024c: svabhāvaṃ cetanāṃ caiva jñātvā vai deham āśrite
GE07mbh_12_u:290.025a: madhyastham ekam ātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:290.026c: prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca vyānodānau ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.027a: avāk caivānilaṃ jñātvā pravahaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.027c: sapta vātāṃs tathā śeṣān saptadhā vidhivat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.028a: prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva mārgāṃś ca subahūn varān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.028c: saptarṣīṃś ca bahūñ jñātvā rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.029c: aiśvaryāc cyāvitāñ jñātvā kālena mahatā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.030a: mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ śrutvā nāśaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:290.030c: gatiṃ cāpy aśubhāṃ jñātvā nṛpate pāpakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:290.031a: vaitaraṇyāṃ ca yad duḥkhaṃ patitānāṃ yamakṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:290.031c: yonīṣu ca vicitrāsu saṃsārān aśubhāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.034a: vijñāyāhitam ātmānaṃ yogāṃś ca vividhān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.036a: upaplavāṃs tathā ghorāñ śaśinas tejasas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.036c: tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.037a: dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca vijñāya kṛpaṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.038a: bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya kṣayaṃ dehasya cāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:290.038c: rāge mohe ca saṃprāpte kva cit sattvaṃ samāśritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.039a: sahasreṣu naraḥ kaś cin mokṣabuddhiṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.040c: viṣayāṇāṃ ca daurātmyaṃ vijñāya nṛpate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.041a: gatāsūnāṃ ca kaunteya dehān dṛṣṭvā tathāśubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.041c: vāsaṃ kuleṣu jantūnāṃ duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.043a: jananīṣu ca vartante ye na samyag yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:290.043c: sadevakeṣu lokeṣu ye na vartanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.045a: vedavādāṃs tathā citrān ṛtūnāṃ paryayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.045c: kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca māsānāṃ prakṣayaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.046a: pakṣakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.046c: kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.047a: vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā samudrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.047c: kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ ca tathā punar vṛddhiṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:290.048a: saṃyogānāṃ kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.048c: kṣayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā śailānāṃ kṣayaṃ ca saritāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.049a: varṇānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣayāntaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.049c: jarāmṛtyuṃ tathā janma dṛṣṭvā duḥkhāni caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:290.050a: dehadoṣāṃs tathā jñātvā teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.051a: ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya sarvān ātmani saṃśritān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.051c: svadehād utthitān gandhāṃs tathā vijñāya cāśubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.052c: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.053a: pañca doṣān prabho dehe pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.053c: mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śṛṇu tān arisūdana
GE07mbh_12_u:290.054a: kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ nidrā pañcamaḥ śvāsa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:290.056a: guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā doṣān doṣaśatair api
GE07mbh_12_u:290.056c: hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś citrān vijñāya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.057a: apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ viṣṇor māyāśatair vṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.058e: rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ paṅke dvipam ivāvaśam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.059a: sāṃkhyā rājan mahāprājñās tyaktvā dehaṃ prajākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.060a: rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.060c: puṇyāṃś ca sāttvikān gandhān sparśajān dehasaṃśritān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.069c: tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma viśanti vimalaṃ nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.070a: tatas tān sukṛtīn sāṃkhyān sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.071a: tatra tān pravaho vāyuḥ pratigṛhṇāti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.072a: sūkṣmaḥ śītaḥ sugandhī ca sukhasparśaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.072c: saptānāṃ marutāṃ śreṣṭho lokān gacchati yaḥ śubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:290.072e: sa tān vahati kaunteya nabhasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:290.073a: nabho vahati lokeśa rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:290.073b-0749_01: tamo vahati rājendra rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:290.073c: rajo vahati rājendra sattvasya paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:290.074a: sattvaṃ vahati śuddhātman paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:290.075e: paramā sā gatiḥ pārtha nirdvaṃdvānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:290.076c: ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te smaranty uta na vānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:290.077a: yad atra tathyaṃ tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:290.077c: tvad ṛte mānavaṃ nānyaṃ praṣṭum arhāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_12_u:290.078a: mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn
GE07mbh_12_u:290.078c: yadi tatraiva vijñāne vartante yatayaḥ pare
GE07mbh_12_u:290.079c: magnasya hi pare jñāne kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:290.080a: yathānyāyaṃ tvayā tāta praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ susaṃkaṭaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.080e: atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mayeritam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.081a: buddhiś ca paramā yatra kāpilānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:290.081c: indriyāṇy api budhyante svadehaṃ dehino nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:290.081e: kāraṇāny ātmanas tāni sūkṣmaḥ paśyati tais tu saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.082c: vinaśyanti na saṃdehaḥ phenā iva mahārṇave
GE07mbh_12_u:290.084a: sa paśyati yathānyāyaṃ sparśān spṛśati cābhibho
GE07mbh_12_u:290.085a: indriyāṇīha sarvāṇi sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:290.086a: indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.086c: ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmāś caraty ātmā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.087a: sattvasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.087c: guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇān buddheś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.088a: guṇāṃś ca manasas tadvan nabhasaś ca guṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.088c: guṇān vāyoś ca dharmātmaṃs tejasaś ca guṇān punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.089a: apāṃ guṇāṃs tathā pārtha pārthivāṃś ca guṇān api
GE07mbh_12_u:290.089c: sarvātmanā guṇair vyāpya kṣetrajñaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:290.090a: ātmā ca yāti kṣetrajñaṃ karmaṇī ca śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:290.090c: śiṣyā iva mahātmānam indriyāṇi ca taṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:290.091a: prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya gacchaty ātmānam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.093a: śiṣṭaṃ tv atra manas tāta indriyāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:290.094a: śakyaṃ cālpena kālena śāntiṃ prāptuṃ guṇārthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:290.095a: sāṃkhyā rājan mahāprājñā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:290.095c: jñānenānena kaunteya tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:290.096a: atra te saṃśayo mā bhūj jñānaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ paraṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.096c: akṣaraṃ dhruvam avyaktaṃ pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.097c: kūṭasthaṃ caiva nityaṃ ca yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.098c: yac ca śaṃsanti śāstreṣu vadanti paramarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.099a: sarve viprāś ca devāś ca tathāgamavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.100a: prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā vadanti guṇabuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.100c: samyag yuktās tathā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.101a: amūrtes tasya kaunteya sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.103a: jñānaṃ mahad yad dhi mahatsu rājan; vedeṣu sāṃkhyeṣu tathaiva yoge
GE07mbh_12_u:290.103c: yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vividhaṃ purāṇaṃ; sāṃkhyāgataṃ tan nikhilaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:290.104a: yac cetihāseṣu mahatsu dṛṣṭaṃ; yac cārthaśāstre nṛpa śiṣṭajuṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:290.104c: jñānaṃ ca loke yad ihāsti kiṃ cit; sāṃkhyāgataṃ tac ca mahan mahātman
GE07mbh_12_u:290.105a: śamaś ca dṛṣṭaḥ paramaṃ balaṃ ca; jñānaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca yathāvad uktam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.105c: tapāṃsi sūkṣmāṇi sukhāni caiva; sāṃkhye yathāvad vihitāni rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:290.106a: viparyaye tasya hi pārtha devān; gacchanti sāṃkhyāḥ satataṃ sukhena
GE07mbh_12_u:290.106c: tāṃś cānusaṃcārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ; patanti vipreṣu yateṣu bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.107a: hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ; divaukaso dyām iva pārtha sāṃkhyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.107c: tato 'dhikaṃ te 'bhiratā mahārhe; sāṃkhye dvijāḥ pārthiva śiṣṭajuṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:290.108a: teṣāṃ na tiryag gamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ; nāvāg gatiḥ pāpakṛtāṃ nivāsaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.108c: na cābudhānām api te dvijātayo; ye jñānam etan nṛpate 'nuraktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:290.109a: sāṃkyaṃ viśālaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ; mahārṇavaṃ vimalam udārakāntam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.109c: kṛtsnaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ nṛpate mahātmā; nārāyaṇo dhārayate 'prameyam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.110a: etan mayoktaṃ naradeva tattvaṃ; nārāyaṇo viśvam idaṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:290.110c: sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ; saṃhārakāle ca tad atti bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.001a: kiṃ tad akṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.001c: kiṃ ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmād āvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.003a: tvaṃ hi jñānanidhir viprair ucyase vedapāragaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.003c: ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.004c: āvṛtte bhagavaty arke gantāsi paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:291.005a: tvayi pratigate śreyaḥ kutaḥ śroṣyāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.006a: tad etac chrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ kurukulodvaha
GE07mbh_12_u:291.006c: na tṛpyāmīha rājendra śṛṇvann amṛtam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.008c: papraccha janako rājā jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:291.010a: svakṣaraṃ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.011a: bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi paraṃ brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.012a: yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yatredaṃ kṣarate jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:291.012c: yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ śivaṃ kṣemyam anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.013c: yan na kṣarati pūrveṇa yāvat kālena cāpy atha
GE07mbh_12_u:291.015e: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśānaṃ jyotir avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:291.017a: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa buddhir iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.017c: mahān iti ca yogeṣu viriñca iti cāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:291.018a: sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:291.019a: vṛtaṃ naikātmakaṃ yena kṛtsnaṃ trailokyam ātmanā

GE07mbh_12_u:295.006a: ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.006c: ahaṃkārasya ca tathā buddhir vidyā nareśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:295.007c: vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.008a: avyaktasya paraṃ prāhur vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.008c: sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānasya pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:295.009a: jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.010c: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:295.011a: ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktāv ubhāv etau ca nakṣarau
GE07mbh_12_u:295.011c: kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā khyātau tu tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.013c: tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.014c: adhiṣṭhānāt kṣetram āhur etat tat pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.015a: yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tad avyaktātmani saṃkṣipet
GE07mbh_12_u:295.015c: tadā saha guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśo vilīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:295.016a: guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tadaikā prakṛtir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:295.018c: prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:295.019a: kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā tadā guṇavatīm atha
GE07mbh_12_u:295.020c: anyo 'ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:295.021a: tadaiṣo 'nyatvatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:295.021c: prakṛtyā caiva rājendra namiśro 'nyaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:295.022a: yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate
GE07mbh_12_u:295.022c: paśyate cāparaṃ paśyaṃ tadā paśyan na saṃjvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:295.023a: kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo 'haṃ kālam imaṃ janam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.023c: matsyo jālaṃ hy avijñānād anuvartitavāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:295.024a: aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.025c: ātmānaṃ tadvad ajñānād anyatvaṃ caiva vedmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:295.026a: mamāstu dhig abuddhasya yo 'haṃ magnam imaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.026c: anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.027a: ayam atra bhaved bandhur anena saha mokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.027c: sāmyam ekatvam āyāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:295.028a: tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo 'ham anena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:295.028c: ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:295.029c: sasaṅgayāhaṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:295.030a: anayāhaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:295.032a: sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etad dhi vañcanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:295.032c: vañcito 'smy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā
GE07mbh_12_u:295.033a: na cāyam aparādho 'syā aparādho hy ayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:295.035a: prakṛter anayatvena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:295.035c: nirmamasya mamatvena kiṃ kṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:295.036c: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā yeyaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām
GE07mbh_12_u:295.038c: kṣamaṃ mama sahānena naikatvam anayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:295.039e: nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:295.041a: niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca vibuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:295.041c: pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.042c: yad eva śāstraṃ sāṃkhyoktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:295.044a: bṛhac caiva hi tac chāstram ity āhuḥ kuśalā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.044c: asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punar dadhi punaḥ śaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.045a: pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ na paśyati narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:295.045c: sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tatra yathāvad anuvarṇitam
GE07mbh_12_u:295.046a: buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:295.046c: budhyamānaṃ ca buddhaṃ ca prāhur yoganidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.001c: guṇān dhārayate hy eṣā sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:296.002a: ajasraṃ tv iha krīḍārthaṃ vikurvantī narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:296.002c: ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā tāny eva ca vicakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.003a: etad evaṃ vikurvāṇāṃ budhyamāno na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.004a: na tv eva budhyate 'vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ vātha nirguṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.004c: kadā cit tv eva khalv etad āhur apratibuddhakam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.005a: budhyate yadi vāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.005c: budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa saṅgātmaka iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:296.007a: pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.008a: satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.008c: dṛśyādṛśye hy anugatam ubhāv eva mahādyutī
GE07mbh_12_u:296.009a: avyaktaṃ na tu tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.009c: kevalaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:296.011a: budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:296.014a: etat tat tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram
GE07mbh_12_u:296.014c: tattvasaṃśrayaṇād etat tattvavan na ca mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:296.015a: na caiṣa tattvavāṃs tāta nistattvas tv eṣa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:296.015c: eṣa muñcati tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ buddhasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.018c: ekatvaṃ vai bhavaty asya yadā buddhyā na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.020c: vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.021a: eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:296.025c: pareṇa paradharmā ca bhavaty eṣa sametya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:296.026a: viśuddhadharmā śuddhena buddhena ca sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:296.027c: vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:296.029a: kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:296.030a: etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te; tathyaṃ mahārāja yathārthatattvam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.030c: amatsaratvaṃ pratigṛhya cārthaṃ; sanātanaṃ brahma viśuddham ādyam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.031a: na vedaniṣṭhasya janasya rājan; pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:296.032a: na deyam etac ca tathānṛtātmane; śaṭhāya klībāya na jihmabuddhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:296.032c: na paṇḍitajñānaparopatāpine; deyaṃ tvayedaṃ vinibodha yādṛśe
GE07mbh_12_u:296.033c: viśuddhayogāya budhāya caiva; kriyāvate 'tha kṣamiṇe hitāya
GE07mbh_12_u:296.034c: vijānate caiva na cāhitakṣame; dame ca śaktāya śame ca dehinām
GE07mbh_12_u:296.035a: etair guṇair hīnatame na deyam; etat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:296.035c: na śreyasā yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃ; dharmapravaktāram apātradānāt
GE07mbh_12_u:296.036a: pṛthvīm imāṃ yady api ratnapūrṇāṃ; dadyān nadeyaṃ tv idam avratāya
GE07mbh_12_u:296.036c: jitendriyāyaitad asaṃśayaṃ te; bhavet pradeyaṃ paramaṃ narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:296.037a: karāla mā te bhayam astu kiṃ cid; etac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādya
GE07mbh_12_u:296.037c: yathāvad uktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ; niḥśokam atyantam anādimadhyam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.038a: agādhajanmāmaraṇaṃ ca rājan; nirāmayaṃ vītabhayaṃ śivaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:296.038c: samīkṣya mohaṃ tyaja cādya sarvaṃ; jñānasya tattvārtham idaṃ viditvā
GE07mbh_12_u:296.039a: avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād; dhiraṇyagarbhād gadato narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:296.039c: prasādya yatnena tam ugratejasaṃ; sanātanaṃ brahma yathādya vai tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:296.040a: pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra; tathā mayedaṃ tvayi coktam adya
GE07mbh_12_u:296.040c: tathāvāptaṃ brahmaṇo me narendra; mahaj jñānaṃ mokṣavidāṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.041a: etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:296.042a: punarāvṛttim āpnoti paraṃ jñānam avāpya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:296.043a: etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānānāṃ te paraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:296.043c: kathitaṃ tattvatas tāta śrutvā devarṣito nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:296.045a: nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad brahma sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.045c: mā śucaḥ kauravendra tvaṃ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.046a: yena kṣarākṣare vitte na bhayaṃ tasya vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:296.046c: vidyate tu bhayaṃ tasya yo naitad vetti pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:296.047a: avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravan
GE07mbh_12_u:296.048a: devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:296.048d-0761_01: uttīrṇo 'smād agādhāt sa param āpnoti śobhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:296.049c: ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:296.050a: yasmād agādhād avyaktād uttīrṇas tvaṃ sanātanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:296.050c: tasmāt tvaṃ virajāś caiva vitamaskaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:297.001a: mṛgayāṃ vicaran kaś cid vijane janakātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.001c: vane dadarśa viprendram ṛṣiṃ vaṃśadharaṃ bhṛgoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.002a: tam āsīnam upāsīnaḥ praṇamya śirasā munim
GE07mbh_12_u:297.002c: paścād anumatas tena papraccha vasumān idam
GE07mbh_12_u:297.003a: bhagavan kim idaṃ śreyaḥ pretya vāpīha vā bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:297.004c: nijagāda tatas tasmai śreyaskaram idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.006a: dharmaḥ satāṃ hitaḥ puṃsāṃ dharmaś caivāśrayaḥ satām
GE07mbh_12_u:297.006c: dharmāl lokās trayas tāta pravṛttāḥ sacarācarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.007a: svādukāmuka kāmānāṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kiṃ na gacchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:297.009c: satā tu dharmakāmena sukaraṃ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:297.010a: vane grāmyasukhācāro yathā grāmyas tathaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.011c: nivṛttau vā pravṛttau vā saṃpradhārya guṇāguṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:297.012a: nityaṃ ca bahu dātavyaṃ sādhubhyaś cānasūyatā
GE07mbh_12_u:297.013c: krodham utsṛjya dattvā ca nānutapyen na kīrtayet
GE07mbh_12_u:297.014a: anṛśaṃsaḥ śucir dāntaḥ satyavāg ārjave sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.014c: yonikarmaviśuddhaś ca pātraṃ syād vedavid dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.015a: satkṛtā caikapatnī ca jātyā yonir iheṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:297.016a: sa eva dharmaḥ so 'dharmas taṃ taṃ pratinaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:297.017a: līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād rajasaḥ pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:297.018a: viriktasya yathā samyag ghṛtaṃ bhavati bheṣajam
GE07mbh_12_u:297.020a: sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra kriyamāṇaṃ ca pūjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:297.020c: svadharme yatra rāgas te kāmaṃ dharmo vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:297.021a: adhṛtātman dhṛtau tiṣṭha durbuddhe buddhimān bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:297.021c: apraśānta praśāmya tvam aprājña prājñavac cara
GE07mbh_12_u:297.022c: iha ca pretya ca śreyas tasya mūlaṃ dhṛtiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:297.023a: rājarṣir adhṛtiḥ svargāt patito hi mahābhiṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:297.023c: yayātiḥ kṣīṇapuṇyaś ca dhṛtyā lokān avāptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:297.024d-0763_01: sa tu vipras tathā pṛṣṭo rājñā jānakinā vane
GE07mbh_12_u:297.025a: sa tu svabhāvasaṃpannas tac chrutvā munibhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:297.025c: vinivartya manaḥ kāmād dharme buddhiṃ cakāra ha
GE07mbh_12_u:298.002a: yac chivaṃ nityam abhayaṃ nityaṃ cākṣaram avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.002c: śuci nityam anāyāsaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:298.004c: papraccha janako rājā praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.005c: kim avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tasmāc ca paratas tu kim
GE07mbh_12_u:298.006a: prabhavaṃ cāpyayaṃ caiva kālasaṃkhyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:298.007a: ajñānāt paripṛcchāmi tvaṃ hi jñānamayo nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.007c: tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.008c: yogānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.009a: na tavāviditaṃ kiṃ cin māṃ tu jijñāsate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:298.009c: pṛṣṭena cāpi vaktavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.010a: aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktā vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_12_u:298.010c: atha sapta tu vyaktāni prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.011a: avyaktaṃ ca mahāṃś caiva tathāhaṃkāra eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:298.011c: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.012a: etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārān api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:298.012c: śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.013a: śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:298.013c: vāk ca hastau ca pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:298.016a: avyaktāc ca mahān ātmā samutpadyati pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:298.016c: prathamaṃ sargam ity etad āhuḥ prādhānikaṃ budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.017c: dvitīyaṃ sargam ity āhur etad buddhyātmakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.018c: tṛtīyaḥ sarga ity eṣa āhaṃkārika ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:298.019c: caturthaṃ sargam ity etan mānasaṃ paricakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:298.020a: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:298.020c: pañcamaṃ sargam ity āhur bhautikaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.021a: śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.021c: sargaṃ tu ṣaṣṭham ity āhur bahucintātmakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.022c: saptamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad aindriyakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:298.023c: aṣṭamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.024a: tiryak srotas tv adhaḥsrota utpadyati narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:298.024c: navamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:298.025a: etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:299.003c: sā mūrtiḥ sarvabhūtānām ity evam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:299.004c: saṃdadhe 'rdhaṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ divam ardhaṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.005a: dyāvāpṛthivyor ity eṣa rājan vedeṣu paṭhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:299.005c: tayoḥ śakalayor madhyam ākāśam akarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.007a: sṛjaty ahaṃkāram ṛṣir bhūtaṃ divyātmakaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:299.007c: caturaś cāparān putrān dehāt pūrvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.007d-0765_01: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:299.007e: te vai pitṛbhyaḥ pitaraḥ śrūyante rājasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:299.008a: devāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca sutā devair lokāḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.009c: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:299.010a: etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyam iha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.011a: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.011e: yair āviṣṭāni bhūtāni ahany ahani pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:299.012a: anyonyaṃ spṛhayanty ete anyonyasya hite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.013a: te vadhyamānā anyonyaṃ guṇair hāribhir avyayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.014c: ratrir etāvatī caiva manasaś ca narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:299.015a: manaś carati rājendra caritaṃ sarvam indriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:299.015c: na cendriyāṇi paśyanti mana evātra paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:299.016a: cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi manasā tu na cakṣuṣā

GE07mbh_12_u:300.001a: tattvānāṃ sargasaṃkhyā ca kālasaṃkhyā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:300.001c: mayā proktānupūrvyeṇa saṃhāram api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:300.002a: yathā saṃharate jantūn sasarja ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:300.002c: anādinidhano brahmā nityaś cākṣara eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:300.003a: ahaḥkṣayam atho buddhvā niśi svapnamanās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:300.008a: tataḥ kālāgnim āsādya tad ambho yāti saṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_12_u:300.010a: bhakṣayām āsa balavān vāyur aṣṭātmako balī
GE07mbh_12_u:300.010c: vicarann amitaprāṇas tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:300.013a: tam apy anupamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ śaṃbhuḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:300.013c: aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:300.015c: anugrasaty anantaṃ hi mahātmā viśvam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:300.017c: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:301.001a: pādāv adhyātmam ity āhur brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:301.013d-0767_01: cittam adhyātmam ity āhur yoginaḥ sūkṣmadṛṣṭayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:301.014a: eṣā te vyaktato rājan vibhūtir anuvarṇitā

GE07mbh_12_u:301.016c: prakṛtis tathā vikurute puruṣasya guṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_12_u:301.017a: sattvam ānanda udrekaḥ prītiḥ prākāśyam eva ca

GE07mbh_12_u:301.023c: bhedaḥ paruṣatā caiva kāmakrodhau madas tathā

GE07mbh_12_u:301.027f-0768_04: etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktāḥ pumān ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:302.001c: kṛtsnasya caiva jagatas tiṣṭhanty anapagāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:302.002c: koṭiśaś ca karoty eṣa pratyagātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:302.005a: dvaṃdvam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu saṃnipātaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:302.005c: sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:302.006a: sattvasya tu rajo dṛṣṭaṃ rajasaś ca tamas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:302.006c: tamasaś ca tathā sattvaṃ sattvasyāvyaktam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:302.006d-0770_01: sattvaṃ prapadyate sattvād avyaktād vyaktam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:302.009c: śāsvataṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva akṣaraṃ cābhayaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:302.010a: jñānināṃ saṃbhavaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam avraṇam acyutam
GE07mbh_12_u:302.011a: avyaktasthaṃ paraṃ yat tat pṛṣṭas te 'haṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:302.011c: sa eṣa prakṛtiṣṭho hi tasthur ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:302.012a: acetanaś caiṣa mataḥ prakṛtisthaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:302.014a: agrāhyāv ṛṣiśārdūla katham eko hy acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:302.014c: cetanāvāṃs tathā caikaḥ kṣetrajña iti bhāṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:302.015a: tvaṃ hi viprendra kārtsnyena mokṣadharmam upāsase
GE07mbh_12_u:302.016a: astitvaṃ kevalatvaṃ ca vinābhāvaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:302.016b-0771_01: daivatāni ca me brūhi dehaṃ yāny āśritāni vai
GE07mbh_12_u:302.017a: kālena yad dhi prāpnoti sthānaṃ tad brūhi me dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:302.017c: sāṃkhyajñānaṃ ca tattvena pṛthag yogaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:302.018a: ariṣṭāni ca tattvena vaktum arhasi sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:302.018c: viditaṃ sarvam etat te pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:303.001a: na śakyo nirguṇas tāta guṇīkartuṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:303.001c: guṇavāṃś cāpy aguṇavān yathātattvaṃ nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:303.002a: guṇair hi guṇavān eva nirguṇaś cāguṇas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:303.003c: upayuṅkte ca tān eva sa caivājñaḥ svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.004a: avyaktas tu na jānīte puruṣo jñaḥ svabhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.004c: na mattaḥ param astīti nityam evābhimanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:303.010a: bījatvāt prakṛtitvāc ca pralayatvāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:303.011c: anityaṃ nityam avyaktam evam etad dhi śuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:303.012a: avyaktaikatvam ity āhur nānātvaṃ puruṣas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:303.013a: anyaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyaktas tv adhruvo dhruvasaṃjñakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.013c: yathā muñja iṣīkāyās tathaivaitad dhi jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:303.013d-0773_01: na caiva muñjasaṃyogād iṣīkā kartṛ budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:303.014a: anyaṃ ca maśakaṃ vidyād anyac codumbaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:303.015a: anya eva tathā matsyas tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:303.015c: na codakasya sparśena matsyo lipyati sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.016a: anyo hy agnir ukhāpy anyā nityam evam avaihi bhoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.017a: puṣkaraṃ tv anyad evātra tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:303.017c: na codakasya sparśena lipyate tatra puṣkaram
GE07mbh_12_u:303.018a: eteṣāṃ saha saṃvāsaṃ vivāsaṃ caiva nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.018c: yathā tathainaṃ paśyanti na nityaṃ prākṛtā janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.019a: ye tv anyathaiva paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:303.019c: te vyaktaṃ nirayaṃ ghoraṃ praviśanti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.020c: evaṃ hi parisaṃkhyāya sāṃkhyāḥ kevalatāṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:303.021a: ye tv anye tattvakuśalās teṣām etan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:303.021c: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yogānām api darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.002a: nāsti sāṃkhyasamaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti yogasamaṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.002c: tāv ubhāv ekacaryau tu ubhāv anidhanau smṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:304.003a: pṛthak pṛthak tu paśyanti ye 'lpabuddhiratā narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.003c: vayaṃ tu rājan paśyāma ekam eva tu niścayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:304.004a: yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti tat sāṃkhyair api dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:304.004c: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:304.005c: tenaiva cātha dehena vicaranti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_12_u:304.006a: yāvad dhi pralayas tāta sūkṣmeṇāṣṭaguṇena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:304.006c: yogena lokān vicaran sukhaṃ saṃnyasya cānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:304.008a: dviguṇaṃ yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ prāhur uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.008d-0774_01: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāṇāyāmaṃ ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:304.009a: dhāraṇā caiva manasaḥ prāṇāyāmaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:304.009b-0775_01: ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:304.009c: prāṇāyāmo hi saguṇo nirguṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.010a: yatra dṛśyeta muñcan vai prāṇān maithilasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:304.010c: vātādhikyaṃ bhavaty eva tasmād dhi na samācaret
GE07mbh_12_u:304.011a: niśāyāḥ prathame yāme codanā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.011c: madhye suptvā pare yāme dvādaśaiva tu codanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.013a: pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ tu doṣān ākṣipya pañcadhā
GE07mbh_12_u:304.013c: śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:304.015c: ahaṃkāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:304.016a: evaṃ hi parisaṃkhyāya tato dhyāyeta kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.017c: śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva īśānaṃ brahma cāvyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.018c: lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
GE07mbh_12_u:304.019a: nivāte tu yathā dīpo jvalet snehasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.020a: pāṣāṇa iva meghotthair yathā bindubhir āhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.020c: nālaṃ cālayituṃ śakyas tathā yuktasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.022a: tailapātraṃ yathā pūrṇaṃ karābhyāṃ gṛhya pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:304.023a: saṃyatātmā bhayāt teṣāṃ na pātrād bindum utsṛjet
GE07mbh_12_u:304.024a: sthiratvād indriyāṇāṃ tu niścalatvāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:304.024c: evaṃ yuktasya tu muner lakṣaṇāny upadhārayet
GE07mbh_12_u:304.025a: sa yuktaḥ paśyati brahma yat tat paramam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.026a: etena kevalaṃ yāti tyaktvā deham asākṣikam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.026c: kālena mahatā rājañ śrutir eṣā sanātanī
GE07mbh_12_u:304.027a: etad dhi yogaṃ yogānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:304.027c: vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:305.002a: jaṅghābhyāṃ tu vasūn devān āpnuyād iti naḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:305.002c: jānubhyāṃ ca mahābhāgān devān sādhyān avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:305.004a: pārśvābhyāṃ maruto devān nāsābhyām indum eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:305.004c: bāhubhyām indram ity āhur urasā rudram eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:305.005a: grīvāyās tam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ naram āpnoty anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:305.006a: ghrāṇena gandhavahanaṃ netrābhyāṃ sūryam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:305.006c: bhrūbhyāṃ caivāśvinau devau lalāṭena pitṝn atha
GE07mbh_12_u:305.007a: brahmāṇam āpnoti vibhuṃ mūrdhnā devāgrajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:305.009a: yo 'rundhatīṃ na paśyeta dṛṣṭapūrvāṃ kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:305.009c: tathaiva dhruvam ity āhuḥ pūrṇenduṃ dīpam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:305.010a: paracakṣuṣi cātmānaṃ ye na paśyanti pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:305.013a: śīrṇanābhi yathā cakraṃ chidraṃ somaṃ prapaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:305.014a: śavagandham upāghrāti surabhiṃ prāpya yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:305.016a: akasmāc ca sravedyasya vāmam akṣi narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:305.018a: pratīkṣamāṇas tat kālaṃ yat kālaṃ prati tad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:305.018c: athāsya neṣṭaṃ maraṇaṃ sthātum icched imāṃ kriyām
GE07mbh_12_u:305.021a: gacchet prāpyākṣayaṃ kṛtsnam ajanma śivam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.001a: avyaktasthaṃ paraṃ yat tat pṛṣṭas te 'haṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.001c: paraṃ guhyam imaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.003a: mahatā tapasā devas tapiṣṭhaḥ sevito mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.004a: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva viprarṣe yad iṣṭaṃ te sudurlabham
GE07mbh_12_u:306.004c: tat te dāsyāmi prītātmā matprasādo hi durlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.005a: tataḥ praṇamya śirasā mayoktas tapatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.006a: tato māṃ bhagavān āha vitariṣyāmi te dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:306.007a: tato mām āha bhagavān āsyaṃ svaṃ vivṛtaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:306.007c: vivṛtaṃ ca tato me ''syaṃ praviṣṭā ca sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:306.008d-0776_02: mucyatāṃ yad adhītaṃ te matta ity eva so 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:306.009a: tato vidahyamānaṃ mām uvāca bhagavān raviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.010a: śītībhūtaṃ ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān āha bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.010c: pratiṣṭhāsyati te vedaḥ sottaraḥ sakhilo dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:306.012a: prāpsyase ca yad iṣṭaṃ tat sāṃkhyayogepsitaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.014c: oṃkāram āditaḥ kṛtvā mama devī sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:306.016c: cakre sapariśeṣaṃ ca harṣeṇa parameṇa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.017a: kṛtvā cādhyayanaṃ teṣāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ śatam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.018c: vyāpto yajño mahārāja pitus tava mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.020a: sumantunātha pailena tathā jaimininā ca vai
GE07mbh_12_u:306.020c: pitrā te munibhiś caiva tato 'ham anumānitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.021a: daśa pañca ca prāptāni yajūṃṣy arkān mayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.022a: bījam etat puraskṛtya devīṃ caiva sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_12_u:306.023a: kartuṃ śatapathaṃ vedam apūrvaṃ kāritaṃ ca me
GE07mbh_12_u:306.024c: sarve ca śiṣyāḥ śucayo gatāḥ paramaharṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.026a: kim atra brahmaṇyam ṛtaṃ kiṃ ca vedyam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.026c: cintaye tatra cāgatya gandharvo mām apṛcchata
GE07mbh_12_u:306.028a: viśvāviśvaṃ tathāśvāśvaṃ mitraṃ varuṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.028c: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathājño jñaḥ kas tapā atapās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.028e: sūryādaḥ sūrya iti ca vidyāvidye tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.029a: vedyāvedyaṃ tathā rājann acalaṃ calam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.029c: apūrvam akṣayaṃ kṣayyam etat praśnam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.030a: athoktaś ca mayā rājan rājā gandharvasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.031a: muhūrtaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ tāvad yāvad enaṃ vicintaye
GE07mbh_12_u:306.031c: bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa tūṣṇīṃ gandharva āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.032c: manasā sa ca me praśno dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.033c: mathnāmi manasā tāta dṛṣṭvā cānvīkṣikīṃ parām
GE07mbh_12_u:306.035a: athoktas tu mayā rājan rājā viśvāvasus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.035c: śrūyatāṃ yad bhavān asmān praśnaṃ saṃpṛṣṭavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.038a: avyaktaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhuḥ puruṣeti ca nirguṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.038c: tathaiva mitraṃ puruṣaṃ varuṇaṃ prakṛtiṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.039a: jñānaṃ tu prakṛtiṃ prāhur jñeyaṃ niṣkalam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.039c: ajñaś ca jñaś ca puruṣas tasmān niṣkala ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040a: kas tapā atapāḥ proktaḥ ko 'sau puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040c: tapāḥ prakṛtir ity āhur atapā niṣkalaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040d-0779_01: sūryam avyaktam ity uktam atisūryas tu niṣkalam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040d-0779_02: avidyā prakṛtir jñeyā vidyā puruṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040d-0780_01: sūryāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ vidyād asūryā niṣphalaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.040d-0780_02: vidyeti puruṣaṃ vidyād avidyā prakṛtiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.041c: calācalam iti proktaṃ tvayā tad api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:306.042a: calāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ prāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ kṣepasargayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.043a: ajāv ubhāv aprajau ca akṣayau cāpy ubhāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:306.044c: akṣayaṃ puruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kṣayo hy asya na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.047a: jāyante ca mriyante ca yasminn ete yataś cyutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.047c: vedārthaṃ ye na jānanti vedyaṃ gandharvasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:306.048a: sāṅgopāṅgān api yadi pañca vedān adhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.048c: vedavedyaṃ na jānīte vedabhāravaho hi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.049c: viṣṭhāṃ tatrānupaśyeta na maṇḍaṃ nāpi vā ghṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.050a: tathā vedyam avedyaṃ ca vedavidyo na vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:306.051c: yathāsya janmanidhane na bhavetāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.052c: parityajya kṣayam iha akṣayaṃ dharmam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.053a: yadā tu paśyate 'tyantam ahany ahani kāśyapa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.054a: anyaś ca śaśvad avyaktas tathānyaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.054c: tasya dvāv anupaśyeta tam ekam iti sādhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.056a: pañcaviṃśaṃ yad etat te proktaṃ brāhmaṇasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:306.056c: tathā tan na tathā veti tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:306.060a: kaśyapasya pituś caiva pūrvam eva mayā śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.061a: daivatebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca daityebhyaś ca tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.061c: prāptam etan mayā kṛtsnaṃ vedyaṃ nityaṃ vadanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:306.062a: tasmāt tad vai bhavadbuddhyā śrotum icchāmi brāhmaṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.063a: na tavāviditaṃ kiṃ cid bhavāñ śrutinidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.063c: kathyate devaloke ca pitṛloke ca brāhmaṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.064c: patiś ca tapatāṃ śaśvad ādityas tava bhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.065a: sāṃkhyajñānaṃ tvayā brahmann avāptaṃ kṛtsnam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.066c: śrotum icchāmi taj jñānaṃ ghṛtaṃ maṇḍamayaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.067c: jijñāsasi ca māṃ rājaṃs tan nibodha yathāśrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.068c: na tu budhyati gandharva prakṛtiḥ pañcaviṃśakam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.070a: paśyaṃs tathaivāpaśyaṃś ca paśyaty anyas tathānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.070c: ṣaḍviṃśaḥ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:306.070e: na tu paśyati paśyaṃs tu yaś cainam anupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:306.072e: sasnehaḥ sahavāsāc ca sābhimānaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.073a: sa nimajjati kālasya yadaikatvaṃ na budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.074a: yadā tu manyate 'nyo 'ham anya eṣa iti dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.075a: anyaś ca rājann avaras tathānyaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.076c: janmamṛtyubhayād bhītā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca kāśyapa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.077c: tadā sa sarvavid vidvān na punarjanma vindati
GE07mbh_12_u:306.078a: evam apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.079a: paśyāpaśyaṃ yo 'nupaśyet kṣemaṃ tattvaṃ ca kāśyapa
GE07mbh_12_u:306.079c: kevalākevalaṃ cādyaṃ pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:306.080a: tathyaṃ śubhaṃ caitad uktaṃ tvayā bhoḥ; samyak kṣemyaṃ devatādyaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_12_u:306.080c: svasty akṣayaṃ bhavataś cāstu nityaṃ; buddhyā sadā buddhiyuktaṃ namas te
GE07mbh_12_u:306.081a: evam uktvā saṃprayāto divaṃ sa; vibhrājan vai darśanena
GE07mbh_12_u:306.081c: tuṣṭaś ca tuṣṭyā parayābhinandya; pradakṣiṇaṃ mama kṛtvā mahātmā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.082a: brahmādīnāṃ khecarāṇāṃ kṣitau ca; ye cādhastāt saṃvasante narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:306.082c: tatraiva tad darśanaṃ darśayan vai; samyak kṣemyaṃ ye pathaṃ saṃśritā vai
GE07mbh_12_u:306.083a: sāṃkhyāḥ sarve sāṃkhyadharme ratāś ca; tadvad yogā yogadharme ratāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.083c: ye cāpy anye mokṣakāmā manuṣyās; teṣām etad darśanaṃ jñānadṛṣṭam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.084a: jñānān mokṣo jāyate pūruṣāṇāṃ; nāsty ajñānād evam āhur narendra
GE07mbh_12_u:306.084c: tasmāj jñānaṃ tattvato 'nveṣitavyaṃ; yenātmānaṃ mokṣayej janmamṛtyoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.085a: prāpya jñānaṃ brāhmaṇāt kṣatriyād vā; vaiśyāc chūdrād api nīcād abhīkṣṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.085c: śraddhātavyaṃ śraddadhānena nityaṃ; na śraddhinaṃ janmamṛtyū viśetām
GE07mbh_12_u:306.086a: sarve varṇā brāhmaṇā brahmajāś ca; sarve nityaṃ vyāharante ca brahma
GE07mbh_12_u:306.086c: tattvaṃ śāstraṃ brahmabuddhyā bravīmi; sarvaṃ viśvaṃ brahma caitat samastam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.087a: brahmāsyato brāhmaṇāḥ saṃprasūtā; bāhubhyāṃ vai kṣatriyāḥ saṃprasūtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.087c: nābhyāṃ vaiśyāḥ pādataś cāpi śūdrāḥ; sarve varṇā nānyathā veditavyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.088a: ajñānataḥ karmayoniṃ bhajante; tāṃ tāṃ rājaṃs te yathā yānty abhāvam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.088c: tathā varṇā jñānahīnāḥ patante; ghorād ajñānāt prākṛtaṃ yonijālam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.089a: tasmāj jñānaṃ sarvato mārgitavyaṃ; sarvatrasthaṃ caitad uktaṃ mayā te
GE07mbh_12_u:306.089c: tasthau brahmā tasthivāṃś cāparo yas; tasmai nityaṃ mokṣam āhur dvijendrāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.090a: yat te pṛṣṭaṃ tan mayā copadiṣṭaṃ; yāthātathyaṃ tad viśoko bhavasva
GE07mbh_12_u:306.090c: rājan gacchasvaitadarthasya pāraṃ; samyak proktaṃ svasti te 'stv atra nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:306.092a: gate munivare tasmin kṛte cāpi pradakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_12_u:306.093a: gokoṭiṃ sparśayām āsa hiraṇyasya tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.093c: ratnāñjalim athaikaṃ ca brāhmaṇebhyo dadau tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:306.094a: videharājyaṃ ca tathā pratiṣṭhāpya sutasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:306.096a: anantam iti kṛtvā sa nityaṃ kevalam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.097a: janmamṛtyū ca rājendra prākṛtaṃ tad acintayat
GE07mbh_12_u:306.098e: nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃsaḥ śucis tasmāc chucir bhava
GE07mbh_12_u:306.099a: dīyate yac ca labhate dattaṃ yac cānumanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:306.099b-0781_01: avyakteneti tac cintyam anyathā mā vicintaya
GE07mbh_12_u:306.099c: dadāti ca naraśreṣṭha pratigṛhṇāti yac ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:306.099e: dadāty avyaktam evaitat pratigṛhṇāti tac ca vai
GE07mbh_12_u:306.100a: ātmā hy evātmano hy ekaḥ ko 'nyas tvatto 'dhiko bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:306.100c: evaṃ manyasva satatam anyathā mā vicintaya
GE07mbh_12_u:306.101a: yasyāvyaktaṃ na viditaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.102a: na svādhyāyais tapobhir vā yajñair vā kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:306.103a: tathaiva mahataḥ sthānam āhaṃkārikam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:306.104a: ye tv avyaktāt paraṃ nityaṃ jānate śāstratatparāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.104c: janmamṛtyuviyuktaṃ ca viyuktaṃ sad asac ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:306.105a: etan mayāptaṃ janakāt purastāt; tenāpi cāptaṃ nṛpa yājñavalkyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:306.105c: jñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ na tathā hi yajñā; jñānena durgaṃ tarate na yajñaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.106a: durgaṃ janma nidhanaṃ cāpi rājan; na bhūtikaṃ jñānavido vadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:306.106c: yajñais tapobhir niyamair vrataiś ca; divaṃ samāsādya patanti bhūmau
GE07mbh_12_u:306.107a: tasmād upāsasva paraṃ mahac chuci; śivaṃ vimokṣaṃ vimalaṃ pavitram
GE07mbh_12_u:306.107c: kṣetrajñavit pārthiva jñānayajñam; upāsya vai tattvam ṛṣir bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:306.108a: upaniṣadam upākarot tadā vai; janakanṛpasya purā hi yājñavalkyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:306.108c: yad upagaṇitaśāśvatāvyayaṃ tac; chubham amṛtatvam aśokam ṛcchatīti
GE07mbh_12_u:307.001a: aiśvaryaṃ vā mahat prāpya dhanaṃ vā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:307.001c: dīrgham āyur avāpyātha kathaṃ mṛtyum atikramet
GE07mbh_12_u:307.002a: tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:307.005c: tapasā vātha buddhyā vā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:307.006a: evam uktaḥ sa vaidehaṃ pratyuvāca parokṣavit
GE07mbh_12_u:307.006c: nivṛttir naitayor asti nānivṛttiḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:307.007a: na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:307.009a: naivāsya bhavitā kaś cin nāsau bhavati kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:307.009c: pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārair anyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:307.009e: nāyam atyantasaṃvāso labdhapūrvo hi kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:307.010a: kṣipyante tena tenaiva niṣṭanantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:307.011a: jarāmṛtyū hi bhūtānāṃ khāditārau vṛkāv iva
GE07mbh_12_u:307.011c: balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca hrasvānāṃ mahatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:307.012c: kathaṃ hṛṣyeta jāteṣu mṛteṣu ca kathaṃ jvaret
GE07mbh_12_u:307.013a: kuto 'ham āgataḥ ko 'smi kva gamiṣyāmi kasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:307.013c: kasmin sthitaḥ kva bhavitā kasmāt kim anuśocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:307.013d-0782_01: satyaś ca te yathātmā ca tyaktaḥ syāt kim anena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:307.014a: draṣṭā svargasya na hy asti tathaiva narakasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:307.014c: āgamāṃs tv anatikramya dadyāc caiva yajeta ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.001c: kaḥ prāpto vinayaṃ buddhyā mokṣatattvaṃ vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.002a: saṃnyasyate yathātmāyaṃ saṃnyastātmā yathā ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.002c: paraṃ mokṣasya yac cāpi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.003c: janakasya ca saṃvādaṃ sulabhāyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.004a: saṃnyāsaphalikaḥ kaś cid babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.004c: maithilo janako nāma dharmadhvaja iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.005a: sa vede mokṣaśāstre ca sve ca śāstre kṛtāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.006a: tasya vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ śrutvā tāṃ sādhuvṛttatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.008a: tayā jagad idaṃ sarvam aṭantyā mithileśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.008c: tatra tatra śruto mokṣe kathyamānas tridaṇḍibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.009a: sā susūkṣmāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā tathyaṃ neti sasaṃśayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.010a: tataḥ sā viprahāyātha pūrvarūpaṃ hi yogataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.013a: rājā tasyāḥ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā saukumāryaṃ vapus tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.014a: tato 'syāḥ svāgataṃ kṛtvā vyādiśya ca varāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.015a: atha bhuktavatī prītā rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.016a: sulabhā tv asya dharmeṣu mukto neti sasaṃśayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.017a: netrābhyāṃ netrayor asya raśmīn saṃyojya raśmibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.017c: sā sma saṃcodayiṣyantaṃ yogabandhair babandha ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.018a: janako 'py utsmayan rājā bhāvam asyā viśeṣayan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.019a: tad ekasminn adhiṣṭhāne saṃvādaḥ śrūyatām ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.020a: bhagavatyāḥ kva caryeyaṃ kṛtā kva ca gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.020c: kasya ca tvaṃ kuto veti papracchaināṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.021a: śrute vayasi jātau ca sadbhāvo nādhigamyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.022a: chatrādiṣu viśeṣeṣu muktaṃ māṃ viddhi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.022c: sa tvāṃ saṃmantum icchāmi mānārhāsi matā hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.023a: yasmāc caitan mayā prāptaṃ jñānaṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.023c: yasya nānyaḥ pravaktāsti mokṣe tam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.026c: vārṣikāṃś caturo māsān purā mayi sukhoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.027c: śrāvitas trividhaṃ mokṣaṃ na ca rājyād vicālitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.028a: so 'haṃ tām akhilāṃ vṛttiṃ trividhāṃ mokṣasaṃhitām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.028c: muktarāgaś carāmy ekaḥ pade paramake sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.029a: vairāgyaṃ punar etasya mokṣasya paramo vidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.029c: jñānād eva ca vairāgyaṃ jāyate yena mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.030a: jñānena kurute yatnaṃ yatnena prāpyate mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.030c: mahad dvaṃdvapramokṣāya sā siddhir yā vayotigā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.031a: seyaṃ paramikā buddhiḥ prāptā nirdvaṃdvatā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.032a: yathā kṣetraṃ mṛdūbhūtam adbhir āplāvitaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.032c: janayaty aṅkuraṃ karma nṛṇāṃ tadvat punarbhavam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.033a: yathā cottāpitaṃ bījaṃ kapāle yatra tatra vā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.034c: jñānaṃ kṛtam abījaṃ me viṣayeṣu na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.035a: nābhiṣajjati kasmiṃś cin nānarthe na parigrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.036a: yaś ca me dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ candanena samukṣayet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.036c: savyaṃ vāsyā ca yas takṣet samāv etāv ubhau mama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.038a: mokṣe hi trividhā niṣṭhā dṛṣṭā pūrvair maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.038c: jñānaṃ lokottaraṃ yac ca sarvatyāgaś ca karmaṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.040a: prahāyobhayam apy etaj jñānaṃ karma ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.041a: yame ca niyame caiva dveṣe kāme parigrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.041c: māne dambhe tathā snehe sadṛśās te kuṭumbibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.042a: tridaṇḍādiṣu yady asti mokṣo jñānena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.042c: chatrādiṣu kathaṃ na syāt tulyahetau parigrahe
