GE07mbh_12_u:308.043a: yena yena hi yasyārthaḥ kāraṇeneha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.043c: tat tad ālambate dravyaṃ sarvaḥ sve sve parigrahe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.044a: doṣadarśī tu gārhasthye yo vrajaty āśramāntaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.044c: utsṛjan parigṛhṇaṃś ca so 'pi saṅgān na mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.046c: mucyante kiṃ na mucyante pade paramake sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.047c: liṅgāny atyartham etāni na mokṣāyeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.048a: yadi saty api liṅge 'smiñ jñānam evātra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.049a: atha vā duḥkhaśaithilyaṃ vīkṣya liṅge kṛtā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.049c: kiṃ tad evārthasāmānyaṃ chatrādiṣu na lakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.050a: ākiṃcanye na mokṣo 'sti kaiṃcanye nāsti bandhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.050c: kaiṃcanye cetare caiva jantur jñānena mucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.051c: bandhanāyataneṣv eṣu viddhy abandhe pade sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.053a: so 'ham evaṃgato mukto jātāsthas tvayi bhikṣuki
GE07mbh_12_u:308.053c: ayathārtho hi te varṇo vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tan mama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.054a: saukumāryaṃ tathā rūpaṃ vapur agryaṃ tathā vayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.055a: yac cāpy ananurūpaṃ te liṅgasyāsya viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.055c: mukto 'yaṃ syān na vety asmād dharṣito matparigrahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.056a: na ca kāmasamāyukte mukte 'py asti tridaṇḍakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.056c: na rakṣyate tvayā cedaṃ na muktasyāsti gopanā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.057a: matpakṣasaṃśrayāc cāyaṃ śṛṇu yas te vyatikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.058a: praveśas te kṛtaḥ kena mama rāṣṭre pure tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.058c: kasya vā saṃnisargāt tvaṃ praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.060a: vartase mokṣadharmeṣu gārhasthye tv aham āśrame
GE07mbh_12_u:308.061a: sagotrāṃ vāsagotrāṃ vā na veda tvāṃ na vettha mām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.062a: atha jīvati te bhartā proṣito 'py atha vā kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.063a: sā tvam etāny akāryāṇi kāryāpekṣā vyavasyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.063c: avijñānena vā yuktā mithyājñānena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.064a: atha vāpi svatantrāsi svadoṣeṇeha kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.064c: yadi kiṃ cic chrutaṃ te 'sti sarvaṃ kṛtam anarthakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.066a: na mayy evābhisaṃdhis te jayaiṣiṇyā jaye kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.066c: yeyaṃ matpariṣat kṛtsnā jetum icchasi tām api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.067a: tathā hy evaṃ punaś ca tvaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ svāṃ pratimuñcasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.069a: icchator hi dvayor lābhaḥ strīpuṃsor amṛtopamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.069c: alābhaś cāpy araktasya so 'tra doṣo viṣopamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.070a: mā sprākṣīḥ sadhu jānīṣva svaśāstram anupālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.070c: kṛteyaṃ hi vijijñāsā mukto neti tvayā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.070e: etat sarvaṃ praticchannaṃ mayi nārhasi gūhitum
GE07mbh_12_u:308.071a: sā yadi tvaṃ svakāryeṇa yady anyasya mahīpateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.072a: na rājānaṃ mṛṣā gacchen na dvijātiṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:308.072c: na striyaṃ strīguṇopetāṃ hanyur hy ete mṛṣāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.073a: rājñāṃ hi balam aiśvaryaṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.074a: ata etair balair ete balinaḥ svārtham icchatā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.075a: sā tvaṃ jātiṃ śrutaṃ vṛttaṃ bhāvaṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.075c: kṛtyam āgamane caiva vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.076a: ity etair asukhair vākyair ayuktair asamañjasaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.079c: pañcaitāny arthajātāni vākyam ity ucyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.081c: tatrātiśayinī buddhis tat saukṣmyam iti vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.082a: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pravibhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.082c: kaṃ cid artham abhipretya sā saṃkhyety upadhāryatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.083a: idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścād vaktavyaṃ yad vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.083c: kramayogaṃ tam apy āhur vākyaṃ vākyavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.084c: idaṃ tad iti vākyānte procyate sa vinirṇayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.085c: tatra yā nṛpate vṛttis tat prayojanam iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.087c: nāślakṣṇaṃ na ca saṃdigdhaṃ vakṣyāmi paramaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:308.088c: nānṛtaṃ na trivargeṇa viruddhaṃ nāpy asaṃskṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.089a: na nyūnaṃ kaṣṭaśabdaṃ vā vyutkramābhihitaṃ na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.090a: kāmāt krodhād bhayāl lobhād dainyād ānāryakāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.090c: hrīto 'nukrośato mānān na vakṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:308.091a: vaktā śrotā ca vākyaṃ ca yadā tv avikalaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.091c: samam eti vivakṣāyāṃ tadā so 'rthaḥ prakāśate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.092a: vaktavye tu yadā vaktā śrotāram avamanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.092c: svārtham āha parārthaṃ vā tadā vākyaṃ na rohati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.093a: atha yaḥ svārtham utsṛjya parārthaṃ prāha mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.093c: viśaṅkā jāyate tasmin vākyaṃ tad api doṣavat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.094a: yas tu vaktā dvayor artham aviruddhaṃ prabhāṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.094c: śrotuś caivātmanaś caiva sa vaktā netaro nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.095a: tad arthavad idaṃ vākyam upetaṃ vākyasaṃpadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.096a: kāsi kasya kuto veti tvayāham abhicoditā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.096c: tatrottaram idaṃ vākyaṃ rājann ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.097a: yathā jatu ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca pāṃsavaś codabindubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.097c: suśliṣṭāni tathā rājan prāṇinām iha saṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.098a: śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaḥ pañcendriyāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.099a: na caiṣāṃ codanā kā cid astīty eṣa viniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.099c: ekaikasyeha vijñānaṃ nāsty ātmani tathā pare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.100a: na veda cakṣuś cakṣuṣṭvaṃ śrotraṃ nātmani vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.101a: bāhyān anyān apekṣante guṇāṃs tān api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.101c: rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ prakāśaś ca darśane hetavas trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.103a: dvādaśas tv aparas tatra buddhir nāma guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.104a: atha dvādaśake tasmin sattvaṃ nāmāparo guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.105a: kṣetrajña iti cāpy anyo guṇas tatra caturdaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.105c: mamāyam iti yenāyaṃ manyate na ca manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.106a: atha pañcadaśo rājan guṇas tatrāparaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.107a: guṇas tv evāparas tatra saṃghāta iti ṣoḍaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.107c: ākṛtir vyaktir ity etau guṇau yasmin samāśritau
GE07mbh_12_u:308.110a: viṃśakaś caiṣa saṃghāto mahābhūtāni pañca ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.111a: ity evaṃ viṃśatiś caiva guṇāḥ sapta ca ye smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.111c: vidhiḥ śukraṃ balaṃ ceti traya ete guṇāḥ pare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.112a: ekaviṃśaś ca daśa ca kalāḥ saṃkhyānataḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.112c: samagrā yatra vartante tac charīram iti smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.113a: avyaktaṃ prakṛtiṃ tv āsāṃ kalānāṃ kaś cid icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.114a: avyaktaṃ yadi vā vyaktaṃ dvayīm atha catuṣṭayīm
GE07mbh_12_u:308.115a: seyaṃ prakṛtir avyaktā kalābhir vyaktatāṃ gatā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.115c: ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca rājendra ye cāpy anye śarīriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.116c: yāsām eva nipātena kalalaṃ nāma jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.118a: saṃpūrṇe navame māse jantor jātasya maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:308.118b-0784_01: evaṃ hi jantuḥ saṃpūrṇo navame māsi maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:308.118c: jāyate nāmarūpatvaṃ strī pumān veti liṅgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.119a: jātamātraṃ tu tad rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāmranakhāṅguli
GE07mbh_12_u:308.120a: kaumārād yauvanaṃ cāpi sthāviryaṃ cāpi yauvanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.120c: anena kramayogena pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ na labhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.121c: vartate sarvabhūteṣu saukṣmyāt tu na vibhāvyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.122a: na caiṣām apyayo rājaṃl lakṣyate prabhavo na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.123c: ajasraṃ sarvalokasya kaḥ kuto vā na vā kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.124a: kasyedaṃ kasya vā nedaṃ kuto vedaṃ na vā kutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.124c: saṃbandhaḥ ko 'sti bhūtānāṃ svair apy avayavair iha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.125a: yathādityān maṇeś caiva vīrudbhyaś caiva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.125c: bhavaty evaṃ samudayāt kalānām api jantavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.126c: evam evātmanātmānam anyasmin kiṃ na paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.126e: yady ātmani parasmiṃś ca samatām adhyavasyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.127a: atha māṃ kāsi kasyeti kimartham anupṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.127c: idaṃ me syād idaṃ neti dvaṃdvair muktasya maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:308.127e: kāsi kasya kuto veti vacane kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.128c: kṛtavān yo mahīpāla kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.129a: trivarge saptadhā vyaktaṃ yo na vedeha karmasu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.129c: saṅgavān yas trivarge ca kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.130a: priye caivāpriye caiva durbale balavaty api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.130c: yasya nāsti samaṃ cakṣuḥ kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.131a: tad amuktasya te mokṣe yo 'bhimāno bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.131c: suhṛdbhiḥ sa nivāryas te vicittasyeva bheṣajaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.133a: imāny anyāni sūkṣmāṇi mokṣam āśritya kāni cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.134a: ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekacchatrāṃ praśāsti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.134c: ekam eva sa vai rājā puram adhyāvasaty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:308.135a: tatpure caikam evāsya gṛhaṃ yad adhitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.135c: gṛhe śayanam apy ekaṃ niśāyāṃ yatra līyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.136a: śayyārdhaṃ tasya cāpy atra strīpūrvam adhitiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.138a: paratantraḥ sadā rājā svalpe so 'pi prasajjate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.140a: yadā tv ājñāpayaty anyāṃs tadāsyoktā svatantratā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.140c: avaśaḥ kāryate tatra tasmiṃs tasmin guṇe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.141a: svaptukāmo na labhate svaptuṃ kāryārthibhir janaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.142a: snāhy ālabha piba prāśa juhudhy agnīn yajeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.142c: vadasva śṛṇu cāpīti vivaśaḥ kāryate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.143c: na cāpy utsahate dātuṃ vittarakṣī mahājanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.144a: dāne kośakṣayo hy asya vairaṃ cāpy aprayacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.145c: bhayam apy abhaye rājño yaiś ca nityam upāsyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.146a: yadā caite praduṣyanti rājan ye kīrtitā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.146c: tadaivāsya bhayaṃ tebhyo jāyate paśya yādṛśam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.147a: sarvaḥ sve sve gṛhe rājā sarvaḥ sve sve gṛhe gṛhī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.148a: putrā dārās tathaivātmā kośo mitrāṇi saṃcayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.148c: paraiḥ sādhāraṇā hy ete tais tair evāsya hetubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.149a: hato deśaḥ puraṃ dagdhaṃ pradhānaḥ kuñjaro mṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.151a: dvaṃdvais tais tair upahataḥ sarvataḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.152c: ko rājyam abhipadyeta prāpya copaśamaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.153a: mamedam iti yac cedaṃ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ca manyase
GE07mbh_12_u:308.153c: balaṃ kośam amātyāṃś ca kasyaitāni na vā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.154a: mitrāmātyaṃ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ daṇḍaḥ kośo mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.154c: saptāṅgaś cakrasaṃghāto rājyam ity ucyate nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.156a: teṣu teṣu hi kāleṣu tat tad aṅgaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.156c: yena yat sidhyate kāryaṃ tat prādhānyāya kalpate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.157a: saptāṅgaś cāpi saṃghātas trayaś cānye nṛpottama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.157c: saṃbhūya daśavargo 'yaṃ bhuṅkte rājyaṃ hi rājavat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.158a: yaś ca rājā mahotsāhaḥ kṣatradharmarato bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.158c: sa tuṣyed daśabhāgena tatas tv anyo daśāvaraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.159a: nāsty asādhāraṇo rājā nāsti rājyam arājakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.159c: rājye 'sati kuto dharmo dharme 'sati kutaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:308.160a: yo 'py atra paramo dharmaḥ pavitraṃ rājarājyayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.160c: pṛthivī dakṣiṇā yasya so 'śvamedho na vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.161c: samarthā śataśo vaktum atha vāpi sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.162c: na mām evaṃvidhāṃ muktām īdṛśaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.163a: nanu nāma tvayā mokṣaḥ kṛtsnaḥ pañcaśikhāc chrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.164a: tasya te muktasaṅgasya pāśān ākramya tiṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.164c: chatrādiṣu viśeṣeṣu kathaṃ saṅgaḥ punar nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.165a: śrutaṃ te na śrutaṃ manye mithyā vāpi śrutaṃ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.165c: atha vā śrutasaṃkāśaṃ śrutam anyac chrutaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.167a: sattvenānupraveśo hi yo 'yaṃ tvayi kṛto mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.167c: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ tatra yadi mukto 'si sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.168a: niyamo hy eṣa dharmeṣu yatīnāṃ śūnyavāsitā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.168c: śūnyam āvāsayantyā ca mayā kiṃ kasya dūṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.169a: na pāṇibhyāṃ na bāhubhyāṃ pādorubhyāṃ na cānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.169c: na gātrāvayavair anyaiḥ spṛśāmi tvā narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.170c: naitat sadasi vaktavyaṃ sad vāsad vā mithaḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.171c: tvaṃ cātha gurur apy eṣām evam anyonyagauravam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.172c: strīpuṃsoḥ samavāyo 'yaṃ tvayā vācyo na saṃsadi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.173c: tiṣṭhaty aspṛśatī tadvat tvayi vatsyāmi maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:308.174a: yadi vāpy aspṛśantyā me sparśaṃ jānāsi kaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:308.174c: jñānaṃ kṛtam abījaṃ te kathaṃ teneha bhikṣuṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.175a: sa gārhasthyāc cyutaś ca tvaṃ mokṣaṃ nāvāpya durvidam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.177c: nānyad anyad iti jñātvā nānyad anyat pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.178a: pāṇau kuṇḍaṃ tathā kuṇḍe payaḥ payasi makṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.179a: na tu kuṇḍe payobhāvaḥ payaś cāpi na makṣikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.179c: svayam evāśrayanty ete bhāvā na tu parāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.180a: pṛthaktvād āśramāṇāṃ ca varṇānyatve tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.181a: nāsmi varṇottamā jātyā na vaiśyā nāvarā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.182a: pradhāno nāma rājarṣir vyaktaṃ te śrotram āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.182c: kule tasya samutpannāṃ sulabhāṃ nāma viddhi mām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.183a: droṇaś ca śataśṛṅgaś ca vakradvāraś ca parvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.183c: mama satreṣu pūrveṣāṃ citā maghavatā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.184a: sāhaṃ tasmin kule jātā bhartary asati madvidhe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.187a: mokṣe te bhāvitāṃ buddhiṃ śrutvāhaṃ kuśalaiṣiṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.187c: tava mokṣasya cāpy asya jijñāsārtham ihāgatā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.188c: mukto na mucyate yaś ca śānto yaś ca na śāmyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.189a: yathā śūnye purāgāre bhikṣur ekāṃ niśāṃ vaset
GE07mbh_12_u:308.189c: tathā hi tvaccharīre 'sminn imāṃ vatsyāmi śarvarīm
GE07mbh_12_u:308.190c: suptā suśaraṇā prītā śvo gamiṣyāmi maithila
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191a: ity etāni sa vākyāni hetumanty arthavanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191c: śrutvā nādhijagau rājā kiṃ cid anyad ataḥ param yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0002: vaktum arhasi kauravya devasyājasya yā kṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0003: atrāpy udāharantīmaṃ saṃvādaṃ guruśiṣyayoḥ āsurir uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0007: kiṃ vyaktaṃ kim avyaktaṃ kiṃ vyaktāvyaktataram | kati tattvāni
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0008: kim ādyaṃ madhyamaṃ ca tattvānāṃ kim adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivataṃ ca |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0009: kiṃ nu svargāpyayaṃ kati sargāḥ kiṃ bhūtaṃ kiṃ bhaviṣyaṃ kiṃ bhavyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0010: kiṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ jñeyaṃ ko jñātā kiṃ buddhaṃ kim apratibuddhaṃ kiṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0012: kati parvāṇi kati srotāṃsi kati karmayonayaḥ | kim ekatvaṃ kiṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0013: nānātvam | kiṃ sahavāsavivāsaṃ kiṃ vidyāvidyam | iti kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0014: yad bhavān āha kiṃ vyaktaṃ kim avyaktam ity atra brūmaḥ | avyaktam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0015: agrāhyam atarkyam aparimeyam avyaktam | vyaktam upalakṣyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0016: yathartavo 'mūrtayas teṣu puṣpaphalair vyaktir upalakṣyate tadvad avyaktaṃ guṇair upalakṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0017: prāggataṃ pratyaggatam ūrdhvam adhas tiryak ca | sataś cānanugrāhyatvāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0019: avyaktasya tamo rajaḥ sattvaṃ tat pradhānaṃ tattvaṃ paraṃ kṣetram |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0020: salilam amṛtam abhayam avyaktam akṣaram ajaṃ jīvam ity evamādīny avyaktanāmāni evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0023: tasmād ekaguṇo jajñe tad vyaktaṃ tattvam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0024: tad etad avyaktam | prasavadhāraṇādānasvabhāvam āpo dhāraṇe prajanane
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0025: ādāne guṇānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā parāpramattaṃ tad ekasmin kāryakāraṇe |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0027: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ vyaktam ity atra brūmaḥ | vyaktaṃ nāmāsure yat pūrvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0028: avyaktād utpannam īśvaram apratibuddhaguṇastham etat puruṣasaṃjñakaṃ mahad ity uktaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0029: buddhir iti ca dhṛtir iti ca | sattā smṛtir matir medhā vyavasāyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0030: samādhiḥ prāptir ity evamādīni vyaktaparyāyanāmāni vadanti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0032: mahataḥ siddhir āyattā saṃśayaś ca mahān yataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0033: putrasargasya dīptyartham autsukyaṃ ca paraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0034: tad evordhvasrotobhimukhatvād apratibuddhatvāc cātmanaḥ prakaroty ahaṃkāram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0036: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ vyaktāvyaktataram ity atra brūmaḥ | vyaktāvyaktataraṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0038: tad etayor ubhayor viriñcivairiñcayor ekaikaśa utpattiḥ | viriñco 'bhimāniny
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0039: aviveka īrṣyā kāmaḥ krodho lobho darpo moho mamakāraś
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0040: cety etāny ahaṃkāraparyāyanāmāni bhavanti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0041: ahaṃ kartety ahaṃkartā sasṛje viśvam īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0043: ahaṃkārād yugapad utpādayām āsa pañca mahābhūtāni śabdasparśarūparasagandhalakṣaṇāni |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0044: tāny eva buddhyanta iti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0049: vikharād vaikharaṃ yugapad indriyaiḥ sahotpādayati | śrotraghrāṇacakṣurjihvātvag
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0051: iti pañca buddhīndriyāṇi vadanti | evam āhur ācāryāḥ | vāg ghastau
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0052: pādapāyur ānandaś ceti pañca karmendriyāṇi viśeṣāḥ ādityo 'śvinau
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0058: mahad aiśvaryam āpnoti yāvad ācandratārakam kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0059: yad apy uktaṃ kati tattvāni bhavantīti | tad etāni mayā pūrvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0062: na sa pāpena lipyeta nirmuktaḥ sarvasaṃkarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0063: yad apy uktaṃ kim ādyaṃ madhyamaṃ ca tattvānām ity atra brūmaḥ | etad ādyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0065: jñātavyāni bhavantīty evam āha | kenety atrocyate | devadattayajñadattabrāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyaśūdracaṇḍālapulkasādir etāni
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0068: uktāni | etad ādyaṃ madhyamaṃ ca | etasmāt tattvānām utpattir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0069: bhavati atra pralīyante | ke cid āhur ācāryāḥ | aham ity evam ātmakaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0070: śarīrasaṃghātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vyaktam | avyaktasūkṣmādhiṣṭhitam etad
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029A_0073: vyabhram ity āhur ācāryāḥ | evaṃ cāha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0001: yad apy uktaṃ kim adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivataṃ cet yatra brūmaḥ | adhyātmam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0002: adhibhūtam adhidaivataṃ cāsure vakṣyāmaḥ | pādāv adhyātmaṃ gantavyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0003: adhibhūtaṃ viṣṇur adhidaivatam | pāyur adhyātmaṃ visargo 'dhibhūtaṃ mitro 'dhidaivatam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0006: vāg adhyātmaṃ vaktavyam adhibhūtam agnir adhidaivatam | ghrāṇo 'dhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0007: ghreyam adhibhūtaṃ bhūmir adhidaivatam | śrotram adhyātmaṃ śrotavyam adhibhūtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0008: ākāśam adhidaivatam | cakṣur adhyātmaṃ draṣṭavyam adhibhūtaṃ sūryo 'dhidaivatam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0010: spraṣṭavyam adhibhūtaṃ vāyur adhidaivatam | mano 'dhyātmaṃ mantavyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0012: viriñco 'dhidaivatam | buddhir adhyātmaṃ boddhavyam adhibhūtaṃ puruṣo 'dhidaivatam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0013: etāvad adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivataṃ ca sarvatra pratyetavyānīty
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0015: brāhmaṇe nṛpatau kīṭe śvapāke śuni hastini
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0018: yayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0019: ya etat tritayaṃ vetti śuddhaṃ cānyad upekṣakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0020: virajo vitamaskaṃ ca nirmalaṃ śivam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0022: niraṅkuram abījaṃ ca śāśvataṃ tad avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0023: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ nu sargāpyayam iti atra brūmaḥ | tad yathā jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjāś
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0026: kūrmapṛṣṭhanibhā pṛthivī apsu pralīyate | tad udakaṃ sarvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0027: abhavat | agnir apy ādatte toyam | tadāgnibhūtam abhavat | agnim apy ādatte
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0028: vāyuḥ | sa vāyur ūrdhvam adhas tiryak ca dodhavīti | tad vāyur bhūtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0029: abhavat | vāyum apy ādatte vyoma | tad ākāśam eva ninādam abhavat |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0030: tad ākāśaṃ manasi pralīyate | mano 'haṃkāre 'haṃkāro mahati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0031: mahān avyakte tad etat pralayam īhate | pralayāntān mahāpralaya ity ucyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0032: praṇaṣṭasarvasvaṃ tama evāpratimaṃ bhavati | agrāhyam acchedyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0033: abhedyam apratarkyam anādy acintyam anālambam asthānam avyayam ajaṃ śāśvatam evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0036: uttīrya so 'śivād asmāc chivam ānantyam āpnuyāt kapila uvāca iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0038: yad apy uktam āsure kati sargāṇi prākṛtavaikṛtāni bhavantīti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0039: atra brūmaḥ | nava sargāṇi prākṛtavaikṛtāni bhavanti | avyaktān mahad
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0040: utpadyate | taṃ vidyāsargaṃ vadanti | mahataś cāhaṃkāra utpadyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0041: ahaṃkārāt pañcabhūtasargaḥ | bhūtebhyo vikāraḥ | yasmāt kṛtsnasya jagatas
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0042: tejas tad etat prabhavāpyayam | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0043: utpattiṃ nidhanaṃ madhyaṃ bhūtānām ātmanaś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0044: vetti vidyām avidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0045: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ bhūtaṃ kiṃ bhavyaṃ kiṃ bhaviṣyac cety atra brūmaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0046: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ cāsure trailokyaṃ kālaḥ | sa mahātmā saṃpraty atītānāgatānām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0047: utpādakānām utpādakaś cānugrāhakaś ca tirobhāvakaś cety
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0053: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ jñānam iti atra brūmaḥ | jñānaṃ nāmāsure prajñā |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0054: sā buddhir yayā boddhavyam anubudhyate | kiṃ punas tad boddhavyam ity atrocyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0056: dharmyam idam adharmyam | idaṃ vācyam idam avācyam | idaṃ kāryam idam akāryam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0057: idaṃ grāhyam idam agrāhyam | idaṃ gamyam idam agamyam | idaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0058: śrāvyam idam aśrāvyam | idaṃ dṛśyam idam adṛśyam | idaṃ bhakṣyam idam abhakṣyam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0059: idaṃ bhojyam idam abhojyam | idaṃ peyam idam apeyam | idaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0060: lehyam idam alehyam | idaṃ coṣyam idam acoṣyam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0061: kutaś caitāny avatiṣṭhante | kva vā pralīyante |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0062: vā naitāni | tatrocyate | avyaktād etāny avatiṣṭhante | avyaktam eva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0063: pralīyante | avyaktasyaitāni naitāni puruṣasyety atrāha | yady avyaktād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0065: kena khalv idānīṃ kāraṇeneṣṭāniṣṭakṛtair dvaṃdvair avabudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0066: kṣetrajñaḥ | kasmād abhimanyate mamaitāni dvaṃdvāni | aham eteṣāṃ mattaś caitāny
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0067: avatiṣṭhante mayy evābhipralīyanta ity evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0072: yadā tv ayam abhimanyate | avyaktād etāny avatiṣṭhante | avyaktam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0075: setur iva bhavet prakṛtir jalam iva guṇā matsyavat kṣetrī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0076: tasmin svabhāvalulite jale pravṛtte carati matsyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0077: evaṃ svabhāvayogāt sṛjati guṇān prakṛtir ity abhimatam | na so 'jñeṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0078: pravicarati kṣetrajño jñaḥ paraḥ prakṛter iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0079: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ jñeyam iti | atra brūmaḥ | jñeyaṃ nāmāsure puruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0082: viśeṣān pañca caivāhur daśaikaṃ ca prakāśakān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0084: pañca pañca hi vargāṇi vijñeyāny eva tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0086: viśuddhaḥ puruṣaś cāsmād vargahīno na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0088: trayas trivargān yo veda śuddhātmani sa līyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0089: ke te trayas trivargā ity atra brūmaḥ | sattvaṃ rajas tama iti prathamaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0091: budhyamāna iti tṛtīyaḥ | evam ete trayas trivargā bhavanti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0094: karmaṇā manasā vācā pravimukto na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0095: kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ kartṛtvam iti trivargaguṇāḥ | ke guṇā guṇamātrā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0096: guṇalakṣaṇaṃ guṇāvayavam | sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ | tatra
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0101: tamomātrāḥ | guṇavṛttam ity upāsya sarvabhūtamadhyasthas tamasābhibhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0102: svapiti sattvaviśuddho 'vabudhyate | svapnapratibodhanāntaraṃ raja kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0103: ity avayavān | ya evaṃ vindate prājñaḥ sarvato vimucyata iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0104: yad apy uktaṃ ko jñāteti atra brūmaḥ | jñātā nāmāsure kṣetrajño
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0106: paraḥ | taṃ viditvā niravayavam anāmayam asmād duḥkhād vimucyata ity evam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0110: yad apy uktaṃ kim apratibuddhaṃ kiṃ budhyamānaṃ ceti | atra
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0111: brūmaḥ | apratibuddhaṃ nāmāsure avyaktam | budhyamānaṃ buddhistham |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0112: param etābhyām anyad upekṣakaṃ śucijñaṃ vyabhram ity evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0115: ye tv evaṃ nāma budhyeran yathāśāstranidarśanāt kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0117: yad apy uktaṃ kati parvāṇi bhavantīti atrocyate | pañca parvāṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0118: tamo moho mahāmohas tāmisro 'ndhatāmisra iti | tama ity ajñānam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0119: evādhikurute | moha ity ālasyam evādhikurute | mahāmoha iti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0120: kāmam evādhikurute | kasmāt | mahatām apy atra devadānavamaharṣīṇāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0121: mahān moho bhavatīti | tāmisra iti krodham evādhikurute |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0122: andhatāmisra iti viṣādam evādhikurute | viṣādaś ca mṛtyuḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0123: sa cāpratibuddhasya bhavati | kasmāt | yat sattvastho 'ham iti paśyan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0124: mohāt sa sattvavināśe nityasya kṣetrajñasya anupaśyati | yatraikakālam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0126: aham amṛto 'nityatvād ajñānatvāc ca | maraṇajananatve svaśarīrasaṃsthite
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0127: paraśarīrasaṃjñite cābhiṣvajate ahaṃ tava mama tvaṃ mātā mama mātur
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0128: ahaṃ putro mama pitur aham ity evamādiṣu snehāyataneṣv abhidhatte | satataṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0129: duḥkhānubaddhas tāsu tāsu yonyavasthāsv abhiṣicyamāno mama sukhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0130: mama duḥkham ity evamādibhiḥ sarvadvaṃdvair abhyāhato 'haṃkāraspṛṣṭo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0132: 'tikṛcchratvān niyatamānasaḥ śubhāśubham eva karma kurvan sthāvaranirayatiryagyoniṣv
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0137: budhyamāno hy adīnātmā viditārthas tu tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0140: yad apy uktaṃ kati srotāṃsi bhavantīti | atra brūmaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0141: pañca srotāṃsi bhavanti | mukhyasrotas tiryaksrota urdhvasroto 'rvākasroto kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0143: yad apy uktaṃ kati karmayonayo bhavantīti | atra brūmaḥ | pañca karmayonayo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0145: tatra dhṛtir nāma karmayoniḥ | dhṛtiṃ yo 'nurakṣati trividhena
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0148: tanniṣṭhas tatpratijñaś ca dhṛter etat svalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0149: śraddhā nāma karmayoniḥ | śraddhāṃ yas tv anutiṣṭhate so 'nasūyādamādibhiḥ vijñānasaṃyogabrahmacaryagurukulanivāsagṛhasthavānaprasthadānādhyayanapratigrahamantrādibhir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0152: evam anuṣṭhānaṃ kuruta iti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0154: yajanaṃ yājanaṃ caiva śraddhāyā lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0155: sukhaṃ nāma karmayoniḥ | yaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati prāyaścittaparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0156: pareṇa yatnenānutiṣṭhati | tad yathā satyaṃ kāmamanyuviṣayagobrāhmaṇakarma |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0157: anulomānām api proktā sāvitrīty anyāś ca vidyā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0160: prāyaścittaṃ tapaś caiva tat sukhāyāstu lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0161: vividiṣā nāma karmayoniḥ | sarvaṃ jñātukāmatā | āgamāṃś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0162: kurute śrutiviśeṣākāṅkṣī kva saṃjñā kva vāsaṃjñeti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0163: sarvam etat parijñāya karma hy ārabhate tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0167: sarvam etat parijñāya karmabhyo yo nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0169: yad apy uktaṃ kim ekatvaṃ kiṃ nānātvam iti | atra brūmaḥ | ekatvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0170: nāmāsure yad ayaṃ sattvam abhiṣvajate kṣetrajñaḥ vyaktaṃ cāvyaktaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0171: cāpratibuddhattvāt tad ekatvam apadiśyate | nānātvaṃ nāma yad ayaṃ sattvād avyaktāc
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0172: ca smṛtaḥ samāvartayate | etan nānātvam apadiśyate pratibuddhatvāt |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0174: puruṣāṇāṃ sattvenaikatvaṃ bhavati nānātvaṃ ceti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0175: nānātvaikatvam etāvad yo na vindaty abuddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0177: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ sahavāsavivāsam iti | atra brūmaḥ | sahavāsaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0178: nāmāsure yad ayaṃ sattvam abhiṣajate kṣetrajño 'vyaktaṃ cāpratibuddhatvād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0179: etat sahavāsam ity apadiśyate | vivāsaṃ nāma yad ayaṃ sattvād avyaktāc ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0180: vāsaṃ pratisamāvartayate pratibuddhatvād etad vivāsam apadiśyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0182: caturṇāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sattvena sahavāsavivāsam evaṃ cāha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0184: vivāsaṃ sahavāsaṃ ca yo vidvān nāvabudhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0185: sa baddhaḥ sattvasaṃvāsaiḥ saṃsārān na pramucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0187: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ vidyāvidyeti atra brūmaḥ | avidyā nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0188: bhavaty eṣā iṣṭāniṣṭāvyatiriktā trayī punarbhāvikī vidyā nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0193: ūrdhvaṃ cāvāk ca tiryak ca na kva cit kāmayed budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0194: na hi jñānena cājñāne śarma vindati mānuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0195: mānuṣatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāc ca manuṣyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0197: yas tv avidyām adhaḥ kṛtvā vidyārtham avabudhya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0198: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi vidyāvidye sa buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0199: pārāvarye sukhaṃ jñātvā viditvā ca paraṃ budhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0200: mucyate dehasaṃtānād dehāc cāmṛtam āpnuyāt āsurir uvāca iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0202: bhagavan kiṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ vargāvargaṃ kiṃ kṛtsnakṣayaṃ kiṃ śuddhāśuddhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0203: kiṃ nityānityaṃ kiṃ kevalākevalaṃ kiṃ parāt paraṃ kiṃ paśyāpaśyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0204: kiṃ śāśvatāśāśvataṃ kiṃ vyatiriktāvyatiriktaṃ kiṃ yogāyogam ity atra
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0205: saṃdeho me bhavaty apratyakṣatvāt | pratyakṣaṃ caitad bhagavataḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0206: tad anubhāṣitum arhati bhagavān madanugrahāya dharmeṇa | iti | kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0207: yad uktam āsure kiṃ kuśalākuśalam iti | atra brūmaḥ | kuśalaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0208: nāma sarveṣu vedeṣu sarveṣu śāstreṣu sarvāsu vidyāsv adhigatayāthātathyatvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0210: tad etat kuśalākuśalaṃ karma sattvam āhuḥ | sattvamūle khalv ete
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0211: kuśalākuśale sattvabhūte sattva eva pralayaṃ gacchataḥ | sattvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0212: caivāviśeṣas tyajati | tanmūlaṃ caitat kuśalākuśalam aśeṣataḥ sattvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0214: kāyena trividhaṃ karma vācā caiva caturvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0216: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ vargāvargam iti | atra brūmaḥ | vargaṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0217: puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti | avyaktaṃ mahān ahaṃkāraḥ pañca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0218: mahābhūtāni pañca viśeṣā ekādaśendriyāṇi | tad vargam | etasmād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0219: vargād apavarga upavṛttaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ śucir upekṣako budhyamānāpratibuddhayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0221: pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ vyaktam ahaṃkāras tataḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0222: ahaṃkārāt parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0223: mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0226: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ kṛtsnakṣayam iti | atra brūmaḥ | kṛtsnakṣayaṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0227: puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti | avyaktaṃ mahān buddhir ahaṃkāraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0228: pañca mahābhūtāni pañca viśeṣā ekādaśendriyāṇi puruṣeṇa jñātavyāni
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0229: bhavanti | svatas tasmāt tattvāni | nāham eteṣāṃ naitāni mattaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0233: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ śuddhāśuddham iti | atra brūmaḥ | śuddhaṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0234: kṣetrajño draṣṭā sākṣimātrako budhyamānāpratibuddhayoḥ paro yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0235: pañcaviṃśatitattvajñaḥ | yathā mantavyaṃ tathā manyate yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0236: boddhavyaṃ tathā budhyate yathā vaktavyaṃ tathā bravīti yathā kartavyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0237: tathā karoty ahaṃkārāpratibuddhatvāt | budhena kṣetrajñena sarvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0238: sarvāgamāḥ sarvadvaṃdvāni sarvajñānāni tapaś cātapaś ca śuddhaś cāśuddhaś ca |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0239: anena mārgeṇa kṣetrajñasyāśuddhadharmiṇaḥ śuddhim ṛcchati | amārgeṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0241: saṃsāra eva majjaty apratibuddhatvāt | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0242: suśuddhaṃ puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy aśuddham iti manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0243: sa tapo vipulaṃ prāpya saṃsāre pratitiṣṭhati kapila uvāca iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0245: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ nityānityam iti | atra brūmaḥ | nityaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0246: nāmāsure 'vyaktam | anityā vikārāḥ | avyaktam anityaṃ pravadanti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0248: adhiṣṭhānakartṛtvād vikārāṇām | anenaiva hetunā evam etayor ubhayor
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0249: nityatvān nityaḥ kṣetrajña ity evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0251: nityānityaṃ viditvā tu na janma punar āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0252: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ kevalākevalam iti | atra brūmaḥ | kevalaṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0254: buddhisthaṃ budhyamānaṃ puruṣam ācāryāḥ | yadi hy eṣa budhyeta nāham eteṣāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0255: prakṛtivikārāṇām iti kevalaś ca syād anyaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0256: syāt | yadā tv eṣa prakṛtivikārān adhitiṣṭhamāno 'bhimanyate mamaite
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0257: prakṛtivikārā aham eteṣām iti tadaiṣa prakṛtivikārāṇām adhiṣṭhitatvād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0260: tadā saha guṇair eṣa sargapralayabhāg bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0261: yadā tv eṣa vikārāṇām anyo 'ham iti manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0262: tadā vikārān utkramya param avyaktam āpnuyāt kapila uvāca iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0264: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ parāt param iti | atra brūmaḥ | parāt paraṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0265: karmendriyebhyaḥ paraṃ buddhīndriyaṃ buddhīndriyebhyo mano manaso
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0267: buddhir buddher mahān mahataś cāvyaktam | tad etad āsure parāt paraṃ bhavati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0268: aparam etat | param etebhyo 'nyaḥ kṣetrajñas tv asargapralayadharmā | asargapralayadharmiṇāv
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0269: abuddhabudhyamānāv avyaktapuruṣau | na tv etāvad budhyamānāpratibuddhatvād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0272: parāparaṃ viditvā tu na janma punar āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0273: evam etābhyāṃ budhyamānāpratibuddhābhyām anyaṃ buddhaṃ buddhvā na śocatīti kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0275: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ paśyāpaśyam iti | atra brūmaḥ | anādinidhanād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0278: hetunā śāśvataṃ ca varṇayanti | śāśvatas tu bhagavān kṣetrajño bījadharmā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0279: prakṛtivikārayor vyatiriktaḥ muktadharmā ceti | evam āha |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0280: paśyaḥ paśyati paśyantam apaśyantaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0281: apaśyas tāv apaśyatvāt paśyāpaśyau na paśyati iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0283: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ vyatiriktam iti | atra brūmaḥ | vyatiriktaṃ nāmāsure
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0284: puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ | yathā puṣkaraparṇastho bindur na śleṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0285: upagacchanty anyatvāt tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ | yathā muñjād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0286: iṣīkā nikṛṣṭā na punar āviśati anyatvāt tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0287: yathodake pravartamāne matsyo na pravartate 'nyatvāt tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0288: yathodumbare maśako bhinna udumbare na punar abhiṣvajate 'nyatvāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0289: kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ | yathā kūlād vṛkṣaḥ pataṃs tat kūlaṃ muñcaty anyatvāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0290: kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ | yathā vṛkṣād vā śakunir utpatan sa taṃ vṛkṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0291: utsṛjaty anyatvāt tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaḥ | kasmād anyatvāt | sarveṣām evam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0292: anyatvam | kūlam anyad vṛkṣo 'nyaḥ | maśako 'nyo 'nyad udumbaram |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0293: anyo matsyo 'nyad udakam | muñjam anyad anyeṣīkā | anyad udakam anyat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0294: puṣkaraparṇam | tathānyat kṣetraṃ kṣetrajño 'nyaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ | kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0296: yad apy uktaṃ kiṃ viyogāviyogam iti | atra brūmaḥ | aviyogo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0297: nāmāsure viṣayaviṣayiṇau prati viśleṣo na bhavaty apratibuddhatvāt |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0298: viyogo nāmāsure puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ tattvānām asaṃsakto nāham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0299: eteṣām anye caite mamety anabhimanyamāno viyogī bhavati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0301: sa muktas tattvasaṃtānāt pareṇa samatāṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0302: evam etad āsure paraṃ puruṣād anyad vyaktam abuddhaṃ budhyamāno 'bhimanyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0303: nānābhāvāt kṣetradharmāvyaktam akṣetradharmā kṣetrajñaḥ | bījadharmāvyaktam abījadharmā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0312: vimokṣadharmā kṣetrajñaḥ | kiṃ ca bhūyo draṣṭā kṣetrajño
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0313: draṣṭavyam avyaktam | śrotā kṣetrajñaḥ śrotavyam avyaktam | mantā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0314: kṣetrajño mantavyam avyaktam | boddhā kṣetrajño boddhavyam avyaktam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0315: evam evāsure anyad avyaktam anyaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcaviṃśatitattvam kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0317: evam etad āsure buddhyā buddhvā nirdvaṃdvaṃ nirnamaskāram asvāhākārasvadhākāram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0318: anahaṃkāraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ śuddhaṃ nirdvaṃdvena nirdvitīyena śuddhenālubdhakenāhiṃsakena
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0323: śāyinā bhikṣuṇā svakāryam anuṣṭhātavyam | pratibhāvyam upasargaṃ jitvā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0324: yogena yogakāryam anuṣṭheyam | tad dvividhaṃ dhyānam | tad yathā prāṇāyāmātmakaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0326: tad yathā śrotraṃ śrāvyebhyaḥ pratisamāvartayati ghrāṇaṃ ghreyebhyaś
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0327: cakṣū rūpebhyas tvacaṃ sparśebhyo jihvāṃ rasebhyo mano mantavyebhyo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0328: 'haṃkāram abhimānebhyo buddhiṃ boddhavyebhyaḥ | tad etad idam indriyagrāmam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0329: asmād indriyaviṣayāt svaiḥ svaṃ nirudhya devatāḥ pratisamāvartayati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0331: pratisamāvartayati mānasam indriyāṇi | mānasebhyaś caivaṃ saṃkalpebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0332: pratisamāvartayitvā mahātmā kratum unnayate | mahākratavo bhūtādiś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0333: bhūtaviśeṣāś ca mahaty ātmani mahāntam ātmānaṃ kratūṃś ca vivecayitvā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0334: vyaktam anuyuṅkte | tatrātītaḥ kṣemī bhavati tasmād ayaṃ vivṛtaḥ | yaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0335: tataḥ kṣetrajñam asamāvṛto bhavati nirdvaṃdvo nirdvitīyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0336: śuddho mukto nityaḥ kevalo bhavati | eṣo 'nta eṣo 'pavarga eṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0338: tad yathā tathopanayanena pūrvataraiś cācāryair upadiṣṭam | tad evam upadeśaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0340: yathāsya jāgrataḥ svapno yathā syāt tamasā vṛtaḥ kapila uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0341: vibhāgajñasya mokṣas tu yas tv ajñaḥ sa punar bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0342: etāvad evāsure dhyānam anuvarṇitam | parisaṃkhyānam api coktam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0343: caturviṃśatitattvam etat kāraṇam ity atra brūmaḥ | tad etad buddhisthaṃ budhyamānam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0344: etad ācāryāḥ śuddham icchanty anavabodhāt | nānyam aguṇaṃ puruṣam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0345: kas tv eṣo 'dhiṣṭhātṛsaṃjñakaḥ prakṛtivikārāṇām anyas tv apratīkāraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0347: tad etat prakṛtivikārasaṃjñakād anyad avyaktāt puruṣaṃ śuddhaṃ niṣkaivalyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0350: yonisthāḥ puruṣāś ca yena viditā buddhyā sadā buddhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0351: draṣṭā caiva paro guṇair virahito jñānāt turīyo 'kṣayas
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0352: tadvad vartayatīha yaḥ kṛtamatir muktaḥ sa yonyādhikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0353: tad etad upasaṃkhyānam anuvarṇitaṃ yāthātathyadarśanād anavabuddhānāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0355: sāṅgopāṅgeṣu setihāsapañcameṣv āsure vedeṣv aṣṭāsu vidyāsthāneṣv
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0356: amṛtam uddhṛtya mayānuvarṇitaṃ sāṃkhyajñānam etāvad etaj jñātavyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0357: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni | tad etan nāputrāya nāśiṣyāya nāsarvasvapradāyine
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0358: nāsaṃvatsaroṣitāya vā vartayitavyam | paramajñānam ityartham ṛṣayo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0359: vedaproktaṃ vedyaṃ vetsyantīti | tad etad āsure nāvabudhyanty abhīkṣṇapāpmāno
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0363: bhūtagrāmā ajñānapatham āśritā ajñānam evāvalīyante | jāyante
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0364: cāsakṛd asakṛj jñānāt sthāvaranarakatiryagyoniṣv evopapadyante varṣakoṭiśatasahasrāṇy
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0365: anekāni | kathaṃ cit kasya cid dharmabuddhir api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0367: te 'py apavargeṇaiva sukhakāmāḥ pratikūladuḥkhanivartanam eva kurvanto
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0368: bhāvotpādakaṃ trailokyād anyad apaśyanto niḥsaraṇaṃ trailokyam evāgādhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0369: prapatanti | tadvad āsure laukikeṣv api tu darśaneṣu paraṃ vedaprāmāṇyam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0370: te cāpi duḥkhasaṃsāravartakā eva | kuta eva |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0371: vedārthaṃ yajño yajñārthaṃ svargaḥ svargārthaṃ sukhaṃ ca mohāyatanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0372: mohaprabhavaṃ janma | tac ca sukhaduḥkhahaitukamohaprabhavaṃ janma | tathaiva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0373: cāpi nidhanam | tac cāpi duḥkhahaitukaratam | tasmān mantragrāmo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0374: duḥkhasya parasparaṃ hetuḥ | tasmād upaśamarucayo duḥkhasamudraugham uttitīrṣanto
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0375: hitvā sarvavedān upaśamaśāstreṣu prayujyante | tad abhyāsāc
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0376: ca śāstrasya duḥkhamārgāvacchedaṃ kurvanti | svātmany ekatvenāvatiṣṭhante
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0378: teṣāṃ śāstrābhyāsād duḥkhasroto nivartate | atyantacchinne duḥkhasrotasi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0379: śāntir ihāntāya duḥkhasya | tad etad āsure mayotpannamātreṇaivāvabuddhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0380: prākṛtajñānam | yad antarotpannas tatra bhagavān viriñco
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0381: 'pi vikrośitavān saptakṛtvaḥ yadā na tasya kaś cit prativacanaṃ bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0382: prāyacchat tataḥ pravṛttas tatra bhavān punaḥ sargāya nivṛtta iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0383: tad etat paramajñānam āsurer ācāryeṇānuśastaṃ paramarṣiṇā bhagavatā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0384: kapilena pareṇa bahumānena | bhagavatā cāsuriṇā śāstraṃ bhagavate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0387: ṛṣibhyaḥ | tat edat paramaṃ tat pareṇa bhagavatā vyāsena vyāsān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0388: mayāvāptaṃ paramajñānaṃ tathā matto bhavatā prāptam iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0389: tad etad brāhmaṇāṃs tāta śrāvayet saṃśitavratān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0393: yady api syus trayo varṇā yajñe cādhikriyanti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0394: mantravarjaṃ tu śūdrāṇāṃ kriyā dṛṣṭā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029B_0396: śāstrakārās tathā caitat pravadantīti naḥ śrutam yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0002: yat prāpya kleśaṃ nāpnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0006: pūrvajāś ca trayas tasya kathyante brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0007: sanakaḥ sanandanaś caiva tṛtīyaś ca sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0008: jātamātrāś ca te sarve pratibuddhā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0009: caturthaś caiva teṣāṃ sa bhagavān yogasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0011: hairaṇyagarbhaś ca munir vasiṣṭhaḥ pañcamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0012: ṣaṣṭhaḥ sthāṇuś ca bhagavān ameyātmā triśūladhṛk
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0015: bhṛgur marīcer anujo bhṛgor apy aṅgirās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0018: paṭhyante brahmajā hy ete vidvadbhir amitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0019: sargam etan mahārāja kurvann ādigurur mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0022: sanakaprabhṛtayas tatra trayaḥ prāptāḥ paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0024: sanatkumāras tu vibhur yogam āsthāya yogavit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0025: vicacāra trayo lokān aiśvaryeṇa pareṇa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0026: rudraś cāpy aṣṭaguṇitaṃ yogaṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0028: marīcipramukhās tāta sarve sṛṣṭyartham eva te
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0029: niyuktā rājaśārdūla teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śṛṇuṣva me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0030: sapta brahmāṇa ity eṣa purāṇe niścayo gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0031: sarvavedeṣu caivoktāḥ khileṣu ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0032: itihāse purāṇe ca śrutir eṣā purātanā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0034: eteṣāṃ pitaras tāta putrā ity anucakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0036: pitṝṇāṃ caiva rājendra putrā devā iti śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0037: devair vyāptā ime lokā ity evam anuśuśruma
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0039: devalāc ca naraśreṣṭha kāśyapāc ca mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0040: gautamād atha kauṇḍinyād bhāradvājāt tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0042: pitrā ca mama rājendra śrāddhakāle prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0044: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yan mā pṛcchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0049: sa kadā cin mahārāja merupṛṣṭhe sameyivān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0059: sāṃkhyayogaṃ ca yo veda pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0062: prabhavaṃ cāpyayaṃ caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0063: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca sanatkumāra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0064: kālasaṃkhyāś ca sargāṃś ca tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0067: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0068: kālasaṃkhyā ca sargaṃ ca sarvam eva mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0072: tāni te saṃpravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0073: mahārṇavo 'rṇavaś caiva salilaṃ ca guṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0074: vedās tapaś ca yajñāś ca dharmaś ca bhagavān vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0075: prāṇaḥ saṃvartako 'gniś ca vyoma kālas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0081: tathaiva divasaṃ prāhur yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0083: ahaḥ kṛtvā sukhaṃ tāta sasarja prabhur īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0084: hiraṇyagarbhaṃ viśvātmā hy aṇḍajaṃ jalajaṃ munim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0091: sṛjate sa tv ahaṃkāraṃ parameṣṭhinam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0092: ahaṃkāreṇa vai lokā vyāptās tv āhaṃkṛtena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0095: unmajjanti nimajjanti ūrdhvādhas tiryag eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0096: etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyam atha kurvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0097: trīṇi kalpasahasrāṇi ahar etāvad eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0098: ahaṃkāraś ca sṛjati mahābhūtāni pañca vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0099: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0101: śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca rase gandhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0102: guṇeṣv eteṣv abhiratāḥ paṅkalagnā iva dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0104: eteṣām iha vai sargaṃ caturtham iha kurvatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0105: dve tu kalpasahasre vai aho rātris tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0106: ananta iti vikhyātaḥ pañcamaḥ sarga ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0108: manaḥ sargagataṃ tāta viśat sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0109: na tathānyāni bhūtāni balavanti yathā manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0110: etasyāpi tu vai sargaṃ ṣaṣṭham āhur dvijātayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0111: ahaḥ kalpasahasraṃ vai rātrir etāvatī tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0112: urdhvasrotas tu vai sargaṃ saptamaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0113: aṣṭamaś cāpy adhaḥsrotas tiryak tu navamaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0114: etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0117: pravakṣyāmy aparaṃ tattvaṃ yasya yasyeśvaraś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0118: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca sanatkumāra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0119: yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ tat tathā vai nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0120: adhaḥsrotasi sarge ca tiryaksrotasi caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0121: etābhyām īśvaraṃ vidyād ūrdhvasrotas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0123: buddhīndriyāṇām atha tu mana īśvaram ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0124: manasaḥ pañca bhūtāni saguṇāny āhur īśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0126: bhavān hi kuśalaś caiva dharmeṣv eva pareṣu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0127: kālāgnir apy ahaḥ svaṃ te jagad dahati cāṃśubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0128: tataḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0131: nirvṛkṣā nistṛṇā caiva dagdhā kālāgninā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0132: jagat pralīnaṃ jagati jagaty apsu pralīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0133: naṣṭagandhā tadā sūkṣmā jalam evābhavat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0138: taṃ tathā visphurantaṃ hi vāyur dhvaṃsayate mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0139: mahatā balavegena ādatte taṃ hi bhānumān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0140: vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0141: praṇaśyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0142: tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śabdam ādatte vai manas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0144: bhuṅkte tu sa tadā vyoma manas tāta digātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0146: saṃkalpātmānam ādatte cittaṃ vai svena tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0147: cittaṃ grasaty ahaṃkāras tadā vai munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0148: vinaṣṭe ca tadā citte ahaṃkāro bhaven mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0150: abhimāne vinaṣṭe tu mahān brahmā virājate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0151: taṃ tadā triṣu lokeṣu mūrtiṣv evāgramūrtijam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0152: yena viśvam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ nirmitaṃ vai guṇārthinā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0155: eṣo 'pyayaś ca pralayo mayā te paribhāṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0156: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0157: ākāśaṃ prathamaṃ bhūtaṃ śrotram adhyātmaṃ śabdo 'dhibhūtaṃ diśo 'dhidaivatam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0158: vāyur dvitīyaṃ bhūtaṃ tvag adhyātmaṃ sparśo 'dhibhūtaṃ vidyud adhidaivataṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0159: syāt | jyotis tṛtīyaṃ bhūtaṃ cakṣur adhyātmaṃ rūpam adhibhūtaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0160: sūryo 'dhidaivataṃ syāt | āpaś caturthaṃ bhūtaṃ jihvādhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0161: raso 'dhibhūtaṃ somo 'dhidaivataṃ syāt | pṛthivī pañcamaṃ bhūtaṃ ghrāṇam adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0162: gandho 'dhibhūtaṃ vāyur adhidaivataṃ syāt | pāñcabhautikam etac
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0164: ata ūrdhvaṃ trividham indriyavidhim anuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ | pādāv adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0165: gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ viṣṇur adhidaivataṃ syāt | hastāv adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0166: kartavyam adhibhūtaṃ indro 'dhidaivataṃ syāt | pāyur adhyātmaṃ visargo 'dhibhūtaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0168: prajāpatir adhidaivataṃ syāt | vāg adhyātmaṃ vaktavyam adhibhūtaṃ agnir adhidaivataṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0169: syāt | mano 'dhyātmaṃ mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ candramā adhidaivataṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0172: syāt | evam avyakto bhagavān asakṛd asakṛt sargān kurute saṃharate ca |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0173: kasmāt krīḍārtham | yathādityo 'ṃśujālaṃ kṣipati saṃharate ca yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0175: stanitaṃ garjitonmiśraṃ tac ca tatraiva prāṇaśat |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0176: evam avyakto guṇān sṛjati saṃharate ca | yathā cārṇavād ūrmijālaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0177: nīcoccaṃ prādurbhavati tac ca tatraiva prāṇaśad evam avyakto lokān sṛjati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0178: saṃharate ca | yathā ca kūrmo 'ṅgāni kāmāt prasārayate punaś ca praveśayaty
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0179: evam avyakto lokān prasārayati girati ca | cetanaś ca bhagavān pañcaviṃśakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0181: sahadharmā ca bhagavato 'vyaktasya kriyāvato 'kriyāvān bhagavān paramaprakṛtir nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0183: yady acetanā prakṛtiś cetanādhiṣṭhitā cetayati kasmān na mokṣo 'sti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0184: bhavadvidhānāṃ cetaskāṅkṣiṇāṃ ceto hi pañcaviṃśakam upadiśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0185: yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca | tac cāyuktam upadiśanti | tad vañcanāc cāyutaprakṛtisahadharmā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0187: ca manyāmahe adhiṣṭhātṛtvād aṇutvāc ceta iti | ataś ca bhavaty eva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0188: doṣa iti | yathā hi kaś cid dīrgham adhvānaṃ gacchati saṅgavān | asaṅgasyāgamavato
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0189: gamane na prayojanaṃ bhavati | atha gacchati so 'pi saṅgī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0190: bhavati | matsyaś codakaṃ sahadharmiṇāv eva | evaṃ bhagavadvacanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0191: prakṛtipuruṣau | yady udakaṃ pravartamānaṃ matsyo 'nupravartate nanu saṅgavān sanatkumāra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0192: bhavati asaṅgī matsyas tasya kiṃ saṅgavṛttyānuvartanena |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0193: devarṣe tatrāsaṅgaṃ varṇayanti puruṣasya | na bhagavatā vyaktena
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0194: saṅgo 'sti nirguṇasya guṇinā | tatra ślokān udāharanti budhāḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0196: adhiṣṭhā puruṣo nityaṃ prakṛtyā na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0198: cetanā puruṣo nityaṃ kālasya na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0200: draṣṭā hi puruṣo nityaṃ manaso na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0202: boddhā hi puruṣo nityaṃ vedasya na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0204: jñātā hi puruṣo nityaṃ kṣetrasya na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0206: kartā hi puruṣo nityaṃ parasya na ca ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0208: devarṣe tatrāsaṅgam anuvarṇayanti puruṣasya | śucir hi bhagavān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0209: kṣetrajño 'śucinīṃ prakṛtim udāharanti | saṅgī hi saṅgavān saṅgī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0210: cāsaṅga iti yo 'saṅgo hy ātmānaṃ saṅginam anupaśyati sa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0213: sumahān duḥkhayogo bhavati | yathā ca samudraṃ prayātasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0215: caṇḍavāyunā bhidyamāna itas tataś ca vimalābhir ūrmibhir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0216: bhidyamāno hāhābhūto jano vyāpadyet | śataśaś cāprāptamanorathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0217: plavān gṛhītvā | plavāś conmajjanti nimajjanti cānyonyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0218: avalambamānāḥ | evam ajñānī puruṣa unmajjati nimajjati ca | yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0219: tatronmajjaṃś ca nimajjaṃś ca kaś cit pāram āsādayati sa muktas tatas
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0222: prakṛtis tadvat puruṣo 'py ebhir eva guṇair yutaḥ | tat katham anityāṃ prakṛtim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0223: udāharanti nityaṃ puruṣam iti | sanatkumāra uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0225: prakṛtir hi puruṣaś ca | kartṛtvād guṇānām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0226: anityāṃ prakṛtim udāharanti akartṛtvān nityaḥ puruṣaḥ | yadi prakṛtir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0227: guṇān kuryād veda cātmānaṃ puruṣaś ca | nityānityabhāve vītarāgatve
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0228: cāsya nirdvaṃdvatā ca | yadā tv ayam eva syān nānyad asti mama param ity abhimanyamāno
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0230: ubhāv amūrtī hy ajarāv ubhāv eva mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0231: viditau viṣayī caiva viṣayaś ca mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0232: puruṣo viṣayī nityaṃ prakṛtir viṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0235: puruṣaś cāpi jānāti bhuṅkte yaś ca sa bhujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0236: mahadādayo guṇā bhojyaṃ bhoktā tu prakṛtir dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0237: manyanty evaṃ vibhāgajñā bhoktāraṃ tasya ceśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0241: dvaṃdvabhāvād anityaṃ hi triguṇā prakṛtis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0245: evam anumanyante yatayaḥ stunvānāḥ puruṣam | sattvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0246: kṣetraṃ paraṃ guhākṣayakaraṃ calavraṇakaraṃ niśicaraṃ nidhir matiḥ smṛtir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0247: iti caitāni prakṛtiparyāyanāmāni | athāparāṇi bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0248: iti | sattvaṃ rajas tama iti triguṇam etat prakṛtir ity anupaśyati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0249: atha tad avyaktāt param avyayaṃ śivaṃ kṣemamayaṃ śuci vyabhram iti vimalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0250: amalam acalam ajaram akaram ataram abhavam iti | abhavanam anayanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0251: agamanaṃ pṛthag iti caitāni puruṣaparyāyanāmāni atra paśyantu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0252: bhavantaḥ kṣetrajñaṃ vimokṣaṃ viśokaṃ vimoham | vidambhād vilobhād vikārād
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0253: viruddhād ānṛśaṃsyād alaulyam aśaraṇam abhayam anavayavaṃ paśyante
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0254: tad yathā maśakodumbarayor vivāsasahavāso 'nya eva svabhāva evam eva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0255: jñānājñānayor vivāsasahavāsaḥ | anyad eva jñānam ajñānam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0256: kṣetrajñas tyakṣyati prakṛtiṃ na ca prakṛtiḥ kṣetrajñaṃ tyakṣyati | manyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0257: prakṛtiṃ kṣetrajño na ca prakṛtiḥ kṣetrajñaṃ manyate | budhyate prakṛtiṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0258: kṣetrajño na ca prakṛtiḥ kṣetrajñaṃ budhyate paśyati prakṛtiṃ kṣetrajño
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0259: na ca prakṛtiḥ kṣetrajñaṃ paśyati | etad vivāsasahavāsam ity etan nānātvadarśanaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0260: paśyanti devarṣe | jñātāraṃ tad asaṅgam anupaśyatu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0262: yogāś ca sāṃkhyāś ca vadanti samyaṅ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0263: na pañcaviṃśāt param asti kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0266: ity etad yogadarśanam atra sāṃkhyair gītam | śloko bhavati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0267: paśyaḥ paśyati paśyantam apaśyantaṃ ca paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0268: apaśyas tāv apaśyatvāt paśyāpaśyau na paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0269: prakṛtiḥ kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaś cāparaḥ | kṣetrajñaḥ ṣaḍviṃśako 'nupaśyati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0270: na tat pañcaviṃśaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ prakṛtir vā paraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ paśyati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0271: devarṣe yan mayā bahubhir janmabhir avāptam idānīm | ye hy evaṃ paśyanti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0272: śivaṃ hi teṣām ihaiva cāmutra saṃśayo nāsti | sukhaṃ paraṃ janma cāhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0273: bravīmi | na tv itaraṃ mṛtyuṃ vivedāham |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0274: prativirama sa buddhivigrahāt paramaśucis tvam upāsa nirmamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0275: bahubhir aribhir etad āvṛtaṃ prakṛtimayaṃ hi śarīram adhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0276: yadi jayasi śarīram ekato nanu vijitās tava sarvaśatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0277: munibhir ṛṣibhir īritaṃ paraṃ paramaśuciṃ tam upāsya te gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0279: śivasya caitan namucer nāradasya prahrādasya vṛtrasya virocanasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0280: baler marīceḥ pulastyapulahayoḥ | tathaiva bhṛgvaṅgirasor atrivasiṣṭhakāśyapānāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0282: tathaiva viśvāvasave mayoktaṃ gandharvāpsarobhiś ca | etad brahma sarvatra
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0283: samaṃ draṣṭavyam | brahmaṇi cendre śuni kīṭe pataṃgadaṃśamaśakeṣu samyag
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0284: anudarśanāc ca paśyāmaḥ | sarvasya mokṣadharmo vidyate | etat padam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0285: anudvignaṃ janmamṛtyutamonudam upaśāntaṃ samuttīrṇam avasthitam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0287: etac chrutvā muniśreṣṭho nāradaḥ sa mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0288: parayā ca mudā yuktaḥ praṇamya śirasā gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0289: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca taṃ kṛtvā jagāma bhavanaṃ svakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029C_0290: bhagavān api tatraiva sadyas tv antaradhīyata bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0001: saṃyamanaḥ kāśipatir avimuktagataṃ muniṃ papraccha jñānavijñānaṃ saṃyamana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0003: ko viśvaṃ sṛjate sarvam idaṃ saṃharate ca kaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0004: kaś ca viśvam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhaty agnivad dāruṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0005: kaś ca viśvam aviśvaṃ ca nityam evānupaśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0006: kau ca tau muniśārdūla namasye tāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0008: kiṃ ca havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ ca paṭhyate śāstradarśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0009: kaś ca sattvāt samutpannas tasmāt tattvād viśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0010: kaś ca tattvādir ity uktas tathā prāṇādir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0011: bhūtādiś ca muniśreṣṭha vikārādis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0012: kasmād ādadate caiva visṛjya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0013: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0014: vimokṣaś cāsya bhagavan yo 'yaṃ deheṣu vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0016: vartate tvayi kārtsnyena yogaśāstraṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0018: sāṅgopāṅgāś ca catvāro vedās tiṣṭhanti vedavit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0019: sarvasya cāsya jñānasya granthataś cārthataś ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0020: viditaṃ veditavyaṃ hi pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0023: parokṣam etad asmākaṃ tava pratyakṣam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0028: sarvathā tena dehena asadgranthena me mune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0029: badhyāmi bhagavan nityam ityartham aham āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0031: tad etac chrotum icchāmi yāthātathyena tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0033: vaktum arhasi śāntyartham etam arthaṃ mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0034: mamodvahaty eva manaḥ tattvaṃ śrotuṃ parāyaṇam pañcaśikha uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0037: sarvasya cāsya jñānasya kṛtsnakārī bhavān api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0038: viśanād viśvam ity āhur lokānāṃ kāśisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0039: lokāṃś ca viśvam eveti pravadanti narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0040: lokānām apy aviśanād aviśvam iti taṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0044: amṛtāś ca trayo 'py ete nityāś ceti vadanti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0045: vibhāginaś ca vai nityaṃ vimalāś ceti naḥ śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0046: ajāś cāmūrtayaś caiva aprakampyāvyayāś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0047: agrāhyāś cāpratarkyāś ca tathāmartyāś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0049: acchedyāś cāmarāś caiva apradahyatamāś ca vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0050: nirguṇāś cetanāś caiva paśyāś ceti narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0051: yathaitad uktam ācāryair evam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0052: santi sarve guṇā hy eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0054: eko 'tra guṇavāṃś caiva tathaivācetanaś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0055: apaśyaś ca mahārāja pradhāna iti paṭhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0056: pratyayaṃ copasarge vai vidhānaṃ mana iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0057: pradhāna iti nāmāsya etayor dharma ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0059: tasya tat saṃpravakṣyāmi nava tāṃś ca nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0060: prākṛtāny asya catvāri vaikṛtāni tu pañca vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0063: mahān iti ca nāmāsya prāhur vedavipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0064: buddhir ity apare rājan viriñceti tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0067: ekaikaśo viriñco vai vairiñcād utpattitaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0068: ete sargā mahārāja vidyāvidyeti naḥ śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0071: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0073: vairiñco viṣayārthī tu jajñe bhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0074: mana ity abhidiśyeta vikharād vaikharas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0076: caturaḥ prākṛtān sargān yugapat tāta buddhimān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0079: tiryak sargaṃ tathā mukhya ūrdhvo 'rvāksrota eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0083: yaś ca yasmāt samutpannas tataś caivānuvarṇitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0084: vikārādi manaḥ prāhus trayāṇāṃ pañcakāni vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0085: bhūtādīnāṃ tu pañcānām āhur vikharam eva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0089: ādim avyaktam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanam pañcaśikha uvāca iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0093: vyaktasyāvyaktam ity āhur viśvarūpasya naḥ śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0095: adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0097: śrotram adhyātmaṃ śabdo 'dhibhūtam ākāśam adhidaivatam | tvag adhyātmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0098: sparśo 'dhibhūtaṃ vāyur adhidaivatam | vāg adhyātmaṃ vaktavyam adhibhūtam agnir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0099: adhidaivatam | ghrāṇam adhyātmaṃ gandho 'dhibhūtaṃ pṛthivy adhidaivatam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0100: pādāv adhyātmaṃ gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ viṣṇur adhidaivatam | hastāv
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0101: adhyātmaṃ kartavyam adhibhūtam indro 'dhidaivatam | pāyur adhyātmaṃ visargo
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0103: prajāpatir adhidaivatam | mano 'dhyātmaṃ mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ candramā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0106: etad adhyātmam adhibhūtam adhidaivataṃ ca sarvaṃ vijñātavyam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0111: tad etat paryāyaśatasahasraśaḥ pañcaśataṃ pañcāhorātram apadiśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0112: pañcānāṃ puruṣāṇām | tatraikasya pratiṣiddham avyaktasya caturṇāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0113: vakṣyanty ācāryāḥ | mahadādīnāṃ paryāyaśatasahasrāṇy aśītim ahorātram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0114: apadiśyate | prādhānikasya mahataś catvāriṃśat paryāyaśatasahasrāṇy ahorātram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0117: apadiśyate | vaikārikasya puruṣasya manasaḥ paryāyam api caturyugam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0123: bhagavan yadā khalv agnir dāruśatasahasrakoṭiṣv avatiṣṭhamānas tatsthatvān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0124: nityaṃ sahadharmā syād evaṃ khalv ayaṃ kṣetrasahasrakoṭiṣv avatiṣṭhamānas tatsthatvān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0125: nityaṃ sahadharmaḥ syāt | yadi khalv asyāniṣṭaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0126: kṣetraṃ sahadharmitvaṃ syān nāyam iṣṭāniṣṭe pravartamānaḥ prakṛtim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0128: syād bhavatu | na hy aniṣṭaguṇenānugamyamānām abhiṣvajata ityartham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0129: asyeṣṭā prakṛtir guṇāṃś ca tān anuvartate ca | tad abhiṣvajanād anugamanāc ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0130: tatsthatvāc ca nityasyānityam anupaśyāmaḥ | tad dhetumātraṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0131: vakṣyāmaḥ | kaś cid guṇyaguṇinā sārdhaṃ samīyāya | sametya ca kāryakāraṇaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0132: sa kurvīta | taṃ ca tatheṣṭāniṣṭe pravartamānaṃ guṇinam athāguṇo 'nuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0134: yadi hy ayam iṣṭāniṣṭavyatiriktaḥ sadbhāvo nāyam iṣṭāniṣṭavattvam ityartham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0136: ceti | tad anuṣvajanād anugamanāc ca kāryākāryakartṛtvam asyānupaśyāmaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0138: yad uktam iṣṭāniṣṭe nāyam iti tan mithyā | guṇavān ayaṃ kṣetrajño
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0139: nāguṇavān | yady ayam aguṇavān syān nāyam iṣṭāniṣṭe pravartamānāṃ prakṛtim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0140: anuvarteta dharmiṇīm | tad anuvarṇitāni dvaṃdvasya dvaṃdvadharmitvāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0141: paśyāmaḥ | tad anupapannaṃ syād vyatiriktasyātiriktatvam anirdvaṃdvasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0142: sadvaṃdvatvaṃ ca paśyasva | ācārya paśya tvaṃ kevalasyākevalatvaṃ pañcaśikha uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0144: bhoḥ saṃyamana yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā na vayam asyaitad evaṃ gṛhṇīmaḥ ekatvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0145: evaitad upadiṣṭaṃ bhavatā tatra yan neṣṭam | saṃyogaṃ nityaṃ jānīte
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0146: sṛjyamānam asakṛt saṃharamāṇaṃ ca | guṇāṃs tu guṇasaṃharaṇam anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0149: vighūrṇanto 'vaśā bhūmau patanti | tatas tair bhūtair hīnā bhūr vivasanā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0150: śuddhā sthaṇḍilā kūrmapṛṣṭhanibhā babhūva | tāṃ tathābhūtāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0151: jagajjananīṃ jagatīm āpo bhuñjate | praṇaṣṭā bhūr jalam eva syāt | jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0152: ādityo raśmibhir ādatte | samantād apāṃ vināśād agnir jājvalyamāno 'ntarikṣacarān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0153: bhūtān upayujyāgnir jalam ādatte | agniṃ ca vāyuḥ | vinaṣṭe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0154: 'gnau vāyur evāgniḥ syāt | sa tadā sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇān upayujya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0155: vāyur ākāśaṃ syāt | ākāśaṃ mano mano 'haṃkāro 'haṃkāraṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0156: mahān sūryaḥ sūyanāt | kṛtsnasya jagataḥ sarvasūryāṇām ekīkṛtya lokāṃs
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0157: trīn nāśāya syān mahatas tamaso madhye tiṣṭhaty ekas tam apy ādadad avyaktam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0158: tad etat pañcāhorātrikaṃ pralayaṃ mahāpralaya ity ucyate | pralayān mahatas tad
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0160: tad etad dhavyaṃ kavyaṃ ca prakaraṇād guṇatāṃ kavyam ity ucyate sa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0161: haraṇād dhavyam iti | tad etad guṇavan nirguṇaṃ guṇopayogād guṇakartṛtvād guṇīty
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0162: ucyate budhaiḥ | krīḍārtham evāsakṛt sṛjate ca guṇān | anavabodhāt tad aparas
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0163: tv aham evaikaḥ syān nānyaḥ syād iti | yadi hy eṣāvabudhyetānyo 'sti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0164: mama vara iti na sṛjed udāsīnatvāc ca sargasaṃhārayor utpattir na bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0165: yad uktaṃ bhoḥ saṃyamana ko viśvaṃ sṛjate kṛtsnam idaṃ saṃharate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0166: ceti | yad apy uktaṃ kaś ca viśvam adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhaty agnivad dāruṣv iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0168: draṣṭā draṣṭavyasya śrotā śrotavyasya mantā mantavyasya boddhā boddhavyasyādhiṣṭhātā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0169: vā | anenādhiṣṭhitā prakṛtir guṇān saṃharate ca nartate |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0173: pṛthaktvāt | pṛthagbhāvam asya prapadyato 'nekatvaṃ neṣṭaṃ bhavataḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0174: prakṛtikṣetrajñayor ekatvam anavabodhadarśanam etad abudhānāṃ darśanam na
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0175: budhā hy evam etad anupaśyanti paśyāpaśyayor ekatvam | paśyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0176: paśyantaṃ daivād anya eva paśyaḥ | kasmāt | śāstradarśanāt | śāstradarśanasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0177: cānavabodhād abudha ity ucyate budhaiḥ | budhaś cāyaṃ kṣetrajño
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0178: buddhyādīn guṇān abhivartamānān anubudhyate prakṛtitaḥ | tac ca boddhavyam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0179: na tv evaṃ prakṛtir guṇān kṣetrajñaṃ vā | anavabodhāt | yadi hy evaṃ budhyeran
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0180: prakṛtir vā guṇā vā buddhaṃ buddhasahadharmiṇī syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0181: te ca | buddho 'nubudhyati tam anubuddhatvāt prakṛtir abhimanyate | aham evāsya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0184: iti | gamanaṃ saṃkocanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ priyāpriyaṃ gamyāgamyaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0186: guṇān utpādayaty anavabodhāt | prakṛtir anubhūyate dvaṃdvatvāt |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0187: tad anekatvam asya kṣetrajñasya prapadyate | nirdvaṃdvasya cāsya pravartamānasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0188: paśyata utpadyate 'haṃkārakṛto doṣaḥ syāt | aham enāṃ pratyācakṣe 'ham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0189: enāṃ budhyāmīti | na caiṣā paśyaty ācakṣate manyate budhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0190: cāhaṃkārāt | yadi hy abhimanyed vābhiṣvajed vā | evam anubuddhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0191: syāt | anubandhāc ca śaktitvaṃ syāt | śaktitvāc cāsya vyatirekatvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0192: syāt | yadi hy ayam iṣṭāniṣṭābhyāṃ madhyasthaḥ katham asyeṣṭāniṣṭakṛto
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0193: doṣaḥ syāt | bhavati nirdvaṃdvatvāc cāsyālepakatvāc cāsya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0194: vyatirekatvaṃ syāt | bhavataś cātra ślokau yathā |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0199: evam asya bho saṃyamana vyatiriktasya vyatiriktatvaṃ bhavati |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0200: asahabhāvam asahabhāvatvāc ca | anyatvam anyatvān nistattvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0202: ghorād agādhād avyaktād astam astataraṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0204: ye tv abuddhās tapoyogād ekatvaṃ nānupaśyati (sic)
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0205: te vyaktaniṣṭhād ekatvāj jāyante ca mriyanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0207: anityāc ca mahārāja dvaṃdvaniṣṭhā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0210: advaidhāt tu bhaven mokṣo hy avyaktagrāhadharmiṇām pañcaśikha uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0212: bhoḥ saṃyamana evam anyo 'vyaktadharmiṇo 'py aguṇo guṇadharmiṇo 'py
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0214: vimuktaś cāvimuktād vimalaś cāvimalāc chuddho 'śuddhād yogaś cāviyogān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0216: nityam asaktas tatsthatvān maśakodumbarayor matsyodakayoś ca yathāvyaktaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0217: bhavati sahabhāvād evam asya kṣetrajñasyānyatvaṃ bhavati | tad uṣyamāṇasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0219: kevalākevalasya nityānityasya jñānājñānasya | evam asya bhoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0221: sthirāt sthiraṃ, abhrād anabhraṃ vraṇād avraṇaṃ kājād akājaṃ sīmād asīmaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0222: purād apuraṃ purasya cāpy avadāraṇaṃ puratvam upadiśyate | lokād alokaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0223: kālād akālaṃ bhayād abhayaṃ śivād aśivaṃ vibhutvāc cāvibhutvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0224: evam asyānupaśyataḥ khalv avyaktam avijanam asyaikatvaṃ param anupaśyato
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0225: nānātvāt kṣemyād akṣemyaḥ syād akṣemyād avyaktāt | bhavanti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0228: kṣemyas tv anyas taṃ tu naivānupaśyet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0234: gacchaty ayaṃ na calo nācalas tvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0236: sa syād vyaktaḥ kiṃ ca saṃjñānasaṃjñaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0238: bhāvān na syān na prabhāvaḥ śuciḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0244: buddhāt ṣaḍviṃśabodhanatvam upadiśanti | boddhāraṃ budhyamānasya vyatiriktasya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0246: kaś cin neyaṃ mama kā cana ṣaḍviṃśasyāham anena mama saha caikatvam iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0248: sāmyaḥ sāmyaṃ śuciṃ dṛṣṭvā śucim āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0249: bahiḥ kṛtvā tamisrālam avyaktāc cetanaṃ param iti |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0251: tad etad bhagavatā buddham avāpya mahat tattvaṃ paramarṣiṇā paramaguruṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0252: mama kapilena guruṇā ca mamāsuriṇā jātiśatair bahubhir avāptaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0253: kṛtsnakṣayaṃ kapilāt | mamāpy evam eva śiṣyadaśakatvam upagamya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0254: jātiśatair bahubhir avāptaṃ bhagavata āsureḥ sakāśāt | mattaś ca kātyāyanenāptam |
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0256: gārgyeṇāvāptam | tad etat paraṃparayā bahubhir ācāryair avāptaṃ kṛtsnakṣayam amṛtārthatattvaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0257: vimalam amalajñānam | atyagādham acetanam akevalam avyaktam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0258: apāsya nityaṃ cetanaṃ kevalaṃ jñānaṃ pratibuddhaṃ budhyamānena pañcaviṃśakena
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0272: tat te śrutaṃ tad bhava vītaśoka
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0278: yas tv anyathā paśyati hy alpabuddhir
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0282: na cāsya duḥkhaṃ sa tu duḥkham eti
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0293: sa yatra tatra saṃvasaṃs trivargavic chucir bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029D_0295: tvam avabudhyati yadā tadā śucir bhaved iti vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0006: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇa ca damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0009: vayaṃ ca yady anugrāhyāḥ sarve bhagavato matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0014: śrotum icchasi kaunteya bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ śubhām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0016: vijayaś ca narendrāṇām iha pārtha na durlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0020: bālye 'vāptaṃ tu yad vīra agastyena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0034: yan na taptaṃ purā vatsa divyair anyais tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0035: neśvareṇa na cendreṇa yamena varuṇena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0039: nirdvaṃdvo nirahaṃkāro nirāśo niḥspṛhaḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0041: nirvṛto nistamā dhīro nivṛttaḥ sarvataḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0043: bhāskare vartate nityaṃ tapyamānam atīva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0044: avardhata mahāpuṇye sa hi dharmeṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0045: atha kaunteya kālena kena cid bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0050: etasminn antare pārtha ṛṣisaṃghaḥ sa vai mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0051: pradakṣiṇaṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā bhāskaraṃ girim abhyayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0052: te taṃ girivaraṃ puṇyam atha kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0055: vigāhya taj jalaṃ rājan prahṛṣṭā munayo 'bhavan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0056: ke cit sasnur yathākāmaṃ ke cid atra upaspṛśan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0057: ke cit puṇyena toyena pitṝn devān atarpayan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0058: ke cit prakrīḍitās tatra japanty anye tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0059: adhyātmaṃ cintayanty anye ke cid vedān adhīyire
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0060: kathāḥ śuśruvur anye ca proktā anyais tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0061: dhyānam anye hy upāsanta niṣeduś ca tathā pare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0062: evaṃ tair ṛṣibhiḥ siddhair vitamā puṇyavardhanī
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0063: nadī sā puruṣavyāghra dyotate tais tapodhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0066: vitamāyāṃ tad ekānte tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0073: sa bhavān deśam utsṛjya imaṃ suravareśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0074: gantum arhasi dharmātman draṣṭum etan na te kṣamam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0075: sa tatas tad vacaḥ śrutvā devarājaḥ pitāmahāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0079: te pranṛttāḥ pragītāś ca tathā prahasitā api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0080: vitamāyā jale puṇye tasmin prakrīḍitāḥ pare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0083: saṃvarto 'py atha kaunteya jalād utthāya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0084: uvāca tān ṛṣīn sarvān harṣeṇa mahatā yutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0085: śrūyatām ṛṣibhiḥ sarvair idaṃ mama vaco dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0087: aham ugratapā viprā bhavanto 'pi tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0088: na tulyo 'smatprabhāveṇa dharmeṇa ca tathā paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0090: tapobalaṃ na paśyāmi kim apy etat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0097: evam etan na saṃdeho yat tvayoktaṃ dhṛtavrata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0098: tasmāt prabhāvaṃ tapaso draṣṭum arhāma sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0099: ṛṣayaḥ śrūyatāṃ tāvan mama vākyaṃ dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0100: ahaṃ śucir ahaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ aham ugratapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0101: ahaṃ pradhāna ity evaṃ yaj jalpatha tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0102: kim etat kathayitvā vo hy ahaṃkārāt punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0103: pratyakṣaṃ draṣṭum icchāma iha dharmasya naḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0104: na tapo vidyate yatra sarvabhūteṣv asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0107: yatra yena tapas taptaṃ tathā daśadaśātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0108: tad darśayadhvaṃ saṃgamya tapo yasya yathā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0109: tato bhṛguvacaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ tad ṛṣimaṇḍalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0110: bhṛgor vacaḥ puraskṛtya tathety ūcur maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0111: te tu krodhād ahaṃkāraṃ prāpya sarve maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0112: nadīṃ tāṃ vitamāṃ puṇyām upaspraṣṭuṃ vicakramuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0113: te tatra bhraṣṭatapaso vitamāyāṃ jalaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0115: tatas tad gaganaṃ ruddhaṃ sarvais tair ṛṣisattamaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0117: kaś cid ākāśam āviśya jvalad dharmeṇa kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0118: apsarobhis tathā cānye pūtāḥ svargagatā dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0119: puṣpavarṣais tathā cānyaiḥ pūjyante guhyakair api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0120: ke cid ākāśam āviśya divyāṃ ceṣṭām akurvata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0121: tathāsīt sumahān nādo harṣāt teṣām ariṃdama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0122: anyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ tatra hasatāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0123: te dṛṣṭvā balam anyonyaṃ dharmasya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0124: tad evaṃ kathayantas te tīre nadyās tathā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0125: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā viditvā ca dharmalopaṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0127: atha te ṛṣayaḥ sarve gantukāmā nabhastalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0131: te nirastā nirutsāhā nirāśā gamanaṃ prati
