GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0134: kim idaṃ kiṃ nv idam iti dhik kaṣṭam iti cāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0137: mohasya vaśam āgamya sarva eva vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0138: na kiṃ cid abhijānanti dharmasya gamanasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0139: yadā vimanasaḥ sarve khagāḥ khāt patitā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0140: athaitān nāradovāca harṣād idam atho vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0144: evaṃ gate na paśyāmi svargaṃ gantuṃ yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0145: ete stha ṛṣayaḥ sarve pakṣahīnāḥ khagā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0147: ete stha sarve saṃvṛttā nirāśā gamanaṃ prati dvaipāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0148: nadyās tīre śubhe puṇye dharmaṃ kuruta yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0149: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣayo dīnacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0150: taṃ nāradam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ prahvā bhūtvātha te 'bruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0152: adhiṣṭhātuṃ kathaṃ vāpi na bhaved dharmasaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0153: teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradaḥ punar abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0154: muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthāya yogam āgamya vai śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0156: kim āśāsya tu pāpasya karmaṇaś caritasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0157: aho phalam anāryasya duṣkṛtasya mahat tv idam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0158: yad evaṃ prāpyate doṣas tv ahaṃkāro maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0159: kva tad varṣasahasrāṇi taptasya tapasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0160: kva tan naṣṭaṃ purā tv iṣṭaṃ niyamaḥ kva ca vai damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0161: yad ūrdhvabāhubhiḥ śāntaiḥ kva nu tasya phalaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0162: yadarthaṃ cārcitā devāḥ pitaraś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0163: kva nu tasya phalaṃ viprāḥ tapaso 'gryasya vai gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0164: ete kartavyadharmāḥ stha punar eva yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0165: evaṃ gate na paśyāmi gamanaṃ vas triviṣṭapam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0167: aham apy anugantā vai kevalena tu karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0169: tad iyaṃ pravarasrotā nadī puṇyajalā śubhā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0170: kartavyo dharma iha tu yadi nāsti nabhogatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0172: iha dharmaṃ sunibhṛtā bhavantaḥ kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0175: iha devena devyā ca rudreṇa sumahat tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0179: eṣa prabhāvo dharmajñā nadyā asyā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0180: caritveha tataḥ puṇyaṃ gamiṣyatha śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0181: yadā vimanasaḥ sarve paraṃ dainyam upāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0182: sarva eva mahātmānaḥ tatas tān nārado 'bravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0185: yac ca vakṣyāmi tat kāryaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kāryasādhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0186: sarvathā mānam utsṛjya vinayena damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0187: yad idaṃ vacanaṃ me 'dya kariṣyatha tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0190: asmin muhūrte sarveṣāṃ kalmaṣaṃ nāśam eṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0191: anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me munir asmi dhṛtavratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0193: dharmo vas tyaktamānānāṃ svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0194: idaṃ muhūrtaṃ sarveṣāṃ madvākyaṃ parigṛhya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0198: kathayiṣyāmi vaḥ samyak sarveṣām eva sādhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0199: śrutvā kṣamākṣamaṃ jñātvā yad dhitaṃ tat kariṣyatha dvaipāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0200: śāśvataṃ ca dhruvaṃ caiva yathāsthānaṃ gamiṣyatha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0201: te tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tadā ṛṣivarā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0203: taṃ bhṛguḥ prayato bhūtvā devarṣiṃ nāradaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0205: kiṃ nu tad daivataṃ brahman vrataṃ vā niyamo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0207: sarvathā naitad āścaryaṃ devarṣe tava yan matam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0208: asmākam anukampārthaṃ yat tvaṃ vadasi dhārmika
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0209: tato vada hitaṃ vākyaṃ pāpam etat pramārjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0210: ko vā sa niyamo vipra samādheyo hi naḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0211: tad ete vai vayaṃ sarve ṛṣayo munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0213: tat tu dharmātmanaḥ śrutvā bhṛgor vākyaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0214: kṛtāñjalipuṭāṃs tāṃś ca ṛṣīn dṛṣṭvā mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0215: tataḥ prahasya tad vākyaṃ nārado munisattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0216: sarvān eva samāsīnān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0217: hanta vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi sarva eva nibodhata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0218: kṣamaṃ cāpy anukūlaṃ ca svargāya ca hitāya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0220: agastyo nāma dharmātmā bhāskare tapa āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0221: dhairyeṇa tapasā caiva dharmeṇa ca damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0222: na tulyo vidyate yasya sarveṣāṃ bhavatām api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0225: yadi mānaṃ ca mohaṃ ca tyaktvā darpaṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0226: abhigacchata taṃ bālaṃ gamiṣyatha yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0227: sa hy arka iva tejasvī bhāskare parvatottame
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0229: na tulyas tejasā tasya dharmeṇa ca damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0231: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0232: hṛṣṭena manasā sarve tasya vākyam adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0233: nāradaṃ te tathety uktvā sarve kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0234: prasannamanaso vīra jagmus te bhāskaraṃ girim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0238: upary upari dharmātmā caraty ugraṃ tapaḥ śuciḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0239: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ śatrusūdana
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0240: tasmān nātarkayaṃs te tad yad uktaṃ nāradena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0241: tatas tv abhigatāḥ sarve taṃ bālam ṛṣisattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0243: sarveṣāṃ vacanāt teṣāṃ bhṛgus tatra yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0249: bhavatprasādād icchāmo gantum iṣṭāṃ śubhāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0254: ātmānaṃ ca pitṝṃś caiva jīvalokaṃ ca tāraya
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0255: vayaṃ tvā prayatāḥ sarve svargahetor upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0257: vayaṃ tv abhigatāḥ sarve bhavataḥ svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0258: āśayā tvatsakāśāc ca kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śivaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0259: yathārthaṃ kuru dharmajña ṛṣīṇām iha cāgamam dvaipāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0261: sa tān ṛṣigaṇān dṛṣṭvā agastyaḥ śaraṇāgatān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0265: susvāgataṃ vo bhavatu sādhūnāṃ sarvaśas tv iha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0266: svam āśramapadaṃ tāvad ṛṣīṇāṃ bhavatām idam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0267: tatas teṣv arhataḥ kṛtvā sa cātithividhiṃ dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0269: agastyas tāṃs tataḥ sarvān kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0270: namo bhagavatām astu sarveṣām eva vaḥ samam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0271: putro 'haṃ bhavatāṃ sādhu śiṣyo vā praṇato 'bruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0272: kā śaktir mama bālasya muner akṛtakarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0273: bhavatām abhayaṃ dātuṃ svargaṃ prāpayituṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0274: muneḥ kartavyadharmo 'yaṃ kevalaṃ kiṃ cid eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0275: nāma dharma iti śrutvā kiṃ cin niyamavān aham
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0276: kuto dharmaḥ kutaḥ puṇyaṃ kuto dānaṃ kuto damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0277: yena dadyām ahaṃ dharmaṃ bhavatāṃ svargakāṅkṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0278: prasīdata na me roṣaṃ yūyaṃ vai kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0280: tad etad vacanaṃ śrutvā munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0281: cakrus te gamane buddhiṃ tām eva vitamāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0282: tatas tv agastyaḥ sahasā tān uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0284: śirasy añjalinā bālaḥ praṇamya śirasā hy api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0285: idaṃ vacanam iṣṭātmā sarvān eva tadābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0286: na gantavyam alaṃ tāvat sarvair ṛṣigaṇair itaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0287: dāsyāmi yadi śakṣyāmi svargīyaṃ bhavatāṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0289: muhūrtaṃ sthīyatāṃ tāvad yāvat tāvad upaspṛśe
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0290: sa gatvā vitamāṃ puṇyām ṛṣis tvaritam ātmavān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0291: yathāvidhi upaspṛśya tatas tv abhyājagāma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0292: tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ dhīmān adhiṣṭhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0293: hṛṣṭena manasovāca sthito hy ūrdhvam udaṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0294: yady asti sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid devatā vā supūjitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0296: dhruvāya cāstu sarveṣāṃ svargaṃ sthānaṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0297: mama satyena tapasā niyamena damena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0300: svargam āruruhus tāni muditāni yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0301: vacanaṃ śrūyate tatra sādhu sādhv ity anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0302: sādhu putra suputras tvaṃ mitrasya sudhṛtavrata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0303: sādhu sattvavatāṃ śreṣṭha sādhu satyavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0304: sādhu dānam idaṃ puṇyaṃ sādhu brahmaṇyatā ca te
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0305: tvatprasādād vayaṃ sarve nākapṛṣṭham idaṃ kṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0307: nedur dundubhayaḥ svarge aho dānaphalasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0308: ghuṣyate cāpy aho dānaṃ tribhir lokair mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0312: aho dānaṃ ghoṣayanto agastyaṃ pūjayanti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0313: ūrvaśī menakā rambhā śyāmā kālī tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0314: rāmā yojanagandhā ca gandhakālī tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0316: aho dānaṃ ghoṣayanti śataśaś caiva mānada
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0319: tiṣṭhanty abhimukhāḥ svargaṃ sādhu sādhv ity atho 'bruvan
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0320: dhruvaṃ te cāpy aho dānaṃ tasya lokās trayas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0323: evaṃ tadā mahārāja agasteḥ sādhuvādinaḥ dvaipāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0324: ghuṣyate cāpy aho dānaṃ sarvato bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0325: aho dāne ghuṣyamāṇe brahmarṣes tasya vai tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0328: harṣeṇa mahatā yukto bhāskaraṃ girim āruhat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0331: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado bālam agastyaṃ munisattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0337: naitad indrādibhir devair avāptam ṛṣibhir na ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0338: yat tvayādya mahāprājña prāptaṃ bālena kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0341: kartavyo bahulaś caiva tvayā dharmo hy asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0342: bhavān asmin yuge pūrve ṛṣir eko guṇaiḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0344: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0346: bhagavan kevalaṃ bālyād avāptaṃ tapasā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0347: mayādya katham apy uktaṃ kṛte teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0348: te gatāḥ sahasā sarve vacanān mama nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0349: nākapṛṣṭhaṃ mahātmānaḥ sa hi dharmaḥ samārjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0353: lokāṃs tvayā mahāprājña dharmeṇa mahatā ciram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0354: bhavān eko muniḥ pūrvaṃ vṛṣabho nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0355: yadā ca varṣakoṭī vai yugam āsīn mahāvrata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0357: yadā dvīpān samudrāṃś ca parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0359: tadāpi hi bhavāñ jātaḥ salilād dhi svayaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0360: puṣkarāc ca yathā brahmā yathā toyāc ca pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0361: tathā tvam api dharmajña svayaṃbhūḥ salilodbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0362: evaṃ hi kathayām āsa varadaḥ padmasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0363: tava sarvaṃ mahāprājña pūrvajanma tapomayam agastya uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0364: tan na te jñānasaṃjñeyas tava janma prabudhyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0365: yathā tathāstu bhagavan diṣṭyā te ṛṣayo gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0366: diṣṭyā te na vṛthā satyā bhagavan vāg udāhṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0367: ahaṃkārakṛtaṃ manye na ca satyaṃ mamānyathā vyāsa uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0368: na smarāmy anṛtaṃ tāta kadā cid api bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0370: yac chrutvā manujaśreṣṭha kalmaṣaṃ nāśam eṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0371: bhaviṣyati na duḥsvapnaḥ pāpaṃ na prabhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0374: tad idaṃ kathayiṣyāmi kuntīputra nibodha me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0376: sa kadā cin mahārāja mahātmā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0379: tatas tu sahasā hy eva utpapāta mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0383: prāpyāntarikṣaṃ bhagavān kiṃ svit kim iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0387: paśyate vimalāḥ sarvā diśo daśa nṛpottama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0388: vimānāni ca devānāṃ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0395: divyena cakṣuṣā rājan daivatāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0396: tatas tv ākāśam āviśya saptavāyupathāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0398: sa paśyati nabho dīptaṃ jvālārcirbhir nirantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0400: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vyathitas tv āsīt sa tadā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0401: kim etad iti cāvignaś cakre saṃsthām avasthitām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0403: tasthau vai pārśvatas tasya agastyasya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0404: sa tu taṃ praśrayād eva upasaṃgamya cābravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0405: agastyaḥ prayato nityaṃ śucinā caiva cetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0407: tataḥ pradīptam ālokya śaṅkitaḥ sādhu kathyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0409: tato 'smi vyathito deva tat prasīda vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0410: evaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ tadā rājan muninā daivataṃ tu tat
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0411: satkṛtya vacanaṃ tasya tato vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0414: idaṃ khalu nabhaḥ sarvam agnir eva dhṛtavrata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0415: tato jyotiṣam ity uktaṃ kāraṇena na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0416: jyotīṃṣy etās tārakā vai nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0418: idaṃ tu dahanākāraṃ yat paśyasi dhṛtavrata
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0419: svargas tatra mahātejā dāhanaṃ pāvakasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0421: svayam agniḥ sthito vipra ato dīptam idaṃ nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0426: atrasthaṃ daivatair brahma devalokaś ca nirmitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0427: parvatāś ca samudrāś ca dvīpāś ca saritas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0428: etat tat prathamaṃ sthānam agnes trailokyapūjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0429: pradīptaṃ yat tvam ālokya śaṅkito 'bhūr dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0430: tad etan nirviśaṅkas tvaṃ mune praviśa mā vyathāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0432: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā daivatasya dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0433: satkṛtya tad asaṃmohād viveśa sa munir nabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0434: sa paśyamānas tatrasthān devān ṛṣigaṇāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0435: jagāma dṛśyamānaś ca pūjyamānaś ca tair api
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0436: sa tan nabho mahātejā viveśa himaśītalam
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0439: sadhvajāni patākāś ca savimānāṃś ca toraṇān
GE07mbh_12_u:308.191d-029E_0441: so 'paśyata mahātejās tasmin hautāśane ha khe
GE07mbh_12_u:309.001a: kathaṃ nirvedam āpannaḥ śuko vaiyāsakiḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.001c: etad icchāmi kauravya śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:309.001d-0786_02: vaktum arhasi kauravya devasyājasya yā kṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.002c: adhyāpya kṛtsnaṃ svādhyāyam anvaśād vai pitā sutam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.003a: dharmaṃ putra niṣevasva sutīkṣṇau hi himātapau
GE07mbh_12_u:309.003c: kṣutpipāse ca vāyuṃ ca jaya nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.004a: satyam ārjavam akrodham anasūyāṃ damaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.005a: satye tiṣṭha rato dharme hitvā sarvam anārjavam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.008c: jīvite śiṣyamāṇe ca kim utthāya na dhāvasi
GE07mbh_12_u:309.011c: dharmyaṃ panthānam ārūḍhās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:309.012c: niyaccha parayā buddhyā cittam utpathagāmi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:309.013a: adyakālikayā buddhyā dūre śva iti nirbhayāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.014a: dharmaniḥśreṇim āsthāya kiṃ cit kiṃ cit samāruha
GE07mbh_12_u:309.015c: vāmataḥ kuru visrabdho naraṃ veṇum ivoddhatam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.016a: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca pañcendriyajalāṃ nadīm
GE07mbh_12_u:309.018a: tiṣṭhantaṃ ca śayānaṃ ca mṛtyur anveṣate yadā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.021a: saṃpatan dehajālāni kadā cid iha mānuṣe
GE07mbh_12_u:309.021c: brāhmaṇyaṃ labhate jantus tat putra paripālaya
GE07mbh_12_u:309.022a: brāhmaṇasya hi deho 'yaṃ na kāmārthāya jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:309.022c: iha kleśāya tapase pretya tv anupamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:309.023a: brāhmaṇyaṃ bahubhir avāpyate tapobhis; tal labdhvā na paripaṇena heḍitavyam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.023c: svādhyāye tapasi dame ca nityayuktaḥ; kṣemārthī kuśalaparaḥ sadā yatasva
GE07mbh_12_u:309.024a: avyaktaprakṛtir ayaṃ kalāśarīraḥ; sūkṣmātmā kṣaṇatruṭiśo nimeṣaromā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.024c: ṛtvāsyaḥ samabalaśuklakṛṣṇanetro; māṃsāṅgo dravati vayohayo narāṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:309.025a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā prasṛtam ajasram ugravegaṃ; gacchantaṃ satatam ihāvyapekṣamāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.025c: cakṣus te yadi na parapraṇetṛneyaṃ; dharme te bhavatu manaḥ paraṃ niśamya
GE07mbh_12_u:309.026a: ye 'mī tu pracalitadharmakāmavṛttāḥ; krośantaḥ satatam aniṣṭasaṃprayogāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.027a: rājā dharmaparaḥ sadā śubhagoptā; samīkṣya sukṛtināṃ dadhāti lokān
GE07mbh_12_u:309.027c: bahuvidham api carataḥ pradiśati; sukham anupagataṃ niravadyam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.028a: śvāno bhīṣaṇāyomukhāni vayāṃsi; vaḍagṛdhrakulapakṣiṇāṃ ca saṃghāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.028c: narāṃ kadane rudhirapā guruvacana;nudam uparataṃ viśasanti
GE07mbh_12_u:309.029a: maryādā niyatāḥ svayaṃbhuvā ya ihemāḥ; prabhinatti daśaguṇā manonugatvāt
GE07mbh_12_u:309.029c: nivasati bhṛśam asukhaṃ pitṛviṣaya;vipinam avagāhya sa pāpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.030a: yo lubdhaḥ subhṛśaṃ priyānṛtaś ca manuṣyaḥ; satatanikṛtivañcanāratiḥ syāt
GE07mbh_12_u:309.030c: upanidhibhir asukhakṛt sa paramanirayago; bhṛśam asukham anubhavati duṣkṛtakarmā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.031c: paraśuvanaśayo nipatito; vasati ca mahāniraye bhṛśārtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.032a: mahāpadāni katthase na cāpy avekṣase param
GE07mbh_12_u:309.033a: prayāsyatāṃ kim āsyate samutthitaṃ mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.034c: tad antikāya dāruṇaiḥ prayatnam ārjave kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:309.035c: taveha jīvitaṃ yamo na cāsti tasya vārakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.036a: purā vivāti māruto yamasya yaḥ puraḥsaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.037a: purā sahikka eva te pravāti māruto 'ntakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.037c: purā ca vibhramanti te diśo mahābhayāgame
GE07mbh_12_u:309.038a: smṛtiś ca saṃnirudhyate purā taveha putraka
GE07mbh_12_u:309.039c: smaran purā na tapyase nidhatsva kevalaṃ nidhim
GE07mbh_12_u:309.044a: purā kusaṃgatāni te suhṛnmukhāś ca śatravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.044c: vicālayanti darśanād ghaṭasva putra yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:309.045a: dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.045c: mṛtaṃ ca yan na muñcati samarjayasva tad dhanam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.046c: yad eva yasya yautakaṃ tad eva tatra so 'śnute
GE07mbh_12_u:309.047a: paratra yena jīvyate tad eva putra dīyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:309.047c: dhanaṃ yad akṣayaṃ dhruvaṃ samarjayasva tat svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.048a: na yāvad eva pacyate mahājanasya yāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.048c: apakva eva yāvake purā praṇīyase tvara
GE07mbh_12_u:309.049a: na mātṛpitṛbāndhavā na saṃstutaḥ priyo janaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.050a: yad eva karma kevalaṃ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:309.050c: tad eva tasya yautakaṃ bhavaty amutra gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.052c: na sākṣir ātmanā samo nṛṇām ihāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_12_u:309.054c: ta eva tasya sākṣiṇo bhavanti dharmadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.056c: svam eva karma rakṣyatāṃ svakarma tatra gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:309.057c: yathākṛtaṃ svakarmajaṃ tad eva bhujyate phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.059a: yatheha yat kṛtaṃ śubhaṃ vipāpmabhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.061c: abuddhimohanaṃ punaḥ prabhur vinā na yāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.064a: yadā tvam eva pṛṣṭhatas tvam agrato gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:309.064c: tathā gatiṃ gamiṣyataḥ kim ātmanā pareṇa vā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.065a: yad ekapātināṃ satāṃ bhavaty amutra gacchatām
GE07mbh_12_u:309.066c: na santi yasya vārakāḥ kuruṣva dharmasaṃnidhim
GE07mbh_12_u:309.067a: idaṃ nidarśanaṃ mayā taveha putra saṃmatam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.068a: dadhāti yaḥ svakarmaṇā dhanāni yasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:309.069a: śrutaṃ samartham astu te prakurvataḥ śubhāḥ kriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.069c: tad eva tatra darśanaṃ kṛtajñam arthasaṃhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.070a: nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.070c: chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.071a: kiṃ te dhanena kiṃ bandhubhis te; kiṃ te putraiḥ putraka yo mariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:309.071c: ātmānam anviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭaṃ; pitāmahās te kva gatāś ca sarve
GE07mbh_12_u:309.072b-0787_01: na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vā kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.072c: ko hi tad veda kasyādya mṛtyusenā nivekṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:309.073c: agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.074c: vāmataḥ kuru viśrabdhaṃ paraṃ prepsur atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.075c: sumahad dhairyam ālambya dharmaṃ sarvātmanā kuru
GE07mbh_12_u:309.076a: athemaṃ darśanopāyaṃ samyag yo vetti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.076c: samyak sa dharmaṃ kṛtveha paratra sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:309.077a: na dehabhede maraṇaṃ vijānatāṃ; na ca praṇāśaḥ svanupālite pathi
GE07mbh_12_u:309.077c: dharmaṃ hi yo vardhayate sa paṇḍito; ya eva dharmāc cyavate sa muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:309.078a: prayuktayoḥ karmapathi svakarmaṇoḥ; phalaṃ prayoktā labhate yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:309.078c: nihīnakarmā nirayaṃ prapadyate; triviṣṭapaṃ gacchati dharmapāragaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.079c: tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād bhraśyeta na punar yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.081c: svarge kṛtāvakāśasya tasya nāsti mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.082a: tapovaneṣu ye jātās tatraiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:309.083a: yas tu bhogān parityajya śarīreṇa tapaś caret
GE07mbh_12_u:309.083c: na tena kiṃ cin na prāptaṃ tan me bahumataṃ phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.084c: anāgatāny atītāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.084d-0788_01: aham eko na me kaś cid ahaṃ vāpi na kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:309.084d-0788_02: taṃ na paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yo mama
GE07mbh_12_u:309.085a: na teṣāṃ bhavatā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ tava tair api
GE07mbh_12_u:309.085c: svakṛtais tāni yātāni bhavāṃś caiva gamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:309.086a: iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro 'pi svajanāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:309.086c: svajanas tu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatām eva naśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:309.087c: tataḥ kleśam avāpnoti paratreha tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:309.088a: paśya tvaṃ chidrabhūtaṃ hi jīvalokaṃ svakarmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:309.088c: tat kuruṣva tathā putra kṛtsnaṃ yat samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:309.089a: tad etat saṃpradṛśyaiva karmabhūmiṃ praviśya tām
GE07mbh_12_u:309.091a: dhanena kiṃ yan na dadāti nāśnute; balena kiṃ yena ripūn na bādhate
GE07mbh_12_u:309.091c: śrutena kiṃ yena na dharmam ācaret; kim ātmanā yo na jitendriyo vaśī
GE07mbh_12_u:309.092a: idaṃ dvaipāyanavaco hitam uktaṃ niśamya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:310.001a: kathaṃ vyāsasya dharmātmā śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.001c: siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ prāptas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:310.002a: kasyāṃ cotpādayām āsa śukaṃ vyāsas tapodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.002c: na hy asya jananīṃ vidma janma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.003a: kathaṃ ca bālasya sataḥ sūkṣmajñāne gatā matiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.003c: yathā nānyasya loke 'smin dvitīyasyeha kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:310.004a: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa mahādyute
GE07mbh_12_u:310.004c: na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato 'mṛtam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:310.005a: māhātmyam ātmayogaṃ ca vijñānaṃ ca śukasya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:310.005c: yathāvad ānupūrvyeṇa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:310.006a: na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.006c: ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:310.007a: tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_12_u:310.007c: tad indriyāṇi saṃyamya tapo bhavati nānyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:310.008c: saṃniyamya tu tāny eva siddhiṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.009c: yogasya kalayā tāta na tulyaṃ vidyate phalam
GE07mbh_12_u:310.012c: tatra divyaṃ tapas tepe kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.013c: dhārayan sa tapas tepe putrārthaṃ kurusattama

GE07mbh_12_u:310.014c: vīryeṇa saṃmitaḥ putro mama bhūyād iti sma ha
GE07mbh_12_u:310.015c: varayām āsa deveśam āsthitas tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:310.016a: atiṣṭhan mārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.017a: tatra brahmarṣayaś caiva sarve devarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:310.017c: lokapālāś ca lokeśaṃ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:310.018c: maruto mārutaś caiva sāgarāḥ saritas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:310.019c: viśvāvasuś ca gandharvaḥ siddhāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.020c: dhārayāṇaḥ srajaṃ bhāti jyotsnām iva niśākaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.021c: āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogam ṛṣiḥ putrārtham udyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.022a: na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānir upajāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:310.022c: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:310.024a: mārkaṇḍeyo hi bhagavān etad ākhyātavān mama
GE07mbh_12_u:310.024c: sa devacaritānīha kathayām āsa me sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:310.025a: tā etādyāpi kṛṣṇasya tapasā tena dīpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.026a: evaṃvidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:310.026d-0789_01: tatas tasya mahādevo darśayām āsa sāmbikaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:310.027a: uvāca cainaṃ bhagavāṃs tryambakaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:310.028a: yathā hy agnir yathā vāyur yathā bhūmir yathā jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:310.028c: yathā ca khaṃ tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati suto mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:310.029c: tejasāvṛtya lokāṃs trīn yaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam
GE07mbh_12_u:311.001a: sa labdhvā paramaṃ devād varaṃ satyavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.002a: atha rūpaṃ paraṃ rājan bibhratīṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:311.003c: abhavad bhagavān vyāso vane tasmin yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_12_u:311.004a: sā ca kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam
GE07mbh_12_u:311.005a: sa tām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpeṇānyena saṃvṛtām
GE07mbh_12_u:311.006a: sa tu dhairyeṇa mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.006c: na śaśāka niyantuṃ tad vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.006e: bhāvitvāc caiva bhāvasya ghṛtācyā vapuṣā hṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.007c: araṇyām eva sahasā tasya śukram avāpatat
GE07mbh_12_u:311.008c: araṇīṃ mamantha brahmarṣis tasyāṃ jajñe śuko nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:311.009a: śukre nirmathyamāne tu śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.010c: tathārūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalann iva tejasā
GE07mbh_12_u:311.011a: bibhrat pituś ca kauravya rūpavarṇam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:311.011c: babhau tadā bhāvitātmā vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_12_u:311.012a: taṃ gaṅgā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā merupṛṣṭhe janeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:311.013a: antarikṣāc ca kauravya daṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:311.016c: devā devarṣayaś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:311.017c: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva prahṛṣṭam abhavaj jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:311.018a: taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.020a: haṃsāś ca śatapatrāś ca sārasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.020c: pradakṣiṇam avartanta śukāś cāṣāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:311.021a: āraṇeyas tathā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.026a: devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca bālye 'pi sa mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:311.026c: saṃmantraṇīyo mānyaś ca jñānena tapasā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:311.027a: na tv asya ramate buddhir āśrameṣu narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:312.001a: sa mokṣam anucintyaiva śukaḥ pitaram abhyagāt
GE07mbh_12_u:312.002c: yathā me manasaḥ śāntiḥ paramā saṃbhavet prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:312.003a: śrutvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣir uvāca tam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.003c: adhīṣva putra mokṣaṃ vai dharmāṃś ca vividhān api
GE07mbh_12_u:312.004a: pitur niyogāj jagrāha śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:312.005a: sa taṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.006c: sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.007a: pitur niyogād agaman maithilaṃ janakaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.007c: praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭhāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.008a: uktaś ca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ pathā gacchety avismitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.009c: nānveṣṭavyā viśeṣās tu viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.010a: ahaṃkāro na kartavyo yājye tasmin narādhipe
GE07mbh_12_u:312.010c: sthātavyaṃ ca vaśe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.011c: yājyo mama sa yad brūyāt tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
GE07mbh_12_u:312.012a: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.013a: sa girīṃś cāpy atikramya nadīs tīrtvā sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:312.014a: meror hareś ca dve varṣe varṣaṃ haimavataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:312.016a: pitur vacanam ājñāya tam evārthaṃ vicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:312.016c: adhvānaṃ so 'ticakrāma khe 'caraḥ khe carann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:312.017a: pattanāni ca ramyāṇi sphītāni nagarāṇi ca

GE07mbh_12_u:312.023c: paśyann apaśyann iva tat samatikrāmad acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.024a: manasā taṃ vahan bhāraṃ tam evārthaṃ vicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:312.025c: sthito dhyānaparo mukto viditaḥ praviveśa ha
GE07mbh_12_u:312.027c: tathaiva ca śukas tatra nirmanyuḥ samatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_12_u:312.028c: pratāmyati glāyati vā nāpaiti ca tathātapāt
GE07mbh_12_u:312.032a: taṃ muhūrtād ivāgamya rājño mantrī kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.034a: tad darśayitvā sa śukaṃ mantrī kānanam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.034c: arham āsanam ādiśya niścakrāma tataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.040a: krīḍantyaś ca hasantyaś ca gāyantyaś caiva tāḥ śukam
GE07mbh_12_u:312.041c: vaśyendriyo jitakrodho na hṛṣyati na kupyati
GE07mbh_12_u:312.043a: pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvaiva śukaḥ saṃdhyām upāsya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:312.045a: tato muhūrtād utthāya kṛtvā śaucam anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:312.046a: anena vidhinā kārṣṇis tad ahaḥśeṣam acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:312.046c: tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:313.001a: tataḥ sa rājā janako mantribhiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:313.001c: puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:313.002a: āsanaṃ ca puraskṛtya ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:313.005c: pādyaṃ nivedya prathamam arghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat
GE07mbh_12_u:313.005e: sa ca tāṃ mantravat pūjāṃ pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:313.006a: pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ janakād dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.006c: gāṃ caiva samanujñāya rājānam anumānya ca

GE07mbh_12_u:313.009a: kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva pṛṣṭvā vaiyāsakiṃ nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.009c: kim āgamanam ity eva paryapṛcchata pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.010c: videharājo yājyo me janako nāma viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.011a: tatra gacchasva vai tūrṇaṃ yadi te hṛdi saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.011c: pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā sa te chetsyati saṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.012a: so 'haṃ pitur niyogāt tvām upapraṣṭum ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.012c: tan me dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha yathāvad vaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:313.013a: kiṃ kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha mokṣārthaś ca kim ātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.013c: kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.014a: yat kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha janmaprabhṛti tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:313.016a: vedān adhītya niyato dakṣiṇām apavarjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:313.016c: abhyanujñām atha prāpya samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.017a: samāvṛttas tu gārhasthye sadāro niyato vaset
GE07mbh_12_u:313.019a: sa vane 'gnīn yathānyāyam ātmany āropya dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:313.020c: kim avaśyaṃ nivastavyam āśrameṣu vaneṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:313.021a: etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:313.023a: ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:313.023c: vijñāya kṛtakṛtyas tu tīrṇas tad ubhayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_12_u:313.025c: kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:313.027a: tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.027c: triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet param abhīpsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.028a: rājasāṃs tāmasāṃś caiva nityaṃ doṣān vivarjayet
GE07mbh_12_u:313.028c: sāttvikaṃ mārgam āsthāya paśyed ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.030c: vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvaṃdvaḥ praśamaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.031a: atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.032a: jyotir ātmani nānyatra rataṃ tatraiva caiva tat
GE07mbh_12_u:313.032c: svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ tad draṣṭuṃ susamāhitacetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.033a: na bibheti paro yasmān na bibheti parāc ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.033c: yaś ca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.034a: yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.034c: karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.035c: tyaktvā kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvam aśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:313.036a: yadā śravye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāpyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.036c: samo bhavati nirdvaṃdvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.037a: yadā stutiṃ ca nindāṃ ca samatvenaiva paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:313.037c: kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:313.038a: śītam uṣṇaṃ tathaivārtham anarthaṃ priyam apriyam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.038c: jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.041a: etat sarvaṃ prapaśyāmi tvayi buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:313.041c: yac cānyad api vettavyaṃ tattvato veda tad bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:313.043c: jñānaṃ divyaṃ mamāpīdaṃ tenāsi vidito mama
GE07mbh_12_u:313.044a: adhikaṃ tava vijñānam adhikā ca gatis tava
GE07mbh_12_u:313.044c: adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:313.045a: bālyād vā saṃśayād vāpi bhayād vāpy avimokṣajāt
GE07mbh_12_u:313.045c: utpanne cāpi vijñāne nādhigacchati tāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:313.048a: nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti lolupā
GE07mbh_12_u:313.049a: na bandhuṣu nibandhas te na bhayeṣv asti te bhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.050a: ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cāpy anye manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.050c: āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārgam akṣayaṃ tam anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:313.051a: yat phalaṃ brāhmaṇasyeha mokṣārthaś ca yad ātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:313.051c: tasmin vai vartase vipra kim anyat paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:314.001a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ kṛtātmā kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.002a: kṛtakāryaḥ sukhī śāntas tūṣṇīṃ prāyād udaṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.002b-0791_01: prayayau yogam āsthāya tuṣṭo diśam athottarām
GE07mbh_12_u:314.003a: etasminn eva kāle tu devarṣir nāradas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.004c: kiṃnarāṇāṃ samūhaiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:314.006a: pakṣirājo garutmāṃś ca yaṃ nityam adhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:314.006c: catvāro lokapālāś ca devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.007a: viṣṇunā yatra putrārthe tapas taptaṃ mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.007c: yatraiva ca kumāreṇa bālye kṣiptā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.008a: śaktir nyastā kṣititale trailokyam avamanya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:314.008c: yatrovāca jagatskandaḥ kṣipan vākyam idaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.009c: yo brahmaṇyo dvitīyo 'sti triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:314.010a: so 'bhyuddharatv imāṃ śaktim atha vā kampayatv iti
GE07mbh_12_u:314.010c: tac chrutvā vyathitā lokāḥ ka imām uddhared iti
GE07mbh_12_u:314.011e: kiṃ nv atra sukṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaved iti vicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:314.012a: sa nāmṛṣyata taṃ kṣepam avaikṣata ca pāvakim
GE07mbh_12_u:314.012c: sa prahasya viśuddhātmā śaktiṃ prajvalitāṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.013a: śaktyāṃ tu kampamānāyāṃ viṣṇunā balinā tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.014a: śaktenāpi samuddhartuṃ kampitā sā na tūddhṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.015a: tāṃ kampayitvā bhagavān prahrādam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:314.015c: paśya vīryaṃ kumārasya naitad anyaḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:314.016c: jagrāha tāṃ tasya śaktiṃ na cainām apy akampayat
GE07mbh_12_u:314.017a: nādaṃ mahāntaṃ muktvā sa mūrchito girimūrdhani
GE07mbh_12_u:314.021a: bhagavān pāvakas tatra svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:314.023a: aindrīṃ tu diśam āsthāya śailarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.023e: vedān adhyāpayām āsa vyāsaḥ śiṣyān mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.024a: sumantuṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:314.024c: jaiminiṃ ca mahāprājñaṃ pailaṃ cāpi tapasvinam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.025a: ebhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto vyāsa āste mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.026a: atha vyāsaḥ parikṣiptaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.029a: tato nivedayām āsa pitre sarvam aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.030a: evam adhyāpayañ śiṣyān vyāsaḥ putraṃ ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_12_u:314.031a: tataḥ kadā cic chiṣyās taṃ parivāryāvatasthire
GE07mbh_12_u:314.032c: athocus te tadā vyāsaṃ śiṣyāḥ prāñjalayo gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:314.033a: mahatā śreyasā yuktā yaśasā ca sma vardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.033c: ekaṃ tv idānīm icchāmo guruṇānugrahaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.034a: iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā brahmarṣis tān uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:314.034c: ucyatām iti tad vatsā yad vaḥ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.035a: etad vākyaṃ guroḥ śrutvā śiṣyās te hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.035c: punaḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:314.036a: ūcus te sahitā rājann idaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.036c: yadi prīta upādhyāyo dhanyāḥ smo munisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:314.037a: kāṅkṣāmas tu vayaṃ sarve varaṃ dattaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.037c: ṣaṣṭhaḥ śiṣyo na te khyātiṃ gacched atra prasīda naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.038a: catvāras te vayaṃ śiṣyā guruputraś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.038c: iha vedāḥ pratiṣṭherann eṣa naḥ kāṅkṣito varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.039e: uvāca śiṣyān dharmātmā dharmyaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.040a: brāhmaṇāya sadā deyaṃ brahma śuśrūṣave bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:314.041a: bhavanto bahulāḥ santu vedo vistāryatām ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.044a: na niyojyāś ca vaḥ śiṣyā aniyoge mahābhaye
GE07mbh_12_u:314.045a: sarvas taratu durgāṇi sarvo bhadrāṇi paśyatu
GE07mbh_12_u:314.045c: śrāvayec caturo varṇān kṛtvā brāhmaṇam agrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:314.046a: vedasyādhyayanaṃ hīdaṃ tac ca kāryaṃ mahat smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:314.046c: stutyartham iha devānāṃ vedāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:314.048a: yaś cādharmeṇa vibrūyād yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati
GE07mbh_12_u:314.049a: etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ svādhyāyasya vidhiṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:314.049c: upakuryāc ca śiṣyāṇām etac ca hṛdi vo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:315.001a: etac chrutvā guror vākyaṃ vyāsaśiṣyā mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.002c: tan no manasi saṃrūḍhaṃ kariṣyāmas tathā ca tat
GE07mbh_12_u:315.004a: śailād asmān mahīṃ gantuṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ no mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:315.004c: vedān anekadhā kartuṃ yadi te rucitaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:315.006a: kṣitiṃ vā devalokaṃ vā gamyatāṃ yadi rocate
GE07mbh_12_u:315.006c: apramādaś ca vaḥ kāryo brahma hi pracuracchalam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.007c: jagmuḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vyāsaṃ mūrdhnābhivādya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:315.008c: saṃyājayanto viprāṃś ca rājanyāṃś ca viśas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.009a: pūjyamānā dvijair nityaṃ modamānā gṛhe ratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.012a: bho bho maharṣe vāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate
GE07mbh_12_u:315.012c: eko dhyānaparas tūṣṇīṃ kim āsse cintayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:315.013c: rajasā tamasā caiva somaḥ sopaplavo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.015a: ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca gandharvāś ca mahaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.015c: vimuktā brahmaghoṣeṇa na bhrājante yathā purā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.017a: etan manonukūlaṃ me bhavān arhati bhāṣitum
GE07mbh_12_u:315.017c: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca sarvatra ca kutūhalī
GE07mbh_12_u:315.018a: triṣu lokeṣu yad vṛttaṃ sarvaṃ tava mate sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.018c: tad ājñāpaya viprarṣe brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
GE07mbh_12_u:315.019a: yan mayā samanuṣṭheyaṃ brahmarṣe tad udāhara
GE07mbh_12_u:315.019c: viyuktasyeha śiṣyair me nātihṛṣṭam idaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.020c: malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ strīṇāṃ kautūhalaṃ malam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.021a: adhīyatāṃ bhavān vedān sārdhaṃ putreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0001: uvāca ca mahāprājñaṃ nāradaṃ punar eva hi
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0002: malaṃ pṛthivyā bāhlīkā ity uktam adhunā tvayā nārada uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0003: kīdṛśāś caiva bāhlīkā brūhi me vadatāṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0004: asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ catvāro deśāḥ pāpajanair vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0005: yugaṃdharas tu prathamas tathā bhūtilakaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0007: caturthas tu mahāpāpo bāhlīka iti saṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0009: ekavarṇās tu dṛśyante janā vai hy acyutasthale
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0010: mehanti ca malaṃ pāpā visṛjanti jaleṣu vai
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0011: nityaṃ bhūtilake 'tyannaṃ taj jalaṃ ca pibanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0012: haribāhyās tu vāhīkā na smaranti hariṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0014: vṛthā jātā bhaviṣyanti bāhlīkā iti viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0017: brāhmaṇīṃ bahuputrāṃ tāṃ puṣkare snātum āgatām
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0018: yugaṃdhare payaḥ pītvā hy ucitā hy acyutasthale
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0019: tathā bhūtilake snātvā bāhlīkāṃś ca nirīkṣya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0020: āgatāsi tathā snātuṃ kathaṃ svargaṃ na gacchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0023: etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttam athānyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0025: yad dviṣanti mahātmānaṃ na smaranti janārdanam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0026: na teṣāṃ puṇyatīrtheṣu gatiḥ saṃsargiṇām api
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0027: udyuktā brāhmaṇī bhītā pratiyātā sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0029: anantasya hareḥ śuddhaṃ nāma vai dvādaśākṣaram
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0032: namas te brāhmaṇi śubhe pūtāhaṃ tava darśanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0034: harer nāmnā ca māṃ sādhvī jalena spraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0035: ity uktā brāhmaṇī hṛṣṭā putraiḥ saha śubhavratā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0038: apsarā hy abhavad divyā gatā svarlokam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0040: saputrā cāgatā sthānam acyutasya paraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0041: etat te kathitaṃ vidvan mune kālo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0043: ity uktvā sa jagāmātha nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.022d-030_0044: dvaipāyanas tu bhagavāṃs tac chrutvā munisattamāt
GE07mbh_12_u:315.023c: svareṇoccaiḥ sa śaikṣeṇa lokān āpūrayann iva
GE07mbh_12_u:315.025a: tato 'nadhyāya iti taṃ vyāsaḥ putram avārayat
GE07mbh_12_u:315.026a: apṛcchat pitaraṃ brahman kuto vāyur abhūd ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.026c: ākhyātum arhati bhavān vāyoḥ sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.028a: divyaṃ te cakṣur utpannaṃ svasthaṃ te nirmalaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.028c: tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ sattve vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.029a: ādarśe svām iva chāyāṃ paśyasy ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.030c: dvāv etau pretya panthānau divaṃ cādhaś ca gacchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.031a: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca yatra saṃvānti vāyavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.032c: teṣām apy abhavat putraḥ samāno nāma durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.033a: udānas tasya putro 'bhūd vyānas tasyābhavat sutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.033c: apānaś ca tato jñeyaḥ prāṇaś cāpi tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:315.034c: pṛthak karmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:315.035a: prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuś ceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:315.035c: prāṇanāc caiva bhūtānāṃ prāṇa ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:315.036a: prerayaty abhrasaṃghātān dhūmajāṃś coṣmajāṃś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.036c: prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.037c: āvaho nāma saṃvāti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan
GE07mbh_12_u:315.038a: udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvat somādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.039a: yaś caturbhyaḥ samudrebhyo vāyur dhārayate jalam
GE07mbh_12_u:315.040c: udvaho nāma varṣiṣṭhas tritīyaḥ sa sadāgatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.041a: samuhyamānā bahudhā yena nīlāḥ pṛthag ghanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.042a: saṃhatā yena cāviddhā bhavanti nadatāṃ nadāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.043c: caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.044c: vāyunā vihatā meghā na bhavanti balāhakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.045c: pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.046a: yasmin pāriplave divyā vahanty āpo vihāyasā
GE07mbh_12_u:315.048a: yasmād āpyāyate somo nidhir divyo 'mṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:315.048c: ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyur javatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.051a: yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśām antaṃ prapedire
GE07mbh_12_u:315.052a: yena sṛṣṭaḥ parābhūto yāty eva na nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:315.052c: parāvaho nāma paro vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.054a: etat tu mahad āścaryaṃ yad ayaṃ parvatottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:315.056c: vāyor vāyubhayaṃ hy uktaṃ brahma tat pīḍitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:315.057c: uktvā putram adhīṣveti vyomagaṅgām ayāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.002a: devarṣiṃ tu śuko dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.003c: kena tvāṃ śreyasā tāta yojayāmīti hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_12_u:316.004a: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śukaḥ provāca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:316.004c: asmiṃl loke hitaṃ yat syāt tena māṃ yoktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:316.006a: nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti vidyāsamaṃ tapaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.006c: nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:316.008a: mānuṣyam asukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati
GE07mbh_12_u:316.008c: nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṅgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.010c: kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārtham udyatau
GE07mbh_12_u:316.011a: nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarāt
GE07mbh_12_u:316.012a: ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.012c: ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ na satyād vidyate param
GE07mbh_12_u:316.013a: satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyād api hitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:316.013c: yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:316.014c: yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvān sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.016a: ātmabhūtair atadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:316.017c: yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate param
GE07mbh_12_u:316.018c: nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:316.019c: etad āhuḥ paraṃ śreya ātmajñasya jitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.020c: aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭha iha cāmutra cābhayam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.023c: brāhmaṇe nacirād eva sukham āyāty anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.024a: dvaṃdvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu ya eko ramate muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.024c: viddhi prajñānatṛptaṃ taṃ jñānatṛpto na śocati
GE07mbh_12_u:316.025a: śubhair labhati devatvaṃ vyāmiśrair janma mānuṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.026c: saṃsāre pacyate jantus tat kathaṃ nāvabudhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:316.029c: kṛmir hi kośakāras tu badhyate svaparigrahāt
GE07mbh_12_u:316.032c: pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:316.033a: yadā sarvaṃ parityajya gantavyam avaśena te
GE07mbh_12_u:316.033c: anarthe kiṃ prasaktas tvaṃ svam arthaṃ nānutiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:316.035a: na hi tvā prasthitaṃ kaś cit pṛṣṭhato 'nugamiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:316.035c: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvā yāsyantam anuyāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:316.036a: vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram
GE07mbh_12_u:316.037a: nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.037c: chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.037d-0793_02: na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lauhaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:316.040a: tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja
GE07mbh_12_u:316.040c: ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja
GE07mbh_12_u:316.041a: tyaja dharmam asaṃkalpād adharmaṃ cāpy ahiṃsayā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.044a: idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sarvam ajagac cāpi yad bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:316.044c: mahābhūtātmakaṃ sarvaṃ mahad yat paramāṇu yat
GE07mbh_12_u:316.044d-0794_01: mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpas tathā mahī
GE07mbh_12_u:316.044d-0794_02: ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā yā tu ātmā saptama ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:316.044d-0794_03: aṣṭamaṃ tu mano jñeyaṃ buddhis tu navamī smṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.045a: indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.046a: sarvair ihendriyārthaiś ca vyaktāvyaktair hi saṃhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.047a: etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktaḥ pumān ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:316.047c: trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.048a: ya idaṃ veda tattvena sa veda prabhavāpyayau
GE07mbh_12_u:316.048c: pārāśaryeha boddhavyaṃ jñānānāṃ yac ca kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:316.049a: indriyair gṛhyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.050a: indriyair niyatair dehī dhārābhir iva tarpyate
GE07mbh_12_u:316.050c: loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati
GE07mbh_12_u:316.053c: akartāram amūrtaṃ ca bhagavān āha tīrthavit
GE07mbh_12_u:316.054a: yo jantuḥ svakṛtais tais taiḥ karmabhir nityaduḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.055a: tataḥ karma samādatte punar anyan navaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_12_u:316.056c: badhyate mathyate caiva karmabhir manthavat sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:316.057a: tato nivṛtto bandhāt svāt karmaṇām udayād iha
GE07mbh_12_u:316.058a: sa tvaṃ nivṛttabandhas tu nivṛttaś cāpi karmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:316.059a: saṃyamena navaṃ bandhaṃ nivartya tapaso balāt
GE07mbh_12_u:316.059c: saṃprāptā bahavaḥ siddhim apy abādhāṃ sukhodayām
GE07mbh_12_u:317.001c: niśamya labhate buddhiṃ tāṃ labdhvā sukham edhate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.002c: divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_12_u:317.003c: tiṣṭhate ced vaśe buddhir labhate śokanāśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:317.005a: dravyeṣu samatīteṣu ye guṇās tān na cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:317.006a: doṣadarśī bhavet tatra yatra rāgaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.006c: aniṣṭavad dhitaṃ paśyet tathā kṣipraṃ virajyate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.007a: nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītam anuśocati
GE07mbh_12_u:317.007c: apy abhāvena yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.008a: guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:317.008c: sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.009a: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītam anuśocati
GE07mbh_12_u:317.009c: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.010a: nāśru kurvanti ye buddhyā dṛṣṭvā lokeṣu saṃtatim
GE07mbh_12_u:317.011c: yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas tan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:317.012a: bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:317.012c: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravardhate
GE07mbh_12_u:317.013a: prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.013c: etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:317.014c: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.015a: na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:317.016a: sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.017a: parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.017c: abhyeti brahma so 'tyantaṃ na taṃ śocanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.018a: duḥkham arthā hi tyajyante pālane na ca te sukhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.018c: duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayet
GE07mbh_12_u:317.019a: anyām anyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.019c: atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.021a: anto nāsti pipāsāyās tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:317.021c: tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.022a: nimeṣamātram api hi vayo gacchan na tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:317.023a: bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhvā tamasaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:317.023c: na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:317.024c: vyāghraḥ paśum ivāsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:317.026a: śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca gandheṣu ca raseṣu ca
GE07mbh_12_u:317.026c: nopabhogāt paraṃ kiṃ cid dhanino vādhanasya vā
GE07mbh_12_u:317.027a: prāk saṃprayogād bhūtānāṃ nāsti duḥkham anāmayam
GE07mbh_12_u:317.027c: viprayogāt tu sarvasya na śocet prakṛtisthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.028a: dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:317.028c: cakṣuḥśrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca vidyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:317.029c: vicared asamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:317.030c: ātmanaiva sahāyena yaś caret sa sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:318.001c: nainaṃ prajñā sunītaṃ vā trāyate nāpi pauruṣam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.005a: sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām iva
GE07mbh_12_u:318.005c: āyur ādāya martyānāṃ rātryahāni punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.006a: vyatyayo hy ayam atyantaṃ pakṣayoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.007c: ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:318.009a: yo yam icched yathākāmaṃ kāmānāṃ tat tad āpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:318.009c: yadi syān na parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.010a: saṃyatāś ca hi dakṣāś ca matimantaś ca mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.010c: dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ santaḥ prahīṇāś ca svakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.012a: bhūtānām aparaḥ kaś cid dhiṃsāyāṃ satatotthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.012c: vañcanāyāṃ ca lokasya sa sukheṣv eva jīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:318.013a: aceṣṭamānam āsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃ cid upatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.013c: kaś cit karmānusṛtyānyo na prāpyam adhigacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.014c: śukram anyatra saṃbhūtaṃ punar anyatra gacchati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.015a: tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati vā na vā
GE07mbh_12_u:318.017c: āyuṣmāñ jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ pitaiva saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.018a: devān iṣṭvā tapas taptvā kṛpaṇaiḥ putragṛddhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.019c: vipulān abhijāyante labdhās tair eva maṅgalaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.023c: kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvam iha paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:318.024a: annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāś ca bhakṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.024c: tasminn evodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nānnam iva jīryate
GE07mbh_12_u:318.025c: dhāraṇe vā visarge vā na kartur vidyate vaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.026a: sravanti hy udarād garbhā jāyamānās tathāpare
GE07mbh_12_u:318.027c: prajāṃ ca labhate kāṃ cit punar dvaṃdveṣu majjati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.028c: prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.029a: nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syur nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.029c: vyādhibhiś ca vimathyante vyālaiḥ kṣudramṛgā iva
GE07mbh_12_u:318.031a: te cāpi nipuṇā vaidyāḥ kuśalāḥ saṃbhṛtauṣadhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.032a: te pibantaḥ kaṣāyāṃś ca sarpīṃṣi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:318.032c: dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgā nāgair ivottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.033a: ke vā bhuvi cikitsante rogārtān mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.033c: śvāpadāni daridrāṃś ca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:318.034c: ākramya roga ādatte paśūn paśupaco yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:318.036a: na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:318.037a: na mriyeran na jīryeran sarve syuḥ sarvakāmikāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.038a: upary upari lokasya sarvo bhavitum icchati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.038c: yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:318.040c: svaṃ svaṃ ca punar anyeṣāṃ na kiṃ cid abhigamyate
GE07mbh_12_u:318.041c: vahanti śibikām anye yānty anye śibikāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.042c: manujāś ca śatastrīkāḥ śataśo vidhavāḥ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.043c: idam anyat paraṃ paśya mātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:318.044a: tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja
GE07mbh_12_u:318.044c: ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja
GE07mbh_12_u:318.045a: etat te paramaṃ guhyam ākhyātam ṛṣisattama
GE07mbh_12_u:318.045c: yena devāḥ parityajya martyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.047a: putradārair mahān kleśo vidyāmnāye mahāñ śramaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.047c: kiṃ nu syāc chāśvataṃ sthānam alpakleśaṃ mahodayam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.048a: tato muhūrtaṃ saṃcintya niścitāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.049a: kathaṃ tv aham asaṃkliṣṭo gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:318.050a: paraṃ bhāvaṃ hi kāṅkṣāmi yatra nāvartate punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.051c: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva yatra sthāsyāmi śāśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.052a: na tu yogam ṛte śakyā prāptuṃ sā paramā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.054a: na hy eṣa kṣayam āpnoti somaḥ suragaṇair yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:318.054e: kṣīyate hi sadā somaḥ punaś caivābhipūryate
GE07mbh_12_u:318.054f-0795_01: necchāmy evaṃ viditvaite hrāsavṛddhī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.055a: ravis tu saṃtāpayati lokān raśmibhir ulbaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.056a: ato me rocate gantum ādityaṃ dīptatejasam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.058a: āpṛcchāmi nagān nāgān girīn urvīṃ diśo divam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.059c: paśyantu yogavīryaṃ me sarve devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:318.060c: tasmād anujñāṃ saṃprāpya jagāma pitaraṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:318.062a: śrutvā ṛṣis tad vacanaṃ śukasya; prīto mahātmā punar āha cainam
GE07mbh_12_u:318.062c: bho bhoḥ putra sthīyatāṃ tāvad adya; yāvac cakṣuḥ prīṇayāmi tvadartham
GE07mbh_12_u:318.062d-0797_01: evam uktaḥ pitus tena snehayuktena cetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:319.001c: same deśe vivikte ca niḥśalāka upāviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:319.003a: tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvān āditye nacirodite
GE07mbh_12_u:319.004a: na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo nāpi darśanam
GE07mbh_12_u:319.005c: prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ saṃprekṣya bhāskaram
GE07mbh_12_u:319.007a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā devarṣiṃ nāradaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:319.007c: nivedayām āsa tadā svaṃ yogaṃ paramarṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:319.008a: dṛṣṭo mārgaḥ pravṛtto 'smi svasti te 'stu tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:319.010a: kailāsapṛṣṭhād utpatya sa papāta divaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:319.012a: vyavasāyena lokāṃs trīn sarvān so 'tha vicintayan
GE07mbh_12_u:319.014c: puṣpavarṣaiś ca divyais tam avacakrur divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:319.015a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:319.015c: ṛṣayaś caiva saṃsiddhāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:319.019a: daivataṃ katamaṃ hy etad uttamāṃ gatim āsthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:319.020c: urvaśī pūrvacittiś ca yaṃ nityam upasevate
GE07mbh_12_u:319.020e: te sma brahmarṣiputrasya vismayaṃ yayatuḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:319.024c: ālokayām āsa tadā sarāṃsi saritas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:319.026a: abravīt tās tadā vākyaṃ śukaḥ paramadharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:319.026c: pitā yady anugacchen māṃ krośamānaḥ śuketi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:319.027a: tataḥ prativaco deyaṃ sarvair eva samāhitaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:319.027c: etan me snehataḥ sarve vacanaṃ kartum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:319.028c: samudrāḥ saritaḥ śailāḥ pratyūcus taṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.001a: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ brahmarṣiḥ sumahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.001c: prātiṣṭhata śukaḥ siddhiṃ hitvā lokāṃś caturvidhān

GE07mbh_12_u:320.002c: tataḥ sattvaṃ jahau dhīmāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:320.003a: tatas tasmin pade nitye nirguṇe liṅgavarjite

GE07mbh_12_u:320.004a: ulkāpātā diśāṃ dāhā bhūmikampās tathaiva ca

GE07mbh_12_u:320.007a: vavarṣa vāsavas toyaṃ rasavac ca sugandhi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:320.009c: udīcīṃ diśam āśritya rucire saṃdadarśa ha

GE07mbh_12_u:320.012a: tato mahān abhūc chabdo divi sarvadivaukasām
GE07mbh_12_u:320.012c: gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca ye ca śailanivāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.013a: dṛṣṭvā śukam atikrāntaṃ parvataṃ ca dvidhākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:320.013c: sādhu sādhv iti tatrāsīn nādaḥ sarvatra bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:320.014a: sa pūjyamāno devaiś ca gandharvair ṛṣibhis tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.019a: śukas tu mārutād ūrdhvaṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagām
GE07mbh_12_u:320.021a: sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ śukaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:320.021c: śaśaṃsur ṛṣayas tasmai karma putrasya tat tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.022c: svayaṃ pitrā svareṇoccais trīṃl lokān anunādya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:320.024a: tata ekākṣaraṃ nādaṃ bho ity eva samīrayan
GE07mbh_12_u:320.025a: tataḥ prabhṛti cādyāpi śabdān uccāritān pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:320.026a: antarhitaḥ prabhāvaṃ tu darśayitvā śukas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.026c: guṇān saṃtyajya śabdādīn padam adhyagamat param
GE07mbh_12_u:320.028c: āsādya tam ṛṣiṃ sarvāḥ saṃbhrāntā gatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.029a: jale nililyire kāś cit kāś cid gulmān prapedire
GE07mbh_12_u:320.029c: vasanāny ādaduḥ kāś cid dṛṣṭvā taṃ munisattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:320.030a: tāṃ muktatāṃ tu vijñāya muniḥ putrasya vai tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.030c: saktatām ātmanaś caiva prīto 'bhūd vrīḍitaś ca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:320.032a: tam uvāca mahādevaḥ sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.033a: agner bhūmer apāṃ vāyor antarikṣasya caiva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:320.033c: vīryeṇa sadṛśaḥ putras tvayā mattaḥ purā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.034a: sa tathālakṣaṇo jātas tapasā tava saṃbhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.035a: sa gatiṃ paramāṃ prāpto duṣprāpām ajitendriyaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.035c: daivatair api viprarṣe taṃ tvaṃ kim anuśocasi
GE07mbh_12_u:320.036a: yāvat sthāsyanti girayo yāvat sthāsyanti sāgarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:320.037c: drakṣyase tvaṃ ca loke 'smin matprasādān mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:320.038c: chāyāṃ paśyan samāvṛttaḥ sa muniḥ parayā mudā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.039a: iti janma gatiś caiva śukasya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:320.039c: vistareṇa mayākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:320.040a: etad ācaṣṭa me rājan devarṣir nāradaḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:320.040c: vyāsaś caiva mahāyogī saṃjalpeṣu pade pade
GE07mbh_12_u:320.041c: dhārayed yaḥ śamaparaḥ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:321.001c: ya icchet siddhim āsthātuṃ devatāṃ kāṃ yajeta saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.002a: kuto hy asya dhruvaḥ svargaḥ kuto niḥśreyasaṃ param
GE07mbh_12_u:321.002c: vidhinā kena juhuyād daivaṃ pitryaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.003a: muktaś ca kāṃ gatiṃ gacchen mokṣaś caiva kimātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.003c: svargataś caiva kiṃ kuryād yena na cyavate divaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.004a: devatānāṃ ca ko devaḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca tathā pitā
GE07mbh_12_u:321.004c: tasmāt parataraṃ yac ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:321.005a: gūḍhaṃ māṃ praśnavit praśnaṃ pṛcchase tvam ihānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:321.005c: na hy eṣa tarkayā śakyo vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api
GE07mbh_12_u:321.006a: ṛte devaprasādād vā rājañ jñānāgamena vā
GE07mbh_12_u:321.006c: gahanaṃ hy etad ākhyānaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ tavārihan
GE07mbh_12_u:321.007c: nāradasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣer nārāyaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.009c: naro nārāyaṇaś caiva hariḥ kṛṣṇas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.011a: aṣṭacakraṃ hi tad yānaṃ bhūtayuktaṃ manoramam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.012a: tapasā tejasā caiva durnirīkṣau surair api
GE07mbh_12_u:321.012c: yasya prasādaṃ kurvāte sa devau draṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:321.014a: nāradaḥ sumahad bhūtaṃ lokān sarvān acīcarat
GE07mbh_12_u:321.014c: taṃ deśam agamad rājan badaryāśramam āśugaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.015a: tayor āhnikavelāyāṃ tasya kautūhalaṃ tv abhūt
GE07mbh_12_u:321.015c: idaṃ tad āspadaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yasmiṃl lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.016c: ekā mūrtir iyaṃ pūrvaṃ jātā bhūyaś caturvidhā
GE07mbh_12_u:321.017c: aho hy anugṛhīto 'dya dharma ebhiḥ surair iha
GE07mbh_12_u:321.018a: tatra kṛṣṇo hariś caiva kasmiṃś cit kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:321.018c: sthitau dharmottarau hy etau tathā tapasi dhiṣṭhitau
GE07mbh_12_u:321.019a: etau hi paramaṃ dhāma kānayor āhnikakriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:321.019e: kāṃ devatāṃ nu yajataḥ pitṝn vā kān mahāmatī
GE07mbh_12_u:321.020a: iti saṃcintya manasā bhaktyā nārāyaṇasya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:321.021a: kṛte daive ca pitrye ca tatas tābhyāṃ nirīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.022a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryam apūrvaṃ vidhivistaram
GE07mbh_12_u:321.024c: tvam ajaḥ śāśvato dhātā mato 'mṛtam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.024e: pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhūtabhavyaṃ tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:321.025a: catvāro hy āśramā deva sarve gārhasthyamūlakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.026a: pitā mātā ca sarvasya jagataḥ śāśvato guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.026c: kaṃ tv adya yajase devaṃ pitaraṃ kaṃ na vidmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:321.026d-0800_01: kam arcasi mahābhāga tan me brūhīha pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.027c: tava bhaktimato brahman vakṣyāmi tu yathātatham
GE07mbh_12_u:321.028a: yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.028c: indriyair indriyārthaiś ca sarvabhūtaiś ca varjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.029a: sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:321.030a: avyaktā vyaktabhāvasthā yā sā prakṛtir avyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:321.030c: tāṃ yonim āvayor viddhi yo 'sau sadasadātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.030e: āvābhyāṃ pūjyate 'sau hi daive pitrye ca kalpite
GE07mbh_12_u:321.031a: nāsti tasmāt paro 'nyo hi pitā devo 'tha vā dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.031c: ātmā hi nau sa vijñeyas tatas taṃ pūjayāvahe
GE07mbh_12_u:321.032c: daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kartavyam iti tasyānuśāsanam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.033a: brahmā sthāṇur manur dakṣo bhṛgur dharmas tapo damaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.033c: marīcir aṅgirātriś ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.034a: vasiṣṭhaḥ parameṣṭhī ca vivasvān soma eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.034c: kardamaś cāpi yaḥ proktaḥ krodho vikrīta eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.036a: daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca satataṃ tasya vijñāya tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.037a: svargasthā api ye ke cit taṃ namasyanti dehinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.038a: ye hīnāḥ saptadaśabhir guṇaiḥ karmabhir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:321.038c: kalāḥ pañcadaśa tyaktvā te muktā iti niścayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.039a: muktānāṃ tu gatir brahman kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.039c: sa hi sarvagataś caiva nirguṇaś caiva kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:321.040a: dṛśyate jñānayogena āvāṃ ca prasṛtau tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.040c: evaṃ jñātvā tam ātmānaṃ pūjayāvaḥ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:321.041c: bhaktyā saṃpūjayanty ādyaṃ gatiṃ caiṣāṃ dadāti saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.042a: ye tu tadbhāvitā loke ekāntitvaṃ samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:321.042c: etad abhyadhikaṃ teṣāṃ yat te taṃ praviśanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:321.043c: bhaktyā premṇā ca viprarṣe asmadbhaktyā ca te śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.001a: sa evam ukto dvipadāṃ variṣṭho; nārāyaṇenottamapūruṣeṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:322.001c: jagāda vākyaṃ dvipadāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; nārāyaṇaṃ lokahitādhivāsam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.002a: yadartham ātmaprabhaveha janma; tavottamaṃ dharmagṛhe caturdhā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.002c: tat sādhyatāṃ lokahitārtham adya; gacchāmi draṣṭuṃ prakṛtiṃ tavādyām
GE07mbh_12_u:322.003a: vedāḥ svadhītā mama lokanātha; taptaṃ tapo nānṛtam uktapūrvam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.003c: pūjāṃ gurūṇāṃ satataṃ karomi; parasya guhyaṃ na ca bhinnapūrvam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.004a: guptāni catvāri yathāgamaṃ me; śatrau ca mitre ca samo 'smi nityam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.004c: taṃ cādidevaṃ satataṃ prapanna; ekāntabhāvena vṛṇomy ajasram
GE07mbh_12_u:322.004e: ebhir viśeṣaiḥ pariśuddhasattvaḥ; kasmān na paśyeyam anantam īśam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.005a: tat pārameṣṭhyasya vaco niśamya; nārāyaṇaḥ sātvatadharmagoptā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.005c: gaccheti taṃ nāradam uktavān sa; saṃpūjayitvātmavidhikriyābhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.006a: tato visṛṣṭaḥ parameṣṭhiputraḥ; so 'bhyarcayitvā tam ṛṣiṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.007a: tatrāvatasthe ca munir muhūrtam; ekāntam āsādya gireḥ sa śṛṅge
GE07mbh_12_u:322.008a: kṣīrodadher uttarato hi dvīpaḥ; śvetaḥ sa nāmnā prathito viśālaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.008c: meroḥ sahasraiḥ sa hi yojanānāṃ; dvātriṃśatordhvaṃ kavibhir niruktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.009a: atīndriyāś cānaśanāś ca tatra; niṣpandahīnāḥ susugandhinaś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:322.009c: śvetāḥ pumāṃso gatasarvapāpāś; cakṣurmuṣaḥ pāpakṛtāṃ narāṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:322.011a: ṣaṣṭyā dantair yuktāḥ śuklair; aṣṭābhir daṃṣṭrābhir ye
GE07mbh_12_u:322.012a: bhaktyā devaṃ viśvotpannaṃ; yasmāt sarve lokāḥ sūtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.012c: vedā dharmā munayaḥ śāntā; devāḥ sarve tasya visargāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.013c: kathaṃ te puruṣā jātāḥ kā teṣāṃ gatir uttamā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.014c: teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam etad dhi yac chvetadvīpavāsinām
GE07mbh_12_u:322.015a: tasmān me saṃśayaṃ chindhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:322.015c: tvaṃ hi sarvakathārāmas tvāṃ caivopāśritā vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.016a: vistīrṇaiṣā kathā rājañ śrutā me pitṛsaṃnidhau
GE07mbh_12_u:322.016c: saiṣā tava hi vaktavyā kathāsāro hi sa smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.016d-0802_02: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ purā prāha tatrāhaṃ śrutavān purā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.018a: dhārmiko nityabhaktaś ca pitṝn nityam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.020a: pitṛśeṣeṇa viprāṃś ca saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.022a: ātmā rājyaṃ dhanaṃ caiva kalatraṃ vāhanāni ca
GE07mbh_12_u:322.022c: etad bhagavate sarvam iti tat prekṣitaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.023c: sarvāḥ sātvatam āsthāya vidhiṃ cakre samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.025c: nānṛtā vāk samabhavan mano duṣṭaṃ na cābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:322.025e: na ca kāyena kṛtavān sa pāpaṃ param aṇv api
GE07mbh_12_u:322.026a: ye hi te munayaḥ khyātāḥ sapta citraśikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.026c: tair ekamatibhir bhūtvā yat proktaṃ śāstram uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.026d-0804_01: vedaiś caturbhiḥ samitaṃ kṛtaṃ merau mahāgirau
GE07mbh_12_u:322.028a: sapta prakṛtayo hy etās tathā svāyaṃbhuvo 'ṣṭamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.028c: etābhir dhāryate lokas tābhyaḥ śāstraṃ viniḥsṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.029c: idaṃ śreya idaṃ brahma idaṃ hitam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.029e: lokān saṃcintya manasā tataḥ śāstraṃ pracakrire
GE07mbh_12_u:322.030a: tatra dharmārthakāmā hi mokṣaḥ paścāc ca kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.030c: maryādā vividhāś caiva divi bhūmau ca saṃsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.031a: ārādhya tapasā devaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:322.031c: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai sarve te ṛṣibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:322.032c: viveśa tān ṛṣīn sarvāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.033c: śabde cārthe ca hetau ca eṣā prathamasargajā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.034a: ādāv eva hi tac chāstram oṃkārasvarabhūṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.034c: ṛṣibhir bhāvitaṃ tatra yatra kāruṇiko hy asau
GE07mbh_12_u:322.035c: ṛṣīn uvāca tān sarvān adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.036a: kṛtaṃ śatasahasraṃ hi ślokānām idam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.037a: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yonir etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:322.038a: tathā pramāṇaṃ hi mayā kṛto brahmā prasādajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.038c: rudraś ca krodhajo viprā yūyaṃ prakṛtayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.039a: sūryācandramasau vāyur bhūmir āpo 'gnir eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:322.039c: sarve ca nakṣatragaṇā yac ca bhūtābhiśabditam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.040c: sarve pramāṇaṃ hi yathā tathaitac chāstram uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.041c: asmāt pravakṣyate dharmān manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.044a: yuṣmatkṛtam idaṃ śāstraṃ prajāpālo vasus tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.045a: sa hi madbhāvito rājā madbhaktaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:322.045c: tena śāstreṇa lokeṣu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:322.046c: etad arthyaṃ ca dharmyaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ caitad uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.047c: sa ca rājā śriyā yukto bhaviṣyati mahān vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:322.048a: saṃsthite tu nṛpe tasmiñ śāstram etat sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:322.048c: antardhāsyati tat satyam etad vaḥ kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:322.049c: visṛjya tān ṛṣīn sarvān kām api prasthito diśam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.002a: bṛhad brahma mahac ceti śabdāḥ paryāyavācakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.002c: ebhiḥ samanvito rājan guṇair vidvān bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.004a: sa rājā bhāvitaḥ pūrvaṃ daivena vidhinā vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.004c: pālayām āsa pṛthivīṃ divam ākhaṇḍalo yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.005a: tasya yajño mahān āsīd aśvamedho mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.005c: bṛhaspatir upādhyāyas tatra hotā babhūva ha
GE07mbh_12_u:323.006a: prajāpatisutāś cātra sadasyās tv abhavaṃs trayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.006c: ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.007c: ṛṣir medhātithiś caiva tāṇḍyaś caiva mahān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.008a: ṛṣiḥ śaktir mahābhāgas tathā vedaśirāś ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.009c: kaṇvo 'tha devahotraś ca ete ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.010a: na tatra paśughāto 'bhūt sa rājaivaṃ sthito 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:323.011c: sākṣāt taṃ darśayām āsa so 'dṛśyo 'nyena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:323.013a: bṛhaspatis tataḥ kruddhaḥ sruvam udyamya vegitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.013c: ākāśaṃ ghnan sruvaḥ pātai roṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
GE07mbh_12_u:323.014c: grāhyaḥ svayaṃ hi devena matpratyakṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.015a: udyatā yajñabhāgā hi sākṣāt prāptāḥ surair iha
GE07mbh_12_u:323.015c: kimartham iha na prāpto darśanaṃ sa harir vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016a: tataḥ sa taṃ samuddhūtaṃ bhūmipālo mahān vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016c: prasādayām āsa muniṃ sadasyās te ca sarvaśaḥ uparicaravasur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_03: ity evam ukto vasunā saroṣaś cābravīd guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_04: na yajeyam ahaṃ cātra paribhūtas tvayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_05: tvayā paśur vāritaś ca kṛtaḥ piṣṭamayaḥ paśuḥ vasur uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_06: tvaṃ devaṃ paśyase nityaṃ na paśyeyam ahaṃ katham
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_08: ahaṃ na vāraye hiṃsāṃ drakṣyāmy ekāntiko harim bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_09: tasmāt kopo na kartavyo bhavatā guruṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_10: vasum evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu kruddha eva bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_11: uvāca ṛtvijaś caiva kiṃ naḥ karmeti vārayan
GE07mbh_12_u:323.016d-0806_12: athaikato dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.017a: ūcuś cainam asaṃbhrāntā na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:323.017b-0807_01: śṛṇu tvaṃ vacanaṃ putra asmābhiḥ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.017c: naiṣa dharmaḥ kṛtayuge yas tvaṃ roṣam acīkṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.018a: aroṣaṇo hy asau devo yasya bhāgo 'yam udyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.018c: na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭum asmābhir vā bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:323.018e: yasya prasādaṃ kurute sa vai taṃ draṣṭum arhati
GE07mbh_12_u:323.019a: vayaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ putrā mānasāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.019c: gatā niḥśreyasārthaṃ hi kadā cid diśam uttarām
GE07mbh_12_u:323.021c: sa deśo yatra nas taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.021e: kathaṃ paśyemahi vayaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tv iti
GE07mbh_12_u:323.021f-0809_01: vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ taṃ vai devadevaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.023a: yūyaṃ jijñāsavo bhaktāḥ kathaṃ drakṣyatha taṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:323.026c: gacchadhvaṃ tatra munayas tatrātmā me prakāśitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.027a: atha śrutvā vayaṃ sarve vācaṃ tām aśarīriṇīm
GE07mbh_12_u:323.030c: tataḥ punar varṣaśataṃ taptvā tātkālikaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:323.032c: mānaso nāma sa japo japyate tair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.033a: yā bhaven muniśārdūla bhāḥ sūryasya yugakṣaye
GE07mbh_12_u:323.033c: ekaikasya prabhā tādṛk sābhavan mānavasya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:323.034a: tejonivāsaḥ sa dvīpa iti vai menire vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.034c: na tatrābhyadhikaḥ kaś cit sarve te samatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.035c: sahasā dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma punar eva bṛhaspate
GE07mbh_12_u:323.036a: sahitāś cābhyadhāvanta tatas te mānavā drutam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.036c: kṛtāñjalipuṭā hṛṣṭā nama ity eva vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.037c: baliḥ kilopahriyate tasya devasya tair naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.038a: vayaṃ tu tejasā tasya sahasā hṛtacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.038c: na kiṃ cid api paśyāmo hṛtadṛṣṭibalendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.039c: jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana
GE07mbh_12_u:323.041c: divyāny uvāha puṣpāṇi karmaṇyāś cauṣadhīs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.042a: tair iṣṭaḥ pañcakālajñair harir ekāntibhir naraiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.042c: nūnaṃ tatrāgato devo yathā tair vāg udīritā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.042e: vayaṃ tv enaṃ na paśyāmo mohitās tasya māyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.043a: mārute saṃnivṛtte ca balau ca pratipādite
GE07mbh_12_u:323.044c: asmān na kaś cin manasā cakṣuṣā vāpy apūjayat
GE07mbh_12_u:323.046c: uvāca khasthaṃ kim api bhūtaṃ tatrāśarīrakam
GE07mbh_12_u:323.047c: dṛṣṭo bhavati deveśa ebhir dṛṣṭair dvijottamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.048c: na sa śakyo abhaktena draṣṭuṃ devaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:323.050a: mahat kāryaṃ tu kartavyaṃ yuṣmābhir dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.052a: tatas tad adbhutaṃ vākyaṃ niśamyaivaṃ sma somapa
GE07mbh_12_u:323.052c: tasya prasādāt prāptāḥ smo deśam īpsitam añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:323.053a: evaṃ sutapasā caiva havyakavyais tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:323.053c: devo 'smābhir na dṛṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:323.055c: brahmaśāpād divo bhraṣṭaḥ praviveśa mahīṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.057a: tasyaiva ca prasādena punar evotthitas tu saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:323.057e: parāṃ gatim anuprāpta iti naiṣṭhikam añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.001a: yadā bhakto bhagavata āsīd rājā mahāvasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.001c: kimarthaṃ sa paribhraṣṭo viveśa vivaraṃ bhuvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.002c: ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ tridaśānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:324.002d-0816_01: iyaṃ vai karmabhūmir hi svargo bhogāya kalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.002d-0816_02: tasmād indro mahīṃ prāpya yajamānas tu dīkṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.002d-0816_04: piṣṭam ānīyatām atra paśvartha iti bhāṣata
GE07mbh_12_u:324.002d-0816_05: tac chrutvā devatāḥ sarvā idam ūcur dvijottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.003a: ajena yaṣṭavyam iti devāḥ prāhur dvijottamān
GE07mbh_12_u:324.003c: sa ca chāgo hy ajo jñeyo nānyaḥ paśur iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.004a: bījair yajñeṣu yaṣṭavyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.004c: ajasaṃjñāni bījāni chāgaṃ na ghnantum arhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:324.005a: naiṣa dharmaḥ satāṃ devā yatra vadhyeta vai paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.005c: idaṃ kṛtayugaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kathaṃ vadhyeta vai paśuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.005d-0817_01: yuṣmākam ajabuddhir hi ajo bījaṃ tad ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:324.006a: teṣāṃ saṃvadatām evam ṛṣīṇāṃ vibudhaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:324.006c: mārgāgato nṛpaśreṣṭhas taṃ deśaṃ prāptavān vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.007a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasāyāntaṃ vasuṃ te tv antarikṣagam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.007c: ūcur dvijātayo devān eṣa chetsyati saṃśayam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.008c: kathaṃ svid anyathā brūyād vākyam eṣa mahān vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.009a: evaṃ te saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā vibudhā ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.010a: bho rājan kena yaṣṭavyam ajenāho svid auṣadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.010c: etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ chindhi pramāṇaṃ no bhavān mataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.011a: sa tān kṛtāñjalir bhūtvā paripapraccha vai vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.011c: kasya vaḥ ko mataḥ pakṣo brūta satyaṃ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.012a: dhānyair yaṣṭavyam ity eṣa pakṣo 'smākaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_12_u:324.012c: devānāṃ tu paśuḥ pakṣo mato rājan vadasva naḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.013a: devānāṃ tu mataṃ jñātvā vasunā pakṣasaṃśrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:324.013c: chāgenājena yaṣṭavyam evam uktaṃ vacas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.014a: kupitās te tataḥ sarve munayaḥ sūryavarcasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.015a: surapakṣo gṛhītas te yasmāt tasmād divaḥ pata
GE07mbh_12_u:324.015c: adya prabhṛti te rājann ākāśe vihatā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.015f-0818_01: viruddhaṃ vedasūtrāṇām uktaṃ yadi bhaven nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:324.016c: adho vai saṃbabhūvāśu bhūmer vivarago nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.016e: smṛtis tv enaṃ na prajahau tadā nārāyaṇājñayā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.017a: devās tu sahitāḥ sarve vasoḥ śāpavimokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.017c: cintayām āsur avyagrāḥ sukṛtaṃ hi nṛpasya tat
GE07mbh_12_u:324.018c: asya pratipriyaṃ kāryaṃ sahitair no divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.019a: iti buddhyā vyavasyāśu gatvā niścayam īśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.020c: kāmaṃ sa tava tuṣṭātmā kuryāc chāpavimokṣaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.021a: mānanā tu dvijātīnāṃ kartavyā vai mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:324.022a: yatas tvaṃ sahasā bhraṣṭa ākāśān medinītalam
GE07mbh_12_u:324.022c: ekaṃ tv anugrahaṃ tubhyaṃ dadmo vai nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:324.023c: bhūmer vivarago bhūtvā tāvantaṃ kālam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:324.023e: yajñeṣu suhutāṃ viprair vasor dhārāṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.024a: prāpsyase 'smadanudhyānān mā ca tvāṃ glānir āspṛśet
GE07mbh_12_u:324.024c: na kṣutpipāse rājendra bhūmeś chidre bhaviṣyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.025c: sa devo 'smadvarāt prīto brahmalokaṃ hi neṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:324.026a: evaṃ dattvā varaṃ rājñe sarve tatra divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.026b-0822_01: kratuṃ samāpya piṣṭena munīnāṃ vacanāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.026c: gatāḥ svabhavanaṃ devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.026d-0823_01: gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ sarve gatāḥ svān āśramān punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.026d-0823_03: vasur vivaragas tatra vyalīkasya phalād guroḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.027a: cakre ca satataṃ pūjāṃ viṣvaksenāya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:324.028c: ayajad dhariṃ surapatiṃ bhūmer vivarago 'pi san
GE07mbh_12_u:324.029a: tato 'sya tuṣṭo bhagavān bhaktyā nārāyaṇo hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.031c: samrāḍ rājā vasur nāma dharmātmā māṃ samāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.032c: mānitās te tu viprendrās tvaṃ tu gaccha dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:324.034c: viveśa vivaraṃ bhūmer yatrāste vāgyato vasuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.035b-0824_01: gṛhītvā taṃ vasuṃ bhaktaṃ sahasā vasudhātalāt
GE07mbh_12_u:324.035c: utpapāta nabhas tūrṇaṃ tatra cainam amuñcata
GE07mbh_12_u:324.038a: kevalaṃ puruṣas tena sevito harir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.038c: tataḥ śīghraṃ jahau śāpaṃ brahmalokam avāpa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:324.039a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ te bhūtā mānavā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:324.039c: nārado 'pi yathā śvetaṃ dvīpaṃ sa gatavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:324.039e: tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:325.001a: prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:325.001c: dadarśa tān eva narāñ śvetāṃś candraprabhāñ śubhān
GE07mbh_12_u:325.001d-0825_02: baddhāñjalipuṭān hṛṣṭāñ jitaṃ ta iti vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:325.002a: pūjayām āsa śirasā manasā taiś ca pūjitaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:326.055c: devānāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca pitā hy eko 'ham āditaḥ

GE07mbh_12_u:326.119c: sa hi mātā pitā caiva kṛtsnasya jagato guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:326.123a: yo hy asmākaṃ guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:326.123c: sa jagau paramaṃ japyaṃ nārāyaṇam udīrayan
GE07mbh_12_u:326.124c: pūjayitvā ca deveśaṃ punar āyāt svam āśramam bhīṣma uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:326.124d-0859_02: pāraṃparyāgataṃ hy etat pitrā me kathitaṃ purā sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:326.124d-0860_02: janamejayena yac chrutvā kṛtaṃ samyag yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:326.124d-0860_03: yūyaṃ hi taptatapasaḥ sarve ca caritavratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.001a: kathaṃ sa bhagavān devo yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.002c: pravṛttidharmān vidadhe sa eva bhagavān prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.004a: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ vipra chindhi guhyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.004c: tvayā nārāyaṇakathā śrutā vai dharmasaṃhitā sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:327.004d-0861_01: janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaḥ śiṣyo vyāsasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.005e: mokṣaś coktas tvayā brahman nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_12_u:327.008a: kiṃ nu brahmā ca rudraś ca śakraś ca balabhit prabhuḥ
