GE07mbh_12_u:327.008c: sūryas tārādhipo vāyur agnir varuṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:327.008e: ākāśaṃ jagatī caiva ye ca śeṣā divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.009c: tatas te nāsthitā mārgaṃ dhruvam akṣayam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.011a: etan me saṃśayaṃ vipra hṛdi śalyam ivārpitam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.012a: kathaṃ bhāgaharāḥ proktā devatāḥ kratuṣu dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:327.013a: ye ca bhāgaṃ pragṛhṇanti yajñeṣu dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:327.013c: te yajanto mahāyajñaiḥ kasya bhāgaṃ dadanti vai
GE07mbh_12_u:327.014a: aho gūḍhatamaḥ praśnas tvayā pṛṣṭo janeśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:327.015a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan me pṛṣṭaḥ purā guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.016a: sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.016c: ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai pañcamaś ca śukaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.017a: etān samāgatān sarvān pañca śiṣyān damānvitān
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019a: teṣām abhyasyatāṃ vedān kadā cit saṃśayo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019b-0862_01: kiṃ tu brahmātha rudro vā devatā ṛṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019b-0862_03: ke vai nivṛttimārgasthāḥ kasya devasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019b-0862_04: ke vai yajante sarve 'pi ka eṣām īśvaraḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019c: eṣa vai yas tvayā pṛṣṭas tena teṣāṃ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.019e: tataḥ śruto mayā cāpi tavākhyeyo 'dya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:327.020c: parāśarasutaḥ śrīmān vyāso vākyam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_12_u:327.021a: mayā hi sumahat taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.021c: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca jānīyām iti sattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.023c: tac chṛṇudhvaṃ yathājñānaṃ vakṣye saṃśayam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.023e: yathā vṛttaṃ hi kalpādau dṛṣṭaṃ me jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.025a: tasmāt prasūtam avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.026a: aniruddho hi lokeṣu mahān ātmeti kathyate
GE07mbh_12_u:327.026c: yo 'sau vyaktatvam āpanno nirmame ca pitāmaham
GE07mbh_12_u:327.026e: so 'haṃkāra iti proktaḥ sarvatejomayo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.027a: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.028c: bhūtebhyaś caiva niṣpannā mūrtimanto 'ṣṭa tāñ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:327.029a: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.029c: vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātmā vai manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.029e: jñeyāḥ prakṛtayo 'ṣṭau tā yāsu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.030e: aṣṭābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaś ca jātaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.031a: rudro roṣātmako jāto daśānyān so 'sṛjat svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.031c: ekādaśaite rudrās tu vikārāḥ puruṣāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.032a: te rudrāḥ prakṛtiś caiva sarve caiva surarṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.033a: vayaṃ hi sṛṣṭā bhagavaṃs tvayā vai prabhaviṣṇunā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.035c: evam ukto mahādevo devāṃs tān idam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:327.036a: sādhv ahaṃ jñāpito devā yuṣmābhir bhadram astu vaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.036c: mamāpy eṣā samutpannā cintā yā bhavatāṃ matā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.037c: kathaṃ balakṣayo na syād yuṣmākaṃ hy ātmanaś ca me
GE07mbh_12_u:327.038c: mahāpuruṣam avyaktaṃ sa no vakṣyati yad dhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.039a: tatas te brahmaṇā sārdham ṛṣayo vibudhās tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.041a: ūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭir bāhavaś ca ekāgraṃ ca mano 'bhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.042a: divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te tapas taptvā tad uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.043a: bho bhoḥ sabrahmakā devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.043c: svāgatenārcya vaḥ sarvāñ śrāvaye vākyam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.044a: vijñātaṃ vo mayā kāryaṃ tac ca lokahitaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.046c: yūyaṃ ca vibudhaśreṣṭhā māṃ yajadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.047a: sarve bhāgān kalpayadhvaṃ yajñeṣu mama nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.048c: tatas te vibudhāḥ sarve brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.049c: tasmin satre tadā brahmā svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.049e: devā devarṣayaś caiva sarve bhāgān akalpayan
GE07mbh_12_u:327.050c: prāpur ādityavarṇaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ tamasaḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:327.050e: bṛhantaṃ sarvagaṃ devam īśānaṃ varadaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:327.051a: tato 'tha varado devas tān sarvān amarān sthitān
GE07mbh_12_u:327.052a: yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tathā samupāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.054a: yajñair ye cāpi yakṣyanti sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.054c: kalpayiṣyanti vo bhāgāṃs te narā vedakalpitān
GE07mbh_12_u:327.055a: yo me yathā kalpitavān bhāgam asmin mahākratau
GE07mbh_12_u:327.055c: sa tathā yajñabhāgārho vedasūtre mayā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.058a: yūyaṃ hi bhāvitā loke sarvayajñeṣu mānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.058c: māṃ tato bhāvayiṣyadhvam eṣā vo bhāvanā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:327.059a: ityarthaṃ nirmitā vedā yajñāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:327.059c: ebhiḥ samyak prayuktair hi prīyante devatāḥ kṣitau
GE07mbh_12_u:327.060c: mayā kṛtaṃ suraśreṣṭhā yāvat kalpakṣayād iti
GE07mbh_12_u:327.061a: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.061c: vasiṣṭha iti saptaite mānasā nirmitā hi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:327.062a: ete vedavido mukhyā vedācāryāś ca kalpitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.065a: saptaite mānasāḥ proktā ṛṣayo brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.067a: yato 'haṃ prasṛtaḥ pūrvam avyaktāt triguṇo mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:327.067c: tasmāt parataro yo 'sau kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.068a: yo yathā nirmito jantur yasmin yasmiṃś ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_12_u:327.068c: pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā tatphalaṃ so 'śnute 'vaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.069c: eṣa mātā pitā caiva yuṣmākaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.070a: asya caivānujo rudro lalāṭād yaḥ samutthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.072a: pradṛśyantāṃ ca karmāṇi prāṇināṃ gatayas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.073a: idaṃ kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartate
GE07mbh_12_u:327.073b-0864_01: tripādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.073e: catuṣpāt sakalo dharmo bhaviṣyaty atra vai surāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.074a: tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma trayī yatra bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.074c: prokṣitā yatra paśavo vadhaṃ prāpsyanti vai makhe
GE07mbh_12_u:327.074e: tatra pādacaturtho vai dharmasya na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.075a: tato vai dvāparaṃ nāma miśraḥ kālo bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.075c: dvipādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.075d-0865_01: tatra vadhyanti paśavo yūpeṣv atra nibadhyate
GE07mbh_12_u:327.076d-0866_01: devā devarṣayaś cocus tam evaṃvādinaṃ gurum
GE07mbh_12_u:327.077c: kathaṃ kartavyam asmābhir bhagavaṃs tad vadasva naḥ śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:327.078-0867_02: vastavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhir yatra dharmo na hīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:327.078a: yatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapaḥ satyaṃ damas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.078e: sa vai deśaḥ sevitavyo mā vo 'dharmaḥ padā spṛśet
GE07mbh_12_u:327.081a: taṃ devo darśayām āsa kṛtvā hayaśiro mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.083a: mūrdhnā praṇamya varadaṃ tasthau prāñjalir agrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.083c: sa pariṣvajya devena vacanaṃ śrāvitas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.084c: dhātā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ prabhur jagato guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.085a: yadā ca surakāryaṃ te aviṣahyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:327.086c: tenānuśiṣṭo brahmāpi svaṃ lokam acirād gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.087c: yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prokto yajñadhārī ca nityadā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.089a: sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃ; sa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.089c: yugānte sa suptaḥ susaṃkṣipya lokān; yugādau prabuddho jagad dhy utsasarja
GE07mbh_12_u:327.089d-0868_01: sa ādiḥ sa ca madhyaṃ vai buddhaḥ sṛjati vai jagat
GE07mbh_12_u:327.092a: aśvibhyāṃ pataye caiva marutāṃ pataye tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.094a: tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva pataye yaśaso 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:327.094c: vācaś ca pataye nityaṃ saritāṃ pataye tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.097a: evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ mayā vai jñānacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.097c: kathitaṃ tac ca vaḥ sarvaṃ mayā pṛṣṭena tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.098a: kriyatāṃ madvacaḥ śiṣyāḥ sevyatāṃ harir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.098c: gīyatāṃ vedaśabdaiś ca pūjyatāṃ ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:327.099a: ity uktās tu vayaṃ tena vedavyāsena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_12_u:327.099c: sarve śiṣyāḥ sutaś cāsya śukaḥ paramadharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:327.100a: sa cāsmākam upādhyāyaḥ sahāsmābhir viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:327.101a: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:327.101c: evaṃ me 'kathayad rājan purā dvaipāyano guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.102a: yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet
GE07mbh_12_u:327.103c: āturo mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:327.104a: kāmakāmī labhet kāmaṃ dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:327.104c: brāhmaṇaḥ sarvavedī syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:327.104e: vaiśyo vipulalābhaḥ syāc chūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:327.105a: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim
GE07mbh_12_u:327.106a: kṣemeṇa gacched adhvānam idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate pathi
GE07mbh_12_u:327.106c: yo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate sa tam āpnoti ca dhruvam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.106d-0869_01: ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:327.107a: idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ viniścitaṃ; mahātmanaḥ puruṣavarasya kīrtanam
GE07mbh_12_u:327.107c: samāgamaṃ carṣidivaukasām imaṃ; niśamya bhaktāḥ susukhaṃ labhante
GE07mbh_12_u:328.001a: astauṣīd yair imaṃ vyāsaḥ saśiṣyo madhusūdanam
GE07mbh_12_u:328.001c: nāmabhir vividhair eṣāṃ niruktaṃ bhagavan mama
GE07mbh_12_u:328.002c: śrutvā bhaveyaṃ yat pūtaḥ śaraccandra ivāmalaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.003a: śṛṇu rājan yathācaṣṭa phalgunasya harir vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.006a: yāni nāmāni te deva kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.007a: teṣāṃ niruktaṃ tvatto 'haṃ śrotum icchāmi keśava
GE07mbh_12_u:328.007c: na hy anyo vartayen nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ tvām ṛte prabho
GE07mbh_12_u:328.009a: sāṃkhye ca yogaśāstre ca āyurvede tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:328.010a: gauṇāni tatra nāmāni karmajāni ca kāni cit
GE07mbh_12_u:328.010e: kathyamānaṃ mayā tāta tvaṃ hi me 'rdhaṃ smṛtaḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.012a: yasya prasādajo brahmā rudraś ca krodhasaṃbhavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.012c: yo 'sau yonir hi sarvasya sthāvarasya carasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:328.013a: aṣṭādaśaguṇaṃ yat tat sattvaṃ sattvavatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:328.013c: prakṛtiḥ sā parā mahyaṃ rodasī yogadhāriṇī
GE07mbh_12_u:328.014c: tato yajñaś ca yaṣṭā ca purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.015a: brāhme rātrikṣaye prāpte tasya hy amitatejasaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.015e: tatra brahmā samabhavat sa tasyaiva prasādajaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.016a: ahnaḥ kṣaye lalāṭāc ca suto devasya vai tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.019d-0870_01: yo 'sau rudraḥ so 'ham asmi yo 'ham asmi śivaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.019d-0870_02: yathā rudras tathāhaṃ ca nāvayor antaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.020a: tasmin hi pūjyamāne vai devadeve maheśvare
GE07mbh_12_u:328.020c: saṃpūjito bhavet pārtha devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.021a: aham ātmā hi lokānāṃ viśvānāṃ pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:328.021c: tasmād ātmānam evāgre rudraṃ saṃpūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.022a: yady ahaṃ nārcayeyaṃ vai īśānaṃ varadaṃ śivam
GE07mbh_12_u:328.022c: ātmānaṃ nārcayet kaś cid iti me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.022e: mayā pramāṇaṃ hi kṛtaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartate
GE07mbh_12_u:328.023a: pramāṇāni hi pūjyāni tatas taṃ pūjayāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.023c: yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu
GE07mbh_12_u:328.024a: rudro nārāyaṇaś caiva sattvam ekaṃ dvidhākṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:328.025a: na hi me kena cid deyo varaḥ pāṇḍavanandana
GE07mbh_12_u:328.025c: iti saṃcintya manasā purāṇaṃ viśvam īśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:328.026a: na hi viṣṇuḥ praṇamati kasmai cid vibudhāya tu
GE07mbh_12_u:328.026c: ṛta ātmānam eveti tato rudraṃ bhajāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.027a: sabrahmakāḥ sarudrāś ca sendrā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.028a: bhaviṣyatāṃ vartatāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:328.028c: sarveṣām agraṇīr viṣṇuḥ sevyaḥ pūjyaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.029a: namasva havyadaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathā śaraṇadaṃ nama
GE07mbh_12_u:328.030a: caturvidhā mama janā bhaktā evaṃ hi te śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:328.031a: ye ca śiṣṭās trayo bhaktāḥ phalakāmā hi te matāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.032a: brahmāṇaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ ca yāś cānyā devatāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.032c: prabuddhavaryāḥ sevante mām evaiṣyanti yat param
GE07mbh_12_u:328.032e: bhaktaṃ prati viśeṣas te eṣa pārthānukīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.033a: tvaṃ caivāhaṃ ca kaunteya naranārāyaṇau smṛtau
GE07mbh_12_u:328.034a: jānāmy adhyātmayogāṃś ca yo 'haṃ yasmāc ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:328.035a: narāṇām ayanaṃ khyātam aham ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.035c: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.035e: ayanaṃ mama tat pūrvam ato nārāyaṇo hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.036a: chādayāmi jagad viśvaṃ bhūtvā sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.036c: sarvabhūtādhivāsaś ca vāsudevas tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.037a: gatiś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ prajānāṃ cāpi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:328.037c: vyāptā me rodasī pārtha kāntiś cābhyadhikā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:328.038a: adhibhūtāni cānte 'haṃ tad icchaṃś cāsmi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:328.038c: kramaṇāc cāpy ahaṃ pārtha viṣṇur ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.039a: damāt siddhiṃ parīpsanto māṃ janāḥ kāmayanti hi
GE07mbh_12_u:328.039c: divaṃ corvīṃ ca madhyaṃ ca tasmād dāmodaro hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.040a: pṛśnir ity ucyate cānnaṃ vedā āpo 'mṛtaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.040c: mamaitāni sadā garbhe pṛśnigarbhas tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:328.042a: tataḥ sa brahmaṇaḥ putra ādyo ṛṣivaras tritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.043a: sūryasya tapato lokān agneḥ somasya cāpy uta
GE07mbh_12_u:328.043c: aṃśavo ye prakāśante mama te keśasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.043e: sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur dvijasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.044e: bṛhaspatir athāvindat tāṃ patnīṃ tasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:328.045a: tato vai tam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ maithunopagataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.046c: etad bṛhaspatiḥ śrutvā cukrodha ca śaśāpa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:328.047c: tasmād andho jāsyasi tvaṃ macchāpān nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.048a: sa śāpād ṛṣimukhyasya dīrghaṃ tama upeyivān
GE07mbh_12_u:328.048c: sa hi dīrghatamā nāma nāmnā hy āsīd ṛṣiḥ purā
GE07mbh_12_u:328.049c: prayojayām āsa tadā nāma guhyam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:328.050c: sa cakṣuṣmān samabhavad gautamaś cābhavat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:328.051a: evaṃ hi varadaṃ nāma keśaveti mamārjuna
GE07mbh_12_u:328.051c: devānām atha sarveṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:328.052a: agniḥ somena saṃyukta ekayoni mukhaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:328.053D: ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.001c: eṣa me saṃśayo jātas taṃ chindhi madhusūdana
GE07mbh_12_u:329.003E: naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite
GE07mbh_12_u:329.003F: etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt
GE07mbh_12_u:329.003G: akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005A: tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005B: tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005C: yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005D: yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005E: kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.005H: bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryata iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007A: na hy ṛte mantrād dhavanam asti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007C: havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007D: ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007E: brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007F: tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.007G: yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.008B: agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.008C: evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.008D: agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati
GE07mbh_12_u:329.010a: brāhmaṇānāṃ matir vākyaṃ karma śraddhā tapāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:329.010c: dhārayanti mahīṃ dyāṃ ca śaityād vāry amṛtaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.011a: nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.011c: brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti pretya ceha ca bhūtaye
GE07mbh_12_u:329.012a: naiṣām ukṣā vardhate nota vāhā; na gargaro mathyate saṃpradāne
GE07mbh_12_u:329.012c: apadhvastā dasyubhūtā bhavanti; yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre brāhmaṇā vṛttihīnāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.013A: vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.013B: vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.013C: itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:329.014A: ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.014C: aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.014D: kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.015A: tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.015C: tair asya bhujagaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.015D: pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.016A: amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.016C: yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.017A: viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:329.017B: sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat parokṣam asurebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.018A: atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta
GE07mbh_12_u:329.018B: he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat parokṣam asmākam
GE07mbh_12_u:329.018D: tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.019B: putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi
GE07mbh_12_u:329.019D: sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt
GE07mbh_12_u:329.020A: hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān
GE07mbh_12_u:329.020B: yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.021B: tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja
GE07mbh_12_u:329.021C: tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitaṃ tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto
GE07mbh_12_u:329.021D: saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.022B: kva gamiṣyatha āsyatāṃ tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.022D: vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmaha iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.023A: atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.023D: ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān
GE07mbh_12_u:329.023E: athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede
GE07mbh_12_u:329.024A: devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:329.024E: tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.025A: tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.025B: sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026A: devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026B: sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026C: tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026E: te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026F: atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026-0871_01: evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt |1| sahasraṃ varṣāṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026-0871_02: aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām |2| tathety uktvendraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026-0871_03: svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy abhavat |3| indro dadhīco 'bhavat |4|
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026-0871_04: tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.026-0872_01: śrutir apy atra bhavati | indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:329.027A: tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot
GE07mbh_12_u:329.027B: tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna
GE07mbh_12_u:329.027D: tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna
GE07mbh_12_u:329.027-0873_01: takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.028A: tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsu saṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ prapede
GE07mbh_12_u:329.028B: tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa
GE07mbh_12_u:329.029A: atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.030A: atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.030B: nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.030C: atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.031B: sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm
GE07mbh_12_u:329.031C: sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām
GE07mbh_12_u:329.031D: subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.032C: aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaś cit tvam indrabhukteti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.032E: asti mama kiṃ cid vratam aparyavasitam
GE07mbh_12_u:329.032F: tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiś cid evāhobhir iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.033A: atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.033B: sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.033C: anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya
GE07mbh_12_u:329.034A: sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.034E: tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.035A: tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.035B: aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam
GE07mbh_12_u:329.035C: naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.036C: nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.036D: indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.037A: athendrāṇīm abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.037C: sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.038A: atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.038C: tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm
GE07mbh_12_u:329.038D: sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.038E: sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.039B: tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.039C: ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.039D: tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu
GE07mbh_12_u:329.040A: tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.040C: indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma
GE07mbh_12_u:329.040E: tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa
GE07mbh_12_u:329.041A: tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.041C: evam indro brahmatejaḥprabhāvopabṛṃhitaḥ śatruvadhaṃ kṛtvā svasthānaṃ prāpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.041-0874_01: vanitāsu rajaḥ | vṛkṣeṣu niryāsaḥ | giriṣu śambaḥ |
GE07mbh_12_u:329.041-0874_02: pṛthivyām ūṣarāḥ |1| te 'spṛśyāḥ |2| tasmād dhavir alavaṇaṃ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.041-0875_04: kathayitvā svakān praśnān svaṃ bhīmaṃ ca vimokṣyate |
GE07mbh_12_u:329.042A: ākāśagaṅgāgataś ca purā bharadvājo maharṣir upāspṛśaṃs trīn kramān kramatā viṣṇunābhyāsāditaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.042B: sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.044A: aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.044D: tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt
GE07mbh_12_u:329.044E: atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.044-0876_01: aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:329.045B: tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave
GE07mbh_12_u:329.045C: tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot
GE07mbh_12_u:329.045D: tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ gatvemam arthaṃ śaśaṃsuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.045E: bhagavann asmāsu tulyaprabhāvāsu somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.046C: dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasa iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.046J: tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.046M: meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.047A: sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe
GE07mbh_12_u:329.047B: tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.047C: sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.047D: tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto bhaviṣyatheti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.048A: nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat
GE07mbh_12_u:329.048B: tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:329.048F: etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:329.048G: tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:329.048-0877_01: punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva
GE07mbh_12_u:329.049A: himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame
GE07mbh_12_u:329.049B: bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.049C: tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.049D: tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
GE07mbh_12_u:329.050B: kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje
GE07mbh_12_u:330.001c: bodhayaṃs tāpayaṃś caiva jagad uttiṣṭhataḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_12_u:330.002a: bodhanāt tāpanāc caiva jagato harṣaṇaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:330.003c: varṇaś ca me hariśreṣṭhas tasmād dharir ahaṃ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.004a: dhāma sāro hi lokānām ṛtaṃ caiva vicāritam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.004c: ṛtadhāmā tato vipraiḥ satyaś cāhaṃ prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.005a: naṣṭāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ pūrvam avindaṃ vai guhāgatām
GE07mbh_12_u:330.005c: govinda iti māṃ devā vāgbhiḥ samabhituṣṭuvuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.006a: śipiviṣṭeti cākhyāyāṃ hīnaromā ca yo bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:330.006c: tenāviṣṭaṃ hi yat kiṃ cic chipiviṣṭaṃ hi tat smṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.007a: yāsko mām ṛṣir avyagro naikayajñeṣu gītavān
GE07mbh_12_u:330.007c: śipiviṣṭa iti hy asmād guhyanāmadharo hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:330.008a: stutvā māṃ śipiviṣṭeti yāsko ṛṣir udāradhīḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.009a: na hi jāto na jāye 'haṃ na janiṣye kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:330.009c: kṣetrajñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmād aham ajaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.010a: noktapūrvaṃ mayā kṣudram aślīlaṃ vā kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:330.010c: ṛtā brahmasutā sā me satyā devī sarasvatī
GE07mbh_12_u:330.011a: sac cāsac caiva kaunteya mayāveśitam ātmani
GE07mbh_12_u:330.011c: pauṣkare brahmasadane satyaṃ mām ṛṣayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.012a: sattvān na cyutapūrvo 'haṃ sattvaṃ vai viddhi matkṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.014a: kṛṣāmi medinīṃ pārtha bhūtvā kārṣṇāyaso mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:330.014c: kṛṣṇo varṇaś ca me yasmāt tasmāt kṛṣṇo 'ham arjuna
GE07mbh_12_u:330.015a: mayā saṃśleṣitā bhūmir adbhir vyoma ca vāyunā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.015c: vāyuś ca tejasā sārdhaṃ vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ tato mama
GE07mbh_12_u:330.016a: nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ saukhyaṃ dharmo 'sau para ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:330.016c: tasmān na cyutapūrvo 'ham acyutas tena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.017c: tayoḥ saṃdhāraṇārthaṃ hi mām adhokṣajam añjasā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.018c: te māṃ gāyanti prāgvaṃśe adhokṣaja iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.018d-0879_01: adho na kṣīyate yasmād vadanty anye 'py adhokṣajam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.019c: nānyo hy adhokṣajo loke ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:330.021a: trayo hi dhātavaḥ khyātāḥ karmajā iti ca smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.021c: pittaṃ śleṣmā ca vāyuś ca eṣa saṃghāta ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:330.022a: etaiś ca dhāryate jantur etaiḥ kṣīṇaiś ca kṣīyate
GE07mbh_12_u:330.023a: vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ khyāto lokeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:330.024a: kapir varāhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:330.024c: tasmād vṛṣākapiṃ prāha kaśyapo māṃ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.024d-0880_01: nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca kadā cid vidyate surāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.025a: na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ; kadā cid vidante surāś cāsurāś ca
GE07mbh_12_u:330.025c: anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ; pragīto 'ham īśo vibhur lokasākṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:330.026c: na ca pāpāni gṛhṇāmi tato 'haṃ vai śuciśravāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.027c: imām uddhṛtavān bhūmim ekaśṛṅgas tato hy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:330.028c: trikakut tena vikhyātaḥ śarīrasya tu māpanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:330.031a: hiraṇyagarbho dyutimān eṣa yaś chandasi stutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.031c: yogaiḥ saṃpūjyate nityaṃ sa evāhaṃ vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.032c: sahasraśākhaṃ yat sāma ye vai vedavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.032e: gāyanty āraṇyake viprā madbhaktās te 'pi durlabhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.033a: ṣaṭpañcāśatam aṣṭau ca saptatriṃśatam ity uta
GE07mbh_12_u:330.033c: yasmiñ śākhā yajurvede so 'ham ādhvaryave smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.034c: kalpayanti hi māṃ viprā atharvāṇavidas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.035a: śākhābhedāś ca ye ke cid yāś ca śākhāsu gītayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.036a: yat tad dhayaśiraḥ pārtha samudeti varapradam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.037c: pāñcālena kramaḥ prāptas tasmād bhūtāt sanātanāt
GE07mbh_12_u:330.038a: nārāyaṇād varaṃ labdhvā prāpya yogam anuttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.038c: kramaṃ praṇīya śikṣāṃ ca praṇayitvā sa gālavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.039c: jātīmaraṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ smṛtvā smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.042c: na caivākalpayad bhāgaṃ dakṣo rudrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:330.043c: sasarja śūlaṃ krodhena prajvalantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.044a: tac chūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā dakṣayajñaṃ savistaram
GE07mbh_12_u:330.046a: tac ca śūlaṃ vinirdhūtaṃ huṃkāreṇa mahātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.047a: atha rudra upādhāvat tāv ṛṣī tapasānvitau
GE07mbh_12_u:330.047c: tata enaṃ samuddhūtaṃ kaṇṭhe jagrāha pāṇinā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.048c: mantraiś ca saṃyuyojāśu so 'bhavat paraśur mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:330.049a: kṣiptaś ca sahasā rudre khaṇḍanaṃ prāptavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.049d-0881_01: rudrasya bhāgaṃ pradadur bhāgam uccheṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.049d-0881_02: śrutir apy atra bhavati vedair uktas tathā punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.049d-0881_03: uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve
GE07mbh_12_u:330.050a: asmin yuddhe tu vārṣṇeya trailokyamathane tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.050c: jayaṃ kaḥ prāptavāṃs tatra śaṃsaitan me janārdana
GE07mbh_12_u:330.051c: udvignāḥ sahasā kṛtsnā lokāḥ sarve 'bhavaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.052a: nāgṛhṇāt pāvakaḥ śubhraṃ makheṣu suhutaṃ haviḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.052c: vedā na pratibhānti sma ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:330.053a: devān rajas tamaś caiva samāviviśatus tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.053c: vasudhā saṃcakampe 'tha nabhaś ca vipaphāla ha
GE07mbh_12_u:330.054a: niṣprabhāṇi ca tejāṃsi brahmā caivāsanāc cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.054c: agāc choṣaṃ samudraś ca himavāṃś ca vyaśīryata
GE07mbh_12_u:330.055c: brahmā vṛto devagaṇair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.055e: ājagāmāśu taṃ deśaṃ yatra yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_12_u:330.056c: uvāca vacanaṃ rudraṃ lokānām astu vai śivam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.057a: yad akṣaram athāvyaktam īśaṃ lokasya bhāvanam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.057c: kūṭasthaṃ kartṛnirdvaṃdvam akarteti ca yaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.059c: ahaṃ prasādajas tasya kasmiṃś cit kāraṇāntare
GE07mbh_12_u:330.059e: tvaṃ caiva krodhajas tāta pūrvasarge sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.060a: mayā ca sārdhaṃ varadaṃ vibudhaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.061a: brahmaṇā tv evam uktas tu rudraḥ krodhāgnim utsṛjan
GE07mbh_12_u:330.061c: prasādayām āsa tato devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:330.061e: śaraṇaṃ ca jagāmādyaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:330.062c: prītimān abhavat tatra rudreṇa saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.063a: ṛṣibhir brahmaṇā caiva vibudhaiś ca supūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.063c: uvāca devam īśānam īśaḥ sa jagato hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.064a: yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti yas tvām anu sa mām anu
GE07mbh_12_u:330.064c: nāvayor antaraṃ kiṃ cin mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:330.065a: adya prabhṛti śrīvatsaḥ śūlāṅko 'yaṃ bhavatv ayam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.065c: mama pāṇyaṅkitaś cāpi śrīkaṇṭhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:330.066c: sakhyaṃ caivātulaṃ kṛtvā rudreṇa sahitāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:330.067a: eṣa te kathitaḥ pārtha nārāyaṇajayo mṛdhe
GE07mbh_12_u:330.067c: nāmāni caiva guhyāni niruktāni ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:330.068c: brahmalokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.068e: mayā tvaṃ rakṣito yuddhe mahāntaṃ prāptavāñ jayam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.069a: yas tu te so 'grato yāti yuddhe saṃpraty upasthite
GE07mbh_12_u:330.069c: taṃ viddhi rudraṃ kaunteya devadevaṃ kapardinam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.070a: kālaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ krodhajeti mayā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:330.070c: nihatāṃs tena vai pūrvaṃ hatavān asi vai ripūn
GE07mbh_12_u:330.071c: namasva devaṃ prayato viśveśaṃ haram avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:330.071d-0882_01: yaḥ sa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ krodhajeti punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:330.071d-0882_02: tasya prabhāvam evāgryaṃ yac chrutaṃ te dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001c: yac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0002: na tathā phaladaṃ saute nārāyaṇakathā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0003: pāvitāṅgāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ śrutvemam āditaḥ kathām
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0006: devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ kṛtsnair anyaiś caiva maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0007: dṛṣṭavān nārado yatra devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0008: nūnam etad dhy anumataṃ tasya devasya sūtaja
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0010: yat prādravat punar bhūyo nārado devasattamau sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0011: naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0012: tasmin yajñe vartamāne rājñaḥ pārikṣitasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0014: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsam ṛṣiṃ vedanidhiṃ prabhum janamejaya uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0017: dhyāyatā bhagavadvākyaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ kim ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0018: badaryāśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:331.001d-032_0019: kiyantaṃ kālam avasat kāṃ kathāṃ pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.003a: navanītaṃ yathā dadhno malayāc candanaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.006c: ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā yac ca kiṃ cic carācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:331.006e: na tato 'sti paraṃ manye pāvanaṃ divi ceha ca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.007c: na tathā phaladaṃ cāpi nārāyaṇakathā yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.008a: sarvathā pāvitāḥ smeha śrutvemām āditaḥ kathām
GE07mbh_12_u:331.009a: na citraṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra yad āryo me dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.010a: na cāsya kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ manye lokeṣv api triṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:331.010c: trailokyanātho viṣṇuḥ sa yasyāsīt sāhyakṛt sakhā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.011a: dhanyāś ca sarva evāsan brahmaṃs te mama pūrvakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.011c: hitāya śreyase caiva yeṣām āsīj janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.012a: tapasāpi na dṛśyo hi bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.013c: na cālpatejasam ṛṣiṃ vedmi nāradam avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.013d-0883_01: dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_12_u:331.013e: śvetadvīpaṃ samāsādya yena dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.014c: yad dṛṣṭavāṃs tadā devam aniruddhatanau sthitam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.015a: badarīm āśramaṃ yat tu nāradaḥ prādravat punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.015c: naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ kiṃ nu tatkāraṇaṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:331.016c: badarīm āśramaṃ prāpya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_12_u:331.017a: kiyantaṃ kālam avasat kāḥ kathāḥ pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018c: tad etan me yathātattvaṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0884_01: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tadā rājñā parāśaryo mahāmuniḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0884_03: brūhy asmai sarvam akhilaṃ yad vṛttaṃ nāradasya ha
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0884_04: tayoḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā ca yathā sa kṛtavān punaḥ sūta uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0885_01: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0885_03: tad asmai sarvam ācakṣva yan mattaḥ śrutavān asi
GE07mbh_12_u:331.018d-0885_04: guror vacanam ājñāya sa tu viprarṣabhas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.019d-0886_01: nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:331.019d-0886_03: nāradena purā yā me gurave viniveditā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.020a: prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.020c: nivṛtto nārado rājaṃs tarasā merum āgamat
GE07mbh_12_u:331.021a: paścād asyābhavad rājann ātmanaḥ sādhvasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:331.021c: yad gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ kṣemī punar ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.022c: nipapāta ca khāt tūrṇaṃ viśālāṃ badarīm anu
GE07mbh_12_u:331.023a: tataḥ sa dadṛśe devau purāṇāv ṛṣisattamau
GE07mbh_12_u:331.028a: tau dṛṣṭvā nārado hṛṣṭas tābhyāṃ ca pratipūjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.031a: tatas tau tapasāṃ vāsau yaśasāṃ tejasām api
GE07mbh_12_u:331.032a: paścān nāradam avyagrau pādyārghyābhyāṃ prapūjya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:331.034a: atha nārāyaṇas tatra nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:331.035c: śvetadvīpe tvayā dṛṣṭa āvayoḥ prakṛtiḥ parā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.036c: sarve hi lokās tatrasthās tathā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.036e: adyāpi cainaṃ paśyāmi yuvāṃ paśyan sanātanau
GE07mbh_12_u:331.037a: yair lakṣaṇair upetaḥ sa harir avyaktarūpadhṛk
GE07mbh_12_u:331.037c: tair lakṣaṇair upetau hi vyaktarūpadharau yuvām
GE07mbh_12_u:331.038a: dṛṣṭau mayā yuvāṃ tatra tasya devasya pārśvataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.039a: ko hi nāma bhavet tasya tejasā yaśasā śriyā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.039c: sadṛśas triṣu lokeṣu ṛte dharmātmajau yuvām
GE07mbh_12_u:331.040a: tena me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ nāma kṣetrajñasaṃjñitam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.040c: prādurbhāvāś ca kathitā bhaviṣyanti hi ye yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:331.041c: pratibuddhāś ca te sarve bhaktāś ca puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.042a: te 'rcayanti sadā devaṃ taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.043e: sa kartā kāraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ cātibaladyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.043f-0887_01: hetuś cājñāvidhānaṃ ca tattvaṃ caiva mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.044a: tapasā yojya so ''tmānaṃ śvetadvīpāt paraṃ hi yat
GE07mbh_12_u:331.045a: śāntiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu siddhānāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_12_u:331.045c: etayā śubhayā buddhyā naiṣṭhikaṃ vratam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.046a: na tatra sūryas tapati na somo 'bhivirājate
GE07mbh_12_u:331.046c: na vāyur vāti deveśe tapaś carati duścaram
GE07mbh_12_u:331.047e: sāṅgān āvartayan vedāṃs tapas tepe suduścaram
GE07mbh_12_u:331.048a: yad brahmā ṛṣayaś caiva svayaṃ paśupatiś ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:331.049a: nāgāḥ suparṇā gandharvāḥ siddhā rājarṣayaś ca ye
GE07mbh_12_u:331.049c: havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca satataṃ vidhipūrvaṃ prayuñjate
GE07mbh_12_u:331.049e: kṛtsnaṃ tat tasya devasya caraṇāv upatiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_12_u:331.050c: tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.051c: vidyate triṣu lokeṣu tato 'smy aikāntikaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.051f-0888_05: tathā karmaphalāsaṅgo hy ekāntitvam idaṃ matam
GE07mbh_12_u:331.052a: evaṃ me bhagavān devaḥ svayam ākhyātavān hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:331.052c: āsiṣye tatparo bhūtvā yuvābhyāṃ saha nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.001a: dhanyo 'sy anugṛhīto 'si yat te dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.001c: na hi taṃ dṛṣṭavān kaś cit padmayonir api svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:332.002c: nāradaitad dhi te satyaṃ vacanaṃ samudāhṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:332.003a: nāsya bhaktaiḥ priyataro loke kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_12_u:332.003c: tataḥ svayaṃ darśitavān svam ātmānaṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:332.004a: tapo hi tapyatas tasya yat sthānaṃ paramātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.004c: na tat saṃprāpnute kaś cid ṛte hy āvāṃ dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:332.005a: yā hi sūryasahasrasya samastasya bhaved dyutiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.005c: sthānasya sā bhavet tasya svayaṃ tena virājatā
GE07mbh_12_u:332.006a: tasmād uttiṣṭhate vipra devād viśvabhuvaḥ pateḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.006c: kṣamā kṣamāvatāṃ śreṣṭha yayā bhūmis tu yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:332.007c: āpo yena hi yujyante dravatvaṃ prāpnuvanti ca
GE07mbh_12_u:332.008c: yena sma yujyate sūryas tato lokān virājate
GE07mbh_12_u:332.009a: tasmād devāt samudbhūtaḥ sparśas tu puruṣottamāt
GE07mbh_12_u:332.009c: yena sma yujyate vāyus tato lokān vivāty asau
GE07mbh_12_u:332.010c: ākāśaṃ yujyate yena tatas tiṣṭhaty asaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_12_u:332.013c: teṣāṃ vai kṣemam adhvānaṃ gacchatāṃ dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:332.014a: ādityadagdhasarvāṅgā adṛśyāḥ kena cit kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:332.014c: paramāṇubhūtā bhūtvā tu taṃ devaṃ praviśanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:332.015c: manobhūtās tato bhūyaḥ pradyumnaṃ praviśanty uta
GE07mbh_12_u:332.016a: pradyumnāc cāpi nirmuktā jīvaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:332.019a: āvām api ca dharmasya gṛhe jātau dvijottama
GE07mbh_12_u:332.019c: ramyāṃ viśālām āśritya tapa ugraṃ samāsthitau
GE07mbh_12_u:332.020a: ye tu tasyaiva devasya prādurbhāvāḥ surapriyāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.020c: bhaviṣyanti trilokasthās teṣāṃ svastīty ato dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:332.021c: āsthitābhyāṃ sarvakṛcchraṃ vrataṃ samyak tad uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:332.022a: āvābhyām api dṛṣṭas tvaṃ śvetadvīpe tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:332.023a: sarvaṃ hi nau saṃviditaṃ trailokye sacarācare
GE07mbh_12_u:332.023c: yad bhaviṣyati vṛttaṃ vā vartate vā śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:332.023d-0891_01: sarvaṃ sa te kathitavān devadevo mahāmune
GE07mbh_12_u:332.024a: etac chrutvā tayor vākyaṃ tapasy ugre 'bhyavartata
GE07mbh_12_u:332.026a: avasat sa mahātejā nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:332.026c: tam evābhyarcayan devaṃ naranārāyaṇau ca tau
GE07mbh_12_u:333.001a: kasya cit tv atha kālasya nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.001c: daivaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ pitryaṃ cakre tataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:333.002a: tatas taṃ vacanaṃ prāha jyeṣṭho dharmātmajaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.002c: ka ijyate dvijaśreṣṭha daive pitrye ca kalpite
GE07mbh_12_u:333.003a: tvayā matimatāṃ śreṣṭha tan me śaṃsa yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:333.003c: kim etat kriyate karma phalaṃ cāsya kim iṣyate
GE07mbh_12_u:333.004a: tvayaitat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ daivaṃ kartavyam ity api
GE07mbh_12_u:333.004c: daivataṃ ca paro yajñaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.005a: tatas tadbhāvito nityaṃ yaje vaikuṇṭham avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:333.005c: tasmāc ca prasṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.006a: mama vai pitaraṃ prītaḥ parameṣṭhy apy ajījanat
GE07mbh_12_u:333.007a: yajāmy ahaṃ pitṝn sādho nārāyaṇavidhau kṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:333.007c: evaṃ sa eva bhagavān pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.008a: śrutiś cāpy aparā deva putrān hi pitaro 'yajan
GE07mbh_12_u:333.008c: vedaśrutiḥ praṇaṣṭā ca punar adhyāpitā sutaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.008e: tatas te mantradāḥ putrāḥ pitṛtvam upapedire
GE07mbh_12_u:333.009c: putrāś ca pitaraś caiva parasparam apūjayan
GE07mbh_12_u:333.010a: trīn piṇḍān nyasya vai pṛthvyāṃ pūrvaṃ dattvā kuśān iti
GE07mbh_12_u:333.010c: kathaṃ tu piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ te pitaro lebhire purā
GE07mbh_12_u:333.011a: imāṃ hi dharaṇīṃ pūrvaṃ naṣṭāṃ sāgaramekhalām
GE07mbh_12_u:333.012a: sthāpayitvā tu dharaṇīṃ sve sthāne puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.013e: sthāpayām āsa vai pṛthvyāṃ kuśān āstīrya nārada
GE07mbh_12_u:333.014a: sa teṣv ātmānam uddiśya pitryaṃ cakre yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:333.014c: saṃkalpayitvā trīn piṇḍān svenaiva vidhinā prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.016c: ahaṃ hi pitaraḥ sraṣṭum udyato lokakṛt svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:333.017e: āśritā dharaṇīṃ piṇḍās tasmāt pitara eva te
GE07mbh_12_u:333.018a: trayo mūrtivihīnā vai piṇḍamūrtidharās tv ime
GE07mbh_12_u:333.018c: bhavantu pitaro loke mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.019c: aham evātra vijñeyas triṣu piṇḍeṣu saṃsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.020a: nāsti matto 'dhikaḥ kaś cit ko vābhyarcyo mayā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:333.020c: ko vā mama pitā loke aham eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.021c: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ devadevo vṛṣākapiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:333.024a: ye yajanti pitṝn devān gurūṃś caivātithīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:333.024c: gāś caiva dvijamukhyāṃś ca pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:333.024e: karmaṇā manasā vācā viṣṇum eva yajanti te
GE07mbh_12_u:333.025e: mahān mahātmā sarvātmā nārāyaṇa iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.002c: śrutvā bhagavadākhyānaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:334.003c: tasminn evāśrame ramye tepatus tapa uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:334.005a: naiva tasya paro loko nāyaṃ pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:334.005c: karmaṇā manasā vācā yo dviṣyād viṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_12_u:334.006a: majjanti pitaras tasya narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.006c: yo dviṣyād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:334.007a: kathaṃ nāma bhaved dveṣya ātmā lokasya kasya cit
GE07mbh_12_u:334.007c: ātmā hi puruṣavyāghra jñeyo viṣṇur iti sthitiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.008a: ya eṣa gurur asmākam ṛṣir gandhavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.008e: tasmāc chrutaṃ mayā cedaṃ kathitaṃ ca tavānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:334.009c: ko hy anyaḥ puruṣavyāghra mahābhāratakṛd bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:334.009e: dharmān nānāvidhāṃś caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:334.010a: vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:334.011a: etat tu mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā pārikṣito nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.012a: nārāyaṇīyam ākhyānam etat te kathitaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:334.012c: nāradena purā rājan gurave me niveditam
GE07mbh_12_u:334.013a: sa hi paramagurur bhuvanapatir; dharaṇidharaḥ śamaniyamanidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.013c: śrutivinayanidhir dvijaparamahitas; tava bhavatu gatir harir amarahitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.014a: tapasāṃ nidhiḥ sumahatāṃ mahato; yaśasaś ca bhājanam ariṣṭakahā
GE07mbh_12_u:334.014c: ekāntināṃ śaraṇado 'bhayado; gatido 'stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.015c: vidadhāti nityam ajito 'tibalo; gatim ātmagāṃ sukṛtinām ṛṣiṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:334.016a: taṃ lokasākṣiṇam ajaṃ puruṣaṃ; ravivarṇam īśvaragatiṃ bahuśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.016c: praṇamadhvam ekamatayo yatayaḥ; salilodbhavo 'pi tam ṛṣiṃ praṇataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:334.017a: sa hi lokayonir amṛtasya padaṃ; sūkṣmaṃ purāṇam acalaṃ paramam
GE07mbh_12_u:334.017c: tat sāṃkhyayogibhir udāradhṛtaṃ; buddhyā yatātmabhir viditaṃ satatam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.002a: pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yo yathā parikalpitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.002c: sa tathā naḥ śruto brahman kathyamānas tvayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:335.003a: yac ca tat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tvayā hayaśiro mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.003e: tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ bhagavatā brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.004a: kiṃ tad utpāditaṃ pūrvaṃ hariṇā lokadhāriṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.005c: tad aśvaśirasaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmā kim akaron mune
GE07mbh_12_u:335.006e: pāvitāḥ sma tvayā brahman puṇyāṃ kathayatā kathām
GE07mbh_12_u:335.007c: jagau yad bhagavān vyāso rājño dharmasutasya vai
GE07mbh_12_u:335.007d-0893_01: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi sarvaṃ tac chṛṇu śaunaka
GE07mbh_12_u:335.009a: yat tad darśitavān brahmā devaṃ hayaśirodharam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.010a: yat kiṃ cid iha loke vai dehabaddhaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.011a: īśvaro hi jagatsraṣṭā prabhur nārāyaṇo virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.012a: dharaṇyām atha līnāyām apsu caikārṇave purā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.012c: jyotirbhūte jale cāpi līne jyotiṣi cānile
GE07mbh_12_u:335.013c: vyakte manasi saṃlīne vyakte cāvyaktatāṃ gate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.014a: avyakte puruṣaṃ yāte puṃsi sarvagate 'pi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:335.014c: tama evābhavat sarvaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:335.016a: so 'niruddha iti proktas tat pradhānaṃ pracakṣate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.016c: tad avyaktam iti jñeyaṃ triguṇaṃ nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:335.017b-0895_01: ādikarmā sa bhūtānām aprameyo hariḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.017c: apsv eva śayanaṃ cakre nidrāyogam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.018a: tasya cintayataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ mahān ātmaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.020c: sattvasthaḥ parameṣṭhī sa tato bhūtagaṇān sṛjat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.021a: pūrvam eva ca padmasya patre sūryāṃśusaprabhe
GE07mbh_12_u:335.023a: sa tāmaso madhur jātas tadā nārāyaṇājñayā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.023c: kaṭhinas tv aparo binduḥ kaiṭabho rājasas tu saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.026c: sahasā jagṛhatur vedān brahmaṇaḥ paśyatas tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.027a: atha tau dānavaśreṣṭhau vedān gṛhya sanātanān
GE07mbh_12_u:335.028a: tato hṛteṣu vedeṣu brahmā kaśmalam āviśat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.028c: tato vacanam īśānaṃ prāha vedair vinākṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.029a: vedā me paramaṃ cakṣur vedā me paramaṃ balam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.029c: vedā me paramaṃ dhāma vedā me brahma cottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.030a: mama vedā hṛtāḥ sarve dānavābhyāṃ balād itaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.030c: andhakārā hi me lokā jātā vedair vinākṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.030e: vedān ṛte hi kiṃ kuryāṃ lokān vai sraṣṭum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.031a: aho bata mahad duḥkhaṃ vedanāśanajaṃ mama
GE07mbh_12_u:335.032a: ko hi śokārṇave magnaṃ mām ito 'dya samuddharet
GE07mbh_12_u:335.032c: vedāṃs tān ānayen naṣṭān kasya cāhaṃ priyo bhave
GE07mbh_12_u:335.033c: hareḥ stotrārtham udbhūtā buddhir buddhimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:335.033e: tato jagau paraṃ japyaṃ sāñjalipragrahaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.034a: namas te brahmahṛdaya namas te mama pūrvaja
GE07mbh_12_u:335.036c: tvatto me mānasaṃ janma prathamaṃ dvijapūjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.037a: cākṣuṣaṃ vai dvitīyaṃ me janma cāsīt purātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.037c: tvatprasādāc ca me janma tṛtīyaṃ vācikaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.038a: tvattaḥ śravaṇajaṃ cāpi caturthaṃ janma me vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:335.038c: nāsikyaṃ cāpi me janma tvattaḥ pañcamam ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.039a: aṇḍajaṃ cāpi me janma tvattaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vinirmitam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.039c: idaṃ ca saptamaṃ janma padmajaṃ me 'mitaprabha
GE07mbh_12_u:335.040a: sarge sarge hy ahaṃ putras tava triguṇavarjitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.042a: te me vedā hṛtāś cakṣur andho jāto 'smi jāgṛhi
GE07mbh_12_u:335.042c: dadasva cakṣuṣī mahyaṃ priyo 'haṃ te priyo 'si me
GE07mbh_12_u:335.043a: evaṃ stutaḥ sa bhagavān puruṣaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.043c: jahau nidrām atha tadā vedakāryārtham udyataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.044c: kṛtvā hayaśiraḥ śubhraṃ vedānām ālayaṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.046c: gaṅgā sarasvatī puṇyā bhruvāv āstāṃ mahānadī
GE07mbh_12_u:335.047a: cakṣuṣī somasūryau te nāsā saṃdhyā punaḥ smṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.047c: oṃkāras tv atha saṃskāro vidyuj jihvā ca nirmitā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.048a: dantāś ca pitaro rājan somapā iti viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.048c: goloko brahmalokaś ca oṣṭhāv āstāṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.049c: antardadhe sa viśveśo viveśa ca rasāṃ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.050a: rasāṃ punaḥ praviṣṭaś ca yogaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.050c: śaikṣaṃ svaraṃ samāsthāya om iti prāsṛjat svaram
GE07mbh_12_u:335.051a: sa svaraḥ sānunādī ca sarvagaḥ snigdha eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:335.052a: tatas tāv asurau kṛtvā vedān samayabandhanān
GE07mbh_12_u:335.052c: rasātale vinikṣipya yataḥ śabdas tato drutau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.053e: prādāc ca brahmaṇe bhūyas tataḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.055a: atha kiṃ cid apaśyantau dānavau madhukaiṭabhau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.055c: punar ājagmatus tatra vegitau paśyatāṃ ca tau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.055e: yatra vedā vinikṣiptās tat sthānaṃ śūnyam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:335.056a: tata uttamam āsthāya vegaṃ balavatāṃ varau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.056c: punar uttasthatuḥ śīghraṃ rasānām ālayāt tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.056e: dadṛśāte ca puruṣaṃ tam evādikaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:335.059c: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavendrau tau mahāhāsam amuñcatām
GE07mbh_12_u:335.060a: ūcatuś ca samāviṣṭau rajasā tamasā ca tau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.060c: ayaṃ sa puruṣaḥ śvetaḥ śete nidrām upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.061a: anena nūnaṃ vedānāṃ kṛtam āharaṇaṃ rasāt
GE07mbh_12_u:335.061c: kasyaiṣa ko nu khalv eṣa kiṃ ca svapiti bhogavān
GE07mbh_12_u:335.062a: ity uccāritavākyau tau bodhayām āsatur harim
GE07mbh_12_u:335.063a: nirīkṣya cāsurendrau tau tato yuddhe mano dadhe
GE07mbh_12_u:335.063b-0896_01: vibuddhaḥ sumahātejā yodhayām āsa tāv ubhau
GE07mbh_12_u:335.063c: atha yuddhaṃ samabhavat tayor nārāyaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_12_u:335.066c: nirmame sa tadā lokān kṛtsnān sthāvarajaṅgamān
GE07mbh_12_u:335.068a: tau dānavau harir hatvā kṛtvā hayaśiras tanum
GE07mbh_12_u:335.068c: punaḥ pravṛttidharmārthaṃ tām eva vidadhe tanum vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:335.068d-0897_01: evaṃ sa bhagavān vyāso gurur mama viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.069c: paurāṇam etad ākhyātaṃ rūpaṃ varadam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:335.070a: yo hy etad brāhmaṇo nityaṃ śṛṇuyād dhārayeta vā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.070c: na tasyādhyayanaṃ nāśam upagacchet kadā cana
GE07mbh_12_u:335.071c: pāñcālena kramaḥ prāpto rāmeṇa pathi deśite
GE07mbh_12_u:335.072a: etad dhayaśiro rājann ākhyānaṃ tava kīrtitam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.072c: purāṇaṃ vedasamitaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_12_u:335.073a: yāṃ yām icchet tanuṃ devaḥ kartuṃ kāryavidhau kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:335.073c: tāṃ tāṃ kuryād vikurvāṇaḥ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_12_u:335.074a: eṣa vedanidhiḥ śrīmān eṣa vai tapaso nidhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.074c: eṣa yogaś ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca brahma cāgryaṃ harir vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.078a: apāṃ caiva guṇo rājan raso nārāyaṇātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.078c: jyotiṣāṃ ca guṇo rūpaṃ smṛtaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.080c: nārāyaṇaparaḥ kālo jyotiṣām ayanaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.081a: nārāyaṇaparā kīrtiḥ śrīś ca lakṣmīś ca devatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.082a: kāraṇaṃ puruṣo yeṣāṃ pradhānaṃ cāpi kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.082c: svabhāvaś caiva karmāṇi daivaṃ yeṣāṃ ca kāraṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.082d-0898_01: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
GE07mbh_12_u:335.082d-0898_02: vividhā ca tathā ceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
GE07mbh_12_u:335.084a: tattvam eko mahāyogī harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.085c: manīṣitaṃ vijānāti keśavo na tu tasya te
GE07mbh_12_u:335.086a: ye ke cit sarvalokeṣu daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kurvate
GE07mbh_12_u:335.086c: dānāni ca prayacchanti tapyanti ca tapo mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:335.087a: sarveṣām āśrayo viṣṇur aiśvaraṃ vidhim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.088a: ayaṃ hi nityaḥ paramo maharṣir; mahāvibhūtir guṇavān nirguṇākhyaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.088c: guṇaiś ca saṃyogam upaiti śīghraṃ; kālo yathartāv ṛtusaṃprayuktaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:335.089a: naivāsya vindanti gatiṃ mahātmano; na cāgatiṃ kaś cid ihānupasyati
GE07mbh_12_u:335.089c: jñānātmakāḥ saṃyamino maharṣayaḥ; paśyanti nityaṃ puruṣaṃ guṇādhikam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.001a: aho hy ekāntinaḥ sarvān prīṇāti bhagavān hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.001c: vidhiprayuktāṃ pūjāṃ ca gṛhṇāti bhagavān svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.003a: caturthyāṃ caiva te gatyāṃ gacchanti puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.003c: ekāntinas tu puruṣā gacchanti paramaṃ padam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.004c: agatvā gatayas tisro yad gacchanty avyayaṃ harim
GE07mbh_12_u:336.005a: sahopaniṣadān vedān ye viprāḥ samyag āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.005c: paṭhanti vidhim āsthāya ye cāpi yatidharmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.006a: tebhyo viśiṣṭāṃ jānāmi gatim ekāntināṃ nṛṇām
GE07mbh_12_u:336.006c: kenaiṣa dharmaḥ kathito devena ṛṣiṇāpi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.007a: ekāntināṃ ca kā caryā kadā cotpāditā vibho
GE07mbh_12_u:336.007c: etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
GE07mbh_12_u:336.008c: arjune vimanaske ca gītā bhagavatā svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.009a: āgatiś ca gatiś caiva pūrvaṃ te kathitā mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.009c: gahano hy eṣa dharmo vai durvijñeyo 'kṛtātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.010c: dhāryate svayam īśena rājan nārāyaṇena ha
GE07mbh_12_u:336.011a: etam arthaṃ mahārāja pṛṣṭaḥ pārthena nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.012a: guruṇā ca mamāpy eṣa kathito nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.012c: yathā tu kathitas tatra nāradena tathā śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:336.013e: tena dharmeṇa kṛtavān daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:336.014a: phenapā ṛṣayaś caiva taṃ dharmaṃ pratipedire
GE07mbh_12_u:336.014e: vaikhānasebhyaḥ somas tu tataḥ so 'ntardadhe punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.015a: yadāsīc cākṣuṣaṃ janma dvitīyaṃ brahmaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.015c: tadā pitāmahāt somād etaṃ dharmam ajānata
GE07mbh_12_u:336.015e: nārāyaṇātmakaṃ rājan rudrāya pradadau ca saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.016a: tato yogasthito rudraḥ purā kṛtayuge nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.016c: vālakhilyān ṛṣīn sarvān dharmam etam apāṭhayat
GE07mbh_12_u:336.016e: antardadhe tato bhūyas tasya devasya māyayā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.016f-0899_01: vālakhilyā mahātmāno dharmāya pradaduś ca tam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.017a: tṛtīyaṃ brahmaṇo janma yadāsīd vācikaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:336.017c: tatraiṣa dharmaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ svayaṃ nārāyaṇān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.018a: suparṇo nāma tam ṛṣiḥ prāptavān puruṣottamāt
GE07mbh_12_u:336.018c: tapasā vai sutaptena damena niyamena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:336.019a: triḥ parikrāntavān etat suparṇo dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.019c: yasmāt tasmād vrataṃ hy etat trisauparṇam ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:336.020c: suparṇāc cāpy adhigato dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.021c: vāyoḥ sakāśāt prāptaś ca ṛṣibhir vighasāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.022a: tebhyo mahodadhiś cainaṃ prāptavān dharmam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.023a: yadā bhūyaḥ śravaṇajā sṛṣṭir āsīn mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.024a: jagat sraṣṭumanā devo harir nārāyaṇaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.025a: atha cintayatas tasya karṇābhyāṃ puruṣaḥ sṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.026a: sṛja prajāḥ putra sarvā mukhataḥ pādatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.026c: śreyas tava vidhāsyāmi balaṃ tejaś ca suvrata
GE07mbh_12_u:336.027a: dharmaṃ ca matto gṛhṇīṣva sātvataṃ nāma nāmataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.028c: dharmaṃ cāgryaṃ sa jagrāha sarahasyaṃ sasaṃgraham
GE07mbh_12_u:336.030c: asṛjat sa tadā lokān kṛtsnān sthāvarajaṅgamān
GE07mbh_12_u:336.031a: tataḥ prāvartata tadā ādau kṛtayugaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_12_u:336.031c: tato hi sātvato dharmo vyāpya lokān avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.032c: pūjayām āsa deveśaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:336.034a: tataḥ svārociṣaḥ putraṃ svayaṃ śaṅkhapadaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.035a: tataḥ śaṅkhapadaś cāpi putram ātmajam aurasam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.035e: tataḥ so 'ntardadhe bhūyaḥ prāpte tretāyuge punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.036c: dharmam etaṃ svayaṃ devo harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.037c: sanatkumārād api ca vīraṇo vai prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.038a: vīraṇaś cāpy adhītyainaṃ raucyāya manave dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:336.041a: gṛhīto brahmaṇā rājan prayuktaś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_12_u:336.041c: adhyāpitāś ca munayo nāmnā barhiṣado nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.043c: antardadhe tato rājann eṣa dharmaḥ prabhor hareḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.044a: yad idaṃ saptamaṃ janma padmajaṃ brahmaṇo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.044c: tatraiṣa dharmaḥ kathitaḥ svayaṃ nārāyaṇena hi
GE07mbh_12_u:336.045c: pitāmahaś ca dakṣāya dharmam etaṃ purā dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:336.046a: tato jyeṣṭhe tu dauhitre prādād dakṣo nṛpottama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.046c: āditye savitur jyeṣṭhe vivasvāñ jagṛhe tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.047a: tretāyugādau ca punar vivasvān manave dadau
GE07mbh_12_u:336.048a: ikṣvākuṇā ca kathito vyāpya lokān avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.048c: gamiṣyati kṣayānte ca punar nārāyaṇaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.049a: vratināṃ cāpi yo dharmaḥ sa te pūrvaṃ nṛpottama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.050c: eṣa dharmo jagannāthāt sākṣān nārāyaṇān nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.051a: evam eṣa mahān dharma ādyo rājan sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.051c: durvijñeyo duṣkaraś ca sātvatair dhāryate sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.053c: trivyūhaś cāpi saṃkhyātaś caturvyūhaś ca dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:336.054a: harir eva hi kṣetrajño nirmamo niṣkalas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.056a: akartā caiva kartā ca kāryaṃ kāraṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:336.057e: ekāntino hi puruṣā durlabhā bahavo nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:336.058a: yady ekāntibhir ākīrṇaṃ jagat syāt kurunandana
GE07mbh_12_u:336.059a: evaṃ sa bhagavān vyāso gurur mama viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:336.061a: devaṃ paramakaṃ brahma śvetaṃ candrābham acyutam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.061d-0900_01: tad eva kevalaṃ sthānaṃ muktānāṃ paramaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_12_u:336.062c: na kurvanti kathaṃ viprā anye nānāvrate sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.063c: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:336.065c: nārāyaṇaparo mokṣas tato vai sāttvikaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.067a: manīṣiṇo hi ye ke cid yatayo mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.068a: jāyamānaṃ hi puruṣaṃ yaṃ paśyen madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.068c: sāttvikas tu sa vijñeyo bhaven mokṣe ca niścitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.069c: nārāyaṇātmake mokṣe tato yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:336.070a: nārāyaṇena dṛṣṭaś ca pratibuddho bhavet pumān
GE07mbh_12_u:336.070c: evam ātmecchayā rājan pratibuddho na jāyate
GE07mbh_12_u:336.071a: rājasī tāmasī caiva vyāmiśre prakṛtī smṛte
GE07mbh_12_u:336.071c: tadātmakaṃ hi puruṣaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:336.073a: kāmaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sattvasthā nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.073c: hīnāḥ sattvena sūkṣmeṇa tato vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.074b-0901_01: vada sarvaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:336.076a: evam ekaṃ sāṃkhyayogaṃ vedāraṇyakam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:336.077a: yathā samudrāt prasṛtā jalaughās; tam eva rājan punar āviśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:336.077c: ime tathā jñānamahājalaughā; nārāyaṇaṃ vai punar āviśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:336.078a: eṣa te kathito dharmaḥ sātvato yadubāndhava
GE07mbh_12_u:336.079a: evaṃ hi sumahābhāgo nārado gurave mama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.080c: sa evāyaṃ mayā tubhyam ākhyātaḥ prasṛto guroḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.081a: itthaṃ hi duścaro dharma eṣa pārthivasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:336.081c: yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivānye na bhajanti vimohitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:336.082a: kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānāṃ bhāvano mohanas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:336.082c: saṃhārakārakaś caiva kāraṇaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:337.001a: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ vedāraṇyakam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:337.001c: jñānāny etāni brahmarṣe lokeṣu pracaranti ha
GE07mbh_12_u:337.002a: kim etāny ekaniṣṭhāni pṛthaṅniṣṭhāni vā mune
GE07mbh_12_u:337.002c: prabrūhi vai mayā pṛṣṭaḥ pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.003a: jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃ; yaṃ dvīpamadhye ātmavantam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.005c: sasarja putrārtham udāratejā; vyāsaṃ mahātmānam ajaḥ purāṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.006c: vasiṣṭhasya sutaḥ śaktiḥ śakteḥ putraḥ parāśaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.010c: śuśrūṣāṃ tatparā rājan kṛtavanto vayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.011a: sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.011c: ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai śuko vyāsātmajas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.012a: ebhiḥ parivṛto vyāsaḥ śiṣyaiḥ pañcabhir uttamaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.013a: vedān āvartayan sāṅgān bhāratārthāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.013c: tam ekamanasaṃ dāntaṃ yuktā vayam upāsmahe
GE07mbh_12_u:337.014c: vedārthān bhāratārthāṃś ca janma nārāyaṇāt tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.015a: sa pūrvam uktvā vedārthān bhāratārthāṃś ca tattvavit
GE07mbh_12_u:337.018c: tataḥ sa prādurabhavad athainaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:337.019a: mama tvaṃ nābhito jātaḥ prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.019c: sṛja prajās tvaṃ vividhā brahman sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.020c: praṇamya varadaṃ devam uvāca harim īśvaram
GE07mbh_12_u:337.021a: kā śaktir mama deveśa prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_12_u:337.021c: aprajñāvān ahaṃ deva vidhatsva yad anantaram
GE07mbh_12_u:337.022a: sa evam ukto bhagavān bhūtvāthāntarhitas tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.022c: cintayām āsa deveśo buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.023a: svarūpiṇī tato buddhir upatasthe hariṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:337.023c: yogena caināṃ niryogaḥ svayaṃ niyuyuje tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.024a: sa tām aiśvaryayogasthāṃ buddhiṃ śaktimatīṃ satīm
GE07mbh_12_u:337.024c: uvāca vacanaṃ devo buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.025c: tatas tam īśvarādiṣṭā buddhiḥ kṣipraṃ viveśa sā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.026a: athainaṃ buddhisaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa dadṛśe hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.026c: bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.026d-0902_01: bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.028c: athāsya buddhir abhavat punar anyā tadā kila
GE07mbh_12_u:337.029a: sṛṣṭā imāḥ prajāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā daityadānavagandharvarakṣogaṇasamākulāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.031a: avaśyam eva taiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.031e: tatra nyāyyam idaṃ kartuṃ bhārāvataraṇaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.032c: nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa ca
GE07mbh_12_u:337.033c: mayā hy eṣā hi dhriyate pātālasthena bhoginā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.034a: mayā dhṛtā dhārayati jagad dhi sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:337.034c: tasmāt pṛthvyāḥ paritrāṇaṃ kariṣye saṃbhavaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.035a: evaṃ sa cintayitvā tu bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.036a: vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ mānuṣaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.039a: tam uvāca nataṃ mūrdhnā devānām ādir avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.039c: vedākhyāne śrutiḥ kāryā tvayā matimatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:337.039e: tasmāt kuru yathājñaptaṃ mayaitad vacanaṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:337.040a: tena bhinnās tadā vedā manoḥ svāyaṃbhuve 'ntare
GE07mbh_12_u:337.040c: tatas tutoṣa bhagavān haris tenāsya karmaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.040e: tapasā ca sutaptena yamena niyamena ca
GE07mbh_12_u:337.041c: bhaviṣyasy acalo brahmann apradhṛṣyaś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.042a: punas tiṣye ca saṃprāpte kuravo nāma bhāratāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.044c: kṛṣṇe yuge ca saṃprāpte kṛṣṇavarṇo bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:337.045a: dharmāṇāṃ vividhānāṃ ca kartā jñānakaras tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.045c: bhaviṣyasi tapoyukto na ca rāgād vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_12_u:337.046a: vītarāgaś ca putras te paramātmā bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:337.047a: yaṃ mānasaṃ vai pravadanti putraṃ; pitāmahasyottamabuddhiyuktam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.047c: vasiṣṭham agryaṃ tapaso nidhānaṃ; yaś cāpi sūryaṃ vyatiricya bhāti
GE07mbh_12_u:337.048a: tasyānvaye cāpi tato maharṣiḥ; parāśaro nāma mahāprabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.048c: pitā sa te vedanidhir variṣṭho; mahātapā vai tapaso nivāsaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.048e: kānīnagarbhaḥ pitṛkanyakāyāṃ; tasmād ṛṣes tvaṃ bhavitā ca putraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.050a: tāṃś ca sarvān mayoddiṣṭān drakṣyase tapasānvitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.051a: anādinidhanaṃ loke cakrahastaṃ ca māṃ mune
GE07mbh_12_u:337.051c: anudhyānān mama mune naitad vacanam anyathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.051d-0904_01: bhaviṣyati mahāsattva khyātiś cāpy atulā tava
GE07mbh_12_u:337.052e: tvam eva bhavitā vatsa matprasādān na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.052f-0905_01: yat kiṃ cid vidyate loke sarvaṃ tan madviceṣṭitam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.052f-0905_02: anyo hy anyaṃ cintayati svacchandaṃ vidadhāmy aham
GE07mbh_12_u:337.055a: tad etat kathitaṃ janma mayā pūrvakam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.056a: mayā hi sumahat taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.057a: etad vaḥ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchatha putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.057c: pūrvajanma bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhaktānāṃ snehato mayā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.058a: eṣa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃbhavo 'smadguror nṛpa
GE07mbh_12_u:337.059a: sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ vedāḥ pāśupataṃ tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:337.059c: jñānāny etāni rājarṣe viddhi nānāmatāni vai
GE07mbh_12_u:337.060a: sāṃkhyasya vaktā kapilaḥ paramarṣiḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:337.061c: prācīnagarbhaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ pravadantīha ke cana
GE07mbh_12_u:337.062c: uktavān idam avyagro jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.063a: pañcarātrasya kṛtsnasya vettā tu bhagavān svayam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.063c: sarveṣu ca nṛpaśreṣṭha jñāneṣv eteṣu dṛśyate
GE07mbh_12_u:337.064c: na cainam evaṃ jānanti tamobhūtā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:337.065c: niṣṭhāṃ nārāyaṇam ṛṣiṃ nānyo 'stīti ca vādinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.066a: niḥsaṃśayeṣu sarveṣu nityaṃ vasati vai hariḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:337.068a: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sanātane dve; vedāś ca sarve nikhilena rājan
GE07mbh_12_u:337.068c: sarvaiḥ samastair ṛṣibhir nirukto; nārāyaṇo viśvam idaṃ purāṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:337.069a: śubhāśubhaṃ karma samīritaṃ yat; pravartate sarvalokeṣu kiṃ cit
GE07mbh_12_u:337.069c: tasmād ṛṣes tad bhavatīti vidyād; divy antarikṣe bhuvi cāpsu cāpi
GE07mbh_12_u:338.001a: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmann utāho eka eva tu
GE07mbh_12_u:338.001c: ko hy atra puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ ko vā yonir ihocyate
GE07mbh_12_u:338.003a: bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ ca yathaikā yonir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:338.003c: tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi guṇādhikam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.005c: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca vikhyātam ṛṣisiṃhena cintitam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.007a: samāsatas tu yad vyāsaḥ puruṣaikatvam uktavān
GE07mbh_12_u:338.008c: brahmaṇā saha saṃvādaṃ tryambakasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:338.012c: agrataś cābhavat prīto vavande cāpi pādayoḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.013a: taṃ pādayor nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā savyena pāṇinā
GE07mbh_12_u:338.013c: utthāpayām āsa tadā prabhur ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.014c: svāgataṃ te mahābāho diṣṭyā prāpto 'si me 'ntikam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.015a: kaccit te kuśalaṃ putra svādhyāyatapasoḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:338.015c: nityam ugratapās tvaṃ hi tataḥ pṛcchāmi te punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.016c: kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva sarvasya jagatas tathā
GE07mbh_12_u:338.017c: tato 'haṃ parvataṃ prāptas tv imaṃ tvatpādasevitam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.018a: kautūhalaṃ cāpi hi me ekāntagamanena te
GE07mbh_12_u:338.018c: naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati pitāmaha
GE07mbh_12_u:338.019a: kiṃ nu tat sadanaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kṣutpipāsāvivarjitam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.020c: utsṛjyemaṃ girivaram ekākī prāptavān asi brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:338.022a: bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmaṃs tvayā sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
GE07mbh_12_u:338.022c: sṛjyante cāpare brahman sa caikaḥ puruṣo virāṭ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.023a: ko hy asau cintyate brahmaṃs tvayā vai puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.023c: etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:338.024a: bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:338.024c: evam etad atikrāntaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ naivam ity api
GE07mbh_12_u:338.024e: ādhāraṃ tu pravakṣyāmi ekasya puruṣasya te
GE07mbh_12_u:338.025a: bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sa yathaikā yonir ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:338.025c: tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ paramaṃ sumahattamam
GE07mbh_12_u:338.025e: nirguṇaṃ nirguṇā bhūtvā praviśanti sanātanam brahmovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:339.001a: śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.001c: akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca sarvagaś ca nirucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:339.002a: na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ mayānyair vāpi sattama
GE07mbh_12_u:339.002c: saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo jñānadṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.003c: vasann api śarīreṣu na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.004a: mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃjñitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.004c: sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūto 'sau na grāhyaḥ kena cit kva cit
GE07mbh_12_u:339.006a: kṣetrāṇi hi śarīrāṇi bījāni ca śubhāśubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:339.006c: tāni vetti sa yogātmā tataḥ kṣetrajña ucyate
GE07mbh_12_u:339.007a: nāgatir na gatis tasya jñeyā bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_12_u:339.007c: sāṃkhyena vidhinā caiva yogena ca yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.008a: cintayāmi gatiṃ cāsya na gatiṃ vedmi cottamām
GE07mbh_12_u:339.008c: yathājñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi puruṣaṃ taṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.009a: tasyaikatvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.010a: eko hutāśo bahudhā samidhyate; ekaḥ sūryas tapasāṃ yonir ekā
GE07mbh_12_u:339.010c: eko vāyur bahudhā vāti loke; mahodadhiś cāmbhasāṃ yonir ekaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.010e: puruṣaś caiko nirguṇo viśvarūpas; taṃ nirguṇaṃ puruṣaṃ cāviśanti
GE07mbh_12_u:339.011a: hitvā guṇamayaṃ sarvaṃ karma hitvā śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_12_u:339.011c: ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā evaṃ bhavati nirguṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.012a: acintyaṃ cāpi taṃ jñātvā bhāvasūkṣmaṃ catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.012c: vicared yo yatir yattaḥ sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_12_u:339.013a: evaṃ hi paramātmānaṃ ke cid icchanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.014a: tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityaṃ nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.014c: sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ sarvātmā puruṣo hi saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.014e: na lipyate phalaiś cāpi padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_12_u:339.015a: karmātmā tv aparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhaiḥ sa yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:339.015e: evaṃ bahuvidhaḥ proktaḥ puruṣas te yathākramam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.016a: yat tat kṛtsnaṃ lokatantrasya dhāma; vedyaṃ paraṃ bodhanīyaṃ saboddhṛ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.016c: mantā mantavyaṃ prāśitā prāśitavyaṃ; ghrātā ghreyaṃ sparśitā sparśanīyam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.017a: draṣṭā draṣṭavyaṃ śrāvitā śrāvaṇīyaṃ; jñātā jñeyaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:339.017c: yad vai proktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ pradhānaṃ; nityaṃ caitac chāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca
GE07mbh_12_u:339.018a: yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ; tad vai viprāḥ pravadante 'niruddham
GE07mbh_12_u:339.018c: yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu; āśīryuktaṃ tad dhi tasyopabhojyam
GE07mbh_12_u:339.019a: devāḥ sarve munayaḥ sādhu dāntās; taṃ prāg yajñair yajñabhāgaṃ yajante
GE07mbh_12_u:339.019c: ahaṃ brahmā ādya īśaḥ prajānāṃ; tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.019e: matto jagaj jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca; sarve vedāḥ sarahasyā hi putra
GE07mbh_12_u:339.020c: evaṃ sa eva bhagavāñ jñānena pratibodhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:339.021a: etat te kathitaṃ putra yathāvad anupṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:340.001c: dharmam āśramiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vaktum arhati me bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:340.003a: yasmin yasmiṃs tu viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:340.004a: api ca tvaṃ naravyāghra śrotum arhasi me kathām
GE07mbh_12_u:340.005c: paryeti kramaśo lokān vāyur avyāhato yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:340.006a: sa kadā cin maheṣvāsa devarājālayaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:340.007c: brahmarṣe kiṃ cid āścaryam asti dṛṣṭaṃ tvayānagha
GE07mbh_12_u:340.008a: yathā tvam api viprarṣe trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:340.009a: na hy asty aviditaṃ loke devarṣe tava kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_12_u:340.009c: śrutaṃ vāpy anubhūtaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ vā kathayasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:340.010a: tasmai rājan surendrāya nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:340.011a: yathā yena ca kalpena sa tasmai dvijasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:340.011c: kathāṃ kathitavān pṛṣṭas tathā tvam api me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:341.001c: gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīre kaś cid vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:341.004c: kule mahati vikhyāte viśiṣṭāṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:341.005a: sa putrān bahulān dṛṣṭvā vipule karmaṇi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:341.006a: tataḥ sa dharmaṃ vedoktaṃ yathāśāstroktam eva ca
GE07mbh_12_u:341.006c: śiṣṭācīrṇaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca trividhaṃ cintya cetasā
GE07mbh_12_u:341.007a: kiṃ nu me syāc chubhaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kṣamaṃ kiṃ parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:341.007c: ity evaṃ khidyate nityaṃ na ca yāti viniścayam
GE07mbh_12_u:341.008c: kadā cid atithiḥ prāpto brāhmaṇaḥ susamāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:341.009a: sa tasmai satkriyāṃ cakre kriyāyuktena hetunā
GE07mbh_12_u:341.009c: viśrāntaṃ cainam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_12_u:342.001c: mitratām abhipannas tvāṃ kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:342.002a: gṛhasthadharmaṃ viprendra kṛtvā putragataṃ tv aham
GE07mbh_12_u:342.002c: dharmaṃ paramakaṃ kuryāṃ ko hi mārgo bhaved dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:342.003a: aham ātmānam ātmastham eka evātmani sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.003c: kartuṃ kāṅkṣāmi necchāmi baddhaḥ sādhāraṇair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.005a: asmin hi lokasaṃtāne paraṃ pāram abhīpsataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.005c: utpannā me matir iyaṃ kuto dharmamayaḥ plavaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.006a: samuhyamānāni niśamya loke; niryātyamānāni ca sāttvikāni
GE07mbh_12_u:342.006c: dṛṣṭvā ca dharmadhvajaketumālāṃ; prakīryamāṇām upari prajānām
GE07mbh_12_u:342.007a: na me mano rajyati bhogakāle; dṛṣṭvā yatīn prārthayataḥ paratra
GE07mbh_12_u:342.007c: tenātithe buddhibalāśrayeṇa; dharmārthatattve viniyuṅkṣva māṃ tvam
GE07mbh_12_u:342.008c: provāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ prājño madhurayā girā
GE07mbh_12_u:342.009a: aham apy atra muhyāmi mamāpy eṣa manorathaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.009c: na ca saṃniścayaṃ yāmi bahudvāre triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_12_u:342.010a: ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.010c: vānaprasthāśramaṃ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.011a: rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid ātmaphalāśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:342.011c: gurucaryāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid vākyaṃ yam āśrayam
GE07mbh_12_u:342.012a: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cic chuśrūṣanto divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.012c: ahiṃsayā pare svargaṃ satyena ca tathā pare
GE07mbh_12_u:342.013a: āhave 'bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatāḥ svid divaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:342.014a: ke cid adhyayane yuktā vedavrataparāḥ śubhāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:343.001a: upadeśaṃ tu te vipra kariṣye 'haṃ yathāgamam
GE07mbh_12_u:343.001c: guruṇā me yathākhyātam arthatas tac ca me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:343.003a: samagrais tridaśais tatra iṣṭam āsīd dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:343.004c: padmanābho mahābhāgaḥ padma ity eva viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:343.005a: sa vācā karmaṇā caiva manasā ca dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:343.006c: viṣamasthaṃ janaṃ svaṃ ca cakṣurdhyānena rakṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:343.007a: tam abhikramya vidhinā praṣṭum arhasi kāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_12_u:343.007c: sa te paramakaṃ dharmaṃ namithyā darśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_12_u:343.010a: yajvā dānaruciḥ kṣānto vṛtte ca parame sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:344.001c: parāśvāsakaraṃ vākyam idaṃ me bhavataḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_12_u:344.002c: tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhārtasya ca bhojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:344.004c: prahrādayati māṃ vākyaṃ bhavatā yad udīritam
GE07mbh_12_u:344.005c: prajñānavacanād yo 'yam upadeśo hi me kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:344.005e: bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā māṃ bhāṣate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:344.006a: ihemāṃ rajanīṃ sādho nivasasva mayā saha
GE07mbh_12_u:344.006e: asau hi bhagavān sūryo mandaraśmir avāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:344.007c: uvāsa kila tāṃ rātriṃ saha tena dvijena vai
GE07mbh_12_u:344.008a: tat tac ca dharmasaṃyuktaṃ tayoḥ kathayatos tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:344.008c: vyatītā sā niśā kṛtsnā sukhena divasopamā
GE07mbh_12_u:344.010a: tataḥ sa vipraḥ kṛtadharmaniścayaḥ; kṛtābhyanujñaḥ svajanena dharmavit
GE07mbh_12_u:345.001a: sa vanāni vicitrāṇi tīrthāni ca sarāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_12_u:345.001c: abhigacchan krameṇa sma kaṃ cin munim upasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:345.002a: taṃ sa tena yathoddiṣṭaṃ nāgaṃ vipreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:345.002c: paryapṛcchad yathānyāyaṃ śrutvaiva ca jagāma saḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:345.004a: tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā rūpiṇī dharmavatsalā
GE07mbh_12_u:345.004c: darśayām āsa taṃ vipraṃ nāgapatnī pativratā
GE07mbh_12_u:345.005a: sā tasmai vidhivat pūjāṃ cakre dharmaparāyaṇā
GE07mbh_12_u:345.006c: draṣṭum icchāmi bhavati taṃ devaṃ nāgam uttamam
GE07mbh_12_u:345.007a: etad dhi paramaṃ kāryam etan me phalam īpsitam
GE07mbh_12_u:345.007c: anenārthena cāsmy adya saṃprāptaḥ pannagālayam nāgabhāryovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:345.009c: bhartur bhavatu kiṃ cānyat kriyatāṃ tad vadasva me
GE07mbh_12_u:345.010c: pratīkṣann āgamaṃ devi vatsyāmy asmin mahāvane
GE07mbh_12_u:345.011c: mamābhigamanaṃ prāpto vācyaś ca vacanaṃ tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:345.012a: aham apy atra vatsyāmi gomatyāḥ puline śubhe
GE07mbh_12_u:345.013a: tataḥ sa vipras tāṃ nāgīṃ samādhāya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:345.013c: tad eva pulinaṃ nadyāḥ prayayau brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:346.002a: sarve saṃbhūya sahitās tasya nāgasya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:346.002c: bhrātaras tanayā bhāryā yayus taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:346.003a: te 'paśyan puline taṃ vai vivikte niyatavratam
GE07mbh_12_u:346.004a: te sarve samabhikramya vipram abhyarcya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_12_u:346.005a: ṣaṣṭho hi divasas te 'dya prāptasyeha tapodhana
GE07mbh_12_u:346.005c: na cābhilaṣase kiṃ cid āhāraṃ dharmavatsala
GE07mbh_12_u:346.006a: asmān abhigataś cāsi vayaṃ ca tvām upasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:346.006c: kāryaṃ cātithyam asmābhir vayaṃ sarve kuṭumbinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:346.007a: mūlaṃ phalaṃ vā parṇaṃ vā payo vā dvijasattama
GE07mbh_12_u:346.007c: āhārahetor annaṃ vā bhoktum arhasi brāhmaṇa
GE07mbh_12_u:346.008d-0908_02: anaśnati tvayi brahman gacchema narakaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_12_u:346.009a: na hi no bhrūṇahā kaś cid rājāpathyo 'nṛto 'pi vā
GE07mbh_12_u:346.009c: pūrvāśī vā kule hy asmin devatātithibandhuṣu
GE07mbh_12_u:346.012a: kartavyo na ca saṃtāpo gamyatāṃ ca yathāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:346.012c: tannimittaṃ vrataṃ mahyaṃ naitad bhettum ihārhatha
GE07mbh_12_u:346.013c: svam eva bhavanaṃ jagmur akṛtārthā nararṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:347.001a: atha kāle bahutithe pūrṇe prāpto bhujaṃgamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:347.002c: upapannāṃ ca tāṃ sādhvīṃ pannagaḥ paryapṛcchata
GE07mbh_12_u:347.003c: pūrvam uktena vidhinā yuktā yuktena matsamam
GE07mbh_12_u:347.004a: na khalv asy akṛtārthena strībuddhyā mārdavīkṛtā
GE07mbh_12_u:347.009a: ahaṃ kasya kuto vāhaṃ kaḥ ko me ha bhaved iti
GE07mbh_12_u:347.010c: tavopadeśān nāgendra tac ca tattvena vedmi vai
GE07mbh_12_u:347.011a: sāhaṃ dharmaṃ vijānantī dharmanitye tvayi sthite
