GE07mbh_12_u:347.011c: satpathaṃ katham utsṛjya yāsyāmi viṣame pathi
GE07mbh_12_u:347.013c: sa ca kāryaṃ na me khyāti darśanaṃ tava kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:347.015a: ahaṃ tv anena nāgendra sāmapūrvaṃ samāhitā
GE07mbh_12_u:347.016a: etac chrutvā mahāprājña tatra gantuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:347.016c: dātum arhasi vā tasya darśanaṃ darśanaśravaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.001c: mānuṣaṃ kevalaṃ vipraṃ devaṃ vātha śucismite
GE07mbh_12_u:348.002a: ko hi māṃ mānuṣaḥ śakto draṣṭukāmo yaśasvini
GE07mbh_12_u:348.004a: vandanīyāś ca varadā vayam apy anuyāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.004c: manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa dhanādhyakṣā iti śrutiḥ nāgabhāryovāca
GE07mbh_12_u:348.005c: ekaṃ tv asya vijānāmi bhaktimān atiroṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.005d-0910_01: dvijānām iha bhaktaḥ sa kālavit kaliroṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.005d-0911_02: arthināṃ paramaṃ lokaṃ yaśaś cāgryaṃ samaśnute
GE07mbh_12_u:348.005d-0912_01: prārthitārthābhihantā te mā bhūt kaś cit kule 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:348.005d-0912_02: sāmarthye sati nāgendra narake sa hi majjati
GE07mbh_12_u:348.006a: sa hi kāryāntarākāṅkṣī jalepsuḥ stokako yathā
GE07mbh_12_u:348.006c: varṣaṃ varṣapriyaḥ pakṣī darśanaṃ tava kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_12_u:348.007a: na hi tvā daivataṃ kiṃ cid vivignaṃ pratipālayet
GE07mbh_12_u:348.007c: tulye hy abhijane jāto na kaś cit paryupāsate
GE07mbh_12_u:348.008a: tad roṣaṃ sahajaṃ tyaktvā tvam enaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:348.009c: rājā vā rājaputro vā bhrūṇahatyaiva yujyate
GE07mbh_12_u:348.010a: maunāj jñānaphalāvāptir dānena ca yaśo mahat
GE07mbh_12_u:348.012c: na yāti nirayaṃ kaś cid iti dharmavido viduḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.013a: abhimānena māno me jātidoṣeṇa vai mahān
GE07mbh_12_u:348.013c: roṣaḥ saṃkalpajaḥ sādhvi dagdho vācāgninā tvayā
GE07mbh_12_u:348.014a: na ca roṣād ahaṃ sādhvi paśyeyam adhikaṃ tamaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.015a: doṣasya hi vaśaṃ gatvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_12_u:348.018a: tad eṣa tapasāṃ śatruḥ śreyasaś ca nipātanaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:348.018c: nigṛhīto mayā roṣaḥ śrutvaiva vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:348.019c: yasya me tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā sarvaguṇānvitā
GE07mbh_12_u:348.020a: eṣa tatraiva gacchāmi yatra tiṣṭhaty asau dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:349.001a: sa pannagapatis tatra prayayau brāhmaṇaṃ prati
GE07mbh_12_u:349.001c: tam eva manasā dhyāyan kāryavattāṃ vicārayan
GE07mbh_12_u:349.002a: tam abhikramya nāgendro matimān sa nareśvara
GE07mbh_12_u:349.003a: bho bho kṣāmyābhibhāṣe tvāṃ na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:349.003c: iha tvam abhisaṃprāptaḥ kasyārthe kiṃ prayojanam
GE07mbh_12_u:349.004a: ābhimukhyād abhikramya snehāt pṛcchāmi te dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:349.004c: vivikte gomatītīre kiṃ vā tvaṃ paryupāsase
GE07mbh_12_u:349.005a: dharmāraṇyaṃ hi māṃ viddhi nāgaṃ draṣṭum ihāgatam
GE07mbh_12_u:349.005c: padmanābhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ tatra me kāryam āhitam
GE07mbh_12_u:349.006a: tasya cāham asāṃnidhyaṃ śrutavān asmi taṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:349.006c: svajanaṃ taṃ pratīkṣāmi parjanyam iva karṣakaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:349.008c: śravāḍhyas tvaṃ mahābhāga paraṃ snehena paśyasi
GE07mbh_12_u:349.009a: ahaṃ sa nāgo viprarṣe yathā māṃ vindate bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:349.009c: ājñāpaya yathā svairaṃ kiṃ karomi priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_12_u:349.010a: bhavantaṃ svajanād asmi saṃprāptaṃ śrutavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:349.010c: atas tvāṃ svayam evāhaṃ draṣṭum abhyāgato dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:349.011a: saṃprāptaś ca bhavān adya kṛtārthaḥ pratiyāsyati
GE07mbh_12_u:349.011c: visrabdho māṃ dvijaśreṣṭha viṣaye yoktum arhasi
GE07mbh_12_u:349.012a: vayaṃ hi bhavatā sarve guṇakrītā viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:349.012c: yas tvam ātmahitaṃ tyaktvā mām evehānurudhyase
GE07mbh_12_u:349.013c: kaṃ cid artham anarthajñaḥ praṣṭukāmo bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_12_u:349.016a: tasya me praśnam utpannaṃ chindhi tvam anilāśana
GE07mbh_12_u:349.016c: paścāt kāryaṃ vadiṣyāmi śrotum arhati me bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:350.001a: vivasvato gacchati paryayeṇa; voḍhuṃ bhavāṃs taṃ ratham ekacakram
GE07mbh_12_u:350.001c: āścaryabhūtaṃ yadi tatra kiṃ cid; dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā śaṃsitum arhasi tvam nāga uvāca
GE07mbh_12_u:350.002c: vasanty āśritya munayaḥ saṃsiddhā daivataiḥ saha
GE07mbh_12_u:350.003c: vijṛmbhaty ambare vipra kim āścaryataraṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:350.003d-0915_02: toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:350.003d-0915_04: dīptaḥ samīkṣate lokān kim āścaryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:350.004c: toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:350.005c: paryādatte punaḥ kāle kim āścaryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:350.006c: yato bījaṃ mahī ceyaṃ dhāryate sacarācaram
GE07mbh_12_u:350.007c: anādinidhano vipra kim āścaryam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_12_u:350.008a: āścaryāṇām ivāścaryam idam ekaṃ tu me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_12_u:350.008c: vimale yan mayā dṛṣṭam ambare sūryasaṃśrayāt
GE07mbh_12_u:350.010a: sa lokāṃs tejasā sarvān svabhāsā nirvibhāsayan
GE07mbh_12_u:350.013c: ekībhūtaṃ ca tat tejaḥ kṣaṇenādityatāṃ gatam
GE07mbh_12_u:350.014a: tatra naḥ saṃśayo jātas tayos tejaḥsamāgame
GE07mbh_12_u:350.014c: anayoḥ ko bhavet sūryo rathastho yo 'yam āgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:350.015c: ka eṣa divam ākramya gataḥ sūrya ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:351.001a: naiṣa devo 'nilasakho nāsuro na ca pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:351.001c: uñchavṛttivrate siddho munir eṣa divaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:351.002c: abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣaś ca āsīd vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:351.004d-0918_01: eṣa svena prabhāvena saṃprāpto nirmalāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_12_u:351.005a: na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:351.006a: etad evaṃvidhaṃ dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ tatra me dvija
GE07mbh_12_u:351.006c: saṃsiddho mānuṣaḥ kāyo yo 'sau siddhagatiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:352.003a: anuktvā madgataṃ kāryaṃ kvedānīṃ prasthito bhavān
GE07mbh_12_u:352.003c: ucyatāṃ dvija yat kāryaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:352.004a: uktānukte kṛte kārye mām āmantrya dvijarṣabha
GE07mbh_12_u:352.005a: na hi māṃ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā praṇayavān iha
GE07mbh_12_u:352.006a: tvayi cāhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha bhavān mayi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:352.006c: loko 'yaṃ bhavataḥ sarvaḥ kā cintā mayi te 'nagha
GE07mbh_12_u:352.008a: ya evāhaṃ sa eva tvam evam etad bhujaṃgama
GE07mbh_12_u:352.008c: ahaṃ bhavāṃś ca bhūtāni sarve sarvatragāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_12_u:352.009a: āsīt tu me bhogapate saṃśayaḥ puṇyasaṃcaye
GE07mbh_12_u:352.010a: eṣa me niścayaḥ sādho kṛtaḥ kāraṇavattaraḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:353.001c: dīkṣākāṅkṣī tadā rājaṃś cyavanaṃ bhārgavaṃ śritaḥ
GE07mbh_12_u:353.002c: tathaiva ca kathām etāṃ rājan kathitavāṃs tadā
GE07mbh_12_u:353.005a: devarājena ca purā kathaiṣā kathitā śubhā
GE07mbh_12_u:353.006a: yadā ca mama rāmeṇa yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_12_u:353.006c: vasubhiś ca tadā rājan katheyaṃ kathitā mama
GE07mbh_12_u:353.007a: pṛcchamānāya tattvena mayā tubhyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_12_u:353.007c: katheyaṃ kathitā puṇyā dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE07mbh_12_u:353.008a: tad eṣa paramo dharmo yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_12_u:353.009a: sa ca kila kṛtaniścayo dvijāgryo; bhujagapatipratideśitārthakṛtyaḥ
